atk-s0513a1:13: Tassa pāde namassitvā, katvā dhammassa cañjaliṃ;
atk-s0513a1:32: Bhāsissaṃ bhāsato taṃ me, sādhu gaṇhantu sādhavoti.
atk-s0513a1:34_0: Sā panāyaṃ jātakassa atthavaṇṇanā dūrenidānaṃ, avidūrenidānaṃ, santikenidānanti imāni
atk-s0513a1:34_1: tīṇi nidānāni dassetvā vaṇṇiyamānā ye naṃ suṇanti, tehi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya viññātattā
atk-s0513a1:34_2: yasmā suṭṭhu viññātā nāma hoti, tasmā taṃ tāni nidānāni dassetvā vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0513a1:35_0: Tattha ādito tāva tesaṃ nidānānaṃ paricchedo veditabbo. Dīpaṅkarapādamūlasmiñhi katābhinīhārassa
atk-s0513a1:35_1: mahāsattassa yāva vessantarattabhāvā cavitvā tusitapure nibbatti, tāva pavatto kathāmaggo
atk-s0513a1:35_2: dūrenidānaṃ nāma. Tusitabhavanato pana cavitvā yāva bodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutappatti,
atk-s0513a1:35_3: tāva pavatto kathāmaggo avidūrenidānaṃ nāma. Santikenidānaṃ pana tesu tesu ṭhānesu
atk-s0513a1:37_0: Tatridaṃ dūrenidānaṃ nāma – ito kira kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:37_1: matthake amaravatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. Tattha sumedho nāma brāhmaṇo paṭivasati ubhato
atk-s0513a1:37_2: sujāto mātito ca pitito ca saṃsuddhagahaṇiko yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā akkhitto
atk-s0513a1:37_3: anupakuṭṭho jātivādena abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato.
atk-s0513a1:37_4: So aññaṃ kammaṃ akatvā brāhmaṇasippameva uggaṇhi. Tassa daharakāleyeva mātāpitaro
atk-s0513a1:37_5: kālamakaṃsu. Athassa rāsivaḍḍhako amacco āyapotthakaṃ āharitvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādibharite
atk-s0513a1:37_6: gabbhe vivaritvā “ettakaṃ te, kumāra, mātu santakaṃ, ettakaṃ pitu santakaṃ, ettakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:37_7: ayyakapayyakāna”nti yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dhanaṃ ācikkhitvā “etaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti
atk-s0513a1:37_8: āha. Sumedhapaṇḍito cintesi – “imaṃ dhanaṃ saṃharitvā mayhaṃ pitupitāmahādayo paralokaṃ
atk-s0513a1:37_9: gacchantā ekaṃ kahāpaṇampi gahetvā na gatā, mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0513a1:37_10: vaṭṭatī”ti. So rañño ārocetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṃ datvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:37_11: pabbaji. Imassa panatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne sumedhakathā kathetabbā.
atk-s0513a1:37_12: Sā panesā kiñcāpi buddhavaṃse nirantaraṃ āgatāyeva, gāthāsambandhena pana āgatattā
atk-s0513a1:37_13: na suṭṭhu pākaṭā. Tasmā taṃ antarantarā gāthāya sambandhadīpakehi vacanehi saddhiṃ kathessāma.
atk-s0513a1:39: Kappasatasahassādhikānañhi catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake dasahi saddehi avivittaṃ “amaravatī”ti ca “amara”nti ca laddhanāmaṃ nagaraṃ ahosi, yaṃ sandhāya buddhavaṃse vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:43_0: Tattha dasahi saddehi avivittanti hatthisaddena, assasaddena, rathasaddena, bherisaddena,
atk-s0513a1:43_1: mudiṅgasaddena, vīṇāsaddena, sammasaddena, tāḷasaddena, saṅkhasaddena “asnātha, pivatha,
atk-s0513a1:43_2: khādathā”ti dasamena saddenāti imehi dasahi saddehi avivittaṃ ahosi. Tesaṃ pana saddānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:53: Lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṃ gato”ti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:54_0: Athekadivasaṃ so sumedhapaṇḍito uparipāsādavaratale rahogato hutvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0513a1:54_1: nisinno cintesi – “punabbhave, paṇḍita, paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ, tathā nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:54_2: sarīrabhedanaṃ, ahañca jātidhammo jarādhammo byādhidhammo maraṇadhammo, evaṃbhūtena
atk-s0513a1:54_3: mayā ajātiṃ ajaraṃ abyādhiṃ adukkhaṃ sukhaṃ sītalaṃ amatamahānibbānaṃ pariyesituṃ
atk-s0513a1:54_4: vaṭṭati, avassaṃ bhavato muccitvā nibbānagāminā ekena maggena bhavitabba”nti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:56: Dukkho punabbhavo nāma, sarīrassa ca bhedanaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:61: “Atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkā na hetuye;
atk-s0513a1:63_0: Tato uttaripi evaṃ cintesi – yathā hi loke dukkhassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ sukhaṃ nāma
atk-s0513a1:63_1: atthi, evaṃ bhave sati tappaṭipakkhena vibhavenāpi bhavitabbaṃ. Yathā ca uṇhe sati
atk-s0513a1:63_2: tassa vūpasamabhūtaṃ sītampi atthi, evaṃ rāgādīnaṃ aggīnaṃ vūpasamena nibbānenāpi
atk-s0513a1:63_3: bhavitabbaṃ. Yathā ca pāpassa lāmakassa dhammassa paṭipakkhabhūto kalyāṇo anavajjadhammopi
atk-s0513a1:63_4: atthiyeva, evameva pāpikāya jātiyā sati sabbajātikkhepanato ajātisaṅkhātena nibbānenāpi
atk-s0513a1:70_0: Aparampi cintesi – yathā nāma gūtharāsimhi nimuggena purisena dūrato pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ
atk-s0513a1:70_1: mahātaḷākaṃ disvā “katarena nu kho maggena ettha gantabba”nti taṃ taḷākaṃ gavesituṃ
atk-s0513a1:70_2: yuttaṃ. Yaṃ tassa agavesanaṃ, na so taḷākassa doso. Evameva kilesamaladhovane amatamahānibbānataḷāke
atk-s0513a1:70_3: vijjante tassa agavesanaṃ na amatanibbānamahātaḷākassa doso. Yathā ca corehi samparivārito
atk-s0513a1:70_4: puriso palāyanamagge vijjamānepi sace na palāyati, na so maggassa doso, purisasseva
atk-s0513a1:70_5: doso. Evameva kilesehi parivāretvā gahitassa purisassa vijjamāneyeva nibbānagāmimhi
atk-s0513a1:70_6: sive magge maggassa agavesanaṃ nāma na maggassa doso, puggalasseva doso. Yathā ca
atk-s0513a1:70_7: byādhipīḷito puriso vijjamāne byādhitikicchake vejje sace taṃ vejjaṃ gavesitvā byādhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:70_8: na tikicchāpeti, na so vejjassa doso, purisasseva doso. Evameva yo kilesabyādhipīḷito
atk-s0513a1:70_9: puriso kilesavūpasamamaggakovidaṃ vijjamānameva ācariyaṃ na gavesati, tasseva doso,
atk-s0513a1:72: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso taḷākassa so.
atk-s0513a1:74: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe.
atk-s0513a1:76: Na palāyati so puriso, na doso añjasassa so.
atk-s0513a1:78: Na gavesati taṃ maggaṃ, na doso sivamañjase.
atk-s0513a1:80: Na tikicchāpeti taṃ byādhiṃ, na doso so tikicchake.
atk-s0513a1:82: Na gavesati taṃ ācariyaṃ, na doso so vināyake”ti.
atk-s0513a1:83_0: Aparampi cintesi – yathā maṇḍanajātiko puriso kaṇṭhe āsattaṃ kuṇapaṃ chaḍḍetvā sukhī
atk-s0513a1:83_1: gacchati, evaṃ mayāpi imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkhena nibbānanagaraṃ pavisitabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:83_2: Yathā ca naranāriyo ukkārabhūmiyaṃ uccārapassāvaṃ katvā na taṃ ucchaṅgena vā ādāya
atk-s0513a1:83_3: dasantena vā veṭhetvā gacchanti, jigucchamānā pana anapekkhāva chaḍḍetvā gacchanti,
atk-s0513a1:83_4: evaṃ mayāpi imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ anapekkhena chaḍḍetvā amataṃ nibbānanagaraṃ pavisituṃ
atk-s0513a1:83_5: vaṭṭati. Yathā ca nāvikā nāma jajjaraṃ nāvaṃ anapekkhā chaḍḍetvā gacchanti, evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:83_6: ahampi imaṃ navahi vaṇamukhehi paggharantaṃ kāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkho nibbānapuraṃ
atk-s0513a1:83_7: pavisissāmi. Yathā ca puriso nānāratanāni ādāya corehi saddhiṃ maggaṃ gacchanto attano
atk-s0513a1:83_8: ratananāsabhayena te chaḍḍetvā khemaṃ maggaṃ gaṇhāti, evaṃ ayampi karajakāyo ratanavilopakacorasadiso.
atk-s0513a1:83_9: Sacāhaṃ ettha taṇhaṃ karissāmi, ariyamaggakusaladhammaratanaṃ me nassissati. Tasmā
atk-s0513a1:83_10: mayā imaṃ corasadisaṃ kāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā nibbānanagaraṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭatīti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:91: Chaḍḍayitvāna gacchissaṃ, vaccaṃ katvā yathā kuṭiṃ.
atk-s0513a1:100_0: Evaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito nānāvidhāhi upamāhi imaṃ nekkhammūpasaṃhitaṃ atthaṃ cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:100_1: sakanivesane aparimitaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0513a1:100_2: mahādānaṃ datvā vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ca pahāya amaranagarato nikkhamitvā ekakova
atk-s0513a1:100_3: himavante dhammikaṃ nāma pabbataṃ nissāya assamaṃ katvā tattha paṇṇasālañca caṅkamañca
atk-s0513a1:100_4: māpetvā pañcahi nīvaraṇadosehi vivajjitaṃ “evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādinā nayena vuttehi
atk-s0513a1:100_5: aṭṭhahi kāraṇaguṇehi samupetaṃ abhiññāsaṅkhātaṃ balaṃ āharituṃ tasmiṃ assamapade
atk-s0513a1:100_6: navadosasamannāgataṃ sāṭakaṃ pajahitvā dvādasaguṇasamannāgataṃ vākacīraṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0513a1:100_7: isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji. Evaṃ pabbajito aṭṭhadosasamākiṇṇaṃ taṃ paṇṇasālaṃ pahāya dasaguṇasamannāgataṃ
atk-s0513a1:100_8: rukkhamūlaṃ upagantvā sabbaṃ dhaññavikatiṃ pahāya pavattaphalabhojano hutvā nisajjaṭṭhānacaṅkamanavaseneva
atk-s0513a1:100_9: padhānaṃ padahanto sattāhabbhantareyeva aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ pañcannañca abhiññānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:100_10: lābhī ahosi. Evaṃ taṃ yathāpatthitaṃ abhiññābalaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:115_0: Tattha “assamo sukato mayhaṃ, paṇṇasālā sumāpitā”ti imāya pāḷiyā sumedhapaṇḍitena
atk-s0513a1:115_1: assamapaṇṇasālācaṅkamā sahatthā māpitā viya vuttā. Ayaṃ panettha attho – mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:115_2: “himavantaṃ ajjhogāhetvā ajja dhammikaṃ pabbataṃ pavisissāmī”ti nikkhantaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:115_3: sakko devānamindo vissakammadevaputtaṃ āmantesi – “tāta, ayaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito pabbajissāmīti
atk-s0513a1:115_4: nikkhanto, etassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ māpehī”ti. So tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ramaṇīyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:115_5: assamaṃ, suguttaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ, manoramaṃ caṅkamañca māpesi. Bhagavā pana tadā attano
atk-s0513a1:115_6: puññānubhāvena nipphannaṃ taṃ assamapadaṃ sandhāya sāriputta, tasmiṃ dhammikapabbate –
atk-s0513a1:118: Āha. Tattha sukato mayhanti sukato mayā. Paṇṇasālā sumāpitāti paṇṇacchadanasālāpi me sumāpitā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:119_0: Pañcadosavivajjitanti pañcime caṅkamadosā nāma – thaddhavisamatā, antorukkhatā, gahanacchannatā,
atk-s0513a1:119_2: pādā rujjanti, phoṭā uṭṭhahanti, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na labhati, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vipajjati.
atk-s0513a1:119_3: Mudusamatale pana phāsuvihāraṃ āgamma kammaṭṭhānaṃ sampajjati. Tasmā thaddhavisamabhūmibhāgatā
atk-s0513a1:119_4: eko dosoti veditabbo. Caṅkamassa anto vā majjhe vā koṭiyaṃ vā rukkhe sati pamādamāgamma
atk-s0513a1:119_5: caṅkamantassa nalāṭaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā paṭihaññatīti antorukkhatā dutiyo doso. Tiṇalatādigahanacchanne
atk-s0513a1:119_6: caṅkame caṅkamanto andhakāravelāyaṃ uragādike pāṇe akkamitvā vā māreti, tehi vā daṭṭho
atk-s0513a1:119_7: dukkhaṃ āpajjatīti gahanacchannatā tatiyo doso. Atisambādhe caṅkame vitthārato ratanike
atk-s0513a1:119_8: vā aḍḍharatanike vā caṅkamantassa paricchede pakkhalitvā nakhāpi aṅguliyopi bhijjantīti
atk-s0513a1:119_9: atisambādhatā catuttho doso. Ativisāle caṅkame caṅkamantassa cittaṃ vidhāvati, ekaggataṃ
atk-s0513a1:119_10: na labhatīti ativisālatā pañcamo doso. Puthulato pana diyaḍḍharatanaṃ dvīsu passesu
atk-s0513a1:119_11: ratanamattaanucaṅkamaṃ dīghato saṭṭhihatthaṃ mudutalaṃ samavippakiṇṇavālukaṃ caṅkamaṃ
atk-s0513a1:119_12: vaṭṭati cetiyagirimhi dīpappasādakamahindattherassa caṅkamanaṃ viya, tādisaṃ taṃ
atk-s0513a1:120_0: Aṭṭhaguṇasamupetanti aṭṭhahi samaṇasukhehi upetaṃ. Aṭṭhimāni samaṇasukhāni nāma –
atk-s0513a1:120_2: raṭṭhaṃ pīḷetvā dhanasāraṃ vā sīsakahāpaṇādīni vā gaṇhantesu rājakulesu raṭṭhapīḷanakilesābhāvo,
atk-s0513a1:120_3: upakaraṇesu nicchandarāgabhāvo, coravilope nibbhayabhāvo, rājarājamahāmattehi asaṃsaṭṭhabhāvo,
atk-s0513a1:120_4: catūsu disāsu appaṭihatabhāvoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā tasmiṃ assame vasantena
atk-s0513a1:120_5: sakkā honti imāni aṭṭha samaṇasukhāni vindituṃ, evaṃ aṭṭhaguṇasamupetaṃ taṃ assamaṃ māpesinti.
atk-s0513a1:121_0: Abhiññābalamāharinti pacchā tasmiṃ assame vasanto kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā abhiññānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:121_1: samāpattīnañca uppādanatthāya aniccato dukkhato vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā thāmappattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:121_2: vipassanābalaṃ āhariṃ. Yathā tasmiṃ vasanto taṃ balaṃ āharituṃ sakkomi, evaṃ taṃ
atk-s0513a1:121_3: assamaṃ tassa abhiññatthāya vipassanābalassa anucchavikaṃ katvā māpesinti attho.
atk-s0513a1:122_0: Sāṭakaṃ pajahiṃ tattha, navadosamupāgatanti etthāyaṃ anupubbikathā – tadā kira kuṭileṇacaṅkamādipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:122_2: pavivekakkhamaṃ assamaṃ māpetvā alaṅkatacaṅkamassa ubhosu antesu ālambanaphalakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:122_3: saṃvidhāya nisīdanatthāya caṅkamavemajjhe samatalaṃ muggavaṇṇasilaṃ māpetvā antopaṇṇasālāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:122_5: aggisālāyaṃ aṅgārakapalladāruādīnīti evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ pabbajitānaṃ upakārāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0513a1:122_6: taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ māpetvā paṇṇasālāya bhittiyaṃ “ye keci pabbajitukāmā ime parikkhāre
atk-s0513a1:122_7: gahetvā pabbajantū”ti akkharāni chinditvā devalokameva gate vissakammadevaputte sumedhapaṇḍito
atk-s0513a1:122_8: himavantapabbatapāde girikandarānusārena attano nivāsānurūpaṃ phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ olokento
atk-s0513a1:122_9: nadīnivattane vissakammanimmitaṃ sakkadattiyaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ assamaṃ disvā caṅkamanakoṭiṃ
atk-s0513a1:122_10: gantvā padavalañjaṃ apassanto “dhuvaṃ pabbajitā dhuragāme bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā kilantarūpā
atk-s0513a1:122_11: āgantvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nisinnā bhavissantī”ti cintetvā thokaṃ āgametvā “ativiya
atk-s0513a1:122_12: cirāyanti, jānissāmī”ti paṇṇāsālākuṭidvāraṃ vivaritvā anto pavisitvā ito cito ca
atk-s0513a1:122_13: olokento mahābhittiyaṃ akkharāni vācetvā “mayhaṃ kappiyaparikkhārā ete, ime gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:122_14: pabbajissāmī”ti attano nivatthapārutaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ pajahi. Tenāha “sāṭakaṃ pajahiṃ
atk-s0513a1:122_15: tatthā”ti. Evaṃ paviṭṭho ahaṃ, sāriputta, tassaṃ paṇṇasālāyaṃ sāṭakaṃ pajahiṃ.
atk-s0513a1:123_0: Navadosamupāgatanti sāṭakaṃ pajahanto nava dose disvā pajahinti dīpeti. Tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:123_1: pabbajitānañhi sāṭakasmiṃ nava dosā upaṭṭhahanti. Tesu tassa mahagghabhāvo eko doso,
atk-s0513a1:123_2: parapaṭibaddhatāya uppajjanabhāvo eko, paribhogena lahuṃ kilissanabhāvo eko. Kiliṭṭho
atk-s0513a1:123_3: hi dhovitabbo ca rajitabbo ca hoti. Paribhogena jīraṇabhāvo eko. Jiṇṇassa hi tunnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:123_4: vā aggaḷadānaṃ vā kātabbaṃ hoti. Puna pariyesanāya durabhisambhavabhāvo eko, tāpasapabbajjāya
atk-s0513a1:123_5: asāruppabhāvo eko, paccatthikānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvo eko. Yathā hi naṃ paccatthikā na
atk-s0513a1:123_6: gaṇhanti, evaṃ gopetabbo hoti. Paribhuñjantassa vibhūsanaṭṭhānabhāvo eko, gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:124_0: Vākacīraṃ nivāsesinti tadāhaṃ, sāriputta, ime nava dose disvā sāṭakaṃ pahāya vākacīraṃ
atk-s0513a1:124_1: nivāsesiṃ, muñjatiṇaṃ hīraṃ hīraṃ katvā ganthetvā katavākacīraṃ nivāsanapārupanatthāya ādiyinti attho.
atk-s0513a1:125_0: Dvādasaguṇamupāgatanti dvādasahi ānisaṃsehi samannāgataṃ. Vākacīrasmiñhi dvādasa
atk-s0513a1:125_1: ānisaṃsā – appagghaṃ sundaraṃ kappiyanti ayaṃ tāva eko ānisaṃso, sahatthā kātuṃ sakkāti
atk-s0513a1:125_2: ayaṃ dutiyo, paribhogena saṇikaṃ kilissati, dhoviyamānepi papañco natthīti ayaṃ tatiyo,
atk-s0513a1:125_3: paribhogena jiṇṇepi sibbitabbābhāvo catuttho, puna pariyesantassa sukhena karaṇabhāvo
atk-s0513a1:125_4: pañcamo, tāpasapabbajjāya sāruppabhāvo chaṭṭho, paccatthikānaṃ nirupabhogabhāvo sattamo,
atk-s0513a1:125_5: paribhuñjantassa vibhūsanaṭṭhānābhāvo aṭṭhamo, dhāraṇe sallahukabhāvo navamo, cīvarapaccaye
atk-s0513a1:125_6: appicchabhāvo dasamo, vākuppattiyā dhammikaanavajjabhāvo ekādasamo, vākacīre naṭṭhepi
atk-s0513a1:126_0: Aṭṭhadosasamākiṇṇaṃ, pajahiṃ paṇṇasālakanti. Kathaṃ pajahi? So kira varasāṭakayugaṃ
atk-s0513a1:126_1: omuñcitvā cīvaravaṃse laggitaṃ anojapupphadāmasadisaṃ rattaṃ vākacīraṃ gahetvā nivāsetvā,
atk-s0513a1:126_2: tassūpari aparaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ vākacīraṃ paridahitvā, punnāgapupphasantharasadisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:126_3: sakhuraṃ ajinacammaṃ ekaṃsaṃ katvā jaṭāmaṇḍalaṃ paṭimuñcitvā cūḷāya saddhiṃ niccalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:126_4: sārasūciṃ pavesetvā muttajālasadisāya sikkāya pavāḷavaṇṇaṃ kuṇḍikaṃ odahitvā tīsu
atk-s0513a1:126_5: ṭhānesu vaṅkakājaṃ ādāya ekissā kājakoṭiyā kuṇḍikaṃ, ekissā aṅkusapacchitidaṇḍakādīni
atk-s0513a1:126_6: olaggetvā khāribhāraṃ aṃse katvā, dakkhiṇena hatthena kattaradaṇḍaṃ gahetvā paṇṇasālato
atk-s0513a1:126_7: nikkhamitvā saṭṭhihatthe mahācaṅkame aparāparaṃ caṅkamanto attano vesaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0513a1:126_8: – “mayhaṃ manoratho matthakaṃ patto, sobhati vata me pabbajjā, buddhapaccekabuddhādīhi
atk-s0513a1:126_9: sabbehi dhīrapurisehi vaṇṇitā thomitā ayaṃ pabbajjā nāma, pahīnaṃ me gihibandhanaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:126_10: nikkhantosmi nekkhammaṃ, laddhā me uttamapabbajjā, karissāmi samaṇadhammaṃ, labhissāmi
atk-s0513a1:126_11: maggaphalasukha”nti ussāhajāto khārikājaṃ otāretvā caṅkamavemajjhe muggavaṇṇasilāpaṭṭe
atk-s0513a1:126_12: suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya nisinno divasabhāgaṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā,
atk-s0513a1:126_13: bidalamañcakapasse kaṭṭhattharikāya nipanno sarīraṃ utuṃ gāhāpetvā, balavapaccūse
atk-s0513a1:126_14: pabujjhitvā attano āgamanaṃ āvajjesi “ahaṃ gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ disvā amitabhogaṃ anantayasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:126_15: pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā nekkhammagavesako hutvā pabbajito, ito dāni paṭṭhāya pamādacāraṃ carituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0513a1:127_0: Pavivekañhi pahāya vicarantaṃ micchāvitakkamakkhikā khādanti, idāni mayā vivekamanubrūhetuṃ
atk-s0513a1:127_1: vaṭṭati. Ahañhi gharāvāsaṃ palibodhato disvā nikkhanto, ayañca manāpā paṇṇasālā,
atk-s0513a1:127_4: na etto atirekatarā viya me gehasampadā paññāyatī”ti paṇṇasālāya dose vicinanto aṭṭha dose passi.
atk-s0513a1:128_0: Paṇṇasālāparibhogasmiñhi aṭṭha ādīnavā – mahāsamārambhena dabbasambhāre samodhānetvā
atk-s0513a1:128_1: karaṇapariyesanabhāvo eko ādīnavo, tiṇapaṇṇamattikāsu patitāsu tāsaṃ punappunaṃ ṭhapetabbatāya
atk-s0513a1:128_2: nibandhajagganabhāvo dutiyo, senāsanaṃ nāma mahallakassa pāpuṇāti, avelāya vuṭṭhāpiyamānassa
atk-s0513a1:128_3: cittekaggatā na hotīti uṭṭhāpaniyabhāvo tatiyo, sītuṇhapaṭighātena kāyassa sukhumālakaraṇabhāvo
atk-s0513a1:128_4: catuttho, gehaṃ paviṭṭhena yaṃkiñci pāpaṃ sakkā kātunti garahāpaṭicchādanabhāvo pañcamo,
atk-s0513a1:128_5: “mayha”nti pariggahakaraṇabhāvo chaṭṭho, gehassa atthibhāvo nāma sadutiyakavāsoti
atk-s0513a1:128_6: sattamo, ūkāmaṅgulagharagoḷikādīnaṃ sādhāraṇatāya bahusādhāraṇabhāvo aṭṭhamo. Iti
atk-s0513a1:128_7: ime aṭṭha ādīnave disvā mahāsatto paṇṇasālaṃ pajati. Tenāha “aṭṭhadosasamākiṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:129_0: Upāgamiṃ rukkhamūlaṃ, guṇe dasahupāgatanti channaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dasahi guṇehi upetaṃ
atk-s0513a1:129_1: rukkhamūlaṃ upagatosmīti vadati. Tatrime dasa guṇā – appasamārambhatā eko guṇo, upagamanamattakameva
atk-s0513a1:129_2: hi tattha hoti; apaṭijagganatā dutiyo, tañhi sammaṭṭhampi asammaṭṭhampi paribhogaphāsukaṃ
atk-s0513a1:129_3: hotiyeva. Anuṭṭhāpariyabhāvo tatiyo, garahaṃ nappaṭicchādeti; tattha hi pāpaṃ karonto
atk-s0513a1:129_4: lajjatīti garahāya appaṭicchannabhāvo catuttho; abbhokāsavāso viya kāyaṃ na santhambhetīti
atk-s0513a1:129_5: kāyassa asanthambhanabhāvo pañcamo; pariggahakaraṇābhāvo chaṭṭho; gehālayapaṭikkhepo
atk-s0513a1:129_6: sattamo; bahusādhāraṇagehe viya “paṭijaggissāmi naṃ, nikkhamathā”ti nīharaṇakābhāvo
atk-s0513a1:129_7: aṭṭhamo; vasantassa sappītikabhāvo navamo; rukkhamūlasenāsanassa gatagataṭṭhāne sulabhatāya
atk-s0513a1:129_8: anapekkhabhāvo dasamoti ime dasa guṇe disvā rukkhamūlaṃ upāgatosmīti vadati.
atk-s0513a1:130_0: Imāni ettakāni kāraṇāni sallakkhetvā mahāsatto punadivase bhikkhāya gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:130_1: Athassa sampattagāme manussā mahantena ussāhena bhikkhaṃ adaṃsu. So bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0513a1:130_2: niṭṭhāpetvā assamaṃ āgamma nisīditvā cintesi “nāhaṃ āhāraṃ na labhāmīti pabbajito,
atk-s0513a1:130_3: siniddhāhāro nāmesa mānamadapurisamade vaḍḍheti, āhāramūlakassa ca dukkhassa anto
atk-s0513a1:130_4: natthi. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ vāpitaropitadhaññanibbattaṃ āhāraṃ pajahitvā pavattaphalabhojano
atk-s0513a1:130_5: bhaveyya”nti. So tato ṭṭhāya tathā katvā ghaṭento vāyamanto sattāhabbhantareyeva
atk-s0513a1:130_6: aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca abhiññāyo ca nibbattesi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:135_0: Evaṃ abhiññābalaṃ patvā sumedhatāpase samāpattisukhena vītināmente dīpaṅkaro nāma
atk-s0513a1:135_2: dasasahassī lokadhātu saṃkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, mahāviravaṃ viravi, dvattiṃsa
atk-s0513a1:135_3: pubbanimittāni pāturahesuṃ. Sumedhatāpaso samāpattisukhena vītināmento neva taṃ saddamassosi,
atk-s0513a1:135_4: na tāni nimittāni addasa. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:140_0: Tasmiṃ kāle dīpaṅkaradasabalo catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi parivuto anupubbena cārikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:140_1: caramāno rammaṃ nāma nagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasati. Rammanagaravāsino
atk-s0513a1:140_2: “dīpaṅkaro kira samaṇissaro paramātisambodhiṃ patvā pavattavaradhammacakko anupubbena
atk-s0513a1:140_3: cārikaṃ caramāno rammanagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasatī”ti sutvā sappinavanītādīni
atk-s0513a1:140_4: ceva bhesajjāni vatthacchādanāni ca gāhāpetvā gandhamālādihatthā yena buddho, yena
atk-s0513a1:140_5: dhammo, yena saṅgho, tanninnā tappoṇā tappabbhārā hutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
atk-s0513a1:140_6: gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā svātanāya nimantetvā
atk-s0513a1:141_0: Te punadivase mahādānaṃ sajjetvā nagaraṃ alaṅkaritvā dasabalassa āgamanamaggaṃ alaṅkarontā
atk-s0513a1:141_1: udakabhinnaṭṭhānesu paṃsuṃ pakkhipitvā samaṃ bhūmitalaṃ katvā rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇaṃ vālukaṃ
atk-s0513a1:141_2: ākiranti, lājāni ceva pupphāni ca vikiranti, nānāvirāgehi vatthehi dhajapaṭāke ussāpenti,
atk-s0513a1:141_3: kadaliyo ceva puṇṇaghaṭapantiyo ca patiṭṭhāpenti. Tasmiṃ kāle sumedhatāpaso attano
atk-s0513a1:141_4: assamapadā uggantvā tesaṃ manussānaṃ uparibhāgena ākāsena gacchanto te haṭṭhatuṭṭhe
atk-s0513a1:141_5: manusse disvā “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti ākāsato oruyha ekamantaṃ ṭhito manusse pucchi
atk-s0513a1:141_6: – “ambho kassa tumhe imaṃ maggaṃ alaṅkarothā”ti? Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:150_0: Manussā āhaṃsu “bhante sumedha, na tvaṃ jānāsi, dīpaṅkaradasabalo sammāsambodhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:150_1: patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko cārikaṃ caramāno amhākaṃ nagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre
atk-s0513a1:150_2: paṭivasati. Mayaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantayimhā, tassetaṃ buddhassa bhagavato āgamanamaggaṃ
atk-s0513a1:150_3: alaṅkaromā”ti. Sumedhatāpaso cintesi – “buddhoti kho ghosamattakampi loke dullabhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:150_4: pageva buddhuppādo, mayāpi imehi manussehi saddhiṃ dasabalassa maggaṃ alaṅkarituṃ
atk-s0513a1:150_5: vaṭṭatī”ti. So te manusse āha – “sace bho tumhe etaṃ maggaṃ buddhassa alaṅkarotha,
atk-s0513a1:150_6: mayhampi ekaṃ okāsaṃ detha, ahampi tumhehi saddhiṃ maggaṃ alaṅkarissāmī”ti. Te “sādhū”ti
atk-s0513a1:150_8: imaṃ ṭhānaṃ alaṅkarohī”ti adaṃsu. Sumedho buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā cintesi “ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:150_9: imaṃ okāsaṃ iddhiyā alaṅkarituṃ sakkomi, evaṃ alaṅkato pana mama manaṃ na paritosessati,
atk-s0513a1:150_10: ajja mayā kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti paṃsuṃ āharitvā tasmiṃ padese pakkhipi.
atk-s0513a1:151_0: Tassa tasmiṃ padese analaṅkateyeva dīpaṅkaro dasabalo mahānubhāvānaṃ chaḷabhiññānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:151_1: khīṇāsavānaṃ catūhi satasahassehi parivuto devatāsu dibbagandhamālādīhi pūjayantīsu
atk-s0513a1:151_2: dibbasaṅgītesu pavattantesu manussesu mānusakagandhehi ceva mālādīhi ca pūjayantesu
atk-s0513a1:151_3: anantāya buddhalīḷāya manosilātale vijambhamāno sīho viya taṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:151_4: maggaṃ paṭipajji. Sumedhatāpaso akkhīni ummīletvā alaṅkatamaggena āgacchantassa dasabalassa
atk-s0513a1:151_6: samparivāritaṃ maṇivaṇṇagaganatale nānappakārā vijjulatā viya āveḷāveḷabhūtā ceva
atk-s0513a1:151_7: yugalayugalabhūtā ca chabbaṇṇaghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjentaṃ rūpaggappattaṃ attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:151_8: oloketvā “ajja mayā dasabalassa jīvitapariccāgaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, mā bhagavā kalalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:151_9: akkami, maṇiphalakasetuṃ pana akkamanto viya saddhiṃ catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi
atk-s0513a1:151_10: mama piṭṭhiṃ maddamāno gacchatu, taṃ me bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti
atk-s0513a1:151_11: kese mocetvā ajinacammajaṭāmaṇḍalavākacīrāni kāḷavaṇṇe kalale pattharitvā maṇiphalakasetu
atk-s0513a1:158: ‘Idha bījāni ropissaṃ, khaṇo eva mā upaccagā’.
atk-s0513a1:162: Buddho buddhoti cintento, maggaṃ sodhemahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0513a1:179: Mā naṃ kalale akkamittho, hitāya me bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:180_0: So kalalapiṭṭhe nipannakova puna akkhīni ummīletvā dīpaṅkaradasabalassa buddhasiriṃ
atk-s0513a1:180_1: sampassamāno evaṃ cintesi – “sacāhaṃ iccheyyaṃ, sabbakilese jhāpetvā saṅghanavako
atk-s0513a1:180_2: hutvā rammanagaraṃ paviseyyaṃ. Aññātakavesena pana me kilese jhāpetvā nibbānappattiyā
atk-s0513a1:180_3: kiccaṃ natthi. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ dīpaṅkaradasabalo viya paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā dhammanāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:180_4: āropetvā mahājanaṃ saṃsārasāgarā uttāretvā pacchā parinibbāyeyyaṃ, idaṃ mayhaṃ patirūpa”nti.
atk-s0513a1:180_5: Tato aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipajji. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:195_0: Manussattabhāvasmiṃyeva hi ṭhatvā buddhattaṃ patthentassa patthanā samijjhati, na
atk-s0513a1:195_1: nāgassa vā supaṇṇassa vā devatāya vā patthanā samijjhati. Manussattabhāvepi purisaliṅge
atk-s0513a1:195_2: ṭhitasseva patthanā samijjhati, na itthiyā vā paṇḍakanapuṃsakaubhatobyañjanakānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:195_3: vā patthanā samijjhati. Purisassāpi tasmiṃ attabhāve arahattappattiyā hetusampannasseva
atk-s0513a1:195_4: patthanā samijjhati, no itarassa. Hetusampannassāpi jīvamānakabuddhasseva santike
atk-s0513a1:195_5: patthentassa patthanā samijjhati, parinibbute buddhe cetiyasantike vā bodhimūle vā
atk-s0513a1:195_6: patthentassa na samijjhati. Buddhānaṃ santike patthentassāpi pabbajjāliṅge ṭhitasseva
atk-s0513a1:195_7: samijjhati, no gihiliṅge ṭhitassa. Pabbajitassāpi pañcābhiññassa aṭṭhasamāpattilābhinoyeva
atk-s0513a1:195_8: samijjhati, na imāya guṇasampattiyā virahitassa. Guṇasampannenāpi yena attano jīvitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:195_9: buddhānaṃ pariccattaṃ hoti, tassa iminā adhikārena adhikārasampannasseva samijjhati,
atk-s0513a1:195_10: na itarassa. Adhikārasampannassāpi yassa buddhakārakadhammānaṃ atthāya mahanto chando
atk-s0513a1:195_11: ca ussāho ca vāyāmo ca pariyeṭṭhi ca, tasseva samijjhati, na itarassa.
atk-s0513a1:196_0: Tatridaṃ chandamahantatāya opammaṃ – sace hi evamassa “yo sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:196_1: ekodakībhūtaṃ attano bāhubalena uttaritvā pāraṃ gantuṃ samattho, so buddhattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0513a1:196_2: Yo vā pana sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ veḷugumbasañchannaṃ byūhitvā madditvā padasā gacchanto
atk-s0513a1:196_3: pāraṃ gantuṃ samattho, so buddhattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Yo vā pana sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:196_4: sattiyo ākoṭetvā nirantaraṃ sattiphalasamākiṇṇaṃ padasā akkamamāno pāraṃ gantuṃ samattho,
atk-s0513a1:196_5: so buddhattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Yo vā pana sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ vītaccitaṅgārabharitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:196_6: pādehi maddamāno pāraṃ gantuṃ samattho, so buddhattaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti. Yo etesu ekampi
atk-s0513a1:196_7: attano dukkaraṃ na maññati, “ahaṃ etampi taritvā vā gantvā vā pāraṃ gahessāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:196_8: evaṃ mahantena chandena ca ussāhena ca vāyāmena ca pariyeṭṭhiyā ca samannāgato hoti,
atk-s0513a1:196_9: tassa patthanā samijjhati, na itarassa. Sumedhatāpaso pana ime aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā
atk-s0513a1:197_0: Dīpaṅkaropi bhagavā āgantvā sumedhatāpasassa sīsabhāge ṭhatvā maṇisīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭento
atk-s0513a1:197_1: viya pañcavaṇṇappasādasampannāni akkhīni ummīletvā kalalapiṭṭhe nipannaṃ sumedhatāpasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:197_2: disvā “ayaṃ tāpaso buddhattāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipanno, ijjhissati nu kho imassa
atk-s0513a1:197_3: patthanā, udāhu no”ti anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pesetvā upadhārento “ito kappasatasahassādhikāni
atk-s0513a1:197_4: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni atikkamitvā gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti ñatvā ṭhitakova
atk-s0513a1:197_5: parisamajjhe byākāsi – “passatha no tumhe imaṃ uggatapaṃ tāpasaṃ kalalapiṭṭhe nipanna”nti?
atk-s0513a1:197_6: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti. “Ayaṃ buddhattāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipanno, samijjhissati imassa
atk-s0513a1:197_7: patthanā, ito kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake gotamo nāma
atk-s0513a1:197_8: buddho bhavissati. Tasmiṃ panassa attabhāve kapilavatthu nāma nagaraṃ nivāso bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:197_9: māyā nāma devī mātā, suddhodano nāma rājā pitā, aggasāvako upatisso nāma thero, dutiyasāvako
atk-s0513a1:197_10: kolito nāma, buddhupaṭṭhāko ānando nāma, aggasāvikā khemā nāma therī, dutiyasāvikā
atk-s0513a1:197_11: uppalavaṇṇā nāma therī bhavissati, paripakkañāṇo mahābhinikkhamanaṃ katvā mahāpadhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:197_12: padahitvā nigrodhamūle pāyāsaṃ paṭiggahetvā nerañjarāya tīre paribhuñjitvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a1:201: Aparimeyye ito kappe, buddho loke bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:211: Pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṃ hessati gotamo.

atk-s0513a1:218_0: Sumedhatāpaso “mayhaṃ kira patthanā samijjhissatī”ti somanassappatto ahosi. Mahājano
atk-s0513a1:218_1: dīpaṅkaradasabalassa vacanaṃ sutvā “sumedhatāpaso kira buddhabījaṃ buddhaṅkuro”ti
atk-s0513a1:218_2: haṭṭhatuṭṭho ahosi. Evañcassa ahosi “yathā nāma puriso nadiṃ taranto ujukena titthena
atk-s0513a1:218_3: uttarituṃ asakkonto heṭṭhātitthena uttarati, evameva mayampi dīpaṅkaradasabalassa
atk-s0513a1:218_4: sāsane maggaphalaṃ alabhamānā anāgate yadā tvaṃ buddho bhavissasi, tadā tava sammukhā
atk-s0513a1:218_5: maggaphalaṃ sacchikātuṃ samatthā bhaveyyāmā”ti patthanaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu. Dīpaṅkaradasabalopi
atk-s0513a1:218_6: bodhisattaṃ pasaṃsitvā aṭṭhahi pupphamuṭṭhīhi pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi,
atk-s0513a1:218_7: tepi catusatasahassasaṅkhā khīṇāsavā bodhisattaṃ gandhehi ca mālehi ca pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:218_8: katvā pakkamiṃsu. Devamanussā pana tatheva pūjetvā vanditvā pakkantā.
atk-s0513a1:219_0: Bodhisatto sabbesaṃ paṭikkantakāle sayanā vuṭṭhāya “pāramiyo vicinissāmī”ti puppharāsimatthake
atk-s0513a1:219_1: pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi. Evaṃ nisinne bodhisatte sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā
atk-s0513a1:219_2: sannipatitvā sādhukāraṃ datvā “ayya sumedhatāpasa, porāṇakabodhisattānaṃ pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0513a1:219_3: ābhujitvā ‘pāramiyo vicinissāmā’ti nisinnakāle yāni pubbanimittāni nāma paññāyanti,
atk-s0513a1:219_4: tāni sabbānipi ajja pātubhūtāni, nissaṃsayena tvaṃ buddho bhavissasi, mayampetaṃ
atk-s0513a1:219_5: jānāma ‘yassetāni nimittāni paññāyanti, ekantena so buddho hoti’, tvaṃ attano vīriyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:219_6: daḷhaṃ katvā paggaṇhā”ti bodhisattaṃ nānappakārāhi thutīhi abhitthuniṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:233: Narā nāgā ca gandhabbā, abhivādetvāna pakkamuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:237: Pītiyā ca abhissanno, pallaṅkaṃ ābhujiṃ tadā.

atk-s0513a1:253: Tepajja pupphitā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:254: ‘Latā vā yadi vā rukkhā, phalabhārā honti tāvade;
atk-s0513a1:255: Tepajja phalitā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:257: Tepajja ratanā jotanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:258: ‘Mānusakā ca dibbā ca, turiyā vajjanti tāvade;
atk-s0513a1:261: Tepi ajja pavassanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:265: Tepajja nibbutā aggī, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:267: Tepi ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:273: Tepajja āsayā chuddhā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:274: ‘Na hoti arati sattānaṃ, santuṭṭhā honti tāvade;
atk-s0513a1:275: Tepajja sabbe santuṭṭhā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:278: ‘Rāgo tadā tanu hoti, doso moho vinassati;
atk-s0513a1:279: Tepajja vigatā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.

atk-s0513a1:283: Tena liṅgena jānāma, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.

atk-s0513a1:289: Tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.

atk-s0513a1:296_0: Bodhisatto dīpaṅkaradasabalassa ca dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānañca vacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a1:296_1: bhiyyoso mattāya sañjātussāho hutvā cintesi “buddhā nāma amoghavacanā, natthi buddhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:296_2: kathāya aññathattaṃ. Yathā hi ākāse khittaleḍḍussa patanaṃ dhuvaṃ, jātassa maraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:296_3: dhuvaṃ, aruṇe uggate sūriyassuṭṭhānaṃ, āsayā nikkhantasīhassa sīhanādanadanaṃ, garugabbhāya
atk-s0513a1:296_4: itthiyā bhāramoropanaṃ avassaṃbhāvī, evameva buddhānaṃ vacanaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ amoghaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:296_5: addhā ahaṃ buddho bhavissāmī”ti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:300: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:301: “Yathā khittaṃ nabhe leḍḍu, dhuvaṃ patati bhūmiyaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:311_0: So “dhuvāhaṃ buddho bhavissāmī”ti evaṃ katasanniṭṭhāno buddhakārake dhamme upadhāretuṃ
atk-s0513a1:311_1: “kahaṃ nu kho buddhakārakadhammā, kiṃ uddhaṃ, udāhu adho, disāsu, vidisāsū”ti anukkamena
atk-s0513a1:311_2: sakalaṃ dhammadhātuṃ vicinanto porāṇakabodhisattehi āsevitanisevitaṃ paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ
atk-s0513a1:311_3: disvā evaṃ attānaṃ ovadi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ
atk-s0513a1:311_4: pūreyyāsi. Yathā hi nikkujjito udakakumbho nissesaṃ katvā udakaṃ vamatiyeva, na paccāharati,
atk-s0513a1:311_5: evameva dhanaṃ vā yasaṃ vā puttaṃ vā dāraṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ vā anoloketvā sampattayācakānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:311_6: sabbaṃ icchiticchitaṃ nissesaṃ katvā dadamāno bodhirukkhamūle nisīditvā buddho bhavissasī”ti
atk-s0513a1:311_7: paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:313: Uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, yāvatā dhammadhātuyā.
atk-s0513a1:316: “Imaṃ tvaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:321: Dadāhi dānaṃ nissesaṃ, kumbho viya adhokato”ti.
atk-s0513a1:322_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato
atk-s0513a1:322_1: dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya sīlapāramimpi
atk-s0513a1:322_2: pūreyyāsi. Yathā hi camarīmigo nāma jīvitampi anoloketvā attano vālameva rakkhati,
atk-s0513a1:322_3: evaṃ tvampi ito paṭṭhāya jīvitampi anoloketvā sīlameva rakkhanto buddho bhavissasī”ti
atk-s0513a1:322_4: dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:327: “Imaṃ tvaṃ dutiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:330: Upeti maraṇaṃ tattha, na vikopeti vāladhiṃ.
atk-s0513a1:332: Parirakkha sabbadā sīlaṃ, camarī viya vāladhi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:333_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato
atk-s0513a1:333_1: tatiyaṃ nekkhammapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya nekkhammapāramimpi
atk-s0513a1:333_2: pūreyyāsi. Yathā hi ciraṃ bandhanāgāre vasamāno puriso na tattha sinehaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:333_3: atha kho ukkaṇṭhitoyeva avasitukāmo hoti, evameva tvampi sabbabhave bandhanāgārasadise
atk-s0513a1:333_4: katvā sabbabhavehi ukkaṇṭhito muccitukāmo hutvā nekkhammābhimukhova hohi, evaṃ buddho
atk-s0513a1:333_5: bhavissasī”ti tatiyaṃ nekkhammapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:338: “Imaṃ tvaṃ tatiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:341: Na tattha rāgaṃ janeti, muttimeva gavesati.
atk-s0513a1:344_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato
atk-s0513a1:344_1: catutthaṃ paññāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya paññāpāramimpi
atk-s0513a1:344_2: pūreyyāsi. Hīnamajjhimukkaṭṭhesu kañci avajjetvā sabbepi paṇḍite upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:344_3: puccheyyāsi. Yathā hi piṇḍacāriko bhikkhu hīnādikesu kulesu kiñci avajjetvā paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0513a1:344_4: piṇḍāya caranto khippaṃ yāpanaṃ labhati, evaṃ tvampi sabbapaṇḍite upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:344_5: pucchanto buddho bhavissasī”ti catutthaṃ paññāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:349: “Imaṃ tvaṃ catutthaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:352: Kulāni na vivajjento, evaṃ labhati yāpanaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:355_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato
atk-s0513a1:355_1: pañcamaṃ vīriyapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya vīriyapāramimpi
atk-s0513a1:355_2: pūreyyāsi. Yathā hi sīho migarājā sabbairiyāpathesu daḷhavīriyo hoti, evaṃ tvampi

atk-s0513a1:355_4: pañcamaṃ vīriyapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:360: “Imaṃ tvaṃ pañcamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:366_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato
atk-s0513a1:366_1: chaṭṭhaṃ khantipāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya khantipāramimpi
atk-s0513a1:366_2: pūreyyāsi. Sammānanepi avamānanepi khamova bhaveyyāsi. Yathā hi pathaviyaṃ nāma sucimpi
atk-s0513a1:366_3: pakkhipanti asucimpi, na tena pathavī sinehaṃ, na paṭighaṃ karoti, khamati sahati
atk-s0513a1:366_4: adhivāsetiyeva, evaṃ tvampi sammānanāvamānanakkhamova samāno buddho bhavissasī”ti
atk-s0513a1:366_5: chaṭṭhaṃ khantipāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:371: “Imaṃ tvaṃ chaṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:374: Sabbaṃ sahati nikkhepaṃ, na karoti paṭighaṃ tayā.
atk-s0513a1:377_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato
atk-s0513a1:377_1: sattamaṃ saccapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya saccapāramimpi
atk-s0513a1:377_2: pūreyyāsi. Asaniyā matthake patamānāyapi dhanādīnaṃ atthāya chandādivasena sampajānamusāvādaṃ
atk-s0513a1:377_3: nāma mākāsi. Yathā hi osadhitārakā nāma sabbautūsu attano gamanavīthiṃ jahitvā aññāya
atk-s0513a1:377_4: vīthiyā na gacchati, sakavīthiyāva gacchati, evameva tvampi saccaṃ pahāya musāvādaṃ
atk-s0513a1:377_5: nāma akarontoyeva buddho bhavissasī”ti sattamaṃ saccapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:382: “Imaṃ tvaṃ sattamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:385: Samaye utuvasse vā, na vokkamati vīthito.
atk-s0513a1:388_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato
atk-s0513a1:388_1: aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhānapāramimpi
atk-s0513a1:388_2: pūreyyāsi. Yaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi, tasmiṃ adhiṭṭhāne niccalo bhaveyyāsi. Yathā hi pabbato
atk-s0513a1:388_3: nāma sabbadisāsu vātehi pahaṭopi na kampati na calati, attano ṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0513a1:388_4: evameva tvampi attano adhiṭṭhāne niccalo hontova buddho bhavissasī”ti aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ
atk-s0513a1:393: “Imaṃ tvaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:394: Tattha tvaṃ acalo hutvā, sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasi.
atk-s0513a1:399_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato
atk-s0513a1:399_1: navamaṃ mettāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya navamaṃ
atk-s0513a1:399_2: mettāpāramimpi pūreyyāsi. Ahitesupi hitesupi ekacitto bhaveyyāsi. Yathā hi udakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:399_3: nāma pāpajanassāpi kalyāṇajanassāpi sītibhāvaṃ ekasadisaṃ katvā pharati, evameva
atk-s0513a1:399_4: tvampi sabbasattesu mettacittena ekacittova honto buddho bhavissasī”ti navamaṃ mettāpāramiṃ
atk-s0513a1:404: “Imaṃ tvaṃ navamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:405: Mettāya asamo hohi, yadi bodhiṃ pattumicchasi.
atk-s0513a1:410_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato
atk-s0513a1:410_1: dasamaṃ upekkhāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya upekkhāpāramimpi
atk-s0513a1:410_2: pūreyyāsi. Sukhepi dukkhepi majjhattova bhaveyyāsi. Yathā hi pathavī nāma sucimpi
atk-s0513a1:410_3: asucimpi pakkhippamānā majjhattāva hoti, evameva tvampi sukhadukkhesu majjhattova
atk-s0513a1:410_4: honto buddho bhavissasī”ti dasamaṃ upekkhāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:415: “Imaṃ tvaṃ dasamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:421_0: Tato cintesi – “imasmiṃ loke bodhisattehi pūretabbā bodhiparipācanā buddhakārakadhammā
atk-s0513a1:421_1: ettakāyeva, dasa pāramiyo ṭhapetvā aññe natthi, imāpi dasa pāramiyo uddhaṃ ākāsepi
atk-s0513a1:421_2: natthi, heṭṭhā pathaviyampi, puratthimādīsu disāsupi natthi, mayhameva pana hadayamaṃsabbhantare
atk-s0513a1:421_3: patiṭṭhitā”ti. Evaṃ tāsaṃ hadaye patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ disvā sabbāpi tā daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:421_4: punappunaṃ sammasanto anulomapaṭilomaṃ sammasati, pariyante gahetvā ādiṃ pāpeti,
atk-s0513a1:421_5: ādimhi gahetvā pariyante ṭhapeti, majjhe gahetvā ubhato osāpeti, ubhato koṭīsu hetvā
atk-s0513a1:421_6: majjhe osāpeti. Bāhirakabhaṇḍapariccāgo dānapāramī nāma, aṅgapariccāgo dānaupapāramī
atk-s0513a1:421_7: nāma, jīvitapariccāgo dānaparamatthapāramī nāmāti dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo
atk-s0513a1:421_8: dasa paramatthapāramiyo yantatelaṃ vinivaṭṭento viya mahāmeruṃ matthaṃ katvā cakkavāḷamahāsamuddaṃ
atk-s0513a1:421_9: āluḷento viya ca sammasi. Tassevaṃ dasa pāramiyo sammasantassa dhammatejena catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā
atk-s0513a1:421_10: ayaṃ mahāpathavī hatthinā akkantanaḷakalāpo viya, pīḷiyamānaṃ ucchuyantaṃ viya ca
atk-s0513a1:421_11: mahāviravaṃ viravamānā saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, kulālacakkaṃ viya telayantacakkaṃ
atk-s0513a1:423: Tatuddhaṃ natthi aññatra, daḷhaṃ tattha patiṭṭhaha.
atk-s0513a1:427: Telayante yathā cakkaṃ, evaṃ kampati medanī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:428_0: Mahāpathaviyā kampamānāya rammanagaravāsino saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā yugantavātabbhāhatā
atk-s0513a1:428_1: mahāsālā viya mucchitamucchitāva papatiṃsu, ghaṭādīni kulālabhājanāni pavaṭṭantāni
atk-s0513a1:428_2: aññamaññaṃ paharantāni cuṇṇavicuṇṇāni ahesuṃ. Mahājano bhītatasito satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:428_3: “kiṃ nu kho bhagavā nāgāvaṭṭo ayaṃ bhūtayakkhadevatāsu aññatarāvaṭṭoti na hi mayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:428_4: etaṃ jānāma, apica kho sabbopi ayaṃ mahājano upadduto, kiṃ nu kho imassa lokassa
atk-s0513a1:428_5: pāpakaṃ bhavissati, udāhu kalyāṇaṃ, kathetha no etaṃ kāraṇa”nti āha. Atha satthā
atk-s0513a1:428_6: tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “tumhe mā bhāyatha mā cintayittha, natthi vo itonidānaṃ bhayaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:428_7: Yo so mayā ajja sumedhapaṇḍito ‘anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī’ti byākato,
atk-s0513a1:428_8: so dasa pāramiyo sammasati, tassa dasa pāramiyo sammasantassa viloḷentassa dhammatejena
atk-s0513a1:428_9: sakaladasasahassilokadhātu ekappahārena kampati, ceva, ravati cā”ti āha. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:430: Pavedhamānā sā tattha, mucchitā sesi bhūmiyaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:436: Sabbo upadduto loko, taṃ vinodehi cakkhuma’.
atk-s0513a1:438: Vissatthā hotha mā bhātha, imasmiṃ pathavikampane.
atk-s0513a1:443_0: Mahājano tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho mālāgandhavilepanaṃ ādāya rammanagarā
atk-s0513a1:443_1: nikkhamitvā bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mālādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:443_2: rammanagarameva pāvisi. Bodhisattopi dasa pāramiyo sammasitvā vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:448_0: Atha bodhisattaṃ āsanā vuṭṭhahantaṃ sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sannipatitvā
atk-s0513a1:448_1: dibbehi mālāgandhehi pūjetvā vanditvā “ayya sumedhatāpasa, tayā ajja dīpaṅkaradasabalassa
atk-s0513a1:448_2: pādamūle mahatī patthanā patthitā, sā te anantarāyena samijjhatu, mā te bhayaṃ vā
atk-s0513a1:448_3: chambhitattaṃ vā ahosi, sarīre appamattakopi rogo mā uppajji, khippaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā
atk-s0513a1:448_4: sammāsambodhiṃ paṭivijjha. Yathā pupphūpagaphalūpagā rukkhā samaye pupphanti ceva
atk-s0513a1:448_5: phalanti ca, tatheva tvampi samayaṃ anatikkamitvā khippaṃ sambodhimuttamaṃ phusassū”tiādīni
atk-s0513a1:448_6: thutimaṅgalāni payirudāhaṃsu, evaṃ payirudāhitvā attano attano devaṭṭhānameva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:448_7: Bodhisattopi devatāhi abhitthuto “ahaṃ dasa pāramiyo pūretvā kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:448_8: catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake buddho bhavissāmī”ti vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:448_9: nabhaṃ abbhuggantvā himavantameva agamāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:451: “Vedayanti ca te sotthiṃ, devā mānusakā ubho;
atk-s0513a1:452: Mahantaṃ patthitaṃ tuyhaṃ, taṃ labhassu yathicchitaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:454: Mā te bhavantvantarāyā, phusa khippaṃ bodhimuttamaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:457: “Yathā ye keci sambuddhā, pūrayuṃ dasa pāramī;
atk-s0513a1:458: Tatheva tvaṃ mahāvīra, pūraya dasa pāramī.
atk-s0513a1:466: Tatheva lokā muccitvā, viroca siriyā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:470: Te dhamme paripūrento, pavanaṃ pāvisī tadā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:472_0: Rammanagaravāsinopi kho nagaraṃ pavisitvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:472_1: adaṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā mahājanaṃ saraṇādīsu patiṭṭhāpetvā rammanagaramhā
atk-s0513a1:472_2: nikkhamitvā tato uddhampi yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhanto sabbaṃ buddhakiccaṃ katvā anukkamena
atk-s0513a1:472_3: anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ buddhavaṃse
atk-s0513a1:476: Kañci pañcasu sīlesu, sīle dasavidhe paraṃ.
atk-s0513a1:478: Kassaci asame dhamme, deti so paṭisambhidā.
atk-s0513a1:505: “Ye keci tena samayena, jahanti mānusaṃ bhavaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:518: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:521: “Sā ca iddhi so ca yaso, tāni ca pādesu cakkaratanāni;
atk-s0513a1:523_0: Dīpaṅkarassa pana bhagavato aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā koṇḍañño nāma
atk-s0513a1:523_1: satthā udapādi. Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ. Paṭhamasannipāte koṭisatasahassaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:523_2: dutiye koṭisahassaṃ, tatiye navutikoṭiyo. Tadā bodhisatto vijitāvī nāma cakkavattī
atk-s0513a1:523_3: hutvā koṭisatasahassasaṅkhassa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:523_4: Satthā bodhisattaṃ “buddho bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā dhammaṃ desesi. So satthu dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:523_5: sutvā rajjaṃ niyyādetvā pabbaji. So tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca
atk-s0513a1:523_6: abhiññāyo ca uppādetvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmaloke nibbatti. Koṇḍaññassa buddhassa
atk-s0513a1:523_7: pana rammavatī nāma nagaraṃ, sunando nāma khattiyo pitā, sujātā nāma devī mātā, bhaddo
atk-s0513a1:523_8: ca subhaddo ca dve aggasāvakā, anuruddho nāmupaṭṭhāko, tissā ca upatissā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:523_9: sālakalyāṇī bodhi, aṭṭhāsītihatthubbedhaṃ sarīraṃ, vassasatasahassaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:526_0: Tassa aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kappe caturo buddhā nibbattiṃsu
atk-s0513a1:526_1: maṅgalo, sumano, revato, sobhitoti. Maṅgalassa bhagavato tayo sannipātā ahesuṃ. Tesu
atk-s0513a1:526_2: paṭhamasannipāte koṭisatasahassaṃ bhikkhū ahesuṃ, dutiye koṭisahassaṃ, tatiye navutikoṭiyo.
atk-s0513a1:526_3: Vemātikabhātā kirassa ānandakumāro nāma navutikoṭisaṅkhāya parisāya saddhiṃ dhammassavanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:526_4: satthu santikaṃ agamāsi. Satthā tassa anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, so saddhiṃ parisāya
atk-s0513a1:526_5: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Satthā tesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ pubbacaritaṃ olokento
atk-s0513a1:526_6: iddhimayapattacīvarassa upanissayaṃ disvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā “etha, bhikkhavo”ti
atk-s0513a1:526_7: āha. Sabbe taṅkhaṇaññeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā saṭṭhivassamahātherā viya ākappasampannā
atk-s0513a1:526_8: hutvā satthāraṃ vanditvā parivārayiṃsu. Ayamassa tatiyo sāvakasannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:527_0: Yathā pana aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ samantā asītihatthappamāṇāyeva sarīrappabhā ahosi, na
atk-s0513a1:527_1: evaṃ tassa tassa pana bhagavato sarīrappabhā niccakālaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā
atk-s0513a1:527_2: aṭṭhāsi. Rukkhapathavipabbatasamuddādayo antamaso ukkhalikādīni upādāya suvaṇṇapaṭṭapariyonaddhā
atk-s0513a1:527_3: viya ahesuṃ. Āyuppamāṇaṃ panassa navutivassasahassāni ahosi. Ettakaṃ kālaṃ candimasūriyādayo
atk-s0513a1:527_4: attano pabhāya virocituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu, rattindivaparicchedo na paññāyittha. Divā sūriyālokena
atk-s0513a1:527_5: viya sattā niccaṃ buddhālokeneva vicariṃsu, sāyaṃ pupphitakusumānaṃ, pāto ravanakasakuṇādīnañca
atk-s0513a1:528_0: Kiṃ pana aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ ayamānubhāvo natthīti? No natthi. Tepi hi ākaṅkhamānā
atk-s0513a1:528_1: dasasahassiṃ vā lokadhātuṃ tato vā bhiyyo ābhāya phareyyuṃ. Maṅgalassa pana bhagavato
atk-s0513a1:528_2: pubbapatthanāvasena aññesaṃ byāmappabhā viya sarīrappabhā niccakālameva dasasahassilokadhātuṃ
atk-s0513a1:528_3: pharitvā aṭṭhāsi. So kira bodhisattacariyakāle vessantarasadise attabhāve ṭhito saputtadāro
atk-s0513a1:528_4: vaṅkapabbatasadise pabbate vasi. Atheko kharadāṭhiko nāma yakkho mahāpurisassa dānajjhāsayataṃ
atk-s0513a1:528_5: sutvā brāhmaṇavaṇṇena upasaṅkamitvā mahāsattaṃ dve dārake yāci. Mahāsatto “dadāmi
atk-s0513a1:528_6: brāhmaṇassa puttake”ti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udakapariyantaṃ pathaviṃ kampento dvepi dārake
atk-s0513a1:528_7: adāsi. Yakkho caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhatvā passantasseva mahāsattassa
atk-s0513a1:528_8: mūlakalāpe viya dve dārake khādi. Mahāpurisassa yakkhaṃ oloketvā mukhe vivaṭamatte
atk-s0513a1:528_9: aggijālaṃ viya lohitadhāraṃ uggiramānaṃ tassa mukhaṃ disvāpi kesaggamattampi domanassaṃ
atk-s0513a1:528_10: na uppajji. “Sudinnaṃ vata me dāna”nti cintayato panassa sarīre mahantaṃ pītisomanassa
atk-s0513a1:528_11: udapādi. So “imassa me nissandena anāgate imināva nīhārena rasmiyo nikkhamantū”ti
atk-s0513a1:528_12: patthanaṃ akāsi. Tassa taṃ patthanaṃ nissāya buddhabhūtassa sarīrato rasmiyo nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a1:529_0: Aparampissa pubbacaritaṃ atthi. So kira bodhisattakāle ekassa buddhassa cetiyaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:529_1: “imassa buddhassa mayā jīvitaṃ pariccajituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti daṇḍadīpikāveṭhananiyāmena
atk-s0513a1:529_2: sakalasarīraṃ veṭhāpetvā ratanamattamakuḷaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ sappissa
atk-s0513a1:529_3: pūrāpetvā tattha sahassavaṭṭiyo jālāpetvā taṃ sīsenādāya sakalasarīraṃ jālāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:529_4: cetiyaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto sakalarattiṃ vītināmesi. Evaṃ yāva aruṇuggamanā vāyamantassāpissa
atk-s0513a1:529_5: lomakūpamattampi usumaṃ na gaṇhi. Padumagabbhaṃ paviṭṭhakālo viya ahosi. Dhammo hi
atk-s0513a1:529_6: nāmesa attānaṃ rakkhantaṃ rakkhati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0513a1:530: “Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāriṃ, dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahāti;
atk-s0513a1:531: Esānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe, na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārī”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:532: Imassāpi kammassa nissandena tassa bhagavato sarīrobhāso dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:533_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto suruci nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā “satthāraṃ nimantessāmī”ti upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:533_1: madhuradhammakathaṃ sutvā “sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatha, bhante”ti āha. Brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:533_2: kittakehi te bhikkhūhi atthoti? “Kittakā pana vo, bhante, parivārabhikkhū”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:533_3: Tadā pana satthu paṭhamasannipātoyeva hoti, tasmā “koṭisatasahassa”nti āha. Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:533_4: sabbehipi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathāti. Satthā adhivāsesi. Brāhmaṇo svātanāya
atk-s0513a1:533_5: nimantetvā gehaṃ gacchanto cintesi – “ahaṃ ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāgubhattavatthādīni
atk-s0513a1:533_6: dātuṃ sakkomi, nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ pana kathaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:534_0: Tassa sā cintā caturāsītiyojanasahassamatthake ṭhitassa devarañño paṇḍukambalasilāsanassa
atk-s0513a1:534_1: uṇhabhāvaṃ janesi. Sakko “ko nu kho maṃ imamhā ṭhānā cāvetukāmo”ti dibbacakkhunā
atk-s0513a1:534_2: olokento mahāpurisaṃ disvā “suruci nāma brāhmaṇo buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0513a1:534_3: nisīdanaṭṭhānatthāya cintesi, mayāpi tattha gantvā puññakoṭṭhāsaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:534_4: vaḍḍhakivaṇṇaṃ nimminitvā vāsipharasuhattho mahāpurisassa purato pāturahosi. So “atthi
atk-s0513a1:534_5: nu kho kassaci bhatiyā kattabba”nti āha. Mahāpuriso taṃ disvā “kiṃ kammaṃ karissasī”ti
atk-s0513a1:534_6: āha. “Mama ajānanasippaṃ nāma natthi, gehaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ vā yo yaṃ kāreti, tassa taṃ
atk-s0513a1:534_7: kātuṃ jānāmī”ti. “Tena hi mayhaṃ kammaṃ atthī”ti. “Kiṃ ayyā”ti? “Svātanāya me koṭisatasahassabhikkhū
atk-s0513a1:534_8: nimantitā, tesaṃ nisīdanamaṇḍapaṃ karissasī”ti. “Ahaṃ nāma kareyyaṃ, sace mama bhatiṃ
atk-s0513a1:534_9: dātuṃ sakkhissathā”ti. “Sakkhissāmi tātā”ti. “Sādhu karissāmī”ti gantvā ekaṃ padesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:534_10: olokesi, dvādasaterasayojanappamāṇo padeso kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ viya samatalo ahosi. So
atk-s0513a1:534_11: “ettake ṭhāne sattaratanamayo maṇḍapo uṭṭhahatū”ti cintetvā olokesi. Tāvadeva pathaviṃ
atk-s0513a1:534_12: bhinditvā maṇḍapo uṭṭhahi. Tassa sovaṇṇamayesu thambhesu rajatamayā ghaṭakā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:534_13: rajatamayesu sovaṇṇamayā, maṇitthambhesu pavāḷamayā, pavāḷatthambhesu maṇimayā, sattaratanamayesu
atk-s0513a1:534_14: sattaratanamayāva ghaṭakā ahesuṃ. Tato “maṇḍapassa antarantarena kiṅkiṇikajālaṃ olambatū”ti
atk-s0513a1:534_15: olokesi, saha olokaneneva kiṅkiṇikajālaṃ olambi, yassa mandavāteritassa pañcaṅgikasseva
atk-s0513a1:534_16: tūriyassa madhurasaddo niggacchati, dibbasaṅgītivattanakālo viya hoti. “Antarantarā
atk-s0513a1:534_18: bhikkhūnaṃ āsanāni ca ādhārakāni ca pathaviṃ bhinditvā uṭṭhahantū”ti cintesi, tāvadeva
atk-s0513a1:534_19: uṭṭhahiṃsu. “Koṇe koṇe ekekā udakacāṭiyo uṭṭhahantū”ti cintesi, udakacāṭiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:535_0: Ettakaṃ māpetvā brāhmaṇassa santikaṃ gantvā “ehi ayya, tava maṇḍapaṃ oloketvā mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:535_1: bhatiṃ dehī”ti āha. Mahāpuriso gantvā maṇḍapaṃ olokesi, olokentassevassa sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0513a1:535_2: pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ ahosi. Athassa maṇḍapaṃ olokayato etadahosi
atk-s0513a1:535_3: – “nāyaṃ maṇḍapo manussabhūtena kato, mayhaṃ pana ajjhāsayaṃ mayhaṃ guṇaṃ āgamma
atk-s0513a1:535_4: addhā sakkabhavanaṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi, tato sakkena devaraññā ayaṃ maṇḍapo kārito bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:535_5: “Na kho pana me yuttaṃ evarūpe maṇḍape ekadivasaṃyeva dānaṃ dātuṃ, sattāhaṃ dassāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:535_6: cintesi. Bāhirakadānañhi kittakampi samānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:535_7: alaṅkatasīsaṃ pana chinditvā añjitaakkhīni uppāṭetvā hadayamaṃsaṃ vā ubbaṭṭetvā dinnakāle
atk-s0513a1:535_8: bodhisattānaṃ cāgaṃ nissāya tuṭṭhi nāma hoti. Amhākampi hi bodhisattassa sivijātake
atk-s0513a1:535_9: devasikaṃ pañca kahāpaṇasatasahassāni vissajjetvā catūsu dvāresu nagaramajjhe ca
atk-s0513a1:535_10: dānaṃ dentassa taṃ dānaṃ cāgatuṭṭhiṃ uppādetuṃ nāsakkhi. Yadā panassa brāhmaṇavaṇṇena
atk-s0513a1:535_11: āgantvā sakko devarājā akkhīni yāci, tadā tāni uppāṭetvā dadamānasseva hāso uppajji,
atk-s0513a1:535_12: kesaggamattampi cittassa aññathattaṃ nāhosi. Evaṃ dānaṃ nissāya bodhisattānaṃ titti
atk-s0513a1:535_13: nāma natthi. Tasmā sopi mahāpuriso “sattāhaṃ mayā koṭisatasahassasaṅkhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:535_14: dānaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā tasmiṃ maṇḍape buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:535_15: sattāhaṃ gavapānaṃ nāma dānaṃ adāsi. Gavapānanti mahante mahante kolambe khīrassa
atk-s0513a1:535_16: pūretvā uddhanesu āropetvā ghanapākapakke khīre thoke taṇḍule pakkhipitvā pakkamadhusakkarācuṇṇasappīhi
atk-s0513a1:535_17: abhisaṅkhataṃ bhojanaṃ vuccati. Manussāyeva pana parivisituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu, devāpi
atk-s0513a1:535_18: ekantarikā hutvā parivisiṃsu. Dvādasaterasayojanappamāṇaṃ ṭhānampi bhikkhū gaṇhituṃ
atk-s0513a1:535_19: nappahosiyeva. Te pana bhikkhū attano attano ānubhāvena nisīdiṃsu. Pariyosānadivase
atk-s0513a1:535_20: sabbabhikkhūnaṃ pattāni dhovāpetvā bhesajjatthāya sappinavanītamadhuphāṇitādīni pūretvā
atk-s0513a1:535_21: ticīvarehi saddhiṃ adāsi, saṅghanavakabhikkhunā laddhacīvarasāṭakā satasahassagghanakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:536_0: Satthā anumodanaṃ karonto “ayaṃ puriso evarūpaṃ mahādānaṃ adāsi, ko nu kho bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:536_1: upadhārento “anāgate kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake gotamo
atk-s0513a1:536_2: nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti disvā mahāpurisaṃ āmantetvā “tvaṃ ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:536_3: gotamo nāma buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Mahāpuriso byākaraṇaṃ sutvā “ahaṃ kira
atk-s0513a1:536_4: buddho bhavissāmi, ko me gharāvāsena attho, pabbajissāmī”ti cintetvā tathārūpaṃ sampattiṃ
atk-s0513a1:536_5: kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya pahāya satthu santike pabbajitvā buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā abhiññā
atk-s0513a1:536_6: ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā āyupariyosāne brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:537_0: Maṅgalassa pana bhagavato nagaraṃ uttaraṃ nāma ahosi, pitāpi uttaro nāma khattiyo,
atk-s0513a1:537_1: mātāpi uttarā nāma devī, sudevo ca dhammaseno ca dve aggasāvakā, pālito nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0513a1:537_2: sīvalī ca asokā ca dve aggasāvikā, nāgarukkho bodhi, aṭṭhāsītihatthubbedhaṃ sarīraṃ
atk-s0513a1:537_3: ahosi. Navutivassasahassāni ṭhatvā parinibbute pana tasmiṃ bhagavati ekappahāreneva
atk-s0513a1:537_4: dasa cakkavāḷasahassāni ekandhakārāni ahesuṃ. Sabbacakkavāḷesu manussānaṃ mahantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:540_0: Evaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ andhakāraṃ katvā parinibbutassa tassa bhagavato aparabhāge
atk-s0513a1:540_1: sumano nāma satthā udapādi. Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ. Paṭhamasannipāte
atk-s0513a1:540_2: koṭisatasahassabhikkhū ahesuṃ, dutiye kañcanapabbatamhi navutikoṭisahassāni, tatiye
atk-s0513a1:540_3: asītikoṭisahassāni. Tadā mahāsatto atulo nāma nāgarājā ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo.
atk-s0513a1:540_4: So “buddho uppanno”ti sutvā ñātisaṅghaparivuto nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā koṭisatasahassabhikkhuparivārassa
atk-s0513a1:540_5: tassa bhagavato dibbatūriyehi upahāraṃ kāretvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paccekaṃ dussayugāni
atk-s0513a1:540_6: datvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāsi. Sopi naṃ satthā “anāgate buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:540_7: Tassa bhagavato nagaraṃ khemaṃ nāma ahosi, sudatto nāma rājā pitā, sirimā nāma mātā,
atk-s0513a1:540_8: saraṇo ca bhāvitatto ca dve aggasāvakā, udeno nāmupaṭṭhāko, soṇā ca upasoṇā ca dve
atk-s0513a1:540_9: aggasāvikā, nāgarukkho bodhi, navutihatthubbedhaṃ sarīraṃ, navutiyeva vassasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:543_0: Tassa aparabhāge revato nāma satthā udapādi. Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:543_1: Paṭhamasannipāte gaṇanā natthi, dutiye koṭisatasahassabhikkhū ahesuṃ, tathā tatiye.
atk-s0513a1:543_2: Tadā bodhisatto atidevo nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:543_3: sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ ṭhapetvā tassa satthuno kilesappahāne vaṇṇaṃ vatvā uttarāsaṅgena
atk-s0513a1:543_4: pūjaṃ akāsi. Sopi naṃ “buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Tassa pana bhagavato nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:543_5: dhaññavatī nāma ahosi, pitā vipulo nāma khattiyo, mātāpi vipulā nāma devī, varuṇo
atk-s0513a1:543_6: ca brahmadevo ca dve aggasāvakā, sambhavo nāmupaṭṭhāko, bhaddā ca subhaddā ca dve
atk-s0513a1:543_7: aggasāvikā, nāgarukkhova bodhi, sarīraṃ asītihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi, āyu saṭṭhi vassasahassānīti.
atk-s0513a1:546_0: Tassa aparabhāge sobhito nāma satthā udapādi. Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:546_1: Paṭhamasannipāte koṭisatabhikkhū ahesuṃ, dutiye navutikoṭiyo, tatiye asītikoṭiyo.
atk-s0513a1:546_2: Tadā bodhisatto ajito nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:546_3: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi. Sopi naṃ “buddho bhavissasī”ti
atk-s0513a1:546_4: byākāsi. Tassa pana bhagavato sudhammaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, pitāpi sudhammo nāma
atk-s0513a1:546_5: rājā, mātāpi sudhammā nāma devī, asamo ca sunetto ca dve aggasāvakā, anomo nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0513a1:546_6: nakulā ca sujātā ca dve aggasāvikā, nāgarukkhova bodhi, aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:549_0: Tassa aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kappe tayo buddhā nibbattiṃsu
atk-s0513a1:549_1: anomadassī padumo nāradoti. Anomadassissa bhagavato tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:549_2: Paṭhamasannipāte bhikkhū aṭṭhasatasahassāni ahesuṃ, dutiye satta, tatiye cha. Tadā
atk-s0513a1:549_3: bodhisatto eko yakkhasenāpati ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo anekakoṭisatasahassānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:549_4: yakkhānaṃ adhipati. So “buddho uppanno”ti sutvā āgantvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0513a1:549_5: mahādānaṃ adāsi. Satthāpi naṃ “anāgate buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Anomadassissa
atk-s0513a1:549_6: pana bhagavato candavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, yasavā nāma rājā pitā, yasodharā nāma
atk-s0513a1:549_7: mātā, nisabho ca anomo ca dve aggasāvakā, varuṇo nāmupaṭṭhāko, sundarī ca sumanā
atk-s0513a1:549_8: ca dve aggasāvikā, ajjunarukkho bodhi, aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ sarīraṃ ahosi, vassasatasahassaṃ āyūti.
atk-s0513a1:552_0: Tassa aparabhāge padumo nāma satthā udapādi. Tassāpi tayo bhāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:552_1: Paṭhamasannipāte koṭisatasahassabhikkhū ahesuṃ, dutiye tīṇi satasahassāni, tatiye
atk-s0513a1:552_2: agāmake araññe mahāvanasaṇḍavāsīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dve satasahassāni. Tadā tathāgate
atk-s0513a1:552_3: tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vasante bodhisatto sīho hutvā satthāraṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaṃ
atk-s0513a1:552_4: disvā pasannacitto vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pītisomanassajāto tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ
atk-s0513a1:552_5: naditvā sattāhaṃ buddhārammaṇapītiṃ avijahitvā pītisukheneva gocarāya apakkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:552_6: jīvitapariccāgaṃ katvā payirupāsamāno aṭṭhāsi. Satthā sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhito
atk-s0513a1:552_7: sīhaṃ oloketvā “bhikkhusaṅghepi cittaṃ pasādetvā saṅghaṃ vandissatīti bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-s0513a1:552_8: āgacchatū”ti cintesi. Bhikkhū tāvadeva āgamiṃsu. Sīho saṅghe cittaṃ pasādesi. Satthā
atk-s0513a1:552_9: tassa manaṃ oloketvā “anāgate buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Padumassa pana bhagavato
atk-s0513a1:552_10: campakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, asamo nāma rājā pitā, asamā nāma devī mātā, sālo ca
atk-s0513a1:552_11: upasālo ca dve aggasāvakā, varuṇo nāmupaṭṭhāko, rāmā ca surāmā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:552_12: soṇarukkho nāma bodhi, aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ sarīraṃ ahosi, āyu vassasatasahassanti.
atk-s0513a1:555_0: Tassa aparabhāge nārado nāma satthā udapādi. Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:555_1: Paṭhamasannipāte koṭisatasahassabhikkhū ahesuṃ, dutiye navutikoṭisahassāni, tatiye
atk-s0513a1:555_2: asītikoṭisahassāni. Tadā bodhisatto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañcasu abhiññāsu aṭṭhasu
atk-s0513a1:555_3: ca samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasī hutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a1:555_4: lohitacandanena pūjaṃ akāsi. Sopi naṃ “anāgate buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Tassa
atk-s0513a1:555_5: bhagavato dhaññavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, sudevo nāma khattiyo pitā, anomā nāma mātā,
atk-s0513a1:555_6: saddasālo ca jitamitto ca dve aggasāvakā, vāseṭṭho nāmupaṭṭhāko, uttarā ca phaggunī
atk-s0513a1:555_7: ca dve aggasāvikā, mahāsoṇarukkho nāma bodhi, sarīraṃ aṭṭhāsītihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:558_0: Nāradabuddhassa aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā ito satasahassakappamatthake
atk-s0513a1:558_1: ekasmiṃ kappe ekova padumuttarabuddho nāma udapādi. Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā
atk-s0513a1:558_2: ahesuṃ. Paṭhame koṭisatasahassabhikkhū ahesuṃ, dutiye vebhārapabbate navutikoṭisahassāni,
atk-s0513a1:558_3: tatiye asītikoṭisahassāni. Tadā bodhisatto jaṭilo nāma mahāraṭṭhiyo hutvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0513a1:558_4: bhikkhusaṅghassa sacīvaraṃ dānaṃ adāsi. Sopi naṃ “anāgate buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:558_5: Padumuttarassa pana bhagavato kāle titthiyā nāma nāhesuṃ. Sabbe devamanussā buddhameva
atk-s0513a1:558_6: saraṇaṃ agamaṃsu. Tassa nagaraṃ haṃsavatī nāma ahosi, pitā ānando nāma khattiyo,
atk-s0513a1:558_7: mātā sujātā nāma devī, devalo ca sujāto ca dve aggasāvakā, sumano nāmupaṭṭhāko, amitā
atk-s0513a1:558_8: ca asamā ca dve aggasāvikā, salalarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:558_9: ahosi, sarīrappabhā samantato dvādasa yojanāni gaṇhi, vassasatasahassaṃ āyūti.
atk-s0513a1:561_0: Tassa aparabhāge sattati kappasahassāni atikkamitvā sumedho sujāto cāti ekasmiṃ kappe
atk-s0513a1:561_1: dve buddhā nibbattiṃsu. Sumedhassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ, paṭhamasannipāte
atk-s0513a1:561_2: sudassananagare koṭisatakhīṇāsavā ahesuṃ, dutiye pana navutikoṭiyo, tatiye asītikoṭiyo.
atk-s0513a1:561_3: Tadā bodhisatto uttaro nāma māṇavo hutvā nidahitvā ṭhapitaṃyeva asītikoṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0513a1:561_4: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:561_5: nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Sopi naṃ “anāgate buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Sumedhassa bhagavato
atk-s0513a1:561_6: sudassanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, sudatto nāma rājā pitā, mātāpi sudattā nāma, saraṇo
atk-s0513a1:561_7: ca sabbakāmo ca dve aggasāvakā, sāgaro nāmupaṭṭhāko, rāmā ca surāmā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:561_8: mahānīparukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ aṭṭhāsītihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi, āyu navuti vassasahassānīti.
atk-s0513a1:564_0: Tassa aparabhāge sujāto nāma satthā udapādi. Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:564_1: Paṭhamasannipāte saṭṭhi bhikkhusatasahassāni ahesuṃ, dutiye paññāsaṃ, tatiye cattālīsaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:564_2: Tadā bodhisatto cakkavattirājā hutvā “buddho uppanno”ti sutvā upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:564_3: sutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa saddhiṃ sattahi ratanehi catumahādīparajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:564_4: datvā satthu santike pabbaji. Sakalaraṭṭhavāsino raṭṭhuppādaṃ gahetvā ārāmikakiccaṃ
atk-s0513a1:564_5: sādhentā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa niccaṃ mahādānaṃ adaṃsu. Sopi naṃ satthā
atk-s0513a1:564_6: “anāgate buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Tassa bhagavato nagaraṃ sumaṅgalaṃ nāma ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:564_7: uggato nāma rājā pitā, pabhāvatī nāma mātā, sudassano ca sudevo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:564_8: nārado nāmupaṭṭhāko, nāgā ca nāgasamālā ca dve aggasāvikā, mahāveḷurukkho bodhi.
atk-s0513a1:564_9: So kira mandacchiddo ghanakkhandho upari niggatāhi mahāsākhāhi morapiñchakalāpo viya
atk-s0513a1:564_10: virocittha. Tassa bhagavato sarīraṃ paṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ ahosi, āyu navuti vassasahassānīti.
atk-s0513a1:567_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito aṭṭhārasakappasatamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe piyadassī, atthadassī,
atk-s0513a1:567_1: dhammadassīti tayo buddhā nibbattiṃsu. Piyadassissāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:567_2: Paṭhame koṭisatasahassā bhikkhū ahesuṃ, dutiye navutikoṭiyo, tatiye asītikoṭiyo.
atk-s0513a1:567_3: Tadā bodhisatto kassapo nāma māṇavo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṃ gato hutvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:567_4: sutvā koṭisatasahassadhanapariccāgena saṅghārāmaṃ kāretvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:567_5: Atha naṃ satthā “aṭṭhārasakappasataccayena buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Tassa bhagavato
atk-s0513a1:567_6: anomaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, pitā sudinno nāma rājā, mātā candā nāma devī, pālito ca
atk-s0513a1:567_7: sabbadassī ca dve aggasāvakā, sobhito nāmupaṭṭhāko, sujātā ca dhammadinnā ca dve
atk-s0513a1:567_8: aggasāvikā, kakudharukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ asītihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi, navuti vassasahassāni āyūti.
atk-s0513a1:570_0: Tassa aparabhāge atthadassī nāma satthā udapādi. Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:570_1: Paṭhame aṭṭhanavuti bhikkhusatasahassāni ahesuṃ, dutiye aṭṭhāsītisatasahassāni, tathā
atk-s0513a1:570_2: tatiye. Tadā bodhisatto susīmo nāma mahiddhiko tāpaso hutvā devalokato mandāravapupphacchattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:570_3: āharitvā satthāraṃ pūjesi, sopi naṃ “anāgate buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Tassa
atk-s0513a1:570_4: bhagavato sobhitaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, sāgaro nāma rājā pitā, sudassanā nāma mātā,
atk-s0513a1:570_5: santo ca upasanto ca dve aggasāvakā, abhayo nāmupaṭṭhāko, dhammā ca sudhammā ca dve
atk-s0513a1:570_6: aggasāvikā, campakarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ asītihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi, sarīrappabhā samantato
atk-s0513a1:570_7: sabbakālaṃ yojanamattaṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi, āyu vassasatasahassanti.
atk-s0513a1:573_0: Tassa aparabhāge dhammadassī nāma satthā udapādi. Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:573_1: Paṭhame koṭisataṃ bhikkhū ahesuṃ, dutiye sattatikoṭiyo, tatiye asītikoṭiyo. Tadā
atk-s0513a1:573_2: bodhisatto sakko devarājā hutvā dibbagandhapupphehi ca dibbatūriyehi ca pūjaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0513a1:573_3: sopi naṃ “anāgate buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Tassa bhagavato saraṇaṃ nāma nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:573_4: ahosi, pitā saraṇo nāma rājā, mātā sunandā nāma, padumo ca phussadevo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:573_5: sunetto nāmupaṭṭhāko, khemā ca sabbanāmā ca dve aggasāvikā, rattaṅkurarukkho bodhi,
atk-s0513a1:573_6: “bimbijālo”tipi vuccati, sarīraṃ panassa asītihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi, vassasatasahassaṃ āyūti.
atk-s0513a1:576_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito catunavutikappamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe ekova siddhattho nāma
atk-s0513a1:576_1: buddho udapādi. Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ. Paṭhamasannipāte koṭisatasahassaṃ
atk-s0513a1:576_2: bhikkhū ahesuṃ, dutiye navutikoṭiyo, tatiye asītikoṭiyo. Tadā bodhisatto uggatejo
atk-s0513a1:576_3: abhiññābalasampanno maṅgalo nāma tāpaso hutvā mahājambuphalaṃ āharitvā tathāgatassa
atk-s0513a1:576_4: adāsi. Satthā taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjitvā “catunavutikappamatthake buddho bhavissasī”ti
atk-s0513a1:576_5: bodhisattaṃ byākāsi. Tassa bhagavato nagaraṃ vebhāraṃ nāma ahosi, pitā jayaseno nāma
atk-s0513a1:576_6: rājā, mātā suphassā nāma, sambalo ca sumitto ca dve aggasāvakā, revato nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0513a1:576_7: sīvalī ca surāmā ca dve aggasāvikā, kaṇikārarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ saṭṭhihatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:578: Nihanitvā tamaṃ sabbaṃ, sūriyo abbhuggato yathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:579_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito dvānavutikappamatthake tisso phussoti ekasmiṃ kappe dve buddhā
atk-s0513a1:579_1: nibbattiṃsu. Tissassa bhagavato tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ. Paṭhamasannipāte bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:579_2: koṭisataṃ ahosi, dutiye navutikoṭiyo, tatiye asītikoṭiyo. Tadā bodhisatto mahābhogo
atk-s0513a1:579_3: mahāyaso sujāto nāma khattiyo hutvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā mahiddhikabhāvaṃ patvā
atk-s0513a1:579_5: gacchantaṃ tathāgataṃ pūjesi, ākāse pupphavitānaṃ akāsi. Sopi naṃ satthā “ito dvānavutikappe
atk-s0513a1:579_6: buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Tassa bhagavato khemaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, pitā janasandho
atk-s0513a1:579_7: nāma khattiyo, mātā padumā nāma, brahmadevo ca udayo ca dve aggasāvakā, samaṅgo nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0513a1:579_8: phussā ca sudattā ca dve aggasāvikā, asanarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ saṭṭhihatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:582_0: Tassa aparabhāge phusso nāma satthā udapādi. Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:582_1: Paṭhamasannipāte saṭṭhi bhikkhusatasahassāni ahesuṃ, dutiye paṇṇāsa, tatiye dvattiṃsa.
atk-s0513a1:582_2: Tadā bodhisatto vijitāvī nāma khattiyo hutvā mahārajjaṃ pahāya satthu santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a1:582_3: tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā mahājanassa dhammakathaṃ kathesi, sīlapāramiñca pūresi. Sopi
atk-s0513a1:582_4: naṃ “buddho bhavissasī”ti tatheva byākāsi. Tassa bhagavato kāsī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:582_5: jayaseno nāma rājā pitā, sirimā nāma mātā, surakkhito ca dhammaseno ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:582_6: sabhiyo nāmupaṭṭhāko, cālā ca upacālā ca dve aggasāvikā, āmalakarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ
atk-s0513a1:585_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito ekanavutikappe vipassī nāma bhagavā udapādi. Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā
atk-s0513a1:585_1: ahesuṃ. Paṭhamasannipāte aṭṭhasaṭṭhi bhikkhusatasahassaṃ ahosi, dutiye ekasatasahassaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:585_2: tatiye asītisahassāni. Tadā bodhisatto mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo atulo nāma nāgarājā
atk-s0513a1:585_3: hutvā sattaratanakhacitaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ mahāpīṭhaṃ bhagavato adāsi. Sopi naṃ “ito
atk-s0513a1:585_4: ekanavutikappe buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Tassa bhagavato bandhumatī nāma nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:585_5: ahosi, bandhumā nāma rājā pitā, bandhumatī nāma mātā, khaṇḍo ca tisso ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:585_6: asoko nāmupaṭṭhāko, candā ca candamittā ca dve aggasāvikā, pāṭalirukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ
atk-s0513a1:585_7: asītihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi, sarīrappabhā sadā satta yojanāni pharitvā aṭṭhāsi, asīti
atk-s0513a1:587: Vipassī nāma nāmena, loke uppajji cakkhumā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:588_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito ekatiṃsakappe sikhī ca vessabhū cāti dve buddhā ahesuṃ. Sikhissāpi
atk-s0513a1:588_1: bhagavato tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ. Paṭhamasannipāte bhikkhusatasahassaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:588_2: dutiye asītisahassāni, tatiye sattattisahassāni. Tadā bodhisatto arindamo nāma rājā
atk-s0513a1:588_3: hutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sacīvaraṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattaratanapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:588_4: hatthiratanaṃ datvā hatthippamāṇaṃ katvā kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ adāsi. Sopi naṃ “ito katiṃsakappe
atk-s0513a1:588_5: buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Tassa bhagavato aruṇavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, aruṇo
atk-s0513a1:588_6: nāma khattiyo pitā, pabhāvatī nāma mātā, abhibhū ca sambhavo ca dve aggasāvakā, khemaṅkaro
atk-s0513a1:588_7: nāmupaṭṭhāko, sakhilā ca padumā ca dve aggasāvikā, puṇḍarīkarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ
atk-s0513a1:588_8: sattatihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi, sarīrappabhā yojanattayaṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi, sattati vassasahassāni āyūti.
atk-s0513a1:591_0: Tassa aparabhāge vessabhū nāma satthā udapādi. Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:591_1: Paṭhamasannipāte asīti bhikkhusahassāni ahesuṃ, dutiye sattati, tatiye saṭṭhi. Tadā
atk-s0513a1:591_2: bodhisatto sudassano nāma rājā hutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sacīvaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:591_3: mahādānaṃ datvā tassa santike pabbajitvā ācāraguṇasampanno buddharatane cittīkārapītibahulo
atk-s0513a1:591_4: ahosi. Sopi naṃ bhagavā “ito ekatiṃsakappe buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Tassa pana
atk-s0513a1:591_5: bhagavato anomaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, suppatīto nāma rājā pitā, yasavatī nāma mātā,
atk-s0513a1:591_6: soṇo ca uttaro ca dve aggasāvakā, upasanto nāmupaṭṭhāko, dāmā ca samālā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:591_7: sālarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ saṭṭhihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi, saṭṭhi vassasahassāni āyūti.
atk-s0513a1:593: Vessabhū nāma nāmena, loke uppajji so jino”ti.
atk-s0513a1:594_0: Tassa aparabhāge imasmiṃ kappe cattāro buddhā nibbattā kakusandho, koṇāgamano, kassapo,
atk-s0513a1:594_1: amhākaṃ bhagavāti. Kakusandhassa bhagavato ekova sāvakasannipāto, tattha cattālīsa
atk-s0513a1:594_2: bhikkhusahassāni ahesuṃ. Tadā bodhisatto khemo nāma rājā hutvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0513a1:594_3: bhikkhusaṅghassa sapattacīvaraṃ mahādānañceva añjanādibhesajjāni ca datvā satthu
atk-s0513a1:594_4: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbaji. Sopi naṃ satthā byākāsi. Kakusandhassa pana bhagavato
atk-s0513a1:594_5: khemaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, aggidatto nāma brāhmaṇo pitā, visākhā nāma brāhmaṇī mātā,
atk-s0513a1:594_6: vidhuro ca sañjīvo ca dve aggasāvakā, buddhijo nāmupaṭṭhāko, sāmā ca campakā ca dve
atk-s0513a1:594_7: aggasāvikā, mahāsirīsarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ cattālīsahatthubbedhaṃ ahosi, cattālīsa
atk-s0513a1:597_0: Tassa aparabhāge koṇāgamano nāma satthā udapādi. Tassāpi eko sāvakasannipāto, tattha
atk-s0513a1:597_1: tiṃsa bhikkhusahassāni ahesuṃ. Tadā bodhisatto pabbato nāma rājā hutvā amaccagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0513a1:597_2: satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0513a1:597_4: datvā satthu santike pabbaji. Sopi naṃ byākāsi. Tassa bhagavato sobhavatī nāma nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:597_5: ahosi, yaññadatto nāma brāhmaṇo pitā, uttarā nāma brāhmaṇī mātā, bhiyyaso ca uttaro
atk-s0513a1:597_6: ca dve aggasāvakā, sotthijo nāmupaṭṭhāko, samuddā ca uttarā ca dve aggasāvikā, udumbararukkho
atk-s0513a1:597_7: bodhi, sarīraṃ tiṃsahatthubbedhaṃ ahosi, tiṃsa vassasahassāni āyūti.
atk-s0513a1:600_0: Tassa aparabhāge kassapo nāma satthā udapādi. Tassāpi eko sāvakasannipāto, tattha
atk-s0513a1:600_1: vīsati bhikkhusahassāni ahesuṃ. Tadā bodhisatto jotipālo nāma māṇavo hutvā tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:600_2: vedānaṃ pāragū bhūmiyañca antalikkhe ca pākaṭo ghaṭīkārassa kumbhakārassa mitto ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:600_3: So tena saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā āraddhavīriyo
atk-s0513a1:600_4: tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā vattāvattasampattiyā buddhassa sāsanaṃ sobhesi. Sopi naṃ
atk-s0513a1:600_5: byākāsi. Tassa bhagavato jātanagaraṃ bārāṇasī nāma ahosi, brahmadatto nāma brāhmaṇo
atk-s0513a1:600_6: pitā, dhanavatī nāma brāhmaṇī mātā, tisso ca bhāradvājo ca dve aggasāvakā, sabbamitto
atk-s0513a1:600_7: nāmupaṭṭhāko, anuḷā ca uruveḷā ca dve aggasāvikā, nigrodharukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ vīsatihatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:603_0: Yasmiṃ pana kappe dīpaṅkaro dasabalo udapādi, tasmiṃ aññepi tayo buddhā ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:603_1: santikā bodhisattassa byākaraṇaṃ natthi, tasmā te idha na dassitā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:603_2: pana tamhā kappā paṭṭhāya sabbepi buddhe dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:606: “Maṅgalo ca sumano ca, revato sobhito muni;
atk-s0513a1:610: “Tisso phusso ca sambuddho, vipassī sikhi vessabhū;
atk-s0513a1:615_0: Tattha amhākaṃ bodhisatto dīpaṅkarādīnaṃ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike adhikāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:615_1: karonto kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni āgato. Kassapassa pana bhagavato
atk-s0513a1:615_2: orabhāge ṭhapetvā imaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ añño buddho nāma natthi. Iti dīpaṅkarādīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:615_3: catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇo pana bodhisatto yenena –
atk-s0513a1:619_0: Ime aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhārena “handa buddhakare
atk-s0513a1:619_1: dhamme, vicināmi ito cito”ti ussāhaṃ katvā “vicinanto tadādakkhiṃ, paṭhamaṃ dānapārami”nti
atk-s0513a1:619_2: dānapāramitādayo buddhakārakadhammā diṭṭhā, te pūrentoyeva yāva vessantarattabhāvā
atk-s0513a1:619_3: āgami. Āgacchanto ca ye te katābhinīhārānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ ānisaṃsā saṃvaṇṇitā –
atk-s0513a1:625: Jāyamānā manussesu, jaccandhā na bhavanti te.
atk-s0513a1:635_0: Te ānisaṃse adhigantvāva āgato. Pāramiyo pūrentassa cassa akittibrāhmaṇakāle saṅkhabrāhmaṇakāle
atk-s0513a1:635_3: parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena panassa sasapaṇḍitajātake –
atk-s0513a1:637: Dānena me samo natthi, esā me dānapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:638_0: Evaṃ attapariccāgaṃ karontassa dānapāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā. Tathā sīlavarājakāle
atk-s0513a1:638_2: alīnasattukumārakāleti sīlapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena
atk-s0513a1:640: Bhojaputte na kuppāmi, esā me sīlapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:641_0: Evaṃ attapariccāgaṃ karontassa sīlapāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā. Tathā somanassakumārakāle,
atk-s0513a1:641_2: pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena panassa cūḷasutasomajātake –
atk-s0513a1:643: Cajato na hoti laggaṃ, esā me nekkhammapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:644_0: Evaṃ nissaṅgatāya rajjaṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhamantassa nekkhammapāramitā paramatthapāramī
atk-s0513a1:644_1: nāma jātā. Tathā vidhurapaṇḍitakāle, mahāgovindapaṇḍitakāle, kuddālapaṇḍitakāle,
atk-s0513a1:644_3: parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena panassa sattubhastajātake senakapaṇḍitakāle –
atk-s0513a1:646: Paññāya me samo natthi, esā me paññāpāramī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:647_0: Antobhastagataṃ sappaṃ dassentassa paññāpāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā. Tathā
atk-s0513a1:647_1: vīriyapāramitādīnampi pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena panassa mahājanakajātake –
atk-s0513a1:649: Cittassa aññathā natthi, esā me vīriyapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:650: Evaṃ mahāsamuddaṃ tarantassa pavattā vīriyapāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā. Khantivādijātake –
atk-s0513a1:652: Kāsirāje na kuppāmi, esā me khantipāramī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:653: Evaṃ acetanabhāvena viya mahādukkhaṃ adhivāsentassa khantipāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā. Mahāsutasomajātake –
atk-s0513a1:655: Mocesiṃ ekasataṃ khattiye, esā me saccapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:656: Evaṃ jīvitaṃ cajitvā saccamanurakkhantassa saccapāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā. Mūgapakkhajātake –
atk-s0513a1:657: “Mātā pitā na me dessā, napi me dessaṃ mahāyasaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:659: Evaṃ jīvitampi cajitvā vataṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa adhiṭṭhānapāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā. Ekarājajātake –
atk-s0513a1:660: “Na maṃ koci uttasati, napihaṃ bhāyāmi kassaci;
atk-s0513a1:662: Evaṃ jīvitampi anoloketvā mettāyantassa mettāpāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā. Lomahaṃsajātake –
atk-s0513a1:665_0: Evaṃ gāmadārakesu niṭṭhubhanādīhi ceva mālāgandhūpahārādīhi ca sukhadukkhaṃ uppādentesupi
atk-s0513a1:665_1: upekkhaṃ anativattantassa upekkhāpāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0513a1:665_2: vitthārato panesa attho cariyāpiṭakato gahetabbo. Evaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā vessantarattabhāve ṭhito –
atk-s0513a1:668_0: Evaṃ mahāpathavikampanādīni mahāpuññāni katvā āyupariyosāne tato cuto tusitabhavane
atk-s0513a1:668_1: nibbatti. Iti dīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya yāva ayaṃ tusitapure nibbatti, ettakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:671_0: Tusitapure vasanteyeva pana bodhisatte buddhakolāhalaṃ nāma udapādi. Lokasmiñhi tīṇi
atk-s0513a1:671_1: kolāhalāni uppajjanti – kappakolāhalaṃ, buddhakolāhalaṃ, cakkavattikolāhalanti. Tattha
atk-s0513a1:671_2: “vassasatasahassassa accayena kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti lokabyūhā nāma kāmāvacaradevā
atk-s0513a1:671_3: muttasirā vikiṇṇakesā rudamukhā assūni hatthehi puñchamānā rattavatthanivatthā ativiya
atk-s0513a1:671_4: virūpavesadhārino hutvā manussapathe vicarantā evaṃ ārocenti “mārisā ito vassasatasahassassa
atk-s0513a1:671_5: accayena kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissati, ayaṃ loko vinassissati, mahāsamuddopi sussissati,
atk-s0513a1:671_6: ayañca mahāpathavī sineru ca pabbatarājā uḍḍayhissanti vinassissanti, yāva brahmalokā
atk-s0513a1:671_7: lokavināso bhavissati, mettaṃ mārisā bhāvetha, karuṇaṃ, muditaṃ, upekkhaṃ mārisā
atk-s0513a1:671_8: bhāvetha, mātaraṃ upaṭṭhahatha, pitaraṃ upaṭṭhahatha, kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino hothā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:671_9: Idaṃ kappakolāhalaṃ nāma. Vassasahassassa accayena pana sabbaññubuddho loke uppajjissatīti
atk-s0513a1:671_10: lokapāladevatā “ito mārisā vassasahassassa accayena buddho loke uppajjissatī”ti ugghosentā
atk-s0513a1:671_11: āhiṇḍanti. Idaṃ buddhakolāhalaṃ nāma. Vassasatassa accayena cakkavattī rājā uppajjissatīti
atk-s0513a1:671_12: devatā “ito mārisā vassasatassa accayena cakkavattī rājā loke uppajjissatī”ti ugghosentiyo
atk-s0513a1:671_13: āhiṇḍanti. Idaṃ cakkavattikolāhalaṃ nāma. Imāni tīṇi kolāhalāni mahantāni honti.
atk-s0513a1:672_0: Tesu buddhakolāhalasaddaṃ sutvā sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā ekato sannipatitvā
atk-s0513a1:672_1: “asuko nāma satto buddho bhavissatī”ti ñatvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā āyācanti. Āyācamānā
atk-s0513a1:672_2: ca pubbanimittesu uppannesu āyācanti. Tadā pana sabbāpi devatā ekekacakkavāḷe catumahārājasakkasuyāmasantusitasunimmitavasavattimahābrahmehi
atk-s0513a1:672_3: saddhiṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipatitvā tusitabhavane bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā “mārisā
atk-s0513a1:672_4: tumhehi dasa pāramiyo pūrentehi na sakkasampattiṃ, na mārasampattiṃ, na brahmasampattiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:672_5: na cakkavattisampattiṃ patthentehi pūritā, lokanittharaṇatthāya pana sabbaññutaṃ
