atk-s0513a1:672_6: patthentehi pūritā, so vo idāni kālo mārisā buddhattāya samayo, mārisā buddhattāya samayo”ti yāciṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:673_1: pañcamahāvilokanaṃ nāma vilokesi. Tattha “kālo nu kho, akālo nu kho”ti paṭhamaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:673_2: vilokesi. Tattha vassasatasahassato uddhaṃ vaḍḍhitaāyukālo kālo nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0513a1:673_3: Tadā hi sattānaṃ jātijarāmaraṇāni na paññāyanti. Buddhānañca dhammadesanā tilakkhaṇamuttā
atk-s0513a1:673_4: nāma natthi. Tesaṃ “aniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ, anattā”ti kathentānaṃ “kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathentī”ti
atk-s0513a1:673_5: neva sotabbaṃ na saddhātabbaṃ maññanti, tato abhisamayo na hoti, tasmiṃ asati aniyyānikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:673_6: sāsanaṃ hoti. Tasmā so akālo. Vassasatato ūnaāyukālopi kālo na hoti. Kasmā? Tadā
atk-s0513a1:673_7: sattā ussannakilesā honti, ussannakilesānañca dinno ovādo ovādaṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0513a1:673_8: udake daṇḍarāji viya khippaṃ vigacchati. Tasmā sopi akālo. Vassasatasahassato pana
atk-s0513a1:673_9: paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā, vassasatato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ āyukālo kālo nāma. Tadā ca vassasatakālo.
atk-s0513a1:674: Tato dīpaṃ vilokento saparivāre cattāro dīpe oloketvā “tīsu dīpesu buddhā na nibbattanti, jambudīpeyeva nibbattantī”ti dīpaṃ passi.
atk-s0513a1:675_0: Tato “jambudīpo nāma mahā dasayojanasahassaparimāṇo, katarasmiṃ nu kho padese buddhā
atk-s0513a1:675_1: nibbattantī”ti okāsaṃ vilokento majjhimadesaṃ passi. Majjhimadeso nāma – “puratthimāya
atk-s0513a1:675_2: disāya gajaṅgalaṃ nāma nigamo, tassa aparena mahāsālo, tato paraṃ paccantimā janapadā,
atk-s0513a1:675_3: orato majjhe. Pubbadakkhiṇāya disāya sallavatī nāma nadī, tato paraṃ paccantimā janapadā,
atk-s0513a1:675_4: orato majjhe. Dakkhiṇāya disāya setakaṇṇikaṃ nāma nigamo, tato paraṃ paccantimā janapadā,
atk-s0513a1:675_5: orato majjhe. Pacchimāya disāya thūṇaṃ nāma brāhmaṇagāmo, tato paraṃ paccantimā janapadā,
atk-s0513a1:675_6: orato majjhe. Uttarāya disāya usīraddhajo nāma pabbato, tato paraṃ paccantimā janapadā,
atk-s0513a1:675_7: orato majjhe”ti evaṃ vinaye vutto padeso. So āyāmato tīṇi yojanasatāni, vitthārato
atk-s0513a1:675_8: aḍḍhateyyāni, parikkhepato nava yojanasatānīti etasmiṃ padese buddhā, paccekabuddhā,
atk-s0513a1:675_9: aggasāvakā, asīti mahāsāvakā, cakkavattirājā aññe ca mahesakkhā khattiyabrāhmaṇagahapatimahāsālā
atk-s0513a1:675_10: uppajjanti. Idañcettha kapilavatthu nāma nagaraṃ, tattha mayā nibbattitabbanti niṭṭhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:676_0: Tato kulaṃ vilokento “buddhā nāma vessakule vā suddakule vā na nibbattanti, lokasammate
atk-s0513a1:676_1: pana khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakulevāti dvīsuyeva kulesu nibbattanti. Idāni ca khattiyakulaṃ
atk-s0513a1:676_2: lokasammataṃ, tattha nibbattissāmi. Suddhodano nāma rājā me pitā bhavissatī”ti kulaṃ passi.
atk-s0513a1:677_0: Tato mātaraṃ vilokento “buddhamātā nāma lolā surādhuttā na hoti, kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0513a1:677_1: pana pūritapāramī jātito paṭṭhāya akhaṇḍapañcasīlāyeva hoti. Ayañca mahāmāyā nāma
atk-s0513a1:677_2: devī edisī, ayaṃ me mātā bhavissati, kittakaṃ panassā āyūti dasannaṃ māsānaṃ upari
atk-s0513a1:678_0: Iti imaṃ pañcamahāvilokanaṃ viloketvā “kālo me mārisā buddhabhāvāyā”ti devatānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:678_1: saṅgahaṃ karonto paṭiññaṃ datvā “gacchatha, tumhe”ti tā devatā uyyojetvā tusitadevatāhi
atk-s0513a1:678_2: parivuto tusitapure nandanavanaṃ pāvisi. Sabbadevalokesu hi nandanavanaṃ atthiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:678_3: Tattha naṃ devatā “ito cuto sugatiṃ gaccha, ito cuto sugatiṃ gacchā”ti pubbe katakusalakammokāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:678_4: sārayamānā vicaranti. So evaṃ devatāhi kusalaṃ sārayamānāhi parivuto tattha vicaranto
atk-s0513a1:678_5: cavitvā mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:679_0: Tassa āvibhāvatthaṃ ayamanupubbikathā – tadā kira kapilavatthunagare āsāḷhinakkhattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:679_1: saṅghuṭṭhaṃ ahosi, mahājano nakkhattaṃ kīḷati. Mahāmāyāpi devī pure puṇṇamāya sattamadivasato
atk-s0513a1:679_2: paṭṭhāya vigatasurāpānaṃ mālāgandhavibhūtisampannaṃ nakkhattakīḷaṃ anubhavamānā sattame
atk-s0513a1:679_3: divase pātova uṭṭhāya gandhodakena nhāyitvā cattāri satasahassāni vissajjetvā mahādānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:679_4: datvā sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitā varabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:679_5: sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā sirisayane nipannā niddaṃ okkamamānā imaṃ supinaṃ addasa –
atk-s0513a1:679_6: ‘cattāro kira naṃ mahārājāno sayaneneva saddhiṃ ukkhipitvā himavantaṃ netvā saṭṭhiyojanike
atk-s0513a1:679_7: manosilātale sattayojanikassa mahāsālarukkhassa heṭṭhā ṭhapetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:679_8: Atha nesaṃ deviyo āgantvā deviṃ anotattadahaṃ netvā manussamalaharaṇatthaṃ nhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:679_9: dibbavatthaṃ nivāsāpetvā gandhehi vilimpāpetvā dibbapupphāni piḷandhāpetvā tato avidūre
atk-s0513a1:679_10: eko rajatapabbato atthi, tassa anto kanakavimānaṃ atthi, tattha pācīnasīsakaṃ dibbasayanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:679_11: paññāpetvā nipajjāpesuṃ. Atha bodhisatto setavaravāraṇo hutvā tato avidūre eko suvaṇṇapabbato
atk-s0513a1:679_12: atthi, tattha vicaritvā tato oruyha rajatapabbataṃ abhiruhitvā uttaradisato āgamma
atk-s0513a1:679_13: rajatadāmavaṇṇāya soṇḍāya setapadumaṃ gahetvā koñcanādaṃ naditvā kanakavimānaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:679_14: mātusayanaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dakkhiṇapassaṃ phāletvā kucchiṃ paviṭṭhasadiso
atk-s0513a1:680_0: Punadivase pabuddhā devī taṃ supinaṃ rañño ārocesi. Rājā catusaṭṭhimatte brāhmaṇapāmokkhe
atk-s0513a1:680_1: pakkosāpetvā gomayaharitūpalittāya lājādīhi katamaṅgalasakkārāya bhūmiyā mahārahāni
atk-s0513a1:680_2: āsanāni paññāpetvā tattha nisinnānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ sappimadhusakkharābhisaṅkhatassa
atk-s0513a1:680_3: varapāyāsassa suvaṇṇarajatapātiyo pūretvā suvaṇṇarajatapātīhiyeva paṭikujjitvā adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:680_4: aññehi ca ahatavatthakapilagāvidānādīhi te santappesi. Atha nesaṃ sabbakāmehi santappitānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:680_5: supinaṃ ārocāpetvā “kiṃ bhavissatī”ti pucchi. Brāhmaṇā āhaṃsu “mā cintayi, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:680_6: deviyā te kucchimhi gabbho patiṭṭhito, so ca kho purisagabbho, na itthigabbho, putto
atk-s0513a1:680_7: te bhavissati. So sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasissati, rājā bhavissati cakkavattī; sace agārā
atk-s0513a1:680_8: nikkhamma pabbajissati, buddho bhavissati loke vivaṭṭacchado”ti.
atk-s0513a1:681_0: Bodhisattassa pana mātukucchimhi paṭisandhiggahaṇakkhaṇe ekappahāreneva sakaladasasahassī
atk-s0513a1:681_1: lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi. Bāttiṃsapubbanimittāni pāturahesuṃ – dasasu
atk-s0513a1:681_2: cakkavāḷasahassesu appamāṇo obhāso phari. Tassa taṃ siriṃ daṭṭhukāmā viya andhā cakkhūni
atk-s0513a1:681_3: paṭilabhiṃsu, badhirā saddaṃ suṇiṃsu, mūgā samālapiṃsu, khujjā ujugattā ahesuṃ, paṅgulā
atk-s0513a1:681_4: padasā gamanaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu, bandhanagatā sabbasattā andubandhanādīhi mucciṃsu, sabbanarakesu
atk-s0513a1:681_5: aggi nibbāyi, pettivisaye khuppipāsā vūpasami, tiracchānānaṃ bhayaṃ nāhosi, sabbasattānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:681_6: rogo vūpasami, sabbasattā piyaṃvadā ahesuṃ, madhurenākārena assā hasiṃsu, vāraṇā
atk-s0513a1:681_7: gajjiṃsu, sabbatūriyāni sakasakaninnādaṃ muñciṃsu, aghaṭṭitāniyeva manussānaṃ hatthūpagādīni
atk-s0513a1:681_8: ābharaṇāni viraviṃsu, sabbadisā vippasannā ahesuṃ, sattānaṃ sukhaṃ uppādayamāno mudusītalavāto
atk-s0513a1:681_9: vāyi, akālamegho vassi, pathavitopi udakaṃ ubbhijjitvā vissandi, pakkhino ākāsagamanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:681_10: vijahiṃsu, nadiyo asandamānā aṭṭhaṃsu, mahāsamudde madhuraṃ udakaṃ ahosi, sabbatthakameva
atk-s0513a1:681_11: pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannatalo ahosi, thalajajalajādīni sabbapupphāni pupphiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:681_12: rukkhānaṃ khandhesu khandhapadumāni, sākhāsu sākhāpadumāni, latāsu latāpadumāni pupphiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:681_13: thale silātalāni bhinditvā uparūpari satta satta hutvā daṇḍapadumāni nāma nikkhamiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:681_14: ākāse olambakapadumāni nāma nibbattiṃsu, samantato pupphavassā vassiṃsu, ākāse dibbatūriyāni
atk-s0513a1:681_15: vajjiṃsu, sakaladasasahassilokadhātu vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhamālāguḷo viya, uppīḷetvā baddhamālākalāpo
atk-s0513a1:681_16: viya, alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ mālāsanaṃ viya ca ekamālāmālinī vipphurantavāḷabījanī pupphadhūmagandhaparivāsitā
atk-s0513a1:682_0: Evaṃ gahitapaṭisandhikassa bodhisattassa paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya bodhisattassa ceva
atk-s0513a1:682_1: bodhisattamātuyā ca upaddavanivāraṇatthaṃ khaggahatthā cattāro devaputtā ārakkhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:682_2: gaṇhiṃsu. Bodhisattamātu pana purisesu rāgacittaṃ nuppajji, lābhaggayasaggappattā
atk-s0513a1:682_3: ca ahosi sukhinī akilantakāyā. Bodhisattañca antokucchigataṃ vippasanne maṇiratane
atk-s0513a1:682_4: āvutapaṇḍusuttaṃ viya passati. Yasmā ca bodhisattena vasitakucchi nāma cetiyagabbhasadisā
atk-s0513a1:682_5: hoti, na sakkā aññena sattena āvasituṃ vā paribhuñjituṃ vā, tasmā bodhisattamātā
atk-s0513a1:682_6: sattāhajāte bodhisatte kālaṃ katvā tusitapure nibbattati. Yathā ca aññā itthiyo dasa
atk-s0513a1:682_7: māse apatvāpi atikkamitvāpi nisinnāpi nipannāpi vijāyanti, na evaṃ bodhisattamātā.
atk-s0513a1:682_8: Sā pana bodhisattaṃ dasa māse kucchinā pariharitvā ṭhitāva vijāyati. Ayaṃ bodhisattamātudhammatā.
atk-s0513a1:683_0: Mahāmāyāpi devī pattena telaṃ viya dasa māse kucchinā bodhisattaṃ pariharitvā paripuṇṇagabbhā
atk-s0513a1:683_1: ñātigharaṃ gantukāmā suddhodanamahārājassa ārocesi – “icchāmahaṃ, deva, kulasantakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:683_2: devadahanagaraṃ gantu”nti. Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā kapilavatthuto yāva devadahanagarā
atk-s0513a1:683_3: maggaṃ samaṃ kāretvā kadalipuṇṇaghaṭadhajapaṭākādīhi alaṅkārāpetvā devi suvaṇṇasivikāya
atk-s0513a1:683_4: nisīdāpetvā amaccasahassena ukkhipāpetvā mahantena parivārena pesesi. Dvinnaṃ pana
atk-s0513a1:683_5: nagarānaṃ antare ubhayanagaravāsīnampi lumbinīvanaṃ nāma maṅgalasālavanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:683_6: tasmiṃ samaye mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggasākhā sabbaṃ ekapāliphullaṃ ahosi, sākhantarehi
atk-s0513a1:683_7: ceva pupphantarehi ca pañcavaṇṇā bhamaragaṇā nānappakārā ca sakuṇasaṅghā madhurassarena
atk-s0513a1:683_8: vikūjantā vicaranti. Sakalaṃ lumbinīvanaṃ cittalatāvanasadisaṃ, mahānubhāvassa rañño
atk-s0513a1:683_9: susajjitaṃ āpānamaṇḍalaṃ viya ahosi. Deviyā taṃ disvā sālavanakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmatācittaṃ
atk-s0513a1:683_10: udapādi. Amaccā deviṃ gahetvā sālavanaṃ pavisiṃsu. Sā maṅgalasālamūlaṃ gantvā sālasākhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:683_11: gaṇhitukāmā ahosi, sālasākhā suseditavettaggaṃ viya onamitvā deviyā hatthapathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:683_12: upagañchi. Sā hatthaṃ pasāretvā sākhaṃ aggahesi. Tāvadeva cassā kammajavātā caliṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:683_13: Athassā sāṇiṃ parikkhipitvā mahājano paṭikkami. Sālasākhaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhamānāya evassā
atk-s0513a1:683_14: gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ahosi. Taṅkhaṇaṃyeva cattāro visuddhacittā mahābrahmāno suvaṇṇajālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:683_15: ādāya sampattā tena suvaṇṇajālena bodhisattaṃ sampaṭicchitvā mātu purato ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:683_16: “attamanā, devi, hohi, mahesakkho te putto uppanno”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:684_0: Yathā pana aññe sattā mātukucchito nikkhamantā paṭikūlena asucinā makkhitā nikkhamanti,
atk-s0513a1:684_1: na evaṃ bodhisatto. So pana dhammāsanato otaranto dhammakathiko viya, nisseṇito otaranto
atk-s0513a1:684_2: puriso viya, ca dve ca hatthe dve ca pāde pasāretvā ṭhitakova mātukucchisambhavena
atk-s0513a1:684_3: kenaci asucinā amakkhito suddho visado kāsikavatthe nikkhittamaṇiratanaṃ viya jotayanto
atk-s0513a1:684_4: mātukucchito nikkhami. Evaṃ santepi bodhisattassa ca bodhisattamātuyā ca sakkāratthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:684_5: ākāsato dve udakadhārā nikkhamitvā bodhisattassa ca mātuyā ca sarīre utuṃ gāhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:685_0: Atha naṃ suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggahetvā ṭhitānaṃ brahmānaṃ hatthato cattāro mahārājāno
atk-s0513a1:685_1: maṅgalasammatāya sukhasamphassāya ajinappaveṇiyā gaṇhiṃsu, tesaṃ hatthato manussā
atk-s0513a1:685_2: dukūlacumbaṭakena. Manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya puratthimadisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:685_3: olokesi, anekāni cakkavāḷasahassāni ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṃ. Tattha devamanussā gandhamālādīhi
atk-s0513a1:685_4: pūjayamānā “mahāpurisa, idha tumhehi sadiso añño natthi, kutettha uttaritaro”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:685_5: Evaṃ catasso disā, catasso anudisā, heṭṭhā, uparīti dasa disā anuviloketvā attanā
atk-s0513a1:685_6: sadisaṃ kañci adisvā “ayaṃ uttarādisā”ti sattapadavītihārena agamāsi, mahābrahmunā
atk-s0513a1:685_7: setacchattaṃ dhāriyamāno, suyāmena vāḷabījaniṃ, aññāhi ca devatāhi sesarājakakudhabhaṇḍahatthāhi
atk-s0513a1:685_8: anugammamāno. Tato sattamapade ṭhito “aggohamasmiṃ lokassā”tiādikaṃ āsabhiṃ vācaṃ
atk-s0513a1:686_0: Bodhisatto hi tīsu attabhāvesu mātukucchito nikkhantamattova vācaṃ nicchāresi mahosadhattabhāve,
atk-s0513a1:686_1: vessantarattabhāve, imasmiṃ attabhāveti. Mahosadhattabhāve kirassa mātukucchito nikkhantamattasseva
atk-s0513a1:686_2: sakko devarājā āgantvā candanasāraṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā gato, so taṃ muṭṭhiyaṃ katvāva
atk-s0513a1:686_3: nikkhanto. Atha naṃ mātā “tāta, kiṃ gahetvā āgatosī”ti pucchi. “Osadhaṃ, ammā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:686_4: Iti osadhaṃ gahetvā āgatattā “osadhadārako”tvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Taṃ osadhaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:686_5: cāṭiyaṃ pakkhipiṃsu, āgatāgatānaṃ andhabadhirādīnaṃ tadeva sabbarogavūpasamāya bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:686_6: ahosi. Tato “mahantaṃ idaṃ osadhaṃ, mahantaṃ idaṃ osadha”nti uppannavacanaṃ upādāya
atk-s0513a1:686_7: “mahosadho”tvevassa nāmaṃ jātaṃ. Vessantarattabhāve pana mātukucchito nikkhanto dakkhiṇahatthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:686_8: pasāretvā “atthi nu kho, amma, kiñci gehasmiṃ, dānaṃ dassāmī”ti vadanto nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:686_9: Athassa mātā “sadhane kule nibbattosi, tātā”ti puttassa hatthaṃ attano hatthatale
atk-s0513a1:686_10: katvā sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapesi. Imasmiṃ pana attabhāve imaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadīti evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:686_11: bodhisatto tīsu attabhāvesu mātukucchito nikkhantamattova vācaṃ nicchāresi. Yathā
atk-s0513a1:686_12: ca paṭisandhiggahaṇakkhaṇe, jātakkhaṇepissa dvattiṃsa pubbanimittāni pāturahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:686_13: Yasmiṃ pana samaye amhākaṃ bodhisatto lumbinīvane jāto, tasmiṃyeva samaye rāhulamātā
atk-s0513a1:686_14: devī, ānandatthero, channo amacco, kāḷudāyī amacco, kaṇḍako assarājā, mahābodhirukkho,
atk-s0513a1:686_15: catasso nidhikumbhiyo ca jātā. Tattha ekā gāvutappamāṇā, ekā aḍḍhayojanappamāṇā,
atk-s0513a1:686_16: ekā tigāvutappamāṇā, ekā yojanappamāṇā ahosīti. Ime satta sahajātā nāma.
atk-s0513a1:687_0: Ubhayanagaravāsino bodhisattaṃ gahetvā kapilavatthunagarameva agamaṃsu. Taṃ divasaṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:687_1: ca “kapilavatthunagare suddhodanamahārājassa putto jāto, ayaṃ kumāro bodhitale nisīditvā
atk-s0513a1:687_2: buddho bhavissatī”ti tāvatiṃsabhavane haṭṭhatuṭṭhā devasaṅghā celukkhepādīni pavattentā
atk-s0513a1:687_3: kīḷiṃsu. Tasmiṃ samaye suddhodanamahārājassa kulūpako aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī kāḷadevīlo
atk-s0513a1:687_4: nāma tāpaso bhattakiccaṃ katvā divāvihāratthāya tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā tattha divāvihāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:687_5: nisinno tā devatā kīḷamānā disvā “kiṃkāraṇā tumhe evaṃ tuṭṭhamānasā kīḷatha, mayhampetaṃ
atk-s0513a1:687_6: kāraṇaṃ kathethā”ti pucchi. Devatā āhaṃsu “mārisa, suddhodanarañño putto jāto, so
atk-s0513a1:687_7: bodhitale nisīditvā buddho hutvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattessati, tassa anantaṃ buddhalīḷaṃ
atk-s0513a1:687_8: daṭṭhuṃ dhammañca sotuṃ lacchāmāti iminā kāraṇena tuṭṭhāmhā”ti. Tāpaso tāsaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:687_9: sutvā khippaṃ devalokato oruyha rājanivesanaṃ pavisitvā paññattāsane nisinno “putto
atk-s0513a1:687_10: kira te, mahārāja, jāto, passissāmi na”nti āha. Rājā alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ kumāraṃ āharāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:687_11: tāpasaṃ vandāpetuṃ abhihari, bodhisattassa pādā parivattitvā tāpasassa jaṭāsu patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:687_12: Bodhisattassa hi tenattabhāvena vanditabbayuttako nāma añño natthi. Sace hi ajānantā
atk-s0513a1:687_13: bodhisattassa sīsaṃ tāpasassa pādamūle ṭhapeyyuṃ, sattadhā tassa muddhā phaleyya.
atk-s0513a1:687_14: Tāpaso “na me attānaṃ nāsetuṃ yutta”nti uṭṭhāyāsanā bodhisattassa añjaliṃ paggahesi.
atk-s0513a1:687_15: Rājā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā attano puttaṃ vandi.
atk-s0513a1:688_0: Tāpaso atīte cattālīsa kappe, anāgate cattālīsāti asīti kappe anussarati. Bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:688_1: lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā “bhavissati nu kho buddho, udāhu no”ti āvajjetvā upadhārento
atk-s0513a1:688_2: “nissaṃsayaṃ buddho bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “acchariyapuriso aya”nti sitaṃ akāsi. Tato
atk-s0513a1:688_3: “ahaṃ imaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhissāmi nu kho, no”ti upadhārento “na labhissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:688_4: antarāyeva kālaṃ katvā buddhasatenapi buddhasahassenapi gantvā bodhetuṃ asakkuṇeyye
atk-s0513a1:688_5: arūpabhave nibbattissāmī”ti disvā “evarūpaṃ nāma acchariyapurisaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ daṭṭhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:688_6: na labhissāmi, mahatī vata me jāni bhavissatī”ti parodi.
atk-s0513a1:689_0: Manussā disvā “amhākaṃ ayyo idāneva hasitvā puna parodi. Kiṃ nu kho, bhante, amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:689_1: ayyaputtassa koci antarāyo bhavissatī”ti pucchiṃsu. “Natthetassa antarāyo, nissaṃsayena
atk-s0513a1:689_2: buddho bhavissatī”ti. Atha “kasmā paroditthā”ti? “Evarūpaṃ purisaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ daṭṭhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:689_3: na labhissāmi, ‘mahatī vata me jāni bhavissatī’ti attānaṃ anusocanto rodāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:689_4: Tato so “kiṃ nu kho me ñātakesu koci etaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhissati, na labhissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:689_5: upadhārento attano bhāgineyyaṃ nāḷakadārakaṃ addasa. So bhaginiyā gehaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:689_6: te putto nāḷako”ti? “Atthi gehe, ayyā”ti. “Pakkosāhi na”nti pakkosāpetvā attano santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:689_7: āgataṃ kumāraṃ āha – “tāta, suddhodanamahārājassa kule putto jāto, buddhaṅkuro esa,
atk-s0513a1:689_8: pañcatiṃsa vassāni atikkamitvā buddho bhavissati, tvaṃ etaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhissasi, ajjeva
atk-s0513a1:689_9: pabbajāhī”ti. Sattāsītikoṭidhane kule nibbattadārakopi “na maṃ mātulo anatthe niyojessatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:689_10: cintetvā tāvadeva antarāpaṇato kāsāyāni ceva mattikāpattañca āharāpetvā kesamassuṃ
atk-s0513a1:689_11: ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā “yo loke uttamapuggalo, taṃ uddissa mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:689_12: pabbajjā”ti bodhisattābhimukhaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā pattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:689_13: thavikāya pakkhipitvā aṃsakūṭe laggetvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:689_14: So paramābhisambodhiṃ pattaṃ tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā nāḷakapaṭipadaṃ kathāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:689_15: puna himavantaṃ pavisitvā arahattaṃ patvā ukkaṭṭhapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno satteva māse
atk-s0513a1:689_16: āyuṃ pāletvā ekaṃ suvaṇṇapabbataṃ nissāya ṭhitakova anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0513a1:690_0: Bodhisattampi kho pañcame divase sīsaṃ nhāpetvā “nāmaggahaṇaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti rājabhavanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:690_1: catujjātikagandhehi vilimpitvā lājāpañcamakāni pupphāni vikiritvā asambhinnapāyāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:690_2: pacāpetvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṅgate aṭṭhasatabrāhmaṇe nimantetvā rājabhavane nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:690_3: subhojanaṃ bhojetvā mahāsakkāraṃ katvā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti lakkhaṇāni pariggahāpesuṃ. Tesu –
atk-s0513a1:691: “Rāmo dhajo lakkhaṇo cāpi mantī, koṇḍañño ca bhojo suyāmo sudatto;
atk-s0513a1:692: Ete tadā aṭṭha ahesuṃ brāhmaṇā, chaḷaṅgavā mantaṃ viyākariṃsū”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:693_0: Ime aṭṭheva brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇapariggāhakā ahesuṃ. Paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase supinopi
atk-s0513a1:693_1: eteheva pariggahito. Tesu satta janā dve aṅguliyo ukkhipitvā dvedhā byākariṃsu –
atk-s0513a1:693_2: “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāraṃ ajjhāvasamāno rājā hoti cakkavattī, pabbajamāno
atk-s0513a1:693_3: buddho”ti, sabbaṃ cakkavattirañño sirivibhavaṃ ācikkhiṃsu. Tesaṃ pana sabbadaharo
atk-s0513a1:693_4: gottato koṇḍañño nāma māṇavo bodhisattassa varalakkhaṇanipphattiṃ oloketvā – “imassa
atk-s0513a1:693_5: agāramajjhe ṭhānakāraṇaṃ natthi, ekantenesa vivaṭṭacchado buddho bhavissatī”ti ekameva
atk-s0513a1:693_6: aṅguliṃ ukkhipitvā ekaṃsabyākaraṇaṃ byākāsi. Ayañhi katādhikāro pacchimabhavikasatto
atk-s0513a1:693_7: paññāya itare satta jane abhibhavitvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatassa agāramajjhe
atk-s0513a1:693_8: ṭhānaṃ nāma natthi, asaṃsayaṃ buddho bhavissatī”ti ekameva gatiṃ addasa, tasmā ekaṃ
atk-s0513a1:693_9: aṅguliṃ ukkhipitvā evaṃ byākāsi. Athassa nāmaṃ gaṇhantā sabbalokassa atthasiddhikarattā
atk-s0513a1:694_0: Atha te brāhmaṇā attano gharāni gantvā putte āmantayiṃsu – “tātā, amhe mahallakā,
atk-s0513a1:694_1: suddhodanamahārājassa puttaṃ sabbaññutaṃ pattaṃ mayaṃ sambhaveyyāma vā no vā, tumhe
atk-s0513a1:694_2: tasmiṃ kumāre sabbaññutaṃ patte tassa sāsane pabbajeyyāthā”ti. Te sattapi janā yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0513a1:694_3: ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gatā, koṇḍaññamāṇavova arogo ahosi. So mahāsatte vuḍḍhimanvāya
atk-s0513a1:694_4: mahābhinikkhamanaṃ abhinikkhamitvā anukkamena uruvelaṃ gantvā “ramaṇīyo, vata ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:694_5: bhūmibhāgo, alaṃ vatidaṃ kulaputtassa padhānatthikassa padhānāyā”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0513a1:694_6: tattha vāsaṃ upagate “mahāpuriso pabbajito”ti sutvā tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ putte upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:694_7: evamāha “siddhatthakumāro kira pabbajito, so nissaṃsayaṃ buddho bhavissati. Sace
atk-s0513a1:694_8: tumhākaṃ pitaro arogā assu, ajja nikkhamitvā pabbajeyyuṃ. Sace tumhepi iccheyyātha,
atk-s0513a1:694_9: etha, ahaṃ taṃ purisaṃ anupabbajissāmī”ti. Te sabbe ekacchandā bhavituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:694_10: tayo janā na pabbajiṃsu. Koṇḍaññabrāhmaṇaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā itare cattāro pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:694_11: Te pañcapi janā pañcavaggiyattherā nāma jātā.
atk-s0513a1:695_0: Tadā pana rājā “kiṃ disvā mayhaṃ putto pabbajissatī”ti pucchi. “Cattāri pubbanimittānī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:695_2: paṭṭhāya evarūpānaṃ mama puttassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ mā adattha, mayhaṃ puttassa
atk-s0513a1:695_3: buddhabhāvena kammaṃ natthi, ahaṃ mama puttaṃ dvisahassadīpaparivārānaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:695_4: mahādīpānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kārentaṃ chattiṃsayojanaparimaṇḍalāya parisāya
atk-s0513a1:695_5: parivutaṃ gaganatale vicaramānaṃ passitukāmo”ti. Evañca pana vatvā imesaṃ catuppakārānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:695_6: nimittānaṃ kumārassa cakkhupathe āgamananivāraṇatthaṃ catūsu disāsu gāvute gāvute
atk-s0513a1:695_7: ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi. Taṃ divasaṃ pana maṅgalaṭṭhāne sannipatitesu asītiyā ñātikulasahassesu
atk-s0513a1:695_8: ekeko ekamekaṃ puttaṃ paṭijāni – “ayaṃ buddho vā hotu rājā vā, mayaṃ ekamekaṃ puttaṃ
atk-s0513a1:695_9: dassāma. Sacepi buddho bhavissati, khattiyasamaṇeheva purakkhataparivārito vicarissati.
atk-s0513a1:695_10: Sacepi rājā bhavissati, khattiyakumāreheva purakkhataparivārito vicarissatī”ti. Rājāpi
atk-s0513a1:695_11: bodhisattassa uttamarūpasampannā vigatasabbadosā dhātiyo paccupaṭṭhāpesi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:696_0: Athekadivasaṃ rañño vappamaṅgalaṃ nāma ahosi. Taṃ divasaṃ sakalanagaraṃ devavimānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:696_1: viya alaṅkaronti. Sabbe dāsakammakarādayo ahatavatthanivatthā gandhamālādipaṭimaṇḍitā
atk-s0513a1:696_2: rājakule sannipatanti. Rañño kammante naṅgalasahassaṃ yojīyati. Tasmiṃ pana divase
atk-s0513a1:696_4: rañño ālambananaṅgalaṃ pana rattasuvaṇṇaparikkhataṃ hoti. Balibaddānaṃ siṅgarasmipatodāpi
atk-s0513a1:696_5: suvaṇṇaparikkhatāva honti. Rājā mahatā parivārena nikkhanto puttaṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:696_6: Kammantaṭṭhāne eko jamburukkho bahalapalāso sandacchāyo ahosi. Tassa heṭṭhā kumārassa
atk-s0513a1:696_7: sayanaṃ paññapāpetvā upari suvaṇṇatārakakhacitaṃ vitānaṃ bandhāpetvā sāṇipākārena
atk-s0513a1:696_8: parikkhipāpetvā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapāpetvā rājā sabbālaṅkāraṃ alaṅkaritvā amaccagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0513a1:696_9: naṅgalakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Tattha rājā suvaṇṇanaṅgalaṃ gaṇhāti, amaccā ekenūnaṭṭhasatarajatanaṅgalāni,
atk-s0513a1:696_10: kassakā sesanaṅgalāni. Te tāni gahetvā ito cito ca kasanti. Rājā pana orato vā pāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:696_11: gacchati, pārato vā oraṃ āgacchati. Etasmiṃ ṭhāne mahāsampatti ahosi. Bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:696_12: parivāretvā nisinnā dhātiyo “rañño sampattiṃ passissāmā”ti antosāṇito bahi nikkhantā.
atk-s0513a1:696_13: Bodhisatto ito cito ca olokento kañci adisvā vegena uṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ānāpāne
atk-s0513a1:696_14: pariggahetvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattesi. Dhātiyo khajjabhojjantare vicaramānā thokaṃ
atk-s0513a1:696_15: cirāyiṃsu. Sesarukkhānaṃ chāyā nivattā, tassa pana rukkhassa parimaṇḍalā hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:696_16: Dhātiyo “ayyaputto ekato”ti vegena sāṇiṃ ukkhipitvā anto pavisamānā bodhisattaṃ sayane
atk-s0513a1:696_17: pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tañca pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā gantvā rañño ārocesuṃ – “deva, kumāro
atk-s0513a1:696_18: evaṃ nisinno, aññesaṃ rukkhānaṃ chāyā nivattā, jamburukkhassa pana parimaṇḍalā ṭhitā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:696_19: Rājā vegenāgantvā pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā – “idaṃ te, tāta, dutiyaṃ vandana”nti puttaṃ vandi.
atk-s0513a1:697_0: Atha anukkamena bodhisatto soḷasavassuddesiko jāto. Rājā bodhisattassa tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:697_1: anucchavike tayo pāsāde kāresi – ekaṃ navabhūmakaṃ, ekaṃ sattabhūmakaṃ, ekaṃ pañcabhūmakaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:697_2: cattālīsasahassā ca nāṭakitthiyo upaṭṭhāpesi. Bodhisatto devo viya accharāsaṅghaparivuto,
atk-s0513a1:697_3: alaṅkatanāṭakaparivuto, nippurisehi tūriyehi paricāriyamāno mahāsampattiṃ anubhavanto
atk-s0513a1:697_4: utuvārena tesu pāsādesu viharati. Rāhulamātā panassa devī aggamahesī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:698_0: Tassevaṃ mahāsampattiṃ anubhavantassa ekadivasaṃ ñātisaṅghassa abbhantare ayaṃ kathā
atk-s0513a1:698_1: udapādi – “siddhattho kīḷāpasutova vicarati, kiñci sippaṃ na sikkhati, saṅgāme paccupaṭṭhite
atk-s0513a1:698_2: kiṃ karissatī”ti. Rājā bodhisattaṃ pakkosāpetvā – “tāta, tava ñātakā ‘siddhattho
atk-s0513a1:698_3: kiñci sippaṃ asikkhitvā kīḷāpasutova vicaratī’ti vadanti, ettha kiṃ pattakāle maññasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:698_4: Deva, mama sippaṃ sikkhanakiccaṃ natthi, nagare mama sippadassanatthaṃ bheriṃ carāpetha
atk-s0513a1:698_5: “ito sattame divase ñātakānaṃ sippaṃ dassessāmī”ti. Rājā tathā akāsi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:698_6: akkhaṇavedhivālavedhidhanuggahe sannipātāpetvā mahājanassa majjhe aññehi dhanuggahehi
atk-s0513a1:698_7: asādhāraṇaṃ ñātakānaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ sippaṃ dassesi. Taṃ sarabhaṅgajātake āgatanayeneva
atk-s0513a1:699_0: Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatto uyyānabhūmiṃ gantukāmo sārathiṃ āmantetvā “rathaṃ yojehī”ti
atk-s0513a1:699_1: āha. So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā mahārahaṃ uttamarathaṃ sabbālaṅkārena alaṅkaritvā
atk-s0513a1:699_2: kumudapattavaṇṇe cattāro maṅgalasindhave yojetvā bodhisattassa paṭivedesi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:699_3: devavimānasadisaṃ rathaṃ abhiruhitvā uyyānābhimukho agamāsi. Devatā “siddhatthakumārassa
atk-s0513a1:699_4: abhisambujjhanakālo āsanno, pubbanimittaṃ dassessāmā”ti ekaṃ devaputtaṃ jarājajjaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:699_5: khaṇḍadantaṃ palitakesaṃ vaṅkaṃ obhaggasarīraṃ daṇḍahatthaṃ pavedhamānaṃ katvā dassesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:699_6: Taṃ bodhisatto ceva sārathi ca passanti. Tato bodhisatto sārathiṃ – “samma, ko nāmesa
atk-s0513a1:699_7: puriso, kesāpissa na yathā aññesa”nti mahāpadāne āgatanayena pucchitvā tassa vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:699_8: sutvā “dhīratthu vata bho jāti, yatra hi nāma jātassa jarā paññāyissatī”ti saṃviggahadayo
atk-s0513a1:699_9: tatova paṭinivattitvā pāsādameva abhiruhi. Rājā “kiṃ kāraṇā mama putto khippaṃ paṭinivattī”ti
atk-s0513a1:699_10: pucchi. “Jiṇṇakaṃ purisaṃ disvā devā”ti. “Jiṇṇakaṃ disvā pabbajissatīti āhaṃsu, kasmā
atk-s0513a1:699_11: maṃ nāsetha, sīghaṃ puttassa nāṭakāni sajjetha, sampattiṃ anubhavanto pabbajjāya
atk-s0513a1:699_12: satiṃ na karissatī”ti vatvā ārakkhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sabbadisāsu aḍḍhayojane aḍḍhayojane ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:700_0: Punekadivasaṃ bodhisatto tatheva uyyānaṃ gacchanto devatāhi nimmitaṃ byādhitaṃ purisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:700_1: disvā purimanayeneva pucchitvā saṃviggahadayo nivattitvā pāsādaṃ abhiruhi. Rājāpi
atk-s0513a1:700_2: pucchitvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva saṃvidahitvā puna vaḍḍhetvā samantā tigāvutappamāṇe
atk-s0513a1:700_3: padese ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi. Aparaṃ ekadivasaṃ bodhisatto tatheva uyyānaṃ gacchanto devatāhi
atk-s0513a1:700_4: nimmitaṃ kālakataṃ disvā purimanayeneva pucchitvā saṃviggahadayo puna nivattitvā
atk-s0513a1:700_5: pāsādaṃ abhiruhi. Rājāpi pucchitvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva saṃvidahitvā puna vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0513a1:700_6: samantā yojanappamāṇe padese ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi. Aparaṃ pana ekadivasaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0513a1:700_7: tatheva devatāhi nimmitaṃ sunivatthaṃ supārutaṃ pabbajitaṃ disvā “ko nāmeso sammā”ti
atk-s0513a1:700_8: sārathiṃ pucchi. Sārathi kiñcāpi buddhuppādassa abhāvā pabbajitaṃ vā pabbajitaguṇe
atk-s0513a1:700_9: vā na jānāti, devatānubhāvena pana “pabbajito nāmāyaṃ devā”ti vatvā pabbajjāya guṇe
atk-s0513a1:700_10: vaṇṇesi. Bodhisatto pabbajjāya ruciṃ uppādetvā taṃ divasaṃ uyyānaṃ agamāsi. Dīghabhāṇakā
atk-s0513a1:701_0: So tattha divasabhāgaṃ kīḷitvā maṅgalapokkharaṇiyaṃ nhāyitvā atthaṅgate sūriye maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe
atk-s0513a1:701_1: nisīdi attānaṃ alaṅkārāpetukāmo. Athassa paricārakapurisā nānāvaṇṇāni dussāni nānappakārā
atk-s0513a1:701_2: ābharaṇavikatiyo mālāgandhavilepanāni ca ādāya samantā parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:701_3: khaṇe sakkassa nisinnāsanaṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi. So “ko nu kho maṃ imamhā ṭhānā cāvetukāmo”ti
atk-s0513a1:701_4: upadhārento bodhisattassa alaṅkāretukāmataṃ ñatvā vissakammaṃ āmantesi “samma vissakamma,
atk-s0513a1:701_5: siddhatthakumāro ajja aḍḍharattasamaye mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamissati, ayamassa
atk-s0513a1:701_6: pacchimo alaṅkāro, uyyānaṃ gantvā mahāpurisaṃ dibbālaṅkārehi alaṅkarohī”ti. So “sādhū”ti
atk-s0513a1:701_7: paṭissuṇitvā devatānubhāvena taṅkhaṇaṃyeva upasaṅkamitvā tasseva kappakasadiso hutvā
atk-s0513a1:701_8: kappakassa hatthato veṭhanadussaṃ gahetvā bodhisattassa sīsaṃ veṭhesi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:701_9: hatthasamphasseneva “nāyaṃ manusso, devaputto eso”ti aññāsi. Veṭhanena veṭhitamatte
atk-s0513a1:701_10: sīse moḷiyaṃ maṇiratanākārena dussasahassaṃ abbhuggañchi. Puna veṭhentassa dussasahassanti
atk-s0513a1:701_11: dasakkhattuṃ veṭhentassa dasa dussasahassāni abbhuggacchiṃsu. “Sīsaṃ khuddakaṃ, dussāni
atk-s0513a1:701_12: bahūni, kathaṃ abbhuggatānī”ti na cintetabbaṃ. Tesu hi sabbamahantaṃ āmalakapupphappamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:701_13: avasesāni kusumbakapupphappamāṇāni ahesuṃ. Bodhisattassa sīsaṃ kiñjakkhagavacchitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:702_0: Athassa sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitassa sabbatālāvacaresu sakāni sakāni paṭibhānāni dassayantesu,
atk-s0513a1:702_2: sambhāventesu sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ rathavaraṃ abhiruhi. Tasmiṃ samaye “rāhulamātā
atk-s0513a1:702_3: puttaṃ vijātā”ti sutvā suddhodanamahārājā “puttassa me tuṭṭhiṃ nivedethā”ti sāsanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:702_4: pahiṇi. Bodhisatto taṃ sutvā “rāhu jāto, bandhanaṃ jāta”nti āha. Rājā “kiṃ me putto
atk-s0513a1:702_5: avacā”ti pucchitvā taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “ito paṭṭhāya me nattā rāhulakumāroyeva nāma hotū”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:703_0: Bodhisattopi kho rathavaraṃ āruyha mahantena yasena atimanoramena sirisobhaggena
atk-s0513a1:703_1: nagaraṃ pāvisi. Tasmiṃ samaye kisāgotamī nāma khattiyakaññā uparipāsādavaratalagatā
atk-s0513a1:703_2: nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ kurumānassa bodhisattassa rūpasiriṃ disvā pītisomanassajātā idaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0513a1:704: “Nibbutā nūna sā mātā, nibbuto nūna so pitā;
atk-s0513a1:705: Nibbutā nūna sā nārī, yassāyaṃ īdiso patī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:706_0: Bodhisatto taṃ sutvā cintesi “ayaṃ evamāha ‘evarūpaṃ attabhāvaṃ passantiyā mātu hadayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:706_1: nibbāyati, pitu hadayaṃ nibbāyati, pajāpatiyā hadayaṃ nibbāyatī’ti! Kismiṃ nu kho
atk-s0513a1:706_2: nibbute hadayaṃ nibbutaṃ nāma hotī”ti? Athassa kilesesu virattamānasassa etadahosi
atk-s0513a1:706_3: – “rāgaggimhi nibbute nibbutaṃ nāma hoti, dosaggimhi nibbute nibbutaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0513a1:706_4: mohaggimhi nibbute nibbutaṃ nāma hoti, mānadiṭṭhiādīsu sabbakilesadarathesu nibbutesu
atk-s0513a1:706_5: nibbutaṃ nāma hoti. Ayaṃ me sussavanaṃ sāvesi, ahañhi nibbānaṃ gavesanto carāmi,
atk-s0513a1:706_6: ajjeva mayā gharāvāsaṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhamma pabbajitvā nibbānaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:706_7: ayaṃ imissā ācariyabhāgo hotū”ti kaṇṭhato omuñcitvā kisāgotamiyā satasahassagghanakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:706_8: muttāhāraṃ pesesi. Sā “siddhatthakumāro mayi paṭibaddhacitto hutvā paṇṇākāraṃ pesesī”ti
atk-s0513a1:707_0: Bodhisattopi mahantena sirisobhaggena attano pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā sirisayane nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:707_1: Tāvadeva ca naṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā naccagītādīsu susikkhitā devakaññā viya rūpasobhaggappattā
atk-s0513a1:707_2: itthiyo nānātūriyāni gahetvā samparivārayitvā abhiramāpentiyo naccagītavāditāni payojayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:707_3: Bodhisatto kilesesu virattacittatāya naccādīsu anabhirato muhuttaṃ niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0513a1:707_4: Tāpi itthiyo “yassatthāya mayaṃ naccādīni payojema, so niddaṃ upagato, idāni kimatthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:707_5: kilamāmā”ti gahitaggahitāni tūriyāni ajjhottharitvā nipajjiṃsu, gandhatelappadīpā
atk-s0513a1:707_6: jhāyanti. Bodhisatto pabujjhitvā sayanapiṭṭhe pallaṅkena nisinno addasa tā itthiyo
atk-s0513a1:707_7: tūriyabhaṇḍāni avattharitvā niddāyantiyo – ekaccā paggharitakheḷā, lālākilinnagattā,
atk-s0513a1:707_8: ekaccā dante khādantiyo, ekaccā kākacchantiyo, ekaccā vippalapantiyo, ekaccā vivaṭamukhā,
atk-s0513a1:707_9: ekaccā apagatavatthā, pākaṭabībhacchasambādhaṭṭhānā. So tāsaṃ taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:707_10: bhiyyosomattāya kāmesu virattacitto ahosi. Tassa alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ sakkabhavanasadisampi
atk-s0513a1:707_11: taṃ mahātalaṃ apaviddhanānākuṇapabharitaṃ āmakasusānaṃ viya upaṭṭhāsi, tayo bhavā
atk-s0513a1:707_12: ādittagehasadisā khāyiṃsu – “upaddutaṃ vata bho, upassaṭṭhaṃ vata bho”ti udānaṃ pavattesi,
atk-s0513a1:708_0: So “ajjeva mayā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sayanā uṭṭhāya dvārasamīpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:708_1: gantvā “ko etthā”ti āha. Ummāre sīsaṃ katvā nipanno channo “ahaṃ ayyaputta channo”ti
atk-s0513a1:708_2: āha. “Ahaṃ ajja mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitukāmo, ekaṃ me assaṃ kappehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:708_3: So “sādhu devā”ti assabhaṇḍikaṃ gahetvā assasālaṃ gantvā gandhatelapadīpesu jalantesu
atk-s0513a1:708_4: sumanapaṭṭavitānassa heṭṭhā ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge ṭhitaṃ kaṇḍakaṃ assarājānaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:708_5: “ajja mayā imameva kappetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kaṇḍakaṃ kappesi. So kappiyamānova aññāsi
atk-s0513a1:708_6: “ayaṃ kappanā atigāḷhā, aññesu divasesu uyyānakīḷādigamane kappanā viya na hoti,
atk-s0513a1:708_7: mayhaṃ ayyaputto ajja mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitukāmo bhavissatī”ti. Tato tuṭṭhamānaso
atk-s0513a1:708_8: mahāhasitaṃ hasi. So saddo sakalanagaraṃ pattharitvā gaccheyya, devatā pana taṃ saddaṃ
atk-s0513a1:709_0: Bodhisattopi kho channaṃ pesetvāva “puttaṃ tāva passissāmī”ti cintetvā nisinnapallaṅkato
atk-s0513a1:709_1: uṭṭhāya rāhulamātāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā gabbhadvāraṃ vivari. Tasmiṃ khaṇe antogabbhe
atk-s0513a1:709_2: gandhatelapadīpo jhāyati, rāhulamātā sumanamallikādīnaṃ pupphānaṃ ambaṇamattena abhippakiṇṇasayane
atk-s0513a1:709_3: puttassa matthake hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā niddāyati. Bodhisatto ummāre pādaṃ ṭhapetvā ṭhitakova
atk-s0513a1:709_4: oloketvā “sacāhaṃ deviyā hatthaṃ apanetvā mama puttaṃ gaṇhissāmi, devī pabujjhissati,
atk-s0513a1:709_5: evaṃ me gamanantarāyo bhavissati, buddho hutvāva āgantvā puttaṃ passissāmī”ti pāsādatalato
atk-s0513a1:709_6: otari. Yaṃ pana jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tadā sattāhajāto rāhulakumāro hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:709_7: taṃ sesaṭṭhakathāsu natthi, tasmā idameva gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:710_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto pāsādatalā otaritvā assasamīpaṃ gantvā evamāha – “tāta kaṇḍaka, tvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:710_1: ajja ekarattiṃ maṃ tāraya, ahaṃ taṃ nissāya buddho hutvā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ tāressāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:710_2: Tato ullaṅghitvā kaṇḍakassa piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhi. Kaṇḍako gīvato paṭṭhāya āyāmena aṭṭhārasahattho
atk-s0513a1:710_3: hoti tadanucchavikena ubbedhena samannāgato thāmajavasampanno sabbaseto dhotasaṅkhasadiso.
atk-s0513a1:710_4: So sace haseyya vā padasaddaṃ vā kareyya, saddo sakalanagaraṃ avatthareyya. Tasmā
atk-s0513a1:710_5: devatā attano ānubhāvena tassa yathā na koci suṇāti, evaṃ hasitasaddaṃ sannirumbhitvā
atk-s0513a1:710_6: akkamanaakkamanapadavāre hatthatalāni upanāmesuṃ. Bodhisatto assavarassa piṭṭhivemajjhagato
atk-s0513a1:710_7: channaṃ assassa vāladhiṃ gāhāpetvā aḍḍharattasamaye mahādvārasamīpaṃ patto. Tadā
atk-s0513a1:710_8: pana rājā “evaṃ bodhisatto yāya kāyaci velāya nagaradvāraṃ vivaritvā nikkhamituṃ
atk-s0513a1:710_9: na sakkhissatī”ti dvīsu dvārakavāṭesu ekekaṃ purisasahassena vivaritabbaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:710_10: Bodhisatto thāmabalasampanno, hatthigaṇanāya koṭisahassahatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti,
atk-s0513a1:710_11: purisagaṇanāya dasakoṭisahassapurisānaṃ. So cintesi “sace dvāraṃ na vivarīyati, ajja
atk-s0513a1:710_12: kaṇḍakassa piṭṭhe nisinnova vāladhiṃ gahetvā ṭhitena channena saddhiṃyeva kaṇḍakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:710_13: ūrūhi nippīḷetvā aṭṭhārasahatthubbedhaṃ pākāraṃ uppatitvā atikkamissāmī”ti. Channopi
atk-s0513a1:710_14: cintesi “sace dvāraṃ na vivarīyati, ahaṃ ayyaputtaṃ khandhe nisīdāpetvā kaṇḍakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:710_15: dakkhiṇena hatthena kucchiyaṃ parikkhipanto upakacchantare katvā pākāraṃ uppatitvā
atk-s0513a1:710_16: atikkamissāmī”ti. Kaṇḍakopi cintesi “sace dvāraṃ na vivarīyati, ahaṃ attano sāmikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:710_17: piṭṭhiyaṃ yathānisinnameva channena vāladhiṃ gahetvā ṭhitena saddhiṃyeva ukkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:710_18: pākāraṃ uppatitvā atikkamissāmī”ti. Sace dvāraṃ na avāpurīyittha, yathācintitameva
atk-s0513a1:710_19: tesu tīsu janesu aññataro sampādeyya. Dvāre adhivatthā devatā pana dvāraṃ vivari.
atk-s0513a1:711_0: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe māro “bodhisattaṃ nivattessāmī”ti āgantvā ākāse ṭhito āha – “mārisa,
atk-s0513a1:711_1: mā nikkhama, ito te sattame divase cakkaratanaṃ pātubhavissati, dvisahassaparittadīpaparivārānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:711_2: catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ rajjaṃ kāressasi, nivatta mārisā”ti. “Kosi tva”nti? “Ahaṃ vasavattī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:711_3: “Māra, jānāmahaṃ mayhaṃ cakkaratanassa pātubhāvaṃ, anatthikohaṃ rajjena, dasasahassilokadhātuṃ
atk-s0513a1:711_4: unnādetvā buddho bhavissāmī”ti āha. Māro “ito dāni te paṭṭhāya kāmavitakkaṃ vā byāpādavitakkaṃ
atk-s0513a1:711_5: vā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vā cintitakāle jānissāmī”ti otārāpekkho chāyā viya anapagacchanto anubandhi.
atk-s0513a1:712_0: Bodhisattopi hatthagataṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho chaḍḍetvā mahantena
atk-s0513a1:712_1: sakkārena nagarā nikkhami āsāḷhipuṇṇamāya uttarāsāḷhanakkhatte vattamāne. Nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a1:712_2: ca puna nagaraṃ oloketukāmo jāto. Evañca panassa citte uppannamatteyeva “mahāpurisa,
atk-s0513a1:712_3: na tayā nivattitvā olokanakammaṃ kata”nti vadamānā viya mahāpathavī kulālacakkaṃ
atk-s0513a1:712_4: viya bhijjitvā parivatti. Bodhisatto nagarābhimukho ṭhatvā nagaraṃ oloketvā tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:712_6: katvā pāyāsi mahantena sakkārena uḷārena sirisobhaggena. Tadā kirassa devatā purato
atk-s0513a1:712_7: saṭṭhi ukkāsahassāni dhārayiṃsu, pacchato saṭṭhi, dakkhiṇapassato saṭṭhi, vāmapassato
atk-s0513a1:712_8: saṭṭhi, aparā devatā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ aparimāṇā ukkā dhārayiṃsu, aparā devatā
atk-s0513a1:712_9: ca nāgasupaṇṇādayo ca dibbehi gandhehi mālāhi cuṇṇehi dhūmehi pūjayamānā gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:712_10: Pāricchattakapupphehi ceva mandāravapupphehi ca ghanameghavuṭṭhikāle dhārāhi viya
atk-s0513a1:712_11: nabhaṃ nirantaraṃ ahosi, dibbāni saṃgītāni pavattiṃsu, samantato aṭṭhasaṭṭhi tūriyasatasahassāni
atk-s0513a1:712_12: pavajjiṃsu, samuddakucchiyaṃ meghatthanitakālo viya yugandharakucchiyaṃ sāgaranigghosakālo viya vattati.
atk-s0513a1:713_0: Iminā sirisobhaggena gacchanto bodhisatto ekaratteneva tīṇi rajjāni atikkamma tiṃsayojanamatthake
atk-s0513a1:713_1: anomānadītīraṃ pāpuṇi. “Kiṃ pana asso tato paraṃ gantuṃ na sakkotī”ti? “No, na sakko”ti.
atk-s0513a1:713_2: So hi ekaṃ cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ nābhiyā ṭhitacakkassa nemivaṭṭiṃ maddanto viya antantena
atk-s0513a1:713_3: caritvā purepātarāsameva āgantvā attano sampāditaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjituṃ samattho. Tadā
atk-s0513a1:713_4: pana devanāgasupaṇṇādīhi ākāse ṭhatvā ossaṭṭhehi gandhamālādīhi yāva ūruppadesā sañchannaṃ
atk-s0513a1:713_5: sarīraṃ ākaḍḍhitvā gandhamālājaṭaṃ chindantassa atippapañco ahosi, tasmā tiṃsayojanamattameva
atk-s0513a1:713_6: agamāsi. Atha bodhisatto nadītīre ṭhatvā channaṃ pucchi – “kinnāmā ayaṃ nadī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:713_7: “Anomā nāma, devā”ti. “Amhākampi pabbajjā anomā bhavissatī”ti paṇhiyā ghaṭṭento assassa
atk-s0513a1:713_8: saññaṃ adāsi. Asso uppatitvā aṭṭhūsabhavitthārāya nadiyā pārimatīre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:714_0: Bodhisatto assapiṭṭhito oruyha rajatapaṭṭasadise vālukāpuline ṭhatvā channaṃ āmantesi
atk-s0513a1:714_1: – “samma, channa, tvaṃ mayhaṃ ābharaṇāni ceva kaṇḍakañca ādāya gaccha, ahaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:714_2: “Ahampi, deva, pabbajissāmī”ti. Bodhisatto “na labbhā tayā pabbajituṃ, gaccha tva”nti
atk-s0513a1:714_3: tikkhattuṃ paṭibāhitvā ābharaṇāni ceva kaṇḍakañca paṭicchāpetvā cintesi “ime mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:714_4: kesā samaṇasāruppā na hontī”ti. Añño bodhisattassa kese chindituṃ yuttarūpo natthi,
atk-s0513a1:714_5: tato “sayameva khaggena chindissāmī”ti dakkhiṇena hatthena asiṃ gaṇhitvā vāmahatthena
atk-s0513a1:714_6: moḷiyā saddhiṃ cūḷaṃ gahetvā chindi, kesā dvaṅgulamattā hutvā dakkhiṇato āvattamānā
atk-s0513a1:714_7: sīsaṃ allīyiṃsu. Tesaṃ yāvajīvaṃ tadeva pamāṇaṃ ahosi, massu ca tadanurūpaṃ, puna
atk-s0513a1:714_8: kesamassuohāraṇakiccaṃ nāma nāhosi. Bodhisatto saha moḷiyā cuḷaṃ gahetvā “sacāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:714_9: buddho bhavissāmi, ākāse tiṭṭhatu, no ce, bhūmiyaṃ patatū”ti antalikkhe khipi. Taṃ
atk-s0513a1:714_10: cūḷāmaṇiveṭhanaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā ākāse aṭṭhāsi. Sakko devarājā dibbacakkhunā
atk-s0513a1:714_11: oloketvā yojaniyaratanacaṅkoṭakena sampaṭicchitvā tāvatiṃsabhavane cūḷāmaṇicetiyaṃ nāma patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:717_0: Puna bodhisatto cintesi “imāni kāsikavatthāni mayhaṃ na samaṇasāruppānī”ti. Athassa
atk-s0513a1:717_1: kassapabuddhakāle purāṇasahāyako ghaṭīkāramahābrahmā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ jaraṃ apattena
atk-s0513a1:717_2: mittabhāvena cintesi – “ajja me sahāyako mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto, samaṇaparikkhāramassa
atk-s0513a1:718: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsī sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:720_0: Ime aṭṭha samaṇaparikkhāre āharitvā adāsi. Bodhisatto arahaddhajaṃ nivāsetvā uttamapabbajjāvesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:720_1: gaṇhitvā “channa, mama vacanena mātāpitūnaṃ ārogyaṃ vadehī”ti vatvā uyyojesi. Channo
atk-s0513a1:720_2: bodhisattaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Kaṇḍako pana channena saddhiṃ mantayamānassa
atk-s0513a1:720_3: bodhisattassa vacanaṃ suṇanto ṭhatvā “natthi dāni mayhaṃ puna sāmino dassana”nti
atk-s0513a1:720_4: cakkhupathaṃ vijahanto sokaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto hadayena phalitena kālaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:720_5: tāvatiṃsabhavane kaṇḍako nāma devaputto hutvā nibbatti. Channassa paṭhamaṃ ekova
atk-s0513a1:720_6: soko ahosi, kaṇḍakassa pana kālakiriyāya dutiyena sokena pīḷito rodanto paridevanto nagaraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:721_0: Bodhisattopi pabbajitvā tasmiṃyeva padese anupiyaṃ nāma ambavanaṃ atthi, tattha sattāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:721_1: pabbajjāsukhena vītināmetvā ekadivaseneva tiṃsayojanamaggaṃ padasā gantvā rājagahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:721_2: pāvisi. Pavisitvā sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya cari. Sakalanagaraṃ bodhisattassa rūpadassanena
atk-s0513a1:721_3: dhanapālakena paviṭṭharājagahaṃ viya asurindena paviṭṭhadevanagaraṃ viya ca saṅkhobhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:721_4: agamāsi. Rājapurisā gantvā “deva, evarūpo nāma satto nagare piṇḍāya carati, ‘devo
atk-s0513a1:721_5: vā manusso vā nāgo vā supaṇṇo vā ko nāmeso’ti na jānāmā”ti ārocesuṃ. Rājā pāsādatale
atk-s0513a1:721_6: ṭhatvā mahāpurisaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutajāto purise āṇāpesi – “gacchatha bhaṇe, vīmaṃsatha,
atk-s0513a1:721_7: sace amanusso bhavissati, nagarā nikkhamitvā antaradhāyissati, sace devatā bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:721_8: ākāsena gacchissati, sace nāgo bhavissati, pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā gamissati, sace
atk-s0513a1:722_0: Mahāpurisopi kho missakabhattaṃ saṃharitvā “alaṃ me ettakaṃ yāpanāyā”ti ñatvā paviṭṭhadvāreneva
atk-s0513a1:722_1: nagarā nikkhamitvā paṇḍavapabbatacchāyāya puratthābhimukho nisīditvā āhāraṃ paribhuñjituṃ
atk-s0513a1:722_2: āraddho. Athassa antāni parivattitvā mukhena nikkhamanākārappattāni viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:722_3: Tato tena attabhāvena evarūpassa āhārassa cakkhunāpi adiṭṭhapubbatāya tena paṭikūlāhārena
atk-s0513a1:722_4: aṭṭiyamāno evaṃ attanāva attānaṃ ovadi “siddhattha, tvaṃ sulabhannapāne kule tivassikagandhasālibhojanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:722_5: nānaggarasehi bhuñjanaṭṭhāne nibbattitvāpi ekaṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ disvā ‘kadā nu kho ahampi
atk-s0513a1:722_6: evarūpo hutvā piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjissāmi, bhavissati nu kho me so kālo’ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:722_7: nikkhanto, idāni kiṃ nāmetaṃ karosī”ti. Evaṃ attanāva attānaṃ ovaditvā nibbikāro
atk-s0513a1:723_0: Rājapurisā taṃ pavattiṃ disvā gantvā rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā dūtavacanaṃ sutvā vegena
atk-s0513a1:723_1: nagarā nikkhamitvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā iriyāpathasmiṃyeva pasīditvā bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:723_2: sabbaṃ issariyaṃ niyyādesi. Bodhisatto “mayhaṃ, mahārāja, vatthukāmehi vā kilesakāmehi
atk-s0513a1:723_3: vā attho natthi, ahaṃ paramābhisambodhiṃ patthayanto nikkhanto”ti āha. Rājā anekappakāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:723_4: yācantopi tassa cittaṃ alabhitvā “addhā tvaṃ buddho bhavissasi, buddhabhūtena pana
atk-s0513a1:723_5: te paṭhamaṃ mama vijitaṃ āgantabba”nti paṭiññaṃ gaṇhi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro
atk-s0513a1:723_6: pana “pabbajjaṃ kittayissāmi, yathā pabbaji cakkhumā”ti imaṃ pabbajjāsuttaṃ saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:724_0: Bodhisattopi rañño paṭiññaṃ datvā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno āḷārañca kālāmaṃ udakañca
atk-s0513a1:724_1: rāmaputtaṃ upasaṅkamitvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā “nāyaṃ maggo bodhāyā”ti tampi samāpattibhāvanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:724_2: analaṅkaritvā sadevakassa lokassa attano thāmavīriyasandassanatthaṃ mahāpadhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:724_3: padahitukāmo uruvelaṃ gantvā “ramaṇīyo vatāyaṃ bhūmibhāgo”ti tattheva vāsaṃ upagantvā
atk-s0513a1:724_4: mahāpadhānaṃ padahi. Tepi kho koṇḍaññappamukhā pañca pabbajitā gāmanigamarājadhānīsu
atk-s0513a1:724_5: bhikkhāya carantā tattha bodhisattaṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu. Atha naṃ chabbassāni mahāpadhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:724_6: padahantaṃ “idāni buddho bhavissati, idāni buddho bhavissatī”ti pariveṇasammajjanādikāya
atk-s0513a1:724_7: vattapaṭipattiyā upaṭṭhahamānā santikāvacarāvassa ahesuṃ. Bodhisattopi kho “koṭippattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:724_8: dukkarakāriyaṃ karissāmī”ti ekatilataṇḍulādīhipi vītināmesi, sabbasopi āhārūpacchedaṃ
atk-s0513a1:724_9: akāsi, devatāpi lomakūpehi ojaṃ upasaṃharamānā paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0513a1:725_0: Athassa tāya nirāhāratāya paramakasimānappattakāyassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kāyo kāḷavaṇṇo
atk-s0513a1:725_1: ahosi. Bāttiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni paṭicchannāni ahesuṃ. Appekadā appāṇakaṃ jhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:725_2: jhāyanto mahāvedanāhi abhitunno visaññībhūto caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ patati. Atha naṃ ekaccā
atk-s0513a1:725_3: devatā “kālakato samaṇo gotamo”ti vadanti, ekaccā “vihāroveso arahata”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:725_4: Tattha yāsaṃ “kālakato”ti ahosi, tā gantvā suddhodanamahārājassa ārocesuṃ “tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:725_5: putto kālakato”ti. Mama putto buddho hutvā kālakato, ahutvāti? Buddho bhavituṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a1:725_6: padhānabhūmiyaṃyeva patitvā kālakatoti. Idaṃ sutvā rājā “nāhaṃ saddahāmi, mama puttassa
atk-s0513a1:725_7: bodhiṃ appatvā kālakiriyā nāma natthī”ti paṭikkhipi. Kasmā pana rājā na saddahatīti?
atk-s0513a1:725_8: Kāḷadevīlatāpasassa vandāpanadivase jamburukkhamūle ca pāṭihāriyānaṃ diṭṭhattā.
atk-s0513a1:726_0: Puna bodhisatte saññaṃ paṭilabhitvā uṭṭhite tā devatā gantvā “arogo te mahārāja putto”ti
atk-s0513a1:726_1: ārocenti. Rājā “jānāmahaṃ puttassa amaraṇabhāva”nti vadati. Mahāsattassa chabbassāni
atk-s0513a1:726_2: dukkarakāriyaṃ karontassa ākāse gaṇṭhikaraṇakālo viya ahosi. So “ayaṃ dukkarakārikā
atk-s0513a1:726_3: nāma bodhāya maggo na hotī”ti oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āhāretuṃ gāmanigamesu piṇḍāya caritvā
atk-s0513a1:726_4: āhāraṃ āhari, athassa bāttiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni pākatikāni ahesuṃ, kāyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo
atk-s0513a1:726_5: ahosi. Pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū “ayaṃ chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ karontopi sabbaññutaṃ
atk-s0513a1:726_6: paṭivijjhituṃ nāsakkhi, idāni gāmādīsu piṇḍāya caritvā oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āhariyamāno
atk-s0513a1:726_7: kiṃ sakkhissati, bāhuliko esa padhānavibbhanto, sīsaṃ nhāyitukāmassa ussāvabindutakkanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:726_8: viya amhākaṃ etassa santikā visesatakkanaṃ, kiṃ no iminā”ti mahāpurisaṃ pahāya attano
atk-s0513a1:726_9: attano pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ gantvā isipatanaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:727_0: Tena kho pana samayena uruvelāyaṃ senānigame senānikuṭumbikassa gehe nibbattā sujātā
atk-s0513a1:727_1: nāma dārikā vayappattā ekasmiṃ nigrodharukkhe patthanaṃ akāsi “sace samajātikaṃ kulagharaṃ
atk-s0513a1:727_2: gantvā paṭhamagabbhe puttaṃ labhissāmi, anusaṃvaccharaṃ te satasahassapariccāgena
atk-s0513a1:727_3: balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti. Tassā sā patthanā samijjhi. Sā mahāsattassa dukkarakārikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:727_4: karontassa chaṭṭhe vasse paripuṇṇe visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ balikammaṃ kātukāmā hutvā puretaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:727_5: dhenusahassaṃ laṭṭhimadhukavane carāpetvā tāsaṃ khīraṃ pañca dhenusatāni pāyetvā
atk-s0513a1:727_6: tāsaṃ khīraṃ aḍḍhatiyānīti evaṃ yāva soḷasannaṃ dhenūnaṃ khīraṃ aṭṭha dhenuyo pivanti,
atk-s0513a1:727_7: tāva khīrassa bahalatañca madhuratañca ojavantatañca patthayamānā khīraparivattanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:727_8: nāma akāsi. Sā visākhapuṇṇamadivase “pātova balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:727_9: paccuṭṭhāya tā aṭṭha dhenuyo duhāpesi. Vacchakā dhenūnaṃ thanamūlaṃ nāgamiṃsu, thanamūle
atk-s0513a1:727_10: pana navabhājane upanītamatte attano dhammatāya khīradhārā pavattiṃsu. Taṃ acchariyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:727_11: disvā sujātā sahattheneva khīraṃ gahetvā navabhājane pakkhipitvā sahattheneva aggiṃ
atk-s0513a1:728_0: Tasmiṃ pāyāse paccamāne mahantamahantā bubbuḷā uṭṭhahitvā dakkhiṇāvattā hutvā sañcaranti,
atk-s0513a1:728_1: ekaphusitampi bahi na patati, uddhanato appamattakopi dhūmo na uṭṭhahati. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:728_2: samaye cattāro lokapālā āgantvā uddhane ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu, mahābrahmā chattaṃ dhāresi,
atk-s0513a1:728_3: sakko alātāni samānento aggiṃ jālesi. Devatā dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu
atk-s0513a1:728_4: devānañca manussānañca upakappanaojaṃ attano devānubhāvena daṇḍakabaddhaṃ madhupaṭalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:728_5: pīḷetvā madhuṃ gaṇhamānā viya saṃharitvā tattha pakkhipiṃsu. Aññesu hi kālesu devatā
atk-s0513a1:728_6: kabaḷe kabaḷe ojaṃ pakkhipanti, sambodhidivase ca pana parinibbānadivase ca ukkhaliyaṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:728_7: pakkhipanti. Sujātā ekadivaseyeva tattha attano pākaṭāni anekāni acchariyāni disvā
atk-s0513a1:728_8: puṇṇaṃ dāsiṃ āmantesi “amma puṇṇe, ajja amhākaṃ devatā ativiya pasannā, mayā ettake
atk-s0513a1:728_9: kāle evarūpaṃ acchariyaṃ nāma na diṭṭhapubbaṃ, vegena gantvā devaṭṭhānaṃ paṭijaggāhī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:728_10: Sā “sādhu, ayye”ti tassā vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā turitaturitā rukkhamūlaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:729_0: Bodhisattopi kho tasmiṃ rattibhāge pañca mahāsupine disvā pariggaṇhanto “nissaṃsayenāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:729_1: ajja buddho bhavissāmī”ti katasanniṭṭhāno tassā rattiyā accayena katasarīrapaṭijaggano
atk-s0513a1:729_2: bhikkhācārakālaṃ āgamayamāno pātova āgantvā tasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi attano pabhāya
atk-s0513a1:729_3: sakalarukkhaṃ obhāsayamāno. Atha kho sā puṇṇā āgantvā addasa bodhisattaṃ rukkhamūle
atk-s0513a1:729_4: pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokayamānaṃ nisinnaṃ, sarīrato cassa nikkhantāhi pabhāhi sakalarukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:729_5: suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ. Disvā tassā etadahosi – “ajja amhākaṃ devatā rukkhato oruyha sahattheneva
atk-s0513a1:729_6: balikammaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ nisinnā maññe”ti ubbegappattā hutvā vegenāgantvā sujātāya etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:730_0: Sujātā tassā vacanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhamānasā hutvā “ajja dāni paṭṭhāya mama jeṭṭhadhītuṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:730_1: tiṭṭhāhī”ti dhītu anucchavikaṃ sabbālaṅkāraṃ adāsi. Yasmā pana buddhabhāvaṃ pāpuṇanadivase
atk-s0513a1:730_2: satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā sā “suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ pāyāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:730_3: pakkhipissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ nīharāpetvā tattha
atk-s0513a1:730_4: pāyāsaṃ pakkhipitukāmā pakkabhājanaṃ āvajjesi. ‘Sabbo pāyāso padumapattā udakaṃ viya
atk-s0513a1:730_5: vinivattitvā pātiyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi, ekapātipūramattova ahosi’. Sā taṃ pātiṃ aññāya suvaṇṇapātiyā
atk-s0513a1:730_6: paṭikujjitvā odātavatthena veṭhetvā sabbālaṅkārehi attabhāvaṃ alaṅkaritvā taṃ pātiṃ
atk-s0513a1:730_7: attano sīse ṭhapetvā mahantena ānubhāvena nigrodharukkhamūlaṃ gantvā bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:730_8: oloketvā balavasomanassajātā “rukkhadevatā”ti saññāya diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya onatonatā
atk-s0513a1:730_9: gantvā sīsato pātiṃ otāretvā vivaritvā suvaṇṇabhiṅkārena gandhapupphavāsitaṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:730_10: gahetvā bodhisattaṃ upagantvā aṭṭhāsi. Ghaṭīkāramahābrahmunā dinno mattikāpatto ettakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:730_11: addhānaṃ bodhisattaṃ avijahitvā tasmiṃ khaṇe adassanaṃ gato, bodhisatto pattaṃ apassanto
atk-s0513a1:730_12: dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā udakaṃ sampaṭicchi. Sujātā saheva pātiyā pāyāsaṃ mahāpurisassa
atk-s0513a1:730_13: hatthe ṭhapesi, mahāpuriso sujātaṃ olokesi. Sā ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā “ayya, mayā tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:730_14: pariccattaṃ, gaṇhitvā yathāruciṃ gacchathā”ti vanditvā “yathā mayhaṃ manoratho nipphanno,
atk-s0513a1:730_15: evaṃ tumhākampi nipphajjatū”ti vatvā satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇapātiyā purāṇapaṇṇe
atk-s0513a1:731_0: Bodhisattopi kho nisinnaṭṭhānā uṭṭhāya rukkhaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pātiṃ ādāya nerañjarāya
atk-s0513a1:731_1: tīraṃ gantvā anekesaṃ bodhisattasahassānaṃ abhisambujjhanadivase otaritvā nhānaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:731_2: suppatiṭṭhitatitthaṃ nāma atthi, tassa tīre pātiṃ ṭhapetvā otaritvā nhatvā anekabuddhasatasahassānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:731_3: nivāsanaṃ arahaddhajaṃ nivāsetvā puratthābhimukho nisīditvā ekaṭṭhitālapakkappamāṇe
atk-s0513a1:731_4: ekūnapaññāsa piṇḍe katvā sabbaṃ appodakaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñji. So eva hissa buddhabhūtassa
atk-s0513a1:731_5: sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe vasantassa ekūnapaññāsa divasāni āhāro ahosi. Ettakaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:731_6: neva añño āhāro atthi, na nhānaṃ, na mukhadhovanaṃ, na sarīravaḷañjo, jhānasukhena
atk-s0513a1:731_7: maggasukhena phalasukhena ca vītināmesi. Taṃ pana pāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ
atk-s0513a1:731_8: gahetvā “sacāhaṃ, ajja buddho bhavituṃ sakkhissāmi, ayaṃ pāti paṭisotaṃ gacchatu,
atk-s0513a1:731_9: no ce sakkhissāmi, anusotaṃ gacchatū”ti vatvā nadīsote pakkhipi. Sā sotaṃ chindamānā
atk-s0513a1:731_10: nadīmajjhaṃ gantvā majjhamajjhaṭṭhāneneva javasampanno asso viya asītihatthamattaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:731_11: paṭisotaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ āvaṭṭe nimujjitvā kāḷanāgarājabhavanaṃ gantvā tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:731_12: paribhogapātiyo “kili kilī”ti ravaṃ kārayamānā paharitvāva tāsaṃ sabbaheṭṭhimā hutvā
atk-s0513a1:731_13: aṭṭhāsi. Kāḷo nāgarājā taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “hiyyo eko buddho nibbatto, puna ajja eko
atk-s0513a1:731_14: nibbatto”ti vatvā anekehi padasatehi thutiyo vadamāno uṭṭhāsi. Tassa kira mahāpathaviyā
atk-s0513a1:731_15: ekayojanatigāvutappamāṇaṃ nabhaṃ pūretvā ārohanakālo “ajja vā hiyyo vā”ti sadiso ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:732_0: Bodhisattopi nadītīramhi supupphitasālavane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye pupphānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:732_1: vaṇṭato muccanakāle devatāhi alaṅkatena aṭṭhūsabhavitthārena maggena sīho viya vijambhamāno
atk-s0513a1:732_2: bodhirukkhābhimukho pāyāsi. Nāgayakkhasupaṇṇādayo dibbehi gandhapupphādīhi pūjayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:732_3: dibbasaṅgītādīni pavattayiṃsu, dasasahassī lokadhātu ekagandhā ekamālā ekasādhukārā
atk-s0513a1:732_4: ahosi. Tasmiṃ samaye sotthiyo nāma tiṇahārako tiṇaṃ ādāya paṭipathe āgacchanto mahāpurisassa
atk-s0513a1:732_5: ākāraṃ ñatvā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo adāsi. Bodhisatto tiṇaṃ gahetvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha
atk-s0513a1:732_6: dakkhiṇadisābhāge uttarābhimukho aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe dakkhiṇacakkavāḷaṃ osīditvā
atk-s0513a1:732_7: heṭṭhā avīcisampattaṃ viya ahosi, uttaracakkavāḷaṃ ullaṅghitvā upari bhavaggappattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:732_8: viya ahosi. Bodhisatto “idaṃ sambodhiṃ pāpuṇanaṭṭhānaṃ na bhavissati maññe”ti padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:732_9: karonto pacchimadisābhāgaṃ gantvā puratthābhimukho aṭṭhāsi, tato pacchimacakkavāḷaṃ
atk-s0513a1:732_10: osīditvā heṭṭhā avīcisampattaṃ viya ahosi, puratthimacakkavāḷaṃ ullaṅghitvā upari
atk-s0513a1:732_11: bhavaggappattaṃ viya ahosi. Ṭhitaṭṭhitaṭṭhāne kirassa nemivaṭṭipariyante akkante
atk-s0513a1:732_12: nābhiyā patiṭṭhitamahāsakaṭacakkaṃ viya mahāpathavī onatunnatā ahosi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:732_13: “idampi sambodhiṃ pāpuṇanaṭṭhānaṃ na bhavissati maññe”ti padakkhiṇaṃ karonto uttaradisābhāgaṃ
atk-s0513a1:732_14: gantvā dakkhiṇābhimukho aṭṭhāsi, tato uttaracakkavāḷaṃ osīditvā heṭṭhā avīcisampattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:732_15: viya ahosi, dakkhiṇacakkavāḷaṃ ullaṅghitvā upari bhavaggappattaṃ viya ahosi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:732_16: “idampi sambodhiṃ pāpuṇanaṭṭhānaṃ na bhavissati maññe”ti padakkhiṇaṃ karonto puratthimadisābhāgaṃ
atk-s0513a1:732_17: gantvā pacchimābhimukho aṭṭhāsi. Puratthimadisābhāge pana sabbabuddhānaṃ pallaṅkaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:732_18: taṃ neva chambhati, na kampati. Mahāsatto “idaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ avijahitaṃ acalaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:732_19: kilesapañjaraviddhaṃsanaṭṭhāna”nti ñatvā tāni tiṇāni agge gahetvā cālesi, tāvadeva
atk-s0513a1:732_20: cuddasahattho pallaṅko ahosi. Tānipi kho tiṇāni tathārūpena saṇṭhānena saṇṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:732_21: yathārūpaṃ sukusalopi cittakāro vā potthakāro vā ālikhitumpi samattho natthi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:732_22: bodhikkhandhaṃ piṭṭhito katvā puratthābhimukho daḷhamānaso hutvā –
atk-s0513a1:733: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatu;
atk-s0513a1:735: Na tvevāhaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ appatvā imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmīti asanisatasannipātenapi abhejjarūpaṃ aparājitapallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:736_0: Tasmiṃ samaye māro devaputto “siddhatthakumāro mayhaṃ vasaṃ atikkamitukāmo, na dānissa
atk-s0513a1:736_1: atikkamituṃ dassāmī”ti mārabalassa santikaṃ gantvā etamatthaṃ ārocetvā māraghosanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:736_2: nāma ghosāpetvā mārabalaṃ ādāya nikkhami. Sā mārasenā mārassa purato dvādasayojanā
atk-s0513a1:736_3: hoti, dakkhiṇato ca vāmato ca dvādasayojanā, pacchato yāva cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:736_4: ṭhitā, uddhaṃ navayojanubbedhā, yassā unnadantiyā unnādasaddo yojanasahassato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:736_5: pathaviundriyanasaddo viya suyyati. Atha māro devaputto diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ girimekhalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:736_6: nāma hatthiṃ abhiruhitvā bāhusahassaṃ māpetvā nānāvudhāni aggahesi. Avasesāyapi māraparisāya
atk-s0513a1:736_7: dve janā ekasadisaṃ āvudhaṃ na gaṇhiṃsu, nānappakāravaṇṇā nānappakāramukhā hutvā
atk-s0513a1:737_0: Dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā pana mahāsattassa thutiyo vadamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. Sakko devarājā
atk-s0513a1:737_1: vijayuttarasaṅkhaṃ dhamamāno aṭṭhāsi. So kira saṅkho vīsahatthasatiko hoti. Sakiṃ
atk-s0513a1:737_2: vātaṃ gāhāpetvā dhamanto cattāro māse saddaṃ karitvā nissaddo hoti. Mahākāḷanāgarājā
atk-s0513a1:737_3: atirekapadasatena vaṇṇaṃ vadanto aṭṭhāsi, mahābrahmā setacchattaṃ dhārayamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:737_4: Mārabale pana bodhimaṇḍaṃ upasaṅkamante tesaṃ ekopi ṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi, sammukhasammukhaṭṭhāneneva
atk-s0513a1:737_5: palāyiṃsu. Kāḷo nāgarājā pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā pañcayojanasatikaṃ mañjerikanāgabhavanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:737_6: gantvā ubhohi hatthehi mukhaṃ pidahitvā nipanno. Sakko vijayuttarasaṅkhaṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:737_7: katvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Mahābrahmā setacchattaṃ cakkavāḷakoṭiyaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:737_8: brahmalokameva agamāsi. Ekā devatāpi ṭhātuṃ samatthā nāhosi, mahāpuriso ekakova nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:738_0: Māropi attano parisaṃ āha “tātā suddhodanaputtena siddhatthena sadiso añño puriso
atk-s0513a1:738_1: nāma natthi, mayaṃ sammukhā yuddhaṃ dātuṃ na sakkhissāma, pacchābhāgena dassāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:738_2: Mahāpurisopi tīṇi passāni oloketvā sabbadevatānaṃ palātattā suññāni addasa. Puna
atk-s0513a1:738_3: uttarapassena mārabalaṃ ajjhottharamānaṃ disvā “ayaṃ ettako jano maṃ ekakaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0513a1:738_4: mahantaṃ vāyāmaṃ parakkamaṃ karoti, imasmiṃ ṭhāne mayhaṃ mātā vā pitā vā bhātā vā
atk-s0513a1:738_5: añño vā koci ñātako natthi, imā pana dasa pāramiyova mayhaṃ dīgharattaṃ puṭṭhaparijanasadisā,
atk-s0513a1:738_6: tasmā pāramiyova phalakaṃ katvā pāramisattheneva paharitvā ayaṃ balakāyo mayā viddhaṃsetuṃ
atk-s0513a1:739_0: Atha kho māro devaputto “eteneva siddhatthaṃ palāpessāmī”ti vātamaṇḍalaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:739_2: pabbatakūṭāni padāletvā vanagaccharukkhādīni ummūletvā samantā gāmanigame cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:739_3: kātuṃ samatthāpi mahāpurisassa puññatejena vihatānubhāvā bodhisattaṃ patvā cīvarakaṇṇamattampi
atk-s0513a1:739_4: cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Tato “udakena na ajjhottharitvā māressāmī”ti mahāvassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:739_5: Tassānubhāvena uparūpari satapaṭalasahassapaṭalādibhedā valāhakā uṭṭhahitvā vassiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:739_6: Vuṭṭhidhārāvegena pathavī chiddā ahosi. Vanarukkhādīnaṃ uparibhāgena mahāmegho āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:739_7: mahāsattassa cīvare ussāvabinduṭṭhānamattampi temetuṃ nāsakkhi. Tato pāsāṇavassaṃ
atk-s0513a1:739_8: samuṭṭhāpesi. Mahantāni mahantāni pabbatakūṭāni dhūmāyantāni pajjalantāni ākāsenāgantvā
atk-s0513a1:739_9: bodhisattaṃ patvā dibbamālāguḷabhāvaṃ āpajjiṃsu. Tato paharaṇavassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:739_11: patvā dibbapupphāni ahesuṃ. Tato aṅgāravassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Kiṃsukavaṇṇā aṅgārā ākāsenāgantvā
atk-s0513a1:739_12: bodhisattassa pādamūle dibbapupphāni hutvā vikiriṃsu. Tato kukkuḷavassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:739_13: Accuṇho aggivaṇṇo kukkuḷo ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle dibbacandanacuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:739_14: hutvā nipati. Tato vālukāvassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Atisukhumavālukā dhūmāyantā pajjalantā
atk-s0513a1:739_15: ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle dibbapupphāni hutvā nipatiṃsu. Tato kalalavassaṃ
atk-s0513a1:739_16: samuṭṭhāpesi. Taṃ kalalaṃ dhūmāyantaṃ pajjalantaṃ ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle
atk-s0513a1:739_17: dibbavilepanaṃ hutvā nipati. Tato “iminā bhiṃsetvā siddhatthaṃ palāpessāmī”ti andhakāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:739_18: samuṭṭhāpesi. Taṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ viya mahātamaṃ hutvā bodhisattaṃ patvā sūriyappabhāvihataṃ
atk-s0513a1:740_1: bodhisattaṃ palāpetuṃ asakkonto “kiṃ bhaṇe, tiṭṭhatha, imaṃ siddhatthakumāraṃ gaṇhatha
atk-s0513a1:740_2: hanatha palāpethā”ti parisaṃ āṇāpetvā sayampi girimekhalassa hatthino khandhe nisinno
atk-s0513a1:740_3: cakkāvudhaṃ ādāya bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “siddhattha uṭṭhāhi etasmā pallaṅkā,
atk-s0513a1:740_4: nāyaṃ tuyhaṃ pāpuṇāti, mayhaṃ eva pāpuṇātī”ti āha. Mahāsatto tassa vacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a1:740_5: avoca – “māra, neva tayā dasa pāramiyo pūritā, na upapāramiyo, na paramatthapāramiyo,
atk-s0513a1:740_6: nāpi pañca mahāpariccāgā pariccattā, na ñātatthacariyā, na lokatthacariyā, na buddhicariyā
atk-s0513a1:740_7: pūritā, sabbā tā mayāyeva pūritā, tasmā nāyaṃ pallaṅko tuyhaṃ pāpuṇāti, mayheveso pāpuṇātī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:741_0: Māro kuddho kodhavegaṃ asahanto mahāpurisassa cakkāvudhaṃ vissajjesi. Taṃ tassa dasa
atk-s0513a1:741_1: pāramiyo āvajjentassa uparibhāge mālāvitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ kira khuradhāracakkāvudhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:741_2: aññadā tena kuddhena vissaṭṭhaṃ ekaghanapāsāṇatthambhe vaṃsakaḷīre viya chindantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:741_3: gacchati, idāni pana tasmiṃ mālāvitānaṃ hutvā ṭhite avasesā māraparisā “idāni pallaṅkato
atk-s0513a1:741_4: vuṭṭhāya palāyissatī”ti mahantamahantāni selakūṭāni vissajjesuṃ. Tānipi mahāpurisassa
atk-s0513a1:741_5: dasa pāramiyo āvajjentassa mālāguḷabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā bhūmiyaṃ patiṃsu. Devatā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:741_6: ṭhitā gīvaṃ pasāretvā sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā “naṭṭho vata so siddhatthakumārassa rūpaggappatto
atk-s0513a1:741_7: attabhāvo, kiṃ nu kho karissatī”ti olokenti.
atk-s0513a1:742_1: mayhaṃva pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā ṭhitaṃ māraṃ āha – “māra tuyhaṃ dānassa dinnabhāve ko
atk-s0513a1:742_2: sakkhī”ti. Māro “ime ettakā janā sakkhino”ti mārabalābhimukhaṃ hatthaṃ pasāresi.
atk-s0513a1:742_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe māraparisāya “ahaṃ sakkhī, ahaṃ sakkhī”ti pavattasaddo pathaviundriyanasaddasadiso
atk-s0513a1:742_4: ahosi. Atha māro mahāpurisaṃ āha “siddhattha, tuyhaṃ dānassa dinnabhāve ko sakkhī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:742_5: Mahāpuriso “tuyhaṃ tāva dānassa dinnabhāve sacetanā sakkhino, mayhaṃ pana imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:742_6: ṭhāne sacetano koci sakkhī nāma natthi, tiṭṭhatu tāva me avasesattabhāvesu dinnadānaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:742_7: vessantarattabhāve pana ṭhatvā mayhaṃ sattasatakamahādānassa dinnabhāve ayaṃ acetanāpi
atk-s0513a1:742_9: ṭhatvā mayhaṃ sattasatakamahādānassa dinnabhāve tvaṃ sakkhī na sakkhī”ti mahāpathaviabhimukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:742_10: hatthaṃ pasāresi. Mahāpathavī “ahaṃ te tadā sakkhī”ti viravasatena viravasahassena
atk-s0513a1:743_0: Tato mahāpurise “dinnaṃ te siddhattha mahādānaṃ uttamadāna”nti vessantaradānaṃ sammasante
atk-s0513a1:743_1: diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko girimekhalahatthī jaṇṇukehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi, māraparisā
atk-s0513a1:743_2: disāvidisā palāyi, dve ekamaggena gatā nāma natthi, sīsābharaṇāni ceva nivatthavatthāni
atk-s0513a1:743_3: ca pahāya sammukhasammukhadisāhiyeva palāyiṃsu. Tato devasaṅghā palāyamānaṃ mārabalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:743_4: disvā “mārassa parājayo jāto, siddhatthakumārassa jayo, jayapūjaṃ karissāmā”ti nāgā
atk-s0513a1:743_5: nāgānaṃ, supaṇṇā supaṇṇānaṃ, devatā devatānaṃ, brahmāno brahmānaṃ, ugghosetvā gandhamālādihatthā
atk-s0513a1:745: “Jayo hi buddhassa sirīmato ayaṃ, mārassa ca pāpimato parājayo;
atk-s0513a1:746: Ugghosayuṃ bodhimaṇḍe pamoditā, jayaṃ tadā nāgagaṇā mahesino.
atk-s0513a1:747: “Jayo hi buddhassa sirīmato ayaṃ, mārassa ca pāpimato parājayo;
atk-s0513a1:748: Ugghosayuṃ bodhimaṇḍe pamoditā, supaṇṇasaṅghāpi jayaṃ mahesino.
atk-s0513a1:749: “Jayo hi buddhassa sirīmato ayaṃ, mārassa ca pāpimato parājayo;
atk-s0513a1:750: Ugghosayuṃ bodhimaṇḍe pamoditā, jayaṃ tadā devagaṇā mahesino.
atk-s0513a1:751: “Jayo hi buddhassa sirīmato ayaṃ, mārassa ca pāpimato parājayo;
atk-s0513a1:752: Ugghosayuṃ bodhimaṇḍe pamoditā, jayaṃ tadā brahmagaṇāpi tādino”ti.
atk-s0513a1:753_0: Avasesā dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatā mālāgandhavilepanehi ca pūjayamānā nānappakārā
atk-s0513a1:753_1: thutiyo ca vadamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. Evaṃ anatthaṅgateyeva sūriye mahāpuriso mārabalaṃ vidhametvā
atk-s0513a1:753_2: cīvarūpari patamānehi bodhirukkhaṅkurehi rattapavāḷapallavehi viya pūjiyamāno paṭhamayāme
atk-s0513a1:753_3: pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ anussaritvā, majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā, pacchimayāme
atk-s0513a1:753_4: paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāresi. Athassa dvādasapadikaṃ paccayākāraṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena
atk-s0513a1:753_5: anulomapaṭilomato sammasantassa dasasahassī lokadhātu udakapariyantaṃ katvā dvādasakkhattuṃ sampakampi.
atk-s0513a1:754_0: Mahāpurise pana dasasahassilokadhātuṃ unnādetvā aruṇuggamanavelāya sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:754_1: paṭivijjhante sakaladasasahassī lokadhātu alaṅkatapaṭiyattā ahosi. Pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:754_2: ussāpitānaṃ dhajānaṃ paṭākānaṃ raṃsiyo pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ paharanti,
atk-s0513a1:754_5: dakkhiṇacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ paharanti, pathavitale ussāpitānaṃ pana dhajānaṃ paṭākānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:754_6: brahmalokaṃ āhacca aṭṭhaṃsu, brahmaloke baddhānaṃ pathavitale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, dasasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0513a1:754_7: pupphūpagarukkhā pupphaṃ gaṇhiṃsu, phalūpagarukkhā phalapiṇḍībhārabharitā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:754_8: Khandhesu khandhapadumāni pupphiṃsu, sākhāsu sākhāpadumāni, latāsu latāpadumāni,
atk-s0513a1:754_9: ākāse olambakapadumāni, silātalāni bhinditvā uparūpari satta satta hutvā daṇḍakapadumāni
atk-s0513a1:754_10: uṭṭhahiṃsu. Dasasahassī lokadhātu vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhamālāguḷā viya susanthatapupphasanthāro
atk-s0513a1:754_11: viya ca ahosi. Cakkavāḷantaresu aṭṭhayojanasahassalokantarikā sattasūriyappabhāyapi
atk-s0513a1:754_12: anobhāsitapubbā ekobhāsā ahesuṃ, caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro mahāsamuddo madhurodako
atk-s0513a1:754_13: ahosi, nadiyo nappavattiṃsu, jaccandhā rūpāni passiṃsu, jātibadhirā saddaṃ suṇiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:754_14: jātipīṭhasappino padasā gacchiṃsu, andubandhanādīni chijjitvā patiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:755: Evaṃ aparimāṇena sirivibhavena pūjiyamāno mahāpuriso anekappakāresu acchariyadhammesu pātubhūtesu sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā sabbabuddhānaṃ avijahitaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0513a1:759: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0513a1:761: Iti tusitapurato paṭṭhāya yāva ayaṃ bodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutappatti, ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ avidūrenidānaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:764_0: “Santikenidānaṃ pana ‘bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
atk-s0513a1:764_1: Vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāya’nti evaṃ tesu tesu ṭhānesu viharato tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:764_2: tasmiṃ ṭhāneyeva labbhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi evaṃ vuttaṃ, atha kho pana tampi ādito
atk-s0513a1:764_3: paṭṭhāya evaṃ veditabbaṃ – udānaṃ udānetvā jayapallaṅke nisinnassa hi bhagavato etadahosi
atk-s0513a1:764_4: “ahaṃ kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni imassa pallaṅkassa kāraṇā sandhāviṃ,
atk-s0513a1:764_5: ettakaṃ me kālaṃ imasseva pallaṅkassa kāraṇā alaṅkatasīsaṃ gīvāya chinditvā dinnaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:764_6: suañjitāni akkhīni hadayamaṃsañca ubbaṭṭetvā dinnaṃ, jālīkumārasadisā puttā kaṇhājinakumārisadisā
atk-s0513a1:764_7: dhītaro maddīdevisadisā bhariyāyo ca paresaṃ dāsatthāya dinnā, ayaṃ me pallaṅko jayapallaṅko
atk-s0513a1:764_8: varapallaṅko ca. Ettha me nisinnassa saṅkappā paripuṇṇā, na tāva ito uṭṭhahissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:764_9: anekakoṭisatasahassā samāpattiyo samāpajjanto sattāhaṃ tattheva nisīdi. Yaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0513a1:764_10: vuttaṃ “atha kho bhagavā sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:765_0: Atha ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ “ajjāpi nūna siddhatthassa kattabbakiccaṃ atthi, pallaṅkasmiñhi
atk-s0513a1:765_1: ālayaṃ na vijahatī”ti parivitakko udapādi. Satthā devatānaṃ parivitakkaṃ ñatvā tāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:765_2: vitakkavūpasamanatthaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi. Mahābodhimaṇḍasmiñhi
atk-s0513a1:766_0: Evaṃ satthā iminā pāṭihāriyena devatānaṃ vitakkaṃ vūpasametvā pallaṅkato īsakaṃ pācīnanissite
atk-s0513a1:766_1: uttaradisābhāge ṭhatvā “imasmiṃ vata me pallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdha”nti
atk-s0513a1:766_2: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pūritānaṃ pāramīnaṃ phalādhigamaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:766_3: pallaṅkaṃ bodhirukkhañca animisehi akkhīhi olokayamāno sattāhaṃ vītināmesi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:766_4: animisacetiyaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Atha pallaṅkassa ca ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antarā caṅkamaṃ
atk-s0513a1:766_5: māpetvā puratthimapacchimato āyate ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0513a1:767_0: Catutthe pana sattāhe bodhito pacchimuttaradisābhāge devatā ratanagharaṃ māpayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:767_1: tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ visesato cettha anantanayaṃ samantapaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:767_2: vicinanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi. Ābhidhammikā panāhu “ratanagharaṃ nāma na sattaratanamayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:767_3: gehaṃ, sattannaṃ pana pakaraṇānaṃ sammasitaṭṭhānaṃ ‘ratanaghara’nti vuccatī”ti. Yasmā
atk-s0513a1:767_4: panettha ubhopete pariyāyā yujjanti, tasmā ubhayampetaṃ gahetabbameva. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:767_5: pana taṃ ṭhānaṃ ratanagharacetiyaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Evaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva cattāri sattāhāni
atk-s0513a1:767_6: vītināmetvā pañcame sattāhe bodhirukkhamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami, tatrāpi
atk-s0513a1:768_0: Tasmiṃ samaye māro devaputto “ettakaṃ kālaṃ anubandhanto otārāpekkhopi imassa na
atk-s0513a1:768_1: kiñci khalitaṃ addasaṃ, atikkantodāni esa mama vasa”nti domanassappatto mahāmagge
atk-s0513a1:768_2: nisīditvā soḷasa kāraṇāni cintento bhūmiyaṃ soḷasa lekhā kaḍḍhi – “ahaṃ eso viya
atk-s0513a1:768_3: dānapāramiṃ na pūresiṃ, tenamhi iminā sadiso na jāto”ti ekaṃ lekhaṃ kaḍḍhi. Tathā
atk-s0513a1:768_4: “ahaṃ eso viya sīlapāramiṃ, nekkhammapāramiṃ, paññāpāramiṃ, vīriyapāramiṃ, khantipāramiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:768_5: saccapāramiṃ, adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ, mettāpāramiṃ, upekkhāpāramiṃ na pūresiṃ, tenamhi
atk-s0513a1:768_6: iminā sadiso na jāto”ti dasamaṃ lekhaṃ kaḍḍhi. Tathā “ahaṃ eso viya asādhāraṇassa
atk-s0513a1:768_7: indriyaparopariyattañāṇassa paṭivedhāya upanissayabhūtā dasa pāramiyo na pūresiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:768_8: tenamhi iminā sadiso na jāto”ti ekādasamaṃ lekhaṃ kaḍḍhi. Tathā “ahaṃ eso viya asādhāraṇassa
atk-s0513a1:768_10: sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭivedhāya upanissayabhūtā dasa pāramiyo na pūresiṃ, tenamhi
atk-s0513a1:768_11: iminā sadiso na jāto”ti soḷasamaṃ lekhaṃ kaḍḍhi. Evaṃ imehi kāraṇehi mahāmagge soḷasa
atk-s0513a1:769_0: Tasmiṃ samaye taṇhā, arati, ragāti tisso māradhītaro “pitā no na paññāyati, kahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:769_1: nu kho etarahī”ti olokayamānā taṃ domanassappattaṃ bhūmiṃ vilekhamānaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:769_2: pitu santikaṃ gantvā “kasmā, tāta, dukkhī dummano”ti pucchiṃsu. Ammā, ayaṃ mahāsamaṇo
atk-s0513a1:769_3: mayhaṃ vasaṃ atikkanto, ettakaṃ kālaṃ olokento otāramassa daṭṭhuṃ nāsakkhiṃ, tenāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:769_4: dukkhī dummanoti. Yadi evaṃ mā cintayittha, mayametaṃ attano vase katvā ādāya āgamissāmāti.
atk-s0513a1:769_5: Na sakkā, ammā, eso kenaci vase kātuṃ, acalāya saddhāya patiṭṭhito eso purisoti.
atk-s0513a1:769_6: “Tāta mayaṃ itthiyo nāma idāneva naṃ rāgapāsādīhi bandhitvā ānessāma, tumhe mā cintayitthā”ti
atk-s0513a1:769_7: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “pāde te samaṇa paricāremā”ti āhaṃsu. Bhagavā va tāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:769_8: vacanaṃ manasi akāsi, na akkhīni ummīletvā olokesi, anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye vimuttamānaso
atk-s0513a1:770_0: Puna māradhītaro “uccāvacā kho purisānaṃ adhippāyā, kesañci kumārikāsu pemaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a1:770_1: kesañci paṭhamavaye ṭhitāsu, kesañci majjhimavaye ṭhitāsu, yaṃnūna mayaṃ nānappakārehi
atk-s0513a1:770_2: rūpehi palobheyyāmā”ti ekamekā kumārivaṇṇādivasena sataṃ sataṃ attabhāve abhinimminitvā
atk-s0513a1:770_3: kumāriyo, avijātā, sakiṃvijātā, duvijātā, majjhimitthiyo, mahitthiyo ca hutvā chakkhattuṃ
atk-s0513a1:770_4: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “pāde te samaṇa paricāremā”ti āhaṃsu. Tampi bhagavā na
atk-s0513a1:770_5: manasākāsi, yathā taṃ anuttare upadhisaṅkhayeva vimutto. Keci panācariyā vadanti
atk-s0513a1:770_6: “tā mahitthibhāvena upagatā disvā bhagavā ‘evamevaṃ etā khaṇḍadantā palitakesā hontū’ti
atk-s0513a1:770_7: adhiṭṭhāsī”ti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi satthā evarūpaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ karoti. Bhagavā
atk-s0513a1:770_8: pana “apetha tumhe, kiṃ disvā evaṃ vāyamatha, evarūpaṃ nāma avītarāgādīnaṃ purato
atk-s0513a1:770_9: kātuṃ yuttaṃ, tathāgatassa pana rāgo pahīno, doso pahīno, moho pahīno”ti attano kilesappahānaṃ ārabbha –
atk-s0513a1:771: “Yassa jitaṃ nāvajīyati, jitamassa noyāti koci loke;
atk-s0513a1:772: Taṃ buddhamanantagocaraṃ, apadaṃ kena padena nessatha.
atk-s0513a1:773: “Yassa jālinī visattikā, taṇhā natthi kuhiñci netave;
atk-s0513a1:774: Taṃ buddhamanantagocaraṃ, apadaṃ kena padena nessathā”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:775: Imā dhammapade buddhavagge dve gāthā vadanto dhammaṃ kathesi. Tā “saccaṃ kira no pitā avoca, arahaṃ sugato loke na rāgena suvānayo”tiādīni vatvā pitu santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:776_0: Bhagavāpi tattha sattāhaṃ vītināmetvā mucalindamūlaṃ agamāsi. Tattha sattāhavaddalikāya
atk-s0513a1:776_1: uppannāya sītādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ mucalindena nāgarājena sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhitto
atk-s0513a1:776_2: asambādhāya gandhakuṭiyaṃ viharanto viya vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvediyamāno sattāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:776_3: vītināmetvā rājāyatanaṃ upasaṅkami, tatthāpi vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvediyamānoyeva
atk-s0513a1:776_4: nisīdi. Ettāvatā satta sattāhāni paripuṇṇāni. Etthantare neva mukhadhovanaṃ, na sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:777_0: Athassa tasmiṃ sattasattāhamatthake ekūnapaññāsatime divase tattha nisinnassa “mukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:777_1: dhovissāmī”ti cittaṃ udapādi. Sakko devānamindo agadaharīṭakaṃ āharitvā adāsi, satthā
atk-s0513a1:777_2: taṃ paribhuñji, tenassa sarīravaḷañjaṃ ahosi. Athassa sakkoyeva nāgalatādantakaṭṭhañceva
atk-s0513a1:777_3: mukhadhovanaudakañca adāsi. Satthā taṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotattadahodakena mukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:778_0: Tasmiṃ samaye tapussabhallikā nāma dve vāṇijā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi ukkalājanapadā
atk-s0513a1:778_1: majjhimadesaṃ gacchantā attano ñātisālohitāya devatāya sakaṭāni sannirumbhitvā satthu
atk-s0513a1:778_2: āhārasampādane ussāhitā manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca ādāya “paṭiggaṇhātu no, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:778_3: bhagavā imaṃ āhāraṃ anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Bhagavā
atk-s0513a1:778_4: pāyāsapaṭiggahaṇadivaseyeva pattassa antarahitattā “na kho tathāgatā hatthesu paṭiggaṇhanti,
atk-s0513a1:778_5: kimhi nu kho ahaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya”nti cintesi. Athassa cittaṃ ñatvā catūhi disāhi cattāro
atk-s0513a1:778_6: mahārājāno indanīlamaṇimaye patte upanāmesuṃ, bhagavā te paṭikkhipi. Puna muggavaṇṇaselamaye
atk-s0513a1:778_7: cattāro patte upanāmesuṃ. Bhagavā catunnampi devaputtānaṃ anukampāya cattāropi patte
atk-s0513a1:778_8: paṭiggahetvā uparūpari ṭhapetvā “eko hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi, cattāropi mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:778_9: paññāyamānalekhā hutvā majjhimena pamāṇena ekattaṃ upagamiṃsu. Bhagavā tasmiṃ paccagghe
atk-s0513a1:778_10: selamaye patte āhāraṃ paṭiggaṇhitvā paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ akāsi. Dve bhātaro vāṇijā
atk-s0513a1:778_11: buddhañca dhammañca saraṇaṃ gantvā dvevācikā upāsakā ahesuṃ. Atha nesaṃ “ekaṃ no,
atk-s0513a1:778_12: bhante, paricaritabbaṭṭhānaṃ dethā”ti vadantānaṃ dakkhiṇahatthena attano sīsaṃ parāmasitvā
atk-s0513a1:778_13: kesadhātuyo adāsi. Te attano nagare tā dhātuyo suvaṇṇasamuggassa anto pakkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:779_0: Sammāsambuddhopi kho tato uṭṭhāya puna ajapālanigrodhameva gantvā nigrodhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:779_1: Athassa tattha nisinnamattasseva attanā adhigatassa dhammassa gambhīrataṃ paccavekkhantassa
atk-s0513a1:779_2: sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇo “adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo”ti paresaṃ dhammaṃ adesetukamyatākārapavatto
atk-s0513a1:779_3: vitakko udapādi. Atha brahmā sahampati “nassati vata bho loko, vinassati vata bho
atk-s0513a1:779_5: ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā “desetu, bhante, bhagavā dhamma”ntiādinā nayena dhammadesanaṃ āyāci.
atk-s0513a1:780_0: Satthā tassa paṭiññaṃ datvā “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti cintento
atk-s0513a1:780_1: “āḷāro paṇḍito, so imaṃ dhammaṃ khippaṃ ājānissatī”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā puna olokento
atk-s0513a1:780_2: tassa sattāhakālakatabhāvaṃ ñatvā udakaṃ āvajjesi. Tassāpi abhidosakālakatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:780_3: ñatvā “bahūpakārā kho me pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū”ti pañcavaggiye ārabbha manasikāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:780_4: katvā “kahaṃ nu kho te etarahi viharantī”ti āvajjento “bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye”ti
atk-s0513a1:780_5: ñatvā “tattha gantvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattessāmī”ti katipāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍasāmantāyeva
atk-s0513a1:780_6: piṇḍāya caranto viharitvā āsāḷhipuṇṇamāsiyaṃ “bārāṇasiṃ gamissāmī”ti cātuddasiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:780_7: paccūsasamaye vibhātāya rattiyā kālasseva pattacīvaramādāya aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ
atk-s0513a1:780_8: paṭipanno antarāmagge upakaṃ nāma ājīvakaṃ disvā tassa attano buddhabhāvaṃ ācikkhitvā
atk-s0513a1:781_0: Pañcavaggiyā therā tathāgataṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā “ayaṃ āvuso samaṇo gotamo
atk-s0513a1:781_1: paccayabāhullāya āvattitvā paripuṇṇakāyo pīṇindriyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo hutvā āgacchati,
atk-s0513a1:781_2: imassa abhivādanādīni na karissāma, mahākulapasuto kho panesa āsanābhihāraṃ arahati,
atk-s0513a1:781_3: tenassa āsanamattaṃ paññāpessāmā”ti katikaṃ akaṃsu. Bhagavā sadevakassa lokassa cittācāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:781_4: jānanasamatthena ñāṇena “kiṃ nu kho ime cintayiṃsū”ti āvajjetvā cittaṃ aññāsi. Atha
atk-s0513a1:781_5: ne sabbadevamanussesu anodissakavasena pharaṇasamatthaṃ mettacittaṃ saṅkhipitvā odissakavasena
atk-s0513a1:781_6: mettacittena phari. Te bhagavatā mettacittena phuṭṭhā tathāgate upasaṅkamante sakāya
atk-s0513a1:781_7: katikāya saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānādīni sabbakiccāni akaṃsu, sammāsambuddhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:781_8: panassa ajānamānā kevalaṃ nāmena ca āvusovādena ca samudācaranti.
atk-s0513a1:782_0: Atha ne bhagavā “mā vo, bhikkhave, tathāgataṃ nāmena ca āvusovādena ca samudācaratha,
atk-s0513a1:782_1: arahaṃ, bhikkhave, tathāgato sammāsambuddho”ti attano buddhabhāvaṃ saññāpetvā paññatte
atk-s0513a1:782_2: varabuddhāsane nisinno uttarāsāḷhanakkhattayoge vattamāne aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi
atk-s0513a1:782_3: parivuto pañcavaggiye there āmantetvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttantaṃ desesi. Tesu
atk-s0513a1:782_4: aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesento suttapariyosāne aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi
atk-s0513a1:782_5: saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Satthā tattheva vassaṃ upagantvā punadivase vappattheraṃ
atk-s0513a1:782_6: ovadanto vihāreyeva nisīdi, sesā cattāro piṇḍāya cariṃsu. Vappatthero pubbaṇheyeva
atk-s0513a1:782_7: sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi. Eteneva upāyena punadivase bhaddiyattheraṃ, punadivase mahānāmattheraṃ,
atk-s0513a1:782_8: punadivase assajittheranti sabbe sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa
atk-s0513a1:782_9: pañcapi jane sannipātetvā anattalakkhaṇasuttantaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne pañcapi
atk-s0513a1:782_10: therā arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Atha satthā yasakulaputtassa upanissayaṃ disvā
