atk-s0513a1:782_11: taṃ rattibhāge nibbijjitvā gehaṃ pahāya nikkhantaṃ “ehi yasā”ti pakkositvā tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:782_12: rattibhāge sotāpattiphale, punadivase arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā, aparepi tassa sahāyake
atk-s0513a1:782_13: catupaṇṇāsa jane ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā arahattaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:783_0: Evaṃ loke ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantesu jātesu satthā vutthavasso pavāretvā “caratha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:783_1: cārika”nti saṭṭhi bhikkhū disāsu pesetvā sayaṃ uruvelaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge kappāsikavanasaṇḍe
atk-s0513a1:783_2: tiṃsa jane bhaddavaggiyakumāre vinesi. Tesu sabbapacchimako sotāpanno, sabbuttamo
atk-s0513a1:783_3: anāgāmī ahosi. Tepi sabbe ehibhikkhubhāveneva pabbājetvā disāsu pesetvā uruvelaṃ
atk-s0513a1:783_4: gantvā aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni dassetvā uruvelakassapādayo sahassajaṭilaparivāre
atk-s0513a1:783_5: tebhātikajaṭile vinetvā ehibhikkhubhāveneva pabbājetvā gayāsīse nisīdāpetvā ādittapariyāyadesanāya
atk-s0513a1:783_6: arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā tena arahantasahassena parivuto “bimbisārarañño dinnaṃ paṭiññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:783_7: mocessāmī”ti rājagahaṃ gantvā nagarūpacāre laṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ agamāsi. Rājā uyyānapālassa
atk-s0513a1:783_8: santikā “satthā āgato”ti sutvā dvādasanahutehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi parivuto satthāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:783_9: upasaṅkamitvā cakkavicittatalesu suvaṇṇapaṭṭavitānaṃ viya pabhāsamudayaṃ vissajjantesu
atk-s0513a1:783_10: tathāgatassa pādesu sirasā nipatitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ parisāya.
atk-s0513a1:784_0: Atha kho tesaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ etadahosi “kiṃ nu kho mahāsamaṇo uruvelakassape
atk-s0513a1:784_1: brahmacariyaṃ carati, udāhu uruvelakassapo mahāsamaṇe”ti. Bhagavā tesaṃ cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya
atk-s0513a1:785: “Kimeva disvā uruvelavāsi, pahāsi aggiṃ kisako vadāno;
atk-s0513a1:786: Pucchāmi taṃ kassapa etamatthaṃ, kathaṃ pahīnaṃ tava aggihutta”nti. ;
atk-s0513a1:788: “Rūpe ca sadde ca atho rase ca, kāmitthiyo cābhivadanti yaññā;
atk-s0513a1:789: Etaṃ malanti upadhīsu ñatvā, tasmā na yiṭṭhe na hute arañji”nti. –
atk-s0513a1:790_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā attano sāvakabhāvapakāsanatthaṃ tathāgatassa pādapiṭṭhe sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:790_1: “satthā me, bhante, bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī”ti vatvā ekatālaṃ dvitālaṃ titālanti yāva
atk-s0513a1:790_2: sattatālappamāṇaṃ sattakkhattuṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā oruyha tathāgataṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:790_3: nisīdi. Taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā mahājano “aho mahānubhāvā buddhā, evaṃ thāmagatadiṭṭhiko
atk-s0513a1:790_4: nāma ‘arahā’ti maññamāno uruvelakassapopi diṭṭhijālaṃ bhinditvā tathāgatena damito”ti
atk-s0513a1:790_5: satthu guṇakathaṃyeva kathesi. Bhagavā “nāhaṃ idāniyeva uruvelakassapaṃ damemi, atītepi
atk-s0513a1:790_6: esa mayā damitoyevā”ti vatvā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā mahānāradakassapajātakaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0513a1:790_7: cattāri saccāni pakāsesi. Magadharājā ekādasahi nahutehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:790_8: ekaṃ nahutaṃ upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesi. Rājā satthu santike nisinnoyeva pañca assāsake
atk-s0513a1:790_9: pavedetvā saraṇaṃ gantvā svātanāya nimantetvā āsanā vuṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:791_0: Punadivase yehi ca bhagavā diṭṭho, yehi ca adiṭṭho, sabbepi rājagahavāsino aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhā
atk-s0513a1:791_1: manussā tathāgataṃ daṭṭhukāmā pātova rājagahato laṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ agamaṃsu. Tigāvuto
atk-s0513a1:791_2: maggo nappahosi, sakalalaṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ ahosi. Mahājano dasabalassa
atk-s0513a1:791_3: rūpasobhaggappattaṃ attabhāvaṃ passanto tittiṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi. Vaṇṇabhūmi nāmesā.
atk-s0513a1:791_4: Evarūpesu hi ṭhānesu tathāgatassa lakkhaṇānubyañjanādippabhedā sabbāpi rūpakāyasirī
atk-s0513a1:791_5: vaṇṇetabbā. Evaṃ rūpasobhaggappattaṃ dasabalassa sarīraṃ passamānena mahājanena nirantaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:791_6: phuṭe uyyāne ca magge ca ekabhikkhussapi nikkhamanokāso nāhosi. Taṃ divasaṃ kira
atk-s0513a1:791_7: bhagavā chinnabhatto bhaveyya, taṃ mā ahosīti sakkassa nisinnāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a1:791_8: So āvajjamāno taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā buddhadhammasaṅghapaṭisaṃyuttā
atk-s0513a1:791_9: thutiyo vadamāno dasabalassa purato otaritvā devatānubhāvena okāsaṃ katvā –
atk-s0513a1:800_0: Imāhi gāthāhi satthu vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno purato pāyāsi. Tadā mahājano māṇavakassa rūpasiriṃ
atk-s0513a1:800_1: disvā “ativiya abhirūpo ayaṃ māṇavako, na kho pana amhehi diṭṭhapubbo”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:800_2: “kuto ayaṃ māṇavako, kassa vāya”nti āha. Taṃ sutvā māṇavo –
atk-s0513a1:802: Arahaṃ sugato loke, tassāhaṃ paricārako”ti. – gāthamāha;
atk-s0513a1:803_0: Satthā sakkena katokāsaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā bhikkhusahassaparivuto rājagahaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:803_1: Rājā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā “ahaṃ, bhante, tīṇi ratanāni vinā
atk-s0513a1:803_2: vattituṃ na sakkhissāmi, velāya vā avelāya vā bhagavato santikaṃ āgamissāmi, laṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:803_3: nāma atidūre, idaṃ pana amhākaṃ veḷuvanaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ nātidūre nāccāsanne gamanāgamanasampannaṃ
atk-s0513a1:803_4: buddhārahaṃ senāsanaṃ. Idaṃ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātū”ti suvaṇṇabhiṅkārena pupphagandhavāsitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:803_5: maṇivaṇṇaṃ udakaṃ ādāya veḷuvanuyyānaṃ pariccajanto dasabalassa hatthe udakaṃ pātesi.
atk-s0513a1:803_6: Tasmiṃ ārāmapaṭiggahaṇe “buddhasāsanassa mūlāni otiṇṇānī”ti mahāpathavī kampi. Jambudīpasmiñhi
atk-s0513a1:803_7: ṭhapetvā veḷuvanaṃ aññaṃ mahāpathaviṃ kampetvā gahitasenāsanaṃ nāma natthi. Tambapaṇṇidīpepi
atk-s0513a1:803_8: ṭhapetvā mahāvihāraṃ aññaṃ pathaviṃ kampetvā gahitasenāsanaṃ nāma natthi. Satthā
atk-s0513a1:803_9: veḷuvanārāmaṃ paṭiggahetvā rañño anumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto veḷuvanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:804_0: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye sāriputto ca moggallāno cāti dve paribbājakā rājagahaṃ upanissāya
atk-s0513a1:804_1: viharanti amataṃ pariyesamānā. Tesu sāriputto assajittheraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:804_2: pasannacitto payirupāsitvā “ye dhammā hetuppabhavā”ti gāthaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale
atk-s0513a1:804_3: patiṭṭhāya attano sahāyakassa moggallānaparibbājakassapi tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi. Sopi
atk-s0513a1:804_4: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Te ubhopi janā sañcayaṃ oloketvā attano parisāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:804_5: bhagavato santike pabbajiṃsu. Tesu mahāmoggallāno sattāhena arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, sāriputtatthero
atk-s0513a1:804_6: aḍḍhamāsena. Ubhopi ca ne satthā aggasāvakaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Sāriputtattherena arahattappattadivaseyeva
atk-s0513a1:805_0: Tathāgate pana tasmiṃyeva veḷuvanuyyāne viharante suddhodanamahārājā “putto kira
atk-s0513a1:805_1: me chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ caritvā paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattavaradhammacakko
atk-s0513a1:805_2: rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharatī”ti sutvā aññataraṃ amaccaṃ āmantesi “ehi,
atk-s0513a1:805_3: bhaṇe, purisasahassaparivāro rājagahaṃ gantvā mama vacanena ‘pitā vo suddhodanamahārājā
atk-s0513a1:805_4: daṭṭhukāmo’ti vatvā puttaṃ me gaṇhitvā ehī”ti āha. So “evaṃ, devā”ti rañño vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:805_5: sirasā sampaṭicchitvā purisasahassaparivāro khippameva saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:805_6: dasabalassa catuparisamajjhe nisīditvā dhammadesanāvelāya vihāraṃ pāvisi. So “tiṭṭhatu
atk-s0513a1:805_7: tāva rañño pahitasāsana”nti pariyante ṭhito satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yathāṭhitova
atk-s0513a1:805_8: saddhiṃ purisasahassena arahattaṃ patvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Bhagavā “etha bhikkhavo”ti
atk-s0513a1:805_9: hatthaṃ pasāresi, sabbe taṅkhaṇaṃyeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā saṭṭhivassattherā
atk-s0513a1:805_10: viya ahesuṃ. Arahattaṃ pattakālato paṭṭhāya pana ariyā nāma majjhattāva hontīti so
atk-s0513a1:805_11: raññā pahitasāsanaṃ dasabalassa na kathesi. Rājā “neva gato āgacchati, na sāsanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:805_12: suyyatī”ti “ehi, bhaṇe, tvaṃ gacchāhī”ti teneva niyāmena aññaṃ amaccaṃ pesesi. Sopi
atk-s0513a1:805_13: gantvā purimanayeneva saddhiṃ parisāya arahattaṃ patvā tuṇhī ahosi. Rājā eteneva
atk-s0513a1:805_14: niyāmena purisasahassaparivāre nava amacce pesesi, sabbe attano kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:806_0: Rājā sāsanamattampi āharitvā ācikkhantaṃ alabhitvā cintesi “ettakā janā mayi sinehābhāvena
atk-s0513a1:806_1: sāsanamattampi na paccāhariṃsu, ko nu kho mama vacanaṃ karissatī”ti sabbaṃ rājabalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:806_2: olokento kāḷudāyiṃ addasa. So kira rañño sabbatthasādhako amacco abbhantariko ativissāsiko
atk-s0513a1:806_3: bodhisattena saddhiṃ ekadivase jāto sahapaṃsukīḷako sahāyo. Atha naṃ rājā āmantesi
atk-s0513a1:806_4: “tāta, kāḷudāyi ahaṃ mama puttaṃ passitukāmo nava purisasahassāni pesesiṃ, ekapurisopi
atk-s0513a1:806_5: āgantvā sāsanamattaṃ ārocentopi natthi, dujjāno kho pana jīvitantarāyo, ahaṃ jīvamānova
atk-s0513a1:806_6: puttaṃ daṭṭhuṃ icchāmi, sakkhissasi nu kho me puttaṃ dassetu”nti. Sakkhissāmi, deva,
atk-s0513a1:806_7: sace pabbajituṃ labhissāmīti. Tāta, tvaṃ pabbajitvā vā apabbajitvā vā mayhaṃ puttaṃ
atk-s0513a1:806_8: dassehīti. So “sādhu, devā”ti rañño sāsanaṃ ādāya rājagahaṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanāvelāya
atk-s0513a1:806_9: parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ sutvā saparivāro arahattaphalaṃ patvā ehibhikkhubhāve patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:807_0: Satthā buddho hutvā paṭhamaṃ antovassaṃ isipatane vasitvā vutthavasso pavāretvā uruvelaṃ
atk-s0513a1:807_1: gantvā tattha tayo māse vasanto tebhātikajaṭile vinetvā bhikkhusahassaparivāro phussamāsapuṇṇamāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:807_2: rājagahaṃ gantvā dve māse vasi. Ettāvatā bārāṇasito nikkhantassa pañca māsā jātā,
atk-s0513a1:807_3: sakalo hemanto atikkanto. Kāḷudāyittherassa āgatadivasato sattaṭṭha divasā vītivattā,
atk-s0513a1:807_4: so phagguṇīpuṇṇamāsiyaṃ cintesi “atikkanto hemanto, vasantasamayo anuppatto, manussehi
atk-s0513a1:807_5: sassādīni uddharitvā sammukhasammukhaṭṭhānehi maggā dinnā, haritatiṇasañchannā pathavī,
atk-s0513a1:807_6: supupphitā vanasaṇḍā, paṭipajjanakkhamā maggā, kālo dasabalassa ñātisaṅgahaṃ kātu”nti.
atk-s0513a1:808: “Aṅgārino dāni dumā bhadante, phalesino chadanaṃ vippahāya;
atk-s0513a1:809: Te accimantova pabhāsayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ…pe….
atk-s0513a1:811: Saddalā haritā bhūmi, esa kālo mahāmunī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:812_0: Saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi dasabalassa kulanagaraṃ gamanatthāya gamanavaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0513a1:812_1: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ nu kho udāyi madhurassarena gamanavaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇesī”ti āha. Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:812_2: tumhākaṃ pitā suddhodanamahārājā passitukāmo, karotha ñātakānaṃ saṅgahanti. Sādhu
atk-s0513a1:812_3: udāyi, karissāmi ñātakānaṃ saṅgahaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocehi, gamikavattaṃ pūressantīti.
atk-s0513a1:813_0: Bhagavā aṅgamagadhavāsīnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ dasahi sahassehi, kapilavatthuvāsīnaṃ dasahi
atk-s0513a1:813_1: sahassehīti sabbeheva vīsatisahassehi khīṇāsavabhikkhūhi parivuto rājagahā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a1:813_2: divase divase yojanaṃ gacchati. “Rājagahato saṭṭhiyojanaṃ kapilavatthuṃ dvīhi māsehi
atk-s0513a1:813_3: pāpuṇissāmī”ti aturitacārikaṃ pakkāmi. Theropi “bhagavato nikkhantabhāvaṃ rañño ārocessāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:813_4: vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā rañño nivesane pāturahosi. Rājā theraṃ disvā tuṭṭhacitto mahārahe
atk-s0513a1:813_5: pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā attano paṭiyāditassa nānaggarasabhojanassa pattaṃ pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:813_6: Thero uṭṭhāya gamanākāraṃ dassesi. Nisīditvā bhuñjatha, tātāti. Satthu santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:813_7: bhuñjissāmi, mahārājāti. Kahaṃ pana, tāta, satthāti? Vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivāro
atk-s0513a1:813_8: tumhākaṃ dassanatthāya cārikaṃ nikkhanto, mahārājāti. Rājā tuṭṭhamānaso āha “tumhe
atk-s0513a1:813_9: imaṃ paribhuñjitvā yāva mama putto imaṃ nagaraṃ pāpuṇāti, tāvassa itova piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0513a1:813_10: harathā”ti. Thero adhivāsesi. Rājā theraṃ parivisitvā pattaṃ gandhacuṇṇena ubbaṭṭetvā
atk-s0513a1:813_11: uttamabhojanassa pūretvā “tathāgatassa dethā”ti therassa hatthe patiṭṭhāpesi. Thero
atk-s0513a1:813_12: sabbesaṃ passantānaṃyeva pattaṃ ākāse khipitvā sayampi vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0513a1:813_13: āharitvā satthu hatthe ṭhapesi. Satthā taṃ paribhuñji. Etenupāyena thero divase divase
atk-s0513a1:813_14: āhari, satthāpi antarāmagge raññoyeva piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñji. Theropi bhattakiccāvasāne
atk-s0513a1:813_15: divase divase “ajja ettakaṃ bhagavā āgato, ajja ettaka”nti buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttāya
atk-s0513a1:813_16: kathāya sakalaṃ rājakulaṃ satthu dassanaṃ vināyeva satthari sañjātappasādaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:813_17: Teneva naṃ bhagavā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kulappasādakānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:814_0: Sākiyāpi kho “anuppatte bhagavati amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭhaṃ passissāmā”ti sannipatitvā
atk-s0513a1:814_1: bhagavato vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vīmaṃsamānā “nigrodhasakkassa ārāmo ramaṇīyo”ti sallakkhetvā
atk-s0513a1:814_2: tattha sabbaṃ paṭijagganavidhiṃ kāretvā gandhapupphahatthā paccuggamanaṃ karontā
atk-s0513a1:814_3: sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍite daharadahare nāgaradārake ca nāgaradārikāyo ca paṭhamaṃ pahiṇiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:814_4: tato rājakumāre ca rājakumārikāyo ca, tesaṃ anantaraṃ sāmaṃ gandhapupphacuṇṇādīhi
atk-s0513a1:814_5: pūjayamānā bhagavantaṃ gahetvā nigrodhārāmameva agamaṃsu. Tatra bhagavā vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto
atk-s0513a1:814_6: paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi. Sākiyā nāma mānajātikā mānatthaddhā, te “siddhatthakumāro
atk-s0513a1:814_7: amhehi daharataro, amhākaṃ kaniṭṭho, bhāgineyyo, putto, nattā”ti cintetvā daharadahare
atk-s0513a1:814_8: rājakumāre āhaṃsu “tumhe vandatha, mayaṃ tumhākaṃ piṭṭhito nisīdissāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:815_0: Tesu evaṃ avanditvā nisinnesu bhagavā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā “na maṃ ñātayo vandanti,
atk-s0513a1:815_1: handa dāni ne vandāpessāmī”ti abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:815_2: ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā tesaṃ sīse pādapaṃsuṃ okiramāno viya kaṇḍambarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyasadisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:815_3: pāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi. Rājā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā āha – “bhagavā tumhākaṃ jātadivase kāḷadevalassa
atk-s0513a1:815_4: vandanatthaṃ upanītānaṃ pāde vo parivattitvā brāhmaṇassa matthake patiṭṭhite disvāpi
atk-s0513a1:815_5: ahaṃ tumhe vandiṃ, ayaṃ me paṭhamavandanā. Vappamaṅgaladivase jambucchāyāya sirisayane
atk-s0513a1:815_6: nisinnānaṃ vo jambucchāyāya aparivattanaṃ disvāpi pāde vandiṃ, ayaṃ me dutiyavandanā.
atk-s0513a1:815_7: Idāni imaṃ adiṭṭhapubbaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvāpi ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pāde vandāmi, ayaṃ me
atk-s0513a1:815_8: tatiyavandanā”ti. Raññā pana vandite bhagavantaṃ avanditvā ṭhātuṃ samattho nāma ekasākiyopi
atk-s0513a1:816_0: Iti bhagavā ñātayo vandāpetvā ākāsato otaritvā paññattāsane nisīdi. Nisinne bhagavati
atk-s0513a1:816_1: sikhāpatto ñātisamāgamo ahosi, sabbe ekaggacittā hutvā nisīdiṃsu. Tato mahāmegho
atk-s0513a1:816_2: pokkharavassaṃ vassi. Tambavaṇṇaṃ udakaṃ heṭṭhā viravantaṃ gacchati, temitukāmova
atk-s0513a1:816_3: temeti, atemitukāmassa sarīre ekabindumattampi na patati. Taṃ disvā sabbe acchariyabbhutacittajātā
atk-s0513a1:816_4: “aho acchariyaṃ, aho abbhuta”nti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Satthā “na idāneva mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:816_5: ñātisamāgame pokkharavassaṃ vassati, atītepi vassī”ti imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā vessantarajātakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:816_6: kathesi. Dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sabbe uṭṭhāya vanditvā pakkamiṃsu. Ekopi rājā vā rājamahāmatto
atk-s0513a1:816_7: vā “sve amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā gato nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:817_0: Satthā punadivase vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivuto kapilavatthuṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Taṃ
atk-s0513a1:817_1: na koci gantvā nimantesi, pattaṃ vā aggahosi. Bhagavā indakhīle ṭhitova āvajjesi
atk-s0513a1:817_2: “kathaṃ nu kho pubbabuddhā kulanagare piṇḍāya cariṃsu, kiṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā issarajanānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:817_3: gharāni agamaṃsu, udāhu sapadānacārikaṃ cariṃsū”ti. Tato ekabuddhassapi uppaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0513a1:817_4: gamanaṃ adisvā “mayāpi idāni ayameva vaṃso, ayaṃ paveṇī paggahetabbā, āyatiñca me
atk-s0513a1:817_5: sāvakāpi mamaññeva anusikkhantā piṇḍacārikavattaṃ paripūressantī”ti koṭiyaṃ niviṭṭhagehato
atk-s0513a1:817_6: paṭṭhāya sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya cari. “Ayyo kira siddhatthakumāro piṇḍāya caratī”ti dvibhūmakatibhūmakādīsu
atk-s0513a1:817_7: pāsādesu sīhapañjare vivaritvā mahājano dassanabyāvaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:818_0: Rāhulamātāpi devī “ayyaputto kira imasmiṃyeva nagare mahantena rājānubhāvena suvaṇṇasivikādīhi
atk-s0513a1:818_1: vicaritvā idāni kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyavatthavasano kapālahattho piṇḍāya carati,
atk-s0513a1:818_2: sobhati nu kho”ti sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā olokayamānā bhagavantaṃ nānāvirāgasamujjalāya
atk-s0513a1:822: Cāmarihatthavibhūsitapaṇho, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:824: Lokahitāya āgato naravīro, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:826: Indadhanuabhinīlabhamuko, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:828: Mattagajindavilāsitagāmī, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:830: Vīsativīsatisetasudanto, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:832: Sīlasamādhipatiṭṭhitacitto, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:834: Kañcanasucchaviuttamavaṇṇo, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:836: Osadhipaṇḍarasuddhasuuṇṇo, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho.
atk-s0513a1:838: Sāvakamajjhagato samaṇindo, esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:839_0: Evamimāhi dasahi narasīhagāthāhi nāma abhitthavitvā “tumhākaṃ putto kira idāni piṇḍāya
atk-s0513a1:839_1: caratī”ti rañño ārocesi. Rājā saṃviggahadayo hatthena sāṭakaṃ saṇṭhapento turitaturitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:839_2: nikkhamitvā vegena gantvā bhagavato purato ṭhatvā āha – “kiṃ, bhante, amhe lajjāpetha,
atk-s0513a1:839_3: kimatthaṃ piṇḍāya caratha, kiṃ ‘ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ na sakkā bhattaṃ laddhu’nti
atk-s0513a1:839_4: saññaṃ karitthā”ti. Vaṃsacārittametaṃ, mahārāja, amhākanti. Nanu, bhante, amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:839_5: mahāsammatakhattiyavaṃso nāma vaṃso, tattha ca ekakhattiyopi bhikkhācaro nāma natthīti.
atk-s0513a1:839_6: “Ayaṃ, mahārāja, rājavaṃso nāma tava vaṃso, amhākaṃ pana dīpaṅkaro koṇḍañño…pe… kassapoti
atk-s0513a1:839_7: ayaṃ buddhavaṃso nāma. Ete ca aññe ca anekasahassasaṅkhā buddhā bhikkhācarā, bhikkhācāreneva
atk-s0513a1:841: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi cā”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:842: Imaṃ gāthamāha. Gāthāpariyosāne rājā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:843: “Dhammaṃ care sucaritaṃ, na naṃ duccaritaṃ care;
atk-s0513a1:844: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi cā”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:845_0: Imaṃ pana gāthaṃ sutvā sakadāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Mahādhammapālajātakaṃ sutvā anāgāmiphale
atk-s0513a1:845_1: patiṭṭhāsi, maraṇasamaye setacchattassa heṭṭhā sirisayane nipannoyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:845_2: Araññavāsena pana padhānānuyogakiccaṃ rañño nāhosi. Sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikatvāyeva
atk-s0513a1:845_3: pana bhagavato pattaṃ gahetvā saparisaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahāpāsādaṃ āropetvā paṇītena
atk-s0513a1:845_4: khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisi. Bhattakiccapariyosāne sabbaṃ itthāgāraṃ āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:845_5: bhagavantaṃ vandi ṭhapetvā rāhulamātaraṃ. Sā pana “gaccha, ayyaputtaṃ vandāhī”ti
atk-s0513a1:845_6: parijanena vuccamānāpi “sace mayhaṃ guṇo atthi, sayameva mama santikaṃ ayyaputto
atk-s0513a1:845_7: āgamissati, āgatameva naṃ vandissāmī”ti vatvā na agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:846_0: Bhagavā rājānaṃ pattaṃ gāhāpetvā dvīhi aggasāvakehi saddhiṃ rājadhītāya sirigabbhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:846_1: gantvā “rājadhītā yathāruci vandamānā na kiñci vattabbā”ti vatvā paññattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:846_2: Sā vegenāgantvā gopphakesu gahetvā pādapiṭṭhiyaṃ sīsaṃ parivattetvā yathāajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:846_3: vandi. Rājā rājadhītāya bhagavati sinehabahumānādiguṇasampattiyo kathesi “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:846_4: mama dhītā ‘tumhehi kāsāyāni vatthāni nivāsitānī’ti sutvā tato paṭṭhāya kāsāyavatthanivatthā
atk-s0513a1:846_5: jātā, tumhākaṃ ekabhattikabhāvaṃ sutvā ekabhattikāva jātā, tumhehi mahāsayanassa
atk-s0513a1:846_6: chaḍḍitabhāvaṃ sutvā paṭṭikāmañcakeyeva nipannā, tumhākaṃ mālāgandhādīhi viratabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:846_7: ñatvā viratamālāgandhāva jātā, attano ñātakehi ‘mayaṃ paṭijaggissāmā’ti sāsane pesitepi
atk-s0513a1:846_8: ekañātakampi na olokesi, evaṃ guṇasampannā me dhītā bhagavā”ti. “Anacchariyaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:846_9: yaṃ idāni tayā rakkhiyamānā rājadhītā paripakke ñāṇe attānaṃ rakkheyya, esā pubbe
atk-s0513a1:846_10: anārakkhā pabbatapāde vicaramānā aparipakke ñāṇe attānaṃ rakkhī”ti vatvā candakinnarījātakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:847_0: Dutiyadivase pana nandassa rājakumārassa abhisekagehappavesanavivāhamaṅgalesu vattamānesu
atk-s0513a1:847_1: tassa gehaṃ gantvā kumāraṃ pattaṃ gāhāpetvā pabbājetukāmo maṅgalaṃ vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0513a1:847_2: pakkāmi. Janapadakalyāṇī kumāraṃ gacchantaṃ disvā “tuvaṭaṃ kho, ayyaputta, āgaccheyyāsī”ti
atk-s0513a1:847_3: vatvā gīvaṃ pasāretvā olokesi. Sopi bhagavantaṃ “pattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ avisahamāno
atk-s0513a1:847_4: vihāraṃyeva agamāsi, taṃ anicchamānaṃyeva bhagavā pabbājesi. Iti bhagavā kapilavatthuṃ
atk-s0513a1:848_0: Sattame divase rāhulamātā kumāraṃ alaṅkaritvā bhagavato santikaṃ pesesi “passa, tāta,
atk-s0513a1:848_1: etaṃ vīsatisahassasamaṇaparivutaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ brahmarūpavaṇṇaṃ samaṇaṃ, ayaṃ te
atk-s0513a1:848_2: pitā, etassa mahantā nidhayo ahesuṃ, tyāssa nikkhamanakālato paṭṭhāya na passāma,
atk-s0513a1:848_3: gaccha, naṃ dāyajjaṃ yācāhi – ‘ahaṃ tāta kumāro abhisekaṃ patvā cakkavattī bhavissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:848_4: dhanena me attho, dhanaṃ me dehi. Sāmiko hi putto pitu santakassā’ti”. Kumāro ca
atk-s0513a1:848_5: bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā pitu sinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho “sukhā te, samaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:848_6: chāyā”ti vatvā aññañca bahuṃ attano anurūpaṃ vadanto aṭṭhāsi. Bhagavā katabhattakicco
atk-s0513a1:848_7: anumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. Kumāropi “dāyajjaṃ me, samaṇa, dehi, dāyajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:848_8: me, samaṇa, dehī”ti bhagavantaṃ anubandhi. Bhagavā kumāraṃ na nivattāpesi, parijanopi
atk-s0513a1:848_9: bhagavatā saddhiṃ gacchantaṃ nivattetuṃ nāsakkhi. Iti so bhagavatā saddhiṃ ārāmameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:849_0: Tato bhagavā cintesi “yaṃ ayaṃ pitu santakaṃ dhanaṃ icchati, taṃ vaṭṭānugataṃ savighātaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:849_1: handassa bodhimaṇḍe paṭiladdhaṃ sattavidhaṃ ariyadhanaṃ demi, lokuttaradāyajjassa
atk-s0513a1:849_2: naṃ sāmikaṃ karomī”ti āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi “tena hi, tvaṃ sāriputta, rāhulakumāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:849_3: pabbājehī”ti. Thero taṃ pabbājesi. Pabbajite pana kumāre rañño adhimattaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:849_4: uppajji. Taṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto bhagavato nivedetvā “sādhu, bhante, ayyā mātāpitūhi
atk-s0513a1:849_5: ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ na pabbājeyyu”nti varaṃ yāci. Bhagavā tassa taṃ varaṃ datvā punadivase
atk-s0513a1:849_6: rājanivesane katapātarāso ekamantaṃ nisinnena raññā “bhante, tumhākaṃ dukkarakārikakāle
atk-s0513a1:849_7: ekā devatā maṃ upasaṅkamitvā ‘putto te kālakato’ti āha, tassā vacanaṃ asaddahanto
atk-s0513a1:849_8: ‘na mayhaṃ putto bodhiṃ appatvā kālaṃ karotī’ti taṃ paṭikkhipi”nti vutte “idāni kiṃ
atk-s0513a1:849_9: saddahissatha, ye tumhe pubbepi aṭṭhikāni dassetvā ‘putto te mato’ti vutte na saddahitthā”ti
atk-s0513a1:849_10: imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā mahādhammapālajātakaṃ kathesi. Kathāpariyosāne rājā anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:850_0: Iti bhagavā pitaraṃ tīsu phalesu patiṭṭhāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto punadeva rājagahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:850_1: gantvā veḷuvane vihāsi. Tasmiṃ samaye anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati pañcahi sakaṭasatehi
atk-s0513a1:850_2: bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya rājagahe attano piyasahāyakassa seṭṭhino gehaṃ gantvā tattha buddhassa
atk-s0513a1:850_3: bhagavato uppannabhāvaṃ sutvā balavapaccūsasamaye devatānubhāvena vivaṭena dvārena
atk-s0513a1:850_4: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya dutiyadivase buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0513a1:850_5: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā sāvatthiṃ āgamanatthāya satthu paṭiññaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:850_6: antarāmagge pañcacattālīsayojanaṭṭhāne satasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ datvā yojanike yojanike
atk-s0513a1:850_7: vihāre kāretvā jetavanaṃ koṭisanthārena aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭīhi kiṇitvā navakammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:850_8: paṭṭhapesi. So majjhe dasabalassa gandhakuṭiṃ kāresi, taṃ parivāretvā asītimahātherānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:850_11: ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge manoramaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpetvā dasabalassa āgamanatthāya dūtaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:850_12: Satthā dūtassa vacanaṃ sutvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahā nikkhamitvā anupubbena
atk-s0513a1:851_0: Mahāseṭṭhipi kho vihāramahaṃ sajjetvā tathāgatassa jetavanappavisanadivase puttaṃ
atk-s0513a1:851_1: sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ katvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatteheva pañcahi kumārasatehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:851_2: pesesi. So saparivāro pañcavaṇṇavatthasamujjalāni pañca dhajasatāni gahetvā dasabalassa
atk-s0513a1:851_3: purato ahosi. Tesaṃ pacchato mahāsubhaddā cūḷasubhaddāti dve seṭṭhidhītaro pañcahi
atk-s0513a1:851_4: kumārikāsatehi saddhiṃ puṇṇaghaṭe gahetvā nikkhamiṃsu. Tāsaṃ pacchato seṭṭhibhariyā
atk-s0513a1:851_5: sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā pañcahi mātugāmasatehi saddhiṃ puṇṇapātiyo gahetvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:851_6: Sabbesaṃ pacchato sayaṃ mahāseṭṭhi ahatavatthanivattho ahatavatthanivattheheva pañcahi
atk-s0513a1:851_7: seṭṭhisatehi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ abbhuggañchi. Bhagavā imaṃ upāsakaparisaṃ purato
atk-s0513a1:851_8: katvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto attano sarīrappabhāya suvaṇṇarasasekapiñjarāni viya
atk-s0513a1:851_9: vanantarāni kurumāno anantāya buddhalīḷāya apaṭisamāya buddhasiriyā jetavanavihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:852_0: Atha naṃ anāthapiṇḍiko pucchi – “kathāhaṃ, bhante, imasmiṃ vihāre paṭipajjāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:852_1: Tena hi gahapati imaṃ vihāraṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dehīti.
atk-s0513a1:852_2: “Sādhu, bhante”ti mahāseṭṭhi suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ ādāya dasabalassa hatthe udakaṃ pātetvā
atk-s0513a1:852_3: “imaṃ jetavanavihāraṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dammī”ti adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:854: Sarīsape ca makase, sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0513a1:858: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano.
atk-s0513a1:863: Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāya, parinibbāti anāsavo”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:864_0: Vihārānisaṃsaṃ kathesi. Anāthapiṇḍiko dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya vihāramahaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:864_1: Visākhāya pāsādamaho catūhi māsehi niṭṭhito, anāthapiṇḍikassa pana vihāramaho navahi
atk-s0513a1:864_2: māsehi niṭṭhāsi. Vihāramahepi aṭṭhāraseva koṭiyo pariccāgaṃ agamaṃsu. Iti ekasmiṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:865_0: Atīte pana vipassissa bhagavato kāle punabbasumitto nāma seṭṭhi suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāsanthārena
atk-s0513a1:865_1: kiṇitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne yojanappamāṇaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kāresi. Sikhissa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0513a1:865_2: sirivaḍḍho nāma seṭṭhi suvaṇṇaphālasanthārena kiṇitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne tigāvutappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:865_3: saṅghārāmaṃ kāresi. Vessabhussa bhagavato kāle sotthijo nāma seṭṭhi suvaṇṇahatthipadasanthārena
atk-s0513a1:865_4: kiṇitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne aḍḍhayojanappamāṇaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kāresi. Kakusandhassa bhagavato
atk-s0513a1:865_5: kāle accuto nāma seṭṭhi suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāsanthārena kiṇitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne gāvutappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:865_6: saṅghārāmaṃ kāresi. Koṇāgamanassa bhagavato kāle uggo nāma seṭṭhi suvaṇṇakacchapasanthārena
atk-s0513a1:865_7: kiṇitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne aḍḍhagāvutappamāṇaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kāresi. Kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0513a1:865_8: kāle sumaṅgalo nāma seṭṭhi suvaṇṇakaṭṭisanthārena kiṇitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne soḷasakarīsappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:865_9: saṅghārāmaṃ kāresi. Amhākaṃ pana bhagavato kāle anāthapiṇḍiko nāma seṭṭhi kahāpaṇakoṭisanthārena
atk-s0513a1:865_10: kiṇitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kāresi. Idaṃ kira ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:866: Iti mahābodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutappattito yāva mahāparinibbānamañcā yasmiṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne bhagavā vihāsi, idaṃ santikenidānaṃ nāma, tassa vasena sabbajātakāni vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0513a1:872_0: Imaṃ tāva apaṇṇakadhammadesanaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiṃ upanissāya jetavanamahāvihāre viharanto
atk-s0513a1:872_1: kathesi. Kaṃ pana ārabbha ayaṃ kathā samuṭṭhitāti? Seṭṭhissa sahāyake pañcasate titthiyasāvake.
atk-s0513a1:872_2: Ekasmiñhi divase anāthapiṇḍiko seṭṭhi attano sahāyake pañcasate aññatitthiyasāvake
atk-s0513a1:872_3: ādāya bahuṃ mālāgandhavilepanañceva sappitelamadhuphāṇitavatthacchādanāni ca gāhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:872_4: jetavanaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā bhesajjāni ceva vatthāni
atk-s0513a1:872_5: ca bhikkhusaṅghassa vissajjetvā cha nisajjādose vajjetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Tepi aññatitthiyasāvakā
atk-s0513a1:872_6: tathāgataṃ vanditvā satthu puṇṇacandasassirikaṃ mukhaṃ, lakkhaṇānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:872_7: byāmappabhāparikkhittaṃ brahmakāyaṃ, āveḷāveḷā yamakayamakā hutvā niccharantiyo ghanabuddharasmiyo
atk-s0513a1:873_0: Atha nesaṃ satthā manosilātale sīhanādaṃ nadanto taruṇasīho viya gajjanto pāvussakamegho
atk-s0513a1:873_1: viya ca ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya ca ratanadāmaṃ ganthento viya ca aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena
atk-s0513a1:873_2: savanīyena kamanīyena brahmassarena nānānayavicittaṃ madhuradhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:873_3: Te satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacittā uṭṭhāya dasabalaṃ vanditvā aññatitthiyasaraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:873_4: bhinditvā buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ agamaṃsu. Te tato paṭṭhāya niccakālaṃ anāthapiṇḍikena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:873_5: gandhamālādihatthā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanti, dānaṃ denti, sīlaṃ rakkhanti,
atk-s0513a1:874_0: Atha bhagavā sāvatthito punadeva rājagahaṃ agamāsi. Te tathāgatassa gatakāle taṃ
atk-s0513a1:874_1: saraṇaṃ bhinditvā puna aññatitthiyasaraṇaṃ gantvā attano mūlaṭṭhāneyeva patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0513a1:874_2: Bhagavāpi sattaṭṭha māse vītināmetvā puna jetavanameva agamāsi. Anāthapiṇḍiko punapi
atk-s0513a1:874_3: te ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:874_4: nisīdi. Tepi bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ tathāgate cārikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:874_5: pakkante gahitasaraṇaṃ bhinditvā puna aññatitthiyasaraṇameva gahetvā mūle patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:875_1: nānāgandhapūritaṃ ratanakaraṇḍakaṃ vivaranto viya mukhapadumaṃ vivaritvā madhurassaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:875_2: nicchārento “saccaṃ kira tumhe upāsakā tīṇi saraṇāni bhinditvā aññatitthiyasaraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:875_3: gatā”ti pucchi. Atha tehi paṭicchādetuṃ asakkontehi “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti vutte satthā
atk-s0513a1:875_4: “upāsakā heṭṭhā avīciṃ upari bhavaggaṃ paricchedaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu
atk-s0513a1:875_5: sīlādīhi guṇehi buddhena sadiso nāma natthi, kuto adhikataro”ti. “Yāvatā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:875_6: sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā, tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati,
atk-s0513a1:875_7: yaṃ kiñci vittaṃ idha vā huraṃ vā…pe… aggato ve pasannāna”ntiādīhi suttehi pakāsite
atk-s0513a1:875_8: ratanattayaguṇe pakāsetvā “evaṃ uttamaguṇehi samannāgataṃ ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā
atk-s0513a1:875_9: upāsakā vā upāsikā vā nirayādīsu nibbattakā nāma natthi, apāyanibbattito pana muccitvā
atk-s0513a1:875_10: devaloke uppajjitvā mahāsampattiṃ anubhonti, tasmā tumhehi evarūpaṃ saraṇaṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0513a1:876: Ettha ca tīṇi ratanāni mokkhavasena uttamavasena saraṇagatānaṃ apāyesu nibbattiyā abhāvadīpanatthaṃ imāni suttāni dassetabbāni –
atk-s0513a1:877: “Ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0513a1:879: “Ye keci dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0513a1:881: “Ye keci saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0513a1:883: “Bahuṃ ve saraṇaṃ yanti, pabbatāni vanāni ca;
atk-s0513a1:887: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
atk-s0513a1:893_0: Na kevalañca nesaṃ satthā ettakaṃyeva dhammaṃ desesi, apica kho “upāsakā buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:893_1: nāma, dhammānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma, saṅghānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma sotāpattimaggaṃ
atk-s0513a1:893_2: deti, sotāpattiphalaṃ deti, sakadāgāmimaggaṃ deti, sakadāgāmiphalaṃ deti, anāgāmimaggaṃ
atk-s0513a1:893_3: deti, anāgāmiphalaṃ deti, arahattamaggaṃ deti, arahattaphalaṃ detī”tievamādīhipi
atk-s0513a1:893_4: nayehi dhammaṃ desetvā “evarūpaṃ nāma saraṇaṃ bhindantehi ayuttaṃ tumhehi kata”nti
atk-s0513a1:893_6: bhikkhave, bhāvito bahulīkato ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya
atk-s0513a1:893_7: sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. Katamo ekadhammo? Buddhānussatī”tievamādīhi suttehi dīpetabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:894_0: Evaṃ bhagavā nānappakārehi upāsake ovaditvā “upāsakā pubbepi manussā asaraṇaṃ ‘saraṇa’nti
atk-s0513a1:894_1: takkaggāhena viraddhaggāhena gahetvā amanussapariggahite kantāre yakkhabhakkhā hutvā
atk-s0513a1:894_2: mahāvināsaṃ pattā, apaṇṇakaggāhaṃ pana ekaṃsikaggāhaṃ aviraddhaggāhaṃ gahitamanussā
atk-s0513a1:894_3: tasmiṃyeva kantāre sotthibhāvaṃ pattā”ti vatvā tuṇhī ahosi. Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko
atk-s0513a1:894_4: gahapati uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā abhitthavitvā sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:894_5: evamāha “bhante, idāni tāva imesaṃ upāsakānaṃ uttamasaraṇaṃ bhinditvā takkaggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:894_6: amhākaṃ pākaṭaṃ, pubbe pana amanussapariggahite kantāre takkikānaṃ vināso, apaṇṇakaggāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:894_7: gahitamanussānañca sotthibhāvo amhākaṃ paṭicchanno, tumhākameva pākaṭo, sādhu vata
atk-s0513a1:894_8: no bhagavā ākāse puṇṇacandaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya imaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ karotū”ti. Atha
atk-s0513a1:894_9: bhagavā “mayā kho, gahapati, aparimitakālaṃ dasa pāramiyo pūretvā lokassa kaṅkhacchedanatthameva
atk-s0513a1:894_10: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, sīhavasāya suvaṇṇanāḷiṃ pūrento viya sakkaccaṃ sotaṃ
atk-s0513a1:894_11: odahitvā suṇohī”ti seṭṭhino satuppādaṃ janetvā himagabbhaṃ padāletvā puṇṇacandaṃ
atk-s0513a1:894_12: nīharanto viya bhavantarena paṭicchannakāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:895_0: Atīte kāsiraṭṭhe bārāṇasinagare brahmadatto nāma rājā ahosi. Tadā bodhisatto satthavāhakule
atk-s0513a1:895_1: paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasamāsaccayena mātukucchito nikkhamitvā anupubbena vayappatto
atk-s0513a1:895_2: pañcahi sakaṭasatehi vaṇijjaṃ karonto vicarati. So kadāci pubbantato aparantaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0513a1:895_3: kadāci aparantato pubbantaṃ. Bārāṇasiyaṃyeva aññopi satthavāhaputto atthi bālo abyatto
atk-s0513a1:895_4: anupāyakusalo. Tadā bodhisatto bārāṇasito mahagghaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pañca sakaṭasatāni
atk-s0513a1:895_5: pūretvā gamanasajjāni katvā ṭhapesi. Sopi bālasatthavāhaputto tatheva pañca sakaṭasatāni
atk-s0513a1:896_0: Tadā bodhisatto cintesi “sace ayaṃ bālasatthavāhaputto mayā saddhiṃyeva gamissati,
atk-s0513a1:896_1: sakaṭasahasse ekato maggaṃ gacchante maggopi nappahossati, manussānaṃ dārudakādīnipi,
atk-s0513a1:896_2: balibaddānaṃ tiṇānipi dullabhāni bhavissanti, etena vā mayā vā purato gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:896_3: So taṃ pakkosāpetvā etamatthaṃ ārocetvā “dvīhipi amhehi ekato gantuṃ na sakkā, kiṃ
atk-s0513a1:896_4: tvaṃ purato gamissasi, udāhu pacchato”ti āha. So cintesi “mayi purato gacchante bahū
atk-s0513a1:896_5: ānisaṃsā, maggena abhinneneva gamissāmi, goṇā anāmaṭṭhatiṇaṃ khādissanti, manussānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:896_6: anāmaṭṭhaṃ sūpeyyapaṇṇaṃ bhavissati, pasannaṃ udakaṃ bhavissati, yathāruciṃ agghaṃ
atk-s0513a1:896_7: ṭhapetvā bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇissāmī”ti. So “ahaṃ, samma, purato gamissāmī”ti āha. Bodhisattopi
atk-s0513a1:896_8: pacchato gamane bahū ānisaṃse addasa. Evaṃ hissa ahosi – “purato gacchantā magge
atk-s0513a1:896_9: visamaṭṭhānaṃ samaṃ karissanti, ahaṃ tehi gatamaggena gamissāmi, purato gatehi balibaddehi
atk-s0513a1:896_10: pariṇatathaddhatiṇe khādite mama goṇā puna uṭṭhitāni madhuratiṇāni khādissanti, gahitapaṇṇaṭṭhānato
atk-s0513a1:896_11: uṭṭhitaṃ manussānaṃ sūpeyyapaṇṇaṃ madhuraṃ bhavissati, anudake ṭhāne āvāṭaṃ khanitvā
atk-s0513a1:896_12: ete udakaṃ uppādessanti, tehi katesu āvāṭesu mayaṃ udakaṃ pivissāma, agghaṭṭhapanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:896_13: nāma manussānaṃ jīvitā voropanasadisaṃ, ahaṃ pacchato gantvā etehi ṭhapitagghena
atk-s0513a1:896_14: bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇissāmī”ti. Atha so ettake ānisaṃse disvā “samma, tvaṃ purato gacchāhī”ti
atk-s0513a1:896_15: āha. “Sādhu, sammā”ti bālasatthavāho sakaṭāni yojetvā nikkhanto anupubbena manussāvāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:897_0: Kantāraṃ nāma – corakantāraṃ, vāḷakantāraṃ, nirudakakantāraṃ, amanussakantāraṃ, appabhakkhakantāranti
atk-s0513a1:897_1: pañcavidhaṃ. Tattha corehi adhiṭṭhitamaggo corakantāraṃ nāma. Sīhādīhi adhiṭṭhitamaggo
atk-s0513a1:897_2: vāḷakantāraṃ nāma. Yattha nhāyituṃ vā pātuṃ vā udakaṃ natthi, idaṃ nirudakakantāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:897_3: nāma. Amanussādhiṭṭhitaṃ amanussakantāraṃ nāma. Mūlakhādanīyādivirahitaṃ appabhakkhakantāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:897_4: nāma. Imasmiṃ pañcavidhe kantāre taṃ kantāraṃ nirudakakantārañceva amanussakantārañca.
atk-s0513a1:897_5: Tasmā so bālasatthavāhaputto sakaṭesu mahantamahantā cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā udakassa pūrāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:898_0: Athassa kantāramajjhaṃ gatakāle kantāre adhivatthayakkho “imehi manussehi gahitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:898_1: udakaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā dubbale katvā sabbeva ne khādissāmī”ti sabbasetataruṇabalibaddayuttaṃ
atk-s0513a1:898_2: manoramaṃ yānakaṃ māpetvā dhanukalāpaphalakāvudhahatthehi dasahi dvādasahi amanussehi
atk-s0513a1:898_3: parivuto uppalakumudāni piḷandhitvā allakoso allavattho issarapuriso viya tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:898_4: yānake nisīditvā kaddamamakkhitehi cakkehi paṭipathaṃ agamāsi. Parivāraamanussāpissa
atk-s0513a1:898_5: purato ca pacchato ca gacchantā allakesā allavatthā uppalakumudamālā piḷandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:898_6: padumapuṇḍarīkakalāpe gahetvā bhisamuḷālāni khādantā udakabindūhi ceva kalalehi ca
atk-s0513a1:898_7: paggharantehi agamaṃsu. Satthavāhā ca nāma yadā dhuravāto vāyati, tadā yānake nisīditvā
atk-s0513a1:898_8: upaṭṭhākaparivutā rajaṃ pariharantā purato gacchanti. Yadā pacchato vāto vāyati,
atk-s0513a1:898_9: tadā teneva nayena pacchato gacchanti. Tadā pana dhuravāto ahosi, tasmā so satthavāhaputto purato agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:899_0: Yakkho taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā attano yānakaṃ maggā okkamāpetvā “kahaṃ gacchathā”ti
atk-s0513a1:899_1: tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ akāsi. Satthavāhopi attano yānakaṃ maggā okkamāpetvā sakaṭānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:899_2: gamanokāsaṃ datvā ekamante ṭhito taṃ yakkhaṃ avoca “bho, amhe tāva bārāṇasito āgacchāma.
atk-s0513a1:899_3: Tumhe pana uppalakumudāni piḷandhitvā padumapuṇḍarīkahatthā bhisamuḷālāni khādantā
atk-s0513a1:899_4: kaddamamakkhitā udakabindūhi paggharantehi āgacchatha. Kiṃ nu kho tumhehi āgatamagge
atk-s0513a1:899_5: devo vassati, uppalādisañchannāni vā sarāni atthī”ti pucchi. Yakkho tassa kathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:899_6: sutvā “samma, kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathesi. Esā nīlavanarāji paññāyati. Tato paṭṭhāya sakalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:899_7: araññaṃ ekodakaṃ, nibaddhaṃ devo vassati, kandarā pūrā, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne padumādisañchannāni
atk-s0513a1:899_8: sarāni atthī”ti vatvā paṭipāṭiyā gacchantesu sakaṭesu “imāni sakaṭāni ādāya kahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:899_9: gacchathā”ti pucchi. “Asukajanapadaṃ nāmā”ti. “Imasmiṃ cimasmiñca sakaṭe kiṃ nāma
atk-s0513a1:899_10: bhaṇḍa”nti? “Asukañca asukañcā”ti. “Pacchato āgacchantaṃ sakaṭaṃ ativiya garukaṃ
atk-s0513a1:899_11: hutvā āgacchati, etasmiṃ kiṃ bhaṇḍa”nti? “Udakaṃ etthā”ti. “Parato tāva udakaṃ ānentehi
atk-s0513a1:899_12: vo manāpaṃ kataṃ, ito paṭṭhāya pana udakena kiccaṃ natthi, purato bahu udakaṃ, cāṭiyo
atk-s0513a1:899_13: bhinditvā udakaṃ chaḍḍetvā sukhena gacchathā”ti āha. Evañca pana vatvā “tumhe gacchatha,
atk-s0513a1:899_14: amhākaṃ papañco hotī”ti thokaṃ gantvā tesaṃ adassanaṃ patvā attano yakkhanagarameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:900_0: Sopi bālasatthavāho attano bālatāya yakkhassa vacanaṃ gahetvā cāṭiyo bhindāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:900_1: pasatamattampi udakaṃ anavasesetvā sabbaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā sakaṭāni pājāpesi, purato appamattakampi
atk-s0513a1:900_2: udakaṃ nāhosi, manussā pānīyaṃ alabhantā kilamiṃsu. Te yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā gantvā
atk-s0513a1:900_3: sakaṭāni mocetvā parivaṭṭakena ṭhapetvā goṇe cakkesu bandhiṃsu. Neva goṇānaṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:900_4: ahosi, na manussānaṃ yāgubhattaṃ vā. Dubbalamanussā tattha tattha nipajjitvā sayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:900_5: Rattibhāgasamanantare yakkhā yakkhanagarato āgantvā sabbepi goṇe ca manusse ca jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:900_6: pāpetvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā aṭṭhīni avasesetvā agamaṃsu. Evamekaṃ bālasatthavāhaputtaṃ
atk-s0513a1:900_7: nissāya sabbepi te vināsaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, hatthaṭṭhikādīni disāvidisāsu vippakiṇṇāni
atk-s0513a1:901_0: Bodhisattopi kho bālasatthavāhaputtassa nikkhantadivasato māsaḍḍhamāsaṃ vītināmetvā
atk-s0513a1:901_1: pañcahi sakaṭasatehi nagarā nikkhamma anupubbena kantāramukhaṃ pāpuṇi. So tattha
atk-s0513a1:901_2: udakacāṭiyo pūretvā bahuṃ udakaṃ ādāya khandhāvāre bheriṃ carāpetvā manusse sannipātetvā
atk-s0513a1:901_3: evamāha “tumhe maṃ anāpucchitvā pasatamattampi udakaṃ mā vaḷañjayittha, kantāre visarukkhā
atk-s0513a1:901_4: nāma honti, pattaṃ vā pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā tumhehi pure akhāditapubbaṃ maṃ anāpucchitvā
atk-s0513a1:901_5: mā khāditthā”ti. Evaṃ manussānaṃ ovādaṃ datvā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi kantāraṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a1:901_6: Tasmiṃ kantāramajjhaṃ sampatte so yakkho purimanayeneva bodhisattassa paṭipathe attānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:901_7: dassesi. Bodhisatto taṃ disvāva aññāsi “imasmiṃ kantāre udakaṃ natthi, nirudakakantāro
atk-s0513a1:901_8: nāmesa, ayañca nibbhayo rattanetto, chāyāpissa na paññāyati, nissaṃsayaṃ iminā purato
atk-s0513a1:901_9: gato bālasatthavāhaputto sabbaṃ udakaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā kilametvā sapariso khādito bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:901_10: mayhaṃ pana paṇḍitabhāvaṃ upāyakosallaṃ na jānāti maññe”ti. Tato naṃ āha “gacchatha
atk-s0513a1:901_11: tumhe, mayaṃ vāṇijā nāma aññaṃ udakaṃ adisvā gahitaudakaṃ na chaḍḍema, diṭṭhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:901_12: pana chaḍḍetvā sakaṭāni sallahukāni katvā gamissāmā”ti yakkho thokaṃ gantvā adassanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:902_0: Yakkhe pana gate manussā bodhisattaṃ āhaṃsu “ayya, ete manussā ‘esā nīlavanarāji
atk-s0513a1:902_1: paññāyati, tato paṭṭhāya nibaddhaṃ devo vassatī’ti vatvā uppalakumudamālādhārino
atk-s0513a1:902_2: padumapuṇḍarīkakalāpe ādāya bhisamuḷālāni khādantā allavatthā allakesā udakabindūhi
atk-s0513a1:902_3: paggharantehi āgatā, udakaṃ chaḍḍetvā sallahukehi sakaṭehi khippaṃ gacchāmā”ti. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:902_4: tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā sakaṭāni ṭhapāpetvā sabbe manusse sannipātāpetvā “tumhehi ‘imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:902_5: kantāre saro vā pokkharaṇī vā atthī’ti kassaci sutapubba”nti pucchi. “Na, ayya, sutapubba”nti.
atk-s0513a1:902_6: Nirudakakantāro nāma eso, idāni ekacce manussā “etāya nīlavanarājiyā purato devo
atk-s0513a1:902_7: vassatī”ti vadanti, “vuṭṭhivāto nāma kittakaṃ ṭhānaṃ vāyatī”ti? “Yojanamattaṃ, ayyā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:902_8: “Kacci pana vo ekassāpi sarīraṃ vuṭṭhivāto paharatī”ti? “Natthi ayyā”ti. “Meghasīsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:902_9: nāma kittake ṭhāne paññāyatī”ti? “Tiyojanamatte ayyā”ti. “Atthi pana vo kenaci ekampi
atk-s0513a1:902_10: meghasīsaṃ diṭṭha”nti? “Natthi, ayyā”ti. “Vijjulatā nāma kittake ṭhāne paññāyatī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:902_11: “Catuppañcayojanamatte, ayyā”ti. “Atthi pana vo kenaci vijjulatobhāso diṭṭho”ti?
atk-s0513a1:902_13: ayyā”ti. “Atthi pana vo kenaci meghasaddo suto”ti? “Natthi, ayyā”ti. “Na ete manussā,
atk-s0513a1:902_14: yakkhā ete, amhe udakaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā dubbale katvā khāditukāmā āgatā bhavissanti.
atk-s0513a1:902_15: Purato gato bālasatthavāhaputto na upāyakusalo. Addhā so etehi udakaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:902_16: kilametvā khādito bhavissati, pañca sakaṭasatāni yathāpūritāneva ṭhitāni bhavissanti.
atk-s0513a1:902_17: Ajja mayaṃ tāni passissāma, pasatamattampi udakaṃ achaḍḍetvā sīghasīghaṃ pājethā”ti pājāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:903_0: So gacchanto yathāpūritāneva pañca sakaṭasatāni goṇamanussānañca hatthaṭṭhikādīni
atk-s0513a1:903_1: disāvidisāsu vippakiṇṇāni disvā sakaṭāni mocāpetvā sakaṭaparivaṭṭakena khandhāvāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:903_2: bandhāpetvā kālasseva manusse ca goṇe ca sāyamāsabhattaṃ bhojāpetvā manussānaṃ majjhe
atk-s0513a1:903_3: goṇe nipajjāpetvā sayaṃ balanāyako hutvā khaggahattho tiyāmarattiṃ ārakkhaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:903_4: ṭhitakova aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpesi. Punadivase pana pātova sabbakiccāni niṭṭhāpetvā goṇe
atk-s0513a1:903_5: bhojetvā dubbalasakaṭāni chaḍḍāpetvā thirāni gāhāpetvā appagghaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:903_6: mahagghaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ āropāpetvā yathādhippetaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā diguṇatiguṇena mūlena bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a1:903_7: vikkiṇitvā sabbaṃ parisaṃ ādāya puna attano nagarameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:904_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetvā “evaṃ, gahapati, pubbe takkaggāhagāhino mahāvināsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:904_1: pattā, apaṇṇakaggāhagāhino pana amanussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā sotthinā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:904_2: gantvā puna sakaṭṭhānameva paccāgamiṃsū”ti vatvā dvepi vatthūni ghaṭetvā imissā apaṇṇakadhammadesanāya
atk-s0513a1:908_0: Tattha apaṇṇakanti ekaṃsikaṃ aviraddhaṃ niyyānikaṃ. Ṭhānanti kāraṇaṃ. Kāraṇañhi yasmā
atk-s0513a1:908_1: tadāyattavuttitāya phalaṃ tiṭṭhati nāma, tasmā “ṭhāna”nti vuccati, “ṭhānañca ṭhānato
atk-s0513a1:908_2: aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato”tiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo. Iti “apaṇṇakaṃ ṭhāna”nti padadvayenāpi
atk-s0513a1:908_4: niyyānikakāraṇaṃ, taṃ ida”nti dīpeti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, pabhedato pana tīṇi saraṇagamanāni,
atk-s0513a1:908_5: pañca sīlāni, dasa sīlāni, pātimokkhasaṃvaro, indriyasaṃvaro, ājīvapārisuddhi, paccayapaṭisevanaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:908_6: sabbampi catupārisuddhisīlaṃ; indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, jāgariyānuyogo,
atk-s0513a1:908_7: jhānaṃ, vipassanā, abhiññā, samāpatti, ariyamaggo, ariyaphalaṃ, sabbampetaṃ apaṇṇakaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:909: Yasmā ca pana niyyānikapaṭipadāya etaṃ nāmaṃ, tasmāyeva bhagavā apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ dassento imaṃ suttamāha –
atk-s0513a1:910_0: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti,
atk-s0513a1:910_1: yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṃ khayāya. Katamehi tīhi? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:910_2: indriyesu guttadvāro hoti, bhojane mattaññū hoti, jāgariyaṃ anuyutto hoti. Kathañca,
atk-s0513a1:910_3: bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvāro hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:910_4: disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti…pe… evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvāro hoti.
atk-s0513a1:911_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhojane mattaññū hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā
atk-s0513a1:911_1: yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti neva davāya na madāya…pe… evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhojane mattaññū hoti.
atk-s0513a1:912: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jāgariyaṃ anuyutto hoti. Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya…pe… evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jāgariyaṃ anuyutto hotī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:913_0: Imasmiñcāpi sutte tayova dhammā vuttā. Ayaṃ pana apaṇṇakapaṭipadā yāva arahattaphalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:913_1: labbhateva. Tattha arahattaphalampi, phalasamāpattivihārassa ceva, anupādāparinibbānassa
atk-s0513a1:914_0: Eketi ekacce paṇḍitamanussā. Tattha kiñcāpi “asukā nāmā”ti niyamo natthi, idaṃ pana
atk-s0513a1:914_1: saparisaṃ bodhisattaṃyeva sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Dutiyaṃ āhu takkikāti dutiyanti
atk-s0513a1:914_2: paṭhamato apaṇṇakaṭṭhānato niyyānikakāraṇato dutiyaṃ takkaggāhakāraṇaṃ aniyyānikakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:914_3: Āhu takkikāti ettha pana saddhiṃ purimapadena ayaṃ yojanā – apaṇṇakaṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃsikakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:914_4: aviraddhakāraṇaṃ niyyānikakāraṇaṃ eke bodhisattappamukhā paṇḍitamanussā gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:914_5: Ye pana bālasatthavāhaputtappamukhā takkikā āhu, te dutiyaṃ sāparādhaṃ anekaṃsikaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:914_6: viraddhakāraṇaṃ aniyyānikakāraṇaṃ aggahesuṃ. Tesu ye apaṇṇakaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ, te
atk-s0513a1:914_7: sukkapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā. Ye dutiyaṃ “purato bhavitabbaṃ udakenā”ti takkaggāhasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0513a1:915_0: Tattha sukkapaṭipadā aparihānipaṭipadā, kaṇhapaṭipadā parihānipaṭipadā. Tasmā ye
atk-s0513a1:915_1: sukkapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā, te aparihīnā sotthibhāvaṃ pattā. Ye pana kaṇhapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0513a1:915_2: paṭipannā, te parihīnā anayabyasanaṃ āpannāti imamatthaṃ bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikassa
atk-s0513a1:915_3: gahapatino vatvā uttari idamāha “etadaññāya medhāvī, taṃ gaṇhe yadapaṇṇaka”nti.
atk-s0513a1:916_0: Tattha etadaññāya medhāvīti “medhā”ti laddhanāmāya vipulāya visuddhāya uttamāya paññāya
atk-s0513a1:916_1: samannāgato kulaputto etaṃ apaṇṇake ceva sapaṇṇake cāti dvīsu atakkaggāhatakkaggāhasaṅkhātesu
atk-s0513a1:916_2: ṭhānesu guṇadosaṃ vuddhihāniṃ atthānatthaṃ ñatvāti attho. Taṃ gaṇhe yadapaṇṇakanti
atk-s0513a1:916_4: tadeva gaṇheyya. Kasmā? Ekaṃsikādibhāvatoyeva. Itaraṃ pana na gaṇheyya. Kasmā? Anekaṃsikādibhāvatoyeva.
atk-s0513a1:916_5: Ayañhi apaṇṇakapaṭipadā nāma sabbesaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhaputtānaṃ paṭipadā.
atk-s0513a1:916_6: Sabbabuddhā hi apaṇṇakapaṭipadāyameva ṭhatvā daḷhena vīriyena pāramiyo pūretvā bodhimūle
atk-s0513a1:916_7: buddhā nāma honti, paccekabuddhā paccekabodhiṃ uppādenti, buddhaputtā sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ paṭivijjhanti.
atk-s0513a1:917_0: Iti bhagavā tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ tisso kulasampattiyo ca cha kāmasagge brahmalokasampattiyo
atk-s0513a1:917_1: ca datvāpi pariyosāne arahattamaggaphaladāyikā apaṇṇakapaṭipadā nāma, catūsu apāyesu
atk-s0513a1:917_2: pañcasu ca nīcakulesu nibbattidāyikā sapaṇṇakapaṭipadā nāmāti imaṃ apaṇṇakadhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:917_3: dassetvā uttari cattāri saccāni soḷasahi ākārehi pakāsesi. Catusaccapariyosāne sabbepi
atk-s0513a1:918_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā dassetvā dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0513a1:918_1: jātakaṃ samodhānetvā dassesi – “tasmiṃ samaye bālasatthavāhaputto devadatto ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:918_2: tassa parisā devadattaparisāva, paṇḍitasatthavāhaputtaparisā buddhaparisā, paṇḍitasatthavāhaputto
atk-s0513a1:922_0: Akilāsunoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto kathesi. Kaṃ pana ārabbhāti?
atk-s0513a1:922_1: Ekaṃ ossaṭṭhavīriyaṃ bhikkhuṃ. Tathāgate kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharante eko sāvatthivāsī
atk-s0513a1:922_2: kulaputto jetavanaṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacitto kāmesu
atk-s0513a1:922_3: ādīnavaṃ disvā pabbajitvā upasampadāya pañcavassiko hutvā dve mātikā uggaṇhitvā vipassanācāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:922_4: sikkhitvā satthu santike attano cittaruciyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ekaṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:922_5: vassaṃ upagantvā temāsaṃ vāyamantopi obhāsamattaṃ vā nimittamattaṃ vā uppādetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a1:923_0: Athassa etadahosi “satthārā cattāro puggalā kathitā, tesu mayā padaparamena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:923_1: natthi maññe mayhaṃ imasmiṃ attabhāve maggo vā phalaṃ vā, kiṃ karissāmi araññavāsena,
atk-s0513a1:923_2: satthu santikaṃ gantvā rūpasobhaggappattaṃ buddhasarīraṃ olokento madhuraṃ dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:923_3: suṇanto viharissāmī”ti puna jetavanameva paccāgamāsi. Atha naṃ sandiṭṭhasambhattā
atk-s0513a1:923_4: āhaṃsu – “āvuso, tvaṃ satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ‘samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī’ti
atk-s0513a1:923_5: gato, idāni pana āgantvā saṅgaṇikāya abhiramamāno carasi, kiṃ nu kho te pabbajitakiccaṃ
atk-s0513a1:923_6: matthakaṃ pattaṃ, appaṭisandhiko jātosī”ti? Āvuso, ahaṃ maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā alabhitvā
atk-s0513a1:923_7: “abhabbapuggalena mayā bhavitabba”nti vīriyaṃ ossajitvā āgatomhīti. “Akāraṇaṃ te,
atk-s0513a1:923_8: āvuso, kataṃ daḷhavīriyassa satthu sāsane pabbajitvā vīriyaṃ ossajantena, ayuttaṃ
atk-s0513a1:923_9: te kataṃ, ehi tathāgatassa dassemā”ti taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:924_0: Satthā taṃ disvā evamāha “bhikkhave, tumhe etaṃ bhikkhuṃ anicchamānaṃ ādāya āgatā,
atk-s0513a1:924_1: kiṃ kataṃ iminā”ti? “Bhante, ayaṃ bhikkhu evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:924_2: karonto vīriyaṃ ossajitvā āgato”ti āhaṃsu. Atha naṃ satthā āha “saccaṃ kira tayā
atk-s0513a1:924_3: bhikkhu vīriyaṃ ossaṭṭha”nti? “Saccaṃ, bhagavā”ti. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ bhikkhu evarūpe
atk-s0513a1:924_4: mama sāsane pabbajitvā ‘appiccho’ti vā ‘santuṭṭho’ti vā ‘pavivitto’ti vā ‘āraddhavīriyo’ti
atk-s0513a1:924_5: vā evaṃ attānaṃ ajānāpetvā ‘ossaṭṭhavīriyo bhikkhū’ti jānāpesi. Nanu tvaṃ pubbe vīriyavā
atk-s0513a1:924_6: ahosi, tayā ekena kataṃ vīriyaṃ nissāya marukantāre pañcasu sakaṭasatesu manussā
atk-s0513a1:924_7: ca goṇā ca pānīyaṃ labhitvā sukhitā jātā, idāni kasmā vīriyaṃ ossajasī”ti. So bhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:925_0: Taṃ pana kathaṃ sutvā bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu – “bhante, idāni iminā bhikkhunā
atk-s0513a1:925_1: vīriyassa ossaṭṭhabhāvo amhākaṃ pākaṭo, pubbe panassa ekassa vīriyaṃ nissāya marukantāre
atk-s0513a1:925_2: goṇamanussānaṃ pānīyaṃ labhitvā sukhitabhāvo paṭicchanno, tumhākaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇasseva
atk-s0513a1:925_3: pākaṭo, amhākampetaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathethā”ti. “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇāthā”ti bhagavā
atk-s0513a1:925_4: tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satuppādaṃ janetvā bhavantarena paṭicchannakāraṇaṃ pākaṭamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:926_0: Atīte kāsiraṭṭhe bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto satthavāhakule
atk-s0513a1:926_1: paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā vayappatto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi vaṇijjaṃ karonto vicarati. So
atk-s0513a1:926_2: ekadā saṭṭhiyojanikaṃ marukantāraṃ paṭipajji. Tasmiṃ kantāre sukhumavālukā muṭṭhinā
atk-s0513a1:926_3: gahitā hatthe na tiṭṭhati, sūriyuggamanato paṭṭhāya aṅgārarāsi viya uṇhā hoti, na
atk-s0513a1:926_4: sakkā akkamituṃ. Tasmā taṃ paṭipajjantā dārudakatilataṇḍulādīni sakaṭehi ādāya rattimeva
atk-s0513a1:926_5: gantvā aruṇuggamane sakaṭāni parivaṭṭaṃ katvā matthake maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā kālasseva
atk-s0513a1:926_6: āhārakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā chāyāya nisinnā divasaṃ khepetvā atthaṅgate sūriye sāyamāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:926_7: bhuñjitvā bhūmiyā sītalāya jātāya sakaṭāni yojetvā gacchanti, samuddagamanasadisameva
atk-s0513a1:926_8: gamanaṃ hoti. Thalaniyāmako nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, so tārakasaññā satthaṃ tāreti.
atk-s0513a1:927_0: Sopi satthavāho tasmiṃ kāle imināva niyāmena taṃ kantāraṃ gacchanto ekūnasaṭṭhi yojanāni
atk-s0513a1:927_1: gantvā “idāni ekaratteneva marukantārā nikkhamanaṃ bhavissatī”ti sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0513a1:927_2: sabbaṃ dārudakaṃ khepetvā sakaṭāni yojetvā pāyāsi. Niyāmako pana purimasakaṭe āsanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:927_3: pattharāpetvā ākāse tārakaṃ olokento “ito pājetha, ito pājethā”ti vadamāno nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:927_4: So dīghamaddhānaṃ aniddāyanabhāvena kilanto niddaṃ okkami, goṇe nivattitvā āgatamaggameva
atk-s0513a1:927_5: gaṇhante na aññāsi. Goṇā sabbarattiṃ agamaṃsu. Niyāmako aruṇuggamanavelāya pabuddho
atk-s0513a1:927_6: nakkhattaṃ oloketvā “sakaṭāni nivattetha nivattethā”ti āha. Sakaṭāni nivattetvā paṭipāṭiṃ
atk-s0513a1:927_7: karontānaññeva aruṇo uggato. Manussā “hiyyo amhākaṃ niviṭṭhakhandhāvāraṭṭhānamevetaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:927_8: dārudakampi no khīṇaṃ, idāni naṭṭhamhā”ti sakaṭāni mocetvā parivaṭṭakena ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:927_9: matthake maṇḍapaṃ katvā attano attano sakaṭassa heṭṭhā anusocantā nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:928_0: Bodhisatto “mayi vīriyaṃ ossajante sabbe vinassissantī”ti pāto sītalavelāyameva āhiṇḍanto
atk-s0513a1:928_1: ekaṃ dabbatiṇagacchaṃ disvā “imāni tiṇāni heṭṭhā udakasinehena uṭṭhitāni bhavissantī”ti
atk-s0513a1:928_2: cintetvā kuddālaṃ gāhāpetvā taṃ padesaṃ khaṇāpesi, te saṭṭhihatthaṭṭhānaṃ khaṇiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:928_3: Ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ khaṇitvā paharantānaṃ kuddālo heṭṭhāpāsāṇe paṭihaññi, pahaṭamatte
atk-s0513a1:928_4: sabbe vīriyaṃ ossajiṃsu. Bodhisatto pana “imassa pāsāṇassa heṭṭhā udakena bhavitabba”nti
atk-s0513a1:928_5: otaritvā pāsāṇe ṭhito oṇamitvā sotaṃ odahitvā saddaṃ āvajjento heṭṭhā udakassa pavattanasaddaṃ
atk-s0513a1:928_6: sutvā uttaritvā cūḷupaṭṭhākaṃ āha – “tāta, tayā vīriye ossaṭṭhe sabbe vinassissāma,
atk-s0513a1:928_7: tvaṃ vīriyaṃ anossajanto imaṃ ayakūṭaṃ gahetvā āvāṭaṃ otaritvā etasmiṃ pāsāṇe pahāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:928_8: dehī”ti. So tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sabbesu vīriyaṃ ossajitvā ṭhitesupi vīriyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:928_9: anossajanto otaritvā pāsāṇe pahāraṃ adāsi. Pāsāṇo majjhe bhijjitvā heṭṭhā patitvā
atk-s0513a1:928_10: sotaṃ sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsi, tālakkhandhappamāṇā udakavaṭṭi uggañchi. Sabbe pānīyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:928_11: pivitvā nhāyiṃsu, atirekāni akkhayugādīni phāletvā yāgubhattaṃ pacitvā bhuñjitvā
atk-s0513a1:928_12: goṇe ca bhojetvā sūriye atthaṅgate udakāvāṭasamīpe dhajaṃ bandhitvā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:928_13: agamaṃsu. Te tattha bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā diguṇaṃ tiguṇaṃ catugguṇaṃ lābhaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0513a1:928_14: attano vasanaṭṭhānameva agamaṃsu. Te tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gatā,
atk-s0513a1:928_15: bodhisattopi dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:929: Sammāsambuddho imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ kathetvā abhisambuddhova imaṃ gāthaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0513a1:931: “Akilāsuno vaṇṇupathe khaṇantā, udaṅgaṇe tattha papaṃ avinduṃ;
atk-s0513a1:932: Evaṃ munī vīriyabalūpapanno, akilāsu vinde hadayassa santi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:933_0: Tattha akilāsunoti nikkosajjā āraddhavīriyā. Vaṇṇupatheti vaṇṇu vuccati vālukā, vālukāmaggeti
atk-s0513a1:933_1: attho. Khaṇantāti bhūmiṃ khaṇamānā. Udaṅgaṇeti ettha udāti nipāto, aṅgaṇeti manussānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:933_2: sañcaraṇaṭṭhāne, anāvāṭe bhūmibhāgeti attho. Tatthāti tasmiṃ vaṇṇupathe. Papaṃ avindunti
atk-s0513a1:933_3: udakaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu. Udakañhi papīyanabhāvena “papā”ti vuccati. Pavaddhaṃ vā āpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:934_0: Evanti opammapaṭipādanaṃ. Munīti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, kāyamoneyyādīsu vā aññataraṃ,
atk-s0513a1:934_1: tena samannāgatattā puggalo “munī”ti vuccati. So panesa agāriyamuni, anagāriyamuni,
atk-s0513a1:934_2: sekkhamuni, asekkhamuni, paccekabuddhamuni, munimunīti anekavidho. Tattha agāriyamunīti
atk-s0513a1:934_3: gihī āgataphalo viññātasāsano. Anagāriyamunīti tathārūpova pabbajito. Sekkhamunīti
atk-s0513a1:934_4: satta sekkhā. Asekkhamunīti khīṇāsavo. Paccekabuddhamunīti paccekasambuddho. Munimunīti
atk-s0513a1:934_5: sammāsambuddho. Imasmiṃ panatthe sabbasaṅgāhakavasena moneyyasaṅkhātāya paññāya samannāgato
atk-s0513a1:934_6: “munī”ti veditabbo. Vīriyabalūpapannoti vīriyena ceva kāyabalañāṇabalena ca samannāgato.
atk-s0513a1:935: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatu;
atk-s0513a1:937_0: Evaṃ vuttena caturaṅgasamannāgatena vīriyena samannāgatattā analaso. Vinde hadayassa
atk-s0513a1:937_1: santinti cittassapi hadayarūpassapi sītalabhāvakaraṇena “santi”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ
atk-s0513a1:938_0: “Dukkhaṃ, bhikkhave, kusīto viharati vokiṇṇo pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi, mahantañca
atk-s0513a1:938_1: sadatthaṃ parihāpeti. Āraddhavīriyo ca kho, bhikkhave, sukhaṃ viharati pavivitto
atk-s0513a1:938_2: pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi, mahantañca sadatthaṃ paripūreti, na, bhikkhave, hīnena
atk-s0513a1:939_0: Evaṃ anekehi suttehi kusītassa dukkhavihāro, āraddhavīriyassa ca sukhavihāro saṃvaṇṇito.
atk-s0513a1:939_1: Idhāpi āraddhavīriyassa akatābhinivesassa vipassakassa vīriyabalena adhigantabbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:939_2: tameva sukhavihāraṃ dassento “evaṃ munī vīriyabalūpapanno, akilāsu vinde hadayassa
atk-s0513a1:939_3: santi”nti āha. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā te vāṇijā akilāsuno vaṇṇupathe khaṇantā udakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:939_4: labhiṃsu, evaṃ imasmimpi sāsane akilāsu hutvā vāyamamāno paṇḍito bhikkhu imaṃ jhānādibhedaṃ
atk-s0513a1:939_5: hadayassa santiṃ labhati. So tvaṃ bhikkhu pubbe udakamattassa atthāya vīriyaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:939_6: idāni evarūpe maggaphaladāyake niyyānikasāsane kasmā vīriyaṃ ossajasīti evaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:939_7: dhammadesanaṃ dassetvā cattāri saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne ossaṭṭhavīriyo bhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:940_0: Satthāpi dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānetvā dassesi “tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:940_1: samaye vīriyaṃ anossajitvā pāsāṇaṃ bhinditvā mahājanassa udakadāyako cūḷupaṭṭhāko
atk-s0513a1:940_2: ayaṃ ossaṭṭhavīriyo bhikkhu ahosi, avasesaparisā idāni buddhaparisā jātā, satthavāhajeṭṭhako
atk-s0513a1:944_0: Idha ce naṃ virādhesīti imampi dhammadesanaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto ekaṃ ossaṭṭhavīriyameva
atk-s0513a1:944_1: bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. Tañhi purimanayeneva bhikkhūhi ānītaṃ disvā satthā āha
atk-s0513a1:944_2: – “tvaṃ bhikkhu, evarūpe maggaphaladāyake sāsane pabbajitvā vīriyaṃ ossajanto satasahassagghanikāya
atk-s0513a1:944_3: kañcanapātiyā parihīno serivavāṇijo viya ciraṃ socissasī”ti. Bhikkhū tassatthassa
atk-s0513a1:944_4: āvibhāvatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu, bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannakāraṇaṃ pākaṭamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:945_0: Atīte ito pañcame kappe bodhisatto serivaraṭṭhe kacchapuṭavāṇijo ahosi. So serivanāmakena
atk-s0513a1:945_1: ekena lolakacchapuṭavāṇijena saddhiṃ vohāratthāya gacchanto nīlavāhaṃ nāma nadiṃ
atk-s0513a1:945_2: uttaritvā ariṭṭhapuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ pavisanto nagaravīthiyo bhājetvā attano pattavīthiyā
atk-s0513a1:945_3: bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇanto vicari. Itaropi attano pattavīthiṃ gaṇhi. Tasmiñca nagare ekaṃ
atk-s0513a1:945_4: seṭṭhikulaṃ parijiṇṇaṃ ahosi, sabbe puttabhātikā ca dhanañca parikkhayaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:945_5: ekā dārikā ayyikāya saddhiṃ avasesā ahosi, tā dvepi paresaṃ bhatiṃ katvā jīvanti.
atk-s0513a1:945_6: Gehe pana tāsaṃ mahāseṭṭhinā paribhuttapubbā suvaṇṇapāti bhājanantare nikkhittā dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:945_7: avalañjiyamānā malaggahitā ahosi, tā tassā suvaṇṇapātibhāvampi na jānanti. So lolavāṇijo
atk-s0513a1:945_8: tasmiṃ samaye “maṇike gaṇhatha, maṇike gaṇhathā”ti vicaranto taṃ gharadvāraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:945_9: Sā kumārikā taṃ disvā ayyikaṃ āha “amma mayhaṃ ekaṃ piḷandhanaṃ gaṇhā”ti. Amma mayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:945_10: duggatā, kiṃ datvā gaṇhissāmāti. Ayaṃ no pāti atthi, no ca amhākaṃ upakārā, imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:945_11: datvā gaṇhāti. Sā vāṇijaṃ pakkosāpetvā āsane nisīdāpetvā taṃ pātiṃ datvā “ayya, imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:945_12: gahetvā tava bhaginiyā kiñcideva dehī”ti āha. Vāṇijo pātiṃ hatthena gahetvāva “suvaṇṇapāti
atk-s0513a1:945_13: bhavissatī”ti parivattetvā pātipiṭṭhiyaṃ sūciyā lekhaṃ kaḍḍhitvā suvaṇṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0513a1:945_14: “imāsaṃ kiñci adatvāva imaṃ pātiṃ harissāmī”ti “ayaṃ kiṃ agghati, aḍḍhamāsakopissā
atk-s0513a1:945_15: mūlaṃ na hotī”ti bhūmiyaṃ khipitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. Ekena pavisitvā nikkhantavīthiṃ
atk-s0513a1:945_16: itaro pavisituṃ labhatīti bodhisatto taṃ vīthiṃ pavisitvā “maṇike gaṇhatha, maṇike
atk-s0513a1:946_0: Puna sā kumārikā tatheva ayyikaṃ āha. Atha naṃ ayyikā “amma, paṭhamaṃ āgatavāṇijo
atk-s0513a1:946_1: pātiṃ bhūmiyaṃ khipitvā gato, idāni kiṃ datvā gaṇhissāmā”ti āha. Amma, so vāṇijo
atk-s0513a1:946_2: pharusavāco, ayaṃ pana piyadassano mudusallāpo, appeva nāma naṃ gaṇheyyāti. Amma,
atk-s0513a1:946_3: tena hi pakkosāhīti. Sā taṃ pakkosi. Athassa gehaṃ pavisitvā nisinnassa taṃ pātiṃ
atk-s0513a1:946_4: adaṃsu. So tassā suvaṇṇapātibhāvaṃ ñatvā “amma, ayaṃ pāti satasahassaṃ agghati, satasahassagghanakabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a1:946_5: mayhaṃ hatthe natthī”ti āha. Ayya, paṭhamaṃ āgatavāṇijo “ayaṃ aḍḍhamāsakampi na agghatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:946_6: vatvā bhūmiyaṃ khipitvā gato, ayaṃ pana tava puññena suvaṇṇapāti jātā bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:946_7: mayaṃ imaṃ tuyhaṃ dema, kiñcideva no datvā imaṃ gahetvā yāhīti. Bodhisatto tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:946_8: khaṇe hatthagatāni pañca kahāpaṇasatāni pañcasatagghanakañca bhaṇḍaṃ sabbaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a1:946_9: “mayhaṃ imaṃ tulañca pasibbakañca aṭṭha ca kahāpaṇe dethā”ti ettakaṃ yācitvā ādāya
atk-s0513a1:946_10: pakkāmi. So sīghameva nadītīraṃ gantvā nāvikassa aṭṭha kahāpaṇe datvā nāvaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a1:947_0: Tato lolavāṇijopi puna taṃ gehaṃ gantvā “āharatha taṃ pātiṃ, tumhākaṃ kiñcideva dassāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:947_1: āha. Sā taṃ paribhāsitvā “tvaṃ amhākaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ aḍḍhamāsagghanikampi
atk-s0513a1:947_2: na akāsi, tuyhaṃ pana sāmikasadiso eko dhammiko vāṇijo amhākaṃ sahassaṃ datvā taṃ
atk-s0513a1:947_3: ādāya gato”ti āha. Taṃ sutvāva “satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇapātiyā parihīnomhi,
atk-s0513a1:947_4: mahājānikaro vata me aya”nti sañjātabalavasoko satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkonto visaññī
atk-s0513a1:947_5: hutvā attano hatthagate kahāpaṇe ceva bhaṇḍikañca gharadvāreyeva vikiritvā nivāsanapārupanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:947_6: pahāya tulādaṇḍaṃ muggaraṃ katvā ādāya bodhisattassa anupadaṃ pakkanto nadītīraṃ
atk-s0513a1:947_7: gantvā bodhisattaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā “ambho, nāvika, nāvaṃ nivattehī”ti āha. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:947_8: pana “tāta, mā nivattayī”ti paṭisedhesi. Itarassapi bodhisattaṃ gacchantaṃ passantasseva
atk-s0513a1:947_9: balavasoko udapādi, hadayaṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi, mukhato lohitaṃ uggañchi, vāpikaddamo viya
atk-s0513a1:947_10: hadayaṃ phali. So bodhisatte āghātaṃ bandhitvā tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi. Idaṃ
atk-s0513a1:947_11: paṭhamaṃ devadattassa bodhisatte āghātabandhanaṃ. Bodhisatto dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:948: Sammāsambuddho imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ kathetvā abhisambuddhova imaṃ gāthaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0513a1:952_0: Tattha idha ce naṃ virādhesi, saddhammassa niyāmatanti imasmiṃ sāsane etaṃ saddhammassa
atk-s0513a1:952_1: niyāmatāsaṅkhātaṃ sotāpattimaggaṃ virādhesi. Yadi virādhesi, vīriyaṃ ossajanto nādhigacchasi
atk-s0513a1:952_2: na paṭilabhasīti attho. Ciraṃ tvaṃ anutappesīti evaṃ sante tvaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ socanto
atk-s0513a1:952_3: paridevanto anutapessasi, atha vā ossaṭṭhavīriyatāya ariyamaggassa virādhitattā dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:952_4: nirayādīsu uppanno nānappakārāni dukkhāni anubhavanto anutappissasi kilamissasīti
atk-s0513a1:952_5: ayamettha attho. Kathaṃ? Serivāyaṃva vāṇijoti “serivā”ti evaṃnāmako ayaṃ vāṇijo yathā.
atk-s0513a1:952_6: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā pubbe serivanāmako vāṇijo satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ
atk-s0513a1:952_7: labhitvā tassā gahaṇatthāya vīriyaṃ akatvā tato parihīno anutappi, evameva tvampi
atk-s0513a1:952_8: imasmiṃ sāsane paṭiyattasuvaṇṇapātisadisaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ossaṭṭhavīriyatāya anadhigacchanto
atk-s0513a1:952_9: tato parihīno dīgharattaṃ anutappissasi. Sace pana vīriyaṃ na ossajissasi, paṇḍitavāṇijo
atk-s0513a1:952_10: suvaṇṇapātiṃ viya mama sāsane navavidhampi lokuttaradhammaṃ paṭilabhissasīti.
atk-s0513a1:953: Evamassa satthā arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ dassetvā cattāri saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne ossaṭṭhavīriyo bhikkhu aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:954: Satthāpi dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānetvā dassesi – “tadā bālavāṇijo devadatto ahosi, paṇḍitavāṇijo pana ahameva ahosi”nti desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:958: Appakenapi medhāvīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ bhagavā rājagahaṃ upanissāya jīvakambavane viharanto cūḷapanthakattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:959_0: Tattha cūḷapanthakassa tāva nibbatti kathetabbā. Rājagahe kira dhanaseṭṭhikulassa
atk-s0513a1:959_1: dhītā attano dāseneva saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā “aññepi me imaṃ kammaṃ jāneyyu”nti
atk-s0513a1:959_2: bhītā evamāha “amhehi imasmiṃ ṭhāne vasituṃ na sakkā, sace me mātāpitaro imaṃ dosaṃ
atk-s0513a1:959_3: jānissanti, khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ karissanti, videsaṃ gantvā vasissāmā”ti hatthasāraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:959_4: aggadvārena nikkhamitvā “yattha vā tattha vā aññehi ajānanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vasissāmā”ti ubhopi agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:960_0: Tesaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ saṃvāsamanvāya tassā kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:960_1: Sā gabbhaparipākaṃ āgamma sāmikena saddhiṃ mantesi “gabbho me paripākaṃ gato, ñātibandhuvirahite
atk-s0513a1:960_2: ṭhāne gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ nāma ubhinnampi amhākaṃ dukkhameva, kulagehameva gacchāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:960_3: So “sacāhaṃ gamissāmi, jīvitaṃ me natthī”ti cintetvā “ajja gacchāma, sve gacchāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:960_4: divase atikkāmesi. Sā cintesi “ayaṃ bālo attano dosamahantatāya gantuṃ na ussahati,
atk-s0513a1:960_5: mātāpitaro nāma ekantahitā, ayaṃ gacchatu vā mā vā, mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Sā tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:960_6: gehā nikkhante gehaparikkhāraṃ paṭisāmetvā attano kulagharaṃ gatabhāvaṃ anantaragehavāsīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:961_0: Atha so puriso gharaṃ āgato taṃ adisvā paṭivissake pucchitvā “kulagharaṃ gatā”ti
atk-s0513a1:961_1: sutvā vegena anubandhitvā antarāmagge sampāpuṇi. Tassāpi tattheva gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:961_2: ahosi. So “kiṃ idaṃ bhadde”ti pucchi. “Sāmi, eko putto jāto”ti. “Idāni kiṃ karissāmā”ti?
atk-s0513a1:961_3: “Yassatthāya mayaṃ kulagharaṃ gaccheyyāma, taṃ kammaṃ antarāva nipphannaṃ, tattha
atk-s0513a1:961_4: gantvā kiṃ karissāma, nivattāmā”ti dvepi ekacittā hutvā nivattiṃsu. Tassa ca dārakassa
atk-s0513a1:961_5: panthe jātattā “panthako”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Tassā na cirasseva aparopi gabbho patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a1:961_6: Sabbaṃ purimanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ. Tassāpi dārakassa panthe jātattā paṭhamajātassa
atk-s0513a1:961_7: “mahāpanthako”ti nāmaṃ katvā itarassa “cūḷapanthako”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Te dvepi dārake
atk-s0513a1:962_0: Tesaṃ tattha vasantānaṃ ayaṃ mahāpanthakadārako aññe dārake “cūḷapitā mahāpitā”ti,
atk-s0513a1:962_1: “ayyako ayyikā”ti ca vadante sutvā mātaraṃ pucchi “amma, aññe dārakā ‘cūḷapitā mahāpitā’tipi
atk-s0513a1:962_2: vadanti, ‘ayyako ayyikā’tipi vadanti, amhākaṃ ñātakā natthī”ti. “Āma, tāta, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:962_3: ettha ñātakā natthi, rājagahanagare pana vo dhanaseṭṭhi nāma ayyako, tattha tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:962_4: bahū ñātakā”ti. “Kasmā tattha na gacchatha, ammā”ti? Sā attano agamanakāraṇaṃ puttassa
atk-s0513a1:962_5: akathetvā puttesu punappunaṃ kathentesu sāmikaṃ āha – “ime dārakā maṃ ativiya kilamenti,
atk-s0513a1:962_6: kiṃ no mātāpitaro disvā maṃsaṃ khādissanti, ehi dārakānaṃ ayyakakulaṃ dassessāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:962_7: “Ahaṃ sammukhā bhavituṃ na sakkhissāmi, taṃ pana tattha nayissāmī”ti. “Sādhu, ayya,
atk-s0513a1:962_8: yena kenaci upāyena dārakānaṃ ayyakakulameva daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti dvepi janā dārake
atk-s0513a1:962_9: ādāya anupubbena rājagahaṃ patvā nagaradvāre ekissā sālāya nivāsaṃ katvā dārakamātā
atk-s0513a1:962_10: dve dārake gahetvā āgatabhāvaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:963_0: Te taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā “saṃsāre vicarantānaṃ na putto na dhītā nāma natthi, te amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:963_1: mahāparādhikā, na sakkā tehi amhākaṃ cakkhupathe ṭhātuṃ, ettakaṃ pana dhanaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:963_2: dvepi janā phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā jīvantu, dārake pana idha pesentū”ti. Seṭṭhidhītā
atk-s0513a1:963_3: mātāpitūhi pesitaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā dārake āgatadūtānaṃyeva hatthe datvā pesesi, dārakā
atk-s0513a1:963_4: ayyakakule vaḍḍhanti. Tesu cūḷapanthako atidaharo, mahāpanthako pana ayyakena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:963_5: dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ gacchati. Tassa niccaṃ satthu sammukhā dhammaṃ suṇantassa
atk-s0513a1:963_6: pabbajjāya cittaṃ nami. So ayyakaṃ āha “sace tumhe sampaṭicchatha, ahaṃ pabbajeyya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:963_7: “Kiṃ vadesi, tāta, mayhaṃ sakalalokassapi pabbajjāto taveva pabbajjā bhaddikā, sace
atk-s0513a1:963_8: sakkosi, pabbaja tātā”ti sampaṭicchitvā satthu santikaṃ gato. Satthā “kiṃ mahāseṭṭhi
atk-s0513a1:963_9: dārako te laddho”ti. “Āma, bhante ayaṃ dārako mayhaṃ nattā, tumhākaṃ santike pabbajāmīti
atk-s0513a1:963_10: vadatī”ti āha. Satthā aññataraṃ piṇḍacārikaṃ bhikkhuṃ “imaṃ dārakaṃ pabbājehī”ti
atk-s0513a1:963_11: āṇāpesi. Thero tassa tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā pabbājesi. So bahuṃ buddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:963_12: uggaṇhitvā paripuṇṇavasso upasampadaṃ labhi. Upasampanno hutvā yoniso manasikāre
atk-s0513a1:964_0: So jhānasukhena, maggasukhena, phalasukhena vītināmento cintesi “sakkā nu kho imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:964_1: sukhaṃ cūḷapanthakassa dātu”nti. Tato ayyakaseṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā “mahāseṭṭhi
atk-s0513a1:964_2: sace tumhe sampaṭicchatha, ahaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ pabbājeyya”nti āha. “Pabbājetha, bhante”ti.
atk-s0513a1:964_3: Thero cūḷapanthakadārakaṃ pabbājetvā dasasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi. Cūḷapanthakasāmaṇero
atk-s0513a1:965: “Padumaṃ yathā kokanadaṃ sugandhaṃ, pāto siyā phullamavītagandhaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:967_0: Imaṃ ekagāthaṃ catūhi māsehi gaṇhituṃ nāsakkhi. So kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle
atk-s0513a1:967_1: pabbajitvā paññavā hutvā aññatarassa dandhabhikkhuno uddesaggahaṇakāle parihāsakeḷiṃ
atk-s0513a1:967_2: akāsi. So bhikkhu tena parihāsena lajjito neva uddesaṃ gaṇhi, na sajjhāyamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:967_3: Tena kammena ayaṃ pabbajitvāva dandho jāto, gahitagahitaṃ padaṃ uparūpari padaṃ gaṇhantassa
atk-s0513a1:967_4: nassati. Tassa imameva gāthaṃ gahetuṃ vāyamantassa cattāro māsā atikkantā.
atk-s0513a1:968_0: Atha naṃ mahāpanthako āha “cūḷapanthaka, tvaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane abhabbo, catūhi māsehi
atk-s0513a1:968_1: ekampi gāthaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkosi, pabbajitakiccaṃ pana tvaṃ kathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessasi,
atk-s0513a1:968_2: nikkhama ito”ti vihārā nikkaḍḍhi. Cūḷapanthako buddhasāsane sinehena gihibhāvaṃ na
atk-s0513a1:968_3: pattheti. Tasmiñca kāle mahāpanthako bhattuddesako hoti. Jīvako komārabhacco bahuṃ
atk-s0513a1:968_4: gandhamālaṃ ādāya attano ambavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pūjetvā dhammaṃ sutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0513a1:968_5: dasabalaṃ vanditvā mahāpanthakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kittakā, bhante, satthu santike bhikkhū”ti
atk-s0513a1:968_6: pucchi. “Pañcamattāni bhikkhusatānī”ti. “Sve, bhante, buddhappamukhāni pañca bhikkhusatāni
atk-s0513a1:968_7: ādāya amhākaṃ nivesane bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti. “Upāsaka, cūḷapanthako nāma bhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:968_8: dandho aviruḷhidhammo, taṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ nimantanaṃ sampaṭicchāmī”ti thero āha.
atk-s0513a1:968_9: Taṃ sutvā cūḷapanthako cintesi “thero ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nimantanaṃ sampaṭicchanto
atk-s0513a1:968_10: maṃ bāhiraṃ katvā sampaṭicchati, nissaṃsayaṃ mayhaṃ bhātikassa mayi cittaṃ bhinnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:968_11: bhavissati, kiṃ idāni mayhaṃ iminā sāsanena, gihī hutvā dānādīni puññāni karonto jīvissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:969_0: So punadivase pātova “gihī bhavissāmī”ti pāyāsi. Satthā paccūsakāleyeva lokaṃ olokento
atk-s0513a1:969_1: imaṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā paṭhamataraṃ gantvā cūḷapanthakassa gamanamagge dvārakoṭṭhake
atk-s0513a1:969_2: caṅkamanto aṭṭhāsi. Cūḷapanthako gharaṃ gacchanto satthāraṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vandi.
atk-s0513a1:969_3: Atha naṃ satthā “kahaṃ pana, tvaṃ cūḷapanthaka, imāya velāya gacchasī”ti āha. Bhātā
atk-s0513a1:969_4: maṃ, bhante, nikkaḍḍhati, tenāhaṃ vibbhamituṃ gacchāmīti. Cūḷapanthaka, tava pabbajjā
atk-s0513a1:969_5: nāma mama santakā, bhātarā nikkaḍḍhito kasmā mama santikaṃ nāgañchi? Ehi kiṃ te gihibhāvena,
atk-s0513a1:969_6: mama santike bhavissasī”ti bhagavā cūḷapanthakaṃ ādāya gantvā gandhakuṭippamukhe
atk-s0513a1:969_7: nisīdāpetvā “cūḷapanthaka, tvaṃ puratthābhimukho hutvā imaṃ pilotikaṃ ‘rajoharaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:969_8: rajoharaṇa’nti parimajjanto idheva hohī”ti iddhiyā abhisaṅkhataṃ parisuddhaṃ pilotikākhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a1:969_9: datvā kāle ārocite bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto jīvakassa gehaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:970_0: Cūḷapanthakopi sūriyaṃ olokento taṃ pilotikākhaṇḍaṃ “rajoharaṇaṃ rajoharaṇa”nti parimajjanto
atk-s0513a1:970_1: nisīdi, tassa taṃ pilotikākhaṇḍaṃ parimajjantassa parimajjantassa kiliṭṭhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:970_2: Tato cintesi “idaṃ pilotikākhaṇḍaṃ ativiya parisuddhaṃ, imaṃ pana attabhāvaṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a1:970_3: purimapakatiṃ vijahitvā evaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ jātaṃ, aniccā vata saṅkhārā”ti khayavayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:970_4: paṭṭhapento vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhesi. Satthā “cūḷapanthakassa cittaṃ vipassanaṃ āruḷha”nti
atk-s0513a1:970_5: ñatvā “cūḷapanthaka, tvaṃ etaṃ pilotikākhaṇḍameva saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ rajorañjitaṃ jātanti
atk-s0513a1:970_6: mā saññaṃ kari, abbhantare pana te rāgarajādayo atthi, te harāhī”ti vatvā obhāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:970_7: vissajjetvā purato nisinno viya paññāyamānarūpo hutvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a1:971: “Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati, rāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ rajoti;
atk-s0513a1:972: Etaṃ rajaṃ vippajahitva bhikkhavo, viharanti te vigatarajassa sāsane.
atk-s0513a1:973: “Doso rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati, dosassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ rajoti;
atk-s0513a1:974: Etaṃ rajaṃ vippajahitva bhikkhavo, viharanti te vigatarajassa sāsane.
atk-s0513a1:975: “Moho rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati, mohassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ rajoti;
atk-s0513a1:976: Etaṃ rajaṃ vippajahitva bhikkhavo, viharanti te vigatarajassa sāsane”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:977_0: Gāthāpariyosāne cūḷapanthako saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, paṭisambhidāhiyevassa
atk-s0513a1:977_1: tīṇi piṭakāni āgamaṃsu. So kira pubbe rājā hutvā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto nalāṭato
atk-s0513a1:977_2: sede muccante parisuddhena sāṭakena nalāṭantaṃ puñchi, sāṭako kiliṭṭho ahosi. So
atk-s0513a1:977_3: “imaṃ sarīraṃ nissāya evarūpo parisuddho sāṭako pakatiṃ jahitvā kiliṭṭho jāto, aniccā
atk-s0513a1:977_4: vata saṅkhārā”ti aniccasaññaṃ paṭilabhi. Tena kāraṇenassa rajoharaṇameva paccayo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:978_0: Jīvakopi kho komārabhacco dasabalassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ upanāmesi. Satthā “nanu, jīvaka,
atk-s0513a1:978_1: vihāre bhikkhū atthī”ti hatthena pattaṃ pidahi. Mahāpanthako “bhante, vihāre natthi
atk-s0513a1:978_2: bhikkhū”ti āha. Satthā “atthi jīvakā”ti āha. Jīvako “tena hi, bhaṇe, gaccha, vihāre
atk-s0513a1:978_3: bhikkhūnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ vā natthibhāvaṃ vā jānāhī”ti purisaṃ pesesi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0513a1:978_4: cūḷapanthako “mayhaṃ bhātiko ‘vihāre bhikkhū natthī’ti bhaṇati, vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:978_5: atthibhāvamassa pakāsessāmī”ti sakalaṃ ambavanaṃ bhikkhūnaṃyeva pūresi. Ekacce bhikkhū
atk-s0513a1:978_6: cīvarakammaṃ karonti, ekacce rajanakammaṃ, ekacce sajjhāyaṃ karontīti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:978_7: asadisaṃ bhikkhusahassaṃ māpesi. So puriso vihāre bahū bhikkhū disvā nivattitvā “ayya,
atk-s0513a1:978_8: sakalaṃ ambavanaṃ bhikkhūhi paripuṇṇa”nti jīvakassa ārocesi. Theropi kho tattheva –
atk-s0513a1:981_0: Atha satthā taṃ purisaṃ āha – “vihāraṃ gantvā ‘satthā cūḷapanthakaṃ nāma pakkosatī’ti
atk-s0513a1:981_1: vadehī”ti. Tena gantvā tathāvutte “ahaṃ cūḷapanthako, ahaṃ cūḷapanthako”ti mukhasahassaṃ
atk-s0513a1:981_2: uṭṭhahi. Puriso gantvā “sabbepi kira te, bhante, cūḷapanthakāyeva nāmā”ti āha. Tena
atk-s0513a1:981_3: hi tvaṃ gantvā yo paṭhamaṃ “ahaṃ cūḷapanthako”ti vadati, taṃ hatthe gaṇha, avasesā
atk-s0513a1:981_4: antaradhāyissantīti. So tathā akāsi, tāvadeva sahassamattā bhikkhū antaradhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:981_5: Thero tena purisena saddhiṃ agamāsi. Satthā bhattakiccapariyosāne jīvakaṃ āmantesi
atk-s0513a1:981_6: “jīvaka, cūḷapanthakassa pattaṃ gaṇha, ayaṃ te anumodanaṃ karissatī”ti. Jīvako tathā
atk-s0513a1:981_7: akāsi. Thero sīhanādaṃ nadanto taruṇasīho viya tīṇi piṭakāni saṃkhobhetvā anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:982_0: Satthā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhūhi vatte dassite uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0513a1:982_1: gandhakuṭippamukhe ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghassa sugatovādaṃ datvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0513a1:982_2: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ uyyojetvā surabhigandhavāsitaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā dakkhiṇena passena
atk-s0513a1:982_3: sīhaseyyaṃ upagato. Atha sāyanhasamaye dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū ito cito ca samosaritvā
atk-s0513a1:982_4: rattakambalasāṇiṃ parikkhipantā viya nisīditvā satthu guṇakathaṃ ārabhiṃsu “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:982_5: mahāpanthako cūḷapanthakassa ajjhāsayaṃ ajānanto ‘catūhi māsehi ekagāthaṃ gaṇhituṃ
atk-s0513a1:982_6: na sakkoti, dandho aya’nti vihārā nikkaḍḍhi, sammāsambuddho pana attano anuttaradhammarājatāya
atk-s0513a1:982_7: ekasmiṃyevassa antarabhatte saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ adāsi, tīṇi piṭakāni paṭisambhidāhiyeva
atk-s0513a1:982_8: āgatāni, aho buddhānaṃ balaṃ nāma mahanta”nti.
atk-s0513a1:983_0: Atha bhagavā dhammasabhāyaṃ imaṃ kathāpavattiṃ ñatvā “ajja mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:983_1: buddhaseyyāya uṭṭhāya surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā vijjulataṃ viya kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:983_2: rattakambalasadisaṃ sugatamahācīvaraṃ pārupitvā surabhigandhakuṭito nikkhamma mattavāraṇo
atk-s0513a1:983_3: viya sīhavikkantavilāsena vijambhamāno sīho viya anantāya buddhalīlāya dhammasabhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:983_5: vissajjento aṇṇavakucchiṃ obhāsayamāno yugandharamatthake bālasūriyo viya āsanamajjhe
atk-s0513a1:983_6: nisīdi. Sammāsambuddhe pana āgatamatte bhikkhusaṅgho kathaṃ pacchinditvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:984_0: Satthā mudukena mettacittena parisaṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ parisā ativiya sobhati, ekassapi
atk-s0513a1:984_1: hatthakukkuccaṃ vā pādakukkuccaṃ vā ukkāsitasaddo vā khipitasaddo vā natthi, sabbepime
atk-s0513a1:984_2: buddhagāravena sagāravā buddhatejena tajjitā mayi āyukappampi akathetvā nisinne paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0513a1:984_3: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā na kathessanti, kathāsamuṭṭhāpanavattaṃ nāma mayāva jānitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:984_4: ahameva paṭhamaṃ kathessāmī”ti madhurena brahmassarena bhikkhū āmantetvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0513a1:984_5: bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā, kā ca pana vo antarākathā vippakatā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:984_6: Bhante, na mayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinnā aññaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathema, tumhākaṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:984_7: pana guṇe vaṇṇayamānā nisinnāmha “āvuso mahāpanthako cūḷapanthakassa ajjhāsayaṃ ajānanto
atk-s0513a1:984_8: ‘catūhi māsehi ekaṃ gāthaṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkoti, dandho aya’nti vihārā nikkaḍḍhi,
atk-s0513a1:984_9: sammāsambuddho pana anuttaradhammarājatāya ekasmiṃyevassa antarabhatte saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0513a1:984_10: arahattaṃ adāsi, aho buddhānaṃ balaṃ nāma mahanta”nti. Satthā bhikkhūnaṃ kathaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a1:984_11: “bhikkhave, cūḷapanthako maṃ nissāya idāni tāva dhammesu dhammamahantataṃ patto,
atk-s0513a1:984_12: pubbe pana maṃ nissāya bhogesupi bhogamahantataṃ pāpuṇī”ti āha. Bhikkhū tassatthassa
atk-s0513a1:984_13: āvibhāvatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu. Bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:985_0: Atīte kāsiraṭṭhe bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:985_1: vayappatto seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ labhitvā cūḷaseṭṭhi nāma ahosi, so paṇḍito byatto sabbanimittāni
atk-s0513a1:985_2: jānāti. So ekadivasaṃ rājupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto antaravīthiyaṃ matamūsikaṃ disvā taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0513a1:985_3: nakkhattaṃ samānetvā idamāha “sakkā cakkhumatā kulaputtena imaṃ undūraṃ gahetvā puttadārabharaṇañca
atk-s0513a1:985_4: kātuṃ kammante ca payojetu”nti? Aññataro duggatakulaputto taṃ seṭṭhissa vacanaṃ sutvā
