atk-s0513a1:985_5: “nāyaṃ ajānitvā kathessatī”ti taṃ mūsikaṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ āpaṇe biḷālassatthāya vikkiṇitvā
atk-s0513a1:985_6: kākaṇikaṃ labhitvā tāya kākaṇikāya phāṇitaṃ gahetvā ekena ghaṭena pānīyaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:985_7: So araññato āgacchante mālākāre disvā thokaṃ thokaṃ phāṇitakhaṇḍaṃ datvā uḷuṅkena
atk-s0513a1:985_8: pānīyaṃ adāsi, te cassa ekekaṃ pupphamuṭṭhiṃ adaṃsu. So tena pupphamūlena punadivasepi
atk-s0513a1:985_9: phāṇitañca pānīyaghaṭañca gahetvā pupphārāmameva gato. Tassa taṃ divasaṃ mālākārā
atk-s0513a1:985_10: aḍḍhocitake pupphagacche datvā agamaṃsu. So na cirasseva iminā upāyena aṭṭha kahāpaṇe labhi.
atk-s0513a1:986_0: Puna ekasmiṃ vātavuṭṭhidivase rājuyyāne bahū sukkhadaṇḍakā ca sākhā ca palāsañca
atk-s0513a1:986_1: vātena pātitaṃ hoti, uyyānapālo chaḍḍetuṃ upāyaṃ na passati. So tattha gantvā “sace
atk-s0513a1:986_2: imāni dārupaṇṇāni mayhaṃ dassasi, ahaṃ te imāni sabbāni nīharissāmī”ti uyyānapālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:986_3: āha, so “gaṇha ayyā”ti sampaṭicchi. Cūḷantevāsiko dārakānaṃ kīḷanamaṇḍalaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:986_4: phāṇitaṃ datvā muhuttena sabbāni dārupaṇṇāni nīharāpetvā uyyānadvāre rāsiṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:986_5: Tadā rājakumbhakāro rājakule bhājanānaṃ pacanatthāya dārūni pariyesamāno uyyānadvāre
atk-s0513a1:986_6: tāni disvā tassa hatthato kiṇitvā gaṇhi. Taṃ divasaṃ cūḷantevāsiko dāruvikkayena
atk-s0513a1:986_7: soḷasa kahāpaṇe cāṭiādīni ca pañca bhājanāni labhi.
atk-s0513a1:987_0: So catuvīsatiyā kahāpaṇesu jātesu “atthi ayaṃ upāyo mayha”nti nagaradvārato avidūre
atk-s0513a1:987_1: ṭhāne ekaṃ pānīyacāṭiṃ ṭhapetvā pañcasate tiṇahārake pānīyena upaṭṭhahi. Te āhaṃsu
atk-s0513a1:987_2: “samma, tvaṃ amhākaṃ bahūpakāro, kiṃ te karomā”ti? So “mayhaṃ kicce uppanne karissathā”ti
atk-s0513a1:987_3: vatvā ito cito ca vicaranto thalapathakammikena ca jalapathakammikena ca saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:987_4: mittasanthavaṃ akāsi. Tassa thalapathakammiko “sve imaṃ nagaraṃ assavāṇijako pañca
atk-s0513a1:987_5: assasatāni gahetvā āgamissatī”ti ācikkhi. So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tiṇahārake āha “ajja
atk-s0513a1:987_6: mayhaṃ ekekaṃ tiṇakalāpaṃ detha, mayā ca tiṇe avikkiṇite attano tiṇaṃ mā vikkiṇathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:987_7: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā pañca tiṇakalāpasatāni āharitvā tassa ghare pāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:987_8: Assavāṇijo sakalanagare assānaṃ gocaraṃ alabhitvā tassa sahassaṃ datvā taṃ tiṇaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:988_0: Tato katipāhaccayenassa jalapathakammiko sahāyako ārocesi “paṭṭanamhi mahānāvā āgatā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:988_1: So “atthi ayaṃ upāyo”ti aṭṭhahi kahāpaṇehi sabbaparivārasampannaṃ tāvakālikaṃ rathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:988_2: gahetvā mahantena yasena nāvāpaṭṭanaṃ gantvā ekaṃ aṅgulimuddikaṃ nāvikassa saccakāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:988_3: datvā avidūre ṭhāne sāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā nisinno purise āṇāpesi “bāhirato vāṇijesu
atk-s0513a1:988_4: āgatesu tatiyena paṭihārena maṃ ārocethā”ti. “Nāvā āgatā”ti sutvā bārāṇasito satamattā
atk-s0513a1:988_5: vāṇijā “bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāmā”ti āgamiṃsu. Bhaṇḍaṃ tumhe na labhissatha, asukaṭṭhāne nāma
atk-s0513a1:988_6: mahāvāṇijena saccakāro dinnoti. Te taṃ sutvā tassa santikaṃ āgatā. Pādamūlikapurisā
atk-s0513a1:988_7: purimasaññāvasena tatiyena paṭihārena tesaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ārocesuṃ. Te satamattā vāṇijā
atk-s0513a1:988_8: ekekaṃ sahassaṃ datvā tena saddhiṃ nāvāya pattikā hutvā puna ekekaṃ sahassaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a1:989_0: Cūḷantevāsiko dve satasahassāni gaṇhitvā bārāṇasiṃ āgantvā “kataññunā me bhavituṃ
atk-s0513a1:989_1: vaṭṭatī”ti ekaṃ satasahassaṃ gāhāpetvā cūḷaseṭṭhissa samīpaṃ gato. Atha naṃ seṭṭhi
atk-s0513a1:989_2: “kiṃ te, tāta, katvā idaṃ dhanaṃ laddha”nti pucchi. So “tumhehi kathitaupāye ṭhatvā
atk-s0513a1:989_3: catumāsambhantareyeva laddha”nti matamūsikaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ vatthuṃ kathesi. Cūḷaseṭṭhi
atk-s0513a1:989_4: tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “idāni evarūpaṃ dārakaṃ mama santakaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vayappattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:989_5: attano dhītaraṃ datvā sakalakuṭumbassa sāmikaṃ akāsi. So seṭṭhino accayena tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:989_6: nagare seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ labhi. Bodhisattopi yathākammaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:990: Sammāsambuddhopi imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ kathetvā abhisambuddhova imaṃ gāthaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0513a1:994_0: Tattha appakenapīti thokenapi parittakenapi. Medhāvīti paññavā. Pābhatenāti bhaṇḍamūlena.
atk-s0513a1:994_1: Vicakkhaṇoti vohārakusalo. Samuṭṭhāpeti attānanti mahantaṃ dhanañca yasañca uppādetvā
atk-s0513a1:994_2: tattha attānaṃ saṇṭhāpeti patiṭṭhāpeti. Yathā kiṃ? Aṇuṃ aggiṃva sandhamaṃ, yathā
atk-s0513a1:994_3: paṇḍitapuriso parittaṃ aggiṃ anukkamena gomayacuṇṇādīni pakkhipitvā mukhavātena dhamanto
atk-s0513a1:994_4: samuṭṭhāpeti vaḍḍheti mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ karoti, evameva paṇḍito thokampi pābhataṃ
atk-s0513a1:994_5: labhitvā nānāupāyehi payojetvā dhanañca yasañca vaḍḍheti, vaḍḍhetvā ca pana tattha
atk-s0513a1:994_6: attānaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti, tāya eva vā pana dhanayasamahantatāya attānaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
atk-s0513a1:995_0: Iti bhagavā “bhikkhave, cūḷapanthako maṃ nissāya idāni dhammesu dhammamahantataṃ
atk-s0513a1:995_1: patto, pubbe pana bhogesupi bhogamahantataṃ pāpuṇī”ti evaṃ imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0513a1:995_2: dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā cūḷantevāsiko
atk-s0513a1:995_3: cūḷapanthako ahosi, cūḷakaseṭṭhi pana ahameva ahosi”nti desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:999_0: Kimagghati taṇḍulanāḷikāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lāludāyittheraṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:999_1: kathesi. Tasmiṃ samaye āyasmā dabbo mallaputto saṅghassa bhattuddesako hoti. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:999_2: pātova salākabhattāni uddisamāne lāludāyittherassa kadāci varabhattaṃ pāpuṇāti, kadāci
atk-s0513a1:999_3: lāmakabhattaṃ. So lāmakabhattassa pattadivase salākaggaṃ ākulaṃ karoti, “kiṃ dabbova
atk-s0513a1:999_4: salākaṃ dātuṃ jānāti, amhe na jānāmā”ti vadati. Tasmiṃ salākaggaṃ ākulaṃ karonte
atk-s0513a1:999_5: “handa dāni tvameva salākaṃ dehī”ti salākapacchiṃ adaṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya so saṅghassa
atk-s0513a1:999_6: salākaṃ adāsi. Dento ca pana “idaṃ varabhatta”nti vā “lāmakabhatta”nti vā “asukavassagge
atk-s0513a1:999_7: varabhatta”nti vā “asukavassagge lāmakabhatta”nti vā na jānāti, ṭhitikaṃ karontopi
atk-s0513a1:999_8: “asukavassagge ṭhitikā”ti na sallakkheti. Bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhitavelāya “imasmiṃ ṭhāne ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:999_9: ṭhitikā ṭhitā, imasmiṃ ṭhāne aya”nti bhūmiyaṃ vā bhittiyaṃ vā lekhaṃ kaḍḍhati. Punadivase
atk-s0513a1:999_10: salākagge bhikkhū mandatarā vā honti bahutarā vā, tesu mandataresu lekhā heṭṭhā hoti,
atk-s0513a1:999_11: bahutaresu upari. So ṭhitikaṃ ajānanto lekhāsaññāya salākaṃ deti.
atk-s0513a1:1000_0: Atha naṃ bhikkhū “āvuso, udāyi, lekhā nāma heṭṭhā vā hoti upari vā, varabhattaṃ pana
atk-s0513a1:1000_1: asukavassagge ṭhitaṃ, lāmakabhattaṃ asukavassagge”ti āhaṃsu. So bhikkhū paṭippharanto
atk-s0513a1:1000_2: “yadi evaṃ ayaṃ lekhā kasmā evaṃ ṭhitā, kiṃ ahaṃ tumhākaṃ saddahāmi, imissā lekhāya
atk-s0513a1:1000_3: saddahāmī”ti vadati. Atha naṃ daharā ca sāmaṇerā ca “āvuso lāludāyi tayi salākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1000_4: dente bhikkhū lābhena parihāyanti, na tvaṃ dātuṃ anucchaviko, gaccha ito”ti salākaggato
atk-s0513a1:1000_5: nikkaḍḍhiṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe salākagge mahantaṃ kolāhalaṃ ahosi. Taṃ sutvā satthā ānandattheraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1000_6: pucchi “ānanda, salākagge mahantaṃ kolāhalaṃ, kiṃ saddo nāmeso”ti. Thero tathāgatassa
atk-s0513a1:1000_7: tamatthaṃ ārocesi. “Ānanda, na idāneva lāludāyi attano bālatāya paresaṃ lābhahāniṃ
atk-s0513a1:1000_8: karoti, pubbepi akāsiyevā”ti āha. Thero tassatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ yāci.
atk-s0513a1:1000_9: Bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1001_0: Atīte kāsiraṭṭhe bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto rājā ahosi. Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto tassa
atk-s0513a1:1001_1: agghāpaniko ahosi. Hatthiassādīni ceva maṇisuvaṇṇādīni ca agghāpesi, agghāpetvā bhaṇḍasāmikānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1001_2: bhaṇḍānurūpameva mūlaṃ dāpesi. Rājā pana luddho hoti, so lobhapakatitāya evaṃ cintesi
atk-s0513a1:1001_3: “ayaṃ agghāpaniko evaṃ agghāpento na cirasseva mama gehe dhanaṃ parikkhayaṃ gamessati,
atk-s0513a1:1001_4: aññaṃ agghāpanikaṃ karissāmī”ti. So sīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭetvā rājaṅgaṇaṃ olokento ekaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1001_5: gāmikamanussaṃ lolabālaṃ rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṃ disvā “esa mayhaṃ agghāpanikakammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1001_6: kātuṃ sakkhissatī”ti taṃ pakkosāpetvā “sakkhissasi, bhaṇe, amhākaṃ agghāpanikakammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1001_7: kātu”nti āha. Sakkhissāmi, devāti. Rājā attano dhanarakkhaṇatthāya taṃ bālaṃ agghāpanikakamme
atk-s0513a1:1001_8: ṭhapesi. Tato paṭṭhāya so bālo hatthiassādīni agghāpento agghaṃ hāpetvā yathāruciyā
atk-s0513a1:1001_9: katheti. Tassa ṭhānantare ṭhitattā yaṃ so katheti, tameva mūlaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1002_0: Tasmiṃ kāle uttarāpathato eko assavāṇijo pañca assasatāni ānesi. Rājā taṃ purisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1002_1: pakkosāpetvā asse agghāpesi. So pañcannaṃ assasatānaṃ ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷikaṃ agghamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1002_2: Katvā ca pana “assavāṇijassa ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷikaṃ dethā”ti vatvā asse assasālāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1002_3: saṇṭhāpesi. Assavāṇijo porāṇaagghāpanikassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā
atk-s0513a1:1002_4: “idāni kiṃ kattabba”nti pucchi. So āha “tassa purisassa lañjaṃ datvā evaṃ pucchatha
atk-s0513a1:1002_5: ‘amhākaṃ tāva assā ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷikaṃ agghantīti ñātametaṃ, tumhe pana nissāya taṇḍulanāḷiyā
atk-s0513a1:1002_6: agghaṃ jānitukāmamhā, sakkhissatha no rañño santike ṭhatvā sā taṇḍulanāḷikā idaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1002_7: nāma agghatīti vattu’nti, sace sakkomīti vadati, taṃ gahetvā rañño santikaṃ gacchatha,
atk-s0513a1:1003_0: Assavāṇijo “sādhū”ti bodhisattassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā agghāpanikassa lañjaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a1:1003_1: tamatthaṃ ārocesi. So lañjaṃ labhitvāva “sakkhissāmi taṇḍulanāḷiṃ agghāpetu”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1003_2: “Tena hi gacchāma rājakula”nti taṃ ādāya rañño santikaṃ agamāsi. Bodhisattopi aññepi
atk-s0513a1:1003_3: bahū amaccā agamiṃsu. Assavāṇijo rājānaṃ vanditvā āha – “deva, pañcannaṃ assasatānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1003_4: ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷiṃ agghanakabhāvaṃ jānāma, sā pana taṇḍulanāḷi kiṃ agghatīti agghāpanikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1003_5: pucchatha devā”ti. Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ ajānanto “ambho agghāpanika, pañca assasatāni
atk-s0513a1:1003_6: kiṃ agghantī”ti pucchi. Taṇḍulanāḷiṃ, devāti. “Hotu, bhaṇe, assā tāva taṇḍulanāḷiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1003_7: agghantu. Sā pana kiṃ agghati taṇḍulanāḷikā”ti pucchi. So bālapuriso “bārāṇasiṃ santarabāhiraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1003_8: agghati taṇḍulanāḷikā”ti āha. So kira pubbe rājānaṃ anuvattanto ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1003_9: assānaṃ agghamakāsi. Puna vāṇijassa hatthato lañjaṃ labhitvā tassā taṇḍulanāḷikāya
atk-s0513a1:1003_10: bārāṇasiṃ santarabāhiraṃ agghamakāsi. Tadā pana bārāṇasiyā pākāraparikkhepo dvādasayojaniko
atk-s0513a1:1003_11: hoti. Idamassa antaraṃ, bāhiraṃ pana tiyojanasatikaṃ raṭṭhaṃ. Iti so bālo evaṃ mahantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1004_0: Taṃ sutvā amaccā pāṇiṃ paharitvā hasamānā “mayaṃ pubbe pathaviñca rajjañca anagghanti
atk-s0513a1:1004_1: saññino ahumha, evaṃ mahantaṃ kira sarājakaṃ bārāṇasirajjaṃ taṇḍulanāḷimattaṃ agghati,
atk-s0513a1:1004_2: aho agghāpanikassa ñāṇasampadā. Kahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ ayaṃ agghāpaniko vihāsi, amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1008: Tasmiṃ kāle rājā lajjito taṃ bālaṃ nikkaḍḍhāpetvā bodhisattasseva agghāpanikaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi. Bodhisattopi yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1009_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1009_1: samodhānesi “tadā gāmikabālaagghāpaniko lāludāyī ahosi, paṇḍitaagghāpaniko pana ahameva
atk-s0513a1:1013_0: Hiriottappasampannāti idaṃ bhagavā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bahubhaṇḍikaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1013_1: ārabbha kathesi. Sāvatthivāsī kireko kuṭumbiko bhariyāya kālakatāya pabbaji. So pabbajanto
atk-s0513a1:1013_2: attano pariveṇañca aggisālañca bhaṇḍagabbhañca kāretvā bhaṇḍagabbhaṃ sappitaṇḍulādīhi
atk-s0513a1:1013_3: pūretvā pabbaji. Pabbajitvā ca pana attano dāse pakkosāpetvā yathārucitaṃ āhāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1013_4: pacāpetvā bhuñjati, bahuparikkhāro ca ahosi, rattiṃ aññaṃ nivāsanapārupanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1013_5: divā aññaṃ. Vihārapaccante vasati. Tassekadivasaṃ cīvarapaccattharaṇādīni nīharitvā
atk-s0513a1:1013_6: pariveṇe pattharitvā sukkhāpentassa sambahulā jānapadā bhikkhū senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā
atk-s0513a1:1013_7: pariveṇaṃ gantvā cīvarādīni disvā “kassimānī”ti pucchiṃsu. So “mayhaṃ, āvuso”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1013_8: “Āvuso, idampi cīvaraṃ, idampi nivāsanaṃ, idampi paccattharaṇaṃ, sabbaṃ tuyhamevā”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1013_9: “Āma mayhamevā”ti. “Āvuso bhagavatā tīṇi cīvarāni anuññātāni, tvaṃ evaṃ appicchassa
atk-s0513a1:1013_10: buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā evaṃ bahuparikkhāro jāto, ehi taṃ dasabalassa santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1013_11: nessāmā”ti taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1014_0: Satthā disvāva “kiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, anicchamānakaṃyeva bhikkhuṃ gaṇhitvā āgatatthā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1014_1: āha. “Bhante, ayaṃ bhikkhu bahubhaṇḍo bahuparikkhāro”ti. “Saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:1014_2: bahubhaṇḍo”ti? “Saccaṃ, bhagavā”ti. “Kasmā pana tvaṃ bhikkhu bahubhaṇḍo jāto”? “Nanu
atk-s0513a1:1014_3: ahaṃ appicchatāya santuṭṭhitāya pavivekassa vīriyārambhassa vaṇṇaṃ vadāmī”ti. So
atk-s0513a1:1014_4: satthu vacanaṃ sutvā kupito “iminā dāni nīhārena carissāmī”ti pārupanaṃ chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0513a1:1015_0: Atha naṃ satthā upatthambhayamāno “nanu tvaṃ bhikkhu pubbe hirottappagavesako dakarakkhasakālepi
atk-s0513a1:1015_1: hirottappaṃ gavesamāno dvādasa saṃvaccharāni vihāsi, atha kasmā idāni evaṃ garuke
atk-s0513a1:1015_2: buddhasāsane pabbajitvā catuparisamajjhe pārupanaṃ chaḍḍetvā hirottappaṃ pahāya ṭhitosī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1015_3: So satthu vacanaṃ sutvā hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā taṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1015_4: vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Bhikkhū tassatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1015_5: bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1016_0: Atīte kāsiraṭṭhe bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā ahosi. Tadā bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā
atk-s0513a1:1016_1: kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase “mahisāsakumāro”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1016_2: Tassa ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle rañño aññopi putto jāto, tassa “candakumāro”ti
atk-s0513a1:1016_3: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Tassa pana ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle bodhisattassa mātā kālamakāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1016_4: rājā aññaṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Sā rañño piyā ahosi manāpā, sāpi saṃvāsamanvāya
atk-s0513a1:1016_5: ekaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi, “sūriyakumāro”tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Rājā puttaṃ disvā tuṭṭhacitto
atk-s0513a1:1016_6: “bhadde, puttassa te varaṃ dammī”ti āha. Devī, varaṃ icchitakāle gahetabbaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:1016_7: ṭhapesi. Sā putte vayappatte rājānaṃ āha – “devena mayhaṃ puttassa jātakāle varo
atk-s0513a1:1016_8: dinno, puttassa me rajjaṃ dehī”ti. Rājā “mayhaṃ dve puttā aggikkhandhā viya jalamānā
atk-s0513a1:1016_9: vicaranti, na sakkā tava puttassa rajjaṃ dātu”nti paṭikkhipitvāpi taṃ punappunaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1016_10: yācamānameva disvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ puttānaṃ pāpakampi cinteyyā”ti putte pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1016_11: āha – “tātā, ahaṃ sūriyakumārassa jātakāle varaṃ adāsiṃ. Idānissa mātā rajjaṃ yācati,
atk-s0513a1:1016_12: ahaṃ tassa na dātukāmo, mātugāmo nāma pāpo, tumhākaṃ pāpakampi cinteyya, tumhe araññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1016_13: pavisitvā mama accayena kulasantake nagare rajjaṃ kareyyāthā”ti roditvā kanditvā
atk-s0513a1:1016_14: sīse cumbitvā uyyojesi. Te pitaraṃ vanditvā pāsādā otarante rājaṅgaṇe kīḷamāno sūriyakumāro
atk-s0513a1:1016_15: disvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “ahampi bhātikehi saddhiṃ gamissāmī”ti tehi saddhiṃyeva nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:1017_0: Bodhisatto maggā okkamma rukkhamūle nisīditvā sūriyakumāraṃ āmantesi “tāta sūriyakumāra,
atk-s0513a1:1017_1: etaṃ saraṃ gantvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca paduminipaṇṇehi amhākampi pānīyaṃ ānehī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1017_2: Taṃ pana saraṃ vessavaṇassa santikā ekena dakarakkhasena laddhaṃ hoti, vessavaṇo
atk-s0513a1:1017_3: ca taṃ āha – “ṭhapetvā devadhammajānanake ye aññe imaṃ saraṃ otaranti, te khādituṃ
atk-s0513a1:1017_4: labhasi. Anotiṇṇe na labhasī”ti. Tato paṭṭhāya so rakkhaso ye taṃ saraṃ otaranti,
atk-s0513a1:1017_5: te devadhamme pucchitvā ye na jānanti, te khādati. Atha kho sūriyakumāro taṃ saraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1017_6: gantvā avīmaṃsitvāva otari. Atha naṃ so rakkhaso gahetvā “devadhamme jānāsī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1017_7: So “devadhammā nāma candimasūriyā”ti āha. Atha naṃ “tvaṃ devadhamme na jānāsī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1017_8: vatvā udakaṃ pavesetvā attano vasanaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Bodhisattopi taṃ aticirāyantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1017_9: disvā candakumāraṃ pesesi. Rakkhaso tampi gahetvā “devadhamme jānāsī”ti pucchi. “Āma
atk-s0513a1:1017_10: jānāmi, devadhammā nāma catasso disā”ti. Rakkhaso “na tvaṃ devadhamme jānāsī”ti tampi
atk-s0513a1:1018_0: Bodhisatto tasmimpi cirāyante “ekena antarāyena bhavitabba”nti sayaṃ tattha gantvā
atk-s0513a1:1018_1: dvinnampi otaraṇapadavaḷañjaṃ disvā “rakkhasapariggahitena iminā sarena bhavitabba”nti
atk-s0513a1:1018_2: khaggaṃ sannayhitvā dhanuṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi. Dakarakkhaso bodhisattaṃ udakaṃ anotarantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1018_3: disvā vanakammikapuriso viya hutvā bodhisattaṃ āha – “bho, purisa, tvaṃ maggakilanto
atk-s0513a1:1018_4: kasmā imaṃ saraṃ otaritvā nhatvā pivitvā bhisamuḷālaṃ khāditvā pupphāni piḷandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1018_5: yathāsukhaṃ na gacchasī”ti? Bodhisatto taṃ disvā “eso yakkho bhavissatī”ti ñatvā
atk-s0513a1:1018_6: “tayā me bhātikā gahitā”ti āha. “Āma, gahitā”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā”ti? “Ahaṃ imaṃ saraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1018_7: otiṇṇake labhāmī”ti. “Kiṃ pana sabbeva labhasī”ti? “Ye devadhamme jānanti, te ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:1018_8: avasese labhāmī”ti. “Atthi pana te devadhammehi attho”ti? “Āma, atthī”ti. “Yadi evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1018_9: ahaṃ te devadhamme kathessāmī”ti. “Tena hi kathehi, ahaṃ devadhamme suṇissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1018_10: Bodhisatto āha “ahaṃ devadhamme katheyyaṃ, kiliṭṭhagatto panamhī”ti. Yakkho bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1018_11: nhāpetvā bhojanaṃ bhojetvā pānīyaṃ pāyetvā pupphāni piḷandhāpetvā gandhehi vilimpāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1019: Bodhisatto āsane nisīditvā yakkhaṃ pādamūle nisīdāpetvā “tena hi ohitasoto sakkaccaṃ devadhamme suṇāhī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1023_0: Tattha hiriottappasampannāti hiriyā ca ottappena ca samannāgatā. Tesu kāyaduccaritādīhi
atk-s0513a1:1023_1: hiriyatīti hirī, lajjāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tehiyeva ottappatīti ottappaṃ, pāpato ubbegassetaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1023_2: adhivacanaṃ. Tattha ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī, bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ. Attādhipateyyā
atk-s0513a1:1023_3: hirī, lokādhipateyyaṃ ottappaṃ. Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā hirī, bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1024_0: Tattha ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti – jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1024_1: vayaṃ paccavekkhitvā sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0513a1:1024_2: “Pāpakaraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ na jātisampannānaṃ kammaṃ, hīnajaccānaṃ kevaṭṭādīnaṃ kammaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1024_3: mādisassa jātisampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ tāva jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1024_4: pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā “pāpakaraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ daharehi
atk-s0513a1:1024_5: kattabbaṃ kammaṃ, mādisassa vaye ṭhitassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ vayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1024_6: paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā “pāpakammaṃ nāmetaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1024_7: dubbalajātikānaṃ kammaṃ, mādisassa sūrabhāvasampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti
atk-s0513a1:1024_8: evaṃ sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā
atk-s0513a1:1024_9: “pāpakammaṃ nāmetaṃ andhabālānaṃ kammaṃ, na paṇḍitānaṃ, mādisassa paṇḍitassa bahussutassa
atk-s0513a1:1024_10: idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto
atk-s0513a1:1024_11: hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Evaṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0513a1:1024_12: Samuṭṭhāpetvā ca pana attano citte hiriṃ pavesetvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ hirī
atk-s0513a1:1025: Kathaṃ ottappaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma? “Sace tvaṃ pāpakammaṃ karissasi, catūsu parisāsu garahappatto bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:1028: Evaṃ paccavekkhanto hi bahiddhāsamuṭṭhitena ottappena pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ ottappaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1029_0: Kathaṃ hirī attādhipateyyā nāma? Idhekacco kulaputto attānaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1029_1: katvā “mādisassa saddhāpabbajitassa bahussutassa dhutaṅgadharassa na yuttaṃ pāpakammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1029_2: kātu”nti pāpaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ hirī attādhipateyyā nāma hoti. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0513a1:1030: “So attānaṃyeva adhipatiṃ katvā akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti. Sāvajjaṃ pajahati, anavajjaṃ bhāveti. Suddhamattānaṃ pariharatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1031: Kathaṃ ottappaṃ lokādhipateyyaṃ nāma? Idhekacco kulaputto lokaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0513a1:1032_0: “Mahā kho panāyaṃ lokasannivāso. Mahantasmiṃ kho pana lokasannivāse santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā
atk-s0513a1:1032_1: iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno, te dūratopi passanti, āsannāpi na dissanti,
atk-s0513a1:1032_2: cetasāpi cittaṃ jānanti, tepi maṃ evaṃ jānissanti ‘passatha bho, imaṃ kulaputtaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1032_3: saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
atk-s0513a1:1033_0: “Santi devatā iddhimantiyo dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduniyo, tā dūratopi passanti,
atk-s0513a1:1033_1: āsannāpi na dissanti, cetasāpi cittaṃ jānanti, tāpi maṃ evaṃ jānissanti ‘passatha
atk-s0513a1:1033_2: bho, imaṃ kulaputtaṃ, saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati
atk-s0513a1:1033_3: pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti. So lokaṃyeva adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ karitvā akusalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1033_4: pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti. Sāvajjaṃ pajahati, anavajjaṃ bhāveti. Suddhamattānaṃ pariharatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1035_0: “Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā hirī, bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhitaṃ ottappa”nti ettha pana lajjāti
atk-s0513a1:1035_1: lajjanākāro, tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitā hirī. Bhayanti apāyabhayaṃ, tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1035_2: ottappaṃ. Tadubhayampi pāpaparivajjane pākaṭaṃ hoti. Ekacco hi yathā nāmeko kulaputto
atk-s0513a1:1035_3: uccārapassāvādīni karonto lajjitabbayuttakaṃ ekaṃ disvā lajjanākārappatto bhaveyya
atk-s0513a1:1035_4: hīḷito, evamevaṃ ajjhattaṃ lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Ekacco apāyabhayabhīto
atk-s0513a1:1035_5: hutvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Tatridaṃ opammaṃ – yathā hi dvīsu ayoguḷesu eko sītalo
atk-s0513a1:1035_6: bhaveyya gūthamakkhito, eko uṇho āditto. Tattha paṇḍito sītalaṃ gūthamakkhitattā
atk-s0513a1:1035_7: jigucchanto na gaṇhāti, itaraṃ ḍāhabhayena. Tattha sītalassa gūthamakkhitassa jigucchāya
atk-s0513a1:1035_8: agaṇhanaṃ viya ajjhattaṃ lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā pāpassa akaraṇaṃ, uṇhassa ḍāhabhayena
atk-s0513a1:1035_9: agaṇhanaṃ viya apāyabhayena pāpassa akaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1036_1: dvayaṃ pāpaparivajjaneyeva pākaṭaṃ hoti. Ekacco hi jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇā, satthumahattapaccavekkhaṇā,
atk-s0513a1:1036_3: hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpaṃ na karoti. Ekacco attānuvādabhayaṃ, parānuvādabhayaṃ, daṇḍabhayaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1036_4: duggatibhayanti catūhi kāraṇehi vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1036_5: pāpaṃ na karoti. Tattha jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇādīni ceva attānuvādabhayādīni ca
atk-s0513a1:1036_6: vitthāretvā kathetabbāni. Tesaṃ vitthāro aṅguttaranikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto.
atk-s0513a1:1037_0: Sukkadhammasamāhitāti idameva hirottappaṃ ādiṃ katvā kattabbā kusalā dhammā sukkadhammā
atk-s0513a1:1037_1: nāma, te sabbasaṅgāhakanayena catubhūmakalokiyalokuttaradhammā. Tehi samāhitā samannāgatāti
atk-s0513a1:1037_2: attho. Santo sappurisā loketi kāyakammādīnaṃ santatāya santo, kataññukataveditāya
atk-s0513a1:1037_3: sobhanā purisāti sappurisā. Loko pana saṅkhāraloko, sattaloko, okāsaloko, khandhaloko,
atk-s0513a1:1037_4: āyatanaloko, dhātulokoti anekavidho. Tattha “eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā…pe…
atk-s0513a1:1037_5: aṭṭhārasa lokā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo”ti ettha saṅkhāraloko vutto. Khandhalokādayo tadantogadhāyeva.
atk-s0513a1:1037_6: “Ayaṃ loko paraloko, devaloko manussaloko”tiādīsu pana sattaloko vutto.
atk-s0513a1:1039: Tāva sahassadhā loko, ettha te vattate vaso”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:1040: Ettha okāsaloko vutto. Tesu idha sattaloko adhippeto. Sattalokasmiñhi ye evarūpā sappurisā, te devadhammāti vuccanti.
atk-s0513a1:1041_0: Tattha devāti sammutidevā, upapattidevā, visuddhidevāti tividhā. Tesu mahāsammatakālato
atk-s0513a1:1041_1: paṭṭhāya lokena “devā”ti sammatattā rājarājakumārādayo sammutidevā nāma. Devaloke
atk-s0513a1:1041_2: uppannā upapattidevā nāma. Khīṇāsavā pana visuddhidevā nāma. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:1042: “Sammutidevā nāma rājāno deviyo rājakumārā. Upapattidevā nāma bhummadeve upādāya taduttaridevā. Visuddhidevā nāma buddhā paccekabuddhā khīṇāsavā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1043_0: Imesaṃ devānaṃ dhammāti devadhammā. Vuccareti vuccanti. Hirottappamūlakā hi kusalā
atk-s0513a1:1043_1: dhammā kulasampadāya ceva devaloke nibbattiyā ca visuddhibhāvassa ca kāraṇattā kāraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0513a1:1043_2: tividhānampi tesaṃ devānaṃ dhammāti devadhammā, tehi devadhammehi samannāgatā puggalāpi
atk-s0513a1:1043_3: devadhammā. Tasmā puggalādhiṭṭhānadesanāya te dhamme dassento “santo sappurisā loke,
atk-s0513a1:1044_0: Yakkho imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacitto bodhisattaṃ āha – “paṇḍita, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1044_1: pasanno, ekaṃ bhātaraṃ demi, kataraṃ ānemī”ti? “Kaniṭṭhaṃ ānehī”ti. “Paṇḍita, tvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1044_2: kevalaṃ devadhamme jānāsiyeva, na pana tesu vattasī”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā”ti? “Yaṃkāraṇā
atk-s0513a1:1044_3: jeṭṭhakaṃ ṭhapetvā kaniṭṭhaṃ āṇāpento jeṭṭhāpacāyikakammaṃ na karosī”ti. Devadhamme
atk-s0513a1:1044_4: cāhaṃ, yakkha, jānāmi, tesu ca vattāmi. Mayañhi imaṃ araññaṃ etaṃ nissāya paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0513a1:1044_5: Etassa hi atthāya amhākaṃ pitaraṃ etassa mātā rajjaṃ yāci, amhākaṃ pana pitā taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1044_6: varaṃ adatvā amhākaṃ anurakkhaṇatthāya araññavāsaṃ anujāni. So kumāro anuvattitvā
atk-s0513a1:1044_7: amhehi saddhiṃ āgato. “Taṃ araññe eko yakkho khādī”ti vuttepi na koci saddahissati,
atk-s0513a1:1044_8: tenāhaṃ garahabhayabhīto tameva āṇāpemīti. “Sādhu sādhu paṇḍita, tvaṃ devadhamme
atk-s0513a1:1044_9: ca jānāsi, tesu ca vattasī”ti pasanno yakkho bodhisattassa sādhukāraṃ datvā dvepi
atk-s0513a1:1045_0: Atha naṃ bodhisatto āha – “samma, tvaṃ pubbe attanā katena pāpakammena paresaṃ maṃsalohitakhādako
atk-s0513a1:1045_1: yakkho hutvā nibbatto, idānipi pāpameva karosi, idaṃ te pāpakammaṃ nirayādīhi muccituṃ
atk-s0513a1:1045_2: okāsaṃ na dassati, tasmā ito paṭṭhāya pāpaṃ pahāya kusalaṃ karohī”ti. Asakkhi ca
atk-s0513a1:1045_3: pana taṃ dametuṃ. So taṃ yakkhaṃ dametvā tena saṃvihitārakkho tattheva vasanto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1045_4: nakkhattaṃ oloketvā pitu kālakatabhāvaṃ ñatvā yakkhaṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gantvā rajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1045_5: gahetvā candakumārassa oparajjaṃ, sūriyakumārassa senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ, datvā yakkhassa
atk-s0513a1:1045_6: ramaṇīye ṭhāne āyatanaṃ kāretvā, yathā so aggamālaṃ aggapupphaṃ aggabhattañca labhati,
atk-s0513a1:1045_7: tathā akāsi. So dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1046_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā dassetvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne so
atk-s0513a1:1046_1: bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Sammāsambuddhopi dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1046_2: ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā dakarakkhaso bahubhaṇḍikabhikkhu ahosi, sūriyakumāro
atk-s0513a1:1046_3: ānando, candakumāro sāriputto, jeṭṭhakabhātā mahisāsakumāro pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1050_0: Putto tyāhaṃ mahārājāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vāsabhakhattiyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1050_1: Vāsabhakhattiyāya vatthu dvādasakanipāte bhaddasālajātake āvibhavissati. Sā kira
atk-s0513a1:1050_2: mahānāmassa sakkassa dhītā nāgamuṇḍāya nāma dāsiyā kucchismiṃ jātā kosalarājassa
atk-s0513a1:1050_3: aggamahesī ahosi. Sā rañño puttaṃ vijāyi. Rājā panassā pacchā dāsibhāvaṃ ñatvā ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1050_4: parihāpesi, puttassa viṭaṭūbhassāpi ṭhānaṃ parihāpesiyeva. Te ubhopi antonivesaneyeva
atk-s0513a1:1050_5: vasanti. Satthā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā pubbaṇhasamaye pañcasatabhikkhuparivuto rañño nivesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1050_6: gantvā paññattāsane nisīditvā “mahārāja, kahaṃ vāsabhakhattiyā”ti āha. “Rājā taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1050_7: kāraṇaṃ ārocesi. Mahārāja vāsabhakhattiyā kassa dhītā”ti? “Mahānāmassa bhante”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1050_8: “Āgacchamānā kassa āgatā”ti? “Mayhaṃ bhante”ti. Mahārāja sā rañño dhītā, raññova
atk-s0513a1:1050_9: āgatā, rājānaṃyeva paṭicca puttaṃ labhi, so putto kiṃkāraṇā pitu santakassa rajjassa
atk-s0513a1:1050_10: sāmiko na hoti, pubbe rājāno muhuttikāya kaṭṭhahārikāya kucchismimpi puttaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1050_11: puttassa rajjaṃ adaṃsūti. Rājā tassatthassāvibhāvatthāya bhagavantaṃ yāci, bhagavā
atk-s0513a1:1051_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto rājā mahantena yasena uyyānaṃ gantvā tattha pupphaphalalobhena
atk-s0513a1:1051_1: vicaranto uyyānavanasaṇḍe gāyitvā dārūni uddharamānaṃ ekaṃ itthiṃ disvā paṭibaddhacitto
atk-s0513a1:1051_2: saṃvāsaṃ kappesi. Taṅkhaṇaññeva bodhisatto tassā kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, tāvadeva
atk-s0513a1:1051_3: tassā vajirapūritā viya garukā kucchi ahosi. Sā gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0513a1:1051_4: “gabbho me, deva, patiṭṭhito”ti āha. Rājā aṅgulimuddikaṃ datvā “sace dhītā hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1051_5: imaṃ vissajjetvā poseyyāsi, sace putto hoti, aṅgulimuddikāya saddhiṃ mama santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1052_0: Sāpi paripakkagabbhā bodhisattaṃ vijāyi. Tassa ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle
atk-s0513a1:1052_1: kīḷāmaṇḍale kīḷantassa evaṃ vattāro honti “nippitikenamhā pahaṭā”ti. Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1052_2: mātu santikaṃ gantvā “amma, ko mayhaṃ pitā”ti pucchi. “Tāta, tvaṃ bārāṇasirañño putto”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1052_3: “Amma, atthi pana koci sakkhī”ti? Tāta rājā imaṃ muddikaṃ datvā “sace dhītā hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1052_4: imaṃ vissajjetvā poseyyāsi, sace putto hoti, imāya aṅgulimuddikāya saddhiṃ āneyyāsī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1052_5: vatvā gatoti. “Amma, evaṃ sante kasmā maṃ pitu santikaṃ na nesī”ti. Sā puttassa ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1052_6: ñatvā rājadvāraṃ gantvā rañño ārocāpesi. Raññā ca pakkosāpitā pavisitvā rājānaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0513a1:1052_7: “ayaṃ te, deva, putto”ti āha. Rājā jānantopi parisamajjhe lajjāya “na mayhaṃ putto”ti
atk-s0513a1:1052_8: āha. “Ayaṃ te, deva, muddikā, imaṃ sañjānāsī”ti. “Ayampi mayhaṃ muddikā na hotī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1052_9: “Deva, idāni ṭhapetvā saccakiriyaṃ añño mama sakkhi natthi, sacāyaṃ dārako tumhe
atk-s0513a1:1052_10: paṭicca jāto, ākāse tiṭṭhatu, no ce, bhūmiyaṃ patitvā maratū”ti bodhisattassa pāde
atk-s0513a1:1052_11: gahetvā ākāse khipi. Bodhisatto ākāse pallaṅkamābhujitvā nisinno madhurassarena pitu
atk-s0513a1:1054: “Putto tyāhaṃ mahārāja, tvaṃ maṃ posa janādhipa;
atk-s0513a1:1055: Aññepi devo poseti, kiñca devo sakaṃ paja”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1056_0: Tattha putto tyāhanti putto te ahaṃ. Putto ca nāmesa atrajo, khettajo, antevāsiko,
atk-s0513a1:1056_1: dinnakoti catubbidho. Tattha attānaṃ paṭicca jāto atrajo nāma. Sayanapiṭṭhe pallaṅke
atk-s0513a1:1056_2: uretievamādīsu nibbatto khettajo nāma. Santike sippuggaṇhanako antevāsiko nāma. Posāvanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:1056_3: dinno dinnako nāma. Idha pana atrajaṃ sandhāya “putto”ti vuttaṃ. Catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi
atk-s0513a1:1056_4: janaṃ rañjetīti rājā, mahanto rājā mahārājā. Tamālapanto āha “mahārājā”ti. Tvaṃ maṃ
atk-s0513a1:1056_5: posa janādhipāti janādhipa mahājanajeṭṭhaka tvaṃ maṃ posa bharassu vaḍḍhehi. Aññepi
atk-s0513a1:1056_6: devo posetīti aññepi hatthibandhādayo manusse, hatthiassādayo tiracchānagate ca bahujane
atk-s0513a1:1056_7: devo poseti. Kiñca devo sakaṃ pajanti ettha pana kiñcāti garahatthe ca anuggahaṇatthe
atk-s0513a1:1056_8: ca nipāto. “Sakaṃ pajaṃ attano puttaṃ maṃ devo na posetī”ti vadanto garahati nāma,
atk-s0513a1:1056_9: “aññe bahujane posetī”ti vadanto anuggaṇhati nāma. Iti bodhisatto garahantopi anuggaṇhantopi
atk-s0513a1:1057_0: Rājā bodhisattassa ākāse nisīditvā evaṃ dhammaṃ desentassa sutvā “ehi, tātā”ti hatthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1057_1: pasāresi, “ahameva posessāmi, ahameva posessāmī”ti hatthasahassaṃ pasāriyittha. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1057_2: aññassa hatthe anotaritvā raññova hatthe otaritvā aṅke nisīdi. Rājā tassa oparajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1057_3: datvā mātaraṃ aggamahesiṃ akāsi. So pitu accayena kaṭṭhavāhanarājā nāma hutvā dhammena
atk-s0513a1:1058_0: Satthā kosalarañño imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā dve vatthūni dassetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0513a1:1058_1: jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mātā mahāmāyā ahosi, pitā suddhodanamahārājā, kaṭṭhavāhanarājā
atk-s0513a1:1062_0: Api ataramānānanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ossaṭṭhavīriyaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1062_1: kathesi. Imasmiṃ pana jātake paccuppannavatthu ca atītavatthu ca ekādasakanipāte
atk-s0513a1:1062_2: saṃvarajātake āvibhavissati. Vatthu hi tasmiñca imasmiñca ekasadisameva, gāthā pana
atk-s0513a1:1062_3: nānā. Gāmaṇikumāro bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā bhātikasatassa kaniṭṭhopi hutvā bhātikasataparivārito
atk-s0513a1:1062_4: setacchattassaheṭṭhā varapallaṅke nisinno attano yasasampattiṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1062_5: yasasampatti amhākaṃ ācariyassa santakā”ti tuṭṭho imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1066_0: Tattha apīti nipātamattaṃ. Ataramānānanti paṇḍitānaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā ataritvā avegāyitvā
atk-s0513a1:1066_1: upāyena kammaṃ karontānaṃ. Phalāsāva samijjhatīti yathāpatthike phale āsā tassa phalassa
atk-s0513a1:1066_2: nipphattiyā samijjhatiyeva. Atha vā phalāsāti āsāphalaṃ, yathāpatthitaṃ phalaṃ samijjhatiyevāti
atk-s0513a1:1066_3: attho. Vipakkabrahmacariyosmīti ettha cattāri saṅgahavatthūni seṭṭhacariyattā brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1066_4: nāma, tañca tammūlikāya yasasampattiyā paṭiladdhattā vipakkaṃ nāma. Yo vāssa yaso
atk-s0513a1:1066_5: nipphanno, sopi seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmacariyaṃ nāma. Tenāha “vipakkabrahmacariyosmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1066_6: Evaṃ jānāhi gāmaṇīti katthaci gāmikapurisopi gāmajeṭṭhakopi gāmaṇī. Idha pana sabbajanajeṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1066_7: attānaṃ sandhāyāha. Ambho gāmaṇi, tvaṃ etaṃ kāraṇaṃ evaṃ jānāhi, ācariyaṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a1:1066_8: bhātikasataṃ atikkamitvā idaṃ mahārajjaṃ pattosmīti udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0513a1:1067_0: Tasmiṃ pana rajjaṃ patte sattaṭṭhadivasaccayena sabbepi bhātaro attano attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1067_1: gatā. Gāmaṇirājā dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā yathākammaṃ gato, bodhisattopi puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1068_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā dassetvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne ossaṭṭhavīriyo
atk-s0513a1:1068_1: bhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhito. Satthā dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1068_2: samodhānesi – “tadā gāmaṇikumāro ossaṭṭhavīriyo bhikkhu ahosi, ācariyo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1072_0: Uttamaṅgaruhā mayhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1072_1: kathesi. Taṃ heṭṭhā nidānakathāyaṃ kathitameva. Tasmiṃ pana kāle bhikkhū dasabalassa
atk-s0513a1:1072_2: nekkhammaṃ vaṇṇayantā nisīdiṃsu. Atha satthā dhammasabhaṃ āgantvā buddhāsane nisinno
atk-s0513a1:1072_3: bhikkhū āmantesi “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1072_4: na aññāya kathāya, tumhākaṃyeva pana nekkhammaṃ vaṇṇayamānā nisinnāmhā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:1072_5: bhikkhave, tathāgato etarahiyeva nekkhammaṃ nikkhanto, pubbepi nikkhantoyevā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1072_6: Bhikkhū tassatthassāvibhāvatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu, bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1073_0: Atīte videharaṭṭhe mithilāyaṃ maghadevo nāma rājā ahosi dhammiko dhammarājā. So caturāsīti
atk-s0513a1:1073_1: vassasahassāni kumārakīḷaṃ kīḷi, tathā oparajjaṃ, tathā mahārajjaṃ katvā dīghamaddhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1073_2: khepetvā ekadivasaṃ kappakaṃ āmantesi “yadā me, samma kappaka, sirasmiṃ palitāni
atk-s0513a1:1073_3: passeyyāsi, atha me āroceyyāsī”ti. Kappakopi dīghamaddhānaṃ khepetvā ekadivasaṃ rañño
atk-s0513a1:1073_4: añjanavaṇṇānaṃ kesānaṃ antare ekameva palitaṃ disvā “deva, ekaṃ te palitaṃ dissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1073_5: ārocesi. “Tena hi me, samma, taṃ palitaṃ uddharitvā pāṇimhi ṭhapehī”ti ca vutte suvaṇṇasaṇḍāsena
atk-s0513a1:1073_6: uddharitvā rañño pāṇimhi patiṭṭhāpesi. Tadā rañño caturāsīti vassasahassāni āyu avasiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1073_7: hoti. Evaṃ santepi palitaṃ disvāva maccurājānaṃ āgantvā samīpe ṭhitaṃ viya attānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1073_8: ādittapaṇṇasālaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ viya ca maññamāno saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā “bāla maghadeva,
atk-s0513a1:1073_9: yāva palitassuppādāva ime kilese jahituṃ nāsakkhī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0513a1:1074_0: Tassevaṃ palitapātubhāvaṃ āvajjentassa antoḍāho uppajji, sarīrā sedā mucciṃsu, sāṭakā
atk-s0513a1:1074_1: pīḷetvā apanetabbākārappattā ahesuṃ. So “ajjeva mayā nikkhamitvā pabbajituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1074_2: kappakassa satasahassuṭṭhānakaṃ gāmavaraṃ datvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:1074_3: mama sīse palitaṃ pātubhūtaṃ, mahallakomhi jāto, bhuttā kho pana me mānusakā kāmā,
atk-s0513a1:1074_4: idāni dibbe kāme pariyesissāmi, nekkhammakālo mayhaṃ, tvaṃ imaṃ rajjaṃ paṭipajja,
atk-s0513a1:1074_5: ahaṃ pana pabbajitvā maghadevaambavanuyyāne vasanto samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1074_6: Taṃ evaṃ pabbajitukāmaṃ amaccā upasaṅkamitvā “deva, kiṃ tumhākaṃ pabbajjākāraṇa”nti
atk-s0513a1:1074_7: pucchiṃsu. Rājā palitaṃ hatthena gahetvā amaccānaṃ imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1078_0: Tattha uttamaṅgaruhāti kesā. Kesā hi sabbesaṃ hatthapādādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ uttame sirasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1078_1: ruhattā “uttamaṅgaruhā”ti vuccanti. Ime jātā vayoharāti passatha, tātā, palitapātubhāvena
atk-s0513a1:1078_2: tiṇṇaṃ vayānaṃ haraṇato ime jātā vayoharā. Pātubhūtāti nibbattā. Devadūtāti devo
atk-s0513a1:1078_3: vuccati maccu, tassa dūtāti devadūtā. Sirasmiñhi palitesu pātubhūtesu maccurājassa
atk-s0513a1:1078_4: santike ṭhito viya hoti, tasmā palitāni “maccudevassa dūtā”ti vuccanti. Devā viya
atk-s0513a1:1078_5: dūtātipi devadūtā. Yathā hi alaṅkatapaṭiyattāya devatāya ākāse ṭhatvā “asukadivase
atk-s0513a1:1078_6: tvaṃ marissasī”ti vutte taṃ tatheva hoti, evaṃ sirasmiṃ palitesu pātubhūtesu devatāya
atk-s0513a1:1078_7: byākaraṇasadisameva hoti, tasmā palitāni “devasadisā dūtā”ti vuccanti. Visuddhidevānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1078_8: dūtātipi devadūtā. Sabbabodhisattā hi jiṇṇabyādhimatapabbajite disvāva saṃvegamāpajjitvā
atk-s0513a1:1079: “Jiṇṇañca disvā dukhitañca byādhitaṃ, matañca disvā gatamāyusaṅkhayaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1080: Kāsāyavatthaṃ pabbajitañca disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi rājā”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:1081_0: Iminā pariyāyena palitāni visuddhidevānaṃ dūtattā “devadūtā”ti vuccanti. Pabbajjāsamayo
atk-s0513a1:1082_0: So evaṃ vatvā taṃ divasameva rajjaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tasmiṃyeva maghadevaambavane
atk-s0513a1:1082_1: viharanto caturāsīti vassasahassāni cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā aparihīnajjhāne
atk-s0513a1:1082_2: ṭhito kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbattitvā puna tato cuto mithilāyaṃyeva nimi nāma
atk-s0513a1:1082_3: rājā hutvā osakkamānaṃ attano vaṃsaṃ ghaṭetvā tattheva ambavane pabbajitvā brahmavihāre
atk-s0513a1:1083_0: Satthāpi “na, bhikkhave, tathāgato idāneva mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:1083_1: nikkhantoyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā dassetvā cattāri saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a1:1083_2: keci sotāpannā ahesuṃ, keci sakadāgāmino, keci anāgāmino. Iti bhagavā imāni dve vatthūni
atk-s0513a1:1083_3: kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā kappako ānando ahosi, putto
atk-s0513a1:1087_0: Yañca aññe na rakkhantīti idaṃ satthā anupiyanagaraṃ nissāya anupiyaambavane viharanto
atk-s0513a1:1087_1: sukhavihāriṃ bhaddiyattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi. Sukhavihārī bhaddiyatthero chakhattiyasamāgame
atk-s0513a1:1087_2: upālisattamo pabbajito. Tesu bhaddiyatthero ca, kimilatthero ca, bhagutthero ca,
atk-s0513a1:1087_3: upālitthero ca arahattaṃ pattā, ānandatthero sotāpanno jāto, anuruddhatthero dibbacakkhuko,
atk-s0513a1:1087_4: devadatto jhānalābhī jāto. Channaṃ pana khattiyānaṃ vatthu yāva anupiyanagarā khaṇḍahālajātake
atk-s0513a1:1087_5: āvibhavissati. Āyasmā pana bhaddiyo rājakāle attano rakkhasaṃvidhānañceva tāva bahūhi
atk-s0513a1:1087_6: rakkhāhi rakkhiyamānassa uparipāsādavaratale mahāsayane samparivattamānassāpi attano
atk-s0513a1:1087_7: bhayuppattiñca idāni arahattaṃ patvā araññādīsu yattha katthaci viharantopi attano
atk-s0513a1:1087_8: vigatabhayatañca samanussaranto “aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha”nti udānaṃ udānesi. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a1:1087_9: bhikkhū “āyasmā bhaddiyo aññaṃ byākarotī”ti bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:1087_10: bhaddiyo idāneva sukhavihārī, pubbepi sukhavihārīyevā”ti āha. Bhikkhū tassatthassāvibhāvatthāya
atk-s0513a1:1087_11: bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu. Bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1088_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārayamāne bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇamahāsālo
atk-s0513a1:1088_1: hutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ, nekkhamme cānisaṃsaṃ disvā kāme pahāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:1088_2: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesi, parivāropissa mahā ahosi pañca
atk-s0513a1:1088_3: tāpasasatāni. So vassakāle himavantato nikkhamitvā tāpasagaṇaparivuto gāmanigamādīsu
atk-s0513a1:1088_4: cārikaṃ caranto bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājānaṃ nissāya rājuyyāne vāsaṃ kappesi. Tattha vassike
atk-s0513a1:1088_5: cattāro māse vasitvā rājānaṃ āpucchi. Atha naṃ rājā “tumhe, bhante, mahallakā, kiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1088_6: vo himavantena, antevāsike himavantaṃ pesetvā idheva vasathā”ti yāci. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1088_7: jeṭṭhantevāsikaṃ pañca tāpasasatāni paṭicchāpetvā “gaccha, tvaṃ imehi saddhiṃ himavante
atk-s0513a1:1088_8: vasa, ahaṃ pana idheva vasissāmī”ti te uyyojetvā sayaṃ tattheva vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:1089_0: So panassa jeṭṭhantevāsiko rājapabbajito mahantaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1089_1: katvā aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ahosi. So tāpasehi saddhiṃ himavante vasamāno ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1089_2: ācariyaṃ daṭṭhukāmo hutvā te tāpase āmantetvā “tumhe anukkaṇṭhamānā idheva vasatha,
atk-s0513a1:1089_3: ahaṃ ācariyaṃ vanditvā āgamissāmī”ti ācariyassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1089_4: katvā ekaṃ kaṭṭhattharikaṃ attharitvā ācariyassa santikeyeva nipajji. Tasmiñca samaye
atk-s0513a1:1089_5: rājā “tāpasaṃ passissāmī”ti uyyānaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Antevāsikatāpaso
atk-s0513a1:1089_6: rājānaṃ disvā neva vuṭṭhāsi, nipannoyeva pana “aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha”nti udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0513a1:1089_7: Rājā “ayaṃ tāpaso maṃ disvāpi na uṭṭhito”ti anattamano bodhisattaṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1089_8: ayaṃ tāpaso yadicchakaṃ bhutto bhavissati, udānaṃ udānento sukhaseyyameva kappetī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1089_9: Mahārāja, ayaṃ tāpaso pubbe tumhādiso eko rājā ahosi, svāyaṃ “ahaṃ pubbe gihikāle
atk-s0513a1:1089_10: rajjasiriṃ anubhavanto āvudhahatthehi bahūhi rakkhiyamānopi evarūpaṃ sukhaṃ nāma
atk-s0513a1:1089_11: nālattha”nti attano pabbajjāsukhaṃ jhānasukhañca ārabbha imaṃ udānaṃ udānetīti. Evañca
atk-s0513a1:1089_12: pana vatvā bodhisatto rañño dhammakathaṃ kathetuṃ imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1091: “Yañca aññe na rakkhanti, yo ca aññe na rakkhati;
atk-s0513a1:1092: Sa ve rāja sukhaṃ seti, kāmesu anapekkhavā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1093_0: Tattha yañca aññe na rakkhantīti yaṃ puggalaṃ aññe bahū puggalā na rakkhanti. Yo
atk-s0513a1:1093_1: ca aññe na rakkhatīti yo ca “ekako ahaṃ rajjaṃ kāremī”ti aññe bahū jane na rakkhati.
atk-s0513a1:1093_2: Sa ve rāja sukhaṃ setīti mahārāja so puggalo eko adutiyo pavivitto kāyikacetasikasukhasamaṅgī
atk-s0513a1:1093_3: hutvā sukhaṃ seti. Idañca desanāsīsameva. Na kevalaṃ pana setiyeva, evarūpo pana
atk-s0513a1:1093_4: puggalo sukhaṃ gacchati tiṭṭhati nisīdati sayatīti sabbiriyāpathesu sukhappattova
atk-s0513a1:1093_5: hoti. Kāmesu anapekkhavāti vatthu kāmakilesakāmesu apekkhārahito vigatacchandarāgo
atk-s0513a1:1093_6: nittaṇho evarūpo puggalo sabbiriyāpathesu sukhaṃ viharati mahārājāti.
atk-s0513a1:1094_0: Rājā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhamānaso vanditvā nivesanameva gato, antevāsikopi ācariyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1094_1: vanditvā himavantameva gato. Bodhisatto pana tattheva viharanto aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1095_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā dassetvā dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0513a1:1095_1: jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā antevāsiko bhaddiyatthero ahosi, gaṇasatthā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1105_0: Hoti sīlavataṃ atthoti idaṃ satthā rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1105_1: ārabbha kathesi. Devadattassa vatthu yāva abhimārappayojanā khaṇḍahālajātake āvibhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1105_2: yāva dhanapālakavissajjanā pana cūḷahaṃsajātake āvibhavissati, yāva pathavippavesanā
atk-s0513a1:1106_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye devadatto pañca vatthūni yācitvā alabhanto saṅghaṃ bhinditvā pañca
atk-s0513a1:1106_1: bhikkhusatāni ādāya gayāsīse viharati. Atha tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1106_2: Taṃ ñatvā satthā dve aggasāvake āmantesi “sāriputtā, tumhākaṃ nissitakā pañcasatā
atk-s0513a1:1106_3: bhikkhū devadattassa laddhiṃ rocetvā tena saddhiṃ gatā, idāni pana tesaṃ ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1106_4: gataṃ, tumhe bahūhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ tattha gantvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā te bhikkhū
atk-s0513a1:1106_5: maggaphalehi pabodhetvā gahetvā āgacchathā”ti. Te tatheva gantvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā
atk-s0513a1:1106_6: maggaphalehi pabodhetvā punadivase aruṇuggamanavelāya te bhikkhū ādāya veḷuvanameva
atk-s0513a1:1106_7: āgamaṃsu. Āgantvā ca pana sāriputtattherassa bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ṭhitakāle bhikkhū
atk-s0513a1:1106_8: theraṃ pasaṃsitvā bhagavantaṃ āhaṃsu – “bhante, amhākaṃ jeṭṭhabhātiko dhammasenāpati
atk-s0513a1:1106_9: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi parivuto āgacchanto ativiya sobhati, devadatto pana parihīnaparivāro
atk-s0513a1:1106_10: jāto”ti. Na, bhikkhave, sāriputto idāneva ñātisaṅghaparivuto āgacchanto sobhati,
atk-s0513a1:1106_11: pubbepi sobhiyeva. Devadattopi na idāneva gaṇato parihīno, pubbepi parihīnoyevāti.
atk-s0513a1:1106_12: Bhikkhū tassatthassāvibhāvatthāya bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu, bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1107_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahanagare eko magadharājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Tadā bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1107_1: migayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā vuddhippatto migasahassaparivāro araññe vasati. Tassa
atk-s0513a1:1107_2: lakkhaṇo ca kāḷo cāti dve puttā ahesuṃ. So attano mahallakakāle “tātā, ahaṃ idāni
atk-s0513a1:1107_3: mahallako, tumhe imaṃ gaṇaṃ pariharathā”ti pañca pañca migasatāni ekekaṃ puttaṃ paṭicchāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1107_4: Tato paṭṭhāya te dve janā migagaṇaṃ pariharanti. Magadharaṭṭhasmiñca sassapākasamaye
atk-s0513a1:1107_5: kiṭṭhasambādhe araññe migānaṃ paripantho hoti. Manussā sassakhādakānaṃ migānaṃ māraṇatthāya
atk-s0513a1:1107_6: tattha tattha opātaṃ khaṇanti, sūlāni ropenti, pāsāṇayantāni sajjenti, kūṭapāsādayo
atk-s0513a1:1107_7: pāse oḍḍenti, bahū migā vināsaṃ āpajjanti. Bodhisatto kiṭṭhasambādhasamayaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0513a1:1107_8: dve putte pakkosāpetvā āha – “tātā, ayaṃ kiṭṭhasambādhasamayo, bahū migā vināsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1107_9: pāpuṇanti, mayaṃ mahallakā yena kenaci upāyena ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vītināmessāma, tumhe
atk-s0513a1:1107_10: tumhākaṃ migagaṇe gahetvā araññe pabbatapādaṃ pavisitvā sassānaṃ uddhaṭakāle āgaccheyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1107_11: Te “sādhū”ti pitu vacanaṃ sutvā saparivārā nikkhamiṃsu. Tesaṃ pana gamanamaggaṃ manussā
atk-s0513a1:1107_12: jānanti “imasmiṃ kāle migā pabbatamārohanti, imasmiṃ kāle orohantī”ti. Te tattha
atk-s0513a1:1107_13: tattha paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nilīnā bahū mige vijjhitvā mārenti.
atk-s0513a1:1108_0: Kāḷamigo attano dandhatāya “imāya nāma velāya gantabbaṃ, imāya velāya na gantabba”nti
atk-s0513a1:1108_1: ajānanto migagaṇaṃ ādāya pubbaṇhepi sāyanhepi padosepi paccūsepi gāmadvārena gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1108_2: Manussā tattha tattha pakatiyā ṭhitā ca nilīnā ca bahū mige vināsaṃ pāpenti. Evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1108_3: so attano dandhatāya bahū mige vināsaṃ pāpetvā appakeheva migehi araññaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1108_4: Lakkhaṇamigo pana paṇḍito byatto upāyakusalo “imāya velāya gantabbaṃ, imāya velāya
atk-s0513a1:1108_5: na gantabba”nti jānāti. So gāmadvārenapi na gacchati, divāpi na gacchati, padosepi
atk-s0513a1:1108_6: na gacchati, paccūsepi na gacchati, migagaṇaṃ ādāya aḍḍharattasamayeyeva gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1108_7: Tasmā ekampi migaṃ avināsetvā araññaṃ pāvisi. Te tattha cattāro māse vasitvā sassesu
atk-s0513a1:1109_0: Kāḷo paccāgacchantopi purimanayeneva avasesamige vināsaṃ pāpento ekakova āgami. Lakkhaṇo
atk-s0513a1:1109_1: pana ekamigampi avināsetvā pañcahi migasatehi parivuto mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ āgami.
atk-s0513a1:1109_2: Bodhisatto dvepi putte āgacchante disvā migagaṇena saddhiṃ mantento imaṃ gāthaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi –
atk-s0513a1:1114_0: Tattha sīlavatanti sukhasīlatāya sīlavantānaṃ ācārasampannānaṃ. Atthoti vuḍḍhi. Paṭisanthāravuttinanti
atk-s0513a1:1114_1: dhammapaṭisanthāro ca āmisapaṭisanthāro ca etesaṃ vuttīti paṭisanthāravuttino, tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1114_4: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – imesu dvīsu paṭisanthāresu ṭhitānaṃ ācārasampannānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1114_5: vuḍḍhi nāma hotīti. Idāni taṃ vuḍḍhiṃ dassetuṃ puttamātaraṃ ālapanto viya “lakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1114_6: passā”tiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – ācārapaṭisanthārasampannaṃ attano puttaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1114_7: ekamigampi avināsetvā ñātisaṅghena purakkhataṃ parivāritaṃ āgacchantaṃ passa. Tāya
atk-s0513a1:1114_8: pana ācārapaṭisanthārasampadāya vihīnaṃ dandhapaññaṃ atha passasimaṃ kāḷaṃ ekampi
atk-s0513a1:1114_9: ñātiṃ anavasesetvā suvihīnameva ñātīhi ekakaṃ āgacchantanti. Evaṃ puttaṃ abhinanditvā
atk-s0513a1:1114_10: pana bodhisatto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1115_0: Satthāpi “na, bhikkhave, sāriputto idāneva ñātisaṅghaparivārito sobhati, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:1115_1: sobhatiyeva. Na ca devadatto etarahiyeva gaṇamhā parihīno, pubbepi parihīnoyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1115_2: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ dassetvā dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a1:1115_3: – “tadā kāḷo devadatto ahosi, parisāpissa devadattaparisāva, lakkhaṇo sāriputto,
atk-s0513a1:1115_4: parisā panassa buddhaparisā, mātā rāhulamātā, pitā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1119_0: Nigrodhameva seveyyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kumārakassapattherassa mātaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1119_1: ārabbha kathesi. Sā kira rājagahanagare mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino dhītā ahosi ussannakusalamūlā
atk-s0513a1:1119_2: parimadditasaṅkhārā pacchimabhavikā, antoghaṭe padīpo viya tassā hadaye arahattūpanissayo
atk-s0513a1:1119_3: jalati. Sā attānaṃ jānanakālato paṭṭhāya gehe anabhiratā pabbajitukāmā hutvā mātāpitaro
atk-s0513a1:1119_4: āha – “ammatātā, mayhaṃ gharāvāse cittaṃ nābhiramati, ahaṃ niyyānike buddhasāsane
atk-s0513a1:1119_5: pabbajitukāmā, pabbājetha ma”nti. Amma, kiṃ vadesi, idaṃ kulaṃ bahuvibhavaṃ, tvañca
atk-s0513a1:1119_6: amhākaṃ ekadhītā, na labbhā tayā pabbajitunti. Sā punappunaṃ yācitvāpi mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1119_7: santikā pabbajjaṃ alabhamānā cintesi “hotu, patikulaṃ gatā sāmikaṃ ārādhetvā pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1119_8: Sā vayappattā patikulaṃ gantvā patidevatā hutvā sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā agāraṃ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0513a1:1120_0: Athassā saṃvāsamanvāya kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhahi. Sā gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1120_1: na aññāsi. Atha tasmiṃ nagare nakkhattaṃ ghosayiṃsu, sakalanagaravāsino nakkhattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1120_2: kīḷiṃsu, nagaraṃ devanagaraṃ viya alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ ahosi. Sā pana tāva uḷārāyapi
atk-s0513a1:1120_3: nakkhattakīḷāya vattamānāya attano sarīraṃ na vilimpati nālaṅkaroti, pakativeseneva vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:1121_0: Atha naṃ sāmiko āha – “bhadde, sakalanagaraṃ nakkhattanissitaṃ, tvaṃ pana sarīraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1121_1: nappaṭijaggasī”ti. Ayyaputta, dvattiṃsāya me kuṇapehi pūritaṃ sarīraṃ, kiṃ iminā
atk-s0513a1:1121_2: alaṅkatena, ayañhi kāyo neva devanimmito, na brahmanimmito, na suvaṇṇamayo, na maṇimayo,
atk-s0513a1:1121_3: na haricandanamayo, na puṇḍarīkakumuduppalagabbhasambhūto, na amatosadhapūrito, atha
atk-s0513a1:1121_5: kaṭasivaḍḍhano, taṇhūpādinno, sokānaṃ nidānaṃ, paridevānaṃ vatthu, sabbarogānaṃ ālayo,
atk-s0513a1:1121_6: kammakaraṇānaṃ paṭiggaho, antopūti, bahi niccapaggharaṇo, kimikulānaṃ āvāso, sivathikapayāto,
atk-s0513a1:1123: Chaviyā kāyo paṭicchanno, yathābhūtaṃ na dissati.
atk-s0513a1:1127: Lohitassa lasikāya, pittassa ca vasāya ca.
atk-s0513a1:1133: Subhato naṃ maññati bālo, avijjāya purakkhato. ;
atk-s0513a1:1137: Daṇḍaṃ nūna gahetvāna, kāke soṇe ca vāraye.
atk-s0513a1:1142_0: Ayyaputta, imaṃ kāyaṃ alaṅkaritvā kiṃ karissāmi? Nanu imassa alaṅkatakaraṇaṃ gūthapuṇṇaghaṭassa
atk-s0513a1:1142_1: bahi cittakammakaraṇaṃ viya hotīti? Seṭṭhiputto tassā vacanaṃ sutvā āha “bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:1142_2: tvaṃ imassa sarīrassa ime dose passamānā kasmā na pabbajasī”ti? “Ayyaputta, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1142_3: pabbajjaṃ labhamānā ajjeva pabbajeyya”nti. Seṭṭhiputto “sādhu, ahaṃ taṃ pabbājessāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1142_4: vatvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā mahāsakkāraṃ katvā mahantena parivārena bhikkhunupassayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1142_5: netvā taṃ pabbājento devadattapakkhiyānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbājesi. Sā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1143_0: Athassā gabbhe paripākaṃ gacchante indriyānaṃ aññathattaṃ hatthapādapiṭṭhīnaṃ bahalattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1143_1: udarapaṭalassa ca mahantataṃ disvā bhikkhuniyo taṃ pucchiṃsu “ayye, tvaṃ gabbhinī
atk-s0513a1:1143_2: viya paññāyasi, kiṃ eta”nti? Ayye, “idaṃ nāma kāraṇa”nti na jānāmi, sīlaṃ pana me
atk-s0513a1:1143_3: paripuṇṇanti. Atha naṃ tā bhikkhuniyo devadattassa santikaṃ netvā devadattaṃ pucchiṃsu
atk-s0513a1:1143_4: “ayya, ayaṃ kuladhītā kicchena sāmikaṃ ārādhetvā pabbajjaṃ labhi, idāni panassā gabbho
atk-s0513a1:1143_5: paññāyati, mayaṃ imassa gabbhassa gihikāle vā pabbajitakāle vā laddhabhāvaṃ na jānāma,
atk-s0513a1:1143_6: kiṃdāni karomā”ti? Devadatto attano abuddhabhāvena ca khantimettānuddayānañca natthitāya
atk-s0513a1:1143_7: evaṃ cintesi “devadattapakkhikā bhikkhunī kucchinā gabbhaṃ pariharati, devadatto
atk-s0513a1:1143_8: ca taṃ ajjhupekkhatiyevāti mayhaṃ garahā uppajjissati, mayā imaṃ uppabbājetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1143_9: So avīmaṃsitvāva selaguḷaṃ pavaṭṭayamāno viya pakkhanditvā “gacchatha, imaṃ uppabbājethā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1143_10: āha. Tā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā uṭṭhāya vanditvā upassayaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:1144_0: Atha sā daharā tā bhikkhuniyo āha – “ayye, na devadattatthero buddho, nāpi mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1144_1: tassa santike pabbajjā, loke pana aggapuggalassa sammāsambuddhassa santike mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1144_2: pabbajjā, sā ca pana me dukkhena laddhā, mā naṃ antaradhāpetha, etha maṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1144_3: satthu santikaṃ jetavanaṃ gacchathā”ti. Tā taṃ ādāya rājagahā pañcacattālīsayojanikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1144_4: maggaṃ atikkamma anupubbena jetavanaṃ patvā satthāraṃ vanditvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1144_5: Satthā cintesi – “kiñcāpi gihikāle etissā gabbho patiṭṭhito, evaṃ santepi ‘samaṇo
atk-s0513a1:1144_6: gotamo devadattena jahitaṃ ādāya caratī’ti titthiyānaṃ okāso bhavissati. Tasmā imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1144_7: kathaṃ pacchindituṃ sarājikāya parisāya majjhe imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1144_8: Punadivase rājānaṃ pasenadikosalaṃ mahāanāthapiṇḍikaṃ cūḷaanāthapiṇḍikaṃ visākhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1144_9: mahāupāsikaṃ aññāni ca abhiññātāni mahākulāni pakkosāpetvā sāyanhasamaye catūsu parisāsu
atk-s0513a1:1144_10: sannipatitāsu upālittheraṃ āmantesi “gaccha, tvaṃ catuparisamajjhe imissā daharabhikkhuniyā
atk-s0513a1:1144_11: kammaṃ sodhehī”ti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti thero parisamajjhaṃ gantvā attano paññattāsane
atk-s0513a1:1144_12: nisīditvā rañño purato visākhaṃ upāsikaṃ pakkosāpetvā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ paṭicchāpesi
atk-s0513a1:1144_13: “gaccha visākhe, ‘ayaṃ daharā asukamāse asukadivase pabbajitā’ti tathato ñatvā imassa
atk-s0513a1:1144_14: gabbhassa pure vā pacchā vā laddhabhāvaṃ jānāhī”ti. Upāsikā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a1:1144_16: oloketvā māsadivase samānetvā gihibhāve gabbhassa laddhabhāvaṃ tathato ñatvā therassa
atk-s0513a1:1144_17: santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Thero catuparisamajjhe taṃ bhikkhuniṃ suddhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1144_18: akāsi. Sā suddhā hutvā bhikkhusaṅghañca satthārañca vanditvā bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1144_19: upassayameva gatā. Sā gabbhaparipākamanvāya padumuttarapādamūle patthitapatthanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1145_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā bhikkhunupassayasamīpena gacchanto dārakasaddaṃ sutvā amacce pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1145_1: Amaccā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “deva, daharabhikkhunī puttaṃ vijātā, tasseso saddo”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1145_2: “Bhikkhunīnaṃ, bhaṇe, dārakapaṭijagganaṃ nāma palibodho, mayaṃ naṃ paṭijaggissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1145_3: rājā taṃ dārakaṃ nāṭakitthīnaṃ dāpetvā kumāraparihārena vaḍḍhāpesi. Nāmaggahaṇadivase
atk-s0513a1:1145_4: cassa “kassapo”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Atha naṃ kumāraparihārena vaḍḍhitattā “kumārakassapo”ti
atk-s0513a1:1145_5: sañjāniṃsu. So sattavassikakāle satthu santike pabbajitvā paripuṇṇavasso upasampadaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1145_6: labhitvā gacchante gacchante kāle dhammakathikesu citrakathī ahosi. Atha naṃ satthā
atk-s0513a1:1145_7: “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ kumārakassapo”ti
atk-s0513a1:1145_8: etadagge ṭhapesi. So pacchā vammikasutte arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Mātāpissa bhikkhunī vipassanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1145_9: vaḍḍhetvā aggaphalaṃ pattā. Kumārakassapatthero buddhasāsane gaganamajjhe puṇṇacando viya pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1146_0: Athekadivasaṃ tathāgato pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a1:1146_1: gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi. Bhikkhū ovādaṃ gahetvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu
atk-s0513a1:1146_2: divasabhāgaṃ khepetvā sāyanhasamaye dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitvā “āvuso, devadattena
atk-s0513a1:1146_3: attano abuddhabhāvena ceva khantimettādīnañca abhāvena kumārakassapatthero ca therī
atk-s0513a1:1146_4: ca ubho nāsitā, sammāsambuddho pana attano dhammarājatāya ceva khantimettānuddayasampattiyā
atk-s0513a1:1146_5: ca ubhinnampi tesaṃ paccayo jāto”ti buddhaguṇe vaṇṇayamānā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā buddhalīlāya
atk-s0513a1:1146_6: dhammasabhaṃ āgantvā paññattāsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0513a1:1146_7: sannisinnā”ti pucchi. “Bhante, tumhākameva guṇakathāyā”ti sabbaṃ ārocayiṃsu. Na,
atk-s0513a1:1146_8: bhikkhave, tathāgato idāneva imesaṃ ubhinnaṃ paccayo ca patiṭṭhā ca jāto, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:1146_9: ahosiyevāti. Bhikkhū tassatthassāvibhāvatthāya bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu. Bhagavā bhavantarena
atk-s0513a1:1147_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārayamāne bodhisatto migayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1147_1: gaṇhi. So mātukucchito nikkhanto suvaṇṇavaṇṇo ahosi, akkhīni panassa maṇiguḷasadisāni
atk-s0513a1:1147_2: ahesuṃ, siṅgāni rajatavaṇṇāni, mukhaṃ rattakambalapuñjavaṇṇaṃ, hatthapādapariyantā
atk-s0513a1:1147_3: lākhārasaparikammakatā viya, vāladhi camarassa viya ahosi, sarīraṃ panassa mahantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1147_4: assapotakappamāṇaṃ ahosi. So pañcasatamigaparivāro araññe vāsaṃ kappesi nāmena nigrodhamigarājā
atk-s0513a1:1147_5: nāma. Avidūre panassa aññopi pañcasatamigaparivāro sākhamigo nāma vasati, sopi suvaṇṇavaṇṇova ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1148_0: Tena samayena bārāṇasirājā migavadhappasuto hoti, vinā maṃsena na bhuñjati, manussānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1148_1: kammacchedaṃ katvā sabbe negamajānapade sannipātetvā devasikaṃ migavaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1148_2: Manussā cintesuṃ – “ayaṃ rājā amhākaṃ kammacchedaṃ karoti, yaṃnūna mayaṃ uyyāne migānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1148_3: nivāpaṃ vapitvā pānīyaṃ sampādetvā bahū mige uyyānaṃ pavesetvā dvāraṃ bandhitvā rañño
atk-s0513a1:1148_4: niyyādeyyāmā”ti. Te sabbe uyyāne migānaṃ nivāpatiṇāni ropetvā udakaṃ sampādetvā dvāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1148_5: yojetvā vāgurāni ādāya muggarādinānāvudhahatthā araññaṃ pavisitvā mige pariyesamānā
atk-s0513a1:1148_6: “majjhe ṭhite mige gaṇhissāmā”ti yojanamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ parikkhipitvā saṅkhipamānā nigrodhamigasākhamigānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1148_7: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ majjhe katvā parikkhipiṃsu. Atha naṃ migagaṇaṃ disvā rukkhagumbādayo
atk-s0513a1:1148_8: ca bhūmiñca muggarehi paharantā migagaṇaṃ gahanaṭṭhānato nīharitvā asisattidhanuādīni
atk-s0513a1:1148_9: āvudhāni uggiritvā mahānādaṃ nadantā taṃ migagaṇaṃ uyyānaṃ pavesetvā dvāraṃ pidhāya
atk-s0513a1:1148_10: rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva, nibaddhaṃ migavaṃ gacchantā amhākaṃ kammaṃ nāsetha,
atk-s0513a1:1148_11: amhehi araññato mige ānetvā tumhākaṃ uyyānaṃ pūritaṃ, ito paṭṭhāya tesaṃ maṃsāni
atk-s0513a1:1149_0: Rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā uyyānaṃ gantvā mige olokento dve suvaṇṇamige disvā tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1149_1: abhayaṃ adāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya pana kadāci sayaṃ gantvā ekaṃ migaṃ vijjhitvā āneti,
atk-s0513a1:1149_2: kadācissa bhattakārako gantvā vijjhitvā āharati. Migā dhanuṃ disvāva maraṇabhayena
atk-s0513a1:1149_3: tajjitā palāyanti, dve tayo pahāre labhitvā kilamantipi, gilānāpi honti, maraṇampi
atk-s0513a1:1149_4: pāpuṇanti. Migagaṇo taṃ pavattiṃ bodhisattassa ārocesi. So sākhaṃ pakkosāpetvā āha
atk-s0513a1:1149_5: – “samma, bahū migā nassanti, ekaṃsena maritabbe sati ito paṭṭhāya mā kaṇḍena mige
atk-s0513a1:1149_6: vijjhantu, dhammagaṇḍikaṭṭhāne migānaṃ vāro hotu. Ekadivasaṃ mama parisāya vāro pāpuṇātu,
atk-s0513a1:1149_7: ekadivasaṃ tava parisāya, vārappatto migo gantvā dhammagaṇḍikāya gīvaṃ ṭhapetvā nipajjatu,
atk-s0513a1:1149_8: evaṃ sante migā kilantā na bhavissantī”ti. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:1149_9: vārappattova migo gantvā dhammagaṇḍikāya gīvaṃ ṭhapetvā nipajjati, bhattakārako āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:1150_0: Athekadivasaṃ sākhamigassa parisāya ekissā gabbhinimigiyā vāro pāpuṇi. Sā sākhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1150_1: upasaṅkamitvā “sāmi, ahaṃ gabbhinī, puttaṃ vijāyitvā dve janā vāraṃ gamissāma, mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1150_2: vāraṃ atikkāmehī”ti āha. So “na sakkā tava vāraṃ aññesaṃ pāpetuṃ, tvameva tuyhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1150_3: vāraṃ jānissasi, gacchāhī”ti āha. Sā tassa santikā anuggahaṃ alabhamānā bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1150_4: upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi. So tassā vacanaṃ sutvā “hotu gaccha tvaṃ, ahaṃ te
atk-s0513a1:1150_5: vāraṃ atikkāmessāmī”ti sayaṃ gantvā dhammagaṇḍikāya sīsaṃ katvā nipajji. Bhattakārako
atk-s0513a1:1150_6: taṃ disvā “laddhābhayo migarājā dhammagaṇḍikāya nipanno, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti vegena
atk-s0513a1:1151_0: Rājā tāvadeva rathaṃ āruyha mahantena parivārena āgantvā bodhisattaṃ disvā āha “samma
atk-s0513a1:1151_1: migarāja, nanu mayā tuyhaṃ abhayaṃ dinnaṃ, kasmā tvaṃ idha nipanno”ti. Mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:1151_2: gabbhinī migī āgantvā “mama vāraṃ aññassa pāpehī”ti āha, na sakkā kho pana mayā ekassa
atk-s0513a1:1151_3: maraṇadukkhaṃ aññassa upari nikkhipituṃ, svāhaṃ attano jīvitaṃ tassā datvā tassā
atk-s0513a1:1151_4: santakaṃ maraṇaṃ gahetvā idha nipanno, mā aññaṃ kiñci āsaṅkittha, mahārājāti. Rājā
atk-s0513a1:1151_5: āha – “sāmi, suvaṇṇavaṇṇamigarāja, mayā na tādiso khantimettānuddayasampanno manussesupi
atk-s0513a1:1151_6: diṭṭhapubbo, tena te pasannosmi, uṭṭhehi, tuyhañca tassā ca abhayaṃ dammī”ti. “Dvīhi
atk-s0513a1:1151_7: abhaye laddhe avasesā kiṃ karissanti, narindā”ti? “Avasesānampi abhayaṃ dammi, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1151_8: “Mahārāja, evampi uyyāneyeva migā abhayaṃ labhissanti, sesā kiṃ karissantī”ti? “Etesampi
atk-s0513a1:1151_9: abhayaṃ dammi, sāmī”ti. “Mahārāja, migā tāva abhayaṃ labhantu, sesā catuppadā kiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1151_10: karissantī”ti? “Etesampi abhayaṃ dammi, sāmī”ti. “Mahārāja, catuppadā tāva abhayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1151_11: labhantu, dijagaṇā kiṃ karissantī”ti? “Etesampi abhayaṃ dammi, sāmī”ti. “Mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:1151_12: dijagaṇā tāva abhayaṃ labhantu, udake vasantā macchā kiṃ karissantī”ti? “Etesampi
atk-s0513a1:1151_13: abhayaṃ dammi, sāmī”ti. Evaṃ mahāsatto rājānaṃ sabbasattānaṃ abhayaṃ yācitvā uṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:1151_14: rājānaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā “dhammaṃ cara, mahārāja, mātāpitūsu puttadhītāsu
atk-s0513a1:1151_15: brāhmaṇagahapatikesu negamajānapadesu dhammaṃ caranto samaṃ caranto kāyassa bhedā
atk-s0513a1:1151_16: paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ gamissasī”ti rañño buddhalīlāya dhammaṃ desetvā
atk-s0513a1:1151_17: katipāhaṃ uyyāne vasitvā rañño ovādaṃ datvā migagaṇaparivuto araññaṃ pāvisi. Sāpi
atk-s0513a1:1151_18: kho migadhenu pupphakaṇṇikasadisaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi. So kīḷamāno sākhamigassa santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1151_19: gacchati. Atha naṃ mātā tassa santikaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā “putta, ito paṭṭhāya mā etassa
atk-s0513a1:1151_20: santikaṃ gaccha, nigrodhasseva santikaṃ gaccheyyāsī”ti ovadantī imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1154: Nigrodhasmiṃ mataṃ seyyo, yañce sākhasmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1155_0: Tattha nigrodhameva seveyyāti tāta tvaṃ vā añño vā attano hitakāmo nigrodhameva seveyya
atk-s0513a1:1155_1: bhajeyya upasaṅkameyya, na sākhamupasaṃvaseti sākhamigaṃ pana na upasaṃvase upagamma
atk-s0513a1:1155_2: na saṃvaseyya, etaṃ nissāya jīvikaṃ na kappeyya. Nigrodhasmiṃ mataṃ seyyoti nigrodharañño
atk-s0513a1:1155_3: pādamūle maraṇampi seyyo varaṃ uttamaṃ. Yañce sākhasmi jīvitanti yaṃ pana sākhassa
atk-s0513a1:1155_4: santike jīvitaṃ, taṃ neva seyyo na varaṃ na uttamanti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1156_0: Tato paṭṭhāya ca pana abhayaladdhakā migā manussānaṃ sassāni khādanti, manussā “laddhābhayā
atk-s0513a1:1156_1: ime migā”ti mige paharituṃ vā palāpetuṃ vā na visahanti, te rājaṅgaṇe sannipatitvā
atk-s0513a1:1156_2: rañño tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Rājā “mayā pasannena nigrodhamigarājassa varo dinno, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1156_3: rajjaṃ jaheyyaṃ, na ca taṃ paṭiññaṃ bhindāmi, gacchatha na koci mama vijite mige
atk-s0513a1:1156_4: paharituṃ labhatī”ti āha. Nigrodhamigo taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā migagaṇaṃ sannipātāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1156_5: “ito paṭṭhāya paresaṃ sassaṃ khādituṃ na labhissathā”ti mige ovaditvā manussānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1156_6: ārocāpesi “ito paṭṭhāya sassakārakā manussā sassarakkhaṇatthaṃ vatiṃ mā karontu,
atk-s0513a1:1156_7: khettaṃ pana āvijjhitvā paṇṇasaññaṃ bandhantū”ti. Tato paṭṭhāya kira khettesu paṇṇabandhanasaññā
atk-s0513a1:1156_8: udapādi. Tato paṭṭhāya paṇṇasaññaṃ atikkamanamigo nāma natthi. Ayaṃ kira nesaṃ bodhisattato
atk-s0513a1:1156_9: laddhaovādo. Evaṃ migagaṇaṃ ovaditvā bodhisatto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā saddhiṃ migehi
atk-s0513a1:1156_10: yathākammaṃ gato, rājāpi bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1157_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idānevāhaṃ theriyā ca kumārakassapassa ca avassayo, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:1157_1: avassayo evā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā catusaccadhammadesanaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā dve
atk-s0513a1:1157_2: vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā sākhamigo devadatto
atk-s0513a1:1157_3: ahosi, parisāpissa devadattaparisāva, migadhenu therī ahosi, putto kumārakassapo,
atk-s0513a1:1157_4: rājā ānando, nigrodhamigarājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1161_0: Dhiratthu kaṇḍinaṃ sallanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1161_1: ārabbha kathesi. Taṃ aṭṭhakanipāte indriyajātake āvibhavissati. Bhagavā pana taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1161_2: bhikkhuṃ etadavoca “bhikkhu, pubbepi tvaṃ etaṃ mātugāmaṃ nissāya jīvitakkhayaṃ patvā
atk-s0513a1:1161_3: vītaccitesu aṅgāresu pakko”ti. Bhikkhū tassatthassāvibhāvatthāya bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1161_4: bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannakāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi. Ito paraṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1161_5: yācanaṃ bhavantarapaṭicchannatañca avatvā “atītaṃ āharī”ti ettakameva vakkhāma, ettake
atk-s0513a1:1161_7: cāti sabbametaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yojetvā veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1162_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahe magadharājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Magadhavāsikānaṃ sassasamaye
atk-s0513a1:1162_1: migānaṃ mahāparipantho hoti. Te araññe pabbatapādaṃ pavisanti. Tattha eko araññavāsī
atk-s0513a1:1162_2: pabbateyyamigo ekāya gāmantavāsiniyā migapotikāya saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā tesaṃ migānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1162_3: pabbatapādato oruyha puna gāmantaṃ otaraṇakāle migapotikāya paṭibaddhacittattā tehi
atk-s0513a1:1162_4: saddhiṃyeva otari. Atha naṃ sā āha – “tvaṃ khosi, ayya, pabbateyyo bālamigo, gāmanto
atk-s0513a1:1162_5: ca nāma sāsaṅko sappaṭibhayo, mā amhehi saddhiṃ otarī”ti. So tassā paṭibaddhacittattā
atk-s0513a1:1162_6: anivattitvā saddhiṃyeva agamāsi. Magadhavāsino “idāni migānaṃ pabbatapādā otaraṇakālo”ti
atk-s0513a1:1162_7: ñatvā magge paṭicchannakoṭṭhakesu tiṭṭhanti. Tesampi dvinnaṃ āgamanamagge eko luddako
atk-s0513a1:1162_8: paṭicchannakoṭṭhake ṭhito hoti. Migapotikā manussagandhaṃ ghāyitvā “eko luddako ṭhito
atk-s0513a1:1162_9: bhavissatī”ti taṃ bālamigaṃ purato katvā sayaṃ pacchato ahosi. Luddako ekeneva sarappahārena
atk-s0513a1:1162_10: migaṃ tattheva pāteti. Migapotikā tassa viddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā uppatitvā vātagatiyāva
atk-s0513a1:1162_11: palāyi. Luddako koṭṭhakato nikkhamitvā migaṃ okkantitvā aggiṃ katvā vītaccitesu aṅgāresu
atk-s0513a1:1162_12: madhuramaṃsaṃ pacitvā khāditvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā avasesaṃ lohitabindūhi paggharantehi
atk-s0513a1:1163_0: Tadā bodhisatto tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatto hoti. So taṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1163_1: disvā “imassa bālamigassa maraṇaṃ neva mātaraṃ nissāya, na pitaraṃ nissāya, atha
atk-s0513a1:1163_2: kho kāmaṃ nissāya. Kāmanimittañhi sattā sugatiyaṃ hatthacchedādikaṃ, duggatiyañca
atk-s0513a1:1163_4: nāma imasmiṃ loke garahitameva. Yaṃ janapadaṃ mātugāmo vicāreti anusāsati, so itthipariṇāyako
atk-s0513a1:1163_5: janapadopi garahitoyeva. Ye sattā mātugāmassa vasaṃ gacchanti, tepi garahitāyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1163_6: ekāya gāthāya tīṇi garahavatthūni dassetvā vanadevatāsu sādhukāraṃ datvā gandhapupphādīhi
atk-s0513a1:1163_7: pūjayamānāsu madhurena sarena taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ unnādento imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desesi –
atk-s0513a1:1167: Te cāpi dhikkitā sattā, ye itthīnaṃ vasaṃ gatā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1168_0: Tattha dhiratthūti garahaṇatthe nipāto, svāyamidha uttāsubbegavasena garahaṇe daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0513a1:1168_1: Uttasitubbiggo hi honto bodhisatto evamāha. Kaṇḍamassa atthīti kaṇḍī, taṃ kaṇḍinaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1168_2: Taṃ pana kaṇḍaṃ anupavisanaṭṭhena “salla”nti vuccati, tasmā kaṇḍinaṃ sallanti ettha
atk-s0513a1:1168_3: sallakaṇḍinanti attho. Sallaṃ vā assatthītipi sallo, taṃ sallaṃ. Mahantaṃ vaṇamukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1168_4: katvā balavappahāraṃ dento gāḷhaṃ vijjhatīti gāḷhavedhī, taṃ gāḷhavedhinaṃ. Nānappakārena
atk-s0513a1:1168_5: kaṇḍena, kumudapattasaṇṭhānathalena ujukagamaneneva sallena ca samannāgataṃ gāḷhavedhinaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1168_6: purisaṃ dhiratthūti ayamettha attho. Pariṇāyikāti issarā saṃvidhāyikā. Dhikkitāti
atk-s0513a1:1168_7: garahitā. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Ito paraṃ pana ettakampi avatvā yaṃ yaṃ anuttānaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1168_8: taṃ tadeva vaṇṇayissāma. Evaṃ ekāya gāthāya tīṇi garahavatthūni dassetvā bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1169_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:1169_1: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Satthā dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1169_2: samodhānesi. Ito paraṃ pana “dve vatthūni kathetvā”ti idaṃ avatvā “anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1169_3: ettakameva vakkhāma, avuttampi pana heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yojetvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1170: Tadā pabbateyyamigo ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu ahosi, migapotikā purāṇadutiyikā, kāmesu dosaṃ dassetvā dhammadesakadevatā pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a1:1174_0: Na kiratthi rasehi pāpiyoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissattheraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1174_1: ārabbha kathesi. Satthari kira rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharante tissakumāro
atk-s0513a1:1174_2: nāma mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhikulassa putto ekadivasaṃ veḷuvanaṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1174_3: sutvā pabbajitukāmo pabbajjaṃ yācitvā mātāpitūhi ananuññātattā paṭikkhitto sattāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1174_4: bhattacchedaṃ katvā raṭṭhapālatthero viya mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā satthu santike
atk-s0513a1:1174_5: pabbaji. Satthā taṃ pabbājetvā aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ veḷuvane viharitvā jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1174_6: Tatrāyaṃ kulaputto terasa dhutaṅgāni samādāya sāvatthiyaṃ sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno
atk-s0513a1:1174_7: kālaṃ vītināmeti, “cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissatthero nāmā”ti vutte gaganatale puṇṇacando
atk-s0513a1:1175_0: Tasmiṃ kāle rājagahe nakkhattakīḷāya vattamānāya therassa mātāpitaro yaṃ tassa gihikāle
atk-s0513a1:1175_1: ahosi ābharaṇabhaṇḍakaṃ, taṃ ratanacaṅkoṭake nikkhipitvā ure ṭhapetvā “aññāsu nakkhattakīḷāsu
atk-s0513a1:1175_2: amhākaṃ putto iminā alaṅkārena alaṅkato nakkhattaṃ kīḷati, taṃ no ekaputtaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1175_3: samaṇo gotamo sāvatthinagaraṃ gato, kahaṃ nu kho so etarahi nisinno, kahaṃ ṭhito”ti vatvā rodanti.
atk-s0513a1:1176_0: Athekā vaṇṇadāsī taṃ kulaṃ gantvā seṭṭhibhariyaṃ rodantiṃ disvā pucchi “kiṃ pana,
atk-s0513a1:1176_1: ayye, rodasī”ti? “Sā tamatthaṃ ārocesi”. “Kiṃ pana, ayye, ayyaputto piyāyatī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1176_2: “Asukañca asukañcā”ti. “Sace tumhe imasmiṃ gehe sabbaṃ issariyaṃ mayhaṃ detha, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1176_3: vo puttaṃ ānessāmī”ti. Seṭṭhibhariyā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā paribbayaṃ datvā mahantena
atk-s0513a1:1176_4: parivārena taṃ uyyojesi “gaccha, attano balena mama puttaṃ ānehī”ti. Sā paṭicchannayāne
atk-s0513a1:1176_5: nisinnā sāvatthiṃ gantvā therassa bhikkhācāravīthiyaṃ nivāsaṃ gahetvā seṭṭhikulā
atk-s0513a1:1176_6: āgate manusse therassa adassetvā attano parivāreneva parivutā therassa piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa
atk-s0513a1:1176_7: āditova uḷuṅkayāguñca rasakabhikkhañca datvā rasataṇhāya bandhitvā anukkamena gehe
atk-s0513a1:1176_8: nisīdāpetvā bhikkhaṃ dadamānā ca attano vasaṃ upagatabhāvaṃ ñatvā gilānālayaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0513a1:1176_9: antogabbhe nipajji. Theropi bhikkhācāravelāya sapadānaṃ caranto gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1176_10: Parijano therassa pattaṃ gahetvā theraṃ ghare nisīdāpesi. Thero nisīditvāva “kahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1176_11: upāsikā”ti pucchi. “Gilānā, bhante, tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ icchatī”ti. So rasataṇhāya
atk-s0513a1:1176_12: baddho attano vatasamādānaṃ bhinditvā tassā nipannaṭṭhānaṃ pāvisi. Sā attano āgatakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1176_13: kathetvā taṃ palobhetvā rasataṇhāya bandhitvā uppabbājetvā attano vase ṭhapetvā yāne
atk-s0513a1:1176_14: nisīdāpetvā mahantena parivārena rājagahameva agamāsi. Sā pavatti pākaṭā jātā.
atk-s0513a1:1177_0: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā “cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissattheraṃ kira ekā vaṇṇadāsī
atk-s0513a1:1177_1: rasataṇhāya bandhitvā ādāya gatā”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Satthā dhammasabhaṃ upagantvā
atk-s0513a1:1177_2: alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1177_3: āha. Te taṃ pavattiṃ kathayiṃsu. “Na, bhikkhave, idāneva eso bhikkhu rasataṇhāya
atk-s0513a1:1177_4: bajjhitvā tassā vasaṃ gato, pubbepi tassā vasaṃ gatoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1178_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ rañño brahmadattassa sañjayo nāma uyyānapālo ahosi. Atheko vātamigo
atk-s0513a1:1178_1: taṃ uyyānaṃ āgantvā sañjayaṃ disvā palāyati, sañjayopi na taṃ tajjetvā nīharati.
atk-s0513a1:1178_2: So punappunaṃ āgantvā uyyāneyeva carati. Uyyānapālo uyyāne nānappakārāni pupphaphalāni
atk-s0513a1:1178_3: gahetvā divase divase rañño abhiharati. Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ rājā pucchi “samma uyyānapāla,
atk-s0513a1:1178_4: uyyāne kiñci acchariyaṃ passasī”ti? “Deva, aññaṃ na passāmi, eko pana vātamigo āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:1178_5: uyyāne carati, etaṃ passāmī”ti. “Sakkhissati pana taṃ gahetu”nti. “Thokaṃ madhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1178_6: labhanto anto rājanivesanampi naṃ ānetuṃ sakkhissāmi, devā”ti. Rājā tassa madhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1178_7: dāpesi. So taṃ gahetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā vātamigassa caraṇaṭṭhāne tiṇāni madhunā makkhetvā
atk-s0513a1:1178_8: nilīyi. Migo āgantvā madhumakkhitāni tiṇāni khāditvā rasataṇhāya baddho aññatra agantvā
atk-s0513a1:1178_9: uyyānameva āgacchati. Uyyānapālo tassa madhumakkhitatiṇesu paluddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā anukkamena
atk-s0513a1:1178_10: attānaṃ dassesi. So taṃ disvā katipāhaṃ palāyitvā punappunaṃ passanto vissāsaṃ āpajjitvā
atk-s0513a1:1178_11: anukkamena uyyānapālassa hatthe ṭhitatiṇāni khādituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:1179_0: So tassa vissāsaṃ āpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā yāva rājanivesanā vīthiṃ kilañjehi parikkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1179_1: tahiṃ tahiṃ sākhābhaṅgaṃ pātetvā madhulābukaṃ aṃse laggetvā tiṇakalāpaṃ upakacchake
atk-s0513a1:1179_2: ṭhapetvā madhumakkhitāni tiṇāni migassa purato purato vikiranto antorājanivesanaṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:1179_3: agamāsi. Mige anto paviṭṭhe dvāraṃ pidahiṃsu. Migo manusse disvā kampamāno maraṇabhayatajjito
atk-s0513a1:1179_4: antonivesanaṅgaṇe ādhāvati paridhāvati. Rājā pāsādā oruyha taṃ kampamānaṃ disvā “vātamigo
atk-s0513a1:1179_5: nāma manussānaṃ diṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ sattāhaṃ na gacchati, tajjitaṭṭhānaṃ yāvajīvaṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0513a1:1179_6: so evarūpo gahananissito vātamigo rasataṇhāya baddho idāni evarūpaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgato,
atk-s0513a1:1179_7: natthi vata bho loke rasataṇhāya pāpataraṃ nāmā”ti imāya gāthāya dhammadesanaṃ paṭṭhapesi –
atk-s0513a1:1181: “Na kiratthi rasehi pāpiyo, āvāsehiva santhavehi vā;
atk-s0513a1:1183_0: Tattha kirāti anussavanatthe nipāto. Rasehīti jivhāviññeyyehi madhurambilādīhi. Pāpiyoti
atk-s0513a1:1183_1: pāpataro. Āvāsehiva santhavehi vāti nibaddhavasanaṭṭhānasaṅkhātesu hi āvāsesupi mittasanthavesupi
atk-s0513a1:1183_2: chandarāgo pāpakova, tehi pana sacchandarāgaparibhogehi āvāsehi vā mittasanthavehi
atk-s0513a1:1183_3: vā sataguṇena ca sahassaguṇena ca satasahassaguṇena ca dhuvapaṭisevanaṭṭhena āhāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1183_4: vinā jīvitindriyapālanāya abhāvena ca sacchandarāgaparibhogarasāva pāpatarāti. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1183_5: pana anussavāgataṃ viya imamatthaṃ katvā “na kiratthi rasehi pāpiyo, āvāsehiva santhavehi
atk-s0513a1:1183_6: vā”ti āha. Idāni tesaṃ pāpiyabhāvaṃ dassento “vātamiga”ntiādimāha. Tattha gahananissitanti
atk-s0513a1:1183_7: gahanaṭṭhānanissitaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – passatha rasānaṃ pāpiyabhāvaṃ, idaṃ nāma
atk-s0513a1:1183_8: araññāyatane gahananissitaṃ vātamigaṃ sañjayo uyyānapālo madhurasehi attano vasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1183_9: ānesi, sabbathāpi sacchandarāgaparibhogehi rasehi nāma aññaṃ pāpataraṃ lāmakataraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1183_10: natthīti rasataṇhāya ādīnavaṃ kathesi. Kathetvā ca pana taṃ migaṃ araññameva pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:1184_0: Satthāpi “na, bhikkhave, sā vaṇṇadāsī idāneva etaṃ rasataṇhāya bandhitvā attano vase
atk-s0513a1:1184_1: karoti, pubbepi akāsiyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1184_2: samodhānesi. “Tadā sañjayo ayaṃ vaṇṇadāsī ahosi, vātamigo cūḷapiṇḍapātiko, bārāṇasirājā
atk-s0513a1:1188_0: Aṭṭhakkhuraṃ kharādiyeti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1188_1: ārabbha kathesi. So kira bhikkhu dubbaco ovādaṃ na gaṇhāti. Atha naṃ satthā pucchi
atk-s0513a1:1188_2: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu dubbaco ovādaṃ na gaṇhāsī”ti? “Saccaṃ bhagavā”ti. Satthā
atk-s0513a1:1188_3: “pubbepi tvaṃ dubbacatāya paṇḍitānaṃ ovādaṃ aggahetvā pāsena baddho jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1189_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto migo hutvā migagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0513a1:1189_1: araññe vasati. Athassa bhaginimigī puttakaṃ dassetvā “bhātika, ayaṃ te bhāgineyyo,
atk-s0513a1:1189_2: etaṃ migamāyaṃ uggaṇhāpehī”ti paṭicchāpesi. So taṃ bhāgineyyaṃ “asukavelāya nāma
atk-s0513a1:1189_3: āgantvā uggaṇhāhī”ti āha. So vuttavelāya nāgacchati. Yathā ca ekadivasaṃ, evaṃ satta
atk-s0513a1:1189_4: divase sattovāde atikkanto so migamāyaṃ anuggaṇhitvāva vicaranto pāse bajjhi. Mātāpissa
atk-s0513a1:1189_5: bhātaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ te, bhātika, bhāgineyyo migamāyaṃ uggaṇhāpito”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1189_6: Bodhisatto ca “tassa anovādakassa mā cintayi, na te puttena migamāyā uggahitā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1189_7: vatvā idānipi taṃ anovaditukāmova hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1193_0: Tattha aṭṭhakkhuranti ekekasmiṃ pāde dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena aṭṭhakkhuraṃ. Kharādiyeti
atk-s0513a1:1193_1: taṃ nāmena ālapati. Miganti sabbasaṅgāhikavacanaṃ. Vaṅkātivaṅkinanti mūle vaṅkāni,
atk-s0513a1:1193_2: agge ativaṅkānīti vaṅkātivaṅkāni, tādisāni siṅgāni assa atthīti vaṅkātivaṅkī, taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1193_3: vaṅkātivaṅkinaṃ. Sattahi kālātikkantanti sattahi ovādakālehi ovādaṃ atikkantaṃ. Na
atk-s0513a1:1193_4: naṃ ovaditussaheti etaṃ dubbacamigaṃ ahaṃ ovadituṃ na ussahāmi, etassa me ovādatthāya
atk-s0513a1:1193_5: cittampi na uppajjatīti dasseti. Atha naṃ dubbacamigaṃ pāse baddhaṃ luddo māretvā
atk-s0513a1:1194_0: Satthāpi “na tvaṃ bhikkhu idāneva dubbaco, pubbepi dubbacoyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1194_1: āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi. “Tadā bhāgineyyo migo dubbacabhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:1194_2: ahosi, bhaginī uppalavaṇṇā, ovādamigo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1198_0: Migaṃ tipallatthanti idaṃ satthā kosambiyaṃ badarikārāme viharanto sikkhākāmaṃ rāhulattheraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1198_1: ārabbha kathesi. Ekasmiñhi kāle satthari āḷavinagaraṃ upanissāya aggāḷave cetiye
atk-s0513a1:1198_2: viharante bahū upāsakā upāsikā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ca vihāraṃ dhammassavanatthāya
