atk-s0513a1:1198_3: gacchanti, divā dhammassavanaṃ hoti. Gacchante pana kāle upāsikāyo bhikkhuniyo ca
atk-s0513a1:1198_4: na gacchiṃsu, bhikkhū ceva upāsakā ca ahesuṃ. Tato paṭṭhāya rattiṃ dhammassavanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1198_5: jātaṃ. Dhammassavanapariyosāne therā bhikkhū attano attano vasanaṭṭhānāni gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:1198_6: Daharā sāmaṇerā ca upāsakehi saddhiṃ upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ sayanti. Tesu niddaṃ upagatesu
atk-s0513a1:1198_7: ekacce ghurughurupassāsā kākacchamānā dante khādantā nipajjiṃsu, ekacce muhuttaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1198_8: niddāyitvā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Te taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā “yo pana
atk-s0513a1:1198_9: bhikkhu anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya pācittiya”nti sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetvā kosambiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1199_0: Tattha bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ āhaṃsu – “āvuso rāhula, bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1199_1: idāni tvaṃ attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ jānāhī”ti. Pubbe pana te bhikkhū bhagavati ca gāravaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1199_2: tassa cāyasmato sikkhākāmataṃ paṭicca taṃ attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ ativiya saṅgaṇhanti,
atk-s0513a1:1199_3: khuddakamañcakaṃ paññapetvā ussīsakakaraṇatthāya cīvaraṃ denti. Taṃ divasaṃ pana
atk-s0513a1:1199_4: sikkhāpadabhayena vasanaṭṭhānampi na adaṃsu. Rāhulabhaddopi “pitā me”ti dasabalassa
atk-s0513a1:1199_5: vā, “upajjhāyo me”ti dhammasenāpatino vā, “ācariyo me”ti mahāmoggallānassa vā, “cūḷapitā
atk-s0513a1:1199_6: me”ti ānandattherassa vā santikaṃ agantvā dasabalassa vaḷañjanavaccakuṭiṃ brahmavimānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1199_7: pavisanto viya pavisitvā vāsaṃ kappesi. Buddhānañhi vaḷañjanakuṭiyaṃ dvāraṃ supihitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1199_8: hoti, gandhaparibhaṇḍakatā bhūmi, gandhadāmamālādāmāni osāritāneva honti, sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1199_9: dīpo jhāyati. Rāhulabhaddo pana na tassā kuṭiyā imaṃ sampattiṃ paṭicca tattha vāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1199_10: upagato, bhikkhūhi pana “vasanaṭṭhānaṃ jānāhī”ti vuttattā ovādagāravena sikkhākāmatāya
atk-s0513a1:1199_11: tattha vāsaṃ upagato. Antarantarā hi bhikkhū taṃ āyasmantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1199_12: disvā tassa vīmaṃsanatthāya muṭṭhisammajjaniṃ vā kacavarachaḍḍanakaṃ vā bahi khipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1199_13: tasmiṃ āgate “āvuso, imaṃ kena chaḍḍita”nti vadanti. Tattha kehici “rāhulo iminā
atk-s0513a1:1199_14: maggena gato”ti vutte so āyasmā “nāhaṃ, bhante, etaṃ jānāmī”ti avatvāva taṃ paṭisāmetvā
atk-s0513a1:1199_15: “khamatha me, bhante”ti khamāpetvā gacchati. Evamesa sikkhākāmo.
atk-s0513a1:1200_0: So taṃ sikkhākāmataṃyeva paṭicca tattha vāsaṃ upagato. Atha satthā purearuṇaṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:1200_1: vaccakuṭidvāre ṭhatvā ukkāsi, sopāyasmā ukkāsi. “Ko eso”ti? “Ahaṃ rāhulo”ti nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a1:1200_2: vandi. “Kasmā tvaṃ rāhula idha nipannosī”ti? “Vasanaṭṭhānassa abhāvato”. “Pubbe hi,
atk-s0513a1:1200_3: bhante, bhikkhū mama saṅgahaṃ karonti, idāni attano āpattibhayena vasanaṭṭhānaṃ na
atk-s0513a1:1200_4: denti, svāhaṃ ‘idaṃ aññesaṃ asaṅghaṭṭanaṭṭhāna’nti iminā kāraṇena idha nipannosmīti.
atk-s0513a1:1200_5: Atha bhagavato “rāhulaṃ tāva bhikkhū evaṃ pariccajanti, aññe kuladārake pabbājetvā
atk-s0513a1:1201_0: Atha bhagavā pātova bhikkhū sannipātāpetvā dhammasenāpatiṃ pucchi “jānāsi pana tvaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1201_1: sāriputta, ajja katthaci rāhulassa vutthabhāva”nti? “Na jānāmi, bhante”ti. “Sāriputta,
atk-s0513a1:1201_2: ajja rāhulo vaccakuṭiyaṃ vasi, sāriputta, tumhe rāhulaṃ evaṃ pariccajantā aññe kuladārake
atk-s0513a1:1201_3: pabbājetvā kiṃ karissatha? Evañhi sante imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitā na patiṭṭhā bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a1:1201_4: ito dāni paṭṭhāya anupasampannena ekaṃ dve divase attano santike vasāpetvā tatiyadivase
atk-s0513a1:1201_5: tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ ñatvā bahi vāsethā”ti imaṃ anupaññattiṃ katvā puna sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1202_0: Tasmiṃ samaye dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā bhikkhū rāhulassa guṇakathaṃ kathenti “passathāvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1202_1: yāva sikkhākāmo vatāyaṃ rāhulo, ‘tava vasanaṭṭhānaṃ jānāhī’ti vutto nāma ‘ahaṃ dasabalassa
atk-s0513a1:1202_2: putto, tumhākaṃ senāsanasmā tumheyeva nikkhamathā’ti ekaṃ bhikkhumpi appaṭippharitvā
atk-s0513a1:1202_3: vaccakuṭiyaṃ vāsaṃ kappesī”ti. Evaṃ tesu kathayamānesu satthā dhammasabhaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:1202_4: alaṅkatāsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1202_5: “Bhante, rāhulassa sikkhākāmakathāya, na aññāya kathāyā”ti. Satthā “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:1202_6: rāhulo idāneva sikkhākāmo, pubbe tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi sikkhākāmoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1203_0: Atīte rājagahe eko magadharājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Tadā bodhisatto migayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:1203_1: migagaṇaparivuto araññe vasati. Athassa bhaginī attano puttakaṃ upanetvā “bhātika,
atk-s0513a1:1203_2: imaṃ te bhāgineyyaṃ migamāyaṃ sikkhāpehī”ti āha. Bodhisatto “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā
atk-s0513a1:1203_3: “gaccha, tāta, asukavelāya nāma āgantvā sikkheyyāsī”ti āha. So mātulena vuttavelaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1203_4: anatikkamitvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā migamāyaṃ sikkhi. So ekadivasaṃ vane vicaranto pāsena
atk-s0513a1:1203_5: baddho baddharavaṃ ravi, migagaṇo palāyitvā “putto te pāsena baddho”ti tassa mātuyā
atk-s0513a1:1203_6: ārocesi. Sā bhātu santikaṃ gantvā “bhātika, bhāgineyyo te migamāyaṃ sikkhāpito”ti
atk-s0513a1:1203_7: pucchi. Bodhisatto “mā tvaṃ puttassa kiñci pāpakaṃ āsaṅki, suggahitā tena migamāyā,
atk-s0513a1:1203_8: idāni taṃ hāsayamāno āgacchissatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1206: Ekena sotena chamāssasanto, chahi kalāhitibhoti bhāgineyyo”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1207_0: Tattha miganti bhāgineyyamigaṃ. Tipallatthanti pallatthaṃ vuccati sayanaṃ, ubhohi
atk-s0513a1:1207_1: passehi ujukameva ca nipannakavasenāti tīhākārehi pallatthaṃ assa, tīṇi vā pallatthāni
atk-s0513a1:1207_2: assāti tipallattho, taṃ tipallatthaṃ. Anekamāyanti bahumāyaṃ bahuvañcanaṃ. Aṭṭhakkhuranti
atk-s0513a1:1207_3: ekekasmiṃ pāde dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena aṭṭhahi khurehi samannāgataṃ. Aḍḍharattāpapāyinti
atk-s0513a1:1207_4: purimayāmaṃ atikkamitvā majjhimayāme araññato āgamma pānīyassa pivanato aḍḍharatte
atk-s0513a1:1207_5: āpaṃ pivatīti aḍḍharattāpapāyī. Taṃ aḍḍharatte apāyinti attho. Mama bhāgineyyaṃ migaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1207_6: ahaṃ sādhukaṃ migamāyaṃ uggaṇhāpesiṃ. Kathaṃ? Yathā ekena sotena chamāssasanto, chahi
atk-s0513a1:1207_7: kalāhitibhoti bhāgineyyoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ahañhi tava puttaṃ tathā uggaṇhāpesiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1207_8: yathā ekasmiṃ uparimanāsikāsote vātaṃ sannirumbhitvā pathaviyā allīnena ekena heṭṭhimasotena
atk-s0513a1:1207_9: tattheva chamāyaṃ assasanto chahi kalāhi luddakaṃ atibhoti, chahi koṭṭhāsehi ajjhottharati
atk-s0513a1:1207_10: vañcetīti attho. Katamāhi chahi? Cattāro pāde pasāretvā ekena passena seyyāya, khurehi
atk-s0513a1:1208_0: Aparo nayo – pādena paṃsuṃ gahetvā abhimukhākaḍḍhanena, paṭipaṇāmanena, ubhosu passesu
atk-s0513a1:1208_1: sañcaraṇena, udaraṃ uddhaṃ pakkhipanena, adho avakkhipanenāti imāhi chahi kalāhi
atk-s0513a1:1208_2: yathā atibhoti, “mato aya”nti saññaṃ uppādetvā vañceti, evaṃ taṃ migamāyaṃ uggaṇhāpesinti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:1209_0: Aparo nayo – tathā naṃ uggaṇhāpesiṃ, yathā ekena sotena chamāssasanto chahi kalāhiti
atk-s0513a1:1209_1: dvīsupi nayesu dassitehi chahi kāraṇehi kalāhiti kalāyissati, luddaṃ vañcessatīti
atk-s0513a1:1209_2: attho. Bhotīti bhaginiṃ ālapati. Bhāgineyyoti evaṃ chahi kāraṇehi vañcanakaṃ bhāgineyyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1209_3: niddisati. Evaṃ bodhisatto bhāgineyyassa migamāyāya sādhukaṃ uggahitabhāvaṃ dassento
atk-s0513a1:1210_0: Sopi migapotako pāse baddho avipphanditvāyeva bhūmiyaṃ mahāphāsukapassena pāde pasāretvā
atk-s0513a1:1210_1: nipanno pādānaṃ āsannaṭṭhāne khureheva paharitvā paṃsuñca tiṇāni ca uppāṭetvā uccārapassāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1210_2: vissajjetvā sīsaṃ pātetvā jivhaṃ ninnāmetvā sarīraṃ kheḷakilinnaṃ katvā vātaggahaṇena
atk-s0513a1:1210_3: udaraṃ uddhumātakaṃ katvā akkhīni parivattetvā heṭṭhā nāsikāsotena vātaṃ sañcarāpento
atk-s0513a1:1210_4: uparimanāsikāsotena vātaṃ sannirumbhitvā sakalasarīraṃ thaddhabhāvaṃ gāhāpetvā matākāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1210_5: dassesi. Nīlamakkhikāpi naṃ samparivāresuṃ, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne kākā nilīyiṃsu. Luddo
atk-s0513a1:1210_6: āgantvā udaraṃ hatthena paharitvā “atipātova baddho bhavissati, pūtiko jāto”ti tassa
atk-s0513a1:1210_7: bandhanarajjukaṃ mocetvā “etthevadāni naṃ ukkantitvā maṃsaṃ ādāya gamissāmī”ti nirāsaṅko
atk-s0513a1:1210_8: hutvā sākhāpalāsaṃ gahetuṃ āraddho. Migapotakopi uṭṭhāya catūhi pādehi ṭhatvā kāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1210_9: vidhunitvā gīvaṃ pasāretvā mahāvātena chinnavalāhako viya vegena mātu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1211_0: Satthāpi “na, bhikkhave, rāhulo idāneva sikkhākāmo, pubbepi sikkhākāmoyevā”ti imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1211_1: dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā bhāgineyyamigapotako
atk-s0513a1:1211_2: rāhulo ahosi, mātā uppalavaṇṇā, mātulamigo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1215_0: Kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇheti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dve vuḍḍhapabbajite ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1215_1: kathesi. Te kira kosalajanapade ekasmiṃ araññāvāse vasanti. Eko kāḷatthero nāma,
atk-s0513a1:1215_2: eko juṇhatthero nāma. Athekadivasaṃ juṇho kāḷaṃ pucchi “bhante kāḷa, sītaṃ nāma kasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1215_3: kāle hotī”ti. So “kāḷe hotī”ti āha. Athekadivasaṃ kāḷo juṇhaṃ pucchi – “bhante juṇha,
atk-s0513a1:1215_4: sītaṃ nāma kasmiṃ kāle hotī”ti. So “juṇhe hotī”ti āha. Te ubhopi attano kaṅkhaṃ chindituṃ
atk-s0513a1:1215_5: asakkontā satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā “bhante, sītaṃ nāma kasmiṃ kāle
atk-s0513a1:1215_6: hotī”ti pucchiṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “pubbepi ahaṃ, bhikkhave, tumhākaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1215_7: pañhaṃ kathesiṃ, bhavasaṅkhepagatattā pana na sallakkhayitthā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1216_0: Atīte ekasmiṃ pabbatapāde sīho ca byaggho ca dve sahāyā ekissāyeva guhāya vasanti.
atk-s0513a1:1216_1: Tadā bodhisattopi isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tasmiṃyeva pabbatapāde vasati. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1216_2: tesaṃ sahāyakānaṃ sītaṃ nissāya vivādo udapādi. Byaggho “kāḷeyeva sītaṃ hotī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1216_3: Sīho “juṇheyeva sītaṃ hotī”ti āha. Te ubhopi attano kaṅkhaṃ chindituṃ asakkontā bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1218: “Kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇhe, yadā vāyati māluto;
atk-s0513a1:1220_0: Tattha kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇheti kāḷapakkhe vā juṇhapakkhe vā. Yadā vāyati mālutoti
atk-s0513a1:1220_1: yasmiṃ samaye puratthimādibhedo vāto vāyati, tasmiṃ samaye sītaṃ hoti. Kiṃkāraṇā?
atk-s0513a1:1220_2: Vātajāni hi sītāni, yasmā vāte vijjanteyeva sītāni honti, kāḷapakkho vā juṇhapakkho
atk-s0513a1:1220_3: vā ettha apamāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ubhotthamaparājitāti ubhopi tumhe imasmiṃ pañhe
atk-s0513a1:1220_4: aparājitāti. Evaṃ bodhisatto te sahāyake saññāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1221_0: Satthāpi “bhikkhave, pubbepi mayā tumhākaṃ ayaṃ pañho kathito”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1221_1: āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne dvepi therā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1221_2: Satthā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā byaggho kāḷo ahosi, sīho juṇho,
atk-s0513a1:1225_0: Evaṃ ce sattā jāneyyunti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto matakabhattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1225_1: Tasmiñhi kāle manussā bahū ajeḷakādayo māretvā kālakate ñātake uddissa matakabhattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1225_2: nāma denti. Bhikkhū te manusse tathā karonte disvā satthāraṃ pucchiṃsu “etarahi,
atk-s0513a1:1225_3: bhante, manussā bahū pāṇe jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā matakabhattaṃ nāma denti. Atthi nu
atk-s0513a1:1225_4: kho, bhante, ettha vuḍḍhī”ti? Satthā “na, bhikkhave, ‘matakabhattaṃ dassāmā’ti katepi
atk-s0513a1:1225_5: pāṇātipāte kāci vuḍḍhi nāma atthi, pubbe paṇḍitā ākāse nisajja dhammaṃ desetvā ettha
atk-s0513a1:1225_6: ādīnavaṃ kathetvā sakalajambudīpavāsike etaṃ kammaṃ jahāpesuṃ. Idāni pana bhavasaṅkhepagatattā
atk-s0513a1:1226_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente eko tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū disāpāmokkho
atk-s0513a1:1226_1: ācariyabrāhmaṇo “matakabhattaṃ dassāmī”ti ekaṃ eḷakaṃ gāhāpetvā antevāsike āha –
atk-s0513a1:1226_2: “tātā, imaṃ eḷakaṃ nadiṃ netvā nhāpetvā kaṇṭhe mālaṃ parikkhipitvā pañcaṅgulikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1226_3: datvā maṇḍetvā ānethā”ti. Te “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā taṃ ādāya nadiṃ gantvā nhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1226_4: maṇḍetvā nadītīre ṭhapesuṃ. So eḷako attano pubbakammaṃ disvā “evarūpā nāma dukkhā
atk-s0513a1:1226_5: ajja muccissāmī”ti somanassajāto mattikāghaṭaṃ bhindanto viya mahāhasitaṃ hasitvā
atk-s0513a1:1226_6: puna “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo maṃ ghātetvā mayā laddhadukkhaṃ labhissatī”ti brāhmaṇe kāruññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1227_0: Atha naṃ te māṇavā pucchiṃsu “samma eḷaka, tvaṃ mahāsaddena hasi ceva rodi ca, kena
atk-s0513a1:1227_1: nu kho kāraṇena hasi, kena kāraṇena parodī”ti? “Tumhe maṃ imaṃ kāraṇaṃ attano ācariyassa
atk-s0513a1:1227_2: santike puccheyyāthā”ti. Te taṃ ādāya gantvā idaṃ kāraṇaṃ ācariyassa ārocesuṃ. Ācariyo
atk-s0513a1:1227_3: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā eḷakaṃ pucchi “kasmā tvaṃ eḷaka, hasi, kasmā rodī”ti? Eḷako attanā
atk-s0513a1:1227_4: katakammaṃ jātissarañāṇena anussaritvā brāhmaṇassa kathesi “ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, pubbe
atk-s0513a1:1227_5: tādisova mantajjhāyakabrāhmaṇo hutvā ‘matakabhattaṃ dassāmī’ti ekaṃ eḷakaṃ māretvā
atk-s0513a1:1227_6: matakabhattaṃ adāsiṃ, svāhaṃ ekassa eḷakassa ghātitattā ekenūnesu pañcasu attabhāvasatesu
atk-s0513a1:1227_7: sīsacchedaṃ pāpuṇiṃ, ayaṃ me koṭiyaṃ ṭhito pañcasatimo attabhāvo, svāhaṃ ‘ajja evarūpā
atk-s0513a1:1227_8: dukkhā muccissāmī’ti somanassajāto iminā kāraṇena hasiṃ. Rodanto pana ‘ahaṃ tāva
atk-s0513a1:1227_9: ekaṃ eḷakaṃ māretvā pañca jātisatāni sīsacchedadukkhaṃ patvā ajja tamhā dukkhā muccissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1227_10: ayaṃ pana brāhmaṇo maṃ māretvā ahaṃ viya pañca jātisatāni sīsacchedadukkhaṃ labhissatī’ti
atk-s0513a1:1227_11: tayi kāruññena rodi”nti. “Eḷaka, mā bhāyi, nāhaṃ taṃ māressāmī”ti. “Brāhmaṇa, kiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1227_12: vadesi, tayi mārentepi amārentepi na sakkā ajja mayā maraṇā muccitu”nti. “Eḷaka,
atk-s0513a1:1227_13: mā bhāyi, ahaṃ te ārakkhaṃ gahetvā tayā saddhiṃyeva vicarissāmī”ti. “Brāhmaṇa, appamattako
atk-s0513a1:1227_14: tava ārakkho, mayā katapāpaṃ pana mahantaṃ balava”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1228_0: Brāhmaṇo eḷakaṃ muñcitvā “imaṃ eḷakaṃ kassacipi māretuṃ na dassāmī”ti antevāsike
atk-s0513a1:1228_1: ādāya eḷakeneva saddhiṃ vicari. Eḷako vissaṭṭhamattova ekaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhiṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a1:1228_2: jātagumbe gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā paṇṇāni khādituṃ āraddho. Taṅkhaṇaññeva tasmiṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhe
atk-s0513a1:1228_3: asani pati, tato ekā pāsāṇasakalikā chijjitvā eḷakassa pasāritagīvāya patitvā sīsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1228_4: chindi, mahājano sannipati. Tadā bodhisatto tasmiṃ ṭhāne rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0513a1:1228_5: So passantasseva tassa mahājanassa devatānubhāvena ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā “ime
atk-s0513a1:1228_6: sattā evaṃ pāpassa phalaṃ jānamānā appevanāma pāṇātipātaṃ na kareyyu”nti madhurassarena
atk-s0513a1:1231: Na pāṇo pāṇinaṃ haññe, pāṇaghātī hi socatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1232_0: Tattha evaṃ ce sattā jāneyyunti ime sattā evaṃ ce jāneyyuṃ. Kathaṃ? Dukkhāyaṃ jātisambhavoti
atk-s0513a1:1232_1: ayaṃ tattha tattha jāti ca jātassa anukkamena vaḍḍhisaṅkhāto sambhavo ca jarābyādhimaraṇaappiyasampayogapiyavippayogahatthapādacchedādīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1232_2: dukkhānaṃ vatthubhūtattā “dukkho”ti yadi jāneyyuṃ. Na pāṇo pāṇinaṃ haññeti “paraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1232_3: vadhanto jātisambhave vadhaṃ labhati, pīḷento pīḷaṃ labhatī”ti jātisambhavassa dukkhavatthutāya
atk-s0513a1:1232_4: dukkhabhāvaṃ jānanto koci pāṇo aññaṃ pāṇinaṃ na haññe, satto sattaṃ na haneyyāti
atk-s0513a1:1232_5: attho. Kiṃkāraṇā? Pāṇaghātī hi socatīti, yasmā sāhatthikādīsu chasu payogesu yena
atk-s0513a1:1232_6: kenaci payogena parassa jīvitindriyupacchedanena pāṇaghātī puggalo aṭṭhasu mahānirayesu
atk-s0513a1:1232_7: soḷasasu ussadanirayesu nānappakārāya tiracchānayoniyā pettivisaye asurakāyeti imesu
atk-s0513a1:1232_8: catūsu apāyesu mahādukkhaṃ anubhavamāno dīgharattaṃ antonijjhāyanalakkhaṇena sokena
atk-s0513a1:1232_9: socati. Yathā vāyaṃ eḷako maraṇabhayena socati, evaṃ dīgharattaṃ socatītipi ñatvā
atk-s0513a1:1232_10: na pāṇo pāṇinaṃ haññe, koci pāṇātipātakammaṃ nāma na kareyya. Mohena pana mūḷhā avijjāya
atk-s0513a1:1232_11: andhīkatā imaṃ ādīnavaṃ apassantā pāṇātipātaṃ karontīti.
atk-s0513a1:1233_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto nirayabhayena tajjetvā dhammaṃ desesi. Manussā taṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a1:1233_1: nirayabhayabhītā pāṇātipātā viramiṃsu. Bodhisattopi dhammaṃ desetvā mahājanaṃ sīle
atk-s0513a1:1233_2: patiṭṭhāpetvā yathākammaṃ gato, mahājanopi bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni
atk-s0513a1:1233_3: katvā devanagaraṃ pūresi. Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0513a1:1233_4: jātakaṃ samodhānesi “ahaṃ tena samayena rukkhadevatā ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1237_0: Sace mucce pecca mucceti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devatānaṃ āyācanabalikammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1237_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tadā kira manussā vaṇijjāya gacchantā pāṇe vadhitvā devatānaṃ balikammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1237_2: katvā “mayaṃ anantarāyena atthasiddhiṃ patvā āgantvā puna tumhākaṃ balikammaṃ karissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1237_3: āyācitvā gacchanti. Tatthānantarāyena atthasiddhiṃ patvā āgatā “devatānubhāvena idaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1237_4: jāta”nti maññamānā bahū pāṇe vadhitvā āyācanato muccituṃ balikammaṃ karonti, taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1237_5: disvā bhikkhū “atthi nu kho, bhante, ettha attho”ti bhagavantaṃ pucchiṃsu. Bhagavā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1238_0: Atīte kāsiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ gāmake kuṭumbiko gāmadvāre ṭhitanigrodharukkhe devatāya
atk-s0513a1:1238_1: balikammaṃ paṭijānitvā anantarāyena āgantvā bahū pāṇe vadhitvā “āyācanato muccissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1238_2: rukkhamūlaṃ gato. Rukkhadevatā khandhaviṭape ṭhatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1240: “Sace mucce pecca mucce, muccamāno hi bajjhati;
atk-s0513a1:1241: Na hevaṃ dhīrā muccanti, mutti bālassa bandhana”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1242_0: Tattha sace mucce pecca mucceti bho purisa, tvaṃ sace mucce yadi muccitukāmosi. Pecca
atk-s0513a1:1242_1: mucceti yathā paraloke na bajjhasi, evaṃ muccāhi. Muccamāno hi bajjhatīti yathā pana
atk-s0513a1:1242_2: tvaṃ pāṇaṃ vadhitvā muccituṃ icchasi, evaṃ muccamāno hi pāpakammena bajjhati. Tasmā
atk-s0513a1:1242_3: na hevaṃ dhīrā muccantīti ye paṇḍitapurisā, te evaṃ paṭissavato na muccanti. Kiṃkāraṇā?
atk-s0513a1:1242_4: Evarūpā hi mutti bālassa bandhanaṃ, esā pāṇātipātaṃ katvā mutti nāma bālassa bandhanameva
atk-s0513a1:1242_5: hotīti dhammaṃ desesi. Tato paṭṭhāya manussā evarūpā pāṇātipātakammā viratā dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1243: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “ahaṃ tena samayena rukkhadevatā ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1247_0: Disvā padamanuttiṇṇanti idaṃ satthā kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno naḷakapānagāmaṃ patvā
atk-s0513a1:1247_1: naḷakapānapokkharaṇiyaṃ ketakavane viharanto naḷadaṇḍake ārabbha kathesi. Tadā kira
atk-s0513a1:1247_2: bhikkhū naḷakapānapokkharaṇiyaṃ nhatvā sūcigharatthāya sāmaṇerehi naḷadaṇḍake gāhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1247_3: te sabbatthakameva chidde disvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “bhante, mayaṃ sūcigharatthāya
atk-s0513a1:1247_4: naḷadaṇḍake gaṇhāpema, te mūlato yāva aggā sabbatthakameva chiddā, kiṃ nu kho eta”nti
atk-s0513a1:1247_5: pucchiṃsu. Satthā “idaṃ, bhikkhave, mayhaṃ porāṇakaadhiṭṭhāna”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1248_0: Pubbe kira so vanasaṇḍo arañño ahosi. Tassāpi pokkharaṇiyā eko dakarakkhaso otiṇṇotiṇṇe
atk-s0513a1:1248_1: khādati. Tadā bodhisatto rohitamigapotakappamāṇo kapirājā hutvā asītisahassamattavānaraparivuto
atk-s0513a1:1248_2: yūthaṃ pariharanto tasmiṃ araññe vasati. So vānaragaṇassa ovādaṃ adāsi “tātā, imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1248_3: araññe visarukkhāpi amanussapariggahitapokkharaṇiyopi honti, tumhe akhāditapubbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1248_4: phalāphalaṃ khādantā vā apītapubbaṃ pānīyaṃ pivantā vā maṃ paṭipuccheyyāthā”ti. Te
atk-s0513a1:1248_5: “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā ekadivasaṃ agatapubbaṭṭhānaṃ gatā tattha bahudeva divasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1248_6: caritvā pānīyaṃ gavesamānā ekaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ disvā pānīyaṃ apivitvāva bodhisattassāgamanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1248_7: olokayamānā nisīdiṃsu. Bodhisatto āgantvā “kiṃ tātā, pānīyaṃ na pivathā”ti āha. “Tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1248_8: āgamanaṃ olokemā”ti. “Suṭṭhu, tātā”ti bodhisatto pokkharaṇiṃ āvijjhitvā padaṃ paricchindanto
atk-s0513a1:1248_9: otiṇṇameva passi, na uttiṇṇaṃ. So “nissaṃsayaṃ esā amanussapariggahitā”ti ñatvā “suṭṭhu
atk-s0513a1:1248_10: vo kataṃ, tātā, pānīyaṃ apivantehi, amanussapariggahitā aya”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1249_0: Dakarakkhasopi tesaṃ anotaraṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā nīlodaro paṇḍaramukho surattahatthapādo
atk-s0513a1:1249_1: bībhacchadassano hutvā udakaṃ dvidhā katvā nikkhamitvā “kasmā nisinnāttha, otaritvā
atk-s0513a1:1249_2: pānīyaṃ pivathā”ti āha. Atha naṃ bodhisatto pucchi “tvaṃ idha nibbattadakarakkhasosī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1249_3: “Āma, aha”nti. “Tvaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ otiṇṇake labhasī”ti? “Āma, labhāmi, ahaṃ idhotiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1249_4: antamaso sakuṇikaṃ upādāya na kiñci muñcāmi, tumhepi sabbe khādissāmī”ti. “Na mayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1249_5: attānaṃ tuyhaṃ khādituṃ dassāmā”ti. “Pānīyaṃ pana pivissathā”ti. “Āma, pānīyaṃ pivissāma,
atk-s0513a1:1249_6: na ca te vasaṃ gamissāmā”ti. “Atha kathaṃ pānīyaṃ pivissathā”ti? Kiṃ pana tvaṃ maññasi
atk-s0513a1:1249_8: gahetvā uppalanāḷena udakaṃ pivantā viya tava pokkharaṇiyā pānīyaṃ pivissāma, evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1249_9: no tvaṃ khādituṃ na sakkhissasī”ti. Etamatthaṃ viditvā satthā abhisambuddho hutvā
atk-s0513a1:1252_0: Tassattho – bhikkhave, so kapirājā tassā pokkharaṇiyā ekampi uttiṇṇapadaṃ nāddasa,
atk-s0513a1:1252_1: otaritaṃ pana otiṇṇapadameva addasa. Evaṃ disvā padaṃ anuttiṇṇaṃ disvāna otaritaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1252_2: padaṃ “addhāyaṃ pokkharaṇī amanussapariggahitā”ti ñatvā tena saddhiṃ sallapanto sapariso āha –
atk-s0513a1:1254: Tassattho – mayaṃ tava pokkharaṇiyaṃ naḷena pānīyaṃ pivissāmāti. Puna mahāsatto āha –
atk-s0513a1:1256: Evaṃ naḷena pānīyaṃ pivantaṃ saparisampi maṃ tvaṃ neva vadhissasīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1257_0: Evañca pana vatvā bodhisatto ekaṃ naḷadaṇḍakaṃ āharāpetvā pāramiyo āvajjetvā saccakiriyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1257_1: katvā mukhena dhami, naḷo anto kiñci gaṇṭhiṃ asesetvā sabbatthakameva susiro ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1257_2: Iminā niyāmena aparampi aparampi āharāpetvā mukhena dhamitvā adāsi. Evaṃ santepi
atk-s0513a1:1257_3: na sakkā niṭṭhāpetuṃ, tasmā evaṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Bodhisatto pana “imaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1257_4: parivāretvā jātā sabbepi naḷā ekacchiddā hontū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi. Bodhisattānañhi hitūpacārassa
atk-s0513a1:1257_5: mahantatāya adhiṭṭhānaṃ samijjhati. Tato paṭṭhāya sabbepi taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ parivāretvā
atk-s0513a1:1257_6: uṭṭhitanaḷā ekacchiddā jātā. Imasmiñhi kappe cattāri kappaṭṭhiyapāṭihāriyāni nāma.
atk-s0513a1:1257_7: Katamāni cattāri? Cande sasalakkhaṇaṃ sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ ṭhassati, vaṭṭakajātake
atk-s0513a1:1257_8: aggino nibbutaṭṭhānaṃ sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ aggi na jhāyissati, ghaṭīkāranivesanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1257_9: sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ anovassakaṃ ṭhassati, imaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ parivāretvā uṭṭhitanaḷā
atk-s0513a1:1257_10: sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ ekacchiddā bhavissantīti imāni cattāri kappaṭṭhiyapāṭihāriyāni nāma.
atk-s0513a1:1258_0: Bodhisatto evaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā ekaṃ naḷaṃ ādāya nisīdi. Tepi asītisahassavānarā ekekaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1258_1: ādāya pokkharaṇiṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu. Tepi bodhisattassa naḷena ākaḍḍhitvā pānīyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1258_2: pivanakāle sabbe tīre nisinnāva piviṃsu. Evaṃ tehi pānīye pivite dakarakkhaso kiñci
atk-s0513a1:1258_3: alabhitvā anattamano sakanivesanameva gato. Bodhisattopi saparivāro araññameva pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1259_0: Satthā pana “imesaṃ, bhikkhave, naḷānaṃ ekacchiddabhāvo nāma mayhamevetaṃ porāṇakaadhiṭṭhāna”nti
atk-s0513a1:1259_1: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā dakarakkhaso
atk-s0513a1:1259_2: devadatto ahosi, asītisahassavānarā buddhaparisā, upāyakusalo pana kapirājā ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1269_0: Ñātametaṃ kuruṅgassāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1269_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā bhikkhū “āvuso devadatto tathāgatassa
atk-s0513a1:1269_2: ghātanatthāya dhanuggahe payojesi, silaṃ pavijjhi, dhanapālaṃ vissajjesi, sabbathāpi
atk-s0513a1:1269_3: dasabalassa vadhāya parisakkatī”ti devadattassa avaṇṇaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0513a1:1269_4: āgantvā paññattāsane nisinno “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1269_5: pucchi. Bhante, devadatto tumhākaṃ vadhāya parisakkatīti tassa aguṇakathāya sannisinnāmhāti.
atk-s0513a1:1269_6: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, devadatto idāneva mama vadhāya parisakkati, pubbepi mama vadhāya
atk-s0513a1:1269_7: parisakkiyeva, na ca pana maṃ vadhituṃ asakkhī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1270_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kuruṅgamigo hutvā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1270_1: araññāyatane phalāni khādanto vasati. So ekasmiṃ kāle phalasampanne sepaṇṇirukkhe
atk-s0513a1:1270_2: sepaṇṇiphalāni khādati. Atheko gāmavāsī aṭṭakaluddako phalarukkhamūlesu migānaṃ padāni
atk-s0513a1:1270_3: upadhāretvā uparirukkhe aṭṭakaṃ bandhitvā tattha nisīditvā phalāni khādituṃ āgatāgate
atk-s0513a1:1270_4: mige sattiyā vijjhitvā tesaṃ maṃsaṃ vikkiṇanto jīvikaṃ kappeti. So ekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1270_5: rukkhamūle bodhisattassa padavaḷañjaṃ disvā tasmiṃ sepaṇṇirukkhe aṭṭakaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1270_6: pātova bhuñjitvā sattiṃ ādāya vanaṃ pavisitvā taṃ rukkhaṃ āruhitvā aṭṭake nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1270_7: Bodhisattopi pātova vasanaṭṭhānā nikkhamitvā “sepaṇṇiphalāni khādissāmī”ti āgamma
atk-s0513a1:1270_8: taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ sahasāva apavisitvā “kadāci aṭṭakaluddakā rukkhesu aṭṭakaṃ bandhanti,
atk-s0513a1:1270_9: atthi nu kho evarūpo upaddavo”ti pariggaṇhanto bāhiratova aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1271_0: Luddakopi bodhisattassa anāgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā aṭṭake nisinnova sepaṇṇiphalāni khipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1271_1: khipitvā tassa purato pātesi. Bodhisatto “imāni phalāni āgantvā mayhaṃ purato patanti,
atk-s0513a1:1271_2: atthi nu kho upari luddako”ti punappunaṃ ullokento luddakaṃ disvā apassanto viya
atk-s0513a1:1271_3: hutvā “ambho, rukkha-pubbe tvaṃ olambakaṃ cārento viya ujukameva phalāni pātesi,
atk-s0513a1:1271_4: ajja pana te rukkhadhammo pariccatto, evaṃ tayā rukkhadhamme pariccatte ahampi aññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1271_5: rukkhamūlaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mayhaṃ āhāraṃ pariyesissāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1274: Aññaṃ sepaṇṇi gacchāmi, na me te ruccate phala”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1275_0: Tattha ñātanti pākaṭaṃ jātaṃ. Etanti idaṃ. Kuruṅgassāti kuruṅgamigassa. Yaṃ tvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1275_1: sepaṇṇi seyyasīti yaṃ tvaṃ ambho sepaṇṇirukkha purato phalāni pātayamāno seyyasi
atk-s0513a1:1275_2: viseyyasi visiṇṇaphalo hosi, taṃ sabbaṃ kuruṅgamigassa pākaṭaṃ jātaṃ. Na me te ruccate
atk-s0513a1:1275_3: phalanti evaṃ phalaṃ dadamānāya na me tava phalaṃ ruccati, tiṭṭha tvaṃ, ahaṃ aññattha
atk-s0513a1:1276_0: Athassa luddako aṭṭake nisinnova sattiṃ khipitvā “gaccha, viraddho dānimhi ta”nti
atk-s0513a1:1276_1: āha. Bodhisatto nivattitvā ṭhito āha “ambho purisa, idānīsi kiñcāpi maṃ viraddho,
atk-s0513a1:1276_2: aṭṭha pana mahāniraye soḷasaussadaniraye pañcavidhabandhanādīni ca kammakāraṇāni
atk-s0513a1:1276_3: aviraddhoyevāsī”ti. Evañca pana vatvā palāyitvā yathāruciṃ gato, luddopi otaritvā yathāruciṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1277_0: Satthāpi “na, bhikkhave, devadatto idāneva mama vadhāya parisakkati, pubbepi parisakkiyeva,
atk-s0513a1:1277_1: na ca pana maṃ vadhituṃ asakkhī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0513a1:1277_2: jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā aṭṭakaluddako devadatto ahosi, kuruṅgamigo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1281: Ye kukkurāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ñātatthacariyaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Sā dvādasakanipāte bhaddasālajātake āvibhavissati. Idaṃ pana vatthuṃ patiṭṭhapetvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1282_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tathārūpaṃ kammaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0513a1:1282_1: kukkurayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā anekasatakukkuraparivuto mahāsusāne vasati. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1282_2: rājā setasindhavayuttaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ rathaṃ āruyha uyyānaṃ gantvā tattha
atk-s0513a1:1282_3: divasabhāgaṃ kīḷitvā atthaṅgate sūriye nagaraṃ pāvisi. Tassa taṃ rathavarattaṃ yathānaddhameva
atk-s0513a1:1282_4: rājaṅgaṇe ṭhapayiṃsu, so rattibhāge deve vassante tinto. Uparipāsādato koleyyakasunakhā
atk-s0513a1:1282_5: otaritvā tassa cammañca naddhiñca khādiṃsu. Punadivase rañño ārocesuṃ “deva, niddhamanamukhena
atk-s0513a1:1282_6: sunakhā pavisitvā rathassa cammañca naddhiñca khādiṃsū”ti. Rājā sunakhānaṃ kujjhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1282_7: “diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne sunakhe ghātethā”ti āha. Tato paṭṭhāya sunakhānaṃ mahābyasanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1282_8: udapādi. Te diṭṭhidiṭṭhaṭṭhāne ghātiyamānā palāyitvā susānaṃ gantvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1283_0: Bodhisatto ‘tumhe bahū sannipatitā, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti pucchi. Te “antepure kira
atk-s0513a1:1283_1: rathassa cammañca naddhi ca sunakhehi khāditā’ti kuddho rājā sunakhavadhaṃ āṇāpesi,
atk-s0513a1:1283_2: bahū sunakhā vinassanti, mahābhayaṃ uppanna”nti āhaṃsu. Bodhisatto cintesi “ārakkhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:1283_3: bahi sunakhānaṃ okāso natthi, antorājanivesane koleyyakasunakhānameva taṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1283_4: bhavissati. Idāni pana corānaṃ kiñci bhayaṃ natthi, acorā maraṇaṃ labhanti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1283_5: core rañño dassetvā ñātisaṅghassa jīvitadānaṃ dadeyya”nti. So ñātake samassāsetvā
atk-s0513a1:1283_6: “tumhe mā bhāyittha, ahaṃ vo abhayaṃ āharissāmi, yāva rājānaṃ passāmi, tāva idheva
atk-s0513a1:1283_7: hothā”ti pāramiyo āvajjetvā mettābhāvanaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā “mayhaṃ upari leḍḍuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1283_8: vā muggaraṃ vā mā koci khipituṃ ussahī”ti adhiṭṭhāya ekakova antonagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1283_9: Atha naṃ disvā ekasattopi kujjhitvā olokento nāma nāhosi. Rājāpi sunakhavadhaṃ āṇāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1283_10: sayaṃ vinicchaye nisinno hoti. Bodhisatto tattheva gantvā pakkhanditvā rañño āsanassa
atk-s0513a1:1283_11: heṭṭhā pāvisi. Atha naṃ rājapurisā nīharituṃ āraddhā, rājā pana vāresi.
atk-s0513a1:1284_0: So thokaṃ vissamitvā heṭṭhāsanā nikkhamitvā rājānaṃ vanditvā “deva, tumhe kukkure
atk-s0513a1:1284_1: mārāpethā”ti pucchi. “Āma, mārāpemaha”nti. “Ko nesaṃ aparādho narindā”ti? “Rathassa
atk-s0513a1:1284_2: me parivāracammañca naddhiñca khādiṃsū”ti. “Ye khādiṃsu, te jānāthā”ti? “Na jānāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1284_3: “‘Ime nāma cammakhādakacorā’ti tathato ajānitvā diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva mārāpanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1284_4: na yuttaṃ, devā”ti. “Rathacammassa kukkurehi khāditattā ‘diṭṭhadiṭṭhe sabbeva mārethā’ti
atk-s0513a1:1284_5: sunakhavadhaṃ āṇāpesi”nti. “Kiṃ pana vo manussā sabbeva kukkure mārenti, udāhu maraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1284_6: alabhantāpi atthī”ti? “Atthi, amhākaṃ ghare koleyyakā maraṇaṃ na labhantī”ti. Mahārāja
atk-s0513a1:1284_7: idāneva tumhe “rathacammassa kukkurehi khāditattā ‘diṭṭhadiṭṭhe sabbeva mārethā’ti
atk-s0513a1:1284_8: sunakhavadhaṃ āṇāpesi”nti avocuttha, idāni pana “amhākaṃ ghare koleyyakā maraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1284_9: na labhantī”ti vadetha. “Nanu evaṃ sante tumhe chandādivasena agatigamanaṃ gacchatha,
atk-s0513a1:1284_10: agatigamanañca nāma na yuttaṃ, na ca rājadhammo, raññā nāma kāraṇagavesakena tulāsadisena
atk-s0513a1:1284_11: bhavituṃ vaṭṭati, idāni ca koleyyakā maraṇaṃ na labhanti, dubbalasunakhāva labhanti,
atk-s0513a1:1284_12: evaṃ sante nāyaṃ sabbasunakhaghaccā, dubbalaghātikā nāmesā”ti. Evañca pana vatvā
atk-s0513a1:1284_13: mahāsatto madhurassaraṃ nicchāretvā “mahārāja, yaṃ tumhe karotha, nāyaṃ dhammo”ti
atk-s0513a1:1287: Teme na vajjhā mayamasma vajjhā, nāyaṃ saghaccā dubbalaghātikāya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1288_0: Tattha ye kukkurāti ye sunakhā. Yathā hi dhāruṇhopi passāvo “pūtimutta”nti, tadahujātopi
atk-s0513a1:1288_2: vuccati, evamevaṃ vassasatikopi sunakho “kukkuro”ti vuccati. Tasmā mahallakā kāyabalūpapannāpi
atk-s0513a1:1288_3: te “kukkurā”tveva vuttā. Vaddhāti vaḍḍhitā. Koleyyakāti rājakule jātā sambhūtā saṃvaḍḍhā.
atk-s0513a1:1288_4: Vaṇṇabalūpapannāti sarīravaṇṇena ceva kāyabalena ca sampannā. Teme na vajjhāti te
atk-s0513a1:1288_5: ime sassāmikā sārakkhā na vajjhā. Mayamasma vajjhāti assāmikā anārakkhā mayaṃ vajjhā
atk-s0513a1:1288_6: nāma jātā. Nāyaṃ saghaccāti evaṃ sante ayaṃ avisesena saghaccā nāma na hoti. Dubbalaghātikāyanti
atk-s0513a1:1288_7: ayaṃ pana dubbalānaṃyeva ghātanato dubbalaghātikā nāma hoti. Rājūhi nāma corā niggaṇhitabbā,
atk-s0513a1:1288_8: no acorā. Idha pana corānaṃ kiñci bhayaṃ natthi, acorā maraṇaṃ labhanti. Aho imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1288_9: loke ayuttaṃ vattati, aho adhammo vattatīti.
atk-s0513a1:1289_0: Rājā bodhisattassa vacaraṃ sutvā āha – “jānāsi tvaṃ, paṇḍita, asukehi nāma rathacammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1289_1: khādita”nti? “Āma, jānāmī”ti. “Kehi khādita”nti? “Tumhākaṃ gehe vasanakehi koleyyakasunakhehī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1289_2: “Kathaṃ tehi khāditabhāvo jānitabbo”ti? “Ahaṃ tehi khāditabhāvaṃ dassesāmī”ti. “Dassehi
atk-s0513a1:1289_3: paṇḍitā”ti. “Tumhākaṃ ghare koleyyakasunakhe āharāpetvā thokaṃ takkañca dabbatiṇāni
atk-s0513a1:1289_4: ca āharāpethā”ti. Rājā tathā akāsi. Atha naṃ mahāsatto “imāni tiṇāni takkena maddāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1289_5: ete sunakhe pāyethā”ti āha. Rājā tathā katvā pāyāpesi, pītā pītā sunakhā saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1289_6: cammehi vamiṃsu. Rājā “sabbaññubuddhassa byākaraṇaṃ viyā”ti tuṭṭho bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:1289_7: setacchattena pūjaṃ akāsi. Bodhisatto “dhammaṃ cara, mahārāja, mātāpitūsu khattiyā”tiādīhi
atk-s0513a1:1289_8: tesakuṇajātake āgatāhi dasahi dhammacariyagāthāhi rañño dhammaṃ desetvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:1289_9: ito paṭṭhāya appamatto hohī”ti rājānaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā setacchattaṃ raññova paṭiadāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1290_0: Rājā mahāsattassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā sabbasattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā bodhisattaṃ ādiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1290_1: katvā sabbasunakhānaṃ attano bhojanasadisameva niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapetvā bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:1290_2: ovāde ṭhito yāvatāyukaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā kālaṃ katvā devaloke uppajji. Kukkurovādo
atk-s0513a1:1290_3: dasa vassasahassāni pavatti. Bodhisattopi yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1291_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, tathāgato idāneva ñātakānaṃ atthaṃ carati, pubbepi cariyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1291_1: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājā
atk-s0513a1:1291_2: ānando ahosi, avasesā parisā buddhaparisā, kukkurapaṇḍito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1295_0: Api passena semānoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ossaṭṭhavīriyaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1295_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tasmiñhi samaye satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantetvā “bhikkhu, pubbe paṇḍitā
atk-s0513a1:1295_2: anāyatanepi vīriyaṃ akaṃsu, pahāraṃ laddhāpi neva ossajiṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1296_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bhojājānīyasindhavakule nibbatto
atk-s0513a1:1296_1: sabbālaṅkārasampanno bārāṇasirañño maṅgalasso ahosi. So satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇapātiyaṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:1296_3: bhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhati, taṃ ṭhānaṃ rattakambalasāṇiparikkhittaṃ upari suvaṇṇatārakakhacitacelavitānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1296_5: apatthentā rājāno nāma natthi. Ekaṃ samayaṃ satta rājāno bārāṇasiṃ parikkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1296_6: “amhākaṃ rajjaṃ vā detu, yuddhaṃ vā”ti bārāṇasirañño paṇṇaṃ pesesuṃ. Rājā amacce
atk-s0513a1:1296_7: sannipātetvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā “idāni kiṃ karoma, tātā”ti pucchi. “Deva, tumhehi
atk-s0513a1:1296_8: tāva āditova yuddhāya na gantabbaṃ, asukaṃ nāma assārohaṃ pesetvā yuddhaṃ kāretha,
atk-s0513a1:1296_9: tasmiṃ asakkonte pacchā jānissāmā”ti. Rājā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “sakkhissasi, tāta, sattahi
atk-s0513a1:1296_10: rājūhi saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ kātu”nti āha. “Deva, sace bhojājānīyasindhavaṃ labhāmi, tiṭṭhantu
atk-s0513a1:1296_11: satta rājāno, sakalajambudīpe rājūhipi saddhiṃ yujjhituṃ sakkhissāmī”ti. “Tāta, bhojājānīyasindhavo
atk-s0513a1:1296_12: vā hotu añño vā, yaṃ icchasi, taṃ gahetvā yuddhaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1297_0: So “sādhu, devā”ti rājānaṃ vanditvā pāsādā oruyha bhojājānīyasindhavaṃ āharāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1297_1: suvammitaṃ katvā attanāpi sabbasannāhasannaddho khaggaṃ bandhitvā sindhavapiṭṭhivaragato
atk-s0513a1:1297_2: nagarā nikkhamma vijjulatā viya caramāno paṭhamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā ekaṃ rājānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1297_3: jīvaggāhameva gahetvā āgantvā nagare balassa niyyādetvā puna gantvā dutiyaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1297_4: bhinditvā tathā tatiyanti evaṃ pañca rājāno jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā chaṭṭhaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1297_5: bhinditvā chaṭṭhassa rañño gahitakāle bhojājānīyo pahāraṃ labhati, lohitaṃ paggharati,
atk-s0513a1:1297_6: vedanā balavatiyo vattanti. Assāroho tassa pahaṭabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhojājānīyasindhavaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1297_7: rājadvāre nipajjāpetvā sannāhaṃ sithilaṃ katvā aññaṃ assaṃ sannayhituṃ āraddho. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1297_8: mahāphāsukapassena nipannova akkhīni ummiletvā assārohaṃ disvā “ayaṃ aññaṃ assaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1297_9: sannayhati, ayañca asso sattamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ rājānaṃ gaṇhituṃ
atk-s0513a1:1297_10: na sakkhissati, mayā katakammañca nassissati, appaṭisamo assārohopi nassissati, rājāpi
atk-s0513a1:1297_11: parahatthaṃ gamissati, ṭhapetvā maṃ añño asso sattamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1297_12: rājānaṃ gahetuṃ samattho nāma natthī”ti nipannakova assārohaṃ pakkosāpetvā “samma
atk-s0513a1:1297_13: assāroha, sattamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ rājānaṃ gahetuṃ samattho ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:1297_14: maṃ añño asso nāma natthi, nāhaṃ mayā katakammaṃ nāsessāmi, mamaññeva uṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1300: Seyyova vaḷavā bhojjho, yuñja maññeva sārathī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1301_0: Tattha api passena semānoti ekena passena sayamānakopi. Sallebhi sallalīkatoti sallehi
atk-s0513a1:1301_1: viddhopi samāno. Seyyova vaḷavā bhojjhoti vaḷavāti sindhavakulesu ajāto khaluṅkasso.
atk-s0513a1:1301_2: Bhojjhoti bhojājānīyasindhavo. Iti etasmā vaḷavā sallehi viddhopi bhojājānīyasindhavova
atk-s0513a1:1301_3: seyyo varo uttamo. Yuñja maññeva sārathīti yasmā eva gatopi ahameva seyyo, tasmā
atk-s0513a1:1302_0: Assāroho bodhisattaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā vaṇaṃ bandhitvā susannaddhaṃ sannayhitvā tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1302_1: nisīditvā sattamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ rājānaṃ jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā rājabalassa
atk-s0513a1:1302_2: niyyādesi, bodhisattampi rājadvāraṃ ānayiṃsu. Rājā tassa dassanatthāya nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:1302_3: Mahāsatto rājānaṃ āha – “mahārāja, satta rājāno mā ghātayittha, sapathaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0513a1:1302_4: vissajjetha, mayhañca assārohassa ca dātabbaṃ yasaṃ assārohasseva detha, satta rājāno
atk-s0513a1:1302_5: gahetvā dinnayodhaṃ nāma nāsetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Tumhepi dānaṃ detha, sīlaṃ rakkhatha,
atk-s0513a1:1302_6: dhammena samena rajjaṃ kārethā”ti. Evaṃ bodhisattena rañño ovāde dinne bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:1302_7: sannāhaṃ mocayiṃsu, so sannāhe muttamatteyeva nirujjhi. Rājā tassa sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0513a1:1302_8: assārohassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ datvā satta rājāno puna attanno adubbhāya sapathaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0513a1:1302_9: sakasakaṭṭhānāni pesetvā dhammena samena rajjaṃ kāretvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1303_0: Satthā “evaṃ bhikkhu pubbe paṇḍitā anāyatanepi vīriyaṃ akaṃsu, evarūpaṃ pahāraṃ laddhāpi
atk-s0513a1:1303_1: na ossajiṃsu, tvaṃ pana evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā kasmā vīriyaṃ ossajasī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1303_2: vatvā cattāri saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne ossaṭṭhavīriyo bhikkhu arahattaphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1304: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, assāroho sāriputto, bhojājānīyasindhavo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1308_0: Yadā yadāti idampi satthā jetavane viharanto ossaṭṭhavīriyameva bhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1308_1: kathesi. Taṃ pana bhikkhuṃ satthā āmantetvā “bhikkhu pubbe paṇḍitā anāyatanepi laddhappahārāpi
atk-s0513a1:1308_2: hutvā vīriyaṃ akaṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1309_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente purimanayeneva satta rājāno nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1309_1: parivārayiṃsu. Atheko rathikayodho dve bhātikasindhave rathe yojetvā nagarā nikkhamma
atk-s0513a1:1309_2: cha balakoṭṭhake bhinditvā cha rājāno aggahesi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe jeṭṭhakaasso pahāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1309_3: labhi. Rathiko rathaṃ pesento rājadvāraṃ āgantvā jeṭṭhabhātikaṃ rathā mocetvā sannāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1309_4: sithilaṃ katvā ekeneva passena nipajjāpetvā aññaṃ assaṃ sannayhituṃ āraddho. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1309_5: taṃ disvā purimanayeneva cintetvā rathikaṃ pakkosāpetvā nipannakova imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1311: “Yadā yadā yattha yadā, yattha yattha yadā yadā;
atk-s0513a1:1312: Ājañño kurute vegaṃ, hāyanti tattha vāḷavā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1313_0: Tattha yadā yadāti pubbaṇhādīsu yasmiṃ yasmiṃ kāle. Yatthāti yasmiṃ ṭhāne magge vā
atk-s0513a1:1313_1: saṅgāmasīse vā. Yadāti yasmiṃ khaṇe. Yattha yatthāti sattannaṃ balakoṭṭhakānaṃ vasena
atk-s0513a1:1313_2: bahūsu yuddhamaṇḍalesu. Yadā yadāti yasmiṃ yasmiṃ kāle pahāraṃ laddhakāle vā aladdhakāle
atk-s0513a1:1313_3: vā. Ājañño kurute veganti sārathissa cittarucitaṃ kāraṇaṃ ājānanasabhāvo ājañño varasindhavo
atk-s0513a1:1313_4: vegaṃ karoti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati. Hāyanti tattha vāḷavāti tasmiṃ vege kariyamāne
atk-s0513a1:1313_5: itare vaḷavasaṅkhātā khaḷuṅkassā hāyanti parihāyanti, tasmā imasmiṃ rathe maṃyeva yojehīti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1314_0: Sārathi bodhisattaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā rathe yojetvā sattamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1314_1: rājānaṃ ādāya rathaṃ pesento rājadvāraṃ āgantvā sindhavaṃ mocesi. Bodhisatto ekena
atk-s0513a1:1314_2: passena nipanno purimanayeneva rañño ovādaṃ datvā nirujjhi. Rājā tassa sarīrakiccaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1314_3: kāretvā sārathissa sammānaṃ katvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1315_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne so bhikkhu arahatte
atk-s0513a1:1315_1: patiṭṭhāsi. Satthā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā rājā ānandatthero ahosi, asso sammāsambuddho”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1319_0: Aññamaññehi titthehīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dhammasenāpatissa saddhivihārikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1319_1: ekaṃ suvaṇṇakārapubbakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. Āsayānusayañāṇañhi buddhānaṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:1319_2: hoti, na aññesaṃ. Tasmā dhammasenāpati attano āsayānusayañāṇassa natthitāya saddhivihārikassa
atk-s0513a1:1319_3: āsayānusayaṃ ajānanto asubhakammaṭṭhānameva kathesi, tassa taṃ na sappāyamahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1319_4: Kasmā? So kira paṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni suvaṇṇakārageheyeva paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:1319_5: athassa dīgharattaṃ parisuddhasuvaṇṇadassanavasena paricitattā asubhaṃ na sappāyamahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1319_6: So tattha nimittamattampi uppādetuṃ asakkonto cattāro māse khepesi.
atk-s0513a1:1320_0: Dhammasenāpati attano saddhivihārikassa arahattaṃ dātuṃ asakkonto “addhā ayaṃ buddhaveneyyo
atk-s0513a1:1320_1: bhavissati, tathāgatassa santikaṃ nessāmī”ti cintetvā pātova taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1320_2: agamāsi. Satthā “kiṃ nu kho, sāriputta, ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ādāya āgatosī”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1320_3: bhante, imassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsiṃ, ayaṃ pana catūhi māsehi nimittamattampi na uppādesi,
atk-s0513a1:1320_4: svāhaṃ ‘buddhaveneyyo eso bhavissatī’ti cintetvā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ ādāya āgato”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1320_5: “Sāriputta, kataraṃ pana te kammaṭṭhānaṃ saddhivihārikassa dinna”nti? “Asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1320_6: bhagavā”ti. “Sāriputta, natthi tava santāne āsayānusayañāṇaṃ, gaccha, tvaṃ sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0513a1:1320_7: āgantvā tava saddhivihārikaṃ ādāya gaccheyyāsī”ti. Evaṃ satthā theraṃ uyyojetvā tassa
atk-s0513a1:1320_8: bhikkhussa manāpaṃ cīvarañca nivāsanañca dāpetvā taṃ ādāya gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:1320_9: paṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ dāpetvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro puna vihāraṃ āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:1320_10: gandhakuṭiyaṃ divasabhāgaṃ khepetvā sāyanhasamaye taṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā vihāracārikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1320_11: caramāno ambavane ekaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ māpetvā tattha mahantaṃ paduminigacchaṃ, tatrāpi
atk-s0513a1:1320_12: ca mahantaṃ ekaṃ padumapupphaṃ māpetvā “bhikkhu imaṃ pupphaṃ olokento nisīdā”ti nisīdāpetvā gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1321_0: So bhikkhu taṃ pupphaṃ punappunaṃ oloketi. Bhagavā taṃ pupphaṃ jaraṃ pāpesi, taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1321_1: tassa passantasseva jaraṃ patvā vivaṇṇaṃ ahosi. Athassa pariyantato paṭṭhāya pattāni
atk-s0513a1:1321_2: patantāni muhuttena sabbāni patiṃsu. Tato kiñjakkhaṃ pati, kaṇṇikāva avasissi. So
atk-s0513a1:1321_3: bhikkhu taṃ passanto cintesi “idaṃ padumapupphaṃ idāneva abhirūpaṃ ahosi dassanīyaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1321_4: athassa vaṇṇo pariṇato, pattāni ca kiñcakkhañca patitaṃ, kaṇṇikāmattameva avasiṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1321_5: evarūpassa nāma padumassa jarā pattā, mayhaṃ sarīrassa kiṃ na pāpuṇissati, sabbe
atk-s0513a1:1321_6: saṅkhārā aniccā”ti vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Satthā “tassa cittaṃ vipassanaṃ āruḷha”nti
atk-s0513a1:1321_7: ñatvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova obhāsaṃ pharitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1324: So bhikkhu gāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ patvā “mutto vatamhi sabbabhavehī”ti cintetvā –
atk-s0513a1:1326: Visuddhasīlo susamāhitindriyo, cando yathā rāhumukhā pamutto.
atk-s0513a1:1328: Ālokapajjotakaro pabhaṅkaro, sahassaraṃsī viya bhāṇumā nabhe”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:1329_0: Ādīhi gāthāhi udānaṃ udānesi. Udānetvā ca pana gantvā bhagavantaṃ vandi. Theropi
atk-s0513a1:1329_1: āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā attano saddhivihārikaṃ gahetvā agamāsi. Ayaṃ pavatti bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1329_2: antare pākaṭā jātā. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ dasabalassa guṇe vaṇṇayamānā nisīdiṃsu
atk-s0513a1:1329_3: – “āvuso, sāriputtatthero āsayānusayañāṇassa abhāvena attano saddhivihārikassa āsayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1329_4: na jānāti, satthā pana ñatvā ekadivaseneva tassa saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1330_0: Satthā āgantvā paññattāsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1330_1: pucchi. “Na bhagavā aññāya kathāya, tumhākaññeva pana dhammasenāpatino saddhivihārikassa
atk-s0513a1:1330_2: āsayānusayañāṇakathāyā”ti. Satthā “na, bhikkhave, etaṃ acchariyaṃ, svāhaṃ etarahi
atk-s0513a1:1330_3: buddho hutvā tassa āsayaṃ jānāmi, pubbepāhaṃ tassa āsayaṃ jānāmiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1331_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto rajjaṃ kāresi. Tadā bodhisatto taṃ rājānaṃ atthe ca
atk-s0513a1:1331_1: dhamme ca anusāsati. Tadā rañño maṅgalaassanhānatitthe aññataraṃ vaḷavaṃ khaḷuṅkassaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1331_2: nhāpesuṃ. Maṅgalasso vaḷavena nhānatitthaṃ otāriyamāno jigucchitvā otarituṃ na icchi.
atk-s0513a1:1331_3: Assagopako gantvā rañño ārocesi “deva, maṅgalasso titthaṃ otarituṃ na icchatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1331_4: Rājā bodhisattaṃ pesesi – “gaccha, paṇḍita, jānāhi kena kāraṇena asso titthaṃ otāriyamāno
atk-s0513a1:1331_5: na otaratī”ti. Bodhisatto “sādhu, devā”ti nadītīraṃ gantvā assaṃ oloketvā nirogabhāvamassa
atk-s0513a1:1331_6: ñatvā “kena nu kho kāraṇena ayaṃ imaṃ titthaṃ na otaratī”ti upadhārento “paṭhamataraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1331_7: ettha añño nhāpito bhavissati, tenesa jigucchamāno titthaṃ na otarati maññe”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:1331_8: assagopake pucchi “ambho, imasmiṃ titthe kaṃ paṭhamaṃ nhāpayitthā”ti? “Aññataraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1332_0: Bodhisatto “esa attano sindhavatāya jigucchanto ettha nhāyituṃ na icchati, imaṃ aññatitthe
atk-s0513a1:1332_1: nhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tassa āsayaṃ ñatvā “bho assagopaka, sappimadhuphāṇitādibhisaṅkhatapāyāsampi
atk-s0513a1:1332_2: tāva punappunaṃ bhuñjantassa titti hoti. Ayaṃ asso bahū vāre idha titthe nhāto, aññampi
atk-s0513a1:1332_3: tāva naṃ titthaṃ otāretvā nhāpetha ca pāyetha cā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1336_0: Tattha aññamaññehīti aññehi aññehi. Pāyehīti desanāsīsametaṃ, nhāpehi ca pāyehi cāti
atk-s0513a1:1336_1: attho. Accāsanassāti karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ, atiasanena atibhuttenāti attho. Pāyāsassapi
atk-s0513a1:1336_2: tappatīti sappiādīhi abhisaṅkhatena madhurapāyāsena tappati titto hoti, dhāto suhito
atk-s0513a1:1336_3: na puna bhuñjitukāmataṃ āpajjati. Tasmā ayampi asso imasmiṃ titthe nibaddhaṃ nhānena
atk-s0513a1:1336_4: pariyattiṃ āpanno bhavissati, aññattha naṃ nhāpethāti.
atk-s0513a1:1337_0: Te tassa vacanaṃ sutvā assaṃ aññatitthaṃ otāretvā pāyiṃsu ceva nhāpayiṃsu ca. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1337_1: assassa pānīyaṃ pivitvā nhānakāle rañño santikaṃ agamāsi. Rājā “kiṃ, tāta, asso nhāto
atk-s0513a1:1337_2: ca pīto cā”ti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti. “Paṭhamaṃ kiṃ kāraṇā na icchatī”ti? “Iminā nāma
atk-s0513a1:1337_3: kāraṇenā”ti sabbaṃ ācikkhi. Rājā “evarūpassa tiracchānassāpi nāma āsayaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:1337_4: aho paṇḍito”ti bodhisattassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ datvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1338_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, ahaṃ etassa idāneva āsayaṃ jānāmi, pubbepi jānāmiyevā”ti imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1338_1: dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā maṅgalaasso
atk-s0513a1:1338_2: ayaṃ bhikkhu ahosi, rājā ānando, paṇḍitāmacco pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1342_0: Purāṇacorāna vaco nisammāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1342_1: Devadatto ajātasattukumāraṃ pasādetvā lābhasakkāraṃ nipphādesi. Ajātasattukumāro
atk-s0513a1:1342_2: devadattassa gayāsīse vihāraṃ kāretvā nānaggarasehi tivassikagandhasālibhojanassa
atk-s0513a1:1342_3: divase divase pañca thālipākasatāni abhihari. Lābhasakkāraṃ nissāya devadattassa
atk-s0513a1:1342_4: parivāro mahanto jāto, devadatto parivārena saddhiṃ vihāreyeva hoti. Tena samayena
atk-s0513a1:1342_5: rājagahavāsikā dve sahāyā. Tesu eko satthu santike pabbajito, eko devadattassa. Te
atk-s0513a1:1342_6: aññamaññaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhānepi passanti, vihāraṃ gantvāpi passantiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:1343_0: Athekadivasaṃ devadattassa nissitako itaraṃ āha – “āvuso, kiṃ tvaṃ devasikaṃ sedehi
atk-s0513a1:1343_1: muccamānehi piṇḍāya carasi, devadatto gayāsīsavihāre nisīditvāva nānaggarasehi subhojanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1343_2: bhuñjati, evarūpo upāyo natthi, kiṃ tvaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhosi, kiṃ te pātova gayāsīsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1343_3: āgantvā sauttaribhaṅgaṃ yāguṃ pivitvā aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ khajjakaṃ khāditvā nānaggarasehi
atk-s0513a1:1343_4: subhojanaṃ bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti? So punappunaṃ vuccamāno gantukāmo hutvā tato
atk-s0513a1:1343_5: paṭṭhāya gayāsīsaṃ gantvā bhuñjitvā kālasseva veḷuvanaṃ āgacchati. So sabbakālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1343_6: paṭicchādetuṃ nāsakkhi, “gayāsīsaṃ gantvā devadattassa paṭṭhapitaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1343_7: na cirasseva pākaṭo jāto. Atha naṃ sahāyā pucchiṃsu “saccaṃ kira, tvaṃ āvuso, devadattassa
atk-s0513a1:1343_8: paṭṭhapitaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjasī”ti. “Ko evamāhā”ti? “Asuko ca asuko cā”ti. “Saccaṃ ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1343_9: āvuso gayāsīsaṃ gantvā bhuñjāmi, na pana me devadatto bhattaṃ deti, aññe manussā
atk-s0513a1:1343_10: dentī”ti. “Āvuso, devadatto buddhānaṃ paṭikaṇṭako dussīlo ajātasattuṃ pasādetvā adhammena
atk-s0513a1:1343_11: attano lābhasakkāraṃ uppādesi, tvaṃ evarūpe niyyānike buddhasāsane pabbajitvā devadattassa
atk-s0513a1:1343_12: adhammena uppannaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjasi, ehi taṃ satthu santikaṃ nessāmā”ti taṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1344_0: Satthā disvāva “kiṃ, bhikkhave, etaṃ bhikkhuṃ anicchantaññeva ādāya āgatatthā”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1344_1: “Āma bhante, ayaṃ bhikkhu tumhākaṃ santike pabbajitvā devadattassa adhammena uppannaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1344_2: bhojanaṃ bhuñjatī”ti. “Saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu devadattassa adhammena uppannaṃ bhojanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1344_3: bhuñjasī”ti? “Na bhante, devadatto mayhaṃ deti, aññe manussā denti, tamahaṃ bhuñjāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1344_4: Satthā “mā bhikkhu ettha parihāraṃ kari, devadatto anācāro dussīlo, kathañhi nāma
atk-s0513a1:1344_5: tvaṃ idha pabbajitvā mama sāsanaṃ bhajantoyeva devadattassa bhattaṃ bhuñjasi, niccakālampi
atk-s0513a1:1344_6: bhajanasīlakova tvaṃ diṭṭhadiṭṭheyeva bhajasī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1345_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa amacco ahosi. Tadā
atk-s0513a1:1345_1: rañño mahiḷāmukho nāma maṅgalahatthī ahosi sīlavā ācārasampanno, na kañci viheṭheti.
atk-s0513a1:1345_2: Athekadivasaṃ tassa sālāya samīpe rattibhāgasamanantare corā āgantvā tassa avidūre
atk-s0513a1:1345_3: nisinnā coramantaṃ mantayiṃsu “evaṃ ummaṅgo bhinditabbo, evaṃ sandhicchedakammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1345_4: kattabbaṃ, ummaṅgañca sandhicchedañca maggasadisaṃ titthasadisaṃ nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1345_5: katvā bhaṇḍaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati, harantena māretvāva haritabbaṃ, evaṃ uṭṭhātuṃ samattho
atk-s0513a1:1345_6: nāma na bhavissati, corena ca nāma sīlācārayuttena na bhavitabbaṃ, kakkhaḷena pharusena
atk-s0513a1:1345_7: sāhasikena bhavitabba”nti. Evaṃ mantetvā aññamaññaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā agamaṃsu. Eteneva
atk-s0513a1:1345_8: upāyena punadivasepi punadivasepīti bahū divase tattha āgantvā mantayiṃsu. So tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1345_9: vacanaṃ sutvā “te maṃ sikkhāpentī”ti saññāya “idāni mayā kakkhaḷena pharusena sāhasikena
atk-s0513a1:1345_10: bhavitabba”nti tathārūpova ahosi. Pātova āgataṃ hatthigopakaṃ soṇḍāya gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1345_11: pothetvā māresi. Aparampi tathā aparampi tathāti āgatāgataṃ māretiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:1346_0: “Mahiḷāmukho ummattako jāto diṭṭhadiṭṭhe māretī”ti rañño ārocayiṃsu. Rājā bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1346_1: pahiṇi “gaccha paṇḍita, jānāhi kena kāraṇena so duṭṭho jāto”ti. Bodhisatto gantvā
atk-s0513a1:1346_2: tassa sarīre arogabhāvaṃ ñatvā “kena nu kho kāraṇena esa duṭṭho jāto”ti upadhārento
atk-s0513a1:1346_3: “addhā avidūre kesañci vacanaṃ sutvā ‘maṃ ete sikkhāpentī’ti saññāya duṭṭho jāto”ti
atk-s0513a1:1346_4: sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā hatthigopake pucchi “atthi nu kho hatthisālāya samīpe rattibhāge
atk-s0513a1:1346_5: kehici kiñci kathitapubba”nti? “Āma, sāmi, corā āgantvā kathayiṃsū”ti. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1346_6: gantvā rañño ārocesi “deva, añño hatthissa sarīre vikāro natthi, corānaṃ kathaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a1:1346_7: duṭṭho jāto”ti. “Idāni kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? “Sīlavante samaṇabrāhmaṇe hatthisālāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1346_8: nisīdāpetvā sīlācārakathaṃ kathāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. “Evaṃ kārehi, tātā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1347_0: Bodhisatto gantvā sīlavante samaṇabrāhmaṇe hatthisālāyaṃ nisīdāpetvā “sīlakathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1347_1: kathetha, bhante”ti āha. Te hatthissa avidūre nisinnā “na koci parāmasitabbo na māretabbo,
atk-s0513a1:1347_2: sīlācārasampannena khantimettānuddayayuttena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sīlakathaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1347_3: So taṃ sutvā “maṃ ime sikkhāpenti, ito dāni paṭṭhāya sīlavantena bhavitabba”nti sīlavā
atk-s0513a1:1347_4: ahosi. Rājā bodhisattaṃ pucchi “kiṃ, tāta, sīlavā jāto”ti? Bodhisatto “āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1347_5: “Evarūpo duṭṭhahatthī paṇḍite nissāya porāṇakadhammeyeva patiṭṭhito”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1350: Susaññatānañhi vaco nisamma, gajuttamo sabbaguṇesu aṭṭhā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1351_0: Tattha purāṇacorānanti porāṇacorānaṃ. Nisammāti sutvā, paṭhamaṃ corānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvāti
atk-s0513a1:1351_1: attho. Mahiḷāmukhoti hatthinimukhena sadisamukho. Yathā mahiḷā purato olokiyamānā
atk-s0513a1:1351_2: sobhati, na pacchato, tathā sopi purato olokiyamāno sobhati. Tasmā “mahiḷāmukho”tissa
atk-s0513a1:1351_3: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Pothayamanvacārīti pothayanto mārento anucārī. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Susaññatānanti
atk-s0513a1:1351_4: suṭṭhu saññatānaṃ sīlavantānaṃ. Gajuttamoti uttamagajo maṅgalahatthī. Sabbaguṇesu
atk-s0513a1:1351_5: aṭṭhāti sabbesu porāṇaguṇesu patiṭṭhito. Rājā “tiracchānagatassāpi āsayaṃ jānātī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1351_6: bodhisattassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ adāsi. So yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā saddhiṃ bodhisattena yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1352_0: Satthā “pubbepi tvaṃ bhikkhu diṭṭhadiṭṭheyeva bhaji, corānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā core bhaji,
atk-s0513a1:1352_1: dhammikānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā dhammike bhajī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1352_2: ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mahiḷāmukho vipakkhasevakabhikkhu ahosi, rājā
atk-s0513a1:1356_0: Nālaṃ kabaḷaṃ padātaveti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ upāsakañca mahallakattherañca
atk-s0513a1:1356_1: ārabbha kathesi. Sāvatthiyaṃ kira dve sahāyakā. Tesu eko pabbajitvā devasikaṃ itarassa
atk-s0513a1:1356_2: gharaṃ gacchati. So tassa bhikkhaṃ datvā sayampi bhuñjitvā teneva saddhiṃ vihāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1356_3: gantvā yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā ālāpasallāpena nisīditvā nagaraṃ pavisati, itaropi
atk-s0513a1:1356_4: naṃ yāva nagaradvārā anugantvā nivattati. So tesaṃ vissāso bhikkhūnaṃ antare pākaṭo
atk-s0513a1:1356_5: jāto. Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū tesaṃ vissāsakathaṃ kathentā dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1356_6: Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchi, te
atk-s0513a1:1356_7: “imāya nāma, bhante”ti kathayiṃsu. Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva ime vissāsikā,
atk-s0513a1:1356_8: pubbepi vissāsikāyeva ahesu”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1357_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa amacco ahosi. Tadā
atk-s0513a1:1357_1: eko kukkuro maṅgalahatthisālaṃ gantvā maṅgalahatthissa bhuñjanaṭṭhāne patitāni bhattasitthāni
atk-s0513a1:1357_2: khādati. So teneva bhojanena saṃvaddhamāno maṅgalahatthissa vissāsiko jāto hatthisseva
atk-s0513a1:1357_3: santike bhuñjati, ubhopi vinā vattituṃ na sakkonti. So hatthī naṃ soṇḍāya gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1357_4: aparāparaṃ karonto kīḷati, ukkhipitvā kumbhe patiṭṭhāpeti. Athekadivasaṃ eko gāmikamanusso
atk-s0513a1:1357_5: hatthigopakassa mūlaṃ datvā taṃ kukkuraṃ ādāya attano gāmaṃ agamāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:1357_6: so hatthī kukkuraṃ apassanto neva khādati na pivati na nhāyati. Tamatthaṃ rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1357_7: Rājā bodhisattaṃ pahiṇi “gaccha paṇḍita, jānāhi kiṃkāraṇā hatthī evaṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1358_0: Bodhisatto hatthisālaṃ gantvā hatthissa dummanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “imassa sarīre rogo na
atk-s0513a1:1358_1: paññāyati, kenaci panassa saddhiṃ mittasanthavena bhavitabbaṃ, taṃ apassanto esa
atk-s0513a1:1358_2: maññe sokābhibhūto”ti hatthigopake pucchi “atthi nu kho imassa kenaci saddhiṃ vissāso”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1358_3: “Āma, atthi sāmi ekena sunakhena saddhiṃ balavā mettī”ti. “Kahaṃ so etarahī”ti? “Ekena
atk-s0513a1:1358_4: manussena nīto”ti. “Jānātha panassa nivāsanaṭṭhāna”nti? “Na jānāma, sāmī”ti. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1358_5: rañño santikaṃ gantvā “natthi, deva, hatthissa koci ābādho, ekena panassa sunakhena
atk-s0513a1:1358_6: saddhiṃ balavavissāso, taṃ apassanto na bhuñjati maññe”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1360: “Nālaṃ kabaḷaṃ padātave, na ca piṇḍaṃ na kuse na ghaṃsituṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1362_0: Tattha nālanti na samattho. Kabaḷanti bhojanakāle paṭhamameva dinnaṃ kaṭukakabaḷaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1362_1: Padātaveti paādātave, sandhivasena ākāralopo veditabbo, gahetunti attho. Na ca piṇḍanti
atk-s0513a1:1362_2: vaḍḍhetvā dīyamānaṃ bhattapiṇḍampi nālaṃ gahetuṃ. Na kuseti khādanatthāya dinnāni
atk-s0513a1:1362_3: tiṇānipi nālaṃ gahetuṃ. Na ghaṃsitunti nhāpiyamāno sarīrampi ghaṃsituṃ nālaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1362_4: yaṃ yaṃ so hatthī kātuṃ na samattho, taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ rañño ārocetvā tassa asamatthabhāve
atk-s0513a1:1363_0: Rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “idāni kiṃ kātabbaṃ paṇḍitā”ti pucchi. “‘Amhākaṃ kira maṅgalahatthissa
atk-s0513a1:1363_1: sahāyaṃ sunakhaṃ eko manusso gahetvā gato, yassa ghare taṃ sunakhaṃ passanti, tassa
atk-s0513a1:1363_2: ayaṃ nāma daṇḍo’ti bheriṃ carāpetha devā”ti. Rājā tathā kāresi. Taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a1:1363_3: so puriso sunakhaṃ vissajjesi, sunakho vegenāgantvā hatthissa santikameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1363_4: Hatthī taṃ soṇḍāya gahetvā kumbhe ṭhapetvā roditvā paridevitvā kumbhā otāretvā tena
atk-s0513a1:1363_5: bhutte pacchā attanāpi bhuñji. “Tiracchānagatassa āsayaṃ jānātī”ti rājā bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:1364_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, ime idāneva vissāsikā, pubbepi vissāsikāyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1364_1: āharitvā catusaccakathāya vinivaṭṭetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi. Idaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1364_2: catusaccakathāya vinivaṭṭanaṃ nāma sabbajātakesupi atthiyeva. Mayaṃ pana yatthassa
atk-s0513a1:1365: Tadā sunakho upāsako ahosi, hatthī mahallakatthero, rājā ānando, amaccapaṇḍito pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a1:1369_0: Manuññameva bhāseyyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ omasavādaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1369_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tasmiñhi samaye chabbaggiyā kalahaṃ karontā pesale bhikkhū khuṃsenti
atk-s0513a1:1369_2: vambhenti ovijjhanti, dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanti. Bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1369_3: Bhagavā chabbaggiye pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira bhikkhavo”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte
atk-s0513a1:1369_4: vigarahitvā “bhikkhave, pharusavācā nāma tiracchānagatānampi amanāpā, pubbepi eko
atk-s0513a1:1369_5: tiracchānagato attānaṃ pharusena samudācarantaṃ sahassaṃ parājesī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1370_0: Atīte gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilāyaṃ gandhārarājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Tadā bodhisatto goyoniyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1370_1: nibbatti. Atha naṃ taruṇavacchakakāleyeva eko brāhmaṇo godakkhiṇādāyakānaṃ santikā
atk-s0513a1:1370_2: labhitvā “nandivisālo”ti nāmaṃ katvā puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sampiyāyamāno yāgubhattādīni
atk-s0513a1:1370_3: datvā posesi. Bodhisatto vayappatto cintesi “ahaṃ iminā brāhmaṇena kicchena paṭijaggito,
atk-s0513a1:1370_4: mayā ca saddhiṃ sakalajambudīpe añño samadhuro goṇo nāma natthi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ attano
atk-s0513a1:1370_5: balaṃ dassetvā brāhmaṇassa posāvaniyaṃ dadeyya”nti so ekadivasaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ āha “gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:1370_6: brāhmaṇa, ekaṃ govittakaseṭṭhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā ‘mayhaṃ balibaddo atibaddhaṃ sakaṭasataṃ
atk-s0513a1:1370_7: pavaṭṭetī’ti vatvā sahassena abbhutaṃ karohī”ti. So brāhmaṇo seṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:1370_8: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi “imasmiṃ nagare kassa goṇo thāmasampanno”ti. Atha naṃ seṭṭhi
atk-s0513a1:1370_9: “asukassa ca asukassa cā”ti vatvā “sakalanagare pana amhākaṃ goṇehi sadiso nāma natthī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1370_10: āha. Brāhmaṇo “mayhaṃ eko goṇo atibaddhaṃ sakaṭasataṃ pavaṭṭetuṃ samattho atthī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1370_11: āha. Seṭṭhi gahapati “kuto evarūpo goṇo”ti āha. Brāhmaṇo “mayhaṃ gehe atthī”ti. “Tena
atk-s0513a1:1370_12: hi abbhutaṃ karohī”ti. “Sādhu karomī”ti sahassena abbhutaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1371_0: So sakaṭasataṃ vālukāsakkharapāsāṇānaṃyeva pūretvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā sabbāni akkhabandhanayottena
atk-s0513a1:1371_1: ekato bandhitvā nandivisālaṃ nhāpetvā gandhapañcaṅgulikaṃ katvā kaṇṭhe mālaṃ piḷandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1371_2: purimasakaṭadhure ekakameva yojetvā sayaṃ dhure nisīditvā patodaṃ ukkhipitvā “gaccha
atk-s0513a1:1371_3: kūṭa, vahassu kūṭā”ti āha. Bodhisatto “ayaṃ maṃ akūṭaṃ kūṭavādena samudācaratī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1371_4: cattāro pāde thambhe viya niccale katvā aṭṭhāsi. Seṭṭhi taṅkhaṇaññeva brāhmaṇaṃ sahassaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1371_5: āharāpesi. Brāhmaṇo sahassaparājito goṇaṃ muñcitvā gharaṃ gantvā sokābhibhūto nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:1371_6: Nandivisālo caritvā āgato brāhmaṇaṃ sokābhibhūtaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:1371_7: niddāyasī”ti āha. “Kuto me, niddā, sahassaparājitassāti, brāhmaṇa, mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1371_8: tava gehe vasantena atthi kiñci bhājanaṃ vā bhinditapubbaṃ, koci vā madditapubbo,
atk-s0513a1:1371_9: aṭṭhāne vā pana uccārapassāvo katapubbo”ti? “Natthi tātā”ti. Atha tvaṃ maṃ kasmā
atk-s0513a1:1371_10: kūṭavādena samudācarasi, taveveso doso, mayhaṃ doso natthi, gaccha, tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1371_11: dvīhi sahassehi abbhutaṃ karohi, kevalaṃ maṃ akūṭaṃ kūṭavādena mā samudācarasīti.
atk-s0513a1:1372_0: Brāhmaṇo tassa vacanaṃ sutvā gantvā dvīhi sahassehi abbhutaṃ katvā purimanayeneva
atk-s0513a1:1372_1: sakaṭasataṃ atibandhitvā nandivisālaṃ maṇḍetvā purimasakaṭadhure yojesi. Kathaṃ yojesīti?
atk-s0513a1:1372_2: Yugaṃ dhure niccalaṃ bandhitvā ekāya koṭiyā nandivisālaṃ yojetvā ekaṃ koṭiṃ dhurayottena
atk-s0513a1:1372_3: paliveṭhetvā yugakoṭiñca akkhapādañca nissāya muṇḍarukkhadaṇḍakaṃ datvā tena yottena
atk-s0513a1:1372_4: niccalaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapesi. Evañhi kate yugaṃ etto vā ito vā na gacchati, sakkā hoti
atk-s0513a1:1372_5: ekeneva goṇena ākaḍḍhituṃ. Athassa brāhmaṇo dhure nisīditvā nandivisālassa piṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1372_6: parimajjitvā “gaccha bhadra, vahassu, bhandrā”ti āha. Bodhisatto atibaddhaṃ sakaṭasataṃ
atk-s0513a1:1372_7: ekavegeneva ākaḍḍhitvā pacchā ṭhitaṃ sakaṭaṃ purato ṭhitassa sakaṭassa ṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1372_8: Govittakaseṭṭhi parājito brāhmaṇassa dve sahassāni adāsi. Aññepi manussā bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:1372_9: bahuṃ dhanaṃ adaṃsu, sabbaṃ brāhmaṇasseva ahosi. Evaṃ so bodhisattaṃ nissāya bahuṃ dhanaṃ labhi.
atk-s0513a1:1373: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, pharusavacanaṃ nāma kassaci manāpa”nti chabbaggiye bhikkhū garahitvā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1377: Dhanañca naṃ alābhesi, tena cattamano ahū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1378_0: Tattha manuññameva bhāseyyāti parena saddhiṃ bhāsamāno catudosavirahitaṃ madhuraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1378_1: manāpaṃ saṇhaṃ mudukaṃ piyavacanameva bhāseyya. Garuṃ bhāraṃ udaddharīti nandivisālo
atk-s0513a1:1378_2: balibaddo amanāpaṃ bhāsamānassa bhāraṃ anuddharitvā pacchā manāpaṃ piyavacanaṃ bhāsamānassa
atk-s0513a1:1378_3: brāhmaṇassa garuṃ bhāraṃ uddhari, uddharitvā kaḍḍhitvā pavaṭṭesīti attho, da-kāro
atk-s0513a1:1379: Iti satthā “manuññameva bhāseyyā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā brāhmaṇo ānando ahosi, nandivisālo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1383_0: Yato yato garu dhuranti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1383_1: kathesi. Taṃ saddhiṃ devorohaṇena terasakanipāte sarabhamigajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:1383_2: Sammāsambuddhe pana yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā devaloke temāsaṃ vasitvā mahāpavāraṇāya
atk-s0513a1:1383_3: saṅkassanagaradvāre oruyha mahantena parivārena jetavanaṃ paviṭṭhe bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1383_4: sannipatitvā “āvuso, tathāgato nāma asamadhuro, tathāgatena vuḷhadhuraṃ añño vahituṃ
atk-s0513a1:1383_5: samattho nāma natthi, cha satthāro ‘mayameva pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāma, mayameva pāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1383_6: karissāmā’ti vatvā ekampi pāṭihāriyaṃ na akaṃsu, aho satthā asamadhuro”ti satthu
atk-s0513a1:1383_7: guṇakathaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0513a1:1383_8: sannisinnā”ti pucchi. “Mayaṃ, bhante, na aññāya kathāya, evarūpāya nāma tumhākameva
atk-s0513a1:1383_9: guṇakathāyā”ti. Satthā “bhikkhave, idāni mayā vuḷhadhuraṃ ko vahissati, pubbe tiracchānayoniyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1383_10: nibbattopi ahaṃ attanā samadhuraṃ kañci nālattha”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1384_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto goyoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:1384_1: Atha naṃ sāmikā taruṇavacchakakāleyeva ekissā mahallikāya ghare vasitvā tassā nivāsavetanato
atk-s0513a1:1384_2: paricchinditvā adaṃsu. Sā taṃ yāgubhattādīhi paṭijaggamānā puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā vaḍḍhesi.
atk-s0513a1:1384_3: So “ayyikākāḷako” tveva nāmaṃ paññāyittha. Vayappatto ca añjanavaṇṇo hutvā gāmagoṇehi
atk-s0513a1:1384_4: saddhiṃ carati, sīlācārasampanno ahosi. Gāmadārakā siṅgesupi kaṇṇesupi galepi gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1384_5: olambanti, naṅguṭṭhepi gahetvā kīḷanti, piṭṭhiyampi nisīdanti. So ekadivasaṃ cintesi
atk-s0513a1:1384_6: “mayhaṃ mātā duggatā, maṃ puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā dukkhena posesi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhatiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1384_7: katvā imaṃ duggatabhāvato moceyya”nti. So tato paṭṭhāya bhatiṃ upadhārento carati.
atk-s0513a1:1385_0: Athekadivasaṃ eko satthavāhaputto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi visamatitthaṃ sampatto, tassa
atk-s0513a1:1385_1: goṇā sakaṭāni uttāretuṃ na sakkonti, pañcasu sakaṭasatesu goṇā yugaparamparāya yojitā
atk-s0513a1:1385_2: ekampi sakaṭaṃ uttāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Bodhisattopi gāmagoṇehi saddhiṃ tattha samīpe
atk-s0513a1:1385_3: carati. Satthavāhaputtopi gosuttavittako, so “atthi nu kho etesaṃ gunnaṃ antare imāni
atk-s0513a1:1385_4: sakaṭāni uttāretuṃ samattho usabhājānīyo”ti upadhārayamāno bodhisattaṃ disvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1385_5: ājānīyo sakkhissati mayhaṃ sakaṭāni uttāretuṃ, ko nu kho assa sāmiko”ti gopālake
atk-s0513a1:1385_6: pucchi “ko nu kho bho imassa sāmiko, ahaṃ imaṃ sakaṭe yojetvā sakaṭesu uttāritesu
atk-s0513a1:1385_7: vetanaṃ dassāmī”ti. Te āhaṃsu “gahetvā naṃ yojetha, natthi imassa imasmiṃ ṭhāne sāmiko”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1385_8: So naṃ nāsāya rajjukena bandhitvā ākaḍḍhento cāletumpi nāsakkhi. Bodhisatto kira
atk-s0513a1:1385_9: “bhatiyā kathitāya gamissāmī”ti na agamāsi. Satthavāhaputto tassādhippāyaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0513a1:1385_10: “sāmi, tayā pañcasu sakaṭasatesu uttāritesu ekekassa sakaṭassa dve dve kahāpaṇe bhatiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1385_11: katvā sahassaṃ dassāmī”ti āha. Tadā bodhisatto sayameva agamāsi. Atha naṃ purisā
atk-s0513a1:1385_12: purimasakaṭesu yojesuṃ. Atha naṃ ekavegeneva ukkhipitvā thale patiṭṭhāpesi. Etenupāyena
atk-s0513a1:1386_0: Satthavāhaputto ekekassa sakaṭassa ekekaṃ katvā pañcasatāni bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā tassa
atk-s0513a1:1386_1: gale bandhi. So “ayaṃ mayhaṃ yathāparicchinnaṃ bhatiṃ na deti, na dānissa gantuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1386_2: dassāmī”ti gantvā sabbapurimasakaṭassa purato maggaṃ nivāretvā aṭṭhāsi. Apanetuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1386_3: vāyamantāpi naṃ apanetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Satthavāhaputto “jānāti maññe esa attano bhatiyā
atk-s0513a1:1386_4: ūnabhāva”nti ekekasmiṃ sakaṭe dve dve katvā sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ bandhitvā “ayaṃ te sakaṭuttaraṇabhatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1386_5: gīvāyaṃ laggesi. So sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ ādāya mātu santikaṃ agamāsi. Gāmadārakā “kiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1386_6: nāmetaṃ ayyikākāḷakassa gale”ti bodhisattassa santikaṃ āgacchanti. So te anubandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1386_7: dūratova palāpento mātu santikaṃ gato. Pañcannaṃ pana sakaṭasatānaṃ uttāritattā rattehi
atk-s0513a1:1386_8: akkhīhi kilantarūpo paññāyittha. Ayyikā tassa gīvāya sahassatthavikaṃ disvā “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:1386_9: ayaṃ te kahaṃ laddhā”ti gopālakadārake pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “tāta, kiṃ ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1386_10: tayā laddhabhatiyā jīvitukāmā, kiṃkāraṇā evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhosī”ti vatvā bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1386_11: uṇhodakena nhāpetvā sakalasarīraṃ telena makkhetvā pānīyaṃ pāyetvā sappāyaṃ bhojanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1386_12: bhojetvā jīvitapariyosāne saddhiṃ bodhisattena yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:1387: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, tathāgato idāneva asamadhuro, pubbepi asamadhuroyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1390: Tadāssu kaṇhaṃ yuñjanti, svāssu taṃ vahate dhura”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1391_0: Tattha yato yato garu dhuranti yasmiṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne dhuraṃ garu bhāriyaṃ hoti, aññe
atk-s0513a1:1391_1: balibaddā ukkhipituṃ na sakkonti. Yato gambhīravattanīti vattanti etthāti vattanī,
atk-s0513a1:1391_2: maggassetaṃ nāmaṃ, yasmiṃ ṭhāne udakacikkhallamahantatāya vā visamacchinnataṭabhāvena
atk-s0513a1:1391_3: vā maggo gambhīro hotīti attho. Tadāssu kaṇhaṃ yuñjantīti ettha assūti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1391_4: tadā kaṇhaṃ yuñjantīti attho. Yadā dhurañca garu hoti maggo ca gambhīro, tadā aññe
atk-s0513a1:1391_5: balibadde apanetvā kaṇhameva yojentīti vuttaṃ hoti. Svāssu taṃ vahate dhuranti etthāpi
atk-s0513a1:1391_6: assūti nipātamattameva, so taṃ dhuraṃ vahatīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1392_0: Evaṃ bhagavā “tadā, bhikkhave, kaṇhova taṃ dhuraṃ vahatī”ti dassetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0513a1:1392_1: jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mahallikā uppalavaṇṇā ahosi, ayyikākāḷako pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1396_0: Mā munikassa pihayīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto thullakumārikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1396_1: kathesi. Taṃ terasakanipāte cūḷanāradakassapajātake āvi bhavissati. Satthā pana taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1396_2: bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchi. “Āma, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1396_3: nissāyā”ti? “Thullakumārikāpalobhanaṃ bhante”ti. Satthā “bhikkhu esā tava anatthakārikā,
atk-s0513a1:1396_4: pubbepi tvaṃ imissā vivāhadivase jīvitakkhayaṃ patvā mahājanassa uttaribhaṅgabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1397_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ gāmake ekassa kuṭumbikassa
atk-s0513a1:1397_1: gehe goyoniyaṃ nibbatti “mahālohito”ti nāmena, kaniṭṭhabhātāpissa cūḷalohito nāma
atk-s0513a1:1397_2: ahosi. Teyeva dve bhātike nissāya tasmiṃ kule kammadhuraṃ vattati. Tasmiṃ pana kule
atk-s0513a1:1397_3: ekā kumārikā atthi, taṃ eko nagaravāsī kulaputto attano puttassa vāresi. Tassā mātāpitaro
atk-s0513a1:1397_4: “kumārikāya vivāhakāle āgatānaṃ pāhunakānaṃ uttaribhaṅgo bhavissatī”ti yāgubhattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1397_5: datvā munikaṃ nāma sūkaraṃ posesuṃ. Taṃ disvā cūḷalohito bhātaraṃ pucchi “imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1397_6: kule kammadhuraṃ vattamānaṃ amhe dve bhātike nissāya vattati, ime pana amhākaṃ tiṇapalālādīneva
atk-s0513a1:1397_7: denti, sūkaraṃ yāgubhattena posenti, kena nu kho kāraṇena esa etaṃ labhatī”ti. Athassa
atk-s0513a1:1397_8: bhātā “tāta cūḷalohita, mā tvaṃ etassa bhojanaṃ pihayi, ayaṃ sūkaro maraṇabhattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1397_9: bhuñjati. Etissā hi kumārikāya vivāhakāle āgatānaṃ pāhunakānaṃ uttaribhaṅgo bhavissatīti
atk-s0513a1:1397_10: ime etaṃ sūkaraṃ posenti, ito katipāhaccayena te manussā āgamissanti, atha naṃ sūkaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1397_11: pādesu gahetvā kaḍḍhentā heṭṭhāmañcato nīharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā pāhunakānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1397_12: sūpabyañjanaṃ kariyamānaṃ passissasī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1401_0: Tattha mā munikassa pihayīti munikassa bhojane pihaṃ mā uppādayi, “esa muniko subhojanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1401_1: bhuñjatī”ti mā munikassa pihayi, “kadā nu kho ahampi evaṃ sukhito bhaveyya”nti mā
atk-s0513a1:1401_2: munikabhāvaṃ patthayi. Ayañhi āturannāni bhuñjati. Āturannānīti maraṇabhojanāni.
atk-s0513a1:1401_3: Appossukko bhusaṃ khādāti tassa bhojane nirussukko hutvā attanā laddhaṃ bhusaṃ khāda.
atk-s0513a1:1401_4: Etaṃ dīghāyulakkhaṇanti etaṃ dīghāyubhāvassa kāraṇaṃ. Tato na cirasseva te manussā
atk-s0513a1:1401_5: āgamiṃsu, munikaṃ ghātetvā nānappakārehi paciṃsu. Bodhisatto cūḷalohitaṃ āha “diṭṭho
atk-s0513a1:1401_6: te, tāta, muniko”ti. Diṭṭhaṃ me, bhātika, munikassa bhojanaphalaṃ, etassa bhojanato
atk-s0513a1:1401_7: sataguṇena sahassaguṇena amhākaṃ tiṇapalālabhusamattameva uttamañca anavajjañca dīghāyulakkhaṇañcāti.
atk-s0513a1:1402_0: Satthā “evaṃ kho tvaṃ bhikkhu pubbepi imaṃ kumārikaṃ nissāya jīvitakkhayaṃ patvā
atk-s0513a1:1402_1: mahājanassa uttaribhaṅgabhāvaṃ gato”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1402_2: saccapariyosāne ukkaṇṭhito bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Satthā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0513a1:1402_3: jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā munikasūkaro ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu ahosi, thullakumārikā
atk-s0513a1:1402_4: esā eva, cūḷalohito ānando, mahālohito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1411_0: Kulāvakāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aparissāvetvā pānīyaṃ pītaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1411_1: kathesi. Sāvatthito kira dve sahāyakā daharabhikkhū janapadaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ phāsukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:1411_2: yathājjhāsayaṃ vasitvā “sammāsambuddhaṃ passissāmā”ti puna tato nikkhamitvā jetavanābhimukhā
atk-s0513a1:1411_3: pāyiṃsu. Ekassa hatthe parissāvanaṃ atthi, ekassa natthi. Dvepi ekato pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā
atk-s0513a1:1411_4: pivanti. Te ekadivasaṃ vivādaṃ akaṃsu. Parissāvanasāmiko itarassa parissāvanaṃ adatvā
atk-s0513a1:1411_5: sayameva pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā pivi, itaro pana parissāvanaṃ alabhitvā pipāsaṃ sandhāretuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1411_6: asakkonto aparissāvetvā pānīyaṃ pivi. Te ubhopi anupubbena jetavanaṃ patvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1411_7: vanditvā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathetvā “kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1411_8: “Bhante, mayaṃ kosalajanapade ekasmiṃ gāmake vasitvā tato nikkhamitvā tumhākaṃ dassanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:1411_9: āgatā”ti. “Kacci pana vo samaggā āgatatthā”ti? Aparissāvanako āha “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1411_10: antarāmagge mayā saddhiṃ vivādaṃ katvā parissāvanaṃ nādāsī”ti. Itaropi āha “ayaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1411_11: bhante, aparissāvetvāva jānaṃ sapāṇakaṃ udakaṃ pivī”ti. “Saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:1411_12: jānaṃ sapāṇakaṃ udakaṃ pivī”ti? “Āma, bhante, aparissāvitaṃ udakaṃ pivinti. Satthā
atk-s0513a1:1411_13: “bhikkhu pubbe paṇḍitā devanagare rajjaṃ kārentā yuddhaparājitā samuddapiṭṭhena palāyantā
atk-s0513a1:1411_14: ‘issariyaṃ nissāya pāṇavadhaṃ na karissāmā’ti tāva mahantaṃ yasaṃ pariccajitvā supaṇṇapotakānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1411_15: jīvitaṃ datvā rathaṃ nivattayiṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1412_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahe eko māgadharājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Tadā bodhisatto yathā
atk-s0513a1:1412_1: etarahi sakko purimattabhāve magadharaṭṭhe macalagāmake nibbatti, evaṃ tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:1412_2: macalagāmake mahākulassa putto hutvā nibbatti. Nāmaggahaṇadivase cassa “maghakumāro”tveva
atk-s0513a1:1412_3: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto “maghamāṇavo”ti paññāyittha. Athassa mātāpitaro samānajātikakulato
atk-s0513a1:1412_4: dārikaṃ ānayiṃsu. So puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhamāno dānapati ahosi, pañca sīlāni rakkhati.
atk-s0513a1:1412_5: Tasmiñca gāme tettiṃseva kulāni honti, tepi tettiṃsa kulā manussā ekadivasaṃ gāmamajjhe
atk-s0513a1:1412_6: ṭhatvā gāmakammaṃ karonti. Bodhisatto ṭhitaṭṭhāne pādehi paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā taṃ padesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1412_7: ramaṇīyaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi, athañño eko āgantvā tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito. Bodhisatto aparaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1412_8: ṭhānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi, tatrāpi añño ṭhito. Bodhisatto aparampi aparampīti
atk-s0513a1:1412_9: sabbesampi ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ katvā aparena samayena tasmiṃ ṭhāne maṇḍapaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0513a1:1412_10: maṇḍapampi apanetvā sālaṃ kāresi, tattha phalakāsanāni santharitvā pānīyacāṭiṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1413_0: Aparena samayena tepi tettiṃsajanā bodhisattena samānacchandā ahesuṃ. Te bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1413_1: pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā tato paṭṭhāya tehi saddhiṃ puññāni karonto vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:1413_2: Tepi teneva saddhiṃ puññāni karontā kālasseva vuṭṭhāya vāsipharasumusalahatthā catumahāpathādīsu
atk-s0513a1:1413_3: musalena pāsāṇe ubbattetvā pavaṭṭenti, yānānaṃ akkhapaṭighātarukkhe haranti, visamaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1413_4: samaṃ karonti, setuṃ attharanti, pokkharaṇiyo khaṇanti, sālaṃ karonti, dānāni denti,
atk-s0513a1:1413_5: sīlāni rakkhanti. Evaṃ yebhuyyena sakalagāmavāsino bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā sīlāni rakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1414_0: Atha nesaṃ gāmabhojako cintesi “ahaṃ pubbe etesu suraṃ pivantesu pāṇātipātādīni karontesu
atk-s0513a1:1414_1: cāṭikahāpaṇādivasena ceva daṇḍabalivasena ca dhanaṃ labhāmi, idāni pana magho māṇavo
atk-s0513a1:1414_2: sīlaṃ rakkhāpeti, tesaṃ pāṇātipātādīni kātuṃ na deti, idāni pana te pañca sīlāni
atk-s0513a1:1414_3: na rakkhāpessāmī”ti kuddho rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva, bahū corā gāmaghātādīni karontā
atk-s0513a1:1414_4: vicarantī”ti āha. Rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “gaccha, te ānehī”ti āha. So gantvā sabbepi
atk-s0513a1:1414_5: te bandhitvā ānetvā “ānītā, deva, corā”ti rañño ārocesi. Rājā tesaṃ kammaṃ asodhetvāva
atk-s0513a1:1414_6: “hatthinā ne maddāpethā”ti āha. Tato sabbepi te rājaṅgaṇe nipajjāpetvā hatthiṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1414_7: Bodhisatto tesaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi “tumhe sīlāni āvajjetha, pesuññakārake ca raññe ca
atk-s0513a1:1414_8: hatthimhi ca attano sarīre ca ekasadisameva mettaṃ bhāvethā”ti. Te tathā akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1414_9: Atha nesaṃ maddanatthāya hatthiṃ upanesuṃ. So upanīyamānopi na upagacchati, mahāviravaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1414_10: viravitvā palāyati. Aññaṃ aññaṃ hatthiṃ ānayiṃsu, tepi tatheva palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1415_0: Rājā “etesaṃ hatthe kiñci osadhaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā “vicinathā”ti āha. Vicinantā
atk-s0513a1:1415_1: adisvā “natthi, devā”ti āhaṃsu. Tena hi kiñci mantaṃ parivattessanti, pucchatha ne
atk-s0513a1:1415_2: “atthi vo parivattanamanto”ti? Rājapurisā pucchiṃsu, bodhisatto “atthī”ti āha. Rājapurisā
atk-s0513a1:1415_3: “atthi kira, devā”ti ārocayiṃsu, rājā sabbepi te pakkosāpetvā “tumhākaṃ jānanamantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1415_4: kathethā”ti āha. Bodhisatto avoca “deva, añño amhākaṃ manto nāma natthi, amhe pana
atk-s0513a1:1415_5: tettiṃsamattā janā pāṇaṃ na hanāma, adinnaṃ nādiyāma, micchācāraṃ na carāma, musāvādaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1415_6: na bhaṇāma, majjaṃ na pivāma, mettaṃ bhāvema, dānaṃ dema, maggaṃ samaṃ karoma, pokkharaṇiyo
atk-s0513a1:1415_7: khaṇāma, sālaṃ karoma, ayaṃ amhākaṃ manto ca parittañca vuḍḍhi cā”ti. Rājā tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1415_8: pasanno pesuññakārakassa sabbaṃ gehavibhavaṃ tañca tesaṃyeva dāsaṃ katvā adāsi, taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1416_0: Te tato paṭṭhāya yathāruciyā puññāni karontā “catumahāpathe mahantaṃ sālaṃ kāressāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1416_1: vaḍḍhakiṃ pakkosāpetvā sālaṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ. Mātugāmesu pana vigatacchandatāya tassā
atk-s0513a1:1416_2: sālāya mātugāmānaṃ pattiṃ nādaṃsu. Tena ca samayena bodhisattassa gehe sudhammā,
atk-s0513a1:1416_3: cittā, nandā, sujāti catasso itthiyo honti. Tāsu sudhammā vaḍḍhakinā saddhiṃ ekato
atk-s0513a1:1416_4: hutvā “bhātika, imissā sālāya maṃ jeṭṭhikaṃ karohī”ti vatvā lañjaṃ adāsi. So “sādhū”ti
atk-s0513a1:1416_5: sampaṭicchitvā paṭhamameva kaṇṇikārukkhaṃ sukkhāpetvā tacchetvā vijjhitvā kaṇṇikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1416_6: niṭṭhāpetvā vatthena paliveṭhetvā ṭhapesi. Atha sālaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā kaṇṇikāropanakāle
