atk-s0513a1:1416_7: “aho, ayyā, ekaṃ na sarimhā”ti āha. “Kiṃ nāma, bho”ti. “Kaṇṇikā laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1416_8: “Hotu āharissāmā”ti? “Idāni chinnarukkhena kātuṃ na sakkā, pubbeyeva chinditvā tacchetvā
atk-s0513a1:1416_9: vijjhitvā ṭhapitakaṇṇikā laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. “Idāni kiṃ kātabba”nti? “Sace kassaci
atk-s0513a1:1416_10: gehe niṭṭhāpetvā ṭhapitā vikkāyikakaṇṇikā atthi, sā pariyesitabbā”ti. Te pariyesantā
atk-s0513a1:1416_11: sudhammāya gehe disvā mūlena na labhiṃsu. “Sace maṃ sālāya pattikaṃ karotha, dassāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1416_12: vutte “na mayaṃ mātugāmānaṃ pattiṃ damhā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1417_0: Atha ne vaḍḍhakī āha “ayyā, tumhe kiṃ kathetha, ṭhapetvā brahmalokaṃ aññaṃ mātugāmarahitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1417_1: nāma natthi, gaṇhatha kaṇṇikaṃ, evaṃ sante amhākaṃ kammaṃ niṭṭhaṃ gamissatī”ti. Te
atk-s0513a1:1417_2: “sādhū”ti kaṇṇikaṃ gahetvā sālaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā āsanaphalakāni santharitvā pānīyacāṭiyo
atk-s0513a1:1417_3: ṭhapetvā yāgubhattaṃ nibandhiṃsu. Sālaṃ pākārena parikkhipitvā dvāraṃ yojetvā antopākāre
atk-s0513a1:1417_4: vālukaṃ ākiritvā bahipākāre tālapantiyo ropesuṃ. Cittāpi tasmiṃ ṭhāne uyyānaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0513a1:1417_5: “pupphūpagaphalūpagarukkho asuko nāma tasmiṃ natthī”ti nāhosi. Nandāpi tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:1417_6: ṭhāne pokkharaṇiṃ kāresi pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ. Sujā na kiñci akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1418: Bodhisatto mātu upaṭṭhānaṃ pitu upaṭṭhānaṃ kule jeṭṭhāpacāyikakammaṃ saccavācaṃ apharusavācaṃ apisuṇavācaṃ maccheravinayanti imāni satta vatapadāni pūretvā –
atk-s0513a1:1422: Taṃ ve devā tāvatiṃsā, āhu sappuriso itī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:1423_0: Evaṃ pasaṃsiyabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā jīvitapariyosāne tāvatiṃsabhavane sakko devarājā hutvā
atk-s0513a1:1423_1: nibbatti, tepissa sahāyā tattheva nibbattiṃsu. Tasmiṃ kāle tāvatiṃsabhavane asurā
atk-s0513a1:1423_2: paṭivasanti. Sakko devarājā “kiṃ no sādhāraṇena rajjenā”ti asure dibbapānaṃ pāyetvā
atk-s0513a1:1423_3: matte samāne pādesu gāhāpetvā sinerupabbatapāde khipāpesi. Te asurabhavanameva sampāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1424_0: Asurabhavanaṃ nāma sinerussa heṭṭhimatale tāvatiṃsadevalokappamāṇameva, tattha devānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1424_1: pāricchattako viya cittapāṭali nāma kappaṭṭhiyarukkho hoti. Te cittapāṭaliyā pupphitāya
atk-s0513a1:1424_2: jānanti “nāyaṃ amhākaṃ devaloko, devalokasmiñhi pāricchattako pupphatī”ti. Atha te
atk-s0513a1:1424_3: “jarasakko amhe matte katvā mahāsamuddapiṭṭhe khipitvā amhākaṃ devanagaraṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:1424_4: te mayaṃ tena saddhiṃ yujjhitvā amhākaṃ devanagarameva gaṇhissāmā”ti kipillikā viya
atk-s0513a1:1424_5: thambhaṃ sineruṃ anusañcaramānā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Sakko “asurā kira uṭṭhitā”ti sutvā samuddapiṭṭheyeva
atk-s0513a1:1424_6: abbhuggantvā yujjhamāno tehi parājito diyaḍḍhayojanasatikena vejayantarathena dakkhiṇasamuddassa
atk-s0513a1:1424_7: matthakena palāyituṃ āraddho. Athassa ratho samuddapiṭṭhena vegena gacchanto simbalivanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1424_8: pakkhanto, tassa gamanamagge simbalivanaṃ naḷavanaṃ viya chijjitvā chijjitvā samuddapiṭṭhe
atk-s0513a1:1424_9: patati. Supaṇṇapotakā samuddapiṭṭhe paripatantā mahāviravaṃ raviṃsu. Sakko mātaliṃ
atk-s0513a1:1424_10: pucchi “samma mātali, kiṃ saddo nāmesa, atikāruññaravo vattatī”ti? “Deva, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1424_11: rathavegena vicuṇṇite simbalivane patante supaṇṇapotakā maraṇabhayatajjitā ekaviravaṃ viravantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1425_0: Mahāsatto “samma mātali, mā amhe nissāya ete kilamantu, na mayaṃ issariyaṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a1:1425_1: pāṇavadhakammaṃ karoma, etesaṃ pana atthāya mayaṃ jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā asurānaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0513a1:1428: Kāmaṃ cajāma asuresu pāṇaṃ, māme dijā vikulāvā ahesu”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1429_0: Tattha kulāvakāti supaṇṇapotakā. Mātalīti sārathiṃ āmantesi. Simbalisminti passa
atk-s0513a1:1429_1: ete simbalirukkhe olambantā ṭhitāti dasseti. Īsāmukhena parivajjayassūti ete etassa
atk-s0513a1:1429_2: rathassa īsāmukhena yathā na haññanti, evaṃ te parivajjayassu. Kāmaṃ cajāma asuresu
atk-s0513a1:1429_3: pāṇanti yadi amhesu asurānaṃ pāṇaṃ cajantesu etesaṃ sotthi hoti, kāmaṃ cajāma ekaṃseneva
atk-s0513a1:1429_4: mayaṃ asuresu amhākaṃ pāṇaṃ cajāma. Māme dijā vikulāvā ahesunti ime pana dijā ime
atk-s0513a1:1429_5: garuḷapotakā viddhastavicuṇṇitakulāvakatāya vikulāvā mā ahesuṃ, mā amhākaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1429_6: etesaṃ upari khipa, nivattaya nivattaya rathanti. Mātalisaṅgāhako tassa vacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a1:1429_7: rathaṃ nivattetvā aññena maggena devalokābhimukhaṃ akāsi. Asurā pana taṃ nivattayamānameva
atk-s0513a1:1429_8: disvā “addhā aññehipi cakkavāḷehi sakkā āgacchanti, balaṃ labhitvā ratho nivatto
atk-s0513a1:1430_0: Sakkopi devanagaraṃ pavisitvā dvīsu devalokesu devagaṇena parivuto nagaramajjhe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1430_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pathaviṃ bhinditvā yojanasahassubbedho vejayantapāsādo uṭṭhahi. Vijayante
atk-s0513a1:1430_2: uṭṭhitattā “vejayanto” tveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Atha sakko puna asurānaṃ anāgamanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:1430_3: pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:1432: Uragakaroṭipayassa ca hārī, madanayutā caturo ca mahantā”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:1433_0: Dve nagarānipi yuddhena gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ayujjhapurāni nāma jātāni devanagarañca
atk-s0513a1:1433_1: asuranagarañca. Yadā hi asurā balavantā honti, atha devehi palāyitvā devanagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1433_2: pavisitvā dvāre pihite asurānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti. Yadā devā
atk-s0513a1:1433_3: balavantā honti, atha asurehi palāyitvā asuranagaraṃ pavisitvā dvāre pihite sakkānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1433_4: satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti. Iti imāni dve nagarāni ayujjhapurāni nāma.
atk-s0513a1:1433_5: Tesaṃ antarā etesu uragādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu sakkena ārakkhā ṭhapitā. Tattha uraga-saddena
atk-s0513a1:1433_6: nāgā gahitā. Te udake balavantā honti, tasmā sinerussa paṭhamālinde tesaṃ ārakkhā.
atk-s0513a1:1433_7: Karoṭi-saddena supaṇṇā gahitā. Tesaṃ kira karoṭi nāma pānabhojanaṃ, tena taṃ nāmaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1433_8: labhiṃsu, dutiyālinde tesaṃ ārakkhā. Payassahāri-saddena kumbhaṇḍā gahitā. Dānavarakkhasā
atk-s0513a1:1433_9: kirete, tatiyālinde tesaṃ ārakkhā. Madanayuta-saddena yakkhā gahitā. Visamacārino
atk-s0513a1:1433_10: kira te yuddhasoṇḍā, catutthālinde tesaṃ ārakkhā. Caturo ca mahantāti cattāro mahārājāno
atk-s0513a1:1433_11: vuttā, pañcamālinde tesaṃ ārakkhā. Tasmā yadi asurā kupitā āvilacittā devapuraṃ upayanti,
atk-s0513a1:1433_12: pañcavidhesu yaṃ girino paṭhamaṃ paribhaṇḍaṃ, taṃ uragā paribāhiya tiṭṭhanti. Evaṃ sesesu sesā.
atk-s0513a1:1434_0: Imesu pana pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā sakke devānaminde dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāne
atk-s0513a1:1434_1: sudhammā cavitvā tasseva pādaparicārikā hutvā nibbatti, kaṇṇikāya dinnanissandena
atk-s0513a1:1434_2: cassā pañcayojanasatikā sudhammā nāma devasabhā udapādi, yattha dibbasetacchattassa
atk-s0513a1:1434_3: heṭṭhā yojanappamāṇe kañcanapallaṅke nisinno sakko devānamindo devamanussānaṃ kattabbakiccāni
atk-s0513a1:1434_4: karoti. Cittāpi cavitvā tasseva pādaparicārikā hutvā nibbatti, uyyānassa karaṇanissandena
atk-s0513a1:1434_5: cassā cittalatāvanaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ udapādi. Nandāpi cavitvā tasseva pādaparicārikā
atk-s0513a1:1434_6: hutvā nibbatti, pokkharaṇiyā nissandena cassā nandā nāma pokkharaṇī udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:1435_0: Sujā pana kusalakammassa akatattā ekasmiṃ araññe kandarāya bakasakuṇikā hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0513a1:1435_1: Sakko “sujā na paññāyati, kattha nu kho nibbattā”ti āvajjento taṃ disvā tattha gantvā
atk-s0513a1:1435_2: taṃ ādāya devalokaṃ āgantvā tassā ramaṇīyaṃ devanagaraṃ sudhammaṃ devasabhaṃ cittalatāvanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1435_3: nandāpokkharaṇiñca dassetvā “etā kusalaṃ katvā mayhaṃ pādaparicārikā hutvā nibbattā,
atk-s0513a1:1435_4: tvaṃ pana kusalaṃ akatvā tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattā, ito paṭṭhāya sīlaṃ rakkhāhī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1435_5: taṃ ovaditvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā tattheva netvā vissajjesi. Sāpi tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:1435_6: sīlaṃ rakkhati. Sakko katipāhaccayena “sakkā nu kho sīlaṃ rakkhitu”nti gantvā maccharūpena
atk-s0513a1:1435_7: uttāno hutvā purato nipajji, sā “matamacchako”ti saññāya sīse aggahesi, maccho naṅguṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1435_8: cālesi, atha naṃ “jīvati maññe”ti vissajjesi. Sakko “sādhu sādhu, sakkhissasi sīlaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1435_9: rakkhitu”nti agamāsi. Sā tato cutā bārāṇasiyaṃ kumbhakāragehe nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1436_0: Sakko “kahaṃ nu kho nibbattā”ti tattha nibbattabhāvaṃ ñatvā suvaṇṇaeḷālukānaṃ yānakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1436_1: pūretvā majjhe gāmassa mahallakavesena nisīditvā “eḷālukāni gaṇhatha, eḷālukāni gaṇhathā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1436_2: ugghosesi. Manussā āgantvā “dehi, tātā”ti āhaṃsu. “Ahaṃ sīlarakkhakānaṃ dammi, tumhe
atk-s0513a1:1436_3: sīlaṃ rakkhathā”ti? “Mayaṃ sīlaṃ nāma na jānāma, mūlena dehī”ti. “Na mayhaṃ mūlena
atk-s0513a1:1436_4: attho, sīlarakkhakānaññevāhaṃ dammī”ti. Manussā “ko cāyaṃ eḷāluko”ti pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1436_5: Sujā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “mayhaṃ ānītaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā gantvā taṃ “dehi, tātā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1436_6: āha. “Sīlaṃ rakkhasi, ammā”ti? “Āma, rakkhāmī”ti. “Idaṃ mayā tuyhameva atthāya ābhata”nti
atk-s0513a1:1437_0: Sāpi yāvajīvaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tato cutā vepacittissa asurindassa dhītā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:1437_1: sīlānisaṃsena abhirūpā ahosi. So tassā vayappattakāle “mayhaṃ dhītā attano cittarucitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1437_2: sāmikaṃ gaṇhatū”ti asure sannipātesi. Sakko “kahaṃ nu kho sā nibbattā”ti olokento
atk-s0513a1:1437_3: tattha nibbattabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sujā cittarucitaṃ sāmikaṃ gaṇhantī maṃ gaṇhissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1437_4: asuravaṇṇaṃ māpetvā tattha agamāsi. Sujaṃ alaṅkaritvā sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ ānetvā “cittarucitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1437_5: sāmikaṃ gaṇhā”ti āhaṃsu. Sā olokentī sakkaṃ disvā pubbepi sinehavasena uppannapemena
atk-s0513a1:1437_6: mahoghena viya ajjhotthaṭahadayā hutvā “ayaṃ me sāmiko”ti vatvā tassa upari pupphadāmaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1437_7: khipitvā aggahesi. Asurā “amhākaṃ rājā ettakaṃ kālaṃ dhītu anucchavikaṃ alabhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1437_8: idāni labhati, ayamevassā dhītu pitāmahato mahallako anucchaviko”ti lajjamānā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1437_9: So taṃ devanagaraṃ ānetvā aḍḍhateyyānaṃ nāṭikākoṭīnaṃ jeṭṭhikaṃ katvā yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1438_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ bhikkhu pubbe paṇḍitā devanagare rajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1438_1: kārayamānā attano jīvitaṃ pariccajantāpi pāṇātipātaṃ na kariṃsu, tvaṃ nāma evarūpe
atk-s0513a1:1438_2: niyyānike sāsane pabbajitvā aparissāvitaṃ sapāṇakaṃ udakaṃ pivissasī”ti taṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1438_3: garahitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mātalisaṅgāhako ānando
atk-s0513a1:1442_0: Rudaṃ manuññanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ bahubhaṇḍikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1442_1: kathesi. Vatthu heṭṭhā devadhammajātake vuttasadisameva. Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1442_2: kira tvaṃ bhikkhu bahubhaṇḍo”ti pucchi. “Āma, bhante”ti. “Kiṃkāraṇā tvaṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:1442_3: bahubhaṇḍo jātosī”ti? So ettakaṃ sutvāva kuddho nivāsanapārupanaṃ chaḍḍetvā “iminā
atk-s0513a1:1442_4: dāni nīhārena vicarāmī”ti satthu purato naggo aṭṭhāsi. Manussā “dhī dhī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1442_5: So tato palāyitvā hīnāyāvatto. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā “satthu nāma purato
atk-s0513a1:1442_6: evarūpaṃ karissatī”ti tassa aguṇakathaṃ kathesuṃ. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:1442_7: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti bhikkhū pucchi. Bhante, “so hi nāma bhikkhu tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1442_8: purato catuparisamajjhe hirottappaṃ pahāya gāmadārako viya naggo ṭhatvā manussehi
atk-s0513a1:1442_9: jigucchiyamāno hīnāyāvattitvā sāsanā parihīno”ti tassa aguṇakathāya nisinnāmhāti.
atk-s0513a1:1442_10: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva so bhikkhu hirottappābhāvena ratanasāsanā parihīno,
atk-s0513a1:1442_11: pubbe itthiratanapaṭilābhatopi parihīnoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1443_0: Atīte paṭhamakappe catuppadā sīhaṃ rājānaṃ akaṃsu, macchā ānandamacchaṃ, sakuṇā suvaṇṇahaṃsaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1443_1: Tassa pana suvaṇṇahaṃsarājassa dhītā haṃsapotikā abhirūpā ahosi. So tassā varaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1443_2: sā attano cittarucitaṃ sāmikaṃ vāresi. Haṃsarājā tassā varaṃ datvā himavante sabbe
atk-s0513a1:1443_3: sakuṇe sannipātāpesi, nānappakārā haṃsamorādayo sakuṇagaṇā samāgantvā ekasmiṃ mahante
atk-s0513a1:1443_4: pāsāṇatale sannipatiṃsu. Haṃsarājā “attano cittarucitaṃ sāmikaṃ āgantvā gaṇhātū”ti
atk-s0513a1:1443_5: dhītaraṃ pakkosāpesi. Sā sakuṇasaṅghaṃ olokentī maṇivaṇṇagīvaṃ citrapekhuṇaṃ moraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1443_6: disvā “ayaṃ me sāmiko hotū”ti ārocesi. Sakuṇasaṅghā moraṃ upasaṅkamitvā āhaṃsu “samma
atk-s0513a1:1443_7: mora, ayaṃ rājadhītā ettakānaṃ sakuṇānaṃ majjhe sāmikaṃ rocentī tayi ruciṃ uppādesī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1443_8: Moro “ajjāpi tāva me balaṃ na passatī”ti atituṭṭhiyā hirottappaṃ bhinditvā tāva mahato
atk-s0513a1:1443_9: sakuṇasaṅghassa majjhe pakkhe pasāretvā naccituṃ ārabhi, naccanto appaṭicchanno ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1444_0: Suvaṇṇahaṃsarājā lajjito “imassa neva ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī atthi, na bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1444_1: ottappaṃ, nāssa bhinnahirottappassa mama dhītaraṃ dassāmī”ti sakuṇasaṅghamajjhe imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1446: “Rudaṃ manuññaṃ rucirā ca piṭṭhi, veḷuriyavaṇṇūpanibhā ca gīvā;
atk-s0513a1:1447: Byāmamattāni ca pekhuṇāni, naccena te dhītaraṃ no dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1448_0: Tattha rudaṃ manuññanti ta-kārassa da-kāro kato, rutaṃ manāpaṃ, vassitasaddo madhuroti
atk-s0513a1:1448_1: attho. Rucirā ca piṭṭhīti piṭṭhipi te citrā ceva sobhanā ca. Veḷuriyavaṇṇūpanibhāti
atk-s0513a1:1448_3: Naccena te dhītaraṃ no dadāmīti hirottappaṃ bhinditvā naccitabhāveneva te evarūpassa
atk-s0513a1:1448_4: nillajjassa dhītaraṃ no dadāmīti vatvā haṃsarājā tasmiṃyeva parisamajjhe attano bhāgineyyassa
atk-s0513a1:1448_5: haṃsapotakassa dhītaraṃ adāsi. Moro haṃsapotikaṃ alabhitvā lajjitvā tatova uppatitvā
atk-s0513a1:1449_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva esa hirottappaṃ bhinditvā ratanasāsanā parihīno, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:1449_1: itthiratanapaṭilābhato parihīnoyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0513a1:1449_2: jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā moro bahubhaṇḍiko ahosi, haṃsarājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1453_0: Sammodamānāti idaṃ satthā kapilavatthuṃ upanissāya nigrodhārāme viharanto cumbaṭakakalahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1453_1: ārabbha kathesi. So kuṇālajātake āvi bhavissati. Tadā pana satthā ñātake āmantetvā
atk-s0513a1:1453_2: “mahārājā ñātakānaṃ aññamaññaṃ viggaho nāma na yutto, tiracchānagatāpi hi pubbe samaggakāle
atk-s0513a1:1453_3: paccāmitte abhibhavitvā sotthiṃ pattā yadā vivādamāpannā, tadā mahāvināsaṃ pattā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1454_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto vaṭṭakayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:1454_1: anekavaṭṭakasahassaparivāro araññe paṭivasati. Tadā eko vaṭṭakaluddako tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1454_2: gantvā vaṭṭakavassitaṃ katvā tesaṃ sannipatitabhāvaṃ ñatvā tesaṃ upari jālaṃ khipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1454_3: pariyantesu maddanto sabbe ekato katvā pacchiṃ pūretvā gharaṃ gantvā te vikkiṇitvā
atk-s0513a1:1454_4: tena mūlena jīvikaṃ kappeti. Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatto te vaṭṭake āha – “ayaṃ sākuṇiko
atk-s0513a1:1454_5: amhākaṃ ñātake vināsaṃ pāpeti, ahaṃ ekaṃ upāyaṃ jānāmi, enesa amhe gaṇhituṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0513a1:1454_6: ito dāni paṭṭhāya etena tumhākaṃ upari jāle khittamatte ekeko ekekasmiṃ jālakkhike
atk-s0513a1:1454_7: sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā jālaṃ ukkhipitvā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ haritvā ekasmiṃ kaṇṭakagumbe pakkhipatha,
atk-s0513a1:1454_8: evaṃ sante heṭṭhā tena tena ṭhānena palāyissāmā”ti. Te sabbe “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1454_9: Dutiyadivase upari jāle khitte te bodhisattena vuttanayeneva jālaṃ ukkhipitvā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1454_10: kaṇṭakagumbe khipitvā sayaṃ heṭṭhābhāgena tato tato palāyiṃsu. Sākuṇikassa gumbato
atk-s0513a1:1454_11: jālaṃ mocentasseva vikālo jāto, so tucchahatthova agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1455_0: Punadivasato paṭṭhāyapi vaṭṭakā tatheva karonti. Sopi yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā jālameva
atk-s0513a1:1455_1: mocento kiñci alabhitvā tucchahatthova gehaṃ gacchati. Athassa bhariyā kujjhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1455_2: “tvaṃ divase divase tucchahattho āgacchasi, aññampi te bahi positabbaṭṭhānaṃ atthi
atk-s0513a1:1455_3: maññe”ti āha. Sākuṇiko “bhadde, mama aññaṃ positabbaṭṭhānaṃ natthi, apica kho pana
atk-s0513a1:1455_4: te vaṭṭakā samaggā hutvā caranti, mayā khittamatte jālaṃ ādāya kaṇṭakagumbe khipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1455_5: gacchanti, na kho panete sabbakālameva sammodamānā viharissanti, tvaṃ mā cintayi,
atk-s0513a1:1455_6: yadā te vivādamāpajjissanti, tadā te sabbeva ādāya tava mukhaṃ hāsayamāno āgacchissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1458: Yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasa”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1459_0: Tattha yadā te vivadissantīti yasmiṃ kāle te vaṭṭakā nānāladdhikā nānāgāhā hutvā
atk-s0513a1:1459_1: vivadissanti, kalahaṃ karissantīti attho. Tadā ehinti me vasanti tasmiṃ kāle sabbepi
atk-s0513a1:1459_2: te mama vasaṃ āgacchissanti. Athāhaṃ te gahetvā tava mukhaṃ hāsento āgacchissāmīti
atk-s0513a1:1460_0: Katipāhasseva pana accayena eko vaṭṭako gocarabhūmiṃ otaranto asallakkhetvā aññassa
atk-s0513a1:1460_1: sīsaṃ akkami, itaro “ko maṃ sīse akkamī”ti kujjhiṃ. “Ahaṃ asallakkhetvā akkamiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1460_2: mā kujjhī”ti vuttepi kujjhiyeva. Te punappunaṃ kathentā “tvameva maññe jālaṃ ukkhipasī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1460_3: aññamaññaṃ vivādaṃ kariṃsu. Tesu vivadantesu bodhisatto cintesi “vivādake sotthibhāvo
atk-s0513a1:1460_4: nāma natthi, idāneva te jālaṃ na ukkhipissanti, tato mahantaṃ vināsaṃ pāpuṇissanti,
atk-s0513a1:1460_5: sākuṇiko okāsaṃ labhissati, mayā imasmiṃ ṭhāne na sakkā vasitu”nti. So attano parisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1460_6: ādāya aññattha gato. Sākuṇikopi kho katipāhaccayena āgantvā vaṭṭakavassitaṃ vassitvā
atk-s0513a1:1460_7: tesaṃ sannipatitānaṃ upari jālaṃ khipi. Atheko vaṭṭako “tuyhaṃ kira jālaṃ ukkhipantasseva
atk-s0513a1:1460_8: matthake lomāni patitāni, idāni ukkhipā”ti āha. Aparo “tuyhaṃ kira jālaṃ ukkhipantasseva
atk-s0513a1:1460_9: dvīsu pakkhesu pattāni patitāni, idāni ukkhipā”ti āha. Iti tesaṃ “tvaṃ ukkhipa, tvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1460_10: ukkhipā”ti vadantānaññeva sākuṇiko jālaṃ ukkhipitvā sabbeva te ekato katvā pacchiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1461_0: Satthā “evaṃ mahārājā ñātakānaṃ kalaho nāma na yutto, kalaho vināsamūlameva hotī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1461_1: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā apaṇḍitavaṭṭako
atk-s0513a1:1461_2: devadatto ahosi, paṇḍitavaṭṭako pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1465_0: Na maṃ sītaṃ na maṃ uṇhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1465_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tadā hi satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1465_3: madhurahattharasā, taṃ jahituṃ na sakkomī”ti. Atha naṃ satthā “bhikkhu esā itthī
atk-s0513a1:1465_4: tava anatthakārikā, pubbepi tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya maraṇaṃ pāpuṇanto maṃ āgamma maraṇā
atk-s0513a1:1466_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa purohito ahosi. Tadā
atk-s0513a1:1466_1: kevaṭṭā nadiyaṃ jālaṃ khipiṃsu. Atheko mahāmaccho rativasena attano macchiyā saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1466_2: kīḷamāno āgacchati. Tassa sā macchī purato gacchamānā jālagandhaṃ ghāyitvā jālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1466_3: pariharamānā gatā. So pana kāmagiddho lolamaccho jālakucchimeva paviṭṭho. Kevaṭṭā
atk-s0513a1:1466_4: tassa jālaṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā jālaṃ ukkhipitvā macchaṃ gahetvā amāretvāva vālikāpiṭṭhe
atk-s0513a1:1466_5: khipitvā “imaṃ aṅgāresu pacitvā khādissāmā”ti aṅgāre karonti, sūlaṃ tacchenti. Maccho
atk-s0513a1:1466_6: “etaṃ aṅgāratāpanaṃ vā sūlavijjhanaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana dukkhaṃ na maṃ kilameti, yaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1466_7: panesā macchī ‘aññaṃ so nūna ratiyā gato’ti mayi domanassaṃ āpajjati, tameva maṃ
atk-s0513a1:1468: “Na maṃ sītaṃ na maṃ uṇhaṃ, na maṃ jālasmi bādhanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1469: Yañca maṃ maññate macchī, aññaṃ so ratiyā gato”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1470_0: Tattha na maṃ sītaṃ na maṃ uṇhanti macchānaṃ udakā nīhaṭakāle sītaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1470_1: vigate uṇhaṃ hoti, tadubhayampi sandhāya “na maṃ sītaṃ na maṃ uṇhaṃ bādhatī”ti paridevati.
atk-s0513a1:1470_2: Yampi aṅgāresu paccanamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ bhavissati, tampi sandhāya “na maṃ uṇha”nti
atk-s0513a1:1470_3: paridevateva. Na maṃ jālasmi bādhananti yampi me jālasmiṃ bādhanaṃ ahosi, tampi maṃ
atk-s0513a1:1470_4: na bādhetīti paridevati. “Yañca ma”ntiādīsu ayaṃ piṇḍattho – sā macchī mama jāle
atk-s0513a1:1470_5: patitassa imehi kevaṭṭehi gahitabhāvaṃ ajānantī maṃ apassamānā “so maccho idāni aññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1470_6: macchiṃ kāmaratiyā gato bhavissatī”ti cinteti, taṃ tassā domanassappattāya cintanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1471_0: Tasmiṃ samaye purohito dāsaparivuto nhānatthāya nadītīraṃ āgato. So pana sabbarutaññū
atk-s0513a1:1471_1: hoti. Tenassa macchaparidevanaṃ sutvā etadahosi “ayaṃ maccho kilesavasena paridevati,
atk-s0513a1:1471_2: evaṃ āturacitto kho panesa mīyamāno nirayeyeva nibbattissati, ahamassa avassayo bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1471_3: kevaṭṭānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “ambho tumhe amhākaṃ ekadivasampi byañjanatthāya macchaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1471_4: na dethā”ti āha. Kevaṭṭā “kiṃ vadetha, sāmi, tumhākaṃ ruccanakamacchaṃ gaṇhitvā gacchathā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1471_5: āhaṃsu. “Amhākaṃ aññena kammaṃ natthi, imaññeva dethā”ti. “Gaṇhatha sāmī”ti. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1471_6: taṃ ubhohi hatthehi gahetvā nadītīre nisīditvā “ambho maccha, sace tāhaṃ ajja na
atk-s0513a1:1471_7: passeyyaṃ, jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇeyyāsi, idāni ito paṭṭhāya mā kilesavasiko ahosī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1471_8: ovaditvā udake vissajjetvā nhatvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1472_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:1472_1: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Satthāpi anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā
atk-s0513a1:1472_2: macchī purāṇadutiyikā ahosi, maccho ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu purohito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1476_0: Santi pakkhā apatanāti idaṃ satthā magadhesu cārikaṃ caramāno dāvagginibbānaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1476_1: kathesi. Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā magadhesu cārikaṃ caramāno aññatarasmiṃ magadhagāmake
atk-s0513a1:1476_2: piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto bhikkhugaṇaparivuto maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a1:1476_3: Tasmiṃ samaye mahāḍāho uṭṭhahi, purato ca pacchato ca bahū bhikkhū dissanti, sopi
atk-s0513a1:1476_4: kho aggi ekadhūmo ekajālo hutvā avattharamāno āgacchateva. Tattheke puthujjanabhikkhū
atk-s0513a1:1476_5: maraṇabhayabhītā “paṭaggiṃ dassāma, tena daḍḍhaṭṭhānaṃ itaro aggi na ottharissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1476_6: araṇisahitaṃ nīharitvā aggiṃ karonti. Apare āhaṃsu “āvuso, tumhe kiṃ nāma karotha,
atk-s0513a1:1476_7: gaganamajjhe ṭhitaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ, pācīnalokadhātuto uggacchantaṃ sahassaraṃsipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1476_8: sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ, velāya tīre ṭhitā samuddaṃ, sineruṃ nissāya ṭhitā sineruṃ apassantā
atk-s0513a1:1476_9: viya sadevake loke aggapuggalaṃ attanā saddhiṃ gacchantameva sammāsambuddhaṃ anoloketvā
atk-s0513a1:1476_10: ‘paṭaggiṃ demā’ti vadatha, buddhabalaṃ nāma na jānātha, etha satthu santikaṃ gamissāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1476_11: Te purato ca pacchato ca gacchantā sabbepi ekato hutvā dasabalassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1476_12: Satthā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro aññatarasmiṃ padese aṭṭhāsi. Dāvaggi abhibhavanto
atk-s0513a1:1476_13: viya viravanto āgacchati. Āgantvā tathāgatassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ patvā tassa padesassa
atk-s0513a1:1476_14: samantā soḷasakarīsamattaṭṭhānaṃ patto udake opilāpitatiṇukkā viya nibbāyi, vinibbedhato
atk-s0513a1:1477_0: Bhikkhū satthu guṇakathaṃ ārabhiṃsu – “aho buddhānaṃ guṇā nāma, ayañhi nāma acetano
atk-s0513a1:1477_1: aggi buddhānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ avattharituṃ na sakkoti, udake tiṇukkā viya nibbāyati,
atk-s0513a1:1477_2: aho buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo nāmā”ti. Satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “na, bhikkhave, etaṃ etarahi
atk-s0513a1:1477_3: mayhaṃ balaṃ, yaṃ imaṃ bhūmippadesaṃ patvā esa aggi nibbāyati. Idaṃ pana mayhaṃ porāṇakasaccabalaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1477_4: Imasmiñhi padese sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ aggi na jalissati, kappaṭṭhiyapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1477_5: nāmeta”nti āha. Athāyasmā ānando satthu nisīdanatthāya catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññapesi,
atk-s0513a1:1477_6: nisīdi satthā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā. Bhikkhusaṅghopi tathāgataṃ vanditvā parivāretvā
atk-s0513a1:1477_7: nisīdi. Atha satthā “idaṃ tāva, bhante, amhākaṃ pākaṭaṃ, atītaṃ paṭicchannaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1477_8: no pākaṭaṃ karothā”ti bhikkhūhi āyācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1478_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe tasmiṃyeva padese bodhisatto vaṭṭakayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1478_1: mātukucchito jāto aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā nikkhantakāle mahāgeṇḍukappamāṇo vaṭṭakapotako
atk-s0513a1:1478_2: ahosi. Atha naṃ mātāpitaro kulāvake nipajjāpetvā mukhatuṇḍakena gocaraṃ āharitvā
atk-s0513a1:1478_3: posenti. Tassa pakkhe pasāretvā ākāse gamanabalaṃ vā pāde ukkhipitvā thale gamanabalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1478_4: vā natthi. Tañca padesaṃ saṃvacchare saṃvacchare dāvaggi gaṇhāti, so tasmimpi samaye
atk-s0513a1:1478_5: mahāravaṃ ravanto taṃ padesaṃ gaṇhi, sakuṇasaṅghā attano attano kulāvakehi nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a1:1478_6: maraṇabhayabhītā viravantā palāyanti, bodhisattassapi mātāpitaro maraṇabhayabhītā
atk-s0513a1:1478_7: bodhisattaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu. Bodhisatto kulāvake nipannakova gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1478_8: avattharitvā āgacchantaṃ aggiṃ disvā cintesi “sace mayhaṃ pakkhe pasāretvā ākāsena
atk-s0513a1:1478_9: gamanabalaṃ bhaveyya, uppatitvā aññattha gaccheyyaṃ. Sace pāde ukkhipitvā gamanabalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1478_10: bhaveyya, padavārena aññattha gaccheyyaṃ. Mātāpitaropi kho me maraṇabhayabhītā maṃ
atk-s0513a1:1478_11: ekakaṃ pahāya attānaṃ parittāyantā palātā. Idāni me aññaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ natthi, atāṇomhi
atk-s0513a1:1478_12: asaraṇo, kiṃ nu kho ajja mayā kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1479_0: Athassa etadahosi “imasmiṃ loke sīlaguṇo nāma atthi, saccaguṇo nāma atthi, atīte
atk-s0513a1:1479_3: nāma atthi, tehi ca paṭividdhā dhammaguṇā nāma atthi, mayi cāpi ekaṃ saccaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1479_4: saṃvijjamāno eko sabhāvadhammo paññāyati, tasmā atīte buddhe ceva tehi paṭividdhaguṇe
atk-s0513a1:1479_5: ca āvajjetvā mayi vijjamānaṃ saccasabhāvadhammaṃ gahetvā saccakiriyaṃ katvā aggiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1479_6: paṭikkamāpetvā ajja mayā attano ceva sesasakuṇānañca sotthibhāvaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:1484: Atha bodhisatto atīte parinibbutānaṃ buddhānaṃ guṇe āvajjetvā attani vijjamānaṃ saccasabhāvaṃ ārabbha saccakiriyaṃ karonto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1488_0: Tattha santi pakkhā apatanāti mayhaṃ pakkhā nāma atthi upalabbhanti, no ca kho sakkā
atk-s0513a1:1488_1: etehi uppatituṃ ākāsena gantunti apatanā. Santi pādā avañcanāti pādāpi me atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1488_2: tehi pana vañcituṃ padavāragamanena gantuṃ na sakkāti avañcanā. Mātāpitā ca nikkhantāti
atk-s0513a1:1488_3: ye ca maṃ aññattha neyyuṃ, tepi maraṇabhayena mātāpitaro nikkhantā. Jātavedāti aggiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1488_4: ālapati. So hi jātova vedayati paññāyati, tasmā “jātavedo”ti vuccati. Paṭikkamāti
atk-s0513a1:1489_0: Iti mahāsatto “sace mayhaṃ pakkhānaṃ atthibhāvo, te ca pasāretvā ākāse apatanabhāvo,
atk-s0513a1:1489_1: pādānaṃ atthibhāvo, te ca ukkhipitvā avañcanabhāvo, mātāpitūnaṃ maṃ kulāvakeyeva
atk-s0513a1:1489_2: chaḍḍetvā palātabhāvo ca sacco sabhāvabhūtoyeva, jātaveda, etena saccena tvaṃ ito
atk-s0513a1:1489_3: paṭikkamā”ti kulāvake nipannakova saccakiriyaṃ akāsi. Tassa saha saccakiriyāya soḷasakarīsamatte
atk-s0513a1:1489_4: ṭhāne jātavedo paṭikkami. Paṭikkamanto ca na jhāyamānova aññaṃ gato, udake pana opilāpitā
atk-s0513a1:1489_5: ukkā viya tattheva nibbāyi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:1491: Vajjesi soḷasa karīsāni, udakaṃ patvā yathā sikhī”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:1492: Taṃ pana ṭhānaṃ sakalepi imasmiṃ kappe agginā anabhibhavanīyattā kappaṭṭhiyapāṭihāriyaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Evaṃ bodhisatto saccakiriyaṃ katvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1493_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, imassa vanassa agginā anajjhottharaṇaṃ etarahi mayhaṃ balaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1493_1: porāṇaṃ panetaṃ vaṭṭapotakakāle mayhameva saccabala”nti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0513a1:1493_2: saccāni pakāsesi. Saccapariyosāne keci sotāpannā ahesuṃ, keci sakadāgāmino, keci
atk-s0513a1:1493_3: anāgāmino, keci arahattaṃ pattāti. Satthāpi anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a1:1493_4: – “tadā mātāpitaro etarahi mātāpitarova ahesuṃ, vaṭṭakarājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1497_0: Yaṃ nissitāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto daḍḍhapaṇṇasālaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1497_1: Eko kira bhikkhu satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā jetavanato nikkhamma kosalesu
atk-s0513a1:1497_2: ekaṃ paccantagāmaṃ nissāya ekasmiṃ araññasenāsane vasati. Athassa paṭhamamāseyeva
atk-s0513a1:1497_3: paṇṇasālā ḍayhittha. So “paṇṇasālā me daḍḍhā, dukkhaṃ vasāmī”ti manussānaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a1:1497_4: Manussā “idāni no khettaṃ parisukkhaṃ, kedāre pāyetvā karissāma”, tasmiṃ pāyite “bījaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1497_5: vapitvā”, bīje vutte “vatiṃ katvā”, vatiyā katāya “niddāyitvā, lāyitvā, madditvā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1497_6: evaṃ taṃ taṃ kammaṃ apadisantāyeva temāsaṃ vītināmesuṃ. So bhikkhu temāsaṃ ajjhokāse
atk-s0513a1:1497_7: dukkhaṃ vasanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi. Pavāretvā pana
atk-s0513a1:1497_8: satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1497_9: katvā “kiṃ bhikkhu sukhena vassaṃvutthosi, kammaṭṭhānaṃ te matthakaṃ patta”nti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1497_10: So taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā “senāsanasappāyassa me abhāvena kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1497_11: na patta”nti āha. Satthā “pubbe bhikkhu tiracchānagatāpi attano sappāyāsappāyaṃ jāniṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1497_12: tvaṃ kasmā na aññāsī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1498_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sakuṇayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:1498_1: sakuṇasaṅghaparivuto araññāyatane sākhāviṭapasampannaṃ mahārukkhaṃ nissāya vasati.
atk-s0513a1:1498_2: Athekadivasaṃ tassa rukkhassa sākhāsu aññamaññaṃ ghaṃsantīsu cuṇṇaṃ patati, dhūmo
atk-s0513a1:1498_3: uṭṭhāti. Taṃ disvā bodhisatto cintesi “imā dve sākhā evaṃ ghaṃsamānā aggiṃ vissajjessanti,
atk-s0513a1:1498_4: so patitvā purāṇapaṇṇāni gaṇhissati, tato paṭṭhāya imampi rukkhaṃ jhāpessati, na
atk-s0513a1:1498_5: sakkā idha amhehi vasituṃ, ito palāyitvā aññattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So sakuṇasaṅghassa imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1500: “Yaṃ nissitā jagatiruhaṃ vihaṅgamā, svāyaṃ aggiṃ pamuñcati;
atk-s0513a1:1501: Disā bhajatha vakkaṅgā, jātaṃ saraṇato bhaya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1502_0: Tattha jagatiruhanti jagati vuccati pathavī, tattha jātattā rukkho “jagatiruho”ti
atk-s0513a1:1502_1: vuccati. Vihaṅgamāti vihaṃ vuccati ākāsaṃ, tattha gamanato pakkhī “vihaṅgamā”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0513a1:1502_2: Disā bhajathāti imaṃ rukkhaṃ muñcitvā ito palāyantā catasso disā bhajatha. Vakkaṅgāti
atk-s0513a1:1502_3: sakuṇe ālapati. Te hi uttamaṅgaṃ galaṃ kadāci kadāci vaṅkaṃ karonti, tasmā “vakkaṅgā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1502_4: vuccanti. Vaṅkā vā tesaṃ ubhosu passesu pakkhā jātāti vakkaṅgā. Jātaṃ saraṇato bhayanti
atk-s0513a1:1502_5: amhākaṃ avassayarukkhatoyeva bhayaṃ nibbattaṃ, etha aññattha gacchāmāti.
atk-s0513a1:1503_0: Bodhisattassa vacanakarā paṇḍitasakuṇā tena saddhiṃ ekappahāreneva uppatitvā aññattha
atk-s0513a1:1503_1: gatā. Ye pana apaṇḍitā, te “evameva esa bindumatte udake kumbhīle passatī”ti tassa
atk-s0513a1:1503_2: vacanaṃ aggahetvā tattheva vasiṃsu. Tato na cirasseva bodhisattena cintitākāreneva
atk-s0513a1:1503_3: aggi nibbattitvā taṃ rukkhaṃ aggahesi. Dhūmesu ca jālāsu ca uṭṭhitāsu dhūmandhā sakuṇā
atk-s0513a1:1503_4: aññattha gantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu, aggimhi patitvā patitvā vināsaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1504_0: Satthā “evaṃ bhikkhu pubbe tiracchānagatāpi rukkhagge vasantā attano sappāyāsappāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1504_1: jānanti, tvaṃ kasmā na aññāsī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi. Saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a1:1504_2: so bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito. Satthāpi anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a1:1504_3: – “tadā bodhisattassa vacanakarā sakuṇā buddhaparisā ahesuṃ, paṇḍitasakuṇo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1508_0: Ye vuḍḍhamapacāyantīti idaṃ satthā sāvatthiṃ gacchanto sāriputtattherassa senāsanapaṭibāhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1508_1: ārabbha kathesi. Anāthapiṇḍikena hi vihāraṃ kāretvā dūte pesite satthā rājagahā nikkhamma
atk-s0513a1:1508_2: vesāliṃ patvā tattha yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā “sāvatthiṃ gamissāmī”ti maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a1:1508_3: Tena ca samayena chabbaggiyānaṃ antevāsikā purato purato gantvā therānaṃ senāsanesu
atk-s0513a1:1508_4: aggahitesveva “idaṃ senāsanaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyassa, idaṃ ācariyassa, idaṃ amhākameva
atk-s0513a1:1508_5: bhavissatī”ti senāsanāni palibundhenti. Pacchā āgatā therā senāsanāni na labhanti.
atk-s0513a1:1508_6: Sāriputtattherassāpi antevāsikā therassa senāsanaṃ pariyesantā na labhiṃsu. Thero
atk-s0513a1:1508_7: senāsanaṃ alabhanto satthu senāsanassa avidūre ekasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisajjāya ca caṅkamena
atk-s0513a1:1508_8: ca rattiṃ vītināmesi. Satthā paccūsasamaye nikkhamitvā ukkāsi, theropi ukkāsi. “Ko
atk-s0513a1:1508_9: eso”ti? “Ahaṃ, bhante, sāriputto”ti. “Sāriputta, imāya velāya idha kiṃ karosī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1508_10: “So taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi”. Satthā therassa vacanaṃ sutvā “idāni tāva mayi jīvanteyeva
atk-s0513a1:1508_11: bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ agāravā apatissā viharanti, parinibbute kiṃ nu kho karissantī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1509_0: So pabhātāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū pucchi “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:1509_1: chabbaggiyā bhikkhū purato purato gantvā therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanaṃ paṭibāhantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1509_2: “Saccaṃ, bhagavā”ti? Tato chabbaggiye garahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi
atk-s0513a1:1509_3: “ko nu kho, bhikkhave, aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍaṃ arahatī”ti? Ekacce “khattiyakulā
atk-s0513a1:1509_4: pabbajito”ti āhaṃsu, ekacce “brāhmaṇakulā, gahapatikulā pabbajito”ti, apare “vinayadharo,
atk-s0513a1:1509_5: dhammakathiko, paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī, dutiyassa, tatiyassa, catutthassa jhānassa
atk-s0513a1:1509_6: lābhī”ti. Apare “sotāpanno, sakadāgāmī, anāgāmī, arahā, tevijjo, chaḷabhiñño”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1509_7: Evaṃ tehi bhikkhūhi attano attano rucivasena aggāsanādirahānaṃ kathitakāle satthā
atk-s0513a1:1509_8: āha – “na, bhikkhave, mayhaṃ sāsane aggāsanādīni patvā khattiyakulā pabbajito pamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1509_9: na brāhmaṇakulā pabbajito, na gahapatikulā pabbajito, na vinayadharo, na suttantiko,
atk-s0513a1:1509_10: na ābhidhammiko, na paṭhamajjhānādilābhino, na sotāpannādayo pamāṇaṃ, atha kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:1509_11: imasmiṃ sāsane yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1509_12: aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍo laddhabbo. Idamettha pamāṇaṃ. Tasmā vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:1509_13: etesaṃ anucchaviko. Idāni kho pana, bhikkhave, sāriputto mayhaṃ aggasāvako anudhammacakkappavattako
atk-s0513a1:1509_14: mamānantaraṃ senāsanaṃ laddhuṃ arahati, so imaṃ rattiṃ senāsanaṃ alabhanto rukkhamūle
atk-s0513a1:1509_15: vītināmesi, tumhe idāneva evaṃ agāravā apatissā, gacchante gacchante kāle kinti katvā
atk-s0513a1:1509_16: viharissathā”ti. Atha nesaṃ ovādadānatthāya “pubbe, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatāpi ‘na
atk-s0513a1:1509_17: kho panetaṃ amhākaṃ patirūpaṃ, yaṃ mayaṃ aññamaññaṃ agāravā apatissā asabhāgavuttino
atk-s0513a1:1509_18: vihareyyāma, amhesu mahallakataraṃ jānitvā tassa abhivādanādīni karissāmā’ti sādhukaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1509_19: vīmaṃsitvā ‘ayaṃ no mahallako’ti ñatvā tassa abhivādanādīni katvā devapathaṃ pūrayamānā
atk-s0513a1:1510_0: Atīte himavantappadese ekaṃ mahānigrodhaṃ upanissāya tayo sahāyā vihariṃsu – tittiro,
atk-s0513a1:1510_1: makkaṭo, hatthīti. Te aññamaññaṃ agāravā apatissā asabhāgavuttino ahesuṃ. Atha nesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1510_2: etadahosi “na yuttaṃ amhākaṃ evaṃ viharituṃ, yaṃnūna mayaṃ yo no mahallakataro, tassa
atk-s0513a1:1510_3: abhivādanādīni karontā vihareyyāmā”ti. “Ko pana no mahallakataro”ti cintentā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1510_4: “attheso upāyo”ti tayopi janā nigrodhamūle nisīditvā tittiro ca makkaṭo ca hatthiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1510_5: pucchiṃsu “samma hatthi, tvaṃ imaṃ nigrodharukkhaṃ kīvappamāṇakālato paṭṭhāya jānāsī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1510_6: So āha “sammā, ahaṃ taruṇapotakakāle imaṃ nigrodhagacchaṃ antarasatthīsu katvā gacchāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1510_7: avattharitvā ṭhitakāle ca pana me etassa aggasākhā nābhiṃ ghaṭṭeti, evāhaṃ imaṃ gacchakālato
atk-s0513a1:1510_8: paṭṭhāya jānāmī”ti puna ubhopi janā purimanayeneva makkaṭaṃ pucchiṃsu. So āha “ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1510_9: sammā makkaṭacchāpako samāno bhūmiyaṃ nisīditvā gīvaṃ anukkhipitvāva imassa nigrodhapotakassa
atk-s0513a1:1510_10: aggaṅkure khādāmi, evāhaṃ imaṃ khuddakakālato paṭṭhāya jānāmī”ti. Atha itare ubhopi
atk-s0513a1:1510_11: purimanayeneva tittiraṃ pucchiṃsu. So āha “sammā, pubbe asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne mahānigrodharukkho
atk-s0513a1:1510_12: ahosi, ahaṃ tassa phalāni khāditvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne vaccaṃ pātesiṃ, tato esa rukkho
atk-s0513a1:1510_13: jāto, evāhaṃ imaṃ ajātakālato paṭṭhāya jānāmi, tasmā ahaṃ tumhehi jātiyā mahallakataro”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1511_0: Evaṃ vutte makkaṭo ca hatthī ca tittirapaṇḍitaṃ āhaṃsu “samma, tvaṃ amhehi mahallakataro,
atk-s0513a1:1511_1: ito paṭṭhāya mayaṃ tava sakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāni ceva abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānaañjalikammasāmīcikammāni
atk-s0513a1:1511_2: ca karissāma, ovāde ca te ṭhassāma, tvaṃ pana ito paṭṭhāya amhākaṃ ovādānusāsaniṃ
atk-s0513a1:1511_3: dadeyyāsī”ti. Tato paṭṭhāya tittiro tesaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi, sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi, sayampi
atk-s0513a1:1511_4: sīlāni samādiyi. Te tayopi janā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāya aññamaññaṃ sagāravā sappatissā
atk-s0513a1:1511_5: sabhāgavuttino hutvā jīvitapariyosāne devalokaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samādānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1512_0: Te hi nāma, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatā aññamaññaṃ sagāravā sappatissā vihariṃsu, tumhe
atk-s0513a1:1512_1: evaṃ svākhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitvā kasmā aññamaññaṃ agāravā apatissā viharatha.
atk-s0513a1:1512_2: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ito paṭṭhāya tumhākaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1512_3: añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ, yathāvuḍḍhaṃ aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍaṃ, na ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:1512_4: ca navakatarena vuḍḍhataro senāsanena paṭibāhitabbo, yo paṭibāheyya, āpattidukkaṭassāti
atk-s0513a1:1512_5: evaṃ satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1515: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1516_0: Tattha ye vuḍḍhamapacāyantīti jātivuḍḍho, vayovuḍḍho, guṇavuḍḍhoti tayo vuḍḍhā. Tesu
atk-s0513a1:1516_1: jātisampanno jātivuḍḍho nāma, vaye ṭhito vayovuḍḍho nāma, guṇasampanno guṇavuḍḍho
atk-s0513a1:1516_2: nāma. Tesu guṇasampanno vayovuḍḍho imasmiṃ ṭhāne “vuḍḍho”ti adhippeto. Apacāyantīti
atk-s0513a1:1516_3: jeṭṭhāpacāyikakammena pūjenti. Dhammassa kovidāti jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammassa kovidā
atk-s0513a1:1516_4: kusalā. Diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. Pāsaṃsāti pasaṃsārahā. Samparāye
atk-s0513a1:1516_5: ca suggatīti samparetabbe imaṃ lokaṃ hitvā gantabbe paralokepi tesaṃ sugatiyeva hotīti.
atk-s0513a1:1516_6: Ayaṃ panettha piṇḍattho – bhikkhave, khattiyā vā hontu brāhmaṇā vā vessā vā suddā
atk-s0513a1:1516_7: vā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā tiracchānagatā vā, ye keci sattā jeṭṭhāpacitikamme chekā
atk-s0513a1:1516_8: kusalā guṇasampannānaṃ vayovuḍḍhānaṃ apacitiṃ karonti, te imasmiñca attabhāve jeṭṭhāpacitikārakāti
atk-s0513a1:1516_9: pasaṃsaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ thomanaṃ labhanti, kāyassa ca bhedā sagge nibbattantīti.
atk-s0513a1:1517_0: Evaṃ satthā jeṭṭhāpacitikammassa guṇaṃ kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a1:1517_1: – “tadā hatthināgo moggallāno ahosi, makkaṭo sāriputto, tittirapaṇḍito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1521_0: Nāccantaṃ nikatippaññoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cīvaravaḍḍhakaṃ bhikkhu ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1521_1: kathesi. Eko kira jetavanavāsiko bhikkhu yaṃkiñci cīvare kattabbaṃ chedanaghaṭṭanavicāraṇasibbanādikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1521_2: kammaṃ, tattha sukusalo. So tāya kusalatāya cīvaraṃ vaḍḍheti, tasmā “cīvaravaḍḍhako”
atk-s0513a1:1521_3: tveva paññāyittha. Kiṃ panesa karotīti? Jiṇṇapilotikāsu hatthakammaṃ dassetvā suphassikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1521_4: manāpaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā rajanapariyosāne piṭṭhodakena rajitvā saṅkhena ghaṃsitvā ujjalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1521_5: manuññaṃ katvā nikkhipati. Cīvarakammaṃ kātuṃ ajānantā bhikkhū ahate sāṭake gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1521_6: tassa santikaṃ āgantvā “mayaṃ cīvaraṃ kātuṃ na jānāma, cīvaraṃ no katvā dethā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1521_7: vadanti. So “cīvaraṃ āvuso kariyamānaṃ cirena niṭṭhāti, mayā katacīvarameva atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1521_8: ime sāṭake ṭhapetvā taṃ gaṇhitvā gacchathā”ti nīharitvā dasseti. Te tassa vaṇṇasampattimeva
atk-s0513a1:1521_9: disvā antaraṃ ajānantā “thira”nti saññāya ahatasāṭake cīvaravaḍḍhakassa datvā taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1521_10: gaṇhitvā gacchanti. Taṃ tehi thokaṃ kiliṭṭhakāle uṇhodakena dhoviyamānaṃ attano pakatiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1521_11: dasseti, tattha tattha jiṇṇaṭṭhānaṃ paññāyati, te vippaṭisārino honti. Evaṃ āgatāgate
atk-s0513a1:1521_12: pilotikāhi vañcento so bhikkhu sabbattha pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1522_0: Yathā cesa jetavane, tathā aññatarasmiṃ gāmakepi eko cīvaravaḍḍhako lokaṃ vañceti.
atk-s0513a1:1522_1: Tassa sambhattā bhikkhū “bhante, jetavane kira eko cīvaravaḍḍhako evaṃ lokaṃ vañcetī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1522_2: ārocesuṃ. Athassa etadahosi “handāhaṃ, taṃ nagaravāsikaṃ vañcemī”ti pilotikacīvaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1522_3: atimanāpaṃ katvā surattaṃ rajitvā taṃ pārupitvā jetavanaṃ agamāsi. Itaro taṃ disvāva
atk-s0513a1:1522_4: lobhaṃ uppādetvā “bhante, imaṃ cīvaraṃ tumhehi kata”nti pucchi. “Āmāvuso”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1522_5: imaṃ cīvaraṃ mayhaṃ detha, tumhe aññaṃ labhissathā”ti? “Āvuso, mayaṃ gāmavāsikā dullabhapaccayā,
atk-s0513a1:1522_6: imāhaṃ tuyhaṃ datvā attanā kiṃ pārupissāmī”ti? “Bhante, mama santike ahatasāṭakā
atk-s0513a1:1522_7: atthi, te gahetvā tumhākaṃ cīvaraṃ karothā”ti. “Āvuso, mayā ettha hatthakammaṃ dassitaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1522_8: tayi pana evaṃ vadante kiṃ sakkā kātuṃ, gaṇhāhi na”nti tassa pilotikacīvaraṃ datvā
atk-s0513a1:1522_9: ahatasāṭake ādāya taṃ vañcetvā pakkāmi. Jetavanavāsikopi taṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā katipāhaccayena
atk-s0513a1:1522_10: uṇhodakena dhovanto jiṇṇapilotikabhāvaṃ disvā lajjito “gāmavāsicīvaravaḍḍhakena kira
atk-s0513a1:1522_11: jetavanavāsiko vañcito”ti tassa vañcitabhāvo saṅghamajjhe pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1523_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ taṃ kathaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:1523_1: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchi. Te tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1523_2: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, jetavanavāsī cīvaravaḍḍhako idāneva aññe vañceti, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:1523_3: vañcesiyeva. Na gāmavāsikenāpi idāneva esa jetavanavāsī cīvaravaḍḍhako vañcito, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:1524_0: Atīte ekasmiṃ araññāyatane bodhisatto aññataraṃ padumasaraṃ nissāya ṭhite varaṇarukkhe
atk-s0513a1:1524_1: rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti. Tadā aññatarasmiṃ nātimahante sare nidāghasamaye udakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1524_2: mandaṃ ahosi, bahū cettha macchā honti. Atheko bako te macche disvā “ekena upāyena
atk-s0513a1:1524_3: ime macche vañcetvā khādissāmī”ti gantvā udakapariyante cintento nisīdi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0513a1:1524_4: macchā disvā “kiṃ, ayya, cintento nisinnosī”ti pucchiṃsu. “Tumhākaṃ cintento nisinnomhī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1524_5: “Kiṃ amhākaṃ cintesi, ayyā”ti? “‘Imasmiṃ sare udakaṃ parittaṃ, gocaro mando, nidāgho
atk-s0513a1:1524_6: ca mahanto, idānime macchā kiṃ nāma karissantī’ti tumhākaṃ cintento nisinnomhī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1524_7: “Atha kiṃ karoma, ayyā”ti? “Tumhe sace mayhaṃ vacanaṃ kareyyātha, ahaṃ vo ekekaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1524_8: mukhatuṇḍakena gahetvā ekaṃ pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ mahāsaraṃ netvā vissajjeyya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1524_9: “Ayya, paṭhamakappikato paṭṭhāya macchānaṃ cintanakabako nāma natthi, tvaṃ amhesu
atk-s0513a1:1524_10: ekekaṃ khāditukāmosī”ti. “Nāhaṃ tumhe mayhaṃ saddahante khādissāmi”. “Sace pana sarassa
atk-s0513a1:1524_11: atthibhāvaṃ mayhaṃ na saddahatha, ekaṃ macchaṃ mayā saddhiṃ saraṃ passituṃ pesethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1524_12: Macchā tassa saddahitvā “ayaṃ jalepi thalepi samattho”ti ekaṃ kāḷamahāmacchaṃ adaṃsu
atk-s0513a1:1524_13: “imaṃ gahetvā gacchathā”ti. So taṃ gahetvā netvā sare vissajjetvā sabbaṃ saraṃ dassetvā
atk-s0513a1:1524_14: puna ānetvā tesaṃ macchānaṃ santike vissajjesi. So tesaṃ macchānaṃ sarassa sampattiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1524_15: vaṇṇesi. Te tassa kathaṃ sutvā gantukāmā hutvā “sādhu, ayya, amhe gaṇhitvā gacchāhī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1525_0: Bako paṭhamaṃ taṃ kāḷamahāmacchameva gahetvā saratīraṃ netvā saraṃ dassetvā saratīre
atk-s0513a1:1525_1: jāte varaṇarukkhe nilīyitvā taṃ viṭapantare pakkhipitvā tuṇḍena vijjhanto jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1525_2: pāpetvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā kaṇṭake rukkhamūle pātetvā puna gantvā “vissaṭṭho, me so
atk-s0513a1:1525_3: maccho, añño āgacchatū”ti etenupāyena ekekaṃ gahetvā sabbe macche khāditvā puna āgato
atk-s0513a1:1525_4: ekaṃ macchampi nāddasa. Eko panettha kakkaṭako avasiṭṭho. Bako tampi khāditukāmo
atk-s0513a1:1525_5: hutvā “bho, kakkaṭaka, mayā sabbete macchā netvā padumasañchanne mahāsare vissajjitā,
atk-s0513a1:1525_6: ehi tampi nessāmī”ti. “Maṃ gahetvā gacchanto kathaṃ gaṇhissasī”ti? “Ḍaṃsitvā gaṇhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1525_7: “Tvaṃ evaṃ gahetvā gacchanto maṃ pātessasi, nāhaṃ tayā saddhiṃ gamissāmī”ti. “Mā
atk-s0513a1:1525_8: bhāyi, ahaṃ taṃ suggahitaṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti. Kakkaṭako cintesi “imassa macche
atk-s0513a1:1525_9: netvā sare vissajjanaṃ nāma natthi. Sace pana maṃ sare vissajjessati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1525_10: No ce vissajjessati, gīvamassa chinditvā jīvitaṃ harissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1526_0: Atha naṃ evamāha “samma baka, na kho tvaṃ suggahitaṃ gahetuṃ sakkhissasi, amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1526_1: pana gahaṇaṃ suggahaṇaṃ, sacāhaṃ aḷehi tava gīvaṃ gahetuṃ labhissāmi, tava gīvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1526_2: suggahitaṃ katvā tayā saddhiṃ gamissāmī”ti. So taṃ “vañcetukāmo esa ma”nti ajānanto
atk-s0513a1:1526_3: “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi. Kakkaṭako attano aḷehi kammārasaṇḍāsena viya tassa gīvaṃ suggahitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1526_4: katvā “idāni gacchā”ti āha. So taṃ netvā saraṃ dassetvā varaṇarukkhābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1526_5: Kakkaṭako āha “mātula, ayaṃ saro etto, tvaṃ pana ito kiṃ nesī”ti? Bako “na te mātulo
atk-s0513a1:1526_6: ahaṃ, na bhaginiputtosi vata me tva”nti vatvā “tvaṃ ‘esa maṃ ukkhipitvā vicaranto
atk-s0513a1:1526_7: mayhaṃ dāso’ti saññaṃ karosi maññe, passetaṃ varaṇarukkhassa mūle kaṇṭakarāsiṃ, yathā
atk-s0513a1:1526_8: me te sabbe macchā khāditā, tampi tatheva khādissāmī”ti āha. Kakkaṭako “ete macchā
atk-s0513a1:1526_9: attano bālatāya tayā khāditā, ahaṃ pana te maṃ khādituṃ na dassāmi, taññeva pana
atk-s0513a1:1526_10: vināsaṃ pāpessāmi. Tvañhi bālatāya mayā vañcitabhāvaṃ na jānāsi, marantā ubhopi marissāma,
atk-s0513a1:1526_11: ahaṃ te sīsaṃ chinditvā bhūmiyaṃ khipissāmī”ti vatvā kammārasaṇḍāsena viya aḷehi
atk-s0513a1:1526_12: tassa gīvaṃ nippīḷesi. So vivaṭena mukhena akkhīhi assunā paggharantena maraṇabhayatajjito
atk-s0513a1:1526_13: “sāmi, ahaṃ taṃ na khādissāmi, jīvitaṃ me dehī”ti āha. “Yadi evaṃ otaritvā maṃ sarasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1526_14: vissajjehī”ti. So nivattitvā sarameva otaritvā kakkaṭakaṃ sarapariyante paṅkapiṭṭhe
atk-s0513a1:1526_15: ṭhapesi, kakkaṭako kattarikāya kumudanāḷaṃ kappento viya tassa gīvaṃ kappetvā udakaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1527: Taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā varaṇarukkhe adhivatthā devatā sādhukāraṃ dadamānā vanaṃ unnādayamānā madhurassarena imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1531_0: Tattha nāccantaṃ nikatippañño, nikatyā sukhamedhatīti nikati vuccati vañcanā, nikatippañño
atk-s0513a1:1531_1: vañcanapañño puggalo tāya nikatyā nikatiyā vañcanāya na accantaṃ sukhamedhati, niccakāle
atk-s0513a1:1531_2: sukhasmiṃyeva patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti, ekaṃsena pana vināsaṃ pāpuṇātiyevāti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1531_3: Ārādhetīti paṭilabhati. Nikatippaññoti kerāṭikabhāvaṃ sikkhitapañño pāpapuggalo attanā
atk-s0513a1:1531_4: katassa pāpassa phalaṃ ārādheti paṭilabhati vindatīti attho. Kathaṃ? Bako kakkaṭakāmiva,
atk-s0513a1:1531_5: yathā bako kakkaṭakā gīvacchedaṃ pāpuṇāti, evaṃ pāpapuggalo attanā katapāpato diṭṭhadhamme
atk-s0513a1:1531_6: vā samparāye vā bhayaṃ ārādheti paṭilabhatīti imamatthaṃ pakāsento mahāsatto vanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1532_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva gāmavāsicīvaravaḍḍhakenesa vañcito, atītepi vañcitoyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1532_1: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā so bako
atk-s0513a1:1532_2: jetavanavāsī cīvaravaḍḍhako ahosi, kakkaṭako gāmavāsī cīvaravaḍḍhako, rukkhadevatā
atk-s0513a1:1536_0: Maññe sovaṇṇayo rāsīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattherassa saddhivihārikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1536_1: ārabbha kathesi. So kira bhikkhu subbaco ahosi vacanakkhamo, therassa mahantenussāhena
atk-s0513a1:1536_2: upakāraṃ karoti. Athekaṃ samayaṃ thero satthāraṃ āpucchitvā cārikaṃ caranto dakkhiṇāgirijanapadaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1536_3: agamāsi. So bhikkhu tattha gatakāle mānatthaddho hutvā therassa vacanaṃ na karoti
atk-s0513a1:1536_4: “āvuso, idaṃ nāma karohī”ti vutte pana therassa paṭipakkho hoti. Thero tassa āsayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1536_5: na jānāti. So tattha cārikaṃ caritvā puna jetavanaṃ āgato. So bhikkhu therassa jetavanavihāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1536_6: āgatakālato paṭṭhāya puna tādisova jāto. Thero tathāgatassa ārocesi “bhante, mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1536_7: eko saddhivihāriko ekasmiṃ ṭhāne satena kītadāso viya hoti, ekasmiṃ ṭhāne mānatthaddho
atk-s0513a1:1536_8: hutvā ‘idaṃ nāma karohī’ti vutte paṭipakkho hotī”ti. Satthā “nāyaṃ, sāriputta, bhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:1536_9: idāneva evaṃsīlo, pubbepesa ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ gato satena kītadāso viya hoti. Ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1536_10: gato paṭipakkho paṭisattu hotī”ti vatvā therena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1537_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ kuṭumbiyakule paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1537_1: gaṇhi. Tasseko sahāyako kuṭumbiko sayaṃ mahallako, bhariyā panassa taruṇī. Sā taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1537_2: nissāya puttaṃ paṭilabhi. So cintesi “ayaṃ itthī taruṇattā mamaccayena kañcideva
atk-s0513a1:1537_3: purisaṃ gahetvā imaṃ dhanaṃ vināseyya, puttassa me na dadeyya, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1537_4: pathavigataṃ kareyya”nti ghare nandaṃ nāma dāsaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:1537_5: taṃ dhanaṃ nidahitvā tassa ācikkhitvā “tāta, nanda, imaṃ dhanaṃ mamaccayena mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1537_6: puttassa ācikkheyyāsi, mā ca naṃ pariccajasī”ti ovaditvā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1538_0: Puttopissa anukkamena vayappatto jāto. Atha naṃ mātā āha – “tāta, tava pitā nandaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1538_1: dāsaṃ gahetvā dhanaṃ nidhesi, taṃ āharāpetvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapehī”ti. So ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1538_2: nandaṃ āha – “mātula, atthi kiñci mayhaṃ pitarā dhanaṃ nidahita”nti. “Āma, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1538_3: “Kuhiṃ taṃ nidahita”nti. “Araññe, sāmī”ti. “Tena hi gacchāmā”ti kuddālapiṭakaṃ ādāya
atk-s0513a1:1538_4: nidhiṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ mātula, dhana”nti āha. Nando āruyha dhanamatthake ṭhatvā
atk-s0513a1:1538_5: dhanaṃ nissāya mānaṃ uppādetvā “are dāsiputta ceṭaka, kuto te imasmiṃ ṭhāne dhana”nti
atk-s0513a1:1538_6: kumāraṃ akkosati. Kumāro tassa pharusavacanaṃ sutvā asuṇanto viya “tena hi gacchāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1538_7: taṃ gahetvā paṭinivattitvā puna dve tayo divase atikkamitvā agamāsi, nando tatheva
atk-s0513a1:1538_8: akkosati. Kumāro tena saddhiṃ pharusavacanaṃ avatvāva nivattitvā “ayaṃ dāso ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:1538_9: ‘dhanaṃ ācikkhissāmī’ti gacchati, gantvā pana maṃ akkosati, tattha kāraṇaṃ na jānāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1538_10: atthi kho pana me pitu sahāyo kuṭumbiko, taṃ paṭipucchitvā jānissāmī”ti bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:1538_11: santikaṃ gantvā sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā “kiṃ nu kho, tāta, kāraṇa”nti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1539_0: Bodhisatto “yasmiṃ te, tāta, ṭhāne ṭhito nando akkosati, tattheva te pitu santakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1539_1: dhanaṃ, tasmā yadā te nando akkosati, tadā naṃ ‘ehi re dāsa, kiṃ akkosasī’ti ākaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1539_2: taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhinditvā kulasantakaṃ dhanaṃ nīharitvā dāsaṃ ukkhipāpetvā dhanaṃ āharā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1542: Yattha dāso āmajāto, ṭhito thullāni gajjatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1543_0: Tattha maññeti evaṃ ahaṃ jānāmi. Sovaṇṇayoti sundaro vaṇṇo etesanti sovaṇṇāni. Kāni
atk-s0513a1:1543_1: tāni? Rajatamaṇikañcanapavāḷādīni ratanāni. Imasmiñhi ṭhāne sabbānetāni “suvaṇṇānī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1543_2: adhippetāni, tesaṃ rāsi sovaṇṇayo rāsi. Sovaṇṇamālā cāti tuyhaṃ pitusantakā suvaṇṇamālā
atk-s0513a1:1543_3: ca etthevāti maññāmi. Nandako yattha dāsoti yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito nandako dāso. Āmajātoti
atk-s0513a1:1543_4: “āma, ahaṃ vo dāsī”ti evaṃ dāsabyaṃ upagatāya āmadāsisaṅkhātāya dāsiyā putto. Ṭhito
atk-s0513a1:1543_5: thullāni gajjatīti “so yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito thullāni pharusavacanāni vadati, tattheva
atk-s0513a1:1543_6: te kulasantakaṃ dhanaṃ, evaṃ ahaṃ taṃ maññāmī”ti bodhisatto kumārassa dhanaggahaṇūpāyaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a1:1544_0: Kumāro bodhisattaṃ vanditvā gharaṃ gantvā nandaṃ ādāya nidhiṭṭhānaṃ gantvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1544_1: paṭipajjitvā taṃ dhanaṃ āharitvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhito dānādīni
atk-s0513a1:1545_0: Satthā “pubbepesa evaṃsīloyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0513a1:1545_1: jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā nando sāriputtassa saddhivihāriko ahosi, paṇḍitakuṭumbiko
atk-s0513a1:1549_0: Kāmaṃ patāmi nirayanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1549_1: Anāthapiṇḍiko hi vihārameva ārabbha catupaññāsakoṭidhanaṃ buddhasāsane pariccajitvā
atk-s0513a1:1549_2: vikiritvā ṭhapetvā tīṇi ratanāni aññattha ratanasaññameva anuppādetvā satthari jetavane
atk-s0513a1:1549_3: viharante devasikaṃ tīṇi mahāupaṭṭhānāni gacchati. Pātova ekavāraṃ gacchati, katapātarāso
atk-s0513a1:1549_4: ekavāraṃ, sāyanhe ekavāraṃ. Aññānipi antarantarupaṭṭhānāni hontiyeva. Gacchanto ca
atk-s0513a1:1549_5: “kiṃ nu kho ādāya āgatoti sāmaṇerā vā daharā vā hatthampi me olokeyyu”nti tucchahattho
atk-s0513a1:1549_6: nāma na gatapubbo. Pātova gacchanto yāguṃ gāhāpetvā gacchati, katapātarāso sappinavanītamadhuphāṇitādīnipi,
atk-s0513a1:1549_7: sāyanhasamaye gandhamālāvatthādihatthoti. Evaṃ divase divase pariccajantassa panassa
atk-s0513a1:1550_0: Bahū vohārūpajīvinopissa hatthato paṇṇe āropetvā aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhyaṃ dhanaṃ iṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1550_1: gaṇhiṃsu, te mahāseṭṭhi na āharāpeti. Aññā panassa kulasantakā aṭṭhārasa koṭiyo nadītīre
atk-s0513a1:1550_2: nidahitvā ṭhapitā aciravatodakena nadīkūle bhinne mahāsamuddaṃ paviṭṭhā, tā yathāpihitalañchi
atk-s0513a1:1550_3: tāva lohacāṭiyo aṇḍavakucchiyaṃ pavaṭṭantā vicaranti. Gehe panassa pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1550_4: niccabhattaṃ nibaddhameva hoti. Seṭṭhino hi gehaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa catumahāpathe
atk-s0513a1:1550_5: khatapokkharaṇisadisaṃ, sabbabhikkhūnaṃ mātāpituṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ. Tenassa gharaṃ sammāsambuddhopi
atk-s0513a1:1550_6: gacchati, asītimahātherāpi gacchantiyeva. Sesabhikkhūnaṃ pana gacchantānañca āgacchantānañca
atk-s0513a1:1550_7: pamāṇaṃ natthi. Taṃ pana gharaṃ sattabhūmakaṃ sattadvārakoṭṭhakapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ, tassa
atk-s0513a1:1550_8: catutthe dvārakoṭṭhake ekā micchādiṭṭhikā devatā vasati, sā sammāsambuddhe gehaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1550_9: pavisante attano vimāne ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti, dārake gahetvā otaritvā bhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0513a1:1550_10: Asītimahātheresupi avasesattheresupi pavisantesu ca nikkhamantesu ca tatheva karoti.
atk-s0513a1:1550_11: Sā cintesi “samaṇe gotame ca sāvakesu cassa imaṃ gehaṃ pavisantesu mayhaṃ sukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1550_12: nāma natthi, niccakālaṃ otaritvā otaritvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhātuṃ na sakkhissāmi. Yathā ime
atk-s0513a1:1550_13: etaṃ gharaṃ na pavisanti, tathā mayā kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Athekadivasaṃ sayanūpagatasseva
atk-s0513a1:1550_14: mahākammantikassa santikaṃ gantvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi. “Ko etthā”ti ca vutte
atk-s0513a1:1550_16: seṭṭhissa kiriyaṃ na passatha, attano pacchimakālaṃ anoloketvā dhanaṃ nīharitvā samaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1550_17: gotamaṃyeva pūjeti, neva vaṇijjaṃ payojeti, na kammante paṭṭhapeti, tumhe seṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1550_18: tathā ovadatha, yathā attano kammantaṃ karoti. Yathā ca samaṇo gotamo sasāvako imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1550_19: gharaṃ na pavisati, tathā karothā”ti. Atha naṃ so āha “bāladevate, seṭṭhi dhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1550_20: vissajjento niyyānike buddhasāsane vissajjeti, so sace maṃ cūḷāyaṃ gahetvā vikkiṇissati,
atk-s0513a1:1550_21: nevāhaṃ kiñci kathessāmi, gaccha tvaṃ”nti. Sā punekadivasaṃ seṭṭhino jeṭṭhaputtaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1550_22: upasaṅkamitvā tatheva ovadi, sopi taṃ purimanayeneva tajjesi. Seṭṭhinā pana saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1551_0: Seṭṭhinopi nirantaraṃ dānaṃ dentassa vohāre akarontassa āye mandībhūte dhanaṃ parikkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1551_1: agamāsi. Athassa anukkamena dāliddiyappattassa paribhogasāṭakasayanabhojanānipi purāṇasadisāni
atk-s0513a1:1551_2: na bhaviṃsu. Evaṃbhūtopi bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ deti, paṇītaṃ pana katvā dātuṃ na
atk-s0513a1:1551_3: sakkoti. Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ vanditvā nisinnaṃ satthā “dīyati pana te, gahapati,
atk-s0513a1:1551_4: kule dāna”nti pucchi. So “dīyati, bhante, tañca kho kaṇājakaṃ bilaṅgadutiya”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1551_5: Atha naṃ satthā “gahapati, ‘lūkhaṃ dānaṃ demī’ti mā cittaṃ saṅkocayittha. Cittasmiñhi
atk-s0513a1:1551_6: paṇīte buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ dinnadānaṃ lūkhaṃ nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0513a1:1551_7: Vipākamahantattā”ti āha. Cittañhi paṇītaṃ kātuṃ sakkontassa dānaṃ lūkhaṃ nāma natthīti
atk-s0513a1:1553: Tathāgate vā sambuddhe, atha vā tassa sāvake. ;
atk-s0513a1:1555: Sukkhāya aloṇikāya ca, passa phalaṃ kummāsapiṇḍiyā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1556_0: Aparampi naṃ āha “gahapati, tvaṃ tāva lūkhaṃ dānaṃ dadamāno aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1556_1: desi, ahaṃ velāmakāle sakalajambudīpaṃ unnaṅgalaṃ katvā satta ratanāni dadamāno pañca
atk-s0513a1:1556_2: mahānadiyo ekoghapuṇṇaṃ katvā viya ca mahādānaṃ pavattayamāno tisaraṇagataṃ vā pañcasīlarakkhanakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1556_3: vā kañci nālatthaṃ, dakkhiṇeyyapuggalā nāma evaṃ dullabhā. Tasmā ‘lūkhaṃ me dāna’nti
atk-s0513a1:1556_4: mā cittaṃ saṅkocayitthā”ti evañca pana vatvā velāmasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1557_0: Atha kho sā devatā issarakāle seṭṭhinā saddhiṃ kathetumpi asakkontī “idānāyaṃ duggatattā
atk-s0513a1:1557_1: mama vacanaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti maññamānā aḍḍharattasamaye sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā obhāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1557_2: pharitvā ākāse aṭṭhāsi. Seṭṭhi taṃ disvā “ko eso”ti āha. “Ahaṃ mahāseṭṭhi catutthadvārakoṭṭhake
atk-s0513a1:1557_3: adhivatthā, devatā”ti. “Kimatthamāgatāsī”ti? “Tuyhaṃ ovādaṃ kathetukāmā hutvā āgacchāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1557_4: “Tena hi kathehī”ti. Mahāseṭṭhi tvaṃ pacchimakālaṃ na cintesi, puttadhītaro na olokesi,
atk-s0513a1:1557_5: samaṇassa te gotamassa sāsane bahuṃ dhanaṃ vippakiṇṇaṃ, so tvaṃ ativelaṃ dhanavissajjanena
atk-s0513a1:1557_6: vā vaṇijjādikammānaṃ akaraṇena vā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nissāya duggato jāto, evaṃbhūtopi
atk-s0513a1:1557_7: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ na muñcasi, ajjapi te samaṇā gharaṃ pavisantiyeva. Yaṃ tāva tehi
atk-s0513a1:1557_8: nītaṃ, taṃ na sakkā paccāharāpetuṃ, gahitaṃ gahitameva hotu, ito paṭṭhāya pana sayañca
atk-s0513a1:1557_9: samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ mā gamittha, sāvakānañcassa imaṃ gharaṃ pavisituṃ mā
atk-s0513a1:1557_10: adāsi, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nivattitvāpi anolokento attano vohāre ca vaṇijjañca katvā
atk-s0513a1:1557_11: kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapehī”ti. Atha naṃ so evamāha “ayaṃ tayā mayhaṃ dātabbaovādo”ti. “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:1557_12: ayyā”ti. Tādisānaṃ devatānaṃ satenapi sahassenapi satasahassenapi akampanīyo ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1557_13: dasabalena kato. Mama hi saddhā sineru viya acalā suppatiṭṭhitā, mayā niyyānike ratanasāsane
atk-s0513a1:1557_14: dhanaṃ vissajjitaṃ, ayuttaṃ te kathitaṃ, buddhasāsane pahāro dinno, evarūpāya anācārāya
atk-s0513a1:1557_15: dussīlāya kāḷakaṇṇiyā saddhiṃ tayā mama ekagehe vasanakiccaṃ natthi, sīghaṃ mama
atk-s0513a1:1558_0: Sā sotāpannassa ariyasāvakassa vacanaṃ sutvā ṭhātuṃ asakkontī attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1558_1: gantvā dārake hatthena gahetvā nikkhami. Nikkhamitvā ca pana aññattha vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1558_2: alabhamānā “seṭṭhiṃ khamāpetvā tattheva vasissāmī”ti cintetvā nagarapariggāhakadevaputtassa
atk-s0513a1:1558_3: santikaṃ gantvā taṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. “Kenaṭṭhena āgatāsī”ti ca vutte “ahaṃ sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1558_4: attano bālatāya anupadhāretvā anāthapiṇḍikena seṭṭhinā saddhiṃ kathesiṃ, so maṃ kujjhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1558_5: vasanaṭṭhānā nikkaḍḍhi, maṃ seṭṭhissa santikaṃ netvā khamāpetvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ me
atk-s0513a1:1558_6: dethā”ti. “Kiṃ pana tayā seṭṭhi vutto”ti “ito paṭṭhāya buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ saṅghupaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1558_7: mā kari, samaṇassa gotamassa gharappavesanaṃ mā adāsī”ti “evaṃ me vutto, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1558_8: Ayuttaṃ tayā vuttaṃ, sāsane pahāro dinno, “ahaṃ taṃ ādāya seṭṭhino santikaṃ gantuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1558_9: na ussahāmī”ti. Sā tassa santikā saṅgahaṃ alabhitvā catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1559_0: Tehipi tatheva paṭikkhittā sakkaṃ devarājaṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1559_1: “ahaṃ, deva, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ alabhamānā dārake hatthena gahetvā anāthā vicarāmi, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1559_2: siriyā mayhaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dāpethā”ti suṭṭhutaraṃ yāci. Sopi naṃ āha “tayā ayuttaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1559_3: kataṃ, jinasāsane pahāro dinno, ahampi taṃ nissāya seṭṭhinā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0513a1:1559_4: ekaṃ pana te seṭṭhissa khamanūpāyaṃ kathessāmī”ti. “Sādhu, deva, kathehī”ti. Mahāseṭṭhissa
atk-s0513a1:1559_5: hatthato manussehi paṇṇe āropetvā aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhyaṃ dhanaṃ gahitaṃ atthi, tvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1559_6: tassa āyuttakavesaṃ gahetvā kañci ajānāpetvā tāni paṇṇāni ādāya katipayehi yakkhataruṇehi
atk-s0513a1:1559_7: parivāritā ekena hatthena paṇṇaṃ, ekena lekhaniṃ gahetvā tesaṃ gehaṃ gantvā gehamajjhe
atk-s0513a1:1559_8: ṭhitā attano yakkhānubhāvena te uttāsetvā “idaṃ tumhākaṃ iṇapaṇṇaṃ, amhākaṃ seṭṭhi
atk-s0513a1:1559_9: attano issarakāle tumhe na kiñci āha, idāni duggato jāto, tumhehi gahitakahāpaṇāni
atk-s0513a1:1559_10: dethā”ti attano yakkhānubhāvaṃ dassetvā sabbāpi tā aṭṭhārasa hiraññakoṭiyo sādhetvā
atk-s0513a1:1559_11: seṭṭhissa tucchakoṭṭhake pūretvā aññaṃ aciravatinadītīre nidahitaṃ dhanaṃ nadīkūle
atk-s0513a1:1559_12: bhinne samuddaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ atthi, tampi attano ānubhāvena āharitvā tucchakoṭṭhake
atk-s0513a1:1559_13: pūretvā, aññampi asukaṭṭhāne nāma assāmikaṃ aṭṭhārasakoṭimattameva dhanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1559_14: tampi āharitvā tucchakoṭṭhake pūrehi, imāhi catupaññāsakoṭīhi imaṃ tucchakoṭṭhakapūrakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1560_0: Sā “sādhu, devā”ti tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā vuttanayeneva sabbaṃ dhanaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0513a1:1560_1: koṭṭhake pūretvā aḍḍharattasamaye seṭṭhissa sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā
atk-s0513a1:1560_2: ākāse aṭṭhāsi. “Ko eso”ti vutte “ahaṃ te mahāseṭṭhi catutthadvārakoṭṭhake adhivatthā
atk-s0513a1:1560_3: andhabāladevatā, mayā mahāmohamūḷhāya buddhaguṇe ajānitvā purimesu divasesu tumhehi
atk-s0513a1:1560_4: saddhiṃ kiñci kathitaṃ atthi, taṃ me dosaṃ khamatha. Sakkassa hi me devarājassa vacanena
atk-s0513a1:1560_5: tumhākaṃ iṇaṃ sodhetvā aṭṭhārasa koṭiyo, samuddaṃ gatā aṭṭhārasa koṭiyo, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1560_6: ṭhāne assāmikadhanassa aṭṭhārasa koṭiyoti catupaṇṇāsa koṭiyo āharitvā tucchakoṭṭhakapūraṇena
atk-s0513a1:1560_7: daṇḍakammaṃ kataṃ, jetavanavihāraṃ ārabbha parikkhayaṃ gatadhanaṃ sabbaṃ sampiṇḍitaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1560_8: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ alabhamānā kilamāmi, mayā aññāṇatāya kathitaṃ manasi akatvā khamatha mahāseṭṭhī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1561_0: Anāthapiṇḍiko tassā vacanaṃ sutvā cintesi “ayaṃ devatā ‘daṇḍakammañca me kata’nti
atk-s0513a1:1561_1: vadati, attano ca dosaṃ paṭijānāti, satthā imaṃ vinetvā attano guṇe jānāpessati,
atk-s0513a1:1561_2: sammāsambuddhassa naṃ dassessāmī”ti. Atha naṃ āha “amma, devate, sacesi maṃ khamāpetukāmā,
atk-s0513a1:1561_3: satthu santike maṃ khamāpehī”ti. Sādhu evaṃ karissāmi, “satthu pana maṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1561_4: gahetvā gacchāhī”ti. So “sādhū”ti vatvā vibhātāya rattiyā pātova taṃ gahetvā satthu
atk-s0513a1:1561_5: santikaṃ gantvā tāya katakammaṃ sabbaṃ tathāgatassa ārocesi. Satthā tassa vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1561_6: sutvā “idha, gahapati, pāpapuggalopi yāva pāpaṃ na paccati, tāva bhadrāni passati.
atk-s0513a1:1561_7: Yadā panassa pāpaṃ paccati, tadā pāpameva passati. Bhadrapuggalopi yāva bhadraṃ na
atk-s0513a1:1561_8: paccati, tāva pāpāni passati. Yadā panassa bhadraṃ paccati, tadā bhadrameva passatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1561_9: vatvā imā dhammapade dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a1:1562: “Pāpopi passatī bhadraṃ, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati;
atk-s0513a1:1563: Yadā ca paccatī pāpaṃ, atha pāpo pāpāni passati.
atk-s0513a1:1564: “Bhadropi passatī pāpaṃ, yāva bhadraṃ na paccati;
atk-s0513a1:1565: Yadā ca paccatī bhadraṃ, atha bhadro bhadrāni passatī”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:1566_0: Imāsañca pana gāthānaṃ pariyosāne sā devatā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Sā cakkaṅkitesu
atk-s0513a1:1566_1: satthu pādesu nipatitvā “mayā, bhante, rāgarattāya dosapaduṭṭhāya mohamūḷhāya avijjandhāya
atk-s0513a1:1566_2: tumhākaṃ guṇe ajānantiyā pāpakaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ me khamathā”ti satthāraṃ khamāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1567_0: Tasmiṃ samaye anāthapiṇḍiko satthu purato attano guṇaṃ kathesi “bhante, ayaṃ devatā
atk-s0513a1:1567_1: ‘buddhupaṭṭhānādīni mā karohī’ti vārayamānāpi maṃ vāretuṃ nāsakkhi, ‘dānaṃ na dātabba’nti
atk-s0513a1:1567_2: imāya vāriyamānopahaṃ dānaṃ adāsimeva, nūna esa, bhante, mayhaṃ guṇo”ti. Satthā “tvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1567_3: khosi gahapati sotāpanno ariyasāvako acalasaddho visuddhadassano, tuyhaṃ imāya appesakkhadevatāya
atk-s0513a1:1567_4: vārentiyā avāritabhāvo na acchariyo. Yaṃ pana pubbe paṇḍitā anuppanne buddhe aparipakkañāṇe
atk-s0513a1:1567_5: ṭhitā kāmāvacarissarena mārena ākāse ṭhatvā ‘sace dānaṃ dassasi, imasmiṃ niraye paccissasī’ti
atk-s0513a1:1567_6: asītihatthagambhīraṃ aṅgārakāsuṃ dassetvā ‘mā dānaṃ adāsī’ti vāritāpi padumakaṇṇikāmajjhe
atk-s0513a1:1567_7: ṭhatvā dānaṃ adaṃsu, idaṃ acchariya”nti vatvā anāthapiṇḍikena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1568_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bārāṇasiseṭṭhissa kule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:1568_1: nānappakārehi sukhūpakaraṇehi devakumāro viya saṃvaḍḍhiyamāno anukkamena viññutaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1568_2: patvā soḷasavassakāleyeva sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patto. So pitu accayena seṭṭhiṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:1568_3: ṭhatvā catūsu nagaradvāresu catasso dānasālāyo, majjhe nagarassa ekaṃ, attano nivesanadvāre
atk-s0513a1:1568_4: ekanti cha dānasālāyo kāretvā mahādānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ rakkhati, uposathakammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a1:1569_0: Athekadivasaṃ pātarāsavelāya bodhisattassa nānaggarase manuññabhojane upanīyamāne
atk-s0513a1:1569_1: eko paccekabuddho sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhāya bhikkhācāravelaṃ sallakkhetvā “ajja
atk-s0513a1:1569_2: mayā bārāṇasiseṭṭhissa gehadvāraṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā
atk-s0513a1:1569_3: anotattadahe mukhadhovanaṃ katvā manosilātale ṭhito nivāsetvā vijjulatāsadisaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1569_4: bandhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā iddhimayamattikāpattaṃ ādāya ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:1569_5: bhatte upanītamatte gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi. Bodhisatto taṃ disvāva āsanā vuṭṭhāya nipaccakāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1569_6: dassetvā parikammakārakaṃ olokesi. “Kiṃ karomi, sāmī”ti ca vutte “ayyassa pattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1569_7: āharathā”ti āha. Taṅkhaṇaññeva māro pāpimā vikampamāno uṭṭhāya “ayaṃ paccekabuddho
atk-s0513a1:1569_8: ito sattame divase āhāraṃ labhi, ajja alabhamāno vinassissati, imañca vināsessāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1569_9: seṭṭhino ca dānantarāyaṃ karissāmī”ti taṅkhaṇaññeva āgantvā antaravatthumhi asītihatthamattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1569_10: aṅgārakāsuṃ nimmini. Sā khadiraṅgārapuṇṇā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā avīcimahānirayo
atk-s0513a1:1569_11: viya khāyittha. Taṃ pana māpetvā sayaṃ ākāse aṭṭhāsi. Pattāharaṇatthāya gacchamāno
atk-s0513a1:1569_12: puriso taṃ disvā mahābhayappatto nivatti. Bodhisatto “kiṃ, tāta, nivattosī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1569_13: Ayaṃ sāmi antaravatthumhi mahatī aṅgārakāsu sampajjalitā sajotibhūtāti. Athañño athaññoti
atk-s0513a1:1569_14: evaṃ āgatāgatā sabbepi bhayappattā vegena palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1570_0: Bodhisatto cintesi “ajja mayhaṃ dānantarāyaṃ kātukāmo vasavattī māro uyyutto bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1570_1: na kho pana jānāti mārasatena mārasahassenapi mayhaṃ akampiyabhāvaṃ, ajja dāni mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1570_2: vā mārassa vā balamahantataṃ, ānubhāvamahantataṃ jānissāmī”ti taṃ yathāsajjitameva
atk-s0513a1:1570_3: bhattapātiṃ sayaṃ ādāya gehā nikkhamma aṅgārakāsutaṭe ṭhatvā ākāsaṃ ulloketvā māraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1570_4: disvā “kosi tva”nti āha. “Ahaṃ, māro”ti. “Ayaṃ aṅgārakāsu tayā nimmitā”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:1570_5: mayā”ti. “Kimatthāyā”ti. “Tava dānassa antarāyakaraṇatthāya ca paccekabuddhassa ca
atk-s0513a1:1570_6: jīvitanāsanatthāyā”ti. Bodhisatto “neva te ahaṃ attano dānassa antarāyaṃ, na paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0513a1:1570_7: jīvitantarāyaṃ kātuṃ dassāmi, ajja dāni mayhaṃ vā tuyhaṃ vā balamahantataṃ, ānubhāvamahantataṃ
atk-s0513a1:1570_8: jānissāmī”ti aṅgārakāsutaṭe ṭhatvā “bhante, paccekabuddha ahaṃ imissā aṅgārakāsuyā
atk-s0513a1:1570_9: adhosīso patamānopi na nivattissāmi, kevalaṃ tumhe mayā dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ paṭiggaṇhathā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1574_0: Tatthāyaṃ piṇḍattho – bhante, paccekavarabuddha sacepahaṃ tumhākaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dento
atk-s0513a1:1574_1: ekaṃseneva imaṃ nirayaṃ uddhaṃpādo avaṃsiro hutvā patāmi, tathāpi yadidaṃ adānañca
atk-s0513a1:1574_2: asīlañca ariyehi akattabbattā anariyehi ca kattabbattā “anariya”nti vuccati, “na
atk-s0513a1:1574_3: taṃ anariyaṃ karissāmi, handa imaṃ mayā dīyamānaṃ piṇḍaṃ paṭiggaha paṭiggaṇhāhī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1575_0: Evaṃ vatvā bodhisatto daḷhasamādānena bhattapātiṃ gahetvā aṅgārakāsumatthakena pakkhanto,
atk-s0513a1:1575_1: tāvadeva asītihatthagambhīrāya aṅgārakāsuyā talato uparūparijātaṃ satapattapupphitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1575_2: ekaṃ mahāpadumaṃ uggantvā bodhisattassa pāde sampaṭicchi. Tato mahātumbamattā reṇu
atk-s0513a1:1575_3: uggantvā mahāsattassa muddhani ṭhatvā sakalasarīraṃ suvaṇṇacuṇṇasamokiṇṇamiva akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1575_4: So padumakaṇṇikāya ṭhatvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ paccekabuddhassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1575_5: So taṃ paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṃ katvā pattaṃ ākāse khipitvā passantasseva mahājanassa
atk-s0513a1:1575_6: sayampi vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā nānappakāraṃ valāhakapantiṃ maddamāno viya himavantameva
atk-s0513a1:1575_7: gato. Māropi parājito domanassaṃ patvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gato. Bodhisatto pana
atk-s0513a1:1575_8: padumakaṇṇikāya ṭhitakova mahājanassa dānasīlasaṃvaṇṇanena dhammaṃ desetvā mahājanena
atk-s0513a1:1575_9: parivuto attano nivesanameva pavisitvā yāvajīvaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1576_0: Satthā “nayidaṃ, gahapati, acchariyaṃ, yaṃ tvaṃ evaṃ dassanasampanno etarahi devatāya
atk-s0513a1:1576_1: na kampito, pubbe paṇḍitehi katameva acchariya”nti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1576_2: ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā paccekabuddho tattheva parinibbāyi, māraṃ parājetvā
atk-s0513a1:1576_3: padumakaṇṇikāya ṭhatvā paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapātadāyako bārāṇasiseṭṭhi pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1585_0: Yo atthakāmassāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto losakatissattheraṃ nāma ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1585_1: kathesi. Ko panesa losakatissatthero nāmāti? Kosalaraṭṭhe eko attano kulanāsako kevaṭṭaputtako
atk-s0513a1:1585_2: alābhī bhikkhu. So kira nibbattaṭṭhānetā cavitvā kosalaraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ kulasahassavāse
atk-s0513a1:1585_3: kevaṭṭagāme ekissā kevaṭṭiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase
atk-s0513a1:1585_4: taṃ kulasahassaṃ jālahatthaṃ nadiyañca taḷākādīsu ca macche pariyesantaṃ ekaṃ khuddakamacchampi
atk-s0513a1:1585_5: nālattha. Tato paṭṭhāya ca te kevaṭṭā parihāyantiyeva. Tasmiñhi kucchigateyeva nesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1585_6: gāmo satta vāre agginā daḍḍho, satta vāre raññā daṇḍito. Evaṃ anukkamena duggatā
atk-s0513a1:1585_7: jātā. Te cintayiṃsu “pubbe amhākaṃ evarūpaṃ natthi, idāni pana parihāyāma, amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1585_8: antare ekāya kāḷakaṇṇiyā bhavitabbaṃ, dve bhāgā homā”ti pañca pañca kulasatāni ekato
atk-s0513a1:1585_9: ahesuṃ. Tato yattha tassa mātāpitaro, sova koṭṭhāso parihāyati, itaro vaḍḍhati. Te
atk-s0513a1:1585_10: tampi koṭṭhāsaṃ dvidhā, tampi dvidhāti evaṃ yāva tameva kulaṃ ekaṃ ahosi, tāva vibhajitvā
atk-s0513a1:1586_0: Athassa mātā kicchena jīvamānā paripakke gabbhe ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vijāyi. Pacchimabhavikasattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1586_1: na sakkā nāsetuṃ, antoghaṭe padīpo viya tassa hadaye arahattassa upanissayo jalati.
atk-s0513a1:1586_2: Sā taṃ dārakaṃ paṭijaggitvā ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle ekamassa kapālakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1586_3: hatthe datvā “putta, etaṃ gharaṃ pavisā”ti pesetvā palātā. So tato paṭṭhāya ekakova
atk-s0513a1:1586_4: hutvā tattha tattha bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sayati, na nhāyati, na sarīraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1586_5: paṭijaggati, paṃsupisācako viya kicchena jīvikaṃ kappeti. So anukkamena sattavassiko
atk-s0513a1:1586_6: hutvā ekasmiṃ gehadvāre ukkhalidhovanassa chaḍḍitaṭṭhāne kāko viya ekekaṃ bhattasitthaṃ uccinitvā khādati.
atk-s0513a1:1587_0: Atha naṃ dhammasenāpati sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno disvā “ayaṃ satto atikāruññappatto,
atk-s0513a1:1587_1: kataragāmavāsiko nu kho”ti tasmiṃ mettacittaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “ehi, re”ti āha. So āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:1587_2: theraṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ thero “kataragāmavāsikosi, kahaṃ vā te mātāpitaro”ti
atk-s0513a1:1587_3: pucchi. “Ahaṃ, bhante, nippaccayo, mayhaṃ mātāpitaro maṃ nissāya ‘kilantamhā’ti maṃ
atk-s0513a1:1587_4: chaḍḍetvā palātā”ti. “Api pana pabbajissasī”ti. “Bhante, ahaṃ tāva pabbajeyyaṃ, mādisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1587_5: pana kapaṇaṃ ko pabbājessasī”ti? “Ahaṃ pabbājessāmī”ti. “Sādhu, bhante, pabbājethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1587_6: Thero tassa khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ datvā taṃ vihāraṃ netvā sahattheneva nhāpetvā pabbājetvā
atk-s0513a1:1587_8: appapuñño appalābho. Tena kira asadisadānepi kucchipūro na laddhapubbo, jīvitaghaṭanamattameva
atk-s0513a1:1587_9: labhati. Tassa hi patte ekasmiṃyeva yāguuḷuṅke dinne patto samatittiko viya hutvā
atk-s0513a1:1587_10: paññāyati. Atha manussā “imassa patto pūro”ti heṭṭhā yāguṃ denti. Tassa patte yāguṃ
atk-s0513a1:1587_11: dānakāle manussānaṃ bhājane yāgu antaradhāyatītipi vadanti. Khajjakādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0513a1:1588_0: So aparena samayena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhitopi appalābhova
atk-s0513a1:1588_1: ahosi. Athassa anupubbena āyusaṅkhāresu parihīnesu parinibbānadivaso sampāpuṇi. Dhammasenāpati
atk-s0513a1:1588_2: āvajjento tassa parinibbānabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ losakatissatthero ajja parinibbāyissati,
atk-s0513a1:1588_3: ajja mayā etassa yāvadatthaṃ āhāraṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti taṃ ādāya sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0513a1:1588_4: pāvisi. Thero taṃ nissāya tāva bahumanussāya sāvatthiyā hatthaṃ pasāretvā vandanamattampi
atk-s0513a1:1588_5: nālattha. Atha naṃ thero “gacchāvuso, āsanasālāya nisīdā”ti uyyojetvā gato. Taṃ āgatameva
atk-s0513a1:1588_6: manussā “ayyo, āgato”ti āsane nisīdāpetvā bhojesi. Theropi “imaṃ losakassa dethā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1588_7: laddhāhāraṃ pesesi. Taṃ gahetvā gatā losakatissattheraṃ asaritvā sayameva bhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1588_8: Atha therassa uṭṭhāya vihāraṃ gamanakāle losakatissatthero āgantvā theraṃ vandi,
atk-s0513a1:1588_9: thero nivattitvā ṭhitakova “laddhaṃ te, āvuso, bhatta”nti pucchi. Labhissāma no,
atk-s0513a1:1588_10: bhanteti. Thero saṃvegapatto kālaṃ olokesi, kālo atikkanto. Thero “hotāvuso, idheva
atk-s0513a1:1588_11: nisīdā”ti losakattheraṃ āsanasālāyaṃ nisīdāpetvā kosalarañño nivesanaṃ agamāsi. Rājā
atk-s0513a1:1588_12: therassa pattaṃ gāhāpetvā “bhattassa akālo”ti pattapūraṃ catumadhuraṃ dāpesi. Thero
atk-s0513a1:1588_13: taṃ ādāya gantvā “ehāvuso, tissa imaṃ catumadhuraṃ bhuñjā”ti vatvā pattaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1588_14: aṭṭhāsi. So there gāravena lajjanto na paribhuñjati. Atha naṃ thero “ehāvuso tissa,
atk-s0513a1:1588_15: ahaṃ imaṃ pattaṃ gahetvāva ṭhassāmi, tvaṃ nisīditvā paribhuñja. Sace ahaṃ pattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1588_16: hatthato muñceyyaṃ, kiñci na bhaveyyā”ti āha. Athāyasmā losakatissatthero aggasāvake
atk-s0513a1:1588_17: dhammasenāpatimhi pattaṃ gahetvā ṭhite catumadhuraṃ paribhuñji. Taṃ therassa ariyiddhibalena
atk-s0513a1:1588_18: parikkhayaṃ na agamāsi. Tadā losakatissatthero yāvadatthaṃ udarapūraṃ katvā paribhuñji,
atk-s0513a1:1588_19: taṃ divasaṃyeva ca anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Sammāsambuddho santike
atk-s0513a1:1588_20: ṭhatvā sarīranikkhepaṃ kāresi, dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1589_0: Tadā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitvā “āvuso, aho losakatissatthero appapuñño
atk-s0513a1:1589_1: appalābhī, evarūpena nāma appapuññena appalābhinā kathaṃ ariyadhammo laddho”ti kathentā
atk-s0513a1:1589_2: nisīdiṃsu. Satthā dhammasabhaṃ gantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1589_3: pucchi. Te “imāya nāma, bhante”ti ārocayiṃsu. Satthā “bhikkhave, eso bhikkhu attano
atk-s0513a1:1589_4: alābhibhāvañca ariyadhammalābhibhāvañca attanāva akāsi. Ayañhi pubbe paresaṃ lābhantarāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1589_5: katvā appalābhī jāto, “aniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ, anattā”ti vipassanāya yuttabhāvassa balena
atk-s0513a1:1590_0: Atīte kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle aññataro bhikkhu ekaṃ kuṭumbikaṃ nissāya gāmakāvāse
atk-s0513a1:1590_1: vasati pakatatto sīlavā vipassanāya yuttappayutto. Atheko khīṇāsavatthero samavattavāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1590_2: vasamāno anupubbena tassa bhikkhuno upaṭṭhākakuṭumbikassa vasanagāmaṃ sampatto. Kuṭumbiko
atk-s0513a1:1590_3: therassa iriyāpatheyeva pasīditvā pattaṃ ādāya gharaṃ pavesetvā sakkaccaṃ bhojetvā
atk-s0513a1:1590_4: thokaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā theraṃ vanditvā “bhante, amhākaṃ dhuravihārameva gacchatha,
atk-s0513a1:1590_5: mayaṃ sāyanhasamaye āgantvā passissāmā”ti āha. Thero vihāraṃ gantvā nevāsikattheraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1590_6: vanditvā āpucchitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Sopi tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “laddho
atk-s0513a1:1590_7: te, āvuso, bhikkhāhāro”ti pucchi. “Āma, laddho”ti. “Kahaṃ laddho”ti? “Tumhākaṃ dhuragāme
atk-s0513a1:1590_8: kuṭumbikaghare”ti. Evañca pana vatvā attano senāsanaṃ pucchitvā paṭijaggitvā pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1590_9: paṭisāmetvā jhānasukhena phalasukhena ca vītināmento nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1591_0: Sopi kuṭumbiko sāyanhe gandhamālañceva padīpeyyañca gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā nevāsikattheraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1591_1: vanditvā “bhante, eko āgantukatthero atthi, āgato nu kho”ti pucchi. “Āma, āgato”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1591_2: “Idāni kaha”nti. “Asukasenāsane nāmā”ti. So tassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1591_3: nisinno dhammakathaṃ sutvā sītalavelāya cetiyañca bodhiñca pūjetvā dīpe jāletvā ubhopi
atk-s0513a1:1591_4: jane nimantetvā gato. Nevāsikattheropi kho “ayaṃ kuṭumbiko paribhinno, sacāyaṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:1591_5: imasmiṃ vihāre vasissati, na maṃ esa kismiñci gaṇayissatī”ti there anattamanataṃ
atk-s0513a1:1591_6: āpajjitvā “imasmiṃ vihāre etassa avasanākāro mayā kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tena upaṭṭhānavelāya
atk-s0513a1:1591_7: āgatena saddhiṃ kiñci na kathesi. Khīṇāsavatthero tassa ajjhāsayaṃ jānitvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1591_8: thero mama kule vā gaṇe vā apalibuddhabhāvaṃ na jānātī”ti attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:1592_0: Nevāsikopi punadivase nakhapiṭṭhena gaṇḍiṃ paharitvā nakhena dvāraṃ ākoṭetvā kuṭumbikassa
atk-s0513a1:1592_1: gehaṃ agamāsi. So tassa pattaṃ gahetvā paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā “āgantukatthero kahaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1592_2: bhante”ti pucchi. “Nāhaṃ tava kulūpakassa pavattiṃ jānāmi, gaṇḍiṃ paharantopi dvāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1592_3: ākoṭentopi pabodhetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ, hiyyo tava gehe paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā jīrāpetuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1592_4: asakkonto idāni niddaṃ okkantoyeva bhavissati, tvaṃ pasīdamāno evarūpesuyeva ṭhānesu
atk-s0513a1:1592_5: pasīdasī”ti āha – “khīṇāsavattheropi attano bhikkhācāravelaṃ sallakkhetvā sarīraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1592_6: paṭijaggitvā pattacīvaramādāya ākāse uppatitvā aññattha agamāsi. So kuṭumbiko nevāsikattheraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1592_7: sappimadhusakkharābhisaṅkhataṃ pāyāsaṃ pāyetvā pattaṃ gandhacuṇṇehi ubbaṭṭetvā puna
atk-s0513a1:1592_8: pūretvā “bhante, so thero maggakilanto bhavissati, idamassa harathā”ti adāsi. Itaro
atk-s0513a1:1592_9: apaṭikkhipitvāva gahetvā gacchanto “sace so bhikkhu imaṃ pāyāsaṃ pivissati, gīvāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1592_10: gahetvā nikkaḍḍhiyamānopi na gamissati. Sace panāhaṃ imaṃ pāyāsaṃ manussānaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1592_11: pākaṭaṃ me kammaṃ bhavissati. Sace udake opilāpessāmi, udakapiṭṭhe sappi paññāyissati.
atk-s0513a1:1592_12: Sace bhūmiyaṃ chaḍḍessāmi, kākasannipātena paññāyissati. Kattha nu kho imaṃ chaḍḍeyya”nti
atk-s0513a1:1592_13: upadhārento ekaṃ jhāmakkhettaṃ disvā aṅgāre viyūhitvā tattha pakkhipitvā upari aṅgārehi
atk-s0513a1:1592_14: paṭicchādetvā vihāraṃ gato taṃ bhikkhuṃ adisvā cintesi “addhā so bhikkhu khīṇāsavo
