atk-s0513a1:1592_15: mama ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā aññattha gato bhavissati, aho mayā udarahetu ayuttaṃ kata”nti
atk-s0513a1:1592_16: tāvadevassa mahantaṃ domanassaṃ udapādi. Tato paṭṭhāyeva ca manussapeto hutvā na
atk-s0513a1:1593_0: So bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā pakkāvasesena paṭipāṭiyā pañcajātisatesu
atk-s0513a1:1593_1: yakkho hutvā ekadivasampi udarapūraṃ āhāraṃ na labhi. Ekadivasaṃ pana gabbhamalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1593_2: udarapūraṃ labhi. Puna pañcajātisatesu sunakho ahosi. Tadāpi ekadivasaṃ bhattavamanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1593_3: udarapūraṃ labhi, sesakāle pana tena udarapūro āhāro nāma na laddhapubbo. Sunakhayonito
atk-s0513a1:1593_4: pana cavitvā kāsiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ gāme duggatakule nibbatti. Tassa nibbattito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:1593_5: taṃ kulaṃ paramaduggatameva jātaṃ, jātito uddhaṃ udakakañjikāmattampi na labhi. Tassa
atk-s0513a1:1593_6: pana “mittavindako”ti nāmaṃ ahosi. Mātāpitaro chātakadukkhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkontā
atk-s0513a1:1593_7: “gaccha kāḷakaṇṇī”ti taṃ pothetvā nīhariṃsu. So apaṭisaraṇo vicaranto bārāṇasiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1593_8: Tadā bodhisatto bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni sippaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1593_9: vāceti. Tadā bārāṇasivāsino duggatānaṃ paribbayaṃ datvā sippaṃ sikkhāpenti. Ayampi
atk-s0513a1:1593_10: mittavindako bodhisattassa santike sippaṃ sikkhati. So pharuso anovādakkhamo taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1593_11: taṃ paharanto vicarati, bodhisattena ovadiyamānopi ovādaṃ na gaṇhāti. Taṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a1:1594_0: Atha so māṇavakehi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā ovādaṃ aggaṇhanto tato palāyitvā āhiṇḍanto ekaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1594_1: paccantagāmaṃ patvā bhatiṃ katvā jīvati. So tattha ekāya duggatitthiyā saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1594_2: kappesi. Sā taṃ nissāya dve dārake vijāyi. Gāmavāsino “amhākaṃ susāsanaṃ dussāsanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1594_3: āroceyyāsī”ti mittavindakassa bhatiṃ datvā taṃ gāmadvāre kuṭikāya vasāpesuṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1594_4: pana mittavindakaṃ nissāya te paccantagāmavāsino sattakkhattuṃ rājadaṇḍaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1594_5: sattakkhattuṃ nesaṃ gehāni jhāyiṃsu, sattakkhattuṃ taḷākaṃ bhijji. Te cintayiṃsu
atk-s0513a1:1594_6: “amhākaṃ pubbe imassa mittavindakassa anāgamanakāle evarūpaṃ natthi, idāni panassa
atk-s0513a1:1594_7: āgatakālato paṭṭhāya parihāyāmā”ti taṃ pothetvā nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1595_0: So attano dārake gahetvā aññattha gacchanto ekaṃ amanussapariggahaṃ aṭaviṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1595_1: Tatthassa amanussā dārake ca bhariyañca māretvā maṃsaṃ khādiṃsu. So tato palāyitvā
atk-s0513a1:1595_2: tato tato āhiṇḍanto ekaṃ gambhīraṃ nāma paṭṭanagāmaṃ nāvāvissajjanadivaseyeva patvā
atk-s0513a1:1595_3: kammakārako hutvā nāvaṃ abhiruhi. Nāvā samuddapiṭṭhe sattāhaṃ gantvā sattame divase
atk-s0513a1:1595_4: samuddamajjhe ākoṭetvā ṭhapitā viya aṭṭhāsi. Te kāḷakaṇṇisalākaṃ cāresuṃ, sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1595_5: mittavindakasseva pāpuṇi. Manussā tassekaṃ veḷukalāpaṃ datvā hatthe gahetvā samuddapiṭṭhe
atk-s0513a1:1595_6: khipiṃsu, tasmiṃ khittamatte nāvā agamāsi. Mittavindako veḷukalāpe nipajjitvā samuddapiṭṭhe
atk-s0513a1:1595_7: gacchanto kassapasammāsambuddhakāle rakkhitasīlassa phalena samuddapiṭṭhe ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1595_8: phalikavimāne catasso devadhītaro paṭilabhitvā tāsaṃ santike sukhaṃ anubhavamāno
atk-s0513a1:1595_9: sattāhaṃ vasi. Tā pana vimānapetiyo sattāhaṃ sukhaṃ anubhavanti, sattāhaṃ dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1595_10: Sattāhaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavituṃ gacchamānā “yāva mayaṃ āgacchāma, tāva idheva hohī”ti vatvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1596_0: Mittavindako tāsaṃ gatakāle veḷukalāpe nipajjitvā purato gacchanto rajatavimāne aṭṭha
atk-s0513a1:1596_1: devadhītaro labhi. Tatopi paraṃ gacchanto maṇivimāne soḷasa, kanakavimāne dvattiṃsa
atk-s0513a1:1596_2: devadhītaro labhi. Tāsampi vacanaṃ akatvā parato gacchanto antaradīpake ekaṃ yakkhanagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1596_3: addasa. Tatthekā yakkhinī ajarūpena vicarati. Mittavindako tassā yakkhinibhāvaṃ ajānanto
atk-s0513a1:1596_4: “ajamaṃsaṃ khādissāmī”ti taṃ pāde aggahesi, sā yakkhānubhāvena taṃ ukkhipitvā khipi.
atk-s0513a1:1596_5: So tāya khitto samuddamatthakena gantvā bārāṇasiyaṃ parikhāpiṭṭhe ekasmiṃ kaṇṭakagumbamatthake
atk-s0513a1:1596_6: patitvā pavaṭṭamāno bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi. Tasmiñca samaye tasmiṃ parikhāpiṭṭhe rañño
atk-s0513a1:1596_7: ajikā caramānā corā haranti. Ajikagopakā “core gaṇhissāmā”ti ekamantaṃ nilīnā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1596_8: Mittavindako pavaṭṭitvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhito tā ajikā disvā cintesi “ahaṃ samudde ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1596_9: dīpake ajikaṃ pāde gahetvā tāya khitto idha patito. Sace idāni ekaṃ ajikaṃ pāde gahessāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1596_10: sā maṃ parato samuddapiṭṭhe vimānadevatānaṃ santike khipissatī”ti. So evaṃ ayoniso
atk-s0513a1:1596_11: manasikaritvā ajikaṃ pāde gaṇhi, sā gahitamattā viravi. Ajikagopakā ito cito ca āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:1596_12: taṃ gahetvā “ettakaṃ kālaṃ rājakule ajikakhādako esa coro”ti taṃ koṭṭetvā bandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1597_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bodhisatto pañcasatamāṇavakaparivuto nagarā nikkhamma nhāyituṃ gacchanto
atk-s0513a1:1597_1: mittavindakaṃ disvā sañjānitvā te manusse āha – “tātā, ayaṃ amhākaṃ antevāsiko, kasmā
atk-s0513a1:1597_2: naṃ gaṇhathā”ti? “Ajikacorako, ayya, ekaṃ ajikaṃ pāde gaṇhi, tasmā gahito”ti. “Tena
atk-s0513a1:1597_3: hetaṃ amhākaṃ dāsaṃ katvā detha, amhe nissāya jīvissatī”ti. Te, “sādhu ayyā”ti taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1597_4: vissajjetvā agamaṃsu. Atha naṃ bodhisatto “mittavindaka, tvaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ kahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1597_5: vasī”ti pucchi. So sabbaṃ attanā katakammaṃ ārocesi. Bodhisatto “atthakāmānaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1597_6: akaronto evaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1599: “Yo atthakāmassa hitānukampino, ovajjamāno na karoti sāsanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1601_0: Tattha atthakāmassāti vuḍḍhiṃ icchantassa. Hitānukampinoti hitena anukampamānassa.
atk-s0513a1:1601_1: Ovajjamānoti mudukena hitacittena ovadiyamāno. Na karoti sāsananti anusiṭṭhaṃ na
atk-s0513a1:1601_2: karoti, dubbaco anovādako hoti. Mittako viya socatīti yathāyaṃ mittavindako ajikāya
atk-s0513a1:1601_3: pādaṃ gahetvā socati kilamati, evaṃ niccakālaṃ socatīti imāya gāthāya bodhisatto dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:1602_0: Evaṃ tena therena ettake addhāne tīsuyeva attabhāvesu kucchipūro laddhapubbo. Yakkhena
atk-s0513a1:1602_1: hutvā ekadivasaṃ gabbhamalaṃ laddhaṃ, sunakhena hutvā ekadivasaṃ bhattavamanaṃ, parinibbānadivase
atk-s0513a1:1602_2: dhammasenāpatissānubhāvena catumadhuraṃ laddhaṃ. Evaṃ parassa lābhantarāyakaraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1602_3: nāma mahādosanti veditabbaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana kāle sopi ācariyo mittavindakopi yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1603_0: Satthā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, attano appalābhibhāvañca ariyadhammalābhibhāvañca sayameva
atk-s0513a1:1603_1: esa akāsī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a1:1603_2: – “tadā mittavindako losakatissatthero ahosi, disāpāmokkhācariyo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1607_0: Yo atthakāmassāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ lolabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1607_1: Tassa lolabhāvo navakanipāte kākajātake āvi bhavissati. Tadā pana taṃ bhikkhū “ayaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1607_2: bhante, bhikkhu lolo”ti satthu ārocesuṃ. Atha naṃ satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:1607_3: lolosī”ti pucchi. “Āma, bhante”ti. Satthā “pubbepi tvaṃ bhikkhu lolo lolakāraṇā jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1607_4: patto, paṇḍitāpi taṃ nissāya attano vasanaṭṭhānā parihīnā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1608_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto pārāvatayoniyaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1608_1: Tadā bārāṇasivāsino puññakāmatāya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sakuṇānaṃ sukhavasanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:1608_2: thusapacchiyo olambenti. Bārāṇasiseṭṭhinopi bhattakārako attano mahānase ekaṃ thusapacchiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1608_3: olambetvā ṭhapesi, bodhisatto tattha vāsaṃ kappesi. So pātova nikkhamitvā gocare
atk-s0513a1:1608_4: caritvā sāyaṃ āgantvā tattha vasanto kālaṃ khepesi. Athekadivasaṃ eko kāko mahānasamatthakena
atk-s0513a1:1608_5: gacchanto ambilānambilamacchamaṃsānaṃ dhūpanavāsaṃ ghāyitvā lobhaṃ uppādetvā “kaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1608_6: nu kho nissāya imaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ labhissāmī”ti avidūre nisīditvā pariggaṇhanto sāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1608_7: bodhisattaṃ āgantvā mahānasaṃ pavisantaṃ disvā “imaṃ pārāvataṃ nissāya macchamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1608_8: labhissāmī”ti punadivase pātova āgantvā bodhisattassa nikkhamitvā gocaratthāya gamanakāle
atk-s0513a1:1608_9: piṭṭhito piṭṭhito agamāsi. Atha naṃ bodhisatto “kasmā tvaṃ, samma, amhehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1608_10: carasī”ti āha. “Sāmi, tumhāhaṃ kiriyā mayhaṃ ruccati, ito paṭṭhāya tumhe upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1608_11: “Samma, tumhe aññagocarā, mayaṃ aññagocarā, tumhehi amhākaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ dukkara”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1608_12: “Sāmi, tumhākaṃ gocaraggahaṇakāle ahampi gocaraṃ gahetvā tumhehi saddhiṃyeva gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1608_13: “Sādhu, kevalaṃ te appamattena bhavitabba”nti evaṃ bodhisatto kākaṃ ovaditvā gocaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1608_14: caranto tiṇabījādīni khādati. Bodhisattassa pana gocaraggahaṇakāle kāko gantvā gomayapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1608_15: apanetvā pāṇake khāditvā udaraṃ pūretvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ āgantvā “sāmi, tumhe
atk-s0513a1:1608_16: ativelaṃ caratha, atibahubhakkhena nāma bhavituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā bodhisattena
atk-s0513a1:1608_17: gocaraṃ gahetvā sāyaṃ āgacchantena saddhiṃyeva mahānasaṃ pāvisi. Bhattakārako “amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1608_18: kapoto aññampi gahetvā āgato”ti kākassapi pacchiṃ ṭhapesi. Tato paṭṭhāya dve janā vasanti.
atk-s0513a1:1609_0: Athekadivasaṃ seṭṭhissa bahuṃ macchamaṃsaṃ āhariṃsu. Taṃ ādāya bhattakārako mahānase
atk-s0513a1:1609_1: tattha tattha olambesi. Kāko taṃ disvā lobhaṃ uppādetvā “sve gocarabhūmiṃ agantvā
atk-s0513a1:1609_2: mayā idameva khāditabba”nti rattiṃ nitthunanto nipajji. Punadivase bodhisatto gocarāya
atk-s0513a1:1609_3: gacchanto “ehi, samma, kākā”ti āha. “Sāmi, tumhe gacchatha, mayhaṃ kucchirogo atthī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1609_4: “Samma, kākānaṃ kucchirogo nāma na kadāci bhūtapubbo, rattiṃ tīsu yāmesu ekekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1609_5: yāme mucchitā honti, dīpavaṭṭiṃ gilitakāle pana nesaṃ muhuttaṃ titti hoti, tvaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1609_6: macchamaṃsaṃ khāditukāmo bhavissasi, ehi manussaparibhogo nāma tumhākaṃ dupparibhuñjiyo,
atk-s0513a1:1609_7: mā evarūpaṃ akāsi, mayā saddhiṃyeva gocarāya gacchāhī”ti. “Na sakkomi, sāmī”ti. “Tena
atk-s0513a1:1609_8: hi paññāyissasi sakena kammena, lobhavasaṃ agantvā appamatto hohī”ti taṃ ovaditvā
atk-s0513a1:1610_0: Bhattakārako nānappakāraṃ macchamaṃsavikatiṃ sampādetvā usumanikkhamanatthaṃ bhājanāni
atk-s0513a1:1610_1: thokaṃ vivaritvā rasaparissāvanakaroṭiṃ bhājanamatthake ṭhapetvā bahi nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a1:1610_2: sedaṃ puñchamāno aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe kāko pacchito sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā bhattagehaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1610_3: olokento tassa nikkhantabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃdāni mayhaṃ manorathaṃ pūretvā maṃsaṃ khādituṃ
atk-s0513a1:1610_4: kālo, kiṃ nu kho mahāmaṃsaṃ khādāmi, udāhu cuṇṇikamaṃsa”nti cintetvā “cuṇṇikamaṃsena
atk-s0513a1:1610_5: nāma khippaṃ kucchiṃ pūretuṃ na sakkā, mahantaṃ maṃsakhaṇḍaṃ āharitvā pacchiyaṃ nikkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1610_6: khādamāno nipajjissāmī”ti pacchito uppatitvā rasakaroṭiyaṃ nilīyi. Sā “kirī”ti saddamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1610_7: Bhattakārako taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti paviṭṭho kākaṃ disvā “ayaṃ duṭṭhakāko
atk-s0513a1:1610_8: mahāseṭṭhino pakkamaṃsaṃ khāditukāmo, ahaṃ kho pana seṭṭhiṃ nissāya jīvāmi, na imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1610_9: bālaṃ, kiṃ me iminā”ti dvāraṃ pidhāya kākaṃ gahetvā sakalasarīre pattāni luñcitvā
atk-s0513a1:1610_10: allasiṅgīveraloṇajīrakādayo koṭṭetvā ambilatakkena āloḷetvā tenassa sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1610_11: makkhetvā taṃ kākaṃ pacchiyaṃ khipi. So adhimattavedanābhibhūto nitthunanto nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:1611: Bodhisatto sāyaṃ āgantvā taṃ byasanappattaṃ disvā “lolakāka, mama vacanaṃ akatvā tava lobhaṃ nissāya mahādukkhaṃ pattosī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1613: “Yo atthakāmassa hitānukampino, ovajjamāno na karoti sāsanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1615_0: Tattha kapotakassa vacanaṃ akatvāti pārāvatassa hitānusāsanavacanaṃ akatvā. Amittahatthatthagatova
atk-s0513a1:1615_1: setīti amittānaṃ anatthakārakānaṃ dukkhuppādakapuggalānaṃ hatthatthaṃ hatthapathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1615_2: gato ayaṃ kāko viya so puggalo mahantaṃ byasanaṃ patvā anusocamāno setīti.
atk-s0513a1:1616_0: Bodhisatto imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā “idāni mayā ca imasmiṃ ṭhāne na sakkā vasitu”nti aññattha
atk-s0513a1:1616_1: gato. Kākopi tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ patto. Atha naṃ bhattakārako saddhiṃ pacchiyā
atk-s0513a1:1617_0: Satthāpi “na tvaṃ bhikkhu idāneva lolo, pubbepi loloyeva, tañca pana te lolyaṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a1:1617_1: paṇḍitāpi sakāvāsā parihīnā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a1:1617_2: so bhikkhu anāgāmiphalaṃ patto. Satthā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1617_3: “tadā kāko lolabhikkhu ahosi, pārāvato pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1621_0: Yo atthakāmassāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1621_1: kathesi. Tañhi bhagavā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu dubbacosī”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1621_2: bhante”ti vutte “na tvaṃ bhikkhu idāneva dubbaco, pubbepi dubbacoyeva, dubbacattāyeva
atk-s0513a1:1621_3: ca paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ akatvā sappamukhe jīvitakkhayaṃ patto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1622_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe mahābhogakule
atk-s0513a1:1622_1: nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme cānisaṃsaṃ disvā kāme pahāya himavantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1622_2: pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-s0513a1:1622_3: ca uppādetvā jhānasukhena vītināmento aparabhāge mahāparivāro pañcahi tāpasasatehi
atk-s0513a1:1622_4: parivuto gaṇassa satthā hutvā vihāsi. Atheko āsivisapotako attano dhammatāya caranto
atk-s0513a1:1622_5: aññatarassa tāpasassa assamapadaṃ patto. Tāpaso tasmiṃ puttasinehaṃ uppādetvā taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1622_6: ekasmiṃ veḷupabbe sayāpetvā paṭijaggati. Tassa veḷupabbe sayanato “veḷuko”tveva nāmaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1622_7: akaṃsu. Taṃ puttasinehena paṭijagganato tāpasassa “veḷukapitā”tveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1623_0: Tadā bodhisatto “eko kira tāpaso āsivisaṃ paṭijaggatī”ti sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1623_1: kira tvaṃ āsivisaṃ paṭijaggasī”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte “āsivisena saddhiṃ vissāso
atk-s0513a1:1623_2: nāma natthi, mā evaṃ jaggāhī”ti āha. “So me ācariya putto, nāhaṃ tena vinā vattituṃ
atk-s0513a1:1623_3: sakkhissāmī”ti. “Tena hi etasseva santikā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇissasī”ti. Tāpaso bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:1623_4: vacanaṃ na gaṇhi, āsivisampi jahituṃ nāsakkhi. Tato katipāhaccayeneva sabbe tāpasā
atk-s0513a1:1623_5: phalāphalatthāya gantvā gataṭṭhāne phalāphalassa sulabhabhāvaṃ disvā dve tayo divase
atk-s0513a1:1623_6: tattheva vasiṃsu, veḷukapitāpi tehi saddhiṃ gacchanto āsivisaṃ veḷupabbeyeva sayāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1623_7: pidahitvā gato. So puna tāpasehi saddhiṃ dvīhatīhaccayena āgantvā “veḷukassa gocaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1623_8: dassāmī”ti veḷupabbaṃ ugghāṭetvā “ehi, puttaka, chātakosī”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. Āsiviso
atk-s0513a1:1623_9: dvīhatīhaṃ nirāhāratāya kujjhitvā pasāritahatthaṃ ḍaṃsitvā tāpasaṃ tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1623_10: pāpetvā araññaṃ pāvisi. Tāpasā taṃ disvā bodhisattassa ārocesuṃ. Bodhisatto tassa
atk-s0513a1:1623_11: sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā isigaṇassa majjhe nisīditvā isīnaṃ ovādavasena imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1625: “Yo atthakāmassa hitānukampino, ovajjamāno na karoti sāsanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1626: Evaṃ so nihato seti, veḷukassa yathā pitā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1627_0: Tattha evaṃ so nihato setīti yo hi isīnaṃ ovādaṃ na gaṇhāti, so yathā esa tāpaso
atk-s0513a1:1627_1: āsivisamukhe pūtibhāvaṃ patvā nihato seti, evaṃ mahāvināsaṃ patvā nihato setīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1627_2: Evaṃ bodhisatto isigaṇaṃ ovaditvā cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā āyupariyosāne brahmaloke uppajji.
atk-s0513a1:1628_0: Satthā “na tvaṃ bhikkhu idāneva dubbaco, pubbepi dubbacoyeva, dubbacabhāveneva ca
atk-s0513a1:1628_1: āsivisamukhe pūtibhāvaṃ patto”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0513a1:1628_2: jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā veḷukapitā dubbacabhikkhu ahosi, sesaparisā buddhaparisā,
atk-s0513a1:1632_0: Seyyo amittoti idaṃ satthā magadhesu cārikaṃ caramāno aññatarasmiṃ gāmake bālagāmikamanusse
atk-s0513a1:1632_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tathāgato kira ekasmiṃ samaye sāvatthito magadharaṭṭhaṃ gantvā tattha
atk-s0513a1:1632_2: cārikaṃ caramāno aññataraṃ gāmakaṃ sampāpuṇi. So ca gāmako yebhuyyena andhabālamanussehiyeva
atk-s0513a1:1632_3: ussanno. Tatthekadivasaṃ te andhabālamanussā sannipatitvā “bho, amhe araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:1632_4: kammaṃ karonte makasā khādanti, tappaccayā amhākaṃ kammacchedo hoti, sabbeva dhanūni
atk-s0513a1:1632_5: ceva āvudhāni ca ādāya gantvā makasehi saddhiṃ yujjhitvā sabbamakase vijjhitvā chinditvā
atk-s0513a1:1632_6: ca māressāmā”ti mantayitvā araññaṃ gantvā “makase vijjhissāmā”ti aññamaññaṃ vijjhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1632_7: ca paharitvā ca dukkhappattā āgantvā antogāme ca gāmamajjhe ca gāmadvāre ca nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1633_0: Satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto taṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Avasesā paṇḍitamanussā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1633_1: disvā gāmadvāre maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a1:1633_2: satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne patitamanusse disvā te upāsake
atk-s0513a1:1633_3: pucchi “bahū ime gilānā manussā, kiṃ etehi kata”nti? “Bhante, ete manussā ‘makasayuddhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1633_4: karissāmā’ti gantvā aññamaññaṃ vijjhitvā sayaṃ gilānā jātā”ti. Satthā “na idāneva
atk-s0513a1:1633_5: andhabālamanussā ‘makase paharissāmā’ti attānaṃ paharanti, pubbepi ‘makasaṃ paharissāmā’ti
atk-s0513a1:1633_6: paraṃ paharaṇakamanussā ahesuṃyevā”ti vatvā tehi manussehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1634_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto vaṇijjāya jīvikaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0513a1:1634_1: Tadā kāsiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ paccantagāme bahū vaḍḍhakī vasanti. Tattheko khalitavaḍḍhakī
atk-s0513a1:1634_2: rukkhaṃ tacchati, athassa eko makaso tambalohathālakapiṭṭhisadise sīse nisīditvā
atk-s0513a1:1634_3: sattiyā paharanto viya sīsaṃ mukhatuṇḍakena vijjhi. So attano santike nisinnaṃ puttaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1634_4: āha – “tāta, mayhaṃ sīsaṃ makaso sattiyā paharanto viya vijjhati, vārehi na”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1634_5: “Tāta, adhivāsehi, ekappahāreneva taṃ māressāmī”ti. Tasmiṃ samaye bodhisattopi attano
atk-s0513a1:1634_6: bhaṇḍaṃ pariyesamāno taṃ gāmaṃ patvā tassā vaḍḍhakisālāya nisinno hoti. Atha so vaḍḍhakī
atk-s0513a1:1634_7: puttaṃ āha – “tāta, imaṃ makasaṃ vārehī”ti. So “vāressāmi, tātā”ti tikhiṇaṃ mahāpharasuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1634_8: ukkhipitvā pitu piṭṭhipasse ṭhatvā “makasaṃ paharissāmī”ti pitu matthakaṃ dvidhā
atk-s0513a1:1635: Bodhisatto tassa taṃ kammaṃ disvā “paccāmittopi paṇḍitova seyyo. So hi daṇḍabhayenapi manusse na māressatī”ti cintetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1637: “Seyyo amitto matiyā upeto, na tveva mitto mativippahīno;
atk-s0513a1:1638: ‘Makasaṃ vadhissa’nti hi eḷamūgo, putto pitu abbhidā uttamaṅga”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1639_0: Tattha seyyoti pavaro uttamo. Matiyā upetoti paññāya samannāgato. Eḷamūgoti lālāmukho
atk-s0513a1:1639_1: bālo. Putto pitu abbhidā uttamaṅganti attano bālatāya puttopi hutvā pitu uttamaṅgaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1639_2: matthakaṃ “makasaṃ paharissāmī”ti dvidhā bhindi. Tasmā bālamittato paṇḍitaamittova
atk-s0513a1:1639_3: seyyoti imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā bodhisatto uṭṭhāya yathākammaṃ gato. Vaḍḍhakissapi ñātakā
atk-s0513a1:1640_0: Satthā “evaṃ upāsakā pubbepi ‘makasaṃ paharissāmā’ti paraṃ paharaṇakamanussā ahesuṃyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1640_1: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā gāthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1640_2: vatvā pakkanto paṇḍitavāṇijo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1644_0: Seyyo amittotiidaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ anāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhino dāsiṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1644_1: kathesi. Anāthapiṇḍikassa kira ekā rohiṇī nāma dāsī ahosi. Tassā vīhipaharaṇaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:1644_2: āgantvā mahallikā mātā nipajji, taṃ makkhikā parivāretvā sūciyāvijjhamānā viya khādanti.
atk-s0513a1:1644_3: Sā dhītaraṃ āha – “amma, makkhikā maṃ khādanti, etā vārehī”ti. Sā “vāressāmi, ammā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1644_4: musalaṃ ukkhipitvā “mātu sarīre makkhikā māretvā vināsaṃ pāpessāmī”ti mātaraṃ musalena
atk-s0513a1:1644_5: paharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi. Taṃ disvā “mātā me matā”ti rodituṃ ārabhi. Taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1644_6: seṭṭhissa ārocesuṃ. Seṭṭhi tassā sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā vihāraṃ gantvā sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1644_7: satthu ārocesi. Satthā “na kho, gahapati, esā ‘mātu sarīre makkhikā māressāmī’ti
atk-s0513a1:1644_8: idāneva musalena paharitvā mātaraṃ māresi, pubbepi māresiyevā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1645_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā pituaccayena
atk-s0513a1:1645_1: seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi. Tassāpi rohiṇīyeva nāma dāsī ahosi. Sāpi attano vīhipaharaṇaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1645_2: āgantvā nipannaṃ mātaraṃ “makkhikā me, amma, vārehī”ti vuttā evameva musalena paharitvā
atk-s0513a1:1645_3: mātaraṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā rodituṃ ārabhi. Bodhisatto taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “amittopi
atk-s0513a1:1645_4: hi imasmiṃ loke paṇḍitova seyyo”ti cintetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1648: Passa rohiṇikaṃ jammiṃ, mātaraṃ hantvāna socatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1649_0: Tattha medhāvīti paṇḍito ñāṇī vibhāvī. Yañce bālānukampakoti ettha yanti liṅgavipallāso
atk-s0513a1:1649_1: kato, ceti nāmatthe nipāto. Yo nāma bālo anukampako, tato sataguṇena sahassaguṇena
atk-s0513a1:1649_2: paṇḍito amitto hontopi seyyoyevāti attho. Atha vā yanti paṭisedhanatthe nipāto, no
atk-s0513a1:1649_3: ce bālānukampakoti attho. Jamminti lāmikaṃ dandhaṃ. Mātaraṃ hantvāna socatīti “makkhikā
atk-s0513a1:1649_4: māressāmī”ti mātaraṃ hantvā idāni ayaṃ bālā sayameva rodati paridevati. Iminā kāraṇena
atk-s0513a1:1649_5: imasmiṃ loke amittopi paṇḍito seyyoti bodhisatto paṇḍitaṃ pasaṃsanto imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:1650_0: Satthā “na kho, gahapati, esā idāneva ‘makkhikā māressāmī’ti mātaraṃ ghātesi, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:1650_1: ghātesiyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a1:1650_2: – “tadā mātāyeva mātā ahosi, dhītāyeva dhītā, mahāseṭṭhi pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1654_0: Na ve anatthakusalenāti idaṃ satthā aññatarasmiṃ kosalagāmake viharanto uyyānadūsakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1654_1: ārabbha kathesi. Satthā kira kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno aññataraṃ gāmakaṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:1654_2: Tattheko kuṭumbiko tathāgataṃ nimantetvā attano uyyāne nisīdāpetvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0513a1:1654_3: saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā “bhante, yathāruciyā imasmiṃ uyyāne vicarathā”ti āha. Bhikkhū
atk-s0513a1:1654_4: uṭṭhāya uyyānapālaṃ gahetvā uyyāne vicarantā ekaṃ aṅgaṇaṭṭhānaṃ disvā uyyānapālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1654_5: pucchiṃsu “upāsaka, imaṃ uyyānaṃ aññattha sandacchāyaṃ, imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne na koci
atk-s0513a1:1654_6: rukkho vā gaccho vā atthi, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti? “Bhante, imassa uyyānassa ropanakāle
atk-s0513a1:1654_7: eko gāmadārako udakaṃ siñcanto imasmiṃ ṭhāne rukkhapotake ummūlaṃ katvā mūlappamāṇena
atk-s0513a1:1654_8: udakaṃ siñci. Te rukkhapotakā milāyitvā matā. Iminā kāraṇena idaṃ ṭhānaṃ aṅgaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1654_9: jāta”nti. Bhikkhū satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:1654_10: so gāmadārako idāneva ārāmadūsako, pubbepi ārāmadūsakoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1655_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bārāṇasiyaṃ nakkhattaṃ ghosayiṃsu. Nakkhattabherisaddasavanakālato
atk-s0513a1:1655_1: paṭṭhāya sakalanagaravāsino nakkhattanissitakā hutvā vicaranti. Tadā rañño uyyāne
atk-s0513a1:1655_2: bahū makkaṭā vasanti. Uyyānapālo cintesi “nagare nakkhattaṃ ghuṭṭhaṃ, ime vānare
atk-s0513a1:1655_3: ‘udakaṃ siñcathā’ti vatvā ahaṃ nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti jeṭṭhakavānaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:1655_4: “samma vānarajeṭṭhaka, imaṃ uyyānaṃ tumhākampi bahūpakāraṃ, tumhe ettha pupphaphalapallavāni
atk-s0513a1:1655_5: khādatha, nagare nakkhattaṃ ghuṭṭhaṃ, ahaṃ nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmi. Yāvāhaṃ āgacchāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1655_6: tāva imasmiṃ uyyāne rukkhapotakesu udakaṃ siñcituṃ sakkhissathā”ti pucchi. “Sādhu,
atk-s0513a1:1655_7: siñcissāmī”ti. “Tena hi appamattā hothā”ti udakasiñcanatthāya tesaṃ cammakuṭe ca
atk-s0513a1:1655_8: dārukuṭe ca datvā gato. Vānarā cammakuṭe ceva dārukuṭe ca gahetvā rukkhapotakesu
atk-s0513a1:1655_9: udakaṃ siñcanti. Atha ne vānarajeṭṭhako evamāha “bhonto vānarā, udakaṃ nāma rakkhitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1655_10: tumhe rukkhapotakesu udakaṃ siñcantā uppāṭetvā uppāṭetvā mūlaṃ oloketvā gambhīragatesu
atk-s0513a1:1655_11: mūlesu bahuṃ udakaṃ siñcatha, agambhīragatesu appaṃ, pacchā amhākaṃ udakaṃ dullabhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1656_0: Tasmiṃ samaye eko paṇḍitapuriso rājuyyāne te vānare tathā karonte disvā evamāha “bhonto
atk-s0513a1:1656_1: vānarā, kasmā tumhe rukkhapotake uppāṭetvā uppāṭetvā mūlappamāṇena udakaṃ siñcathā”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1656_2: Te “evaṃ no vānarajeṭṭhako ovadatī”ti āhaṃsu. So taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “aho vata bho
atk-s0513a1:1656_3: bālā apaṇḍitā, ‘atthaṃ karissāmā’ti anatthameva karontī”ti cintetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1659: Hāpeti atthaṃ dummedho, kapi ārāmiko yathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1660_0: Tattha veti nipātamattaṃ. Anatthakusalenāti anatthe anāyatane kusalena, atthe āyatane
atk-s0513a1:1660_1: kāraṇe akusalena vāti attho. Atthacariyāti vuḍḍhikiriyā. Sukhāvahāti evarūpena anatthakusalena
atk-s0513a1:1660_2: kāyikacetasikasukhasaṅkhātassa atthassa cariyā na sukhāvahā, na sakkā āvahitunti
atk-s0513a1:1660_3: attho. Kiṃkāraṇā? Ekanteneva hi hāpeti atthaṃ dummedhoti, bālapuggalo “atthaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1660_4: atthaṃ hāpetvā anatthameva karoti. Kapi ārāmiko yathāti yathā ārāme niyutto ārāmarakkhanako
atk-s0513a1:1660_5: makkaṭo “atthaṃ karissāmī”ti anatthameva karoti, evaṃ yo koci anatthakusalo, tena
atk-s0513a1:1660_6: na sakkā atthacariyaṃ āvahituṃ, so ekaṃsena atthaṃ hāpetiyevāti. Evaṃ so paṇḍito
atk-s0513a1:1660_7: puriso imāya gāthāya vānarajeṭṭhakaṃ garahitvā attano parisaṃ ādāya uyyānā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:1661_0: Satthāpi “na, bhikkhave, esa gāmadārako idāneva ārāmadūsako, pubbepi ārāmadūsakoyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1661_1: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā vānarajeṭṭhako
atk-s0513a1:1661_2: ārāmadūsakagāmadārako ahosi, paṇḍitapuriso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1665_0: Na ve anatthakusalenāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vāruṇidūsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1665_1: Anāthapiṇḍikassa kira sahāyo eko vāruṇivāṇijo tikhiṇaṃ vāruṇiṃ yojetvā hiraññasuvaṇṇādīni
atk-s0513a1:1665_2: gahetvā vikkiṇanto mahājane sannipatite “tāta, tvaṃ mūlaṃ gahetvā vāruṇiṃ dehī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1665_3: antevāsikaṃ āṇāpetvā sayaṃ nhāyituṃ agamāsi. Antevāsiko mahājanassa vāruṇiṃ dento
atk-s0513a1:1665_4: manusse antarantarā loṇasakkharā āharāpetvā khādante disvā “ayaṃ surā aloṇikā bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1665_5: loṇamettha pakkhipissāmī”ti surācāṭiyaṃ nāḷimattaṃ loṇaṃ pakkhipitvā tesaṃ suraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1665_6: adāsi. Te mukhaṃ pūretvā pūretvā chaḍḍetvā “kiṃ te kata”nti pucchiṃsu. “Tumhe suraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1665_7: pivitvā loṇaṃ āharāpente disvā loṇena yojesi”nti. “Evarūpaṃ nāma manāpaṃ vāruṇiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1665_8: nāsesi bālā”ti taṃ garahitvā uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya pakkantā. Vāruṇivāṇijo āgantvā ekampi
atk-s0513a1:1665_9: adisvā “vāruṇipāyakā kahaṃ gatā”ti pucchi, so tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Atha naṃ ācariyo
atk-s0513a1:1665_10: “bāla, evarūpā nāma te surā nāsitā”ti garahitvā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:1665_11: Anāthapiṇḍiko “atthidāni me idaṃ kathāpābhata”nti jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0513a1:1665_12: etamatthaṃ ārocesi. Satthā “na esa, gahapati, idāneva vāruṇidūsako, pubbepi vāruṇidūsakoyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1666_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bārāṇasiyaṃ seṭṭhi ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1666_1: Taṃ upanissāya eko vāruṇivāṇijo jīvati. So tikhiṇaṃ suraṃ yojetvā “imaṃ vikkiṇāhī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1666_2: antevāsikaṃ vatvā nhāyituṃ gato. Antevāsiko tasmiṃ gatamatteyeva surāya loṇaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1666_3: imināva nayena suraṃ vināsesi. Athassa ācariyo āgantvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā seṭṭhissa
atk-s0513a1:1666_4: ārocesi. Seṭṭhi “anatthakusalā nāma bālā ‘atthaṃ karissāmā’ti anatthameva karontī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1669: Hāpeti atthaṃ dummedho, koṇḍañño vāruṇiṃ yathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1670_0: Tattha koṇḍañño vāruṇiṃ yathāti yathā ayaṃ koṇḍaññanāmako antevāsiko “atthaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1670_1: loṇaṃ pakkhipitvā vāruṇiṃ hāpesi parihāpesi vināsesi, evaṃ sabbopi anatthakusalo
atk-s0513a1:1670_2: atthaṃ hāpetīti bodhisatto imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:1671_0: Satthāpi “na esa gahapati idāneva vāruṇidūsako, pubbepi vāruṇidūsakoyevā”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a1:1671_1: anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā vāruṇidūsako idānipi vāruṇidūsakova
atk-s0513a1:1675_0: Anupāyena yo atthanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1675_1: Tañhi bhikkhuṃ satthā “na tvaṃ bhikkhu idāneva dubbaco, pubbepi dubbacoyeva, teneva
atk-s0513a1:1675_2: ca kāraṇena paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ akatvā tiṇhena asinā dvidhā katvā chinno hutvā magge
atk-s0513a1:1675_3: nipatittha, tañca ekakaṃ nissāya purisasahassaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ patta”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1676_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente ekasmiṃ gāmake aññataro brāhmaṇo vedabbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1676_1: nāma mantaṃ jānāti. So kira manto anaggho mahāraho, nakkhattayoge laddhe taṃ mantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1676_2: parivattetvā ākāse ullokite ākāsato sattaratanavassaṃ vassati. Tadā bodhisatto tassa
atk-s0513a1:1676_3: brāhmaṇassa santike sippaṃ uggaṇhāti. Athekadivasaṃ brāhmaṇo bodhisattaṃ ādāya kenacideva
atk-s0513a1:1676_4: karaṇīyena attano gāmā nikkhamitvā cetaraṭṭhaṃ agamāsi, antarāmagge ca ekasmiṃ araññaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:1676_5: pañcasatā pesanakacorā nāma panthaghātaṃ karonti. Te bodhisattañca vedabbabrāhmaṇañca
atk-s0513a1:1676_6: gaṇhiṃsu. Kasmā panete “pesanakacorā”ti vuccanti? Te kira dve jane gahetvā ekaṃ dhanāharaṇatthāya
atk-s0513a1:1676_7: pesenti, tasmā “pesanakacorā”tveva vuccanti. Tepi ca pitāputte gahetvā pitaraṃ “tvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1676_8: amhākaṃ dhanaṃ āharitvā puttaṃ gahetvā yāhī”ti vadanti. Etenupāyena mātudhītaro gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1676_9: mātaraṃ vissajjenti, jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhe gahetvā jeṭṭhabhātikaṃ vissajjenti, ācariyantevāsike
atk-s0513a1:1676_10: gahetvā antevāsikaṃ vissajjenti. Te tasmiṃ kāle vedabbabrāhmaṇaṃ gahetvā bodhisattaṃ vissajjesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1677_0: Bodhisatto ācariyaṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ ekāhadvīhaccayena āgamissāmi, tumhe mā bhāyittha,
atk-s0513a1:1677_1: apica kho pana mama vacanaṃ karotha, ajja dhanavassāpanakanakkhattayogo bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1677_2: mā kho tumhe dukkhaṃ asahantā mantaṃ parivattetvā dhanaṃ vassāpayittha. Sace vassāpessatha,
atk-s0513a1:1677_3: tumhe ca vināsaṃ pāpuṇissatha, ime ca pañcasatā corā”ti evaṃ ācariyaṃ ovaditvā dhanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:1677_4: agamāsi. Corāpi sūriye atthaṅgate brāhmaṇaṃ bandhitvā nipajjāpesuṃ. Taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0513a1:1677_5: pācīnalokadhātuto paripuṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṃ uṭṭhahi. Brāhmaṇo nakkhattaṃ olokento “dhanavassāpanakanakkhattayogo
atk-s0513a1:1677_6: laddho, kiṃ me dukkhena anubhūtena, mantaṃ parivattetvā ratanavassaṃ vassāpetvā corānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1677_7: dhanaṃ datvā yathāsukhaṃ gamissāmī”ti cintetvā core āmantesi “bhonto corā, tumhe
atk-s0513a1:1677_8: maṃ kimatthāya gaṇhathā”ti? “Dhanatthāya, ayyā”ti. “Sace vo, dhanena attho, khippaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1677_9: maṃ bandhanā mocetvā sīsaṃ nhāpetvā ahatavatthāni acchādetvā gandhehi vilimpāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1677_10: pupphāni pilandhāpetvā ṭhapethā”ti. “Corā tassa kathaṃ sutvā tathā akaṃsu”.
atk-s0513a1:1678_0: Brāhmaṇo nakkhattayogaṃ ñatvā mantaṃ parivattetvā ākāsaṃ ullokesi, tāvadeva ākāsato
atk-s0513a1:1678_1: ratanāni patiṃsu. Corā taṃ dhanaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā uttarāsaṅgesu bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā pāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1678_2: Brāhmaṇopi tesaṃ pacchatova agamāsi. Atha te core aññe pañcasatā corā gaṇhiṃsu. “Kimatthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1678_3: amhe gaṇhathā”ti ca vuttā “dhanatthāyā”ti āhaṃsu. “Yadi vo dhanena attho, etaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1678_4: gaṇhatha, eso ākāsaṃ ulloketvā dhanaṃ vassāpesi, amhākampetaṃ eteneva dinna”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1678_5: Corā core vissajjetvā “amhākampi dhanaṃ dehī”ti brāhmaṇaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Brāhmaṇo “ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1678_6: tumhākaṃ dhanaṃ dadeyyaṃ, dhanavassāpanakanakkhattayogo pana ito saṃvaccharamatthake
atk-s0513a1:1678_7: bhavissati. Yadi vo dhanenattho, adhivāsetha, tadā dhanavassaṃ vassāpessāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1678_8: Corā kujjhitvā “ambho, duṭṭhabrāhmaṇa, aññesaṃ idāneva dhanaṃ vassāpetvā amhe aññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1678_9: saṃvaccharaṃ adhivāsāpesī”ti tiṇhena asinā brāhmaṇaṃ dvidhā chinditvā magge chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0513a1:1678_10: vegena anubandhitvā tehi corehi saddhiṃ yujjhitvā te sabbepi māretvā dhanaṃ ādāya
atk-s0513a1:1678_11: puna dve koṭṭhāsā hutvā aññamaññaṃ yujjhitvā aḍḍhateyyāni purisasatāni ghātetvā etena
atk-s0513a1:1678_12: upāyena yāva dve janā avasiṭṭhā ahesuṃ, tāva aññamaññaṃ ghātayiṃsu. Evaṃ taṃ purisasahassaṃ vināsaṃ pattaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1679_0: Te pana dve janā upāyena taṃ dhanaṃ āharitvā ekasmiṃ gāmasamīpe gahanaṭṭhāne dhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1679_1: paṭicchādetvā eko khaggaṃ gahetvā rakkhanto nisīdi, eko taṇḍule gahetvā bhattaṃ pacāpetuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1679_2: gāmaṃ pāvisi. Lobho ca nāmesa vināsamūlamevāti dhanasantike nisinno cintesi “tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1679_3: āgate idaṃ dhanaṃ dve koṭṭhāsā bhavissanti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ taṃ āgatamattameva khaggena
atk-s0513a1:1679_4: paharitvā ghāteyya”nti. So khaggaṃ sannayhitvā tassa āgamanaṃ olokento nisīdi. Itaropi
atk-s0513a1:1679_5: cintesi “taṃ dhanaṃ dve koṭṭhāsā bhavissanti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhatte visaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1679_6: taṃ purisaṃ bhojetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā ekakova dhanaṃ gaṇheyya”nti. So niṭṭhite
atk-s0513a1:1679_7: bhatte sayaṃ bhuñjitvā sesake visaṃ pakkhipitvā taṃ ādāya tattha agamāsi. Taṃ bhattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1679_8: otāretvā ṭhitamattameva itaro khaggena dvidhā chinditvā taṃ paṭicchannaṭṭhāne chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0513a1:1679_9: tañca bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā sayampi tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi. Evañca taṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1680_0: Bodhisattopi kho ekāhadvīhaccayena dhanaṃ ādāya āgato tasmiṃ ṭhāne ācariyaṃ adisvā
atk-s0513a1:1680_1: vippakiṇṇaṃ pana dhanaṃ disvā “ācariyena mama vacanaṃ akatvā dhanaṃ vassāpitaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1680_2: sabbehi vināsaṃ pattehi bhavitabba”nti mahāmaggena pāyāsi. Gacchanto ācariyaṃ mahāmagge
atk-s0513a1:1680_3: dvidhā chinnaṃ disvā “mama vacanaṃ akatvā mato”ti dārūni uddharitvā citakaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:1680_4: ācariyaṃ jhāpetvā vanapupphehi pūjetvā purato gacchanto jīvitakkhayaṃ patte pañcasate,
atk-s0513a1:1680_5: purato aḍḍhateyyasateti anukkamena avasāne dve jane jīvitakkhayaṃ patte disvā cintesi
atk-s0513a1:1680_6: “imaṃ dvīhi ūnaṃ purisasahassaṃ vināsaṃ pattaṃ, aññehi dvīhi corehi bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1680_7: tepi santhambhituṃ na sakkhissanti, kahaṃ nu kho te gatā”ti gacchanto tesaṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1680_8: ādāya gahanaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhamaggaṃ disvā gacchanto bhaṇḍikabaddhassa dhanassa rāsiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1680_9: disvā ekaṃ bhattapātiṃ avattharitvā mataṃ addasa. Tato “idaṃ nāma tehi kataṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1680_10: sabbaṃ ñatvā “kahaṃ nu kho so puriso”ti vicinanto tampi paṭicchannaṭṭhāne apaviddhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1680_11: disvā “amhākaṃ ācariyo mama vacanaṃ akatvā attano dubbacabhāvena attanāpi vināsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1680_12: patto, aparampi tena purisasahassaṃ vināsitaṃ, anupāyena vata akāraṇena attano vuḍḍhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1680_13: patthayamānā amhākaṃ ācariyo viya mahāvināsameva pāpuṇissantī”ti cintetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1683: Cetā haniṃsu vedabbaṃ, sabbe te byasanamajjhagū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1684_0: Tattha so vihaññatīti so anupāyena “attano atthaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ sukhaṃ icchāmī”ti akāle
atk-s0513a1:1684_1: vāyāmaṃ karonto puggalo vihaññati kilamati mahāvināsaṃ pāpuṇāti. Cetāti cetaraṭṭhavāsino
atk-s0513a1:1684_2: corā. Haniṃsu vedabbanti vedabbamantavasena “vedabbo”ti laddhanāmaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ haniṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1684_3: Sabbe te byasanamajjhagūti tepi ca anavasesā aññamaññaṃ ghātayamānā byasanaṃ adhigacchiṃsu paṭilabhiṃsūti.
atk-s0513a1:1685_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto “yathā amhākaṃ ācariyo anupāyena aṭṭhāne parakkamaṃ karonto dhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1685_1: vassāpetvā attanāpi jīvitakkhayaṃ patto, aññesañca vināsapaccayo jāto, evameva yo
atk-s0513a1:1685_2: aññopi anupāyena attano atthaṃ icchanto vāyāmaṃ karissati, sabbo so attanā ca vinassissati,
atk-s0513a1:1685_3: paresañca vināsapaccayo bhavissatī”ti vanaṃ unnādento devatāsu sādhukāraṃ dadamānāsu
atk-s0513a1:1685_4: imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desetvā taṃ dhanaṃ upāyena attano gehaṃ āharitvā dānādīni puññāni
atk-s0513a1:1685_5: karonto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā jīvitapariyosāne saggapathaṃ pūrayamāno agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1686_0: Satthāpi “na tvaṃ bhikkhu idāneva dubbaco, pubbepi dubbacova, dubbacattā pana mahāvināsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1686_1: patto”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā
atk-s0513a1:1686_2: vedabbabrāhmaṇo dubbacabhikkhu ahosi, antevāsiko pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1690_0: Nakkhattaṃ patimānentanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ ājīvakaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1690_1: kathesi. Sāvatthiyaṃ kirekaṃ kuladhītaraṃ janapade eko kulaputto attano puttassa
atk-s0513a1:1690_2: vāretvā “asukadivase nāma gaṇhissāmī”ti divasaṃ ṭhapetvā tasmiṃ divase sampatte attano
atk-s0513a1:1690_3: kulūpakaṃ ājīvakaṃ pucchi “bhante, ajja mayaṃ ekaṃ maṅgalaṃ karissāma, sobhanaṃ nu
atk-s0513a1:1690_4: kho nakkhatta”nti. So “ayaṃ maṃ paṭhamaṃ apucchitvāva divasaṃ ṭhapetvā idāni paṭipucchati,
atk-s0513a1:1690_5: hotu, sikkhāpessāmi na”nti kujjhitvā “ajja asobhanaṃ nakkhattaṃ, mā ajja maṅgalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1690_6: karittha, sace karissatha, mahāvināso bhavissatī”ti āha. Tasmiṃ kule manussā tassa
atk-s0513a1:1690_7: saddahitvā taṃ divasaṃ na gacchiṃsu. Nagaravāsino sabbaṃ maṅgalakiriyaṃ katvā tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1690_8: anāgamanaṃ disvā “tehi ajja divaso ṭhapito, no ca kho āgatā, amhākampi bahu vayakammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1690_9: kataṃ, kiṃ no tehi, amhākaṃ dhītaraṃ aññassa dassāmā”ti yathākateneva maṅgalena dhītaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1691_0: Itare punadivase āgantvā “detha no dārika”nti āhaṃsu. Atha ne sāvatthivāsino “janapadavāsino
atk-s0513a1:1691_1: nāma tumhe gahapatikā pāpamanussā divasaṃ ṭhapetvā avaññāya na āgatā, āgatamaggeneva
atk-s0513a1:1691_2: paṭigacchatha, amhehi aññesaṃ dārikā dinnā”ti paribhāsiṃsu. Te tehi saddhiṃ kalahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1691_3: katvā dārikaṃ alabhitvā yathāgatamaggeneva gatā. Tenapi ājīvakena tesaṃ manussānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1691_4: maṅgalantarāyassa katabhāvo bhikkhūnaṃ antare pākaṭo jāto. Te bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1691_5: sannipatitā “āvuso, ājīvakena kulassa maṅgalantarāyo kato”ti kathayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1691_6: Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchi. Te
atk-s0513a1:1691_7: “imāya nāmā”ti kathayiṃsu. “Na, bhikkhave, idāneva ājīvako tassa kulassa maṅgalantarāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1691_8: karoti, pubbepi esa tesaṃ kujjhitvā maṅgalantarāyaṃ akāsiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1692_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente nagaravāsino janapadavāsīnaṃ dhītaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1692_1: vāretvā divasaṃ ṭhapetvā attano kulūpakaṃ ājīvakaṃ pucchiṃsu “bhante, ajja amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1692_2: ekā maṅgalakiriyā, sobhanaṃ nu kho nakkhatta”nti. So “ime attano ruciyā divasaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:1692_3: idāni maṃ pucchantī”ti kujjhitvā “ajja nesaṃ maṅgalantarāyaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:1692_4: “ajja asobhanaṃ nakkhattaṃ, sace karotha, mahāvināsaṃ pāpuṇissathā”ti āha. Te tassa
atk-s0513a1:1692_5: saddahitvā na gamiṃsu. Janapadavāsino tesaṃ anāgamanaṃ ñatvā “te ajja divasaṃ ṭhapetvāpi
atk-s0513a1:1692_6: na āgatā, kiṃ no tehi, aññesaṃ dhītaraṃ dassāmā”ti aññesaṃ dhītaraṃ adaṃsu. Nagaravāsino
atk-s0513a1:1692_7: punadivase āgantvā dārikaṃ yāciṃsu. Janapadavāsino “tumhe nagaravāsino nāma chinnahirikā
atk-s0513a1:1692_8: gahapatikā, divasaṃ ṭhapetvā dārikaṃ na gaṇhittha, mayaṃ tumhākaṃ anāgamanabhāvena
atk-s0513a1:1692_9: aññesaṃ adamhā”ti. Mayaṃ ājīvakaṃ paṭipucchitvā “‘nakkhattaṃ na sobhana’nti nāgatā,
atk-s0513a1:1692_10: detha no dārika”nti. “Amhehi tumhākaṃ anāgamanabhāvena aññesaṃ dinnā, idāni dinnadārikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1693_0: Evaṃ tesu aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ karontesu eko nagaravāsī paṇḍitapuriso ekena kammena
atk-s0513a1:1693_1: janapadaṃ gato tesaṃ nagaravāsīnaṃ “mayaṃ ājīvakaṃ pucchitvā nakkhattassa asobhanabhāvena
atk-s0513a1:1693_2: nāgatā”ti kathentānaṃ sutvā “nakkhattena ko attho, nanu dārikāya laddhabhāvova nakkhatta”nti
atk-s0513a1:1696: Attho atthassa nakkhattaṃ, kiṃ karissanti tārakā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1697_0: Tattha patimānentanti olokentaṃ, “idāni nakkhattaṃ bhavissati, idāni nakkhattaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1697_1: āgamayamānaṃ. Attho bālaṃ upaccagāti etaṃ nagaravāsikaṃ bālaṃ dārikāpaṭilābhasaṅkhāto
atk-s0513a1:1697_2: attho atikkanto. Attho atthassa nakkhattanti yaṃ atthaṃ pariyesanto carati, so paṭiladdho
atk-s0513a1:1697_3: atthova atthassa nakkhattaṃ nāma. Kiṃ karissanti tārakāti itare pana ākāse tārakā
atk-s0513a1:1697_4: kiṃ karissanti, kataraṃ atthaṃ sādhessantīti attho. Nagaravāsino kalahaṃ katvā dārikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1698_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, esa ājīvako idāneva kulassa maṅgalantarāyaṃ karoti, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:1698_1: akāsiyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a1:1698_2: – “tadā ājīvako etarahi ājīvakova ahosi, tānipi kulāni etarahi kulāniyeva, gāthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1698_3: vatvā ṭhito paṇḍitapuriso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1702: Dummedhānanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lokatthacariyaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Sā dvādasakanipāte mahākaṇhajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:1703_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa rañño aggamahesiyā
atk-s0513a1:1703_1: kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tassa mātukucchito nikkhantassa nāmaggahaṇadivase “brahmadattakumāro”ti
atk-s0513a1:1703_2: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So soḷasavassuddesiko hutvā takkasilāyaṃ sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1703_3: pāraṃ gantvā aṭṭhārasannaṃ vijjaṭṭhānānaṃ nipphattiṃ pāpuṇi, athassa pitā oparajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1703_4: adāsi. Tasmiṃ samaye bārāṇasivāsino devatāmaṅgalikā honti, devatā namassanti, bahū
atk-s0513a1:1703_5: ajeḷakakukkuṭabhūkarādayo vadhitvā nānappakārehi pupphagandhehi ceva maṃsalohitehi
atk-s0513a1:1703_6: ca balikammaṃ karonti. Bodhisatto cintesi “idāni sattā devatāmaṅgalikā, bahuṃ pāṇavadhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1703_7: karonti, mahājano yebhuyyena adhammasmiṃyeva niviṭṭho, ahaṃ pitu accayena rajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1703_8: labhitvā ekampi akilametvā upāyeneva pāṇavadhaṃ kātuṃ na dassāmī”ti. So ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1703_9: rathaṃ abhiruyha nagarā nikkhanto addasa ekasmiṃ mahante vaṭarukkhe mahājanaṃ sannipatitaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1703_10: tasmiṃ rukkhe nibbattadevatāya santike puttadhītuyasadhanādīsu yaṃ yaṃ icchati, taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1703_11: taṃ patthentaṃ. So taṃ disvā rathā oruyha taṃ rukkhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā gandhapupphehi
atk-s0513a1:1703_12: pūjetvā udakena abhisekaṃ katvā rukkhaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā devatāmaṅgaliko viya hutvā
atk-s0513a1:1703_13: devataṃ namassitvā rathaṃ abhiruyha nagaraṃ pāvisi. Tato paṭṭhāya imināva niyāmena
atk-s0513a1:1703_14: antarantare tattha gantvā devatāmaṅgaliko viya pūjaṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a1:1704_0: So aparena samayena pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhāya catasso agatiyo vajjetvā dasa
atk-s0513a1:1704_1: rājadhamme akopento dhammena rajjaṃ kārento cintesi “mayhaṃ manoratho matthakaṃ patto,
atk-s0513a1:1704_2: rajje patiṭṭhitomhi. Yaṃ panāhaṃ pubbe ekaṃ atthaṃ cintayiṃ, idāni taṃ matthakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1704_3: pāpessāmī”ti amacce ca brāhmaṇagahapatikādayo ca sannipātāpetvā āmantesi “jānātha
atk-s0513a1:1704_4: bho mayā kena kāraṇena rajjaṃ patta”nti? “Na jānāma, devā”ti. “Api vohaṃ asukaṃ nāma
atk-s0513a1:1704_5: vaṭarukkhaṃ gandhādīhi pūjetvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā namassamāno diṭṭhapubbo”ti. “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:1704_6: devā”ti. Tadāhaṃ patthanaṃ akāsiṃ “sace rajjaṃ pāpuṇissāmi, balikammaṃ te karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1704_7: “Tassā me devatāya ānubhāvena idaṃ rajjaṃ laddhaṃ, idānissā balikammaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1704_8: tumhe papañcaṃ akatvā khippaṃ devatāya balikammaṃ sajjethā”ti. “Kiṃ kiṃ gaṇhāma,
atk-s0513a1:1704_9: devā”ti? Bho ahaṃ devatāya āyācamāno “ye mayhaṃ rajje pāṇātipātādīni pañca dussīlakammāni
atk-s0513a1:1704_10: dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattissanti, te ghātetvā antavaṭṭimaṃsalohitādīhi
atk-s0513a1:1704_11: balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti āyāciṃ. Tasmā tumhe evaṃ bheriṃ carāpetha “amhākaṃ rājā uparājakāleyeva
atk-s0513a1:1704_12: evaṃ āyāci ‘sacāhaṃ rajjaṃ pāpuṇissāmi, ye me rajje dussīlā bhavissanti, te sabbe
atk-s0513a1:1704_13: ghātetvā balikammaṃ karissāmī’ti, so idāni pañcavidhaṃ dussīlakammaṃ dasavidhaṃ akusalakammapathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1704_14: samādāya vattamānānaṃ dussīlānaṃ sahassaṃ ghātetvā tesaṃ hadayamaṃsādīni gāhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1704_15: devatāya balikammaṃ kātukāmo, evaṃ nagaravāsino jānantū”ti. Evañca pana vatvā “yedāni
atk-s0513a1:1704_16: ito paṭṭhāya dussīlakamme vattissanti, tesaṃ sahassaṃ ghātetvā yaññaṃ yajitvā āyācanato
atk-s0513a1:1707: Idāni khohaṃ yajissāmi, bahu adhammiko jano”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1708_0: Tattha dummedhānaṃ sahassenāti “idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, idaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti ajānanabhāvena,
atk-s0513a1:1708_1: dasasu vā pana akusalakammapathesu samādāya vattanabhāvena duṭṭhā medhā etesanti
atk-s0513a1:1708_2: dummedhā, tesaṃ dummedhānaṃ nippaññānaṃ bālapuggalānaṃ gaṇitvā gahitena sahassena.
atk-s0513a1:1708_3: Yañño me upayācitoti mayā devataṃ upasaṅkamitvā “evaṃ yajissāmī”ti yañño yācito.
atk-s0513a1:1708_4: Idāni khohaṃ yajissāmīti so ahaṃ iminā āyācanena rajjassa paṭiladdhattā idāni yajissāmi.
atk-s0513a1:1708_5: Kiṃkāraṇā? Idāni hi bahu adhammiko jano, tasmā idāneva naṃ gahetvā balikammaṃ karissāmīti.
atk-s0513a1:1709_0: Amaccā bodhisattassa vacanaṃ sutvā “sādhu, devā”ti dvādasayojanike bārāṇasinagare
atk-s0513a1:1709_1: bheriṃ carāpesuṃ. Bheriyā āṇaṃ sutvā ekampi dussīlakammaṃ samādāya ṭhito ekapurisopi
atk-s0513a1:1709_2: nāhosi. Iti yāva bodhisatto rajjaṃ kāresi, tāva ekapuggalopi pañcasu dasasu vā dussīlakammesu
atk-s0513a1:1709_3: ekampi kammaṃ karonto na paññāyittha. Evaṃ bodhisatto ekapuggalampi akilamento sakalaraṭṭhavāsino
atk-s0513a1:1709_4: sīlaṃ rakkhāpetvā sayampi dānādīni puññāni katvā jīvitapariyosāne attano parisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1710_0: Satthāpi “na, bhikkhave, tathāgato idāneva lokassa atthaṃ carati, pubbepi cariyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1710_1: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadāparisā
atk-s0513a1:1710_2: buddhaparisā ahesuṃ, bārāṇasirājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1721_0: Āsīsetheva purisoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ossaṭṭhavīriyaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1721_1: kathesi. Tañhi satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ossaṭṭhavīriyosī”ti pucchi. “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:1721_2: bhante”ti ca vutte “kasmā tvaṃ bhikkhu evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā vīriyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1721_3: ossaji, pubbe paṇḍitā rajjā parihāyitvāpi attano vīriye ṭhatvāva naṭṭhampi yasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1722_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto rañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi
atk-s0513a1:1722_1: nibbatto. Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase “sīlavakumāro”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So soḷasavassuddesikova
atk-s0513a1:1722_2: sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā aparabhāge pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhito mahāsīlavarājā
atk-s0513a1:1722_3: nāma ahosi dhammiko dhammarājā. So nagarassa catūsu dvāresu catasso, majjhe ekaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1722_4: nivesanadvāre ekanti niccaṃ cha dānasālāyo kārāpetvā kapaṇaddhikānaṃ dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0513a1:1722_5: sīlaṃ rakkhati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, khantimettānuddayasampanno aṅke nisinnaṃ puttaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1722_6: paritosayamāno viya sabbasatte paritosayamāno dhammena rajjaṃ kāreti. Tasseko amacco
atk-s0513a1:1722_7: antepure padubbhitvā aparabhāge pākaṭo jāto. Amaccā rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā pariggaṇhanto
atk-s0513a1:1722_8: attanā paccakkhato ñatvā taṃ amaccaṃ pakkosāpetvā “andhabāla ayuttaṃ te kataṃ, na
atk-s0513a1:1722_9: tvaṃ mama vijite vasituṃ arahasi, attano dhanañca puttadāre ca gahetvā aññattha yāhī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1722_10: raṭṭhā pabbājesi. So nikkhamitvā kāsiraṭṭhaṃ atikkamma kosalajanapadaṃ gantvā kosalarājānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1722_11: upaṭṭhahanto anukkamena rañño abbhantariko vissāsiko jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1723_0: So ekadivasaṃ kosalarājānaṃ āha – “deva bārāṇasirajjaṃ nāma nimmakkhikamadhupaṭalasadisaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1723_1: rājā atimuduko, appeneva balavāhanena sakkā bārāṇasirajjaṃ gaṇhitu”nti. Rājā tassa
atk-s0513a1:1723_2: vacanaṃ sutvā “bārāṇasirajjaṃ nāma mahā, ayañca ‘appeneva balavāhanena sakkā bārāṇasirajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1723_3: gaṇhitu’nti āha, kiṃ nu kho pana payuttakacoro siyā”ti cintetvā “payuttakosi maññe”ti
atk-s0513a1:1723_4: āha. “Nāhaṃ, deva, payuttako, saccameva vadāmi. Sace me na saddahatha, manusse pesetvā
atk-s0513a1:1723_5: paccantagāmaṃ hanāpetha, te manusse gahetvā attano santikaṃ nīte dhanaṃ datvā vissajjessatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1723_6: Rājā “ayaṃ ativiya sūro hutvā vadati, vīmaṃsissāmi tāvā”ti attano purise pesetvā
atk-s0513a1:1723_7: paccantagāmaṃ hanāpesi. Manussā te core gahetvā bārāṇasirañño dassesuṃ. Rājā te disvā
atk-s0513a1:1723_8: “tātā, kasmā gāmaṃ hanathā”ti pucchi. “Jīvituṃ asakkontā, devā”ti vutte rājā “atha
atk-s0513a1:1723_9: kasmā mama santikaṃ nāgamittha, itodāni paṭṭhāya evarūpaṃ kammaṃ mā karitthā”ti tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1723_10: dhanaṃ datvā vissajjesi. Te gantvā kosalarañño taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. So ettakenāpi
atk-s0513a1:1723_11: gantuṃ avisahanto puna majjhejanapadaṃ hanāpesi. Tepi core rājā tatheva dhanaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a1:1723_12: vissajjesi. So ettakenāpi agantvā puna pesetvā antaravīthiyaṃ vilumpāpesi, rājā tesampi
atk-s0513a1:1723_13: corānaṃ dhanaṃ datvā vissajjesiyeva. Tadā kosalarājā “ativiya dhammiko rājā”ti ñatvā
atk-s0513a1:1724_0: Tadā pana bārāṇasirañño mattavāraṇepi abhimukhaṃ āgacchante anivattanadhammā asaniyāpi
atk-s0513a1:1724_1: sīse patantiyā asantasanasabhāvā sīlavamahārājassa ruciyā sati sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1724_2: gahetuṃ samatthā sahassamattā abhejjavarasūrā mahāyodhā honti. Te “kosalarājā āgacchatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1724_3: sutvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva, kosalarājā kira ‘bārāṇasirajjaṃ gaṇhissāmī’ti
atk-s0513a1:1724_4: āgacchati, gacchāma, naṃ amhākaṃ rajjasīmaṃ anokkantameva pothetvā gaṇhāmā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1724_5: Rājā “tātā, maṃ nissāya aññesaṃ kilamanakiccaṃ natthi, rajjatthiko rajjaṃ gaṇhātu,
atk-s0513a1:1724_6: māgamitthā”ti nivāresi. Kosalarājā rajjasīmaṃ atikkamitvā janapadamajjhaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1724_7: Amaccā punapi rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tatheva vadiṃsu, rājā purimanayeneva nivāresi.
atk-s0513a1:1724_8: Kosalarājā bahinagare ṭhatvā “rajjaṃ vā detu yuddhaṃ vā”ti sīlavamahārājassa sāsanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1724_9: pesesi. Rājā taṃ sutvā “natthi mayā saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ, rajjaṃ gaṇhātū”ti paṭisāsanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1724_10: pesesi. Punapi amaccā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva, na mayaṃ kosalarañño nagaraṃ pavisituṃ
atk-s0513a1:1724_11: dema, bahinagareyeva naṃ pothetvā gaṇhāmā”ti āhaṃsu, rājā purimanayeneva nivāretvā
atk-s0513a1:1724_12: nagaradvārāni vivarāpetvā saddhiṃ amaccasahassena mahātale pallaṅkamajjhe nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1725_0: Kosalarājā mahantena balavāhanena bārāṇasiṃ pāvisi. So ekampi paṭisattuṃ apassanto
atk-s0513a1:1725_1: rañño nivesanadvāraṃ gantvā amaccagaṇaparivuto apārutadvāre nivesane alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1725_2: mahātalaṃ āruyha nisinnaṃ nirāparādhaṃ sīlavamahārājānaṃ saddhiṃ amaccasahassena
atk-s0513a1:1725_3: gaṇhāpetvā “gacchatha, imaṃ rājānaṃ saddhiṃ amaccehi pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1725_4: āmakasusānaṃ netvā galappamāṇe āvāṭe khanitvā yathā ekopi hatthaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:1725_5: evaṃ paṃsuṃ pakkhipitvā nikhanatha, rattiṃ siṅgālā āgantvā etesaṃ kātabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1725_6: karissantī”ti āha. Manussā corarañño āṇaṃ sutvā rājānaṃ saddhiṃ amaccehi pacchābāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1725_7: gāḷhabandhanaṃ bandhitvā nikkhamiṃsu. Tasmimpi kāle sīlavamahārājā corarañño āghātamattampi
atk-s0513a1:1725_8: nākāsi. Tesupi amaccesu evaṃ bandhitvā nīyamānesu ekopi rañño vacanaṃ bhindituṃ samattho
atk-s0513a1:1725_9: nāma nāhosi. Evaṃ suvinītā kirassa parisā. Atha te rājapurisā sāmaccaṃ sīlavamahārājānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1725_10: āmakasusānaṃ netvā galappamāṇe āvāṭe khanitvā sīlavamahārājānaṃ majjhe, ubhosu passesu
atk-s0513a1:1725_11: sesaamacceti evaṃ sabbepi āvāṭesu otāretvā paṃsuṃ ākiritvā ghanaṃ ākoṭetvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1725_12: Tadā sīlavamahārājā amacce āmantetvā “corarañño upari kopaṃ akatvā mettaṃ eva bhāvetha, tātā”ti ovadi.
atk-s0513a1:1726_0: Atha aḍḍharattasamaye “manussamaṃsaṃ khādissāmā”ti siṅgālā āgamiṃsu. Te disvā rājā
atk-s0513a1:1726_1: ca amaccā ca ekappahāreneva saddamakaṃsu, siṅgālā bhītā palāyiṃsu. Te nivattitvā
atk-s0513a1:1726_2: olokentā pacchato kassaci anāgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā puna paccāgamiṃsu. Itarepi tatheva
atk-s0513a1:1726_3: saddamakaṃsu. Evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ palāyitvā puna olokentā tesu ekassapi anāgamanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1726_4: ñatvā “vajjhappattā ete bhavissantī”ti sūrā hutvā nivattitvā puna tesu saddaṃ karontesupi
atk-s0513a1:1726_5: na palāyiṃsu. Jeṭṭhakasiṅgālo rājānaṃ upagañchi, sesā siṅgālā sesānaṃ amaccānaṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1726_6: agamaṃsu. Upāyakusalo rājā tassa attano santikaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā ḍaṃsituṃ okāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1726_7: dento viya gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā taṃ gīvāya ḍaṃsamānaṃ hanukaṭṭhikena ākaḍḍhitvā yante
atk-s0513a1:1726_8: pakkhipitvā viya gāḷhaṃ gaṇhi, nāgabalena raññā hanukaṭṭhikena ākaḍḍhitvā gīvāya
atk-s0513a1:1726_9: gāḷhaṃ gahitasiṅgālo attānaṃ mocetuṃ asakkonto maraṇabhayatajjito mahāviravaṃ viravi.
atk-s0513a1:1726_10: Avasesā siṅgālā tassa taṃ aṭṭassaraṃ sutvā “ekena purisena suggahito bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1726_11: amacce upasaṅkamituṃ asakkontā maraṇabhayatajjitā sabbe palāyiṃsu. Rañño hanukaṭṭhikena
atk-s0513a1:1726_12: daḷhaṃ katvā gahitasiṅgāle aparāparaṃ sañcarante paṃsu sithilā ahosi. Sopi siṅgālo
atk-s0513a1:1726_13: maraṇabhayabhīto catūhi pādehi rañño uparibhāge paṃsuṃ apabyūhi, rājā paṃsuno sithilabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1726_14: ñatvā siṅgālaṃ vissajjetvā nāgabalo thāmasampanno aparāparaṃ sañcaranto ubho hatthe
atk-s0513a1:1726_15: ukkhipitvā āvāṭamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ olubbha vātacchinnavalāhako viya nikkhamitvā ṭhito
atk-s0513a1:1726_16: amacce assāsetvā paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā sabbe uddharitvā amaccaparivuto āmakasusāne aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1727_0: Tasmiṃ samaye manussā ekaṃ matamanussaṃ āmakasusāne chaḍḍentā dvinnaṃ yakkhānaṃ sīmantarikāya
atk-s0513a1:1727_1: chaḍḍesuṃ. Te yakkhā taṃ matamanussaṃ bhājetuṃ asakkontā “na mayaṃ imaṃ bhājetuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1727_2: sakkoma, ayaṃ sīlavarājā dhammiko, esa no bhājetvā dassati, etassa santikaṃ gacchāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1727_3: taṃ matamanussaṃ pāde gahetvā ākaḍḍhantā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “deva, amhākaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1727_4: matakaṃ bhājetvā dehī”ti āhaṃsu. “Bho yakkhā, ahaṃ imaṃ tumhākaṃ bhājetvā dadeyyaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1727_5: aparisuddho panamhi, nhāyissāmi tāvā”ti. Yakkhā corarañño ṭhapitaṃ vāsitaudakaṃ attano
atk-s0513a1:1727_6: ānubhāvena āharitvā rañño nhānatthāya adaṃsu. Nhatvā ṭhitassa saṃharitvā ṭhapite
atk-s0513a1:1727_7: corarañño sāṭake āharitvā adaṃsu, te nivāsetvā ṭhitassa catujjātiyagandhasamuggaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1727_8: āharitvā adaṃsu, gandhe vilimpitvā ṭhitassa suvaṇṇasamugge maṇitālavaṇṭesu ṭhapitāni
atk-s0513a1:1727_9: nānāpupphāni āharitvā adaṃsu. Pupphāni piḷandhitvā ṭhitakāle “aññaṃ kiṃ karomā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1727_10: pucchiṃsu. Rājā attano chātakākāraṃ dassesi, te gantvā corarañño sampāditaṃ nānaggarasabhojanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1727_11: āharitvā adaṃsu, rājā nhātānulitto sumaṇḍitappasādhito nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñji.
atk-s0513a1:1727_12: Yakkhā corarañño ṭhapitaṃ vāsitapānīyaṃ suvaṇṇabhiṅkāreneva suvaṇṇasarakenapi saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1727_13: āhariṃsu. Athassa pānīyaṃ pivitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā hatthe dhovitvā ṭhitakāle corarañño
atk-s0513a1:1727_14: sampāditaṃ pañcasugandhikasuparibhāvitaṃ tambūlaṃ āharitvā adaṃsu. Taṃ khāditvā ṭhitakāle
atk-s0513a1:1727_15: “aññaṃ kiṃ karomā”ti pucchiṃsu. Gantvā corarañño ussīsake nikkhittaṃ maṅgalakhaggaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1727_16: āharathāti. Tampi gantvā āhariṃsu. Rājā taṃ khaggaṃ gahetvā taṃ matamanussaṃ ujukaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1727_17: ṭhapāpetvā matthakamajjhe asinā paharitvā dve koṭṭhāse katvā dvinnaṃ yakkhānaṃ samavibhattameva
atk-s0513a1:1727_18: vibhajitvā adāsi, datvā ca pana khaggaṃ dhovitvā sannayhitvā aṭṭhāsi. Atha te yakkhā
atk-s0513a1:1727_19: manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā suhitā hutvā tuṭṭhacittā “aññaṃ te, mahārāja, kiṃ karomā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1727_20: pucchiṃsu. Tena hi tumhe attano ānubhāvena maṃ corarañño sirigabbhe otāretha, ime
atk-s0513a1:1727_21: ca amacce attano attano gehesu patiṭṭhāpethāti. Te “sādhu devā”ti sampaṭicchitvā tathā akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1728_0: Tasmiṃ samaye corarājā alaṅkatasirigabbhe sirisayanapiṭṭhe nipanno niddāyati. Rājā
atk-s0513a1:1728_1: tassa pamattassa niddāyantassa khaggatalena udaraṃ pahari. So bhīto pabujjhitvā dīpālokena
atk-s0513a1:1728_2: sīlavamahārājānaṃ sañjānitvā sayanā uṭṭhāya satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ṭhito rājānaṃ āha
atk-s0513a1:1728_3: “mahārāja, evarūpāya rattiyā gahitārakkhe pihitadvāre bhavane ārakkhamanussehi nirokāse
atk-s0513a1:1728_4: ṭhāne khaggaṃ sannayhitvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatto kathaṃ nāma tvaṃ imaṃ sayanapiṭṭhaṃ āgatosī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1728_5: Rājā attano āgamanākāraṃ sabbaṃ vitthārato kathesi. Taṃ sutvā corarājā saṃviggamānaso
atk-s0513a1:1728_6: “mahārāja, ahaṃ manussabhūtopi samāno tumhākaṃ guṇe na jānāmi, paresaṃ lohitamaṃsakhādakehi
atk-s0513a1:1728_7: pana kakkhaḷehi pharusehi yakkhehi tava guṇā ñātā, na dānāhaṃ, narinda, evarūpe sīlasampanne
atk-s0513a1:1728_8: tayi dubbhissāmī”ti khaggaṃ ādāya sapathaṃ katvā rājānaṃ khamāpetvā mahāsayane nipajjāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1728_9: attanā khuddakamañcake nipajjitvā pabhātāya rattiyā uṭṭhite sūriye bheriṃ carāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1728_10: sabbaseniyo ca amaccabrāhmaṇagahapatike ca sannipātāpetvā tesaṃ purato ākāse puṇṇacandaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1728_11: ukkhipanto viya sīlavarañño guṇe kathetvā parisamajjheyeva puna rājānaṃ khamāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1728_12: rajjaṃ paṭicchāpetvā “mahārāja, ito paṭṭhāya tumhākaṃ uppanno corūpaddavo mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1728_13: bhāro, mayā gahitārakkhā tumhe rajjaṃ karothā”ti vatvā pesuññakārakassa āṇaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0513a1:1729_0: Sīlavarājāpi kho alaṅkatapaṭiyatto setacchattassa heṭṭhā sarabhapādake kañcanapallaṅke
atk-s0513a1:1729_1: nisinno attano sampattiṃ oloketvā “ayañca evarūpā sampatti amaccasahassassa ca jīvitapaṭilābho
atk-s0513a1:1729_2: mayi vīriyaṃ akaronte na kiñci abhavissa, vīriyabalena panāhaṃ naṭṭhañca imaṃ yasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1729_3: paṭilabhiṃ, amaccasahassassa ca jīvitadānaṃ adāsiṃ, āsacchedaṃ vata akatvā vīriyameva
atk-s0513a1:1729_4: kattabbaṃ. Katavīriyassa hi phalaṃ nāma evaṃ samijjhatī”ti cintetvā udānavasena imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1732: Passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1733_0: Tattha āsīsethevāti “evāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhanto imamhā dukkhā muccissāmī”ti attano
atk-s0513a1:1733_1: vīriyabalena āsaṃ karotheva. Na nibbindeyya paṇḍitoti paṇḍito upāyakusalo yuttaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:1733_2: vīriyaṃ karonto “ahaṃ imassa vīriyassa phalaṃ na labhissāmī”ti na ukkaṇṭheyya, āsacchedaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1733_3: kareyyāti attho. Passāmi vohaṃ attānanti ettha voti nipātamattaṃ, ahaṃ ajja attānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1733_4: passāmi. Yathā icchiṃ tathā ahūti ahañhi āvāṭe nikhāto tamhā dukkhā muccitvā puna
atk-s0513a1:1733_5: attano rajjasampattiṃ icchiṃ, so ahaṃ imaṃ sampattiṃ pattaṃ attānaṃ passāmi. Yathevāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1733_6: pubbe icchiṃ, tatheva me attā jātoti. Evaṃ bodhisatto “aho vata bho sīlasampannānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1733_7: vīriyaphalaṃ nāma samijjhatī”ti imāya gāthāya udānaṃ udānetvā yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1734_0: Satthāpi imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne ossaṭṭhavīriyo
atk-s0513a1:1734_1: bhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Satthā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā
atk-s0513a1:1734_2: paduṭṭhāmacco devadatto ahosi, amaccasahassaṃ buddhaparisā, sīlavamahārājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1738_0: Vāyametheva purisoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ossaṭṭhavīriyamevārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1738_1: Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ mahājanakajātake āvi bhavissati. Janakarājā pana
atk-s0513a1:1742_0: Tattha vāyamethevāti vāyāmaṃ karotheva. Udakā thalamubbhatanti udakato thalamuttiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1742_1: thale patiṭṭhitaṃ attānaṃ passāmīti. Idhāpi ossaṭṭhavīriyo bhikkhu arahattaṃ patto,
atk-s0513a1:1746_0: Tatheva puṇṇā pātiyoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto visavāruṇiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1746_1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ surādhuttā sannipatitvā mantayiṃsu – “surāmūlaṃ no khīṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1746_2: kahaṃ nu kho labhissāmā”ti. Atheko kakkhaḷadhutto āha “mā cintayittha, attheko upāyo”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1746_4: rājupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati, mayaṃ surāpātiyaṃ visaññīkaraṇaṃ bhesajjaṃ pakkhipitvā āpānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1746_5: sajjetvā nisīditvā anāthapiṇḍikassa āgamanakāle ‘ito ehi mahāseṭṭhī’ti pakkositvā
atk-s0513a1:1746_6: taṃ suraṃ pāyetvā visaññībhūtassa aṅgulimuddikā ca sāṭake ca gahetvā surāmūlaṃ karissāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1746_7: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tathā katvā seṭṭhissa āgamanakāle paṭimaggaṃ gantvā “sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1746_8: ito tāva āgacchatha, ayaṃ amhākaṃ santike atimanāpā surā, thokaṃ pivitvā gacchathā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1746_9: vadiṃsu. Sotāpanno ariyasāvako kiṃ suraṃ pivissati, anatthiko samānopi pana “ime
atk-s0513a1:1746_10: dhutte pariggaṇhissāmī”ti tesaṃ āpānabhūmiṃ gantvā tesaṃ kiriyaṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ surā
atk-s0513a1:1746_11: imehi iminā nāma kāraṇena yojitā”ti ñatvā “ito dāni paṭṭhāya ime ito palāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1746_12: cintetvā āha – “hare duṭṭhadhuttā, tumhe ‘surāpātiyaṃ bhesajjaṃ pakkhipitvā āgatāgate
atk-s0513a1:1746_13: pāyetvā visaññī katvā vilumpissāmā’ti āpānamaṇḍalaṃ sajjetvā nisinnā kevalaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1746_14: suraṃ vaṇṇetha, ekopi taṃ ukkhipitvā pivituṃ na ussahati. Sace ayaṃ ayojitā assa,
atk-s0513a1:1746_15: imaṃ tumheva piveyyāthā”ti te dhutte tajjetvā tato palāpetvā attano gehaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:1746_16: “dhuttehi katakāraṇaṃ tathāgatassa ārocessāmī”ti cintento jetavanaṃ gantvā ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:1746_17: Satthā “idāni tāva gahapati te dhuttā taṃ vañcetukāmā jātā, pubbe pana paṇḍitepi
atk-s0513a1:1746_18: vañcetukāmā ahesu”nti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1747_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bārāṇasiseṭṭhi ahosi. Tadāpete
atk-s0513a1:1747_1: dhuttā evameva sammantetvā suraṃ yojetvā bārāṇasiseṭṭhissa āgamanakāle paṭimaggaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1747_2: gantvā evameva kathayiṃsu. Seṭṭhi anatthikopi hutvā te pariggaṇhitukāmo gantvā tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1747_3: kiriyaṃ oloketvā “idaṃ nāmete kātukāmā, palāpessāmi ne ito”ti cintetvā evamāha “bhonto,
atk-s0513a1:1747_4: dhuttā suraṃ pivitvā rājakulaṃ gantuṃ nāma ayuttaṃ, rājānaṃ disvā puna āgacchanto
atk-s0513a1:1747_5: jānissāmi, tumhe idheva nisīdathā”ti rājupaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paccāgañchi. Dhuttā “ito
atk-s0513a1:1747_6: etha, sāmī”ti. Sopi tattha gantvā bhesajjena saṃyojitā surāpātiyo oloketvā evamāha
atk-s0513a1:1747_7: “bhonto dhuttā tumhākaṃ kiriyā mayhaṃ na ruccati, tumhākaṃ surāpātiyo yathāpūritāva
atk-s0513a1:1747_8: ṭhitā, tumhe kevalaṃ suraṃ vaṇṇetha, na pana pivatha. Sacāyaṃ manāpā assa, tumhepi
atk-s0513a1:1747_9: piveyyātha, imāya pana visasaṃyuttāya bhavitabba”nti tesaṃ manorathaṃ bhindanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1750: Ākāraṇena jānāmi, na cāyaṃ bhaddikā surā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1751_0: Tattha tathevāti yathā mayā gamanakāle diṭṭhā, idānipi imā surāpātiyo tatheva puṇṇā.
atk-s0513a1:1751_1: Aññāyaṃ vattate kathāti yā ayaṃ tumhākaṃ surāvaṇṇanakathā vattati, sā aññāva abhūtā
atk-s0513a1:1751_2: atacchā. Yadi hi esā surā manāpā assa, tumhepi piveyyātha, upaḍḍhapātiyo avasisseyyuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1751_3: Tumhākaṃ pana ekenāpi surā na pītā. Ākāraṇena jānāmīti tasmā iminā kāraṇena jānāmi.
atk-s0513a1:1751_4: Na cāyaṃ bhaddikā surāti “nevāyaṃ bhaddikā surā, visasaṃyojitāya etāya bhavitabba”nti
atk-s0513a1:1751_5: dhutte niggaṇhitvā yathā na puna evarūpaṃ karonti, tathā te tajjetvā vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a1:1751_6: So yāvajīvaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1752: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā dhuttā etarahi dhuttā, bārāṇasiseṭṭhi pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1756_0: Nāyaṃ rukkho durāruhāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ phalakusalaṃ upāsakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1756_1: ārabbha kathesi. Eko kira sāvatthivāsī kuṭumbiko buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0513a1:1756_2: attano ārāme nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā uyyānapālaṃ āṇāpesi “bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1756_3: uyyāne vicaritvā ayyānaṃ ambādīni nānāphalāni dehī”ti. So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā
atk-s0513a1:1756_4: bhikkhūsaṅghamādāya uyyāne vicaranto rukkhaṃ ulloketvāva “etaṃ phalaṃ āmaṃ, etaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1756_5: na supakkaṃ, etaṃ supakka”nti jānāti. Yaṃ so vadati, taṃ tatheva hoti. Bhikkhū gantvā
atk-s0513a1:1756_6: tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ “bhante, ayaṃ uyyānapālo phalakusalo bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitova rukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1756_7: ulloketvā ‘etaṃ phalaṃ āmaṃ, etaṃ na supakkaṃ, etaṃ supakka’nti jānāti. Yaṃ so vadati,
atk-s0513a1:1756_8: taṃ tatheva hotī”ti. Satthā “na, bhikkhave, ayameva uyyānapālo phalakusalo, pubbe
atk-s0513a1:1756_9: paṇḍitāpi phalakusalāyeva ahesu”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1757_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto satthavāhakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:1757_1: vayappatto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi vaṇijjaṃ karonto ekasmiṃ kāle mahāvattaniaṭaviṃ patvā
atk-s0513a1:1757_2: aṭavimukhe ṭhatvā sabbe manusse sannipātāpetvā “imissā aṭaviyā visarukkhā nāma honti,
atk-s0513a1:1757_3: visapattāni, visapupphāni, visaphalāni, visamadhūni hontiyeva, pubbe tumhehi aparibhuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1757_4: yaṃ kiñci pattaṃ vā pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā pallavaṃ vā maṃ aparipucchitvā mā khādathā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1757_5: āha. Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā aṭaviṃ otariṃsu. Aṭavimukhe ca ekasmiṃ gāmadvāre
atk-s0513a1:1757_6: kiṃphalarukkho nāma atthi, tassa khandhasākhāpalāsapupphaphalāni sabbāni ambasadisāneva
atk-s0513a1:1757_7: honti. Na kevalaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānatova, gandharasehipissa āmapakkāni phalāni ambaphalasadisāneva,
atk-s0513a1:1757_8: khāditāni pana halāhalavisaṃ viya taṅkhaṇaññeva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpenti. Purato gacchantā
atk-s0513a1:1757_9: ekacce lolapurisā “amburukkho aya”nti saññāya phalāni khādiṃsu, ekacce “satthavāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1757_10: pucchitvāva khādissāmā”ti hatthena gahetvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Te satthavāhe āgate “ayya, imāni
atk-s0513a1:1757_11: ambaphalāni khādāmā”ti pucchiṃsu. Bodhisatto “nāyaṃ ambarukkho”ti ñatvā “kiṃ phalarukkho
atk-s0513a1:1757_12: nāmesa, nāyaṃ ambarukkho, mā khāditthā”ti vāretvā ye khādiṃsu. Tepi vamāpetvā catumadhuraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1758_0: Pubbe pana imasmiṃ rukkhamūle manussā nivāsaṃ kappetvā “ambaphalānī”ti saññāya imāni
atk-s0513a1:1758_1: visaphalāni khāditvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇanti. Punadivase gāmavāsino nikkhamitvā matamanusse
atk-s0513a1:1758_2: disvā pāde gaṇhitvā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne chaḍḍetvā sakaṭehi saddhiṃyeva sabbaṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1758_3: santakaṃ gahetvā gacchanti. Te taṃ divasampi aruṇuggamanakāleyeva “mayhaṃ balibaddo
atk-s0513a1:1758_4: bhavissati, mayhaṃ sakaṭaṃ, mayhaṃ bhaṇḍa”nti vegena taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ gantvā manusse
atk-s0513a1:1758_5: niroge disvā “kathaṃ tumhe imaṃ rukkhaṃ ‘nāyaṃ ambarukkho’ti jānitthā”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1758_6: Te “mayaṃ na jānāma, satthavāhajeṭṭhako no jānātī”ti āhaṃsu. Manussā bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1758_7: pucchiṃsu “paṇḍita, kinti katvā tvaṃ imassa rukkhassa anambarukkhabhāvaṃ aññāsī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1758_8: So “dvīhi kāraṇehi aññāsi”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1762_0: Tattha nāyaṃ rukkho durāruhoti ayaṃ visarukkho na dukkhāruho, ukkhipitvā ṭhapitanisseṇī
atk-s0513a1:1762_1: viya sukhenārohituṃ sakkāti vadati. Napi gāmato ārakāti gāmato dūre ṭhitopi na hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1762_2: gāmadvāre ṭhitoyevāti dīpeti. Ākāraṇena jānāmīti iminā duvidhena kāraṇenāhaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1762_3: rukkhaṃ jānāmi. Kinti? Nāyaṃ sāduphalo dumoti. Sace hi ayaṃ madhuraphalo ambarukkho
atk-s0513a1:1762_4: abhavissa, evaṃ sukhāruḷhe avidūre ṭhite etasmiṃ ekampi phalaṃ na tiṭṭheyya, phalakhādakamanussehi
atk-s0513a1:1762_5: niccaṃ parivutova assa. Evaṃ ahaṃ attano ñāṇena paricchinditvā imassa visarukkhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1762_6: aññāsinti mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā sotthigamanaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1763_0: Satthāpi “evaṃ, bhikkhave, pubbe paṇḍitāpi phalakusalā ahesu”nti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1763_1: āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā parisā buddhaparisā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1767_0: Yo alīnena cittenāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ossaṭṭhavīriyaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1767_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tañhi bhikkhuṃ satthā āmantetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ossaṭṭhavīriyosī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1767_2: pucchitvā “saccaṃ, bhagavā”ti vutte “bhikkhu pubbe paṇḍitā vīriyaṃ kātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:1767_3: vīriyaṃ katvā rajjasampattiṃ pāpuṇiṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1768_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa rañño aggamahesiyā
atk-s0513a1:1768_1: kucchismiṃ nibbatti. Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase aṭṭhasate brāhmaṇe sabbakāmehi santappetvā
atk-s0513a1:1768_2: lakkhaṇāni pucchiṃsu. Lakkhaṇakusalā brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā “puññasampanno,
atk-s0513a1:1768_3: mahārāja, kumāro tumhākaṃ accayena rajjaṃ pāpuṇissati, pañcāvudhakamme paññāto pākaṭo
atk-s0513a1:1768_4: jambudīpe aggapuriso bhavissatī”ti byākariṃsu. Rājā brāhmaṇānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā kumārassa
atk-s0513a1:1768_5: nāmaṃ gaṇhanto “pañcāvudhakumāro”ti nāmaṃ akāsi. Atha naṃ viññutaṃ patvā soḷasavassuddese
atk-s0513a1:1768_6: ṭhitaṃ rājā āmantetvā “tāta, sippaṃ uggaṇhāhī”ti āha. “Kassa santike uggaṇhāmi, devā”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1768_7: “Gaccha, tāta, gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilanagare disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike
atk-s0513a1:1768_8: uggaṇha, idañcassa ācariyabhāgaṃ dajjeyyāsī”ti sahassaṃ datvā uyyojesi. So tattha
atk-s0513a1:1768_9: gantvā sippaṃ sikkhitvā ācariyena dinnaṃ pañcāvudhaṃ gahetvā ācariyaṃ vanditvā takkasilanagarato
atk-s0513a1:1769_0: So antarāmagge silesalomayakkhena nāma adhiṭṭhitaṃ ekaṃ aṭaviṃ pāpuṇi. Atha naṃ aṭavimukhe
atk-s0513a1:1769_1: manussā disvā “bho māṇava, mā imaṃ aṭaviṃ pavisa, silesalomayakkho nāmettha atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1769_2: so diṭṭhadiṭṭhe manusse jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetī”ti vārayiṃsu. Bodhisatto attānaṃ takkento
atk-s0513a1:1769_3: asambhītakesarasīho viya aṭaviṃ pāvisiyeva. Tasmiṃ aṭavimajjhaṃ sampatte so yakkho
atk-s0513a1:1769_4: tālamatto hutvā kūṭāgāramattaṃ sīsaṃ pattappamāṇāni akkhīni, dakalimakuḷamattā dve
atk-s0513a1:1769_5: dāṭhā ca māpetvā setamukho kabarakucchi nīlahatthapādo hutvā bodhisattassa attānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1769_6: dassetvā “kahaṃ yāsi, tiṭṭha bhakkhosi me”ti āha. Atha naṃ bodhisatto “yakkha, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1769_7: attānaṃ takketvā idha paviṭṭho, tvaṃ appamatto hutvā maṃ upagaccheyyāsi. Visapītena
atk-s0513a1:1769_8: hi sarena taṃ vijjhitvā ettheva pātessāmī”ti santajjetvā halāhalavisapītaṃ saraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1769_9: sannayhitvā muñci, so yakkhassa lomesuyeva allīyi. Tato aññaṃ, tato aññanti evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1769_10: paññāsa sare muñci, sabbe tassa lomesuyeva allīyiṃsu. Yakkho sabbepi te sare phoṭetvā
atk-s0513a1:1770_0: Bodhisatto punapi taṃ tajjetvā khaggaṃ kaḍḍhitvā pahari, tettiṃsaṅgulāyato khaggo
atk-s0513a1:1770_1: lomesuyeva allīyi. Atha naṃ kaṇayena pahari, sopi lomesuyeva allīyi. Tassa allīnabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1770_2: ñatvā muggarena pahari, sopi lomesuyeva allīyi. Tassa allīnabhāvaṃ ñatvā kuntena
atk-s0513a1:1770_3: pahari, sopi lomesuyeva allīyi. Tassa allīnabhāvaṃ ñatvā “bho yakkhana, te ahaṃ ‘pañcāvudhakumāro
atk-s0513a1:1770_4: nāmā’ti sutapubbo, ahaṃ tayā adhiṭṭhitaṃ aṭaviṃ pavisanto na dhanuādīni takketvā
atk-s0513a1:1770_5: paviṭṭho, attānaṃyeva pana takketvā paviṭṭho, ajja taṃ pothetvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1770_6: unnādento attānaṃ takketvā dakkhiṇahatthena yakkhaṃ pahari, hattho lomesuyeva allīyi.
atk-s0513a1:1770_7: Vāmahatthena pahari, sopi allīyi. Dakkhiṇapādena pahari, sopi allīyi. Vāmapādena
atk-s0513a1:1770_8: pahari, sopi allīyi. “Sīsena taṃ pothetvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karissāmī”ti sīsena pahari,
atk-s0513a1:1770_9: tampi lomesuyeva allīyi. So pañcoḍḍito pañcasu ṭhānesu baddho olambantopi nibbhayo nissārajjova ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1771_0: Yakkho cintesi “ayaṃ eko purisasīho purisājānīyo, na purisamattova, mādisena nāmassa
atk-s0513a1:1771_1: yakkhena gahitassa santāsamattampi na bhavissati, mayā imaṃ maggaṃ hanantena ekopi
atk-s0513a1:1771_2: evarūpo puriso na diṭṭhapubbo, kasmā nu kho esa na bhāyatī”ti. So taṃ khādituṃ avisahanto
atk-s0513a1:1771_3: “kasmā nu kho, tvaṃ māṇava, maraṇabhayaṃ na bhāyasī”ti pucchi. “Kiṃkāraṇā, yakkha,
atk-s0513a1:1771_4: bhāyissāmi. Ekasmiñhi attabhāve ekaṃ maraṇaṃ niyatameva, apica mayhaṃ kucchimhi vajirāvudhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1771_5: atthi. Sace maṃ khādissasi, taṃ āvudhaṃ jīrāpetuṃ na sakkhissasi, taṃ te antāni khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1771_6: chinditvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessati. Iti ubhopi nassissāma, iminā kāraṇenāhaṃ na bhāyāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1771_7: Idaṃ kira bodhisatto attano abbhantare ñāṇāvudhaṃ sandhāya kathesi. Taṃ sutvā yakkho
atk-s0513a1:1771_8: cintesi “ayaṃ māṇavo saccameva bhaṇati, imassa purisasīhassa sarīrato muggabījamattampi
atk-s0513a1:1771_9: maṃsakhaṇḍaṃ mayhaṃ kucchi jīretuṃ na sakkhissati, vissajjessāmi na”nti maraṇabhayatajjito
atk-s0513a1:1771_10: bodhisattaṃ vissajjetvā “māṇava, purisasīho tvaṃ, na te ahaṃ maṃsaṃ khādissāmi, tvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1771_11: ajja rāhumukhā muttacando viya mama hatthato muccitvā ñātisuhajjamaṇḍalaṃ tosento yāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1772_0: Atha naṃ bodhisatto āha – “yakkha, ahaṃ tāva gacchissāmi, tvaṃ pana pubbepi akusalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1772_1: katvā luddo lohitapāṇi pararuhiramaṃsabhakkho yakkho hutvā nibbatto. Sace idhāpi
atk-s0513a1:1772_2: ṭhatvā akusalameva karissasi, andhakārā andhakārameva gamissasi, maṃ diṭṭhakālato
atk-s0513a1:1772_3: paṭṭhāya pana na sakkā tayā akusalaṃ kātuṃ, pāṇātipātakammaṃ nāma niraye tiracchānayoniyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1772_4: pettivisaye asurakāye ca nibbatteti, manussesu nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne appāyukasaṃvattanikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1772_5: hotī”ti evamādinā nayena pañcannaṃ dussīlyakammānaṃ ādīnavaṃ, pañcannaṃ sīlānaṃ ānisaṃsañca
atk-s0513a1:1772_6: kathetvā nānākāraṇehi yakkhaṃ tajjetvā dhammaṃ desetvā dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:1772_7: pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā tassāyeva naṃ aṭaviyā balipaṭiggāhakaṃ devataṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:1772_8: appamādena ovaditvā aṭavito nikkhamitvā aṭavimukhe manussānaṃ ācikkhitvā sannaddhapañcāvudho
atk-s0513a1:1772_9: bārāṇasiṃ gantvā mātāpitaro disvā aparabhāge rajje patiṭṭhāya dhammena rajjaṃ kārento
atk-s0513a1:1773: Satthāpi imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1778_0: Tatrāyaṃ piṇḍattho – yo puriso alīnena asaṃkuṭitena cittena pakatiyāpi alīnamano
atk-s0513a1:1778_1: alīnajjhāsayova hutvā anavajjaṭṭhena kusalaṃ sattatiṃ sabodhipakkhiyabhedaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1778_2: bhāveti vaḍḍheti, visālena cittena vipassanaṃ anuyuñjati catūhi yogehi khemassa nibbānassa
atk-s0513a1:1778_3: pattiyā, so evaṃ sabbasaṅkhāresu “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0513a1:1778_4: taruṇavipassanato paṭṭhāya uppanne bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhāvento anupubbena ekasaṃyojanampi
atk-s0513a1:1779_0: Evaṃ satthā arahattena dhammadesanāya kūṭaṃ gahetvā matthake cattāri saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1779_1: saccapariyosāne so bhikkhu arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Satthā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a1:1779_2: – “tadā yakkho aṅgulimālo ahosi, pañcāvudhakumāro pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1783_0: Yo pahaṭṭhena cittenāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1783_1: kathesi. Eko kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā ratanasāsane
atk-s0513a1:1783_2: uraṃ datvā pabbaji. Athassa ācariyupajjhāyā “āvuso, ekavidhena sīlaṃ nāma, duvidhena,
atk-s0513a1:1783_3: tividhena, catubbidhena, pañcavidhena, chabbidhena, sattavidhena, aṭṭhavidhena, navavidhena,
atk-s0513a1:1783_4: dasavidhena, bahuvidhena sīlaṃ nāma. Idaṃ cūḷasīlaṃ nāma, idaṃ majjhimasīlaṃ nāma,
atk-s0513a1:1783_5: idaṃ mahāsīlaṃ nāma. Idaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ nāma, idaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ nāma,
atk-s0513a1:1783_6: idaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ nāma, idaṃ paccayapaṭisevanasīlaṃ nāmā”ti sīlaṃ ācikkhanti.
atk-s0513a1:1783_7: So cintesi “idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma atibahu, ahaṃ ettakaṃ samādāya vattituṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1783_8: sīlaṃ pūretuṃ asakkontassa ca nāma pabbajjāya ko attho, ahaṃ gihī hutvā dānādīni
atk-s0513a1:1783_9: puññāni ca karissāmi, puttadārañca posessāmī”ti. Evañca pana cintetvā “bhante, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1783_10: sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkhissāmi, asakkontassa ca nāma pabbajjāya ko attho, ahaṃ hīnāyāvattissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1784_0: Atha naṃ āhaṃsu “āvuso evaṃ sante dasabalaṃ vanditvāva yāhī”ti te taṃ ādāya satthu
atk-s0513a1:1784_1: santikaṃ dhammasabhaṃ agamaṃsu. Satthā disvāva “kiṃ, bhikkhave, anatthikaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1784_2: ādāya āgatatthā”ti āha. Bhante, ayaṃ bhikkhu “ahaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1784_3: pattacīvaraṃ niyyādeti, atha naṃ mayaṃ gahetvā āgatamhāti. “Kasmā pana tumhe, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:1784_4: imassa bhikkhuno bahuṃ sīlaṃ ācikkhatha. Yattakaṃ esa rakkhituṃ sakkoti, tattakameva
atk-s0513a1:1784_5: rakkhissati. Ito paṭṭhāya tumhe etaṃ mā kiñci avacuttha, ahamettha kattabbaṃ jānissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1784_6: ehi tvaṃ bhikkhu, kiṃ te bahunā sīlena, tīṇiyeva sīlāni rakkhituṃ sakkhissasī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1784_7: “Rakkhissāmi, bhante”ti. Tena hi tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya kāyadvāraṃ vacīdvāraṃ manodvāranti
atk-s0513a1:1784_8: tīṇi dvārāni rakkha, mā kāyena pāpakammaṃ kari, mā vācāya, mā manasā. “Gaccha mā
atk-s0513a1:1784_9: hīnāyāvatti, imāni tīṇiyeva sīlāni rakkhā”ti. Ettāvatā so bhikkhu tuṭṭhamānaso “sādhu,
atk-s0513a1:1784_10: bhante, rakkhissāmi imāni tīṇi sīlānī”ti satthāraṃ vanditvā ācariyupajjhāyehi saddhiṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:1784_11: agamāsi. So tāni tīṇi sīlāni pūrentova aññāsi “ācariyupajjhāyehi mayhaṃ ācikkhitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1784_12: sīlampi ettakameva, te pana attano abuddhabhāvena maṃ bujjhāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu, sammāsambuddho
atk-s0513a1:1784_13: attano buddhasubuddhatāya anuttaradhammarājatāya ettakaṃ sīlaṃ tīsuyeva dvāresu pakkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1784_14: maṃ gaṇhāpesi, avassayo vata me satthā jāto”ti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā katipāheneva
atk-s0513a1:1785_0: Taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā bhikkhū “āvuso, taṃ kira bhikkhuṃ ‘bahusīlāni
atk-s0513a1:1785_1: rakkhituṃ na sakkomī’ti hīnāyāvattantaṃ sabbāni sīlāni tīhi koṭṭhāsehi saṅkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1785_2: gāhāpetvā satthā arahattaṃ pāpesi, aho buddhānaṃ balaṃ nāma acchariya”nti buddhaguṇe
atk-s0513a1:1785_3: kathentā nisīdiṃsu. Atha satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0513a1:1785_4: sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “bhikkhave, atigarukopi bhāro koṭṭhāsavasena
atk-s0513a1:1785_5: bhājetvā dinno lahuko viya hoti, pubbepi paṇḍitā mahantaṃ kañcanakkhandhaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1785_6: ukkhipituṃ asakkontā vibhāgaṃ katvā ukkhipitvā agamaṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1786_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ gāmake kassako ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1786_1: So ekadivasaṃ aññatarasmiṃ chaḍḍitagāmake khette kasiṃ kasati. Pubbe ca tasmiṃ gāme
atk-s0513a1:1786_2: eko vibhavasampanno seṭṭhi ūrumattapariṇāhaṃ catuhatthāyāmaṃ kañcanakkhandhaṃ nidahitvā
atk-s0513a1:1786_3: kālamakāsi. Tasmiṃ bodhisattassa naṅgalaṃ lagitvā aṭṭhāsi. So “mūlasantānakaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1786_4: paṃsuṃ viyūhanto taṃ disvā paṃsunā paṭicchādetvā divasaṃ kasitvā atthaṅgate sūriye
atk-s0513a1:1786_5: yuganaṅgalādīni ekamante nikkhipitvā “kañcanakkhandhaṃ gaṇhitvā gacchissāmī”ti taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1786_6: ukkhipituṃ nāsakkhi. Asakkonto nisīditvā “ettakaṃ kucchibharaṇāya bhavissati, ettakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1786_7: nidahitvā ṭhapessāmi, ettakena kammante payojessāmi, ettakaṃ dānādipuññakiriyāya
atk-s0513a1:1786_8: bhavissatī”ti cattāro koṭṭhāse akāsi. Tassevaṃ vibhattakāle so kañcanakkhandho sallahuko
atk-s0513a1:1786_9: viya ahosi. So taṃ ukkhipitvā gharaṃ netvā catudhā vibhajitvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1787: Iti bhagavā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
