atk-s0513a1:1792: Tattha pahaṭṭhenāti vinīvaraṇena. Pahaṭṭhamanasoti tāya eva vinīvaraṇatāya pahaṭṭhamānaso, suvaṇṇaṃ viya pahaṃsitvā samujjotitasappabhāsacitto hutvāti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1793: Evaṃ satthā arahattakūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kañcanakkhandhaladdhapuriso ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1797_0: Yassete caturo dhammāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattassa vadhāya parisakkanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1797_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tasmiñhi samaye satthā “devadatto vadhāya parisakkatī”ti sutvā “na,
atk-s0513a1:1797_2: bhikkhave, idāneva devadatto mayhaṃ vadhāya parisakkati, pubbepi parisakkiyeva, tāsamattampi
atk-s0513a1:1797_3: pana kātuṃ nāsakkhī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1798_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kapiyoniyaṃ nibbattitvā vuḍḍhimanvāya
atk-s0513a1:1798_1: assapotakappamāṇo thāmasampanno ekacaro hutvā nadītīre viharati. Tassā pana nadiyā
atk-s0513a1:1798_2: vemajjhe eko dīpako nānappakārehi ambapanasādīhi phalarukkhehi sampanno. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1798_3: nāgabalo thāmasampanno nadiyā orimatīrato uppatitvā dīpakassa orato nadīmajjhe eko
atk-s0513a1:1798_4: piṭṭhipāsāṇo atthi, tasmiṃ nipatati, tato uppatitvā tasmiṃ dīpake patati. Tattha
atk-s0513a1:1798_5: nānappakārāni phalāni khāditvā sāyaṃ teneva upāyena paccāgantvā attano vasanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:1798_6: vasitvā punadivasepi tatheva karoti. Iminā niyāmena tattha vāsaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0513a1:1799_0: Tasmiṃ pana kāle eko kumbhīlo sapajāpatiko tassā nadiyā vasati. Tassa bhariyā bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1799_1: aparāparaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā bodhisattassa hadayamaṃse dohaḷaṃ uppādetvā kumbhīlaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1799_2: āha – “mayhaṃ kho, ayya, imassa vānarindassa hadayamaṃse dohaḷo uppanno”ti. Kumbhīlo
atk-s0513a1:1799_3: “sādhu, bhadde, lacchasī”ti vatvā “ajja taṃ sāyaṃ dīpakato āgacchantameva gaṇhissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1800_0: Bodhisatto divasaṃ caritvā sāyanhasamaye dīpake ṭhitova pāsāṇaṃ oloketvā – “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1800_1: pāsāṇo idāni uccataro khāyati, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti cintesi. Tassa kira udakappamāṇañca
atk-s0513a1:1800_2: pāsāṇappamāṇañca suvavatthāpitameva hoti. Tenassa etadahosi “ajja imissā nadiyā udakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1800_3: neva hāyati, na ca vaḍḍhati, atha ca panāyaṃ pāsāṇo mahā hutvā paññāyati, kacci nu
atk-s0513a1:1800_4: kho ettha mayhaṃ gahaṇatthāya kumbhīlo nipanno”ti. So “vīmaṃsāmi tāva na”nti tattheva
atk-s0513a1:1800_5: ṭhatvā pāsāṇena saddhiṃ kathento viya “bho pāsāṇā”ti vatvā paṭivacanaṃ alabhanto
atk-s0513a1:1800_6: yāvatatiyaṃ “bho pāsāṇā”ti āha. Pāsāṇo kiṃ paṭivacanaṃ dassati. Punapi vānaro “kiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1800_7: bho pāsāṇa, ajja mayhaṃ paṭivacanaṃ na desī”ti āha. Kumbhīlo “addhā aññesu divasesu
atk-s0513a1:1800_8: ayaṃ pāsāṇo vānarindassa paṭivacanaṃ adāsi, dassāmi dānissa paṭivacana”nti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:1800_9: “kiṃ, bho vānarindā”ti āha. “Kosi tva”nti? “Ahaṃ kumbhīlo”ti. “Kimatthaṃ ettha nipannosī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1800_10: “Tava hadayamaṃsaṃ patthayamāno”ti. Bodhisatto cintesi “añño me gamanamaggo natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1800_11: ajja mayā esa kumbhīlo vañcetabbo”ti. Atha naṃ evamāha “samma kumbhīla, ahaṃ attānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1800_12: tuyhaṃ pariccajissāmi, tvaṃ mukhaṃ vivaritvā maṃ tava santikaṃ āgatakāle gaṇhāhī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1800_13: Kumbhīlānañhi mukhe vivaṭe akkhīni nimmīlanti. So taṃ kāraṇaṃ asallakkhetvā mukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1800_14: vivari, athassa akkhīni pithīyiṃsu. So mukhaṃ vivaritvā akkhīni nimmīletvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:1800_15: Bodhisatto tathābhāvaṃ ñatvā dīpakā uppatito gantvā kumbhīlassa matthake akkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:1800_16: tato uppatito vijjulatā viya vijjotamāno paratīre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1801_0: Kumbhīlo taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā “iminā vānarindena atiaccherakaṃ kata”nti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:1801_1: “bho vānarinda, imasmiṃ loke catūhi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo paccāmitte adhibhavati.
atk-s0513a1:1801_2: Te sabbepi tuyhaṃ abbhantare atthi maññe”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1804: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, diṭṭhaṃ so ativattatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1805_0: Tattha yassāti yassa kassaci puggalassa. Eteti idāni vattabbe paccakkhato niddisati.
atk-s0513a1:1805_1: Caturo dhammāti cattāro guṇā. Saccanti vacīsaccaṃ, “mama santikaṃ āgamissāmī”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a1:1805_2: musāvādaṃ akatvā āgatoyevāti etaṃ te vacīsaccaṃ. Dhammoti vicāraṇapaññā, “evaṃ kate
atk-s0513a1:1805_3: idaṃ nāma bhavissatī”ti esā te vicāraṇapaññā atthi. Dhitīti abbocchinnaṃ vīriyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1805_4: vuccati, etampi te atthi. Cāgoti attapariccāgo, tvaṃ attānaṃ pariccajitvā mama santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1805_5: āgato. Yaṃ panāhaṃ gaṇhituṃ nāsakkhiṃ, mayhamevesa doso. Diṭṭhanti paccāmittaṃ. So
atk-s0513a1:1805_6: ativattatīti yassa puggalassa yathā tava, evaṃ ete cattāro dhammā atthi, so yathā
atk-s0513a1:1805_7: maṃ ajja tvaṃ atikkanto, tatheva attano paccāmittaṃ atikkamati abhibhavatīti. Evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1805_8: kumbhīlo bodhisattaṃ pasaṃsitvā attano vasaṭṭhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1806_0: Satthāpi “na, bhikkhave, devadatto idāneva mayhaṃ vadhāya parisakkati, pubbepi parisakkiyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1806_1: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kumbhīlo
atk-s0513a1:1806_2: devadatto ahosi, bhariyāssa ciñcamāṇavikā, vānarindo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1810: Yassa ete tayo dhammāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattassa vadhāya parisakkanamevārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1811_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente devadatto vānarayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:1811_1: himavantappadese yūthaṃ pariharanto attānaṃ paṭicca jātānaṃ vānarapotakānaṃ “vuḍḍhippattā
atk-s0513a1:1811_2: ime yūthaṃ parihareyyu”nti bhayena dantehi ḍaṃsitvā tesaṃ bījāni uppāṭeti. Tadā bodhisattopi
atk-s0513a1:1811_3: taññeva paṭicca ekissā vānariyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Atha sā vānarī gabbhassa
atk-s0513a1:1811_4: patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā attano gabbhaṃ anurakkhamānā aññaṃ pabbatapādaṃ agamāsi. Sā
atk-s0513a1:1811_5: paripakkagabbhā bodhisattaṃ vijāyi. So vuḍḍhimanvāya viññutaṃ patto thāmasampanno
atk-s0513a1:1811_6: ahosi. So ekadivasaṃ mātaraṃ pucchi “amma, mayhaṃ pitā kaha”nti? “Tāta, asukasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1811_7: nāma pabbatapāde yūthaṃ pariharanto vasatī”ti. “Amma, tassa maṃ santikaṃ nehī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1811_8: “Tāta, na sakkā tayā pitu santikaṃ gantuṃ. Pitā hi te attānaṃ paṭicca jātānaṃ vānarapotakānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1811_9: yūthapariharaṇabhayena dantehi ḍaṃsitvā bījāni uppāṭetī”ti. “Amma, nehi maṃ tattha,
atk-s0513a1:1811_10: ahaṃ jānissāmī”ti. Sā puttaṃ ādāya tassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1812_0: So vānaro attano puttaṃ disvāva “ayaṃ vaḍḍhanto mayhaṃ yūthaṃ pariharituṃ na dassati,
atk-s0513a1:1812_1: idāneva māretabbo”ti “etaṃ āliṅganto viya gāḷhaṃ pīḷetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1812_2: cintetvā “ehi, tāta, ettakaṃ kālaṃ kahaṃ gatosī”ti bodhisattaṃ āliṅganto viya nippīḷesi.
atk-s0513a1:1812_3: Bodhisatto pana nāgabalo thāmasampanno, sopi naṃ nippīḷesi, athassa aṭṭhīni bhijjanākārappattāni
atk-s0513a1:1812_4: ahesuṃ. Athassa etadahosi “ayaṃ vaḍḍhanto maṃ māressati, kena nu kho upāyena puretaraññeva
atk-s0513a1:1812_5: māreyya”nti. Tato cintesi “ayaṃ avidūre rakkhasapariggahito saro atthi, tattha naṃ
atk-s0513a1:1812_6: rakkhasena khādāpessāmī”ti. Atha naṃ evamāha “tāta, ahaṃ mahallako, imaṃ yūthaṃ tuyhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1812_7: niyyādemi, ajjeva taṃ rājānaṃ karomi, asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne saro atthi, tattha dve
atk-s0513a1:1812_8: kumudiniyo, tisso uppaliniyo, pañca paduminiyo ca pupphanti, gaccha, tato pupphāni
atk-s0513a1:1812_9: āharā”ti. So “sādhu, tāta, āharissāmī”ti gantvā sahasā anotaritvā samantā padaṃ paricchindanto
atk-s0513a1:1812_10: otiṇṇapadaññeva addasa, na uttiṇṇapadaṃ. So “iminā sarena rakkhasapariggahitena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1812_11: mayhaṃ pitā attanā māretuṃ asakkonto rakkhasena maṃ khādāpetukāmo bhavissati, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1812_12: imañca saraṃ na otarissāmi, pupphāni ca gahessāmī”ti nirudakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vegaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1812_13: gahetvā uppatitvā parato gacchanto nirudake okāse ṭhitāneva dve pupphāni gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1812_14: paratīre pati. Paratīratopi orimatīraṃ āgacchanto tenevupāyena dve gaṇhi. Evaṃ ubhosu
atk-s0513a1:1812_15: passesu rāsiṃ karonto pupphāni ca gaṇhi, rakkhasassa ca āṇaṭṭhānaṃ na otari.
atk-s0513a1:1813_0: Athassa “ito uttari ukkhipituṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti tāni pupphāni gahetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:1813_1: rāsiṃ karontassa so rakkhaso “mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ evarūpo paññavā acchariyapuriso
atk-s0513a1:1813_2: na diṭṭhapubbo, pupphāni ca nāma yāvadicchakaṃ gahitāni, mayhañca āṇaṭṭhānaṃ na otarī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1813_3: udakaṃ dvidhā bhindanto udakato uṭṭhāya bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “vānarinda, imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1813_4: loke yassa tayo dhammā atthi, so paccāmittaṃ abhibhavati, te sabbepi tava abbhantare
atk-s0513a1:1813_5: atthi maññe”ti vatvā bodhisattassa thutiṃ karonto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1815: “Yassa ete tayo dhammā, vānarinda yathā tava;
atk-s0513a1:1816: Dakkhiyaṃ sūriyaṃ paññā, diṭṭhaṃ so ativattatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1817_0: Tattha dakkhiyanti dakkhabhāvo, sampattabhayaṃ vidhamituṃ jānanapaññāya sampayuttauttamavīriyassetaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1817_1: nāmaṃ. Sūriyanti sūrabhāvo, nibbhayabhāvassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Paññāti paññāpadaṭṭhānāya
atk-s0513a1:1818_0: Evaṃ so dakarakkhaso imāya gāthāya bodhisattassa thutiṃ katvā “imāni pupphāni kimatthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1818_1: harasī”ti pucchi. “Pitā maṃ rājānaṃ kātukāmo, tena kāraṇena harāmī”ti. “Na sakkā
atk-s0513a1:1818_2: tādisena uttamapurisena pupphāni vahituṃ ahaṃ vahissāmī”ti ukkhipitvā tassa pacchato
atk-s0513a1:1818_3: pacchato agamāsi. Athassa pitā dūratova taṃ disvā “ahaṃ imaṃ ‘rakkhasabhattaṃ bhavissatī’ti
atk-s0513a1:1818_4: pahiṇiṃ, so dānesa rakkhasaṃ pupphāni gāhāpento āgacchati, idānimhi naṭṭho”ti cintento
atk-s0513a1:1818_5: sattadhā hadayaphālanaṃ patvā tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ patto. Sesavānarā sannipatitvā
atk-s0513a1:1819: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā yūthapati devadatto ahosi, yūthapatiputto pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1823_0: Dhame dhameti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1823_1: Tañhi bhikkhuṃ satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu dubbacosī”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ, bhagavā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1823_2: vutte “na tvaṃ bhikkhu idāneva dubbaco, pubbepi dubbacoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1824_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bherivādakakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:1824_1: gāmake vasati. So “bārāṇasiyaṃ nakkhattaṃ ghuṭṭha”nti sutvā “samajjamaṇḍale bheriṃ
atk-s0513a1:1824_2: vādetvā dhanaṃ āharissāmī”ti puttaṃ ādāya tattha gantvā bheriṃ vādetvā bahudhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1824_3: labhi. So taṃ ādāya attano gāmaṃ gacchanto corāṭaviṃ patvā puttaṃ nirantaraṃ bheriṃ
atk-s0513a1:1824_4: vādentaṃ vāresi “tāta, nirantaraṃ avādetvā maggapaṭipannassa issarassa bheriṃ viya
atk-s0513a1:1824_5: antarantarā vādehī”ti so pitarā vāriyamānopi “bherisaddeneva core palāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1824_6: vatvā nirantarameva vādesi. Corā paṭhamaññeva bherisaddaṃ sutvā “issarabherī bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1824_7: palāyitvā ati viya ekābaddhaṃ saddaṃ sutvā “nāyaṃ issarabherī bhavissatī”ti āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:1824_8: upadhārentā dveyeva jane disvā pothetvā vilumpiṃsu. Bodhisatto “kicchena vata no
atk-s0513a1:1824_9: laddhaṃ dhanaṃ ekābaddhaṃ katvā vādento nāsesī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1827: Dhantena hi sataṃ laddhaṃ, atidhantena nāsita”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1828_0: Tattha dhame dhameti dhameyya no na dhameyya, bheriṃ vādeyya no na vādeyyāti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1828_1: Nātidhameti atikkamitvā pana nirantarameva katvā na vādeyya. Kiṃkāraṇā? Atidhantañhi
atk-s0513a1:1828_2: pāpakaṃ, nirantaraṃ bherivādanaṃ idāni amhākaṃ pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ jātaṃ. Dhantena hi
atk-s0513a1:1828_3: sataṃ laddhanti nagare dhamantena bherivādanena kahāpaṇasataṃ laddhaṃ. Atidhantena
atk-s0513a1:1828_4: nāsitanti idāni pana me puttena vacanaṃ akatvā yadidaṃ aṭaviyaṃ atidhantaṃ, tena
atk-s0513a1:1829: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā putto dubbacabhikkhu ahosi, pitā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1833: Dhame dhameti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dubbacamevārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1834_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto saṅkhadhamakakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:1834_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ nakkhatte ghuṭṭhe pitaraṃ ādāya saṅkhadhamanakammena dhanaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1834_2: āgamanakāle corāṭaviyaṃ pitaraṃ nirantaraṃ saṅkhaṃ dhamantaṃ vāresi. So “saṅkhasaddena
atk-s0513a1:1834_3: core palāpessāmī”ti nirantarameva dhami, corā purimanayeneva āgantvā vilumpiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1837: Dhantenādhigatā bhogā, te tāto vidhamī dhama”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1838: Tattha te tāto vidhamī dhamanti te saṅkhaṃ dhamitvā laddhabhoge mama pitā punappunaṃ dhamanto vidhami viddhaṃsesi vināsesīti.
atk-s0513a1:1839: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā pitā dubbacabhikkhu ahosi, putto panassa ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1849_0: Asā lokitthiyo nāmāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ukkaṇṭhitaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1849_1: kathesi. Tassa vatthu ummādantijātake āvi bhavissati. Taṃ pana bhikkhuṃ satthā “bhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:1849_2: itthiyo nāma asātā asatiyo lāmikā pacchimikā, tvaṃ evarūpaṃ lāmikaṃ itthiṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a1:1850_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1850_1: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto tīsu vedesu sabbasippesu ca nipphattiṃ patto
atk-s0513a1:1850_2: disāpāmokkho ācariyo ahosi. Tadā bārāṇasiyaṃ ekasmiṃ brāhmaṇakule puttassa jātadivase
atk-s0513a1:1850_3: aggiṃ gahetvā anibbāyantaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu. Atha naṃ brāhmaṇakumāraṃ soḷasavassakāle mātāpitaro
atk-s0513a1:1850_4: āhaṃsu “putta, mayaṃ tava jātadivase aggiṃ gahetvā ṭhapayimha. Sace brahmalokaparāyaṇo
atk-s0513a1:1850_5: bhavitukāmo, tvaṃ aggiṃ ādāya araññaṃ pavisitvā aggiṃ bhagavantaṃ namassamāno brahmalokaparāyaṇo
atk-s0513a1:1850_6: hohi. Sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasitukāmo, takkasilaṃ gantvā disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike
atk-s0513a1:1850_7: sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapehī”ti. Māṇavo “nāhaṃ sakkhissāmi araññe aggiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1850_8: paricarituṃ, kuṭumbameva saṇṭhapessāmī”ti mātāpitaro vanditvā ācariyabhāgaṃ sahassaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1850_9: gahetvā takkasilaṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā paccāgamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1851_0: Mātāpitaro panassa anatthikā gharāvāsena, araññe aggiṃ paricarāpetukāmā honti. Atha
atk-s0513a1:1851_1: naṃ mātā itthīnaṃ dosaṃ dassetvā araññaṃ pesetukāmā “so ācariyo paṇḍito byatto sakkhissati
atk-s0513a1:1851_2: me puttassa itthīnaṃ dosaṃ kathetu”nti cintetvā āha – “uggahitaṃ te, tāta, sippa”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1851_3: “Āma, ammā”ti. “Asātamantopi te uggahito”ti. “Na uggahito, ammā”ti. “Tāta, yadi te
atk-s0513a1:1851_4: asātamanto na uggahito, kiṃ nāma te sippaṃ uggahitaṃ, gaccha, uggaṇhitvā ehī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1851_5: So “sādhū”ti puna takkasilābhimukho pāyāsi. Tassapi ācariyassa mātā mahallikā vīsativassasatikā.
atk-s0513a1:1851_6: So taṃ sahatthā nhāpento bhojento pāyento paṭijaggati. Aññe manussā naṃ tathā karontaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1851_7: jigucchanti. So cintesi “yaṃnūnāhaṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha mātaraṃ paṭijagganto
atk-s0513a1:1851_8: vihareyya”nti. Athekasmiṃ vivitte araññe udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā sappitaṇḍulādīni
atk-s0513a1:1851_9: āharāpetvā mātaraṃ ukkhipitvā tattha gantvā mātaraṃ paṭijagganto vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:1852_0: Sopi kho māṇavo takkasilaṃ gantvā ācariyaṃ apassanto “kahaṃ ācariyo”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a1:1852_1: taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā tattha gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ ācariyo “kiṃ nu kho,
atk-s0513a1:1852_2: tāta, atisīghaṃ āgatosī”ti? “Nanu ahaṃ tumhehi asātamanto nāma na uggaṇhāpito”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1852_3: “Ko pana te asātamante uggaṇhitabbe katvā kathesī”ti? “Mayhaṃ mātā ācariyā”ti. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:1852_4: cintesi “asātamanto nāma koci natthi, imassa pana mātā imaṃ itthidose jānāpetukāmā
atk-s0513a1:1852_5: bhavissatī”ti. Atha naṃ “sādhu, tāta, dassāmi te asātamante, tvaṃ ajja ādiṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:1852_6: mama ṭhāne ṭhatvā mama mātaraṃ sahatthā nhāpento bhojento pāyento paṭijaggāhi, hatthapādasīsapiṭṭhisambāhanādīni
atk-s0513a1:1852_7: cassā karonto ‘ayye jaraṃ pattakālepi tāva te evarūpaṃ sarīraṃ, daharakāle kīdisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1852_8: ahosī’ti hatthapādaparikammādikaraṇakāle hatthapādādīnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ katheyyāsi. Yañca
atk-s0513a1:1852_9: te mama mātā katheti, taṃ alajjanto aniguhanto mayhaṃ āroceyyāsi, evaṃ karonto asātamante
atk-s0513a1:1852_10: lacchasi, akaronto na lacchasī”ti āha. So “sādhu ācariyā”ti tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a1:1853_0: Athassā tasmiṃ māṇave punappunaṃ vaṇṇayamāne “ayaṃ mayā saddhiṃ abhiramitukāmo bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1853_1: andhāya jarājiṇṇāya abbhantare kileso uppajji. Sā ekadivasaṃ attano sarīravaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1853_2: kathayamānaṃ māṇavaṃ āha “mayā saddhiṃ abhiramituṃ icchasī”ti? “Ayye, ahaṃ tāva iccheyyaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1853_3: ācariyo pana garuko”ti. “Sace maṃ icchasi, puttaṃ me mārehī”ti. “Ahaṃ ācariyassa
atk-s0513a1:1853_4: santike ettakaṃ sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā kilesamattaṃ nissāya kinti katvā ācariyaṃ māressāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1853_5: “Tena hi sace tvaṃ maṃ na pariccajasi, ahameva naṃ māressāmī”ti. Evaṃ itthiyo nāma
atk-s0513a1:1853_6: asātā lāmikā pacchimikā, tathārūpe nāma vaye ṭhitā rāgacittaṃ uppādetvā kilesaṃ anuvattamānā
atk-s0513a1:1853_7: evaṃ upakārakaṃ puttaṃ māretukāmā jātā. Māṇavo sabbaṃ taṃ kathaṃ bodhisattassa ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:1854_0: Bodhisatto “suṭṭhu te, māṇava, kataṃ mayhaṃ ārocentenā”ti vatvā mātu āyusaṅkhāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1854_1: olokento “ajjeva marissatī”ti ñatvā “ehi, māṇava, vīmaṃsissāma na”nti ekaṃ udumbararukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1854_2: chinditvā attano pamāṇena kaṭṭharūpakaṃ katvā sasīsaṃ pārupitvā attano sayanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:1854_3: uttānaṃ nipajjāpetvā rajjukaṃ bandhitvā antevāsikaṃ āha – “tāta, pharasuṃ ādāya gantvā
atk-s0513a1:1854_4: mama mātu saññaṃ dehī”ti. Māṇavo gantvā “ayye, ācariyo paṇṇasālāyaṃ attano sayanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:1854_5: nipanno, rajjusaññā me baddhā, imaṃ pharasuṃ ādāya gantvā sace sakkosi, mārehi na”nti
atk-s0513a1:1854_6: āha. “Tvaṃ pana maṃ na pariccajissasī”ti? “Kiṃkāraṇā pariccajissāmī”ti? Sā pharasuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1854_7: ādāya pavedhamānā uṭṭhāya rajjusaññāya gantvā hatthena parāmasitvā “ayaṃ me putto”ti
atk-s0513a1:1854_8: saññāya kaṭṭharūpakassa mukhato sāṭakaṃ apanetvā pharasuṃ ādāya “ekappahāreneva māressāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1854_9: gīvāyameva paharitvā “dha”nti sadde uppanne rukkhabhāvaṃ aññāsi. Atha bodhisattena
atk-s0513a1:1854_10: “kiṃ karosi, ammā”ti vutte sā “vañcitāmhī”ti tattheva maritvā patitā. Attano kira
atk-s0513a1:1855_0: So tassā matabhāvaṃ ñatvā sarīrakiccaṃ katvā āḷāhanaṃ nibbāpetvā vanapupphehi pūjetvā
atk-s0513a1:1855_1: māṇavaṃ ādāya paṇṇasāladvāre nisīditvā “tāta, pāṭiyekko asātamanto nāma natthi, itthiyo
atk-s0513a1:1855_2: asātā nāma, tava mātā ‘asātamantaṃ uggaṇhā’ti mama santikaṃ pesayamānā itthīnaṃ dosaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1855_3: jānanatthaṃ pesesi. Idāni pana te paccakkhameva mama mātu doso diṭṭho, iminā kāraṇena
atk-s0513a1:1855_4: ‘itthiyo nāma asātā lāmikā pacchimikā’ti jāneyyāsī”ti taṃ ovaditvā uyyojesi. Sopi
atk-s0513a1:1855_5: ācariyaṃ vanditvā mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ mātā pucchi “tāta, uggahito
atk-s0513a1:1855_6: te asātamanto”ti? “Āma, ammā”ti. “Idāni kiṃ karissasi, pabbajitvā aggiṃ vā paricarissasi,
atk-s0513a1:1855_7: agāramajjhe vā vasissasī”ti? Māṇavo “mayā, amma, paccakkhato itthīnaṃ dosā diṭṭhā,
atk-s0513a1:1855_8: agārena me kiccaṃ natthi, pabbajissāmaha”nti attano adhippāyaṃ pakāsento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1857: “Asā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati;
atk-s0513a1:1858: Sārattā ca pagabbhā ca, sikhī sabbaghaso yathā;
atk-s0513a1:1860_0: Tattha asāti asatiyo lāmikā. Atha vā sātaṃ vuccati sukhaṃ, taṃ tāsu natthi. Attani
atk-s0513a1:1860_1: paṭibaddhacittānaṃ asātameva dentītipi asā, dukkhā dukkhavatthubhūtāti attho. Imassa
atk-s0513a1:1861: “Māyā cetā marīcī ca, soko rogo cupaddavo;
atk-s0513a1:1862: Kharā ca bandhanā cetā, maccupāsā guhāsayā;
atk-s0513a1:1863: Tāsu yo vissase poso, so naresu narādhamo”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:1864_0: Lokitthiyoti loke itthiyo. Velā tāsaṃ na vijjatīti amma, tāsaṃ itthīnaṃ kilesuppattiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1864_1: patvā velā saṃvaro mariyādā pamāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Sārattā ca pagabbhā cāti velā ca
atk-s0513a1:1864_2: etāsaṃ natthi, pañcasu kāmaguṇesu sārattā allīnā, tathā kāyapāgabbhiyena, vācāpāgabbhiyena,
atk-s0513a1:1864_3: manopāgabbhiyenāti tividhena pāgabbhiyena samannāgatattā pagabbhā cetā. Etāsañhi
atk-s0513a1:1864_4: abbhantare kāyadvārādīni patvā saṃvaro nāma natthi, lolā kākapaṭibhāgāti dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:1864_5: Sikhī sabbaghaso yathāti amma, yathā jālasikhāya “sikhī”ti saṅkhaṃ gato aggi nāma
atk-s0513a1:1864_6: gūthagatādibhedaṃ asucimpi, sappimadhuphāṇitādibhedaṃ sucimpi, iṭṭhampi aniṭṭhampi
atk-s0513a1:1864_7: yaṃ yadeva labhati, sabbaṃ ghasati khādati, tasmā “sabbaghaso”ti vuccati. Tatheva
atk-s0513a1:1864_8: tā itthiyopi hatthimeṇḍagomeṇḍādayo vā hontu hīnajaccā hīnakammantā, khattiyādayo
atk-s0513a1:1864_9: vā hontu uttamakammantā, hīnukkaṭṭhabhāvaṃ acintetvā lokassādavasena kilesasanthave
atk-s0513a1:1864_10: uppanne yaṃ yaṃ labhanti, sabbameva sevantīti sabbaghasasikhisadisā honti. Tasmā
atk-s0513a1:1865_0: Tā hitvā pabbajissāmīti ahaṃ tā lāmikā dukkhavatthubhūtā itthiyo hitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:1865_1: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajissāmi. Vivekamanubrūhayanti kāyaviveko cittaviveko upadhivivekoti
atk-s0513a1:1865_2: tayo vivekā, tesu idha kāyavivekopi vaṭṭati cittavivekopi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ahaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1865_3: amma, pabbajitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo ca pañcābhiññā ca uppādetvā
atk-s0513a1:1865_4: gaṇato kāyaṃ, kilesehi ca cittaṃ vivecetvā imaṃ vivekaṃ brūhento vaḍḍhento brahmalokaparāyaṇo
atk-s0513a1:1865_5: bhavissāmi, alaṃ me agārenāti. Evaṃ itthiyo garahitvā mātāpitaro vanditvā himavantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1865_6: pavisitvā pabbajitvā vuttappakāraṃ vivekaṃ brūhento brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1866_0: Satthāpi “evaṃ bhikkhu itthiyo nāma asātā lāmikā pacchimikā dukkhadāyikā”ti itthīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1866_1: aguṇaṃ kathetvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne so bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1866_2: Satthā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mātā bhaddakāpilānī, pitā
atk-s0513a1:1866_3: mahākassapo ahosi, antevāsiko ānando, ācariyo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1870_0: Yaṃ brāhmaṇo avādesīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ukkaṇṭhitamevārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1870_1: Tañhi satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte
atk-s0513a1:1870_2: “bhikkhu itthiyo nāma arakkhiyā, pubbe paṇḍitā itthiṃ gabbhato paṭṭhāya rakkhantāpi
atk-s0513a1:1871_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1871_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:1871_2: dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi. So purohitena saddhiṃ jūtaṃ kīḷati. Kīḷanto pana –
atk-s0513a1:1874: Imaṃ jūtagītaṃ gāyanto rajataphalake suvaṇṇapāsake khipati. Evaṃ kīḷanto pana rājā niccaṃ jināti, purohito parājīyati.
atk-s0513a1:1875_0: So anukkamena ghare vibhave parikkhayaṃ gacchante cintesi “evaṃ sante sabbaṃ imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1875_1: ghare dhanaṃ khīyissati, pariyesitvā purisantaraṃ agataṃ ekaṃ mātugāmaṃ ghare karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1875_2: Athassa etadahosi “aññaṃ purisaṃ diṭṭhapubbaṃ itthiṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkhissāmi, gabbhato
atk-s0513a1:1875_3: paṭṭhāyekaṃ mātugāmaṃ rakkhitvā taṃ vayappattaṃ vase ṭhapetvā ekapurisikaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:1875_4: gāḷhaṃ ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahitvā rājakulato dhanaṃ āharissāmī”ti. So ca aṅgavijjāya cheko
atk-s0513a1:1875_5: hoti, athekaṃ duggatitthiṃ gabbhiniṃ disvā “dhītaraṃ vijāyissatī”ti ñatvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1875_6: paribbayaṃ datvā ghareyeva vasāpetvā vijātakāle dhanaṃ datvā uyyojetvā taṃ kumārikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1875_7: aññesaṃ purisānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ adatvā itthīnaṃyeva hatthe datvā posāpetvā vayappattakāle
atk-s0513a1:1875_8: taṃ attano vase ṭhapesi. Yāva cesā vaḍḍhati, tāva raññā saddhiṃ jūtaṃ na kīḷi. Taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1875_9: pana vase ṭhapetvā brāhmaṇo “mahārāja, jūtaṃ kīḷāmā”ti āha. Rājā “sādhū”ti purimaniyāmeneva
atk-s0513a1:1875_10: kīḷi. Purohito rañño gāyitvā pāsakaṃ khipanakāle “ṭhapetvā mama māṇavika”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1875_11: Tato paṭṭhāya purohito jināti, rājā parājīyati.
atk-s0513a1:1876_0: Bodhisatto “imassa ghare ekapurisikāya ekāya itthiyā bhavitabba”nti pariggaṇhāpento
atk-s0513a1:1876_1: atthibhāvaṃ ñatvā “sīlamassā bhindāpessāmī”ti ekaṃ dhuttaṃ pakkosāpetvā “sakkhissasi
atk-s0513a1:1876_2: purohitassa itthiyā sīlaṃ bhinditu”nti āha. “Sakkomi, devā”ti. Athassa rājā dhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1876_3: datvā “tena hi khippaṃ niṭṭhāpehī”ti taṃ pahiṇi. So rañño santikā dhanaṃ ādāya gandhadhūmacuṇṇakappūrādīni
atk-s0513a1:1876_4: gahetvā tassa gharato avidūre sabbagandhāpaṇaṃ pasāresi. Purohitassapi gehaṃ sattabhūmakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1876_5: sattadvārakoṭṭhakaṃ hoti, sabbesu dvārakoṭṭhakesu itthīnaṃyeva ārakkhā. Ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:1876_6: pana brāhmaṇaṃ añño puriso gehaṃ pavisituṃ labhanto nāma natthi, kacavarachaḍḍanapacchimpi
atk-s0513a1:1876_7: sodhetvāyeva pavesenti. Taṃ māṇavikaṃ purohitoyeva daṭṭhuṃ labhati. Tassā ca ekā
atk-s0513a1:1876_8: paricārikā itthī atthi. Athassā sā paricārikā gandhapupphamūlaṃ gahetvā gacchantī
atk-s0513a1:1876_9: tassa dhuttassa āpaṇasamīpena gacchati. So “ayaṃ tassā paricārikā”ti suṭṭhu ñatvā
atk-s0513a1:1876_10: ekadivasaṃ taṃ āgacchantiṃ disvā āpaṇā uṭṭhāya gantvā tassā pādamūle patitvā ubhohi
atk-s0513a1:1876_11: hatthehi pāde gāḷhaṃ gahetvā “amma, ettakaṃ kālaṃ kahaṃ gatāsī”ti paridevi, avasesāpi
atk-s0513a1:1876_12: payuttakadhuttā ekamantaṃ ṭhatvā “hatthapādamukhasaṇṭhānehi ca ākappena ca mātāputtā
atk-s0513a1:1876_13: ekasadisāyevā”ti āhaṃsu. Sā itthī tesu tesu kathentesu attano asaddahitvā “ayaṃ me
atk-s0513a1:1876_14: putto bhavissatī”ti sayampi rodituṃ ārabhi. Te ubhopi kanditvā roditvā aññamaññaṃ āliṅgetvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1877_0: Atha so dhutto āha “amma, kahaṃ vasasī”ti? “Kinnarilīlāya vasamānāya rūpasobhaggappattāya
atk-s0513a1:1877_1: purohitassa daharitthiyā upaṭṭhānaṃ kurumānā vasāmi, tātā”ti. “Idāni kahaṃ yāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1877_2: ammā”ti? “Tassā gandhamālādīnaṃ atthāyā”ti. “Amma, kiṃ te aññattha gatāya, ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:1877_3: mameva santikā harā”ti mūlaṃ aggahetvāva bahūni tambūlatakkolakādīni ceva nānāpupphāni
atk-s0513a1:1877_4: ca adāsi. Māṇavikā bahūni gandhapupphādīni disvā “kiṃ, amma, ajja amhākaṃ brāhmaṇo
atk-s0513a1:1877_5: pasanno”ti āha. “Kasmā evaṃ vadasī”ti? “Imesaṃ bahubhāvaṃ disvā”ti. Na brāhmaṇo bahumūlaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1877_6: adāsi, mayā panetaṃ mayhaṃ puttassa santikā ābhatanti. Tato paṭṭhāya sā brāhmaṇena
atk-s0513a1:1877_7: dinnamūlaṃ attanā gahetvā tasseva santikā gandhapupphādīni āharati. Dhutto katipāhaccayena
atk-s0513a1:1877_8: gilānālayaṃ katvā nipajji. Sā tassa āpaṇadvāraṃ gantvā taṃ adisvā “kahaṃ me putto”ti
atk-s0513a1:1877_9: pucchi. “Puttassa te aphāsukaṃ jāta”nti? Sā tassa nipannaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā nisīditvā
atk-s0513a1:1877_10: piṭṭhiṃ parimajjantī “kiṃ te, tāta, aphāsuka”nti pucchi. So tuṇhī ahosi. “Kiṃ na
atk-s0513a1:1877_11: kathesi puttā”ti? “Amma, marantenāpi tuyhaṃ kathetuṃ na sakkā”ti. “Tāta, mayhaṃ akathetvā
atk-s0513a1:1877_12: kassa katheyyāsi, kathehi, tātā”ti. “Amma, mayhaṃ aññaṃ aphāsukaṃ natthi, tassā pana
atk-s0513a1:1877_13: māṇavikāya vaṇṇaṃ sutvā paṭibaddhacittosmi, taṃ labhanto jīvissāmi, alabhanto idheva
atk-s0513a1:1877_14: marissāmī”ti. “Tāta, mayhaṃ esa bhāro, mā tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya cintayī”ti taṃ assāsetvā
atk-s0513a1:1877_15: bahūni gandhapupphādīni ādāya māṇavikāya santikaṃ gantvā “putto me, amma, mama santikā
atk-s0513a1:1877_16: tava vaṇṇaṃ sutvā paṭibaddhacitto jāto, kiṃ kātabba”nti? “Sace ānetuṃ sakkotha, mayā katokāsoyevā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1878_0: Sā tassā vacanaṃ sutvā tato paṭṭhāya tassa gehassa kaṇṇakaṇṇehi bahuṃ kacavaraṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1878_1: ārakkhitthiyā upari chaḍḍesi. Sā tena aṭṭīyamānā apeti. Itarā teneva niyāmena yā
atk-s0513a1:1878_2: yā kiñci katheti, tassā tassā upari kacavaraṃ chaḍḍesi. Tato paṭṭhāya pana sā yaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1878_3: yaṃ āharati vā harati vā, taṃ taṃ na kāci sodhetuṃ ussahati. Tasmiṃ kāle sā taṃ dhuttaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1878_4: pupphapacchiyaṃ nipajjāpetvā māṇavikāya santikaṃ abhihari. Dhutto māṇavikāya sīlaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1878_5: bhinditvā ekāhadvīhaṃ pāsādeyeva ahosi. Purohite bahi nikkhante ubho abhiramanti.
atk-s0513a1:1879_0: Atha naṃ sā ekāhadvīhaccayena “sāmi, idāni tayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. “Ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1879_1: paharitvā gantukāmo”ti. Sā “evaṃ hotū”ti dhuttaṃ nilīyāpetvā brāhmaṇe āgate evamāha
atk-s0513a1:1879_2: “ahaṃ, ayya, tumhesu vīṇaṃ vādentesu naccituṃ icchāmī”ti. “Sādhu, bhadde, naccassū”ti
atk-s0513a1:1879_3: vīṇaṃ vādesi. “Tumhesu olokentesu lajjāmi, mukhaṃ pana vo sāṭakena bandhitvā naccissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1879_4: “Sace lajjasi, evaṃ karohī”ti. Māṇavikā ghanasāṭakaṃ gahetvā tassa akkhīni pidahamānā
atk-s0513a1:1879_5: mukhaṃ bandhi. Brāhmaṇo mukhaṃ bandhāpetvā vīṇaṃ vādesi. Sā muhuttaṃ naccitvā “ayya,
atk-s0513a1:1879_6: ahaṃ te ekavāraṃ sīse paharitukāmā”ti āha. Itthilolo brāhmaṇo kiñci kāraṇaṃ ajānanto
atk-s0513a1:1879_7: “paharāhī”ti āha, māṇavikā dhuttassa saññaṃ adāsi. So saṇikaṃ āgantvā brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0513a1:1879_8: piṭṭhipasse ṭhatvā sīse kapparena pahari, akkhīni patanākārappattāni ahesuṃ, sīse
atk-s0513a1:1879_9: gaṇḍo uṭṭhahi. So vedanāṭṭo hutvā “āhara te hattha”nti āha. Māṇavikā attano hatthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1879_10: ukkhipitvā tassa hatthe ṭhapesi. Brāhmaṇo “hattho muduko, pahāro pana thaddho”ti
atk-s0513a1:1879_11: āha. Dhutto brāhmaṇaṃ paharitvā nilīyi. Māṇavikā tasmiṃ nilīne brāhmaṇassa mukhato
atk-s0513a1:1879_12: sāṭakaṃ mocetvā telaṃ ādāya sīsaṃ parisambāhi. Brāhmaṇe bahi nikkhante puna sā itthī
atk-s0513a1:1880_0: So rañño santikaṃ gantvā sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Rājā attano upaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ
atk-s0513a1:1880_1: brāhmaṇaṃ āha “jūtaṃ kīḷāma brāhmaṇā”ti? “Sādhu, mahārājā”ti. Rājā jūtamaṇḍalaṃ sajjāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1880_2: purimanayeneva jūtagītaṃ gāyitvā pāsake khipati. Brāhmaṇo māṇavikāya tapassa bhinnabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1880_3: ajānanto “ṭhapetvā mama māṇavika”nti āha. Evaṃ vadantopi parājitoyeva. Rājā jinitvā
atk-s0513a1:1880_4: “brāhmaṇa, kiṃ vadesi, māṇavikāya te tapo bhinno, tvaṃ ‘mātugāmaṃ gabbhato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:1880_5: rakkhanto sattasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ karonto rakkhituṃ sakkhissāmī’ti maññasi, mātugāmo
atk-s0513a1:1880_6: nāma kucchiyaṃ pakkhipitvā carantenāpi rakkhituṃ na sakkā, ekapurisikā itthī nāma
atk-s0513a1:1880_7: natthi, tava māṇavikā ‘naccitukāmāmhī’ti vatvā vīṇaṃ vādentassa tava sāṭakena mukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1880_8: bandhitvā attano jāraṃ tava sīse kapparena paharāpetvā uyyojesi, idāni kiṃ kathesī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1883: Aṇḍabhūtābhatā bhariyā, tāsu ko jātu vissase”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1884_0: Tattha yaṃ brāhmaṇo avādesi, vīṇaṃ samukhaveṭhitoti yena kāraṇena brāhmaṇo ghanasāṭakena
atk-s0513a1:1884_1: saha mukhena veṭhito hutvā vīṇaṃ vādesi, taṃ kāraṇaṃ na jānātīti attho. Tañhi sā
atk-s0513a1:1884_2: vañcetukāmā evamakāsi. Brāhmaṇo pana taṃ itthiṃ bahumāyābhāvaṃ ajānanto mātugāmassa
atk-s0513a1:1884_3: saddahitvā “maṃ esā lajjatī”ti evaṃsaññī ahosi, tenassa aññāṇabhāvaṃ pakāsento rājā
atk-s0513a1:1884_4: evamāha, ayametthādhippāyo. Aṇḍabhūtābhatā bhariyāti aṇḍaṃ vuccati bījaṃ, bījabhūtā
atk-s0513a1:1884_5: mātukucchito anikkhantakāleyeva ābhatā ānītā, bhatāti vā puṭṭhāti attho. Kā sā? Bhariyā
atk-s0513a1:1884_6: pajāpati pādaparicārikā. Sā hi bhattavatthādīhi bharitabbatāya, bhinnasaṃvaratāya,
atk-s0513a1:1884_7: lokadhammehi bharitatāya vā “bhariyā”ti vuccati. Tāsu ko jātu vissaseti jātūti ekaṃsādhivacanaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1884_8: tāsu mātukucchito paṭṭhāya rakkhiyamānāsupi evaṃ vippakāraṃ āpajjantīsu bhariyāsu
atk-s0513a1:1884_9: ko nāma paṇḍito puriso ekaṃsena vissase, “nibbikārā esā mayī”ti ko saddaheyyāti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1884_10: Asaddhammavasena hi āmantakesu nimantakesu vijjamānesu mātugāmo nāma na sakkā rakkhitunti.
atk-s0513a1:1885_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto brāhmaṇassa dhammaṃ desesi. Brāhmaṇo bodhisattassa dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1885_1: sutvā nivesanaṃ gantvā taṃ māṇavikaṃ āha – “tayā kira evarūpaṃ pāpakammaṃ kata”nti?
atk-s0513a1:1885_2: “Ayya, ko evamāha, na karomi, ‘ahameva pahariṃ, na añño koci’. Sace na saddahatha,
atk-s0513a1:1885_3: ahaṃ ‘tumhe ṭhapetvā aññassa purisassa hatthasamphassaṃ na jānāmī’ti saccakiriyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1885_4: katvā aggiṃ pavisitvā tumhe saddahāpessāmī”ti. Brāhmaṇo “evaṃ hotū”ti mahantaṃ dārurāsiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1885_5: kāretvā aggiṃ katvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “sace attano saddahasi, aggiṃ pavisāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1886_0: Māṇavikā attano paricārikaṃ paṭhamameva sikkhāpesi “amma, tava puttaṃ tattha gantvā
atk-s0513a1:1886_1: mama aggiṃ pavisanakāle hatthaggahaṇaṃ kātuṃ vadehī”ti. Sā gantvā tathā avaca. Dhutto
atk-s0513a1:1886_2: āgantvā parisamajjhe aṭṭhāsi. Sā māṇavikā brāhmaṇaṃ vañcetukāmā mahājanamajjhe ṭhatvā
atk-s0513a1:1886_3: “brāhmaṇa, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññassa purisassa hatthasamphassaṃ nāma na jānāmi, iminā
atk-s0513a1:1886_4: saccena ayaṃ aggi mā maṃ jhāpesī”ti aggiṃ pavisituṃ āraddhā. Tasmiṃ khaṇe dhutto
atk-s0513a1:1886_5: “passatha bho purohitabrāhmaṇassa kammaṃ, evarūpaṃ mātugāmaṃ aggiṃ pavesāpetī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1886_6: gantvā taṃ māṇavikaṃ hatthe gaṇhi. Sā hatthaṃ vissajjāpetvā purohitaṃ āha – “ayya,
atk-s0513a1:1886_7: mama saccakiriyā bhinnā, na sakkā aggiṃ pavisitu”nti. “Kiṃkāraṇā”ti? “Ajja mayā evarūpā
atk-s0513a1:1886_8: saccakiriyā katā ‘ṭhapetvā mama sāmikaṃ aññassa purisassa hatthasamphassaṃ na jānāmī’ti,
atk-s0513a1:1886_9: idāni camhi iminā purisena hatthe gahitā”ti. Brāhmaṇo “vañcito ahaṃ imāyā”ti ñatvā
atk-s0513a1:1886_10: taṃ pothetvā nīharāpesi. Evaṃ asaddhammasamannāgatā kiretā itthiyo tāva mahantampi
atk-s0513a1:1886_11: pāpakammaṃ katvā attano sāmikaṃ vañcetuṃ “nāhaṃ evarūpaṃ kammaṃ karomī”ti divasampi
atk-s0513a1:1886_12: sapathaṃ kurumānā nānācittāva honti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:1889: “Musā tāsaṃ yathā saccaṃ, saccaṃ tāsaṃ yathā musā;
atk-s0513a1:1890: Gāvo bahi tiṇasseva, omasanti varaṃ varaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1892: Na tā kiñci na jānanti, yaṃ manussesu vañcana”nti. ;
atk-s0513a1:1893_0: Satthā “evaṃ arakkhiyo mātugāmo”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1893_1: saccapariyosāne ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Satthāpi anusandhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1893_2: ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā bārāṇasirājā ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1897_0: Kodhanā akataññū cāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuññevārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1897_1: kathesi. Tañhi satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti
atk-s0513a1:1897_2: vutte “itthiyo nāma bhikkhu akataññū mittadubbhā, kasmā tā nissāya ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1898_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā gaṅgātīre
atk-s0513a1:1898_1: assamaṃ māpetvā samāpattiyo ceva abhiññāyo ca nibbattetvā jhānasukhena viharati.
atk-s0513a1:1898_2: Tasmiṃ samaye bārāṇasiseṭṭhino dhītā duṭṭhakumārī nāma caṇḍā ahosi pharusā, dāsakammakare
atk-s0513a1:1898_3: akkosati paribhāsati paharati. Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ parivāramanussā gahetvā “gaṅgāya
atk-s0513a1:1898_4: kīḷissāmā”ti agamaṃsu. Tesaṃ kīḷantānaññeva sūriyatthaṅgamanavelā jātā, megho uṭṭhahi,
atk-s0513a1:1898_5: manussā meghaṃ disvā ito cito ca vegena palāyiṃsu. Seṭṭhidhītāyapi dāsakammakarā
atk-s0513a1:1898_6: “ajja amhehi etissā piṭṭhiṃ passituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti taṃ antoudakasmiṃyeva chaḍḍetvā uttariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1898_7: Devo pāvassi, sūriyopi atthaṅgato, andhakāro jāto. Te tāya vināva gehaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1898_8: sā”ti vutte “gaṅgāto tāva uttiṇṇā, atha naṃ na jānāma kahaṃ gatā”ti. Ñātakā vicinitvāpi na passiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1899_0: Sā mahāviravaṃ viravantī udakena vuyhamānā aḍḍharattasamaye bodhisattassa paṇṇasālāsamīpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1899_1: pāpuṇi. So tassā saddaṃ sutvā “mātugāmassa saddo eso, parittāṇamassā karissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1899_2: tiṇukkaṃ ādāya nadītīraṃ gantvā taṃ disvā “mā bhāyi, mā bhāyī”ti assāsetvā nāgabalo
atk-s0513a1:1899_3: thāmasampanno bodhisatto nadiṃ taramāno gantvā taṃ ukkhipitvā assamapadaṃ ānetvā
atk-s0513a1:1899_4: aggiṃ katvā adāsi. Sīte vigate madhurāni phalāphalāni upanāmesi. Tāni khāditvā ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1899_5: “kattha vāsikāsi, kathañca gaṅgāya patitāsī”ti pucchi. Sā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Atha
atk-s0513a1:1899_6: naṃ “tvaṃ idheva vasā”ti paṇṇasālāya vasāpento dvīhatīhaṃ sayaṃ abbhokāse vasitvā
atk-s0513a1:1899_7: “idāni gacchā”ti āha. Sā “imaṃ tāpasaṃ sīlabhedaṃ pāpetvā gahetvā gamissāmī”ti na
atk-s0513a1:1899_8: gacchati. Atha gacchante kāle itthikuttaṃ itthilīlaṃ dassetvā tassa sīlabhedaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:1899_9: jhānaṃ antaradhāpesi. So taṃ gahetvā araññeyeva vasati. Atha naṃ sā āha “ayya, kiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1899_10: no araññavāsena, manussapathaṃ gamissāmā”ti? So taṃ ādāya ekaṃ paccantagāmakaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:1899_11: takkabhatiyā jīvikaṃ kappetvā taṃ poseti. Tassa takkaṃ vikkiṇitvā jīvatīti “takkapaṇḍito”ti
atk-s0513a1:1899_12: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Athassa gāmavāsino paribbayaṃ datvā “amhākaṃ suyuttaduyuttakaṃ ācikkhanto
atk-s0513a1:1900_0: Tena ca samayena corā pabbatā oruyha paccantaṃ paharanti. Te ekadivasaṃ taṃ gāmaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1900_1: paharitvā gāmavāsikehiyeva bhaṇḍikā ukkhipāpetvā gacchantā tampi seṭṭhidhītaraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1900_2: attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sesajane vissajjesuṃ. Corajeṭṭhako pana tassā rūpe bajjhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1900_3: taṃ attano bhariyaṃ akāsi. Bodhisatto “itthannāmā kaha”nti pucchi. “Corajeṭṭhakena
atk-s0513a1:1900_4: gahetvā attano bhariyā katā”ti ca sutvāpi “na sā tattha mayā vinā vasissati, palāyitvā
atk-s0513a1:1900_5: āgacchissatī”ti tassā āgamanaṃ olokento tattheva vasi.
atk-s0513a1:1901_0: Seṭṭhidhītāpi cintesi “ahaṃ idha sukhaṃ vasāmi, kadāci maṃ takkapaṇḍito kiñcideva
atk-s0513a1:1901_1: nissāya āgantvā ito ādāya gaccheyya, atha etasmā sukhā parihāyissāmi, yannūnāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1901_2: sampiyāyamānā viya taṃ pakkosāpetvā ghātāpeyya”nti. Sā ekaṃ manussaṃ pakkositvā “ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1901_3: idha dukkhaṃ jīvāmi, takkapaṇḍito āgantvā maṃ ādāya gacchatū”ti sāsanaṃ pesesi. So
atk-s0513a1:1901_4: taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā saddahitvā tattha gantvā gāmadvāre ṭhatvā sāsanaṃ pesesi. Sā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a1:1901_5: taṃ disvā “ayya, sace mayaṃ idāni gacchissāma, corajeṭṭhako anubandhitvā ubhopi amhe
atk-s0513a1:1901_6: ghātessati, rattibhāge gacchissāmā”ti taṃ ānetvā bhojetvā koṭṭhake nisīdāpetvā sāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1901_7: corajeṭṭhakassa āgantvā suraṃ pivitvā mattakāle “sāmi, sace imāya velāya tava sattuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1901_8: passeyyāsi, kinti naṃ kareyyāsī”ti āha. “Idañcidañca karissāmīti”. “Kiṃ pana so dūre,
atk-s0513a1:1901_9: nanu koṭṭhake nisinno”ti? Corajeṭṭhako ukkaṃ ādāya tattha gantvā taṃ disvā gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1901_10: gehamajjhe pātetvā kapparādīhi yathāruciṃ pothesi. So pothiyamānopi aññaṃ kiñci avatvā
atk-s0513a1:1901_11: “kodhanā akataññū ca, pisuṇā mittabhedikā”ti ettakameva vadati. Coro taṃ pothetvā
atk-s0513a1:1901_12: bandhitvā nipajjāpetvā sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā sayi. Pabuddho jiṇṇāya surāya puna taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1901_13: pothetuṃ ārabhi, sopi tāneva cattāri padāni vadati.
atk-s0513a1:1902_0: Coro cintesi “ayaṃ evaṃ pothiyamānopi aññaṃ kiñci avatvā imāneva cattāri padāni vadati,
atk-s0513a1:1902_1: pucchissāmi na”nti tassā suttabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ pucchi “ambho tvaṃ evaṃ pothiyamānopi
atk-s0513a1:1902_2: kasmā etāneva padāni vadasī”ti? Takkapaṇḍito “tena hi suṇāhī”ti taṃ kāraṇaṃ ādito
atk-s0513a1:1902_3: paṭṭhāya kathesi. “Ahaṃ pubbe araññavāsiko eko tāpaso jhānalābhī, svāhaṃ etaṃ gaṅgāya
atk-s0513a1:1902_4: vuyhamānaṃ uttāretvā paṭijaggiṃ. Atha maṃ esā palobhetvā jhānā parihāpesi, svāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1902_5: araññaṃ pahāya etaṃ posento paccantagāmake vasāmi, athesā corehi idhānītā ‘ahaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1902_6: vasāmi, āgantvā maṃ netū’ti mayhaṃ sāsanaṃ pesetvā idāni tava hatthe pātesi, iminā
atk-s0513a1:1902_7: kāraṇenāhaṃ evaṃ kathemī”ti. Coro cintesi “yā esā evarūpe guṇasampanne upakārake
atk-s0513a1:1902_8: evaṃ vippaṭipajji, sā mayhaṃ kataraṃ nāma upaddavaṃ na kareyya, māretabbā esā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1902_9: so takkapaṇḍitaṃ assāsetvā taṃ pabodhetvā khaggaṃ ādāya nikkhamma “etaṃ purisaṃ gāmadvāre
atk-s0513a1:1902_10: ghātessāmī”ti vatvā tāya saddhiṃ bahigāmaṃ gantvā “etaṃ hatthe gaṇhā”ti taṃ tāya
atk-s0513a1:1902_11: hatthe gāhāpetvā khaggaṃ ādāya takkapaṇḍitaṃ paharanto viya taṃ dvidhā chinditvā
atk-s0513a1:1902_12: sasīsaṃ nhāpetvā takkapaṇḍitaṃ katipāhaṃ paṇītena bhojanena santappetvā idāni kahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1902_13: gamissasī”ti āha. Takkapaṇḍito “gharāvāsena me kiccaṃ natthi, isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a1:1902_14: tattheva araññe vasissāmī”ti āha. “Tena hi ahampi pabbajissāmī”ti ubhopi pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a1:1902_15: taṃ araññāyatanaṃ gantvā pañca abhiññā aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā jīvitapariyosāne
atk-s0513a1:1903: Satthā imāni dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1906: Brahmacariyaṃ cara bhikkhu, so sukhaṃ na vihāhisī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1907_0: Tatrāyaṃ piṇḍattho – bhikkhu itthiyo nāmetā kodhanā, uppannaṃ kodhaṃ nivāretuṃ na
atk-s0513a1:1907_1: sakkonti. Akataññū ca, atimahantampi upakāraṃ na jānanti. Pisuṇā ca, piyasuññabhāvakaraṇameva
atk-s0513a1:1907_2: kathaṃ kathenti. Mittabhedikā, mitte bhindanti, mittabhedanakathaṃ kathanasīlāyeva,
atk-s0513a1:1907_3: evarūpehi pāpadhammehi samannāgatā etā. Kiṃ te etāhi, brahmacariyaṃ cara bhikkhu,
atk-s0513a1:1907_4: ayañhi methunavirati parisuddhaṭṭhena brahmacariyaṃ nāma, taṃ cara. So sukhaṃ na
atk-s0513a1:1907_5: vihāhisīti so tvaṃ etaṃ brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanto jhānasukhaṃ maggasukhaṃ phalasukhañca
atk-s0513a1:1907_6: na vihāhisi, etaṃ sukhaṃ na vijahissati, etasmā sukhā na parihāyissasīti attho. “Na
atk-s0513a1:1908_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:1908_1: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Satthā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā corajeṭṭhako ānando
atk-s0513a1:1912_0: Māsu nandi icchati manti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ upāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1912_1: Eko kira sāvatthivāsī upāsako tīsu saraṇesu pañcasu ca sīlesu patiṭṭhito buddhamāmako,
atk-s0513a1:1912_2: dhammamāmako, saṅghamāmako, bhariyā panassa dussīlā pāpadhammā. Yaṃ divasaṃ micchācāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1912_3: carati, taṃ divasaṃ satakītadāsī viya hoti, micchācārassa pana akatadivase sāminī
atk-s0513a1:1912_4: viya hoti caṇḍā pharusā. So tassā bhāvaṃ jānituṃ na sakkoti, atha tāya ubbāḷho buddhūpaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1912_5: na gacchati. Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ gandhapupphādīni ādāya āgantvā vanditvā nisinnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1912_6: satthā āha – “kiṃ nu kho tvaṃ, upāsaka, sattaṭṭha divase buddhūpaṭṭhānaṃ nāgacchasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1912_7: Gharaṇī me, bhante, ekasmiṃ divase satakītadāsī viya hoti, ekasmiṃ divase sāminī
atk-s0513a1:1912_8: viya caṇḍā pharusā. Ahaṃ tassā bhāvaṃ jānituṃ na sakkomi, svāhaṃ tāya ubbāḷho buddhūpaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1912_9: nāgacchāmīti. Athassa vacanaṃ sutvā satthā “upāsaka, ‘mātugāmassa bhāvo nāma dujjāno’ti
atk-s0513a1:1912_10: pubbepi te paṇḍitā kathayiṃsu, tvaṃ pana taṃ bhavasaṅkhepagatattā sallakkhetuṃ na
atk-s0513a1:1912_11: sakkosī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1913_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā
atk-s0513a1:1913_1: pañca māṇavakasatāni sippaṃ sikkhāpeti. Atheko tiroraṭṭhavāsiko brāhmaṇamāṇavako
atk-s0513a1:1913_2: āgantvā tassa santike sippaṃ uggaṇhanto ekāya itthiyā paṭibaddhacitto hutvā taṃ bhariyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1913_3: katvā tasmiṃyeva bārāṇasinagare vasanto dve tisso velāyo ācariyassa upaṭṭhānaṃ na
atk-s0513a1:1913_4: gacchati. Sā panassa bhariyā dussīlā pāpadhammā. Micchācāraṃ ciṇṇadivase dāsī viya
atk-s0513a1:1913_5: hoti, aciṇṇadivase sāminī viya hoti caṇḍā pharusā. So tassā bhāvaṃ jānituṃ asakkonto
atk-s0513a1:1913_6: tāya ubbāḷho ākulacitto ācariyassa upaṭṭhānaṃ na gacchati. Atha naṃ sattaṭṭha divase
atk-s0513a1:1913_7: atikkamitvā āgataṃ “kiṃ, māṇava, na paññāyasī”ti ācariyo pucchi. So “bhariyā maṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1913_8: ācariya, ekadivasaṃ icchati pattheti, dāsī viya nihatamānā hoti. Ekadivasaṃ sāminī
atk-s0513a1:1913_9: viya thaddhā caṇḍā pharusā, ahaṃ tassā bhāvaṃ jānituṃ na sakkomi, tāya ubbāḷho ākulacitto
atk-s0513a1:1913_10: tumhākaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ nāgatomhī”ti. Ācariyo “evametaṃ, māṇava, itthiyo nāma anācāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1913_11: ciṇṇadivase sāmikaṃ anuvattanti, dāsī viya nihatamānā honti. Anāciṇṇadivase pana
atk-s0513a1:1913_12: mānatthaddhā hutvā sāmikaṃ na gaṇenti. Evaṃ itthiyo nāmetā anācārā dussīlā, tāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1913_13: bhāvo nāma dujjāno, tāsu icchantīsupi anicchantīsupi majjhatteneva bhavitabba”nti
atk-s0513a1:1915: “Mā su nandi icchati maṃ, mā su soci na micchati;
atk-s0513a1:1917_0: Tattha mā su nandi icchati manti su-kāro nipātamattaṃ, “ayaṃ itthī maṃ icchati pattheti,
atk-s0513a1:1917_1: mayi sinehaṃ karotī”ti mā tussi. Mā su soci na micchatīti “ayaṃ maṃ na icchatī”tipi
atk-s0513a1:1917_2: mā soci, tassā icchamānāya nandiṃ, na icchamānāya ca sokaṃ akatvā majjhattova hohīti
atk-s0513a1:1917_3: dīpeti. Thīnaṃ bhāvo durājānoti itthīnaṃ bhāvo nāma itthimāyāya paṭicchannattā durājāno.
atk-s0513a1:1917_4: Yathā kiṃ? Macchassevodake gatanti yathā macchassa gamanaṃ udakena paṭicchannattā
atk-s0513a1:1917_5: dujjānaṃ, teneva so kevaṭṭe āgate udakena gamanaṃ paṭicchādetvā palāyati, attānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1917_6: gaṇhituṃ na deti, evameva itthiyo mahantampi dussīlakammaṃ katvā “mayaṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1917_7: na karomā”ti attanā katakammaṃ itthimāyāya paṭicchādetvā sāmike vañcenti. Evaṃ itthiyo
atk-s0513a1:1917_8: nāmetā pāpadhammā durājānā, tāsu majjhattoyeva sukhito hotīti.
atk-s0513a1:1918_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto antevāsikassa ovādaṃ adāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya so tassā upari majjhattova
atk-s0513a1:1918_1: ahosi. Sāpissa bhariyā “ācariyena kira me dussīlabhāvo ñāto”ti tato paṭṭhāya na anācāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1918_2: cari. Sāpi tassa upāsakassa itthī “sammāsambuddhena kira mayhaṃ durācārabhāvo ñāto”ti
atk-s0513a1:1918_3: tato paṭṭhāya pāpakammaṃ nāma na akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1919_0: Satthāpi imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne so upāsako
atk-s0513a1:1919_1: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, satthā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā
atk-s0513a1:1919_2: jayampatikāyeva idāni jayampatikā, ācariyo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1923_0: Yathā nadī ca pantho cāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tathārūpaṃyeva upāsakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1923_1: ārabbha kathesi. So pana pariggaṇhanto tassā dussīlabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhaṇḍito cittabyākulatāya
atk-s0513a1:1923_2: sattaṭṭha divase upaṭṭhānaṃ nāgamāsi. So ekadivasaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā tathāgataṃ vanditvā
atk-s0513a1:1923_3: nisinno “kasmā sattaṭṭha divasāni nāgatosī”ti vutte “bhariyā me, bhante, dussīlā,
atk-s0513a1:1923_4: tassā upari byākulacittatāya nāgatomhī”ti āha. Satthā “upāsaka, itthīsu ‘anācārā
atk-s0513a1:1923_5: etā’ti kopaṃ akatvā majjhatteneva bhavituṃ vaṭṭatīti pubbepi te paṇḍitā kathayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1923_6: tvaṃ pana bhavantarena paṭicchannattā taṃ kāraṇaṃ na sallakkhesī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1924_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto purimanayeneva disāpāmokkho
atk-s0513a1:1924_1: ācariyo ahosi. Athassa antevāsiko bhariyāya dosaṃ disvā byākulacittatāya katipāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1924_2: anāgantvā ekadivasaṃ ācariyena pucchito taṃ kāraṇaṃ nivedesi. Athassa ācariyo “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:1924_3: itthiyo nāma sabbasādhāraṇā, tāsu ‘dussīlā etā’ti paṇḍitā kopaṃ na karontī”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a1:1926: “Yathā nadī ca panto ca, pānāgāraṃ sabhā papā;
atk-s0513a1:1927: Evaṃ lokitthiyo nāma, nāsaṃ kujjhanti paṇḍitā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1928_0: Tattha yathā nadīti yathā anekatitthā nadī nhānatthāya sampattasampattānaṃ caṇḍālādīnampi
atk-s0513a1:1928_1: khattiyādīnampi sādhāraṇā, na tattha koci nhāyituṃ na labhati nāma. “Pantho”tiādīsupi
atk-s0513a1:1928_2: yathā mahāmaggopi sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇo, na koci tena gantuṃ na labhati. Pānāgārampi
atk-s0513a1:1928_3: surāgehaṃ sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ, yo yo pātukāmo, sabbo tattha pavisateva. Puññatthikehi
atk-s0513a1:1928_4: tattha tattha manussānaṃ nivāsatthāya katā sabhāpi sādhāraṇā, na tattha koci pavisituṃ
atk-s0513a1:1928_5: na labhati. Mahāmagge pānīyacāṭiyo ṭhapetvā katā papāpi sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇā, na tattha
atk-s0513a1:1928_6: koci pānīyaṃ pivituṃ na labhati. Evaṃ lokitthiyo nāmāti evameva tāta māṇava imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1928_7: loke itthiyopi sabbasādhāraṇāva, teneva ca sādhāraṇaṭṭhena nadīpanthapānāgārasabhāpapāsadisā.
atk-s0513a1:1928_8: Tasmā nāsaṃ kujjhanti paṇḍitā, etāsaṃ itthīnaṃ “lāmikā etā anācārā dussīlā sabbasādhāraṇā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1928_9: cintetvā paṇḍitā chekā buddhisampannā na kujjhantīti.
atk-s0513a1:1929_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto antevāsikassa ovādaṃ adāsi, so taṃ ovādaṃ sutvā majjhatto ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1929_1: Bhariyāpissa “ācariyena kiramhi ñātā”ti tato paṭṭhāya pāpakammaṃ na akāsi. Tassapi
atk-s0513a1:1929_2: upāsakassa bhariyā “satthārā kiramhi ñātā”ti tato paṭṭhāya pāpakammaṃ na akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1930_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne upāsako sotāpattiphale
atk-s0513a1:1930_1: patiṭṭhahi. Satthāpi anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā jayampatikāva
atk-s0513a1:1930_2: etarahi jayampatikā, ācariyabrāhmaṇo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1934_0: Ekā icchā pure āsīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto saṃkilesaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Eko
atk-s0513a1:1934_1: kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā ratanasāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a1:1934_2: paṭipannako yogāvacaro avissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhāno hutvā ekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0513a1:1934_3: caranto ekaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ itthiṃ disvā subhavasena indriyāni bhinditvā olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:1934_4: Tassa abbhantare kileso cali, vāsiyā ākoṭitakhīrarukkho viya ahosi. So tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:1934_5: kilesavasiko hutvā neva kāyassādaṃ na cittassādaṃ labhati, bhantamigasappaṭibhāgo
atk-s0513a1:1934_6: sāsane anabhirato parūḷhakesalomanakho kiliṭṭhacīvaro ahosi. Athassa indriyavikāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1934_7: disvā sahāyakā bhikkhū “kiṃ nu kho te, āvuso, na yathā porāṇāni indriyānī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1935_0: Atha naṃ te satthu santikaṃ nayiṃsu. Satthā “kiṃ, bhikkhave, anicchamānaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1935_1: ādāya āgatatthā”ti pucchi. “Ayaṃ, bhante, bhikkhu anabhirato”ti? “Saccaṃ bhikkhū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1935_2: “Saccaṃ bhagavā”ti. “Ko taṃ ukkaṇṭhāpesī”ti? “Ahaṃ, bhante, piṇḍāya caranto ekaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1935_3: itthiṃ disvā indriyāni bhinditvā olokesiṃ, atha me kileso cali, tenamhi ukkaṇṭhito”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1935_4: Atha naṃ satthā “anacchariyametaṃ bhikkhu, yaṃ tvaṃ indriyāni bhinditvā visabhāgārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1935_5: subhavasena olokento kilesehi kampito, pubbe pañcābhiññā aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino jhānabalena
atk-s0513a1:1935_6: kilese vikkhambhetvā visuddhacittā gaganatalacarā bodhisattāpi indriyāni bhinditvā
atk-s0513a1:1935_7: visabhāgārammaṇaṃ olokayamānā jhānā parihāyitvā kilesehi kampitā mahādukkhaṃ anubhaviṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1935_8: Na hi sineruuppāṭanakavāto hatthimattaṃ muṇḍapabbataṃ, mahājambuummūlakavāto chinnataṭe
atk-s0513a1:1935_9: virūḷhagacchakaṃ, mahāsamuddaṃ vā pana sosanakavāto khuddakataḷākaṃ kismiñcideva
atk-s0513a1:1935_10: gaṇeti, evaṃ uttamabuddhīnaṃ nāma visuddhacittānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ aññāṇabhāvakarā
atk-s0513a1:1935_11: kilesā tayi kiṃ lajjissanti, visuddhāpi sattā saṃkilissanti, uttamayasasamaṅginopi
atk-s0513a1:1936_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe ekassa mahāvibhavassa
atk-s0513a1:1936_1: brāhmaṇassa kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto sabbasippānaṃ pāraṃ gantvā kāme pahāya
atk-s0513a1:1936_2: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā pañca abhiññā ca aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-s0513a1:1936_3: ca uppādetvā jhānasukhena vītināmento himavantappadese vāsaṃ kappesi. So ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1936_4: kāle loṇambilasevanatthāya himavantā otaritvā bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase
atk-s0513a1:1936_5: katasarīrapaṭijaggano rattavākamayaṃ nivāsanapārupanaṃ saṇṭhāpetvā ajinacammaṃ ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1936_6: aṃse katvā jaṭāmaṇḍalaṃ bandhitvā bhikkhābhājanamādāya bārāṇasiyaṃ bhikkhāya caramāno
atk-s0513a1:1936_7: rañño gharadvāraṃ sampāpuṇi. Rājā tassa iriyāpatheyeva pasīditvā pakkosāpetvā mahārahe
atk-s0513a1:1936_8: āsane nisīdāpetvā paṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena santappetvā katānumodanaṃ uyyāne
atk-s0513a1:1936_9: vasanatthāya yāci. So sampaṭicchitvā rājagehe bhuñjitvā rājakulaṃ ovadamāno tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1937_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā kupitaṃ paccantaṃ vūpasametuṃ gacchanto mudulakkhaṇaṃ nāma aggamahesiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1937_1: “appamattā ayyassa upaṭṭhānaṃ karohī”ti vatvā agamāsi. Bodhisatto rañño gatakālato
atk-s0513a1:1937_2: paṭṭhāya attano ruccanavelāya rājagehaṃ gacchati. Athekadivasaṃ mudulakkhaṇā bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:1937_3: āhāraṃ sampādetvā – “ajja ayyo cirāyatī”ti gandhodakena nhāyitvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā
atk-s0513a1:1937_4: mahātale cūḷasayanaṃ paññāpetvā bodhisattassa āgamanaṃ olokayamānā nipajji. Bodhisattopi
atk-s0513a1:1937_5: attano velaṃ sallakkhetvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya ākāseneva rājanivesanaṃ agamāsi. Mudulakkhaṇā
atk-s0513a1:1937_6: vākacīrasaddaṃ sutvāva “ayyo, āgato”ti vegena uṭṭhahi, tassā vegena uṭṭhahantiyā
atk-s0513a1:1937_7: maṭṭhasāṭako bhassi. Tāpasopi sīhapañjarena pavisanto deviyā visabhāgarūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1937_8: indriyāni bhinditvā subhavasena olokesi. Athassa abbhantare kileso cali, vāsiyā pahaṭakhīrarukkho
atk-s0513a1:1937_9: viya ahosi. Tāvadevassa jhānaṃ antaradhāyi, chinnapakkho kāko viya ahosi. So ṭhitakova
atk-s0513a1:1937_10: āhāraṃ gahetvā abhuñjitvāva kilesakampito pāsādā oruyha uyyānaṃ gantvā paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1937_11: pavisitvā phalakattharaṇasayanassa heṭṭhā āhāraṃ ṭhapetvā visabhāgārammaṇena baddho
atk-s0513a1:1937_12: kilesagginā ḍayhamāno nirāhāratāya sussamāno satta divasāni phalakattharaṇe nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:1938_0: Sattame divase rājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā āgato nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā nivesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1938_1: agantvāva “ayyaṃ passissāmī”ti uyyānaṃ gantvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā taṃ nipannakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1938_2: disvā “ekaṃ aphāsukaṃ jātaṃ maññe”ti paṇṇasālaṃ sodhāpetvā pāde parimajjanto “kiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1938_3: ayya, aphāsuka”nti pucchi. “Mahārāja aññaṃ me aphāsukaṃ natthi, kilesavasena panamhi
atk-s0513a1:1938_4: paṭibaddhacitto jāto”ti. “Kahaṃ paṭibaddhaṃ te, ayya, citta”nti? “Mudulakkhaṇāya,
atk-s0513a1:1938_5: mahārājā”ti. “Sādhu ayya, ahaṃ mudulakkhaṇaṃ tumhākaṃ dammī”ti tāpasaṃ ādāya nivesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1938_6: pavisitvā deviṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ katvā tāpasassa adāsi. Dadamānoyeva ca mudulakkhaṇāya
atk-s0513a1:1938_7: saññamadāsi “tayā attano balena ayyaṃ rakkhituṃ vāyamitabba”nti. “Sādhu, deva, rakkhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1939_0: Atha naṃ mahādvārato nikkhantakāle “ayya, amhākaṃ ekaṃ gehaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:1939_1: rājānaṃ gehaṃ yācāhī”ti āha. Tāpaso gantvā gehaṃ yāci. Rājā manussānaṃ vaccakuṭikiccaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1939_2: sādhayamānaṃ ekaṃ chaḍḍitagehaṃ dāpesi. So deviṃ gahetvā tattha agamāsi, sā pavisituṃ
atk-s0513a1:1939_3: na icchati. “Kiṃkāraṇā na pavisasī”ti? “Asucibhāvenā”ti. Idāni “kiṃ karomī”ti. “Paṭijaggāhi
atk-s0513a1:1939_4: na”nti vatvā rañño santikaṃ pesetvā “gaccha, kuddālaṃ āhara, pacchiṃ āharā”ti āharāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1939_5: asuciñca saṅkārañca chaḍḍāpetvā gāmayaṃ āharāpetvā limpāpetvā punapi “gaccha, mañcaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1939_6: āhara, pīṭhaṃ āhara, attharaṇaṃ āhara, cāṭiṃ āhara, ghaṭaṃ āharā”ti ekamekaṃ āharāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1939_7: puna udakāharaṇādīnaṃ atthāya āṇāpesi. So ghaṭaṃ ādāya udakaṃ āharitvā cāṭiṃ pūretvā
atk-s0513a1:1939_8: nhānodakaṃ sajjetvā sayanaṃ atthari. Atha naṃ sayane ekato nisinnaṃ dāṭhikāsu gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1939_9: “tava samaṇabhāvaṃ vā brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ vā na jānāsī”ti oṇametvā attano abhimukhaṃ ākaḍḍhi.
atk-s0513a1:1939_10: So tasmiṃ kāle satiṃ paṭilabhi, ettakaṃ pana kālaṃ aññāṇī ahosi. Evaṃ aññāṇakaraṇā
atk-s0513a1:1939_11: kilesā nāma. “Kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, andhakaraṇaṃ aññāṇakaraṇa”ntiādi cettha vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1940_0: So satiṃ paṭilabhitvā cintesi “ayaṃ taṇhā vaḍḍhamānā mama catūhi apāyehi sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ
atk-s0513a1:1940_1: na dassati, ajjeva mayā imaṃ rañño niyyādetvā himavantaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So
atk-s0513a1:1940_2: taṃ ādāya rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “mahārāja, tava deviyā mayhaṃ attho natthi, kevalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1940_3: me imaṃ nissāya taṇhā vaḍḍhitā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1943: Yato laddhā aḷārakkhī, icchā icchaṃ vijāyathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1944_0: Tatrāyaṃ piṇḍattho – mahārāja, mayhaṃ imaṃ tava deviṃ mudulakkhaṇaṃ alabhitvā pure
atk-s0513a1:1944_1: “aho vatāhaṃ etaṃ labheyya”nti ekā icchā āsi, ekāva taṇhā uppajji. Yato pana me ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1944_2: aḷārakkhī visālanettā sobhanalocanā laddhā, atha me sā purimikā icchā gehataṇhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1944_3: upakaraṇataṇhaṃ upabhogataṇhanti uparūpari aññaṃ nānappakāraṃ icchaṃ vijāyatha janesi
atk-s0513a1:1944_4: uppādesi. Sā kho pana me evaṃ vaḍḍhamānā icchā apāyato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na dassati,
atk-s0513a1:1944_5: alaṃ me imāya, tvaññeva tava bhariyaṃ gaṇha, ahaṃ pana himavantaṃ gamissāmīti tāvadeva
atk-s0513a1:1944_6: naṭṭhaṃ jhānaṃ uppādetvā ākāse nisinno dhammaṃ desetvā rañño ovādaṃ datvā ākāseneva
atk-s0513a1:1944_7: himavantaṃ gantvā puna manussapathaṃ nāma nāgamāsi, brahmavihāre pana bhāvetvā aparihīnajjhāno
atk-s0513a1:1945_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne so bhikkhu arahattaphale
atk-s0513a1:1945_1: patiṭṭhahi. Satthāpi anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājā ānando
atk-s0513a1:1945_2: ahosi, mudulakkhaṇā uppalavaṇṇā, isi pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1949_0: Ucchaṅge deva me puttoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ jānapaditthiṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1949_1: kathesi. Ekasmiñhi samaye kosalaraṭṭhe tayo janā aññatarasmiṃ aṭavimukhe kasanti.
atk-s0513a1:1949_2: Tasmiṃ samaye antoaṭaviyaṃ corā manusse vilumpitvā palāyiṃsu. Manussā te core pariyesitvā
atk-s0513a1:1949_3: apassantā taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgamma “tumhe aṭaviyaṃ vilumpitvā idāni kassakā viya hothā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1949_4: “te corā ime”ti bandhitvā ānetvā kosalarañño adaṃsu. Athekā itthī āgantvā “acchādanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1949_5: me detha, acchādanaṃ me dethā”ti paridevantī punappunaṃ rājanivesanaṃ pariyāti. Rājā
atk-s0513a1:1949_6: tassā saddaṃ sutvā “gacchatha, detha imissā acchādana”nti āha. Manussā sāṭakaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1949_7: adaṃsu. Sā taṃ disvā “nāhaṃ etaṃ acchādanaṃ yācāmi, sāmikacchādanaṃ yācāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1949_8: Manussā gantvā rañño ārocayiṃsu “na kiresā idaṃ acchādanaṃ katheti, sāmikacchādanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1949_9: kathetī”ti. Atha naṃ rājā pakkosāpetvā “tvaṃ kira sāmikacchādanaṃ yācasī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1949_10: Āma, deva, itthiyā hi sāmiko acchādanaṃ nāma, sāmike hi asati sahassamūlampi sāṭakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1949_11: nivatthā itthī naggāyeva nāma. Imassa panatthassa sādhanatthaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:1951: Itthīpi vidhavā naggā, yassāpi dasa bhātaro”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:1953_0: Rājā tassā pasanno “ime te tayo janā ke hontī”ti pucchi. “Eko me, deva, sāmiko, eko
atk-s0513a1:1953_1: bhātā, eko putto”ti. Rājā “ahaṃ te tuṭṭho, imesu tīsu ekaṃ demi, kataraṃ icchasī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1953_2: pucchi. Sā āha “ahaṃ, deva, jīvamānā ekaṃ sāmikaṃ labhissāmi, puttampi labhissāmiyeva,
atk-s0513a1:1953_3: mātāpitūnaṃ pana me matattā bhātāva dullabho, bhātaraṃ me dehi, devā”ti. Rājā tussitvā
atk-s0513a1:1953_4: tayopi vissajjesi. Evaṃ taṃ ekikaṃ nissāya te tayo janā dukkhato muttā. Taṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1953_5: bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭaṃ jātaṃ. Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1953_6: ekaṃ itthiṃ nissāya tayo janā dukkhato muttā”ti tassā guṇakathāya nisīdiṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0513a1:1953_7: āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1953_8: vutte “na, bhikkhave, esā itthī idāneva te tayo jane dukkhā moceti, pubbepi mocesiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1954_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente tayo janā aṭavimukhe kasantīti sabbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1954_1: purimasadisameva. Tadā pana raññā “tīsu janesu kaṃ icchasī”ti vutte sā āha – “tayopi
atk-s0513a1:1954_2: dātuṃ na sakkotha, devā”ti? “Āma, na sakkomī”ti. “Sace tayo dātuṃ na sakkotha, bhātaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1954_3: me dethā”ti. “Puttaṃ vā sāmikaṃ vā gaṇha, kiṃ te bhātarā”ti ca vuttā “ete nāma deva
atk-s0513a1:1954_4: sulabhā, bhātā pana dullabho”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1956: “Ucchaṅge deva me putto, pathe dhāvantiyā pati;
atk-s0513a1:1957: Tañca desaṃ na passāmi, yato sodariyamānaye”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1958_0: Tattha ucchaṅge, deva, me puttoti deva, mayhaṃ putto ucchaṅgeyeva. Yathā hi araññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1958_1: pavisitvā ucchaṅge katvā ḍākaṃ uccinitvā tattha pakkhipantiyā ucchaṅge ḍākaṃ nāma
atk-s0513a1:1958_2: sulabhaṃ hoti, evaṃ itthiyā puttopi sulabho ucchaṅge ḍākasadisova. Tena vuttaṃ “ucchaṅge,
atk-s0513a1:1958_3: deva, me putto”ti. Pathe dhāvantiyā patīti maggaṃ āruyha ekikāya gacchamānāyapi hi
atk-s0513a1:1958_4: itthiyā pati nāma sulabho, diṭṭhadiṭṭhoyeva hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “pathe dhāvantiyā patī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1958_5: Tañca desaṃ na passāmi, yato sodariyamānayeti yasmā pana me mātāpitaro natthi, tasmā
atk-s0513a1:1958_6: idāni taṃ mātukucchisaṅkhātaṃ aññaṃ desaṃ na passāmi. Yato ahaṃ samāne udare jātattā
atk-s0513a1:1958_7: saudariyasaṅkhātaṃ bhātaraṃ āneyyaṃ, tasmā bhātaraṃyeva me dethāti.
atk-s0513a1:1959: Rājā “saccaṃ esā vadatī”ti tuṭṭhacitto tayopi jane bandhanāgārato ānetvā adāsi, sā tayopi te gahetvā gatā.
atk-s0513a1:1960_0: Satthāpi “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepesā ime tayo jane dukkhato mocesiyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1960_1: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “atīte cattārova
atk-s0513a1:1960_2: etarahi cattāro, rājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1964_0: Yasmiṃ mano nivisatīti idaṃ satthā sāketaṃ nissāya añjanavane viharanto ekaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1964_1: ārabbha kathesi. Bhagavato kira bhikkhusaṅghaparivutassa sāketaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanakāle
atk-s0513a1:1964_2: eko sāketanagaravāsī mahallakabrāhmaṇo nagarato bahi gacchanto antaradvāre dasabalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1964_3: disvā pādesu patitvā gopphakesu gāḷhaṃ gahetvā “tāta, nanu nāma puttehi jiṇṇakāle
atk-s0513a1:1964_4: mātāpitaro paṭijaggitabbā, kasmā ettakaṃ kālaṃ amhākaṃ attānaṃ na dassesi? Mayā tāva
atk-s0513a1:1964_5: diṭṭhosi, mātaraṃ pana passituṃ ehī”ti satthāraṃ gahetvā attano gehaṃ agamāsi. Satthā
atk-s0513a1:1964_6: tattha gantvā nisīdi paññatte āsane saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena. Brāhmaṇīpi āgantvā satthu
atk-s0513a1:1964_7: pādesu patitvā “tāta, ettakaṃ kālaṃ kahaṃ gatosi, nanu nāma mātāpitaro mahallakakāle
atk-s0513a1:1964_8: upaṭṭhātabbā”ti paridevi. Puttadhītaropi “etha, bhātaraṃ vandathā”ti vandāpesi. Ubho
atk-s0513a1:1964_9: tuṭṭhamānasā mahādānaṃ adaṃsu. Satthā bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā tesaṃ dvinnampi janānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1964_10: jarāsuttaṃ kathesi. Suttapariyosāne ubhopi anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Satthā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0513a1:1965_0: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, brāhmaṇo ‘tathāgatassa
atk-s0513a1:1965_1: pitā suddhodano, mātā mahāmāyā’ti jānāti, jānantova saddhiṃ brāhmaṇiyā tathāgataṃ
atk-s0513a1:1965_2: ‘amhākaṃ putto’ti vadati, satthāpi adhivāseti. Kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti? Satthā tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1965_3: kathaṃ sutvā “bhikkhave, ubhopi te attano puttameva ‘putto’ti vadantī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1966_0: Bhikkhave, ayaṃ brāhmaṇo atīte nirantaraṃ pañca jātisatāni mayhaṃ pitā ahosi, pañca
atk-s0513a1:1966_1: jātisatāni cūḷapitā, pañca jātisatāni mahāpitā. Esāpi brāhmaṇī nirantarameva pañca
atk-s0513a1:1966_2: jātisatāni mātā ahosi, pañca jātisatāni cūḷamātā, pañca jātisatāni mahāmātā. Evāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1966_3: diyaḍḍhajātisahassaṃ brāhmaṇassa hatthe saṃvaḍḍho, diyaḍḍhajātisahassaṃ brāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0513a1:1966_4: hatthe saṃvaḍḍhoti tīṇi jātisahassāni kathetvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1970_0: Tattha yasmiṃ mano nivisatīti yasmiṃ puggale diṭṭhamatteyeva cittaṃ patiṭṭhāti. Cittañcāpi
atk-s0513a1:1970_1: pasīdatīti yasmiṃ diṭṭhamatte cittaṃ pasīdati, mudukaṃ hoti. Adiṭṭhapubbake poseti
atk-s0513a1:1970_2: pakatiyā tasmiṃ attabhāve adiṭṭhapubbepi puggale. Kāmaṃ tasmimpi vissaseti anubhūtapubbasineheneva
atk-s0513a1:1970_3: tasmimpi puggale ekaṃsena vissase, vissāsaṃ āpajjatiyevāti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1971: Evaṃ satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā brāhmaṇo ca brāhmaṇī ca ete eva ahesuṃ, putto pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1975_0: Dhiratthu taṃ visaṃ vantanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dhammasenāpatiṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1975_1: kathesi. Therassa kira piṭṭhakhajjakakhādanakāle manussā saṅghassa bahuṃ piṭṭhakhādanīyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1975_2: gahetvā vihāraṃ agamaṃsu, bhikkhusaṅghassa gahitāvasesaṃ bahu atirittaṃ ahosi. Manussā
atk-s0513a1:1975_3: “bhante, antogāmagatānampi gaṇhathā”ti āhaṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe therassa saddhivihāriko
atk-s0513a1:1975_4: daharo antogāme hoti, tassa koṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ anāgacchante “atidivā hotī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1975_5: therassa adaṃsu. Therena tasmiṃ paribhutte daharo agamāsi. Atha naṃ thero “mayaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1975_6: āvuso, tuyhaṃ ṭhapitakhādanīyaṃ paribhuñjimhā”ti āha. So “madhuraṃ nāma, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1975_7: kassa appiya”nti āha. Mahātherassa saṃvego uppajji. So ito paṭṭhāya “piṭṭhakhādanīyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1975_8: na khādissāmī”ti adhiṭṭhāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya kira sāriputtattherena piṭṭhakhādanīyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1975_9: nāma na khāditapubbaṃ. Tassa piṭṭhakhādanīyaṃ akhādanabhāvo bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭo
atk-s0513a1:1975_10: jāto. Bhikkhū taṃ kathaṃ kathentā dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Atha satthā āgantvā “kāya
atk-s0513a1:1975_11: nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:1975_12: sāriputto ekavāraṃ jahitakaṃ jīvitaṃ pariccajantopi puna na gaṇhātiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1976_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto visavejjakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:1976_1: vejjakammena jīvikaṃ kappesi. Athekaṃ janapadamanussaṃ sappo ḍaṃsi, tassa ñātakā
atk-s0513a1:1976_2: pamādaṃ akatvā khippaṃ vejjaṃ ānayiṃsu. Vejjo āha “kiṃ tāva osadhena, paribhāvetvā
atk-s0513a1:1976_3: visaṃ harāmi, daṭṭhasappaṃ āvāhetvā daṭṭhaṭṭhānato teneva visaṃ ākaḍḍhāpemī”ti. “Sappaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1976_4: āvāhetvā visaṃ ākaḍḍhāpehī”ti. So sappaṃ āvāhetvā “tayā ayaṃ daṭṭho”ti āha. “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:1976_5: mayā”ti. “Tayā daṭṭhaṭṭhānato tvaññeva mukhena visaṃ ākaḍḍhāhī”ti. “Mayā ekavāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1976_6: jahitakaṃ puna na gahitapubbaṃ, nāhaṃ mayā jahitavisaṃ ākaḍḍhissāmī”ti. So dārūni
atk-s0513a1:1976_7: āharāpetvā aggiṃ katvā āha “sace attano visaṃ nākaḍḍhasi, imaṃ aggiṃ pavisā”ti. Sappo
atk-s0513a1:1976_8: “api aggiṃ pavisissāmi, nevattanā ekavāraṃ jahitavisaṃ paccāharissāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1979: Vantaṃ paccāharissāmi, mataṃ me jīvitā vara”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1980_0: Tattha dhiratthūti garahatthe nipāto. Taṃ visanti yamahaṃ jīvitakāraṇā vantaṃ visaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1980_1: paccāharissāmi, taṃ vantaṃ visaṃ dhiratthu. Mataṃ me jīvitā varanti tassa visassa
atk-s0513a1:1980_2: apaccāharaṇakāraṇā yaṃ aggiṃ pavisitvā maraṇaṃ, taṃ mama jīvitato varanti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1981_0: Evañca pana vatvā aggiṃ pavisituṃ pāyāsi. Atha naṃ vejjo nivāretvā taṃ purisaṃ osadhehi
atk-s0513a1:1981_1: ca mantehi ca nibbisaṃ arogaṃ katvā sappassa sīlāni datvā “ito paṭṭhāya mā kañci
atk-s0513a1:1982_0: Satthāpi “na, bhikkhave, sāriputto ekavāraṃ jahitakaṃ jīvitampi pariccajanto puna
atk-s0513a1:1982_1: gaṇhātī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā
atk-s0513a1:1982_2: sappo sāriputto ahosi, vejjo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1986_0: Na taṃ jitaṃ sādhu jitanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cittahatthasāriputtaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:1986_1: kathesi. So kira sāvatthiyaṃ eko kuladārako. Athekadivasaṃ kasitvā āgacchanto vihāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1986_2: pavisitvā ekassa therassa pattato siniddhaṃ madhuraṃ paṇītabhojanaṃ labhitvā cintesi
atk-s0513a1:1986_3: “mayaṃ rattindivaṃ sahatthena nānākammāni kurumānāpi evarūpaṃ madhurāhāraṃ na labhāma,
atk-s0513a1:1986_4: mayāpi samaṇena bhavitabba”nti. So pabbajitvā māsaḍḍhamāsaccayena ayoniso manasikaronto
atk-s0513a1:1986_5: kilesavasiko hutvā vibbhamitvā puna bhattena kilamanto āgantvā pabbajitvā abhidhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1986_6: uggaṇhi. Imināva upāyena cha vāre vibbhamitvā pabbajito. Tato sattame bhikkhubhāve
atk-s0513a1:1986_7: sattappakaraṇiko hutvā bahū bhikkhū dhammaṃ vācento vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1986_8: pāpuṇi. Athassa sahāyakā bhikkhū “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso cittahattha, pubbe viya te etarahi
atk-s0513a1:1986_9: kilesā na vaḍḍhantī”ti parihāsaṃ kariṃsu. “Āvuso, abhabbo dāni ahaṃ ito paṭṭhāya gihibhāvāyā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1987_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ arahattaṃ patte dhammasabhāyaṃ kathā udapādi “āvuso, evarūpassa nāma
atk-s0513a1:1987_1: arahattassa upanissaye sati āyasmā cittahatthasāriputto chakkhattuṃ uppabbajito,
atk-s0513a1:1987_2: aho mahādoso puthujjanabhāvo”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi
atk-s0513a1:1987_3: kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “bhikkhave, puthujjanacittaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1987_4: nāma lahukaṃ dunniggahaṃ, ārammaṇavasena gantvā allīyati, ekavāraṃ allīnaṃ na sakkā
atk-s0513a1:1987_5: hoti khippaṃ mocetuṃ, evarūpassa cittassa damatho sādhu. Dantameva hi taṃ sukhaṃ āvahati.
atk-s0513a1:1989: Cittassa damatho sādhu, cittaṃ dantaṃ sukhāvahaṃ”. ;
atk-s0513a1:1990_0: Tassa pana dunniggahatāya pubbe paṇḍitā ekaṃ kuddālakaṃ nissāya taṃ jahituṃ asakkontā
atk-s0513a1:1990_1: lobhavasena chakkhattuṃ uppabbajitvā sattame pabbajitabhāve jhānaṃ uppādetvā taṃ
atk-s0513a1:1991_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto paṇṇikakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1991_1: pāpuṇi, “kuddālapaṇḍito”tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So kuddālakena bhūmiparikammaṃ katvā ḍākañceva
atk-s0513a1:1991_2: alābukumbhaṇḍaeḷālukādīni ca vapitvā tāni vikkiṇanto kapaṇajīvikaṃ kappesi. Tañhissa
atk-s0513a1:1991_3: ekaṃ kuddālakaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ dhanaṃ nāma natthi. So ekadivasaṃ cintesi “kiṃ me
atk-s0513a1:1991_4: gharāvāsena, nikkhamitvā pabbajissāmī”ti. Athekadivasaṃ kuddālakaṃ paṭicchannaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:1991_5: ṭhapetvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā taṃ kuddālakaṃ anussaritvā lobhaṃ chindituṃ asakkonto
atk-s0513a1:1991_6: kuṇṭhakuddālakaṃ nissāya uppabbaji. Evaṃ dutiyampi, tatiyampīti cha vāre taṃ kuddālakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1991_7: paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nikkhipitvā pabbajito ceva uppabbajito ca.
atk-s0513a1:1992_0: Sattame pana vāre cintesi “ahaṃ imaṃ kuṇṭhakuddālakaṃ nissāya punappunaṃ uppabbajito,
atk-s0513a1:1992_1: idāni naṃ mahānadiyaṃ pakkhipitvā pabbajissāmī”ti nadītīraṃ gantvā “sacassa patitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1992_2: passissāmi, punāgantvā uddharitukāmatā bhaveyyā”ti taṃ kuddālakaṃ daṇḍe gahetvā nāgabalo
atk-s0513a1:1992_3: thāmasampanno sīsassa uparibhāge tikkhattuṃ āvijjhitvā akkhīni nimmīletvā nadīmajjhe
atk-s0513a1:1992_4: khipitvā “jitaṃ me jitaṃ me”ti tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe bārāṇasirājā
atk-s0513a1:1992_5: paccantaṃ vūpasametvā āgato nadiyā sīsaṃ nhāyitvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito hatthikkhandhena
atk-s0513a1:1992_6: gacchamāno taṃ bodhisattassa saddaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ puriso ‘jitaṃ me jitaṃ me’ti vadati,
atk-s0513a1:1992_7: ko nu kho etena jito, pakkosatha na”nti pakkosāpetvā “bho purisa, ahaṃ tāva vijitasaṅgāmo
atk-s0513a1:1992_8: idāni jayaṃ gahetvā āgacchāmi, tayā pana ko jito”ti pucchi. Bodhisatto “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:1992_9: tayā saṅgāmasatampi saṅgāmasahassampi saṅgāmasatasahassampi jinantena dujjitameva
atk-s0513a1:1992_10: kilesānaṃ ajitattā. Ahaṃ pana mama abbhantare lobhaṃ niggaṇhanto kilese jini”nti
atk-s0513a1:1992_11: kathentoyeva mahānadiṃ oloketvā āpokasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattetvā sampattānubhāvo
atk-s0513a1:1992_12: ākāse nisīditvā rañño dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1994: “Na taṃ jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ avajīyati;
atk-s0513a1:1995: Taṃ kho jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ nāvajīyatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1996_0: Tattha na taṃ jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ avajīyatīti yaṃ paccāmitte parājinitvā
atk-s0513a1:1996_1: raṭṭhaṃ jitaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ punapi tehi paccāmittehi avajīyati, taṃ jitaṃ sādhujitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1996_2: nāma na hoti. Kasmā? Puna avajīyanato. Aparo nayo – jitaṃ vuccati jayo. Yo paccāmittehi
atk-s0513a1:1996_3: saddhiṃ yujjhitvā adhigato jayo puna tesu jinantesu, parājayo hoti, so na sādhu na
atk-s0513a1:1996_4: sobhano. Kasmā? Yasmā puna parājayova hoti. Taṃ kho jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1996_5: nāvajīyatīti yaṃ kho pana paccāmitte nimmathetvā jitaṃ puna tehi nāvajīyati, yo vā
atk-s0513a1:1996_6: ekavāraṃ laddho jayo na puna parājayo hoti, taṃ jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ sobhanaṃ, so jayo
atk-s0513a1:1996_7: sādhu sobhano nāma hoti. Kasmā? Puna nāvajīyanato. Tasmā, tvaṃ mahārāja, satakkhattumpi
atk-s0513a1:1996_8: sahassakkhattumpi satasahassakkhattumpi saṅgāmasīsaṃ jinitvāpi saṅgāmayodho nāma
atk-s0513a1:1996_9: na hosi. Kiṃkāraṇā? Attano kilesānaṃ ajitattā. Yo pana ekavārampi attano abbhantare
atk-s0513a1:1996_10: kilese jināti, ayaṃ uttamo saṅgāmasīsayodhoti ākāse nisinnakova buddhalīlāya rañño
atk-s0513a1:2000_0: Rañño pana dhammaṃ suṇantasseva tadaṅgappahānavasena kilesā pahīnā, pabbajjāya cittaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2000_1: nami. Rājabalassapi tatheva kilesā pahīyiṃsu. Rājā “idāni tumhe kahaṃ gamissathā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2000_2: bodhisattaṃ pucchi. “Himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajissāmi, mahārājā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2000_3: “Tena hi ahampi pabbajissāmī”ti bodhisatteneva saddhiṃ nikkhami, balakāyo brāhmaṇagahapatikā
atk-s0513a1:2000_4: sabbā seniyoti sabbopi tasmiṃ ṭhāne sannipatito mahājanakāyo raññā saddhiṃyeva nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:2000_5: Bārāṇasivāsinopi “amhākaṃ kira rājā kuddālapaṇḍitassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajjābhimukho
atk-s0513a1:2000_6: hutvā saddhiṃ balakāyena nikkhanto, mayaṃ idha kiṃ karissāmā”ti dvādasayojanikāya
atk-s0513a1:2000_7: bārāṇasiyā sakalanagaravāsino nikkhamiṃsu. Dvādasayojanikā parisā ahosi. Taṃ ādāya
atk-s0513a1:2001_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakkassa devarañño nisinnāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. So āvajjamāno “kuddālapaṇḍito
atk-s0513a1:2001_1: mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto”ti disvā “mahāsamāgamo bhavissati, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ laddhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2001_2: vaṭṭatī”ti vissakammaṃ āmantetvā “tāta, kuddālapaṇḍito mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto,
atk-s0513a1:2001_3: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, tvaṃ himavantappadesaṃ gantvā same bhūmibhāge dīghato
atk-s0513a1:2001_4: tiṃsayojanaṃ vitthārato pannarasayojanaṃ assamapadaṃ māpehī”ti āha. So “sādhu, devā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2001_5: paṭissuṇitvā gantvā tathā akāsi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana hatthipālajātake
atk-s0513a1:2001_6: āvi bhavissati. Idañca hi tañca ekaparicchedameva. Vissakammopi assamapade paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2001_7: māpetvā dussadde mige ca sakuṇe ca amanusse ca paṭikkamāpetvā tena tena disābhāgena
atk-s0513a1:2001_8: ekapadikamaggaṃ māpetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsi. Kuddālapaṇḍitopi taṃ parisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2001_9: ādāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā sakkadattiyaṃ assamapadaṃ gantvā vissakammena māpitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2001_10: pabbajitaparikkhāraṃ gahetvā paṭhamaṃ attanā pabbajitvā pacchā parisaṃ pabbājetvā
atk-s0513a1:2001_11: assamapadaṃ bhājetvā adāsi. Satta rājāno satta rajjāni chaḍḍayiṃsu. Tiṃsayojanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2001_12: assamapadaṃ pūri. Kuddālapaṇḍito sesakasiṇesupi parikammaṃ katvā brahmavihāre bhāvetvā
atk-s0513a1:2001_13: parisāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi. Sabbe samāpattilābhino hutvā brahmavihāre bhāvetvā
atk-s0513a1:2001_14: brahmalokaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ. Ye pana tesaṃ pāricariyaṃ akaṃsu, te devalokaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2002_0: Satthā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ nāmetaṃ kilesavasena allīnaṃ dummocayaṃ hoti, uppannā
atk-s0513a1:2002_1: lobhadhammā duppajahā, evarūpepi paṇḍite aññāṇe karontī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0513a1:2002_2: saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne keci sotāpannā ahesuṃ, keci sakadāgāmino, keci
atk-s0513a1:2002_3: anāgāmino, keci arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Satthāpi anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a1:2002_4: – “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, parisā buddhaparisā, kuddālapaṇḍito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2012_0: Yo pubbe karaṇīyānīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kuṭumbikaputtatissattheraṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2012_1: kathesi. Ekasmiṃ kira divase sāvatthivāsino aññamaññasahāyakā tiṃsamattā kulaputtā
atk-s0513a1:2012_3: jetavanaṃ gantvā nāgamāḷakasālamāḷakādīsu thokaṃ nisīditvā sāyanhasamaye satthari
atk-s0513a1:2012_4: surabhigandhavāsitāya gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā dhammasabhaṃ gantvā alaṅkatabuddhāsane
atk-s0513a1:2012_5: nisinne saparivārā dhammasabhaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ gandhapupphehi pūjetvā cakkaṅkitatalesu
atk-s0513a1:2012_6: phullapadumasassirikesu pādesu vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā dhammaṃ suṇiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2013_0: Atha nesaṃ etadahosi “yathā yathā kho mayaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāma, pabbajeyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2013_1: Te tathāgatassa dhammasabhāto nikkhantakāle tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2013_2: yāciṃsu, satthā tesaṃ pabbajjaṃ adāsi. Te ācariyupajjhāye ārādhetvā upasampadaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2013_3: pañca vassāni ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike vasitvā dve mātikā paguṇaṃ katvā kappiyākappiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2013_4: ñatvā tisso anumodanā uggaṇhitvā cīvarāni sibbetvā rajitvā “samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2013_5: ācariyupajjhāye āpucchitvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā “mayaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2013_6: bhante, bhavesu ukkaṇṭhitā jātijarābyādhimaraṇabhayabhītā, tesaṃ no saṃsāraparimocanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2013_7: kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathethā”ti yāciṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu sappāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2013_8: vicinitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. Te satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2013_9: vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pariveṇaṃ gantvā ācariyupajjhāye oloketvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0513a1:2014_0: Atha nesaṃ abbhantare eko bhikkhu nāmena kuṭumbikaputtatissatthero nāma kusīto hīnavīriyo
atk-s0513a1:2014_1: rasagiddho. So evaṃ cintesi “ahaṃ neva araññe vasituṃ, na padhānaṃ padahituṃ, na
atk-s0513a1:2014_2: bhikkhācariyāya yāpetuṃ sakkhissāmi, ko me gamanena attho, nivattissāmī”ti so vīriyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2014_3: ossajitvā te bhikkhū anugantvā nivatti. Tepi kho bhikkhū kosalesu cārikaṃ caramānā
atk-s0513a1:2014_4: aññataraṃ paccantagāmaṃ gantvā taṃ upanissāya ekasmiṃ araññāyatane vassaṃ upagantvā
atk-s0513a1:2014_5: antotemāsaṃ appamattā ghaṭentā vāyamantā vipassanāgabbhaṃ gāhāpetvā pathaviṃ unnādayamānā
atk-s0513a1:2014_6: arahattaṃ patvā vutthavassā pavāretvā “paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ satthu ārocessāmā”ti tato
atk-s0513a1:2014_7: nikkhamitvā anupubbena jetavanaṃ patvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā ācariyupajjhāye disvā
atk-s0513a1:2014_8: tathāgataṃ daṭṭhukāmā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā tehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2014_9: madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ akāsi. Te katapaṭisanthārā attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ tathāgatassa
atk-s0513a1:2014_10: ārocesuṃ, satthā te bhikkhū pasaṃsi. Kuṭumbikaputtatissatthero satthāraṃ tesaṃ guṇakathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2014_11: kathentaṃ disvā sayampi samaṇadhammaṃ kātukāmo jāto. Tepi kho bhikkhū “mayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2014_12: tameva araññavāsaṃ gantvā vasissāmā”ti satthāraṃ āpucchiṃsu. Satthā “sādhū”ti anujāni.
atk-s0513a1:2015_0: Atha so kuṭumbikaputtatissatthero rattibhāgasamanantare accāraddhavīriyo hutvā ativegena
atk-s0513a1:2015_1: samaṇadhammaṃ karonto majjhimayāmasamanantare ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhitakova
atk-s0513a1:2015_2: niddāyanto parivattitvā pati, ūruṭṭhikaṃ bhijji, vedanā mahantā jātā. Tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2015_3: taṃ paṭijaggantānaṃ gamanaṃ na sampajji. Atha ne upaṭṭhānavelāyaṃ āgate satthā pucchi
atk-s0513a1:2015_4: “nanu tumhe, bhikkhave, ‘sve gamissāmā’ti hiyyo āpucchitthā”ti? “Āma, bhante, apica
atk-s0513a1:2015_5: kho pana amhākaṃ sahāyako kuṭumbikaputtatissatthero akāle ativegena samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2015_6: karonto niddābhibhūto parivattitvā patito, ūruṭṭhissa bhinnaṃ, taṃ nissāya amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2015_7: gamanaṃ na sampajjī”ti. Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idānevesa attano hīnavīriyabhāvena
atk-s0513a1:2015_8: akāle ativegena vīriyaṃ karonto tumhākaṃ gamanantarāyaṃ karoti, pubbepesa tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2015_9: gamanantarāyaṃ akāsiyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
