atk-s0513a1:2016_0: Atīte gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilāyaṃ bodhisatto disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni
atk-s0513a1:2016_1: sippaṃ uggaṇhāpesi. Athassa te māṇavā ekadivasaṃ dāruṃ āharaṇatthāya araññaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2016_2: dārūni uddhariṃsu. Tesaṃ antare eko kusītamāṇavo mahantaṃ varuṇarukkhaṃ disvā “sukkharukkho
atk-s0513a1:2016_3: eso”ti saññāya “muhuttaṃ tāva nipajjitvā pacchā rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā dārūni pātetvā
atk-s0513a1:2016_4: ādāya gamissāmī”ti uttarisāṭakaṃ pattharitvā nipajjitvā kākacchamāno niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0513a1:2016_5: Itare māṇavakā dārukalāpe bandhitvā ādāya gacchantā taṃ pādena piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā
atk-s0513a1:2016_6: pabodhetvā agamaṃsu. Kusītamāṇavo uṭṭhāya akkhīni puñchitvā puñchitvā avigataniddova
atk-s0513a1:2016_7: varuṇarukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā sākhaṃ gahetvā attano abhimukhaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā bhañjanto bhijjitvā
atk-s0513a1:2016_8: uṭṭhitakoṭiyā attano akkhiṃ bhindāpetvā ekena hatthena taṃ pidhāya ekena hatthena
atk-s0513a1:2016_9: alladārūni bhañjitvā rukkhato oruyha dārukalāpaṃ bandhitvā ukkhipitvā vegena gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2017_0: Taṃ divasañca janapadagāmake ekaṃ kulaṃ “sve brāhmaṇavācanakaṃ karissāmā”ti ācariyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2017_1: nimantesi. Ācariyo māṇavake āha “tātā, sve ekaṃ gāmakaṃ gantabbaṃ, tumhe pana nirāhārā
atk-s0513a1:2017_2: na sakkhissatha gantuṃ, pātova yāguṃ pacāpetvā tattha gantvā attanā laddhakoṭṭhāsañca
atk-s0513a1:2017_3: amhākaṃ pattakoṭṭhāsañca sabbamādāya āgacchathā”ti. Te pātova yāgupacanatthāya dāsiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2017_4: uṭṭhāpetvā “khippaṃ no yāguṃ pacāhī”ti āhaṃsu. Sā dārūni gaṇhantī upari ṭhitāni allavaruṇadārūni
atk-s0513a1:2017_5: gahetvā punappunaṃ mukhavātaṃ dadamānāpi aggiṃ ujjāletuṃ asakkontī sūriyaṃ uṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2017_6: Māṇavakā “atidivā jāto, idāni na sakkā gantu”nti ācariyassa santikaṃ agamiṃsu. Ācariyo
atk-s0513a1:2017_7: “kiṃ, tātā, na gatatthā”ti? “Āma, ācariya na gatamhā”ti. “Kiṃkāraṇā”ti? “Asuko nāma
atk-s0513a1:2017_8: kusītamāṇavo amhehi saddhiṃ dārūnamatthāya araññaṃ gantvā varuṇarukkhamūle niddāyitvā
atk-s0513a1:2017_9: pacchā vegena rukkhaṃ āruyha akkhiṃ bhindāpetvā allavaruṇadārūni āharitvā amhehi
atk-s0513a1:2017_10: ānītadārūnaṃ upari pakkhipi. Yāgupācikā tāni sukkhadārusaññāya gahetvā yāva sūriyuggamanā
atk-s0513a1:2017_11: ujjāletuṃ nāsakkhi. Iminā no kāraṇena gamanantarāyo jāto”ti. Ācariyo māṇavena katakammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2017_12: sutvā “andhabālānaṃ kammaṃ nissāya evarūpā parihāni hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi –
atk-s0513a1:2021_0: Tattha sa pacchā manutappatīti yo koci puggalo “idaṃ pubbe kattabbaṃ, idaṃ pacchā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2021_1: avīmaṃsitvā pubbe karaṇīyāni paṭhamameva kattabbakammāni pacchā karoti, ayaṃ varuṇakaṭṭhabhañjo
atk-s0513a1:2021_2: amhākaṃ māṇavako viya so bālapuggalo pacchā anutappati socati paridevatīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2022: Evaṃ bodhisatto antevāsikānaṃ imaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathetvā dānādīni puññāni karitvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2023_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idānevesa tumhākaṃ antarāyaṃ karoti, pubbepi akāsiyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2023_1: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā akkhibhedaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2023_2: patto māṇavo ūrubhedaṃ pattabhikkhu ahosi, sesamāṇavā buddhaparisā, ācariyabrāhmaṇo
atk-s0513a1:2027_0: Akataññussa posassāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2027_1: Dhammasabhāyañhi bhikkhū “āvuso, devadatto akataññū tathāgatassa guṇe na jānātī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2027_2: kathentā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2027_3: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva devadatto akataññū, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:2027_4: akataññūyeva, na kadāci mayhaṃ guṇaṃ jānātī”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2028_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto himavantappadese hatthiyoniyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2028_1: nibbatti. So mātukucchito nikkhanto sabbaseto ahosi rajatapuñjasannibho, akkhīni
atk-s0513a1:2028_2: panassa maṇiguḷasadisāni, paññāyamānāni pañca pasādāni ahesuṃ, mukhaṃ rattakambalasadisaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2028_3: soṇḍā rattasuvaṇṇabindupaṭimaṇḍitaṃ rajatadāmaṃ viya, cattāro pādā katalākhārasaparikammā
atk-s0513a1:2028_4: viya. Evamassa dasahi pāramīhi alaṅkato rūpasobhaggappatto attabhāvo ahosi. Atha
atk-s0513a1:2028_5: naṃ viññutaṃ pattaṃ sakalahimavante vāraṇā sannipatitvā upaṭṭhahantā vicariṃsu. Evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2028_6: so asītisahassavāraṇaparivāro himavantappadese vasamāno aparabhāge gaṇe dosaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:2028_7: gaṇamhā kāyavivekāya ekakova araññe vāsaṃ kappesi. Sīlavantatāya ca panassa “sīlavanāgarājā” tveva nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2029_0: Atheko bārāṇasivāsiko vanacarako himavantaṃ pavisitvā attano ājīvabhaṇḍakaṃ gavesamāno
atk-s0513a1:2029_1: disā vavatthāpetuṃ asakkonto maggamūḷho hutvā maraṇabhayabhīto bāhā paggayha paridevamāno
atk-s0513a1:2029_2: vicarati. Bodhisatto tassa taṃ balavaparidevitaṃ sutvā “imaṃ purisaṃ dukkhā mocessāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2029_3: kāruññena codito tassa santikaṃ agamāsi. So taṃ disvāva bhīto palāyi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:2029_4: taṃ palāyantaṃ disvā tattheva aṭṭhāsi. So puriso bodhisattaṃ ṭhitaṃ disvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2029_5: Bodhisatto puna agamāsi, so puna palāyitvā tassa ṭhitakāle ṭhatvā cintesi “ayaṃ vāraṇo
atk-s0513a1:2029_6: mama palāyanakāle tiṭṭhati, ṭhitakāle āgacchati, nāyaṃ mayhaṃ anatthakāmo, imamhā
atk-s0513a1:2029_7: pana maṃ dukkhā mācetukāmo bhavissatī”ti sūro hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Bodhisatto taṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2029_8: “kasmā bho tvaṃ purisa, paridevamāno vicarasī”ti pucchi. “Sāmi, disā vavatthāpetuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2029_9: asakkonto maggamūḷho hutvā maraṇabhayenā”ti. Atha naṃ bodhisatto attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2029_10: netvā katipāhaṃ phalāphalehi santappetvā “bho, purisa, mā bhāyi, ahaṃ taṃ manussapathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2029_11: nessāmī”ti attano piṭṭhe nisīdāpetvā manussapathaṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2030_0: Atha kho so mittadubbhī puriso “sace koci pucchissati, ācikkhitabbaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2030_1: bodhisattassa piṭṭhe nisinnoyeva rukkhanimittaṃ pabbatanimittaṃ upadhārentova gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2030_2: Atha naṃ bodhisatto araññā nīharitvā bārāṇasigāmimahāmagge ṭhapetvā “bho purisa,
atk-s0513a1:2030_3: iminā maggena gaccha, mayhaṃ pana vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitopi apucchitopi mā kassaci
atk-s0513a1:2030_4: ācikkhī”ti taṃ uyyojetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃyeva agamāsi. Atha so puriso bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2030_5: gantvā anuvicaranto dantakāravīthiṃ patvā dantakāre dantavikatiyo kurumāne disvā
atk-s0513a1:2030_6: “kiṃ pana bho, jīvadantampi labhitvā gaṇheyyāthā”ti? “Bho, kiṃ vadesi, jīvadanto
atk-s0513a1:2030_7: nāma matahatthidantato mahagghataro”ti. “Tena hi ahaṃ vo jīvadantaṃ āharissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2030_8: pātheyyaṃ gahetvā kharakakacaṃ ādāya bodhisattassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2031_0: Bodhisatto taṃ disvā “kimatthaṃ āgatosī”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ, sāmi, duggato kapaṇo jīvituṃ
atk-s0513a1:2031_1: asakkonto tumhe dantakhaṇḍaṃ yācitvā sace dassatha, taṃ ādāya gantvā vikkiṇitvā tena
atk-s0513a1:2031_2: mūlena jīvissāmī”ti āgatoti. “Hotu bho, dantaṃ te dassāmi, sace dantakappanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2031_3: kakacaṃ atthī”ti. “Kakacaṃ gahetvā āgatomhi sāmī”ti. “Tena hi dante kakacena kantitvā
atk-s0513a1:2031_4: ādāya gacchā”ti bodhisatto pāde samiñjitvā gonisinnakaṃ nisīdi. So dvepi aggadante
atk-s0513a1:2031_5: chindi. Bodhisatto te dante soṇḍāya gahetvā “bho purisa, nāhaṃ ‘ete dantā mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2031_6: appiyā amanāpā’ti dammi, imehi pana me dantehi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena
atk-s0513a1:2031_7: sabbadhammapaṭivedhanasamatthā sabbaññutaññāṇadantāva piyatarā, tassa me idaṃ dantadānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2031_8: sabbaññutaññāṇapaṭivijjhanatthāya hotū”ti sabbaññutaññāṇassa ārādhanaṃ katvā dantayugalaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2032_0: So taṃ ādāya gantvā vikkiṇitvā tasmiṃ mūle khīṇe puna bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2032_1: “sāmi, tumhākaṃ dante vikkiṇitvā laddhamūlaṃ mayhaṃ iṇasodhanamattameva jātaṃ, avasesadante
atk-s0513a1:2032_2: dethā”ti āha. Bodhisatto “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā purimanayeneva kappāpetvā avasesadante
atk-s0513a1:2032_3: adāsi. So tepi vikkiṇitvā puna āgantvā “sāmi, jīvituṃ na sakkomi, mūladāṭhā me dethā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2032_4: āha. Bodhisatto “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā purimanayeneva nisīdi. So pāpapuriso mahāsattassa
atk-s0513a1:2032_5: rajatadāmasadisaṃ soṇḍaṃ maddamāno kelāsakūṭasadisaṃ kumbhaṃ abhiruhitvā ubho dantakoṭiyo
atk-s0513a1:2032_6: paṇhiyā paharanto maṃsaṃ viyūhitvā kumbhaṃ āruyha kharakakacena mūladāṭhā kappetvā
atk-s0513a1:2032_7: pakkāmi. Bodhisattassa dassanūpacāraṃ vijahanteyeva pana tasmiṃ pāpapurise catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā
atk-s0513a1:2032_8: ghanapathavī sineruyugandharādayo mahābhāre duggandhajegucchāni gūthamuttādīni ca
atk-s0513a1:2032_9: dhāretuṃ samatthāpi tassa aguṇarāsiṃ dhāretuṃ asakkontī viya bhijjitvā vivaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2032_10: Tāvadeva avīcimahānirayato aggijālā nikkhamitvā taṃ mittadubbhipurisaṃ kulasantakena
atk-s0513a1:2033_0: Evaṃ tassa pāpapuggalassa pathaviṃ paviṭṭhakāle tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā rukkhadevatā
atk-s0513a1:2033_1: “akataññū mittadubbhī puggalo cakkavattirajjaṃ datvāpi tosetuṃ na sakkā”ti vanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2036: Sabbaṃ ce pathaviṃ dajjā, neva naṃ abhirādhaye”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2037_0: Tattha akataññussāti attano kataguṇaṃ ajānantassa. Posassāti purisassa. Vivaradassinoti
atk-s0513a1:2037_1: chiddameva okāsameva olokentassa. Sabbaṃ ce pathaviṃ dajjāti sacepi tādisassa puggalassa
atk-s0513a1:2037_2: sakalaṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ, imaṃ vā pana mahāpathaviṃ parivattetvā pathavojaṃ dadeyya.
atk-s0513a1:2037_3: Neva naṃ abhirādhayeti evaṃ karontopi evarūpaṃ kataguṇaviddhaṃsakaṃ koci paritosetuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2037_4: vā pasādetuṃ vā na sakkuṇeyyāti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2038: Evaṃ sā devatā vanaṃ unnādetvā dhammaṃ desesi. Bodhisatto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2039_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, devadatto idāneva akataññū, pubbepi akataññūyevā”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a1:2039_1: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā mittadubbhī
atk-s0513a1:2039_2: puggalo devadatto ahosi, rukkhadevatā sāriputto, sīlavanāgarājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2043_0: Saccaṃ kirevamāhaṃsūti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattassa vadhāya parisakkanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2043_1: ārabbha kathesi. Bhikkhusaṅghasmiñhi dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīditvā “āvuso, devadatto satthu
atk-s0513a1:2043_2: guṇaṃ na jānāti, vadhāyayeva parisakkatī”ti devadattassa aguṇaṃ kathente satthā āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:2043_3: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte
atk-s0513a1:2043_4: “na, bhikkhave, idāneva devadatto mayhaṃ vadhāya parisakkati, pubbepi parisakkiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2044_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente tassa duṭṭhakumāro nāma putto ahosi
atk-s0513a1:2044_1: kakkhaḷo pharuso pahaṭāsīvisūpamo, anakkositvā vā apaharitvā vā kenaci saddhiṃ na
atk-s0513a1:2044_2: katheti. So antojanassa ca bahijanassa ca akkhimhi patitarajaṃ viya, khādituṃ āgatapisāco
atk-s0513a1:2044_3: viya ca amanāpo ahosi ubbejanīyo. So ekadivasaṃ nadīkīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmo mahantena parivārena
atk-s0513a1:2044_4: nadītīraṃ agamāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāmegho uṭṭhahi, disā andhakārā jātā. So dāsapessajanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2044_5: āha “etha bhaṇe, maṃ gahetvā nadīmajjhaṃ netvā nhāpetvā ānethā”ti. Te taṃ tattha
atk-s0513a1:2044_6: netvā “kiṃ no rājā karissati, imaṃ pāpapurisaṃ ettheva māremā”ti mantayitvā “ettha
atk-s0513a1:2044_7: gaccha kāḷakaṇṇī”ti udake naṃ opilāpetvā paccuttaritvā tīre aṭṭhaṃsu. “Kahaṃ kumāro”ti
atk-s0513a1:2044_8: ca vutte “na mayaṃ kumāraṃ passāma, meghaṃ uṭṭhitaṃ disvā udake nimujjitvā purato
atk-s0513a1:2044_9: āgato bhavissatī”ti. Amaccā rañño santikaṃ agamaṃsu. Rājā “kahaṃ me putto”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2044_10: Na jānāma deva, meghe uṭṭhite “purato āgato bhavissatī”ti saññāya āgatamhāti. Rājā
atk-s0513a1:2044_11: dvāraṃ vivarāpetvā “nadītīraṃ gantvā vicinathā”ti tattha tattha vicināpesi, koci kumāraṃ nāddasa.
atk-s0513a1:2045_0: Sopi kho meghandhakāre deve vassante nadiyā vuyhamāno ekaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ disvā tattha
atk-s0513a1:2045_1: nisīditvā maraṇabhayatajjito paridevamāno gacchati. Tasmiṃ pana kāle bārāṇasivāsī
atk-s0513a1:2045_2: eko seṭṭhi nadītīre cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ nidahitvāva maranto dhanataṇhāya dhanapiṭṭhe
atk-s0513a1:2045_3: sappo hutvā nibbatti. Aparo tasmiṃyeva padese tiṃsa koṭiyo nidahitvā dhanataṇhāya
atk-s0513a1:2045_4: tattheva undūro hutvā nibbatti. Tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ udakaṃ pāvisi. Te udakassa paviṭṭhamaggeneva
atk-s0513a1:2045_5: nikkhamitvā sotaṃ chindantā gantvā taṃ rājakumārena abhinisinnaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ patvā
atk-s0513a1:2045_6: eko ekaṃ koṭiṃ, itaro itaraṃ āruyha khandhapiṭṭheyeva nipajjiṃsu. Tassāyeva kho pana
atk-s0513a1:2045_7: nadiyā tīre eko simbalirukkho atthi, tattheko suvapotako vasati. Sopi rukkho udakena
atk-s0513a1:2045_8: dhotamūlo nadīpiṭṭhe pati, suvapotako deve vassante uppatitvā gantuṃ asakkonto gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2045_9: tasseva khandhassa ekapasse nilīyi. Evaṃ te cattāro janā ekato vuyhamānā gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:2046_0: Bodhisattopi kho tasmiṃ kāle kāsiraṭṭhe udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vuḍḍhippatto
atk-s0513a1:2046_1: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā ekasmiṃ nadīnivattane paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā vasati. So aḍḍharattasamaye
atk-s0513a1:2046_2: caṅkamamāno tassa rājakumārassa balavaparidevanasaddaṃ sutvā cintesi “mādise nāma
atk-s0513a1:2046_3: mettānuddayasampanne tāpase passante etassa purisassa maraṇaṃ ayuttaṃ, udakato uddharitvā
atk-s0513a1:2046_4: tassa jīvitadānaṃ dassāmī”ti. So taṃ “mā bhāyi, mā bhāyī”ti assāsetvā udakasotaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2046_5: chindanto gantvā taṃ dārukkhandhaṃ ekāya koṭiyā gahetvā ākaḍḍhanto nāgabalo thāmasampanno
atk-s0513a1:2046_6: ekavegena tīraṃ patvā kumāraṃ ukkhipitvā tīre patiṭṭhāpesi. Tepi sappādayo disvā
atk-s0513a1:2046_7: ukkhipitvā assamapadaṃ netvā aggiṃ jāletvā “ime dubbalatarā”ti paṭhamaṃ sappādīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2046_8: sarīraṃ sedetvā pacchā rājakumārassa sarīraṃ sedetvā tampi arogaṃ katvā āhāraṃ dentopi
atk-s0513a1:2046_9: paṭhamaṃ sappādīnaṃyeva datvā pacchā tassa phalāphalāni upanāmesi. Rājakumāro “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2046_10: kūṭatāpaso maṃ rājakumāraṃ agaṇetvā tiracchānagatānaṃ sammānaṃ karotī”ti bodhisatte āghātaṃ bandhi.
atk-s0513a1:2047_0: Tato katipāhaccayena sabbesupi tesu thāmabalappattesu nadiyā oghe pacchinne sappo
atk-s0513a1:2047_1: tāpasaṃ vanditvā āha “bhante, tumhehi mayhaṃ mahāupakāro kato, na kho panāhaṃ daliddo,
atk-s0513a1:2047_2: asukaṭṭhāne me cattālīsa hiraññakoṭiyo nidahitvā ṭhapitā, tumhākaṃ dhanena kicce
atk-s0513a1:2047_3: sati sabbampetaṃ dhanaṃ tumhākaṃ dātuṃ sakkomi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā ‘dīghā’ti pakkoseyyāthā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2047_4: vatvā pakkāmi. Undūropi tatheva tāpasaṃ nimantetvā “asukaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā ‘undūrā’ti
atk-s0513a1:2047_5: pakkoseyyāthā”ti vatvā pakkāmi. Suvapotako pana tāpasaṃ vanditvā “bhante, mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2047_6: dhanaṃ natthi, rattasālīhi pana vo atthe sati asukaṃ nāma mayhaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha
atk-s0513a1:2047_7: gantvā ‘suvā’ti pakkoseyyātha, ahaṃ ñātakānaṃ ārocetvā anekasakaṭapūramattā rattasāliyo
atk-s0513a1:2047_8: āharāpetvā dātuṃ sakkomī”ti vatvā pakkāmi. Itaro pana mittadubbhī “dhammasudhammatāya
atk-s0513a1:2047_9: kiñci avatvā gantuṃ ayuttaṃ, evaṃ taṃ attano santikaṃ āgataṃ māressāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:2047_10: “bhante, mayi rajje patiṭṭhite āgaccheyyātha, ahaṃ vo catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2047_11: vatvā pakkāmi. So gantvā na cirasseva rajje patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2048_0: Bodhisatto “vīmaṃsissāmi tāva ne”ti paṭhamaṃ sappassa santikaṃ gantvā avidūre ṭhatvā
atk-s0513a1:2048_1: “dīghā”ti pakkosi. So ekavacaneneva nikkhamitvā bodhisattaṃ vanditvā “bhante, imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2048_2: ṭhāne cattālīsa hiraññakoṭiyo, tā sabbāpi nīharitvā gaṇhathā”ti āha. Bodhisatto “evamatthu,
atk-s0513a1:2048_3: uppanne kicce jānissāmī”ti taṃ nivattetvā undūrassa santikaṃ gantvā saddamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2048_4: Sopi tatheva paṭipajji. Bodhisatto tampi nivattetvā suvassa santikaṃ gantvā “suvā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2048_5: pakkosi. Sopi ekavacaneneva rukkhaggato otaritvā bodhisattaṃ vanditvā “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2048_6: mayhaṃ ñātakānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā himavantappadesato tumhākaṃ sayaṃjātasālī āharāpemī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2048_7: pucchi. Bodhisatto “atthe sati jānissāmī”ti tampi nivattetvā “idāni rājānaṃ pariggaṇhissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2048_8: gantvā rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase ākappasampattiṃ katvā bhikkhācāravattena nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2048_9: pāvisi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe so mittadubbhī rājā alaṅkatahatthikkhandhavaragato mahantena
atk-s0513a1:2048_10: parivārena nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti. So bodhisattaṃ dūratova disvā “ayaṃ so kūṭatāpaso
atk-s0513a1:2048_11: mama santike bhuñjitvā vasitukāmo āgato, yāva parisamajjhe attano mayhaṃ kataguṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2048_12: nappakāseti, tāvadevassa sīsaṃ chindāpessāmī”ti purise olokesi. “Kiṃ karoma, devā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2048_13: ca vutte “esa kūṭatāpaso maṃ kiñci yācitukāmo āgacchati maññe, etassa kāḷakaṇṇitāpasassa
atk-s0513a1:2048_14: maṃ passituṃ adatvāva etaṃ gahetvā pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā catukke catukke paharantā
atk-s0513a1:2048_15: nagarā nikkhāmetvā āghātane sīsamassa chinditvā sarīraṃ sūle uttāsethā”ti āha. Te
atk-s0513a1:2048_16: “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā gantvā niraparādhaṃ mahāsattaṃ bandhitvā catukke catukke
atk-s0513a1:2048_17: paharantā āghātanaṃ netuṃ ārabhiṃsu. Bodhisatto pahaṭapahaṭaṭṭhāne “amma, tātā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2051: Kaṭṭhaṃ niplavitaṃ seyyo, na tvevekacciyo naro”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2052_0: Tattha saccaṃ kirevamāhaṃsūti avitathameva kira evaṃ vadanti. Narā ekacciyā idhāti
atk-s0513a1:2052_1: idhekacce paṇḍitapurisā. Kaṭṭhaṃ niplavitaṃ seyyoti nadiyā vuyhamānaṃ sukkhadāruṃ
atk-s0513a1:2052_2: niplavitaṃ uttāretvā thale ṭhapitaṃ seyyo sundarataro. Evañhi vadamānā te purisā
atk-s0513a1:2052_3: saccaṃ kira vadanti. Kiṃkāraṇā? Tañhi yāgubhattādīnaṃ pacanatthāya, sītāturānaṃ visibbanatthāya,
atk-s0513a1:2052_4: aññesampi ca parissayānaṃ haraṇatthāya upakāraṃ hoti. Na tvevekacciyo naroti ekacco
atk-s0513a1:2052_5: pana mittadubbhī akataññū pāpapuriso oghena vuyhamāno hatthena gahetvā uttārito na
atk-s0513a1:2052_6: tveva seyyo. Tathā hi ahaṃ imaṃ pāpapurisaṃ uttāretvā imaṃ attano dukkhaṃ āharinti.
atk-s0513a1:2053_0: Taṃ sutvā ye tattha paṇḍitapurisā, te āhaṃsu “kiṃ pana, bho pabbajita, tayā amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2053_1: rañño atthi koci guṇo kato”ti? Bodhisatto taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā “evamimaṃ mahoghato
atk-s0513a1:2053_2: uttārento ahameva attano dukkhaṃ akāsiṃ, ‘na vata me porāṇakapaṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ kata’nti
atk-s0513a1:2053_3: anussaritvā evaṃ vadāmī”ti āha. Taṃ sutvā khattiyabrāhmaṇādayo nagaravāsino “svāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2053_4: mittadubbhī rājā evaṃ guṇasampannassa attano jīvitadāyakassa guṇamattampi na jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2053_5: taṃ nissāya kuto amhākaṃ vuḍḍhi, gaṇhatha na”nti kupitā samantato uṭṭhahitvā ususattipāsāṇamuggarādippahārehi
atk-s0513a1:2053_6: hatthikkhandhagatameva naṃ ghātetvā pāde gahetvā kaḍḍhitvā parikhāpiṭṭhe chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0513a1:2054_0: So dhammena rajjaṃ kārento puna ekadivasaṃ sappādayo pariggaṇhitukāmo mahantena parivārena
atk-s0513a1:2054_1: sappassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “dīghā”ti pakkosi. Sappo āgantvā vanditvā “idaṃ te
atk-s0513a1:2054_2: sāmi dhanaṃ gaṇhā”ti āha. Rājā cattālīsahiraññakoṭidhanaṃ amacce paṭicchāpetvā undūrassa
atk-s0513a1:2054_3: santikaṃ gantvā “undūrā”ti pakkosi. Sopi āgantvā vanditvā tiṃsakoṭidhanaṃ niyyādesi.
atk-s0513a1:2054_4: Rājā tampi amacce paṭicchāpetvā suvassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “suvā”ti pakkosi. Sopi
atk-s0513a1:2054_5: āgantvā pāde vanditvā “kiṃ, sāmi, sāliṃ āharāmī”ti āha. Rājā “sālīhi atthe sati āharissasi,
atk-s0513a1:2054_6: ehi gacchāmā”ti sattatiyā hiraññakoṭīhi saddhiṃ te tayopi jane gāhāpetvā nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2054_7: gantvā pāsādavare mahātalaṃ āruyhaṃ dhanaṃ saṅgopetvā sappassa vasanatthāya suvaṇṇanāḷiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2054_8: undūrassa phalikaguhaṃ, suvassa suvaṇṇapañjaraṃ kārāpetvā sappassa ca suvassa ca
atk-s0513a1:2054_9: bhojanatthāya devasikaṃ kañcanataṭṭake madhulāje, undūrassa gandhasālitaṇḍule dāpesi,
atk-s0513a1:2054_10: dānādīni ca puññāni karoti. Evaṃ te cattāropi janā yāvajīvaṃ samaggā sammodamānā
atk-s0513a1:2055_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, devadatto idāneva mayhaṃ vadhāya parisakkati, pubbepi parisakkiyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2055_1: vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā
atk-s0513a1:2055_2: duṭṭharājā devadatto ahosi, sappo sāriputto, undūro moggallāno, suvo ānando, pacchā
atk-s0513a1:2059_0: Sādhū sambahulā ñātīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto udakakalahe attano ñātakānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2059_1: mahāvināsaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ ñatvā ākāsena gantvā rohiṇīnadiyā upari pallaṅkena nisīditvā
atk-s0513a1:2059_2: nīlaraṃsiṃ vissajjetvā ñātake saṃvejetvā ākāsā oruyha nadītīre nisinno taṃ kalahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2059_3: ārabbha kathesi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana kuṇālajātake āvi bhavissati. Tadā
atk-s0513a1:2059_4: pana satthā ñātake āmantetvā “mahārājā, tumhe ñātakā, ñātakehi nāma samaggehi sammodamānehi
atk-s0513a1:2059_5: bhavituṃ vaṭṭati. Ñātakānañhi sāmaggiyā sati paccāmittā okāsaṃ na labhanti, tiṭṭhantu
atk-s0513a1:2059_6: tāva manussabhūtā, acetanānaṃ rukkhānampi sāmaggiṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati. Atītasmiñhi himavantappadese
atk-s0513a1:2059_7: mahāvāto sālavanaṃ pahari, tassa pana sālavanassa aññamaññaṃ rukkhagacchagumbalatāhi
atk-s0513a1:2059_8: sambandhattā ekarukkhampi pātetuṃ asakkonto matthakamatthakeneva agamāsi. Ekaṃ pana
atk-s0513a1:2059_9: aṅgaṇe ṭhitaṃ sākhāviṭapasampannampi mahārukkhaṃ aññehi rukkhehi asambandhattā ummūletvā
atk-s0513a1:2059_10: bhūmiyaṃ pātesi, iminā kāraṇena tumhehipi samaggehi sammodamānehi bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2060_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente paṭhamaṃ uppanno vessavaṇo mahārājā
atk-s0513a1:2060_1: cavi, sakko aññaṃ vessavaṇaṃ ṭhapesi. Etasmiṃ vessavaṇe parivatte pacchā nibbattavessavaṇo
atk-s0513a1:2060_2: “rukkhagacchagumbalatānaṃ attano attano ruccanaṭṭhāne vimānaṃ gaṇhantū”ti sāsanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2060_3: pesesi. Tadā bodhisatto himavantappadese ekasmiṃ sālavane rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2060_4: So ñātake āha “tumhe vimānāni gaṇhantā aṅgaṇe ṭhitarukkhesu mā gaṇhatha, imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2060_5: pana sālavane mayā gahitavimānaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitavimānāni gaṇhathā”ti. Tattha bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:2060_6: vacanakarā paṇḍitadevatā bodhisattassa vimānaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitavimānāni gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2060_7: Apaṇḍitā pana devatā “kiṃ amhākaṃ attho araññavimānehi, mayaṃ manussapathe gāmanigamarājadhānidvāresu
atk-s0513a1:2060_8: vimānāni gaṇhissāma. Gāmādayo hi upanissāya vasamānā devatā lābhaggayasaggappattā
atk-s0513a1:2060_9: hontī”ti manussapathe aṅgaṇaṭṭhāne nibbattamahārukkhesu vimānāni gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2061_0: Athekasmiṃ divase mahatī vātavuṭṭhi uppajji. Vātassa atibalavatāya daḷhamūlā vanajeṭṭhakarukkhāpi
atk-s0513a1:2061_1: saṃbhaggasākhāviṭapā samūlā nipatiṃsu. Taṃ pana aññamaññaṃ sambandhanena ṭhitaṃ sālavanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2061_2: patvā ito cito ca paharanto ekarukkhampi pātetuṃ nāsakkhi. Bhaggavimānā devatā nippaṭisaraṇā
atk-s0513a1:2061_3: dārake hatthesu gahetvā himavantaṃ gantvā attano pavattiṃ sālavanadevatānaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2061_4: Tā tāsaṃ evaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ bodhisattassa ārocesuṃ. Bodhisatto “paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2061_5: aggahetvā nippaccayaṭṭhānaṃ gatā nāma evarūpāva hontī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2065_0: Tattha sambahulā ñātīti cattāro upādāya tatuttari satasahassampi sambahulā nāma,
atk-s0513a1:2065_1: evaṃ sambahulā aññamaññaṃ nissāya vasantā ñātakā. Sādhūti sobhanā pasatthā, parehi
atk-s0513a1:2065_2: appadhaṃsiyāti attho. Api rukkhā araññajāti tiṭṭhantu manussabhūtā, araññe jātarukkhāpi
atk-s0513a1:2065_3: sambahulā aññamaññūpatthambhena ṭhitā sādhuyeva. Rukkhānampi hi sapaccayabhāvo laddhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2065_4: vaṭṭati. Vāto vahati ekaṭṭhanti puratthimādibhedo vāto vāyanto aṅgaṇaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2065_5: ekaṭṭhaṃ ekakameva ṭhitaṃ brahantampi vanappatiṃ sākhāviṭapasampannaṃ mahārukkhampi
atk-s0513a1:2065_6: vahati, ummūletvā pātetīti attho. Bodhisatto imaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathetvā āyukkhaye yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2066_0: Satthāpi “evaṃ, mahārājā, ñātakānaṃ tāva sāmaggiyeva laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, samaggā sammodamānā
atk-s0513a1:2066_1: piyasaṃvāsameva vasathā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2066_2: samodhānesi – “tadā devatā buddhaparisā ahesuṃ, paṇḍitadevatā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2070_0: Abhitthanaya pajjunnāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto attanā vassāpitavassaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2070_1: kathesi. Ekasmiṃ kira samaye kosalaraṭṭhe devo na vassi, sassāni milāyanti, tesu
atk-s0513a1:2070_2: tesu ṭhānesu taḷākapokkharaṇisarāni sussanti. Jetavanadvārakoṭṭhakasamīpe jetavanapokkharaṇiyāpi
atk-s0513a1:2070_3: udakaṃ chijji. Kalalagahanaṃ pavisitvā nipanne macchakacchape kākakulalādayo kaṇayaggasadisehi
atk-s0513a1:2070_4: tuṇḍehi koṭṭetvā nīharitvā nīharitvā vipphandamāne khādanti.
atk-s0513a1:2071_0: Satthā macchakacchapānaṃ taṃ byasanaṃ disvā mahākaruṇāya ussāhitahadayo “ajja mayā
atk-s0513a1:2071_1: devaṃ vassāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pabhātāya rattiyā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhācāravelaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2071_2: sallakkhetvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto buddhalīlāya sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:2071_3: pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto sāvatthito vihāraṃ gacchanto jetavanapokkharaṇiyā
atk-s0513a1:2071_4: sopāne ṭhatvā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi “ānanda, udakasāṭikaṃ āhara, jetavanapokkharaṇiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2071_5: nhāyissāmī”ti. “Nanu, bhante, jetavanapokkharaṇiyaṃ udakaṃ chinnaṃ, kalalamattameva
atk-s0513a1:2071_6: avasiṭṭha”nti? “Ānanda, buddhabalaṃ nāma mahantaṃ, āhara tvaṃ udakasāṭika”nti. Thero
atk-s0513a1:2071_7: āharitvā adāsi. Satthā ekenantena udakasāṭikaṃ nivāsetvā ekenantena sarīraṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0513a1:2071_8: “jetavanapokkharaṇiyaṃ nhāyissāmī”ti sopāne aṭṭhāsi. Taṅkhaṇaññeva sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2071_9: uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. So “kiṃ nu kho”ti āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā vassavalāhakadevarājānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2071_11: khippaṃ sakalakosalaraṭṭhaṃ ekameghaṃ katvā vassāpehī”ti. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a1:2071_12: ekaṃ valāhakaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā meghagītaṃ gāyanto pācīnalokadhātuabhimukho
atk-s0513a1:2071_13: pakkhandi. Pācīnadisābhāge khalamaṇḍalamattaṃ ekaṃ meghapaṭalaṃ uṭṭhāya satapaṭalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2071_14: sahassapaṭalaṃ hutvā abhitthanantaṃ vijjulatā nicchārentaṃ adhomukhaṃ ṭhapitaudakakumbhākārena
atk-s0513a1:2071_15: vassamānaṃ sakalakosalaraṭṭhaṃ mahoghena viya ajjhotthari. Devo acchinnadhāraṃ vassanto
atk-s0513a1:2071_16: muhutteneva jetavanapokkharaṇiṃ pūresi, dhurasopānaṃ āhacca udakaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2072_0: Satthā pokkharaṇiyaṃ nhāyitvā surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā sugatamahācīvaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2072_1: ekaṃsaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto gantvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0513a1:2072_2: nisīditvā bhikkhusaṅghena vatte dassite uṭṭhāya maṇisopānaphalake ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0513a1:2072_3: ovādaṃ datvā uyyojetvā surabhigandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2072_4: kappetvā sāyanhasamaye dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “passathāvuso, dasabalassa
atk-s0513a1:2072_6: macchakacchapesu mahādukkhaṃ pāpuṇantesu kāruññaṃ paṭicca ‘mahājanaṃ dukkhā mocessāmī’ti
atk-s0513a1:2072_7: udakasāṭikaṃ nivāsetvā jetavanapokkharaṇiyā dhurasopāne ṭhatvā muhuttena sakalakosalaraṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2072_8: mahoghena opilāpento viya devaṃ vassāpetvā mahājanaṃ kāyikacetasikadukkhato mocetvā
atk-s0513a1:2072_9: vihāraṃ paviṭṭho”ti kathāya vattamānāya gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā dhammasabhaṃ āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:2072_10: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte
atk-s0513a1:2072_11: “na, bhikkhave, tathāgato idāneva mahājane kilamante devaṃ vassāpeti, pubbe tiracchānayoniyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2072_12: nibbattitvā maccharājakālepi vassāpesiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2073_0: Atīte imasmiṃyeva kosalaraṭṭhe imissā sāvatthiyā imasmiṃyeva jetavanapokkharaṇiṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:2073_1: ekā valligahanaparikkhittā kandarā ahosi. Tadā bodhisatto macchayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2073_2: macchagaṇaparivuto tattha paṭivasati. Yathā pana idāni, evameva tadāpi tasmiṃ raṭṭhe
atk-s0513a1:2073_3: devo na vassi, manussānaṃ sassāni milāyiṃsu, vāpitaḷākakandarādīsu udakaṃ chijji,
atk-s0513a1:2073_4: macchakacchapā kalalagahanaṃ pavisiṃsu. Imissāpi kandarāya macchakacchapā kalalagahanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2073_5: pavisitvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne nilīyiṃsu. Kākādayo tuṇḍena koṭṭetvā nīharitvā khādiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2074_0: Bodhisatto ñātisaṅghassa taṃ byasanaṃ disvā “imaṃ tesaṃ dukkhaṃ ṭhapetvā maṃ añño
atk-s0513a1:2074_1: mocetuṃ samattho nāma natthi, saccakiriyaṃ katvā devaṃ vassāpetvā ñātake maraṇadukkhā
atk-s0513a1:2074_2: mocessāmī”ti kāḷavaṇṇaṃ kaddamaṃ dvidhā viyūhitvā nikkhamitvā añjanarukkhasāraghaṭikavaṇṇo
atk-s0513a1:2074_3: mahāmaccho sudhotalohitaṅgamaṇiguḷasadisāni akkhīni ummīletvā ākāsaṃ ulloketvā pajjunnadevarājassa
atk-s0513a1:2074_4: saddaṃ datvā “bho pajjunna, ahaṃ ñātake nissāya dukkhito, tvaṃ mayi sīlavante kilamante
atk-s0513a1:2074_5: kasmā devaṃ na vassāpesi? Mayā samānajātikānaṃ khādanaṭṭhāne nibbattitvā taṇḍulappamāṇampi
atk-s0513a1:2074_6: macchaṃ ādiṃ katvā khāditapubbo nāma natthi, aññopi me pāṇo jīvitā na voropitapubbo,
atk-s0513a1:2074_7: iminā saccena devaṃ vassāpetvā ñātisaṅghaṃ me dukkhā mocehī”ti vatvā paricārakaceṭakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2074_8: āṇāpento viya pajjunnadevarājānaṃ ālapanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2077: Kākaṃ sokāya randhehi, mañca sokā pamocayā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2078_0: Tattha abhitthanaya pajjunnāti pajjunno vuccati megho, ayaṃ pana meghavasena laddhanāmaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2078_1: vassavalāhakadevarājānaṃ ālapati. Ayaṃ kirassa adhippāyo – devo nāma anabhitthananto
atk-s0513a1:2078_2: vijjulatā anicchārento vassantopi na sobhati, tasmā tvaṃ abhitthananto vijjulatā
atk-s0513a1:2078_3: nicchārento vassāpehīti. Nidhiṃ kākassa nāsayāti kākā kalalaṃ pavisitvā ṭhite macche
atk-s0513a1:2078_4: tuṇḍena koṭṭetvā nīharitvā khādanti, tasmā tesaṃ antokalale macchā “nidhī”ti vuccanti,
atk-s0513a1:2078_5: taṃ kākasaṅghassa nidhiṃ devaṃ vassāpento udakena paṭicchādetvā nāsehīti. Kākaṃ sokāya
atk-s0513a1:2078_6: randhehīti kākasaṅgho imissā kandarāya udakena puṇṇāya macche alabhamāno socissati,
atk-s0513a1:2078_7: taṃ kākagaṇaṃ tvaṃ imaṃ kandaraṃ pūrento sokāya randhehi, sokassatthāya macchassa
atk-s0513a1:2078_8: assāsatthāya devaṃ vassāpehi. Yathā antonijjhānalakkhaṇaṃ sokaṃ pāpuṇāti, evaṃ karohīti
atk-s0513a1:2078_9: attho, mañca sokā pamocayāti ettha ca-kāro sampiṇḍanattho, mañca mama ñātake ca sabbeva
atk-s0513a1:2079: Evaṃ bodhisatto paricārakaceṭakaṃ āṇāpento viya pajjunnaṃ ālapitvā sakalakosalaraṭṭhe mahāvassaṃ vassāpetvā mahājanaṃ maraṇadukkhā mocetvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2080_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, tathāgato idāneva devaṃ vassāpeti, pubbe macchayoniyaṃ nibbattopi
atk-s0513a1:2080_1: vassāpesiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a1:2080_2: – “tadā macchagaṇā buddhaparisā ahesuṃ, pajjunnadevarājā ānando, maccharājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2084_0: Asaṅkiyomhi gāmamhīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ sāvatthivāsiṃ upāsakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2084_1: ārabbha kathesi. So kira sotāpanno ariyasāvako kenacideva karaṇīyena ekena sakaṭasatthavāhena
atk-s0513a1:2084_2: saddhiṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā ekasmiṃ araññaṭṭhāne sakaṭāni mocetvā khandhāvārabandhe
atk-s0513a1:2084_3: kate satthavāhassa avidūre aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle caṅkamati. Athattano kālaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0513a1:2084_4: pañcasatā corā “khandhāvāraṃ vilumpissāmā”ti dhanumuggarādihatthā taṃ ṭhānaṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2084_5: Upāsakopi caṅkamatiyeva. Corā naṃ disvā “addhā esa khandhāvārarakkhako bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2084_6: imassa niddaṃ okkantakāle vilumpissāmā”ti ajjhottharituṃ asakkontā tattha tattheva
atk-s0513a1:2084_7: aṭṭhaṃsu. Sopi upāsako paṭhamayāmepi majjhimayāmepi pacchimayāmepi caṅkamantoyeva
atk-s0513a1:2084_8: aṭṭhāsi. Paccūsakāle jāte corā okāsaṃ alabhantā gahite pāsāṇamuggarādayo chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2085_0: Upāsakopi attano kammaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā puna sāvatthiṃ āgantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2085_1: “bhante, attānaṃ rakkhamānā pararakkhakā hontī”ti pucchi. “Āma, upāsaka, attānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2085_2: rakkhanto parampi rakkhati, paraṃ rakkhanto attānampi rakkhatī”ti. So “yāva subhāsitañcidaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2085_3: bhante, bhagavatā, ahaṃ ekena satthavāhena saddhiṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno rukkhamūle caṅkamanto
atk-s0513a1:2085_4: ‘maṃ rakkhissāmī’ti sakalasatthaṃ rakkhi”nti āha. Satthā “upāsaka, pubbepi paṇḍitā
atk-s0513a1:2085_5: attānaṃ rakkhantā paraṃ rakkhiṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2086_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2086_1: vayappatto kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavante vasanto loṇambilasevanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2086_2: janapadaṃ āgantvā janapadacārikaṃ caranto ekena satthavāhena saddhiṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā
atk-s0513a1:2086_3: ekasmiṃ araññaṭṭhāne satthe niviṭṭhe satthato avidūre jhānasukhena vītināmento aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2086_4: rukkhamūle caṅkamanto aṭṭhāsi. Atha kho pañcasatā corā “sāyamāsabhattassa bhuttakāle
atk-s0513a1:2086_5: taṃ sakaṭasatthaṃ vilumpissāmā”ti āgantvā parivārayiṃsu. Te taṃ tāpasaṃ disvā “sace
atk-s0513a1:2086_6: ayaṃ amhe passissati, satthavāsikānaṃ ārocessati, etassa niddūpagatavelāya vilumpissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2086_7: tattheva aṭṭhaṃsu. Tāpaso sakalampi rattiṃ caṅkamiyeva. Corā okāsaṃ alabhitvā gahitagahite
atk-s0513a1:2086_8: muggarapāsāṇe chaḍḍetvā sakaṭasatthavāsīnaṃ saddaṃ datvā “bhonto, satthavāsino sace
atk-s0513a1:2086_9: esa rukkhamūle caṅkamanakatāpaso ajja nābhavissa, sabbe mahāvilopaṃ pattā abhavissatha,
atk-s0513a1:2086_10: sve tāpasassa mahāsakkāraṃ kareyyāthā”ti vatvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2087_0: Te pabhātāya rattiyā corehi chaḍḍite muggarapāsāṇādayo disvā bhītā bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:2087_1: santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā “bhante, diṭṭhā vo corā”ti pucchiṃsu. “Āmāvuso, diṭṭhā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2087_2: “Bhante, ettakevo core disvā bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā na uppajjī”ti? Bodhisatto “āvuso
atk-s0513a1:2087_3: core disvā bhayaṃ nāma sadhanassa hoti, ahaṃ pana niddhano, svāhaṃ kiṃ bhāyissāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2087_4: Mayhañhi gāmepi araññepi vasantassa bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā natthī”ti vatvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2091_0: Tattha asaṅkiyomhi gāmamhīti saṅkāya niyutto patiṭṭhitoti saṅkiyo, na saṅkiyo asaṅkiyo.
atk-s0513a1:2091_1: Ahaṃ gāme vasantopi saṅkāya appatiṭṭhitattā asaṅkiyo nibbhayo nirāsaṅkoti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2091_2: Araññeti gāmagāmūpacāravinimutte ṭhāne. Ujumaggaṃ samāruḷho, mettāya karuṇāya cāti
atk-s0513a1:2091_3: ahaṃ tikacatukkajjhānikāhi mettākaruṇāhi kāyavaṅkādivirahitaṃ ujuṃ brahmalokagāmimaggaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2091_4: āruḷhoti vadati. Atha vā parisuddhasīlatāya kāyavacīmanovaṅkavirahitaṃ ujuṃ devalokamaggaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2091_5: āruḷhomhīti dassetvā tato uttari mettāya karuṇāya ca patiṭṭhitattā ujuṃ brahmalokamaggampi
atk-s0513a1:2091_6: āruḷhomhītipi dasseti. Aparihīnajjhānassa hi ekantena brahmalokaparāyaṇattā mettākaruṇādayo ujumaggā nāma.
atk-s0513a1:2092: Evaṃ bodhisatto imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desetvā tuṭṭhacittehi tehi manussehi sakkato pūjito yāvajīvaṃ cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2093: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā satthavāsino buddhaparisā ahesuṃ, tāpaso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2097_0: Lābūni sīdantīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto soḷasa mahāsupine ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2097_1: Ekadivasaṃ kira kosalamahārājā rattiṃ niddūpagato pacchimayāme soḷasa mahāsupine
atk-s0513a1:2097_2: disvā bhītatasito pabujjhitvā “imesaṃ supinānaṃ diṭṭhattā kiṃ nu kho me bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2098_0: Atha naṃ pabhātāya rattiyā brāhmaṇapurohitā upasaṅkamitvā “sukhaṃ sayittha, mahārājā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2098_1: pucchiṃsu. “Kuto me ācariyā sukhaṃ, ajjāhaṃ paccūsasamaye soḷasa mahāsupine passiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2098_2: somhi tesaṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya bhayappatto”ti. “Vadetha, mahārāja, sutvā jānissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2098_3: vuttaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ diṭṭhasupine kathetvā “kiṃ nu kho me imesaṃ diṭṭhakāraṇā bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2098_4: pucchi. Brāhmaṇā hatthe vidhuniṃsu. “Kasmā hatthe vidhunathā”ti ca vutte “kakkhaḷā,
atk-s0513a1:2098_5: mahārāja, supinā”ti. “Kā tesaṃ nipphatti bhavissatī”ti? “Rajjantarāyo jīvitantarāyo
atk-s0513a1:2098_6: bhogantarāyoti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ antarāyānaṃ aññataro”ti. “Sappaṭikammā, appaṭikammā”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2098_7: “Kāmaṃ ete supinā atipharusattā appaṭikammā, mayaṃ pana te sappaṭikamme karissāma,
atk-s0513a1:2098_8: ete paṭikkamāpetuṃ asakkontānaṃ amhākaṃ sikkhitabhāvo nāma kiṃ karissatī”ti. “Kiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2098_9: pana katvā paṭikkamāpessathā”ti? “Sabbacatukkena yaññaṃ yajissāma, mahārājā”ti. Rājā
atk-s0513a1:2098_10: bhītatasito “tena hi ācariyā mama jīvitaṃ tumhākaṃ hatthe hotu, khippaṃ me sotthiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2098_11: karothā”ti āha. Brāhmaṇā “bahuṃ dhanaṃ labhissāma, bahuṃ khajjabhojjaṃ āharāpessāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2098_12: haṭṭhatuṭṭhā “mā cintayittha, mahārājā”ti rājānaṃ samassāsetvā rājanivesanā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2098_13: bahinagare yaññāvāṭaṃ katvā bahū catuppadagaṇe thūṇūpanīte katvā pakkhigaṇe samāharitvā
atk-s0513a1:2099_0: Atha kho mallikā devī taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi “kiṃ nu kho,
atk-s0513a1:2099_1: mahārāja, brāhmaṇā punappunaṃ sañcarantī”ti? “Sukhitā, tvaṃ bhadde, amhākaṃ kaṇṇamūle
atk-s0513a1:2099_2: āsīvisaṃ carantaṃ na jānāsī”ti. “Kiṃ etaṃ, mahārājā”ti? Mayā evarūpā dussupinā diṭṭhā,
atk-s0513a1:2099_3: brāhmaṇā “tiṇṇaṃ antarāyānaṃ aññataro paññāyatī”ti vatvā “‘tesaṃ paṭighātāya yaññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2099_4: yajissāmā’ti vatvā punappunaṃ sañcarantī”ti. “Kiṃ pana te, mahārāja, sadevake loke
atk-s0513a1:2099_5: aggabrāhmaṇo supinapaṭikammaṃ pucchito”ti? “Kataro panesa, bhadde, sadevake loke
atk-s0513a1:2099_6: aggabrāhmaṇo”ti. “Sadevake loke aggapuggalaṃ sabbaññuṃ visuddhaṃ nikkilesaṃ mahābrāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2099_7: na jānāsi. So hi bhagavā supinantaraṃ jāneyya, gaccha tvaṃ puccha taṃ, mahārājā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2099_8: “Sādhu, devī”ti rājā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2100_0: Satthā madhurassaraṃ nicchāretvā “kiṃ nu kho, mahārāja, atippagova āgatosī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2100_1: Ahaṃ, bhante, paccūsasamaye soḷasa mahāsupine disvā bhīto brāhmaṇānaṃ ārocesiṃ. Brāhmaṇā
atk-s0513a1:2100_2: “kakkhaḷā, mahārāja, supinā, etesaṃ paṭighātatthāya sabbacatukkena yaññaṃ yajissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2100_3: yaññaṃ sajjenti, bahū pāṇā maraṇabhayatajjitā, tumhe ca sadevake loke aggapuggalā,
atk-s0513a1:2100_4: atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ upādāya natthi so ñeyyadhammo, yo vo ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ nāgacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2100_5: “Etesaṃ me supinānaṃ nipphattiṃ kathetha bhagavā”ti. “Evametaṃ, mahārāja, sadevake
atk-s0513a1:2100_6: loke maṃ ṭhapetvā añño etesaṃ supinānaṃ antaraṃ vā nipphattiṃ vā jānituṃ samattho
atk-s0513a1:2100_7: nāma natthi, ahaṃ te kathessāmi, apica kho tvaṃ diṭṭhadiṭṭhaniyāmeneva supine kathehī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2104: “Lābūni sīdanti silā plavanti, maṇḍūkiyo kaṇhasappe gilanti;
atk-s0513a1:2105: Kākaṃ suvaṇṇā parivārayanti, tasā vakā eḷakānaṃ bhayā hī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:2107_0: (1) Ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ tāva supinaṃ evaṃ addasaṃ – cattāro añjanavaṇṇā kāḷausabhā
atk-s0513a1:2107_1: “yujjhissāmā”ti catūhi disāhi rājaṅgaṇaṃ āgantvā “usabhayuddhaṃ passissāmā”ti mahājane
atk-s0513a1:2107_2: sannipatite yujjhanākāraṃ dassetvā naditvā gajjitvā ayujjhitvāva paṭikkantā. Imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2107_3: paṭhamaṃ supinaṃ addasaṃ, imassa ko vipākoti? “Mahārāja, imassa vipāko neva tava,
atk-s0513a1:2107_4: na mama kāle bhavissati, anāgate pana adhammikānaṃ kapaṇarājūnaṃ adhammikānañca manussānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2107_5: kāle loke viparivattamāne kusale ossanne, akusale ussanne, lokassa parihāyanakāle
atk-s0513a1:2107_6: devo na sammā vassissati, meghapādā pacchijjissanti, sassāni milāyissanti, dubbhikkhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2107_7: bhavissati, vassitukāmā viya catūhi disāhi meghā uṭṭhahitvā itthikāhi ātape patthaṭānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2107_8: vīhiādīnaṃ temanabhayena antopavesitakāle purisesu kuddālapiṭakahatthesu āḷibandhanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2107_9: nikkhantesu vassanākāraṃ dassetvā gajjitvā vijjulatā nicchāretvā te usabhā viya ayujjhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2107_10: avassitvāva palāyissanti. Ayametassa vipāko. Tuyhaṃ pana tappaccayā koci antarāyo
atk-s0513a1:2107_11: natthi, anāgataṃ ārabbha diṭṭho supino esa, brāhmaṇā pana attano jīvitavuttiṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a1:2107_12: kathayiṃsū”ti evaṃ satthā supinassa nipphattiṃ kathetvā āha “dutiyaṃ kathehi, mahārājā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2108_0: (2) Dutiyāhaṃ, bhante, evaṃ addasaṃ – khuddakā rukkhā ceva gacchā ca pathaviṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0513a1:2108_1: vidatthimattampi ratanamattampi anuggantvāva pupphanti ceva phalanti ca. Imaṃ dutiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2108_2: addasaṃ, imassa ko vipākoti? Mahārāja, imassāpi vipāko lokassa parihāyanakāle manussānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2108_3: parittāyukakāle bhavissati. Anāgatasmiñhi sattā tibbarāgā bhavissanti, asampattavayāva
atk-s0513a1:2108_4: kumāriyo purisantaraṃ gantvā utuniyo ceva gabbhiniyo ca hutvā puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhissanti.
atk-s0513a1:2108_5: Khuddakarukkhānaṃ pupphaṃ viya hi tāsaṃ utunibhāvo, phalaṃ viya ca puttadhītaro bhavissanti.
atk-s0513a1:2108_6: Itonidānampi te bhayaṃ natthi, tatiyaṃ kathehi, mahārājāti.
atk-s0513a1:2109_0: (3) Gāviyo, bhante, tadahujātānaṃ vacchakānaṃ khīraṃ pivantiyo addasaṃ. Ayaṃ me tatiyo
atk-s0513a1:2109_1: supino, imassa ko vipākoti? Imassāpi vipāko anāgate eva manussānaṃ jeṭṭhāpacāyikakammassa
atk-s0513a1:2109_2: naṭṭhakāle bhavissati. Anāgatasmiñhi sattā mātāpitūsu vā sassusasuresu vā lajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2109_3: anupaṭṭhāpetvā sayameva kuṭumbaṃ saṃvidahantāva ghāsacchādanamattampi mahallakānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2109_4: dātukāmā dassanti, adātukāmā na dassanti. Mahallakā anāthā asayaṃvasī dārake ārādhetvā
atk-s0513a1:2109_5: jīvissanti tadahujātānaṃ vacchakānaṃ khīraṃ pivantiyo mahāgāviyo viya. Itonidānampi
atk-s0513a1:2109_6: te bhayaṃ natthi, catutthaṃ kathehi, mahārājāti.
atk-s0513a1:2110_0: (4) Dhuravāhe, bhante, ārohapariṇāhasampanne mahāgoṇeyugaparamparāya ayojetvā taruṇe
atk-s0513a1:2110_1: godamme dhure yojente addasaṃ. Te dhuraṃ vahituṃ asakkontā chaḍḍetvā aṭṭhaṃsu, sakaṭāni
atk-s0513a1:2110_2: nappavaṭṭiṃsu. Ayaṃ me catuttho supino, imassa ko vipākoti? Imassāpi vipāko anāgate
atk-s0513a1:2110_3: eva adhammikarājūnaṃ kāle bhavissati. Anāgatasmiñhi adhammikakapaṇarājāno paṇḍitānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2110_4: paveṇikusalānaṃ kammaṃ nittharaṇasamatthānaṃ mahāmattānaṃ yasaṃ na dassanti. Dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2110_5: vinicchayaṭṭhānepi paṇḍite vohārakusale mahallake amacce na ṭhapessanti, tabbiparītānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2110_6: pana taruṇataruṇānaṃ yasaṃ dassanti, tathārūpe eva vinicchayaṭṭhāne ṭhapessanti,
atk-s0513a1:2110_7: te rājakammāni ceva yuttāyuttañca ajānantā neva taṃ yasaṃ ukkhipituṃ sakkhissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2110_8: na rājakammāni nittharituṃ. Te asakkontā kammadhuraṃ chaḍḍessanti, mahallakāpi paṇḍitāmaccā
atk-s0513a1:2110_9: yasaṃ alabhantā kiccāni nittharituṃ samatthāpi “kiṃ amhākaṃ etehi, mayaṃ bāhirakā
atk-s0513a1:2110_10: jātā, abbhantarikā taruṇadārakā jānissantī”ti uppannāni kammāni na karissanti, evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2110_11: sabbathāpi tesaṃ rājūnaṃ hāniyeva bhavissati, dhuraṃ vahituṃ asamatthānaṃ vacchadammānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2110_12: dhure yojitakālo viya, dhuravāhānañca mahāgoṇānaṃ yugaparamparāya ayojitakālo viya
atk-s0513a1:2110_13: bhavissati. Itonidānampi te bhayaṃ natthi, pañcamaṃ kathehi, mahārājāti.
atk-s0513a1:2111_0: (5) Bhante, ekaṃ ubhatomukhaṃ assaṃ addasaṃ, tassa dvīsu passesu yavasaṃ denti, so
atk-s0513a1:2111_1: dvīhi mukhehi khādati. Ayaṃ me pañcamo supino, imassa ko vipākoti? Imassāpi anāgate
atk-s0513a1:2111_2: adhammikarājakāleyeva vipāko bhavissati. Anāgatasmiñhi adhammikā bālarājāno adhammike
atk-s0513a1:2111_3: lolamanusse vinicchaye ṭhapessanti, te pāpapuññesu anādarā bālā sabhāyaṃ nisīditvā
atk-s0513a1:2111_4: vinicchayaṃ dentā ubhinnampi atthapaccatthikānaṃ hatthato lañjaṃ gahetvā khādissanti
atk-s0513a1:2111_5: asso viya dvīhi mukhehi yavasaṃ. Itonidānampi te bhayaṃ natthi, chaṭṭhaṃ kathehi, mahārājāti.
atk-s0513a1:2112_0: (6) Bhante, mahājano satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ sammajjitvā “idha passāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2112_1: karohī”ti ekassa jarasiṅgālassa upanāmesi, taṃ tattha passāvaṃ karontaṃ addasaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2112_2: Ayaṃ me chaṭṭho supino, imassa ko vipākoti? Imassāpi vipāko anāgateyeva bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2112_3: Anāgatasmiñhi adhammikā vijātirājāno jātisampannānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ āsaṅkāya yasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2112_4: na dassanti, akulīnānaṃyeva dassanti. Evaṃ mahākulāni duggatāni bhavissanti, lāmakakulāni
atk-s0513a1:2112_5: issarāni. Te ca kulīnapurisā jīvituṃ asakkontā “ime nissāya jīvissāmā”ti akulīnānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2112_6: dhītaro dassanti, iti tāsaṃ kuladhītānaṃ akulīnehi saddhiṃ saṃvāso jarasiṅgālassa
atk-s0513a1:2112_7: suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ passāvakaraṇasadiso bhavissati. Itonidānampi te bhayaṃ natthi, sattamaṃ kathehīti.
atk-s0513a1:2113_0: (7) Bhante, eko puriso rajjuṃ vaṭṭetvā vaṭṭetvā pādamūle nikkhipati, tena nisinnapīṭhassa
atk-s0513a1:2113_1: heṭṭhā sayitā ekā chātasiṅgālī tassa ajānantasseva taṃ khādati, evāhaṃ addasaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2113_2: me sattamo supino, imassa ko vipākoti? Imassāpi anāgateyeva vipāko bhavissati. Anāgatasmiñhi
atk-s0513a1:2113_3: itthiyo purisalolā surālolā alaṅkāralolā visikhālolā āmisalolā bhavissanti dussīlā
atk-s0513a1:2113_4: durācārā, tā sāmikehi kasigorakkhādīni kammāni katvā kicchena kasirena sambhataṃ
atk-s0513a1:2113_5: dhanaṃ jārehi saddhiṃ suraṃ pivantiyo mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhārayamānā antogehe accāyikampi
atk-s0513a1:2113_6: kiccaṃ anoloketvā gehe parikkhepassa uparibhāgenapi chiddaṭṭhānehipi jāre upadhārayamānā
atk-s0513a1:2113_7: sve vapitabbayuttakaṃ bījampi koṭṭetvā yāgubhattakhajjakādīni sampādetvā khādamānā
atk-s0513a1:2113_8: vilumpissanti heṭṭhāpīṭhake nipannachātasiṅgālī viya vaṭṭetvā vaṭṭetvā pādamūle nikkhittarajjuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2113_9: Itonidānampi te bhayaṃ natthi, aṭṭhamaṃ kathehīti.
atk-s0513a1:2114_0: (8) Bhante, rājadvāre bahūhi tucchakumbhehi parivāretvā ṭhapitaṃ ekaṃ mahantaṃ pūritakumbhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2114_1: addasaṃ. Cattāropi pana vaṇṇā catūhi disāhi catūhi anudisāhi ca ghaṭehi udakaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0513a1:2114_2: āharitvā pūritakumbhameva pūrenti, pūritapūritaṃ udakaṃ uttaritvā palāyati, tepi
atk-s0513a1:2114_3: punappunaṃ tattheva udakaṃ āsiñcanti, tucchakumbhe pana olokentāpi natthi. Ayaṃ me
atk-s0513a1:2114_4: aṭṭhamo supino, imassa ko vipākoti? Imassāpi anāgateyeva vipāko bhavissati. Anāgatasmiñhi
atk-s0513a1:2114_5: loko parihāyissati, raṭṭhaṃ nirojaṃ bhavissati, rājāno duggatā kapaṇā bhavissanti.
atk-s0513a1:2114_6: Yo issaro bhavissati, tassa bhaṇḍāgāre satasahassamattā kahāpaṇā bhavissanti, te
atk-s0513a1:2114_7: evaṃ duggatā sabbe jānapade attanova kamme kāressanti, upaddutā manussā sake kammante
atk-s0513a1:2114_8: chaḍḍetvā rājūnaññeva atthāya pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇāni vapantā rakkhantā lāyantā maddantā
atk-s0513a1:2114_9: pavesentā ucchukhettāni karontā yantāni karontā yantāni vāhentā phāṇitādīni pacantā
atk-s0513a1:2114_10: pupphārāme ca phalārāme ca karontā tattha tattha nipphannāni pubbaṇṇādīni āharitvā
atk-s0513a1:2114_11: rañño koṭṭhāgārameva pūressanti, attano gehesu tucchakoṭṭhe olokentāpi na bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2114_12: tucchakumbhe anoloketvā pūritakumbhe pūraṇasadisameva bhavissati. Itonidānampi te
atk-s0513a1:2115_0: (9) Bhante, ekaṃ pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ gambhīraṃ sabbato titthaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2115_1: addasaṃ. Samantato dvipadacatuppadā otaritvā tattha pānīyaṃ pivanti. Tassā majjhe
atk-s0513a1:2115_2: gambhīraṭṭhāne udakaṃ āvilaṃ, tīrappadesesu dvipadacatuppadānaṃ akkamaṭṭhāne acchaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2115_3: vippasannaṃ anāvilaṃ. Evāhaṃ addasaṃ. Ayaṃ me navamo supino, imassa ko vipākoti?
atk-s0513a1:2115_4: Imassāpi anāgateyeva vipāko bhavissati. Anāgatasmiñhi rājāno adhammikā bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2115_5: chandādivasena agatiṃ gacchantā rajjaṃ kāressanti, dhammena vinicchayaṃ nāma na dassanti,
atk-s0513a1:2115_6: lañjavittakā bhavissanti dhanalolā, raṭṭhavāsikesu nesaṃ khantimettānuddayā nāma
atk-s0513a1:2115_7: na bhavissanti, kakkhaḷā pharusā ucchuyante ucchugaṇṭhikā viya manusse pīḷentā nānappakārena
atk-s0513a1:2115_8: baliṃ uppādentā dhanaṃ gaṇhissanti. Manussā balipīḷitā kiñci dātuṃ asakkontā gāmanigamādayo
atk-s0513a1:2115_9: chaḍḍetvā paccantaṃ gantvā vāsaṃ kappessanti, majjhimajanapado suñño bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2115_10: paccanto ghanavāso seyyathāpi pokkharaṇiyā majjhe udakaṃ āvilaṃ pariyante vippasannaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2115_11: Itonidānampi te bhayaṃ natthi, dasamaṃ kathehīti.
atk-s0513a1:2116_0: (10) Bhante, ekissāyeva kumbhiyā paccamānaṃ odanaṃ apākaṃ addasaṃ “apāka”nti vicāretvā
atk-s0513a1:2116_1: vibhajitvā ṭhapitaṃ viya tīhākārehi paccamānaṃ, ekasmiṃ passe atikilinno hoti, ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2116_2: uttaṇḍulo, ekasmiṃ supakkoti. Ayaṃ me dasamo supino, imassa ko vipākoti? Imassāpi
atk-s0513a1:2116_3: anāgateyeva vipāko bhavissati. Anāgatasmiñhi rājāno adhammikā bhavissanti, tesu adhammikesu
atk-s0513a1:2116_4: rājayuttāpi brāhmaṇagahapatikāpi negamajānapadāpīti samaṇabrāhmaṇe upādāya sabbe
atk-s0513a1:2116_5: manussā adhammikā bhavissanti, tato tesaṃ ārakkhadevatā, balipaṭiggāhikā devatā,
atk-s0513a1:2116_6: rukkhadevatā, ākāsaṭṭhadevatāti evaṃ devatāpi adhammikā bhavissanti. Adhammikarājūnañca
atk-s0513a1:2116_7: rajje vātā visamā kharā vāyissanti, te ākāsaṭṭhavimānāni kampessanti, tesu kampitesu
atk-s0513a1:2116_8: devatā kupitā devaṃ vassituṃ na dassanti, vassamānopi sakalaraṭṭhe ekappahārena na
atk-s0513a1:2116_9: vassissati, vassamānopi sabbattha kasikammassa vā vappakammassa vā upakārako hutvā
atk-s0513a1:2116_10: na vassissati. Yathā ca raṭṭhe, evaṃ janapadepi gāmepi ekataḷākepi ekasarepi ekappahāreneva
atk-s0513a1:2116_11: na vassissati, taḷākassa uparibhāge vassanto heṭṭhābhāge na vassissati, heṭṭhā vassanto
atk-s0513a1:2116_12: upari na vassissati. Ekasmiṃ bhāge sassaṃ ativassena nassissati, ekasmiṃ avassanena
atk-s0513a1:2116_13: milāyissati, ekasmiṃ sammā vassamāno sampādessati. Evaṃ ekassa rañño rajje vuttasassā
atk-s0513a1:2116_14: tippakārā bhavissanti ekakumbhiyā odano viya. Itonidānampi te bhayaṃ natthi, ekādasamaṃ kathehīti.
atk-s0513a1:2117_0: (11) Bhante, satasahassagghanikaṃ candanasāraṃ pūtitakkena vikkiṇante addasaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2117_1: me ekādasamo supino, imassa ko vipākoti? Imassāpi anāgateyeva mayhaṃ sāsane parihāyante
atk-s0513a1:2117_2: vipāko bhavissati. Anāgatasmiñhi paccayalolā alajjī bhikkhū bahū bhavissanti, te
atk-s0513a1:2117_3: mayā paccayaloluppaṃ nimmathetvā kathitadhammadesanaṃ cīvarādicatupaccayahetu paresaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2117_4: desessanti, paccayehi mucchitā nissaraṇapakkhe ṭhitā nibbānābhimukhaṃ katvā desetuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2117_5: na sakkhissanti, kevalaṃ “padabyañjanasampattiñceva madhurasaddañca sutvā mahagghāni
atk-s0513a1:2117_6: cīvarādīni dassanti” iccevaṃ desessanti. Apare antaravīthicatukkarājadvārādīsu nisīditvā
atk-s0513a1:2117_7: kahāpaṇaaḍḍhakahāpaṇapādamāsakarūpādīnipi nissāya desessanti. Iti mayā nibbānagghanakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2117_8: katvā desitaṃ dhammaṃ catupaccayatthāya ceva kahāpaṇaḍḍhakahāpaṇādīnaṃ atthāya ca
atk-s0513a1:2117_9: vikkiṇitvā desentā satasahassagghanakaṃ candanasāraṃ pūtitakkena vikkiṇantā viya
atk-s0513a1:2117_10: bhavissanti. Itonidānampi te bhayaṃ natthi, dvādasamaṃ kathehīti.
atk-s0513a1:2118_0: (12) Bhante, tucchalābūni udake sīdantāni addasaṃ, imassa ko vipākoti? Imassapi anāgate
atk-s0513a1:2118_1: adhammikarājakāle loke viparivattanteyeva vipāko bhavissati. Tadā hi rājāno jātisampannānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2118_2: kulaputtānaṃ yasaṃ na dassanti, akulīnānaṃyeva dassanti, te issarā bhavissanti, itare
atk-s0513a1:2118_3: daliddā. Rājasammukhepi rājadvārepi amaccasammukhepi vinicchayaṭṭhānepi tucchalābusadisānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2118_4: akulīnānaṃyeva kathā osīditvā ṭhitā viya niccalā suppatiṭṭhitā bhavissati. Saṅghasannipātesupi
atk-s0513a1:2118_6: pāpapuggalānaṃyeva kathā niyyānikā bhavissati, na lajjibhikkhūnanti evaṃ sabbathāpi
atk-s0513a1:2118_7: tucchalābusīdanakālo viya bhavissati. Itonidānampi te bhayaṃ natthi, terasamaṃ kathehīti.
atk-s0513a1:2119_0: (13) Bhante, mahantamahantā kūṭāgārappamāṇā ghanasilā nāvā viya udake plavamānā addasaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2119_1: imassa ko vipākoti? Imassapi tādiseyeva kāle vipāko bhavissati. Tadā hi adhammikarājāno
atk-s0513a1:2119_2: akulīnānaṃ yasaṃ dassanti, te issarā bhavissanti, kulīnā duggatā. Tesu na keci gāravaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2119_3: karissanti, itaresuyeva karissanti. Rājasammukhe vā amaccasammukhe vā vinicchayaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:2119_4: vā vinicchayakusalānaṃ ghanasilāsadisānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ kathā na ogāhitvā patiṭṭhahissati.
atk-s0513a1:2119_5: Tesu kathentesu “kiṃ ime kathentī”ti itare parihāsameva karissanti. Bhikkhusannipātesupi
atk-s0513a1:2119_6: vuttappakāresu ṭhānesu neva pesale bhikkhū garukātabbe maññissanti, nāpi tesaṃ kathā
atk-s0513a1:2119_7: pariyogāhitvā patiṭṭhahissati, silānaṃ plavanakālo viya bhavissati. Itonidānampi
atk-s0513a1:2120_0: (14) Bhante, khuddakamadhukapupphappamāṇā maṇḍūkiyo mahantamahante kaṇhasappe vegena
atk-s0513a1:2120_1: anubandhitvā uppalanāḷe viya chinditvā chinditvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā gilantiyo addasaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2120_2: imassa ko vipākoti? Imassapi loke parihāyante anāgate eva vipāko bhavissati. Tadā
atk-s0513a1:2120_3: hi manussā tibbarāgajātikā kilesānuvattakā hutvā taruṇataruṇānaṃ attano bhariyānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2120_4: vase vattissanti, gehe dāsakammakarādayopi gomahiṃsādayopi hiraññasuvaṇṇampi sabbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2120_5: tāsaññeva āyattaṃ bhavissati. “Asukaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ vā paricchadādijātaṃ vā kaha”nti
atk-s0513a1:2120_6: vutte “yattha vā tattha vā hotu, kiṃ tuyhiminā byāpārena, tvaṃ mayhaṃ ghare santaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2120_7: vā asantaṃ vā jānitukāmo jāto”ti vatvā nānappakārehi akkositvā mukhasattīhi koṭṭetvā
atk-s0513a1:2120_8: dāsaceṭake viya attano vase katvā attano issariyaṃ pavattessanti. Evaṃ madhukapupphappamāṇānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2120_9: maṇḍūkapotikānaṃ āsīvise kaṇhasappe gilanakālo viya bhavissati. Itonidānampi te bhayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2121_0: (15) Bhante, dasahi asaddhammehi samannāgataṃ gāmagocaraṃ kākaṃ kañcanavaṇṇatāya
atk-s0513a1:2121_1: “suvaṇṇā”ti laddhanāme suvaṇṇarājahaṃse parivārente addasaṃ, imassa ko vipākoti?
atk-s0513a1:2121_2: Imassāpi anāgate dubbalarājakāleyeva vipāko bhavissati. Anāgatasmiñhi rājāno hatthisippādīsu
atk-s0513a1:2121_3: akusalā yuddhesu avisāradā bhavissanti, te attano rajjavipattiṃ āsaṅkamānā samānajātikānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2121_4: kulaputtānaṃ issariyaṃ adatvā attano pādamūlikanhāpakakappakādīnaṃ dassanti, jātigottasampannā
atk-s0513a1:2121_5: kulaputtā rājakule patiṭṭhaṃ alabhamānā jīvikaṃ kappetuṃ asamatthā hutvā issariye
atk-s0513a1:2121_6: ṭhite jātigottahīne akulīne upaṭṭhahantā vicarissanti, suvaṇṇarājahaṃsehi kākassa
atk-s0513a1:2121_7: parivāritakālo viya bhavissati. Itonidānampi te bhayaṃ natthi, soḷasamaṃ kathehīti.
atk-s0513a1:2122_0: (16) Bhante, pubbe dīpino eḷake khādanti, ahaṃ pana eḷake dīpino anubandhitvā murumurūti
atk-s0513a1:2122_1: khādante addasaṃ. Athaññe tasā vakā eḷake dūratova disvā tasitā tāsappattā hutvā
atk-s0513a1:2122_2: eḷakānaṃ bhayāpalāyitvā gumbagahanādīni pavisitvā nilīyiṃsu, evāhaṃ addasaṃ, imassa
atk-s0513a1:2122_3: ko vipākoti? Imassapi anāgate adhammikarājakāleyeva vipāko bhavissati. Tadā hi akulīnā
atk-s0513a1:2122_4: rājavallabhā issarā bhavissanti, kulīnā apaññātā duggatā. Te rājavallabhā rājānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2122_5: attano kathaṃ gāhāpetvā vinicchayaṭṭhānādīsu balavanto hutvā kulīnānaṃ paveṇiāgatāni
atk-s0513a1:2122_6: khettavatthādīni “amhākaṃ santakāni etānī”ti abhiyuñjitvā tesu “na tumhākaṃ, amhāka”nti
atk-s0513a1:2122_7: āgantvā vinicchayaṭṭhānādīsu vivadantesu vettalatādīhi paharāpetvā gīvāyaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:2122_8: apakaḍḍhāpetvā “attano pamāṇaṃ na jānātha, amhehi saddhiṃ vivadatha, idāni vo rañño
atk-s0513a1:2122_9: kathetvā hatthapādacchedanādīni kāressāmā”ti santajjessanti. Te tesaṃ bhayena attano
atk-s0513a1:2122_10: santakāni vatthūni “tumhākaṃyevetāni gaṇhathā”ti niyyādetvā attano gehāni pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:2122_11: bhītā nipajjissanti. Pāpabhikkhūpi pesale bhikkhū yathāruci viheṭhessanti, te pesalā
atk-s0513a1:2122_12: bhikkhū paṭisaraṇaṃ alabhamānā araññaṃ pavisitvā gahanaṭṭhānesu nilīyissanti. Evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2122_13: hīnajaccehi ceva pāpabhikkhūhi ca upaddutānaṃ jātimantakulaputtānañceva pesalabhikkhūnañca
atk-s0513a1:2122_14: eḷakānaṃ bhayena tasavakānaṃ palāyanakālo viya bhavissati. Itonidānampi te bhayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2122_15: natthi. Ayampi hi supino anāgataṃyeva ārabbha diṭṭho. Brāhmaṇā pana na dhammasudhammatāya
atk-s0513a1:2122_16: tayi sinehena kathayiṃsu, “bahudhanaṃ labhissāmā”ti āmisāpekkhatāya jīvitavuttiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2123_0: Evaṃ satthā soḷasannaṃ mahāsupinānaṃ nipphattiṃ kathetvā “na kho, mahārāja, etarahi
atk-s0513a1:2123_1: tvaññeva ime supine addasa, porāṇakarājānopi addasaṃsu. Brāhmaṇāpi nesaṃ evameva
atk-s0513a1:2123_2: ime supine gahetvā yaññamatthake khipiṃsu, tato paṇḍitehi dinnanayena gantvā bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2123_3: pucchiṃsu. Porāṇakā paṇḍitāpi nesaṃ ime supine kathentā imināva niyāmena kathesu”nti
atk-s0513a1:2124_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2124_1: vayappatto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ceva samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā himavantappadese
atk-s0513a1:2124_2: jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto viharati. Tadā bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto imināva niyāmena ime supine
atk-s0513a1:2124_3: disvā brāhmaṇe pucchi. Brāhmaṇā evameva yaññaṃ yajituṃ ārabhiṃsu. Tesu purohitassa
atk-s0513a1:2124_4: antevāsikamāṇavo paṇḍito byatto ācariyaṃ āha – “ācariya, tumhehi mayaṃ tayo vede
atk-s0513a1:2124_5: uggaṇhāpitā, nanu tesu ekaṃ māretvā ekassa sotthikammassa kāraṇaṃ nāma natthī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2124_6: Tāta, iminā upāyena amhākaṃ bahudhanaṃ uppajjissati, tvaṃ pana rañño dhanaṃ rakkhitukāmo
atk-s0513a1:2124_7: maññeti. Māṇavo “tena hi, ācariya, tumhe tumhākaṃ kammaṃ karotha, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ santike
atk-s0513a1:2124_8: kiṃ karissāmī”ti vicaranto rañño uyyānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2125_0: Taṃ divasameva bodhisattopi taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “ajja mayi manussapathaṃ gate mahājanassa
atk-s0513a1:2125_1: bandhanā mokkho bhavissatī”ti ākāsena gantvā uyyāne otaritvā suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya maṅgalasilātale
atk-s0513a1:2125_2: nisīdi. Māṇavo bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā paṭisanthāramakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2125_3: Bodhisattopi tena saddhiṃ madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kiṃ nu kho, māṇava, rājā dhammena
atk-s0513a1:2125_4: rajjaṃ kāretī”ti pucchi. “Bhante, rājā nāma dhammiko, apica kho taṃ brāhmaṇā atitthe
atk-s0513a1:2125_5: pakkhandāpe”nti. Rājā soḷasa supine disvā brāhmaṇānaṃ ārocesi. Brāhmaṇā “yaññaṃ yajissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2125_6: āraddhā. Kiṃ nu kho, bhante, “ayaṃ nāma imesaṃ supinānaṃ nipphattī”ti rājānaṃ saññāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2125_7: tumhākaṃ mahājanaṃ bhayā mocetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti. Mayaṃ kho, māṇava, rājānaṃ na jānāma,
atk-s0513a1:2125_8: rājāpi amhe na jānāti. Sace pana idhāgantvā puccheyya, katheyyāmassa mayanti. Māṇavo
atk-s0513a1:2125_9: “ahaṃ, bhante, taṃ ānessāmi, tumhe mamāgamanaṃ udikkhantā muhuttaṃ nisīdathā”ti bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2125_10: paṭijānāpetvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “mahārāja, eko ākāsacāriko tāpaso tumhākaṃ uyyāne
atk-s0513a1:2125_11: otaritvā ‘tumhehi diṭṭhasupinānaṃ nipphattiṃ kathessāmī’ti tumhe pakkosatī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2126_0: Rājā tassa kathaṃ sutvā tāvadeva mahantena parivārena uyyānaṃ gantvā tāpasaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0513a1:2126_1: ekamantaṃ nisinno pucchi “tumhe kira, bhante, mayā diṭṭhasupinānaṃ nipphattiṃ jānāthā”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2126_2: “Āma, mahārājā”ti. “Tena hi kathethā”ti. “Kathemi, mahārāja, yathādiṭṭhe tāva supine
atk-s0513a1:2131: “Lābūni sīdanti silā plavanti, maṇḍūkiyo kaṇhasappe gilanti;
atk-s0513a1:2132: Kākaṃ suvaṇṇā parivārayanti, tasā vakā eḷakānaṃ bhayā hī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:2134: Bodhisattopi tesaṃ idāni satthārā kathitaniyāmeneva vitthārato nipphattiṃ kathetvā pariyosāne sayaṃ idaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0513a1:2136_0: Tatrāyamattho – ayaṃ, mahārāja, imesaṃ supinānaṃ nipphatti. Yaṃ panetaṃ tesaṃ paṭighātatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2136_1: yaññakammaṃ vattati, taṃ vipariyāso vattati viparītato vattati, vipallāsena vattatīti
atk-s0513a1:2136_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Kiṃkāraṇā? Imesañhi nipphatti nāma lokassa viparivattanakāle, akāraṇassa
atk-s0513a1:2136_3: kāraṇanti gahaṇakāle, kāraṇassa akāraṇanti chaḍḍanakāle, abhūtassa bhūtanti gahaṇakāle,
atk-s0513a1:2136_4: bhūtassa abhūtanti jahanakāle, alajjīnaṃ ussannakāle, lajjīnañca parihīnakāle bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2136_5: Nayidha matthīti idāni pana tava vā mama vā kāle idha imasmiṃ purisayuge vattamāne
atk-s0513a1:2136_6: etesaṃ nipphatti natthi. Tasmā etesaṃ paṭighātāya vattamānaṃ yaññakammaṃ vipallāsena
atk-s0513a1:2136_7: vattati, alaṃ tena. Natthi te itonidānaṃ bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vāti mahāpuriso
atk-s0513a1:2136_8: rājānaṃ samassāsetvā mahājanaṃ bandhanā mocetvā puna ākāse ṭhatvā rañño ovādaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a1:2136_9: pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā “ito paṭṭhāya, mahārāja, brāhmaṇehi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā
atk-s0513a1:2136_10: pasughātayaññaṃ mā yajī”ti dhammaṃ desetvā ākāseneva attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2136_11: Rājāpi tassa ovāde ṭhito dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2137_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “supinapaccayā te bhayaṃ natthi, haretaṃ yañña”nti
atk-s0513a1:2137_1: yaññaṃ hāretvā mahājanassa jīvitadānaṃ datvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a1:2137_2: – “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, māṇavo sāriputto, tāpaso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2138: Parinibbute pana bhagavati saṅgītikārakā “usabhā”tiādīni tīṇi padāni aṭṭhakathaṃ āropetvā “lābūnī”tiādīni cattāri padāni ekaṃ gāthaṃ katvā ekakanipātapāḷiṃ āropesunti.
atk-s0513a1:2142_0: Ubho khañjāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto macchariyakosiyaseṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2142_1: Rājagahanagarassa kira avidūre sakkāraṃ nāma nigamo ahosi, tattheko macchariyakosiyo
atk-s0513a1:2142_2: nāma seṭṭhi asītikoṭivibhavo paṭivasati. So tiṇaggena telabindumattampi neva paresaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2142_3: deti, na attanā paribhuñjati. Iti tassa taṃ vibhavajātaṃ neva puttadārādīnaṃ, na
atk-s0513a1:2142_4: samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ atthaṃ anubhoti, rakkhasapariggahitapokkharaṇī viya aparibhogaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0513a1:2143_0: Satthā ekadivasaṃ paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya sakalalokadhātuyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2143_1: bodhaneyyabandhave olokento pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake vasantassa tassa seṭṭhino
atk-s0513a1:2143_2: sapajāpatikassa sotāpattiphalassa upanissayaṃ addasa. Tato purimadivase pana rājānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2143_3: upaṭṭhātuṃ rājagehaṃ gantvā rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ katvā āgacchanto ekaṃ chātajjhattaṃ janapadamanussaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2143_4: kummāsapūraṃ kapallapūvaṃ khādantaṃ disvā tattha pipāsaṃ uppādetvā attano gharaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2143_5: gantvā cintesi “sacāhaṃ ‘kapallapūvaṃ khāditukāmomhī’ti vakkhāmi, bahū mayā saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2143_6: khāditukāmā bhavissanti, evaṃ me bahūni taṇḍulasappimadhuphāṇitādīni parikkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2143_7: gamissanti, na kassaci kathessāmī”ti taṇhaṃ adhivāsento vicarati. So gacchante gacchante
atk-s0513a1:2143_8: kāle uppaṇḍupaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto jāto. Tato taṇhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0513a1:2143_9: gabbhaṃ pavisitvā mañcakaṃ upagūhitvā nipajji. Evaṃgatopi dhanahānibhayena kassaci kiñci na kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2144_0: Atha naṃ bhariyā upasaṅkamitvā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjitvā “kiṃ te sāmi, aphāsuka”nti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2144_1: “Na me kiñci aphāsukaṃ atthī”ti. “Kiṃ nu kho te rājā kupito”ti? “Rājāpi me na kuppatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2144_2: “Atha kiṃ te puttadhītāhi vā dāsakammakarādīhi vā kiñci amanāpaṃ kataṃ atthī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2144_3: “Evarūpampi natthī”ti. “Kismiñci pana te taṇhā atthī”ti? Evaṃ vuttepi dhanahānibhayena
atk-s0513a1:2144_4: kiñci avatvā nissaddova nipajji. Atha naṃ bhariyā “kathehi, sāmi, kismiṃ te taṇhā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2144_5: āha. So vacanaṃ parigilanto viya “atthi me ekā taṇhā”ti āha. “Kiṃ taṇhā, sāmī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2144_6: “Kapallapūvaṃ khāditukāmomhī”ti. “Atha kimatthaṃ na kathesi, kiṃ tvaṃ daliddo, idāni
atk-s0513a1:2144_7: sakalasakkāranigamavāsīnaṃ pahonake kapallapūve pacissāmī”ti? “Kiṃ te etehi, te attano
atk-s0513a1:2144_8: kammaṃ katvā khādissantī”ti? “Tena hi ekaracchavāsīnaṃ pahonake pacāmī”ti. Jānāmahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2144_9: tava mahaddhanabhāvanti. “Tena hi imasmiṃ gehamatte sabbesaṃ pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2144_10: “Jānāmahaṃ tava mahajjhāsayabhāva”nti. “Tena hi te puttadāramattasseva pahonakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2144_11: katvā pacāmī”ti. “Kiṃ pana te etehī”ti? “Tena hi tuyhañca mayhañca pahonakaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:2144_12: pacāmī”ti. “Tvaṃ kiṃ karissasī”ti? “Tena hi ekasseva te pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2144_13: “Imasmiṃ ṭhāne paccamānaṃ bahū paccāsīsanti, sakalataṇḍule ṭhapetvā bhinnataṇḍule
atk-s0513a1:2144_14: ca uddhanakapallādīni ca ādāya thokaṃ khīrasappimadhuphāṇitañca gahetvā sattabhūmikassa
atk-s0513a1:2144_15: pāsādassa uparimatalaṃ āruyha paca, tatthāhaṃ ekakova nisīditvā khādissāmī”ti. Sā
atk-s0513a1:2144_16: “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā gahetabbaṃ gāhāpetvā pāsādaṃ āruyha dāsiyo vissajjetvā seṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2144_17: pakkosāpesi. So ādito paṭṭhāya dvārāni pidahanto sabbadvāresu sūcighaṭikāni datvā
atk-s0513a1:2144_18: sattamatalaṃ abhiruhitvā tatthapi dvāraṃ pidahitvā nisīdi. Bhariyāpissa uddhane aggiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2144_19: jāletvā kapallakaṃ āropetvā pūve pacituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2145_0: Atha satthā pātova mahāmoggallānattheraṃ āmantesi, “eso, moggallāna, rājagahanagarassa
atk-s0513a1:2145_1: avidūre sakkāranigame macchariyakosiyaseṭṭhi ‘kapallapūve khādissāmī’ti aññesaṃ dassanabhayena
atk-s0513a1:2145_2: sattabhūmike pāsāde kapallapūve pacāpeti. Tvaṃ tattha gantvā taṃ seṭṭhiṃ dametvā
atk-s0513a1:2145_3: nibbisevanaṃ katvā ubhopi jayampatike pūve ca khīrasappimadhuphāṇitādīni ca gāhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2145_4: attano balena jetavanaṃ ānehi. Ajjāhaṃ pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ vihāreyeva nisīdissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2145_5: pūveheva bhattakiccaṃ karissāmī”ti. Thero “sādhu, bhante”ti satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a1:2145_6: tāvadeva iddhibalena taṃ nigamaṃ gantvā tassa pāsādassa sīhapañjaradvāre sunivattho
atk-s0513a1:2146_0: Mahāseṭṭhino theraṃ disvāva hadayamaṃsaṃ kampi. So “ahaṃ evarūpānaññeva bhayena imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2146_1: ṭhānaṃ āgato, ayañca āgantvā vātapānadvāre ṭhito”ti gahetabbagahaṇaṃ apassanto aggimhi
atk-s0513a1:2146_2: pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya dosena taṭataṭāyanto evamāha “samaṇa, ākāse ṭhatvā tvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2146_3: kiṃ labhissasi, ākāse apade padaṃ dassetvā caṅkamantopi neva labhissasī”ti. Thero
atk-s0513a1:2146_4: tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne aparāparaṃ caṅkami. Seṭṭhi “caṅkamanto kiṃ labhissasi, ākāse pallaṅkena
atk-s0513a1:2146_5: nisīdamānopi na labhissasiyevā”ti āha. Thero pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0513a1:2146_6: “nisinno kiṃ labhissasi, āgantvā vātapānaummāre ṭhitopi na labhissasī”ti āha. Atha
atk-s0513a1:2146_7: thero ummāre aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ “ummāre ṭhito kiṃ labhissasi, dhūmāyantopi na labhissasiyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2146_8: āha. Thero dhūmāyi, sakalapāsādo ekadhūmo ahosi, seṭṭhino akkhīnaṃ sūciyā vijjhanakālo
atk-s0513a1:2146_9: viya jāto. Gehajjhāyanabhayena pana naṃ “pajjalantopi na labhissasī”ti avatvā cintesi
atk-s0513a1:2146_10: “ayaṃ samaṇo suṭṭhu laggo, aladdhā na gamissati, ekamassa pūvaṃ dāpessāmī”ti bhariyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2146_11: āha – “bhadde, ekaṃ khuddakapūvaṃ pacitvā samaṇassa datvā uyyojehi na”nti. Sā thokaññeva
atk-s0513a1:2146_12: piṭṭhaṃ kapallapātiyaṃ pakkhipi, mahāpūvo hutvā sakalapātiṃ pūretvā uddhumāto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2147_0: Seṭṭhi taṃ disvā “bahu tayā piṭṭhaṃ gahitaṃ bhavissatī”ti sayameva dabbikaṇṇena thokataraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2147_1: piṭṭhaṃ gahetvā pakkhipi, pūvo purimapūvato mahantataro jāto. Evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ pacati,
atk-s0513a1:2147_2: so so mahantamahantova hoti. So nibbinno bhariyaṃ āha “bhadde, imassa ekaṃ pūvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2147_3: dehī”ti. Tassā pacchito ekaṃ pūvaṃ gaṇhantiyā sabbe ekābaddhā allīyiṃsu. Sā seṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2147_4: āha “sāmi, sabbe pūvā ekato laggā, visuṃ kātuṃ na sakkomī”ti. “Ahaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2147_5: sopi kātuṃ nāsakkhi. Ubho janā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā kaḍḍhantāpi viyojetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsuyeva.
atk-s0513a1:2147_6: Athassa pūvehi saddhiṃ vāyamantasseva sarīrato sedā mucciṃsu, pipāsā ca pacchijji.
atk-s0513a1:2147_7: Tato bhariyaṃ āha “bhadde, na me pūvehi attho, pacchiyā saddhiṃyeva imassa bhikkhussa
atk-s0513a1:2147_8: dehī”ti. Sā pacchiṃ ādāya theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā sabbe pūve therassa adāsi. Thero ubhinnampi
atk-s0513a1:2147_9: dhammaṃ desesi, tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇe kathesi, “atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭha”nti dānādīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2148_0: Taṃ sutvā pasannacitto seṭṭhi “bhante, āgantvā imasmiṃ pallaṅke nisīditvā pūve paribhuñjathā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2148_1: āha. Thero “mahāseṭṭhi, sammāsambuddho ‘pūve khādissāmī’ti pañcahi bhikkhusatehi
atk-s0513a1:2148_2: saddhiṃ vihāre nisinno, tumhākaṃ ruciyā sati seṭṭhibhariyaṃ pūve ca khīrādīni ca
atk-s0513a1:2148_3: gaṇhāpetha, satthu santikaṃ gamissāmā”ti āha. “Kahaṃ pana, bhante, etarahi satthā”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2148_5: ettakaṃ addhānaṃ kathaṃ gamissāmā”ti? “Mahāseṭṭhi tumhākaṃ ruciyā sati ahaṃ vo attano
atk-s0513a1:2148_6: iddhibalena nessāmi, tumhākaṃ pāsāde sopānasīsaṃ attano ṭhāneyeva bhavissati, sopānapariyosānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2148_7: pana jetavanadvārakoṭṭhake bhavissati, uparipāsādā heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ otaraṇakālamattena
atk-s0513a1:2148_8: vo jetavanaṃ nessāmī”ti. So “sādhu, bhante”ti sampaṭicchi. Thero sopānasīsaṃ tattheva
atk-s0513a1:2149_0: Iti thero seṭṭhiñca seṭṭhibhariyañca uparipāsādā heṭṭhāotaraṇakālato khippataraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2149_1: jetavanaṃ sampāpesi. Te ubhopi satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā kālaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā
atk-s0513a1:2149_2: bhattaggaṃ pavisitvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena. Mahāseṭṭhi
atk-s0513a1:2149_3: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ adāsi, seṭṭhibhariyā tathāgatassa
atk-s0513a1:2149_4: patte pūve patiṭṭhāpesi. Satthā attano yāpanamattaṃ gaṇhi, pañcasatā bhikkhūpi tatheva
atk-s0513a1:2149_5: gaṇhiṃsu. Seṭṭhi khīrasappimadhuphāṇitasakkharādīni dadamāno agamāsi. Satthā pañcahi
atk-s0513a1:2149_6: bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Mahāseṭṭhipi saddhiṃ bhariyāya yāvadatthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2149_7: khādi, pūvānaṃ pariyosānameva na paññāyati, sakalavihāre bhikkhūnañca vighāsādānañca
atk-s0513a1:2149_8: dinnepi na pariyanto paññāyati. “Bhante, pūvā parikkhayaṃ na gacchantī”ti bhagavato
atk-s0513a1:2149_9: ārocesuṃ. Tena hi jetavanadvārakoṭṭhake chaḍḍethāti. Atha ne dvārakoṭṭhakassa avidūre
atk-s0513a1:2149_10: pabbhāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍayiṃsu. Ajjatanāpi taṃ ṭhānaṃ “kapallapūvapabbhāro”tveva paññāyati.
atk-s0513a1:2149_11: Mahāseṭṭhi saddhiṃ bhariyāya bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Bhagavā
atk-s0513a1:2149_12: anumodanaṃ akāsi. Anumodanāpariyosāne ubhopi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2149_13: vanditvā dvārakoṭṭhake sopānaṃ āruyha attano pāsādeyeva patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:2150_0: Punadivase sammāsambuddhe sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā jetavanaṃ āgamma bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2150_1: sugatovādaṃ datvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā paṭisallīne sāyanhasamaye dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2150_3: anupahacca bhoge macchariyaseṭṭhiṃ muhutteneva dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā pūve gāhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2150_4: jetavanaṃ ānetvā satthu sammukhaṃ katvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi, aho mahānubhāvo
atk-s0513a1:2150_5: thero”ti therassa guṇakathaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:2150_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “bhikkhave, kuladamakena
atk-s0513a1:2150_7: nāma bhikkhunā kule aviheṭhetvā akilametvā pupphato reṇuṃ gaṇhantena bhamarena viya
atk-s0513a1:2150_8: upasaṅkamitvā buddhaguṇe jānāpetabba”nti vatvā theraṃ pasaṃsanto –
atk-s0513a1:2152: Paleti rasamādāya, evaṃ gāme munī care”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:2153_0: Imaṃ dhammapade gāthaṃ vatvā uttaripi therassa guṇaṃ pakāsetuṃ “na bhikkhave, idāneva
atk-s0513a1:2153_1: moggallānena macchariyaseṭṭhi damito, pubbepi taṃ dametvā kammaphalasambandhaṃ jānāpesiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2154_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bārāṇasiyaṃ illiso nāma seṭṭhi ahosi
atk-s0513a1:2154_1: asītikoṭivibhavo purisadosasamannāgato khañjo kuṇī visamakkhimaṇḍalo assaddho appasanno
atk-s0513a1:2154_2: maccharī, neva aññesaṃ deti, na sayaṃ paribhuñjati. Rakkhasapariggahitapokkharaṇī
atk-s0513a1:2154_3: viyassa gehaṃ ahosi. Mātāpitaro panassa yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dāyakā dānapatino.
atk-s0513a1:2154_4: So seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ labhitvāyeva kulavaṃsaṃ nāsetvā dānasālaṃ jhāpetvā yācake pothetvā
atk-s0513a1:2155_0: So ekadivasaṃ rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā attano gharaṃ āgacchanto ekaṃ maggakilantaṃ jānapadamanussaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2155_1: ekaṃ surāvārakaṃ, ādāya pīṭhake nisīditvā ambilasurāya kosakaṃ pūretvā pūretvā pūtimacchakena
atk-s0513a1:2155_2: uttaribhaṅgena pivantaṃ disvā suraṃ pātukāmo hutvā cintesi “sacāhaṃ suraṃ pivissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2155_3: mayi pivante bahū pivitukāmā bhavissanti, evaṃ me dhanaparikkhayo bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2155_4: So taṇhaṃ adhivāsento vicaritvā gacchante gacchante kāle adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto vihatakappāso
atk-s0513a1:2155_5: viya paṇḍusarīro ahosi dhammanisanthatagatto jāto. Athekadivasaṃ gabbhaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:2155_6: mañcakaṃ upagūhitvā nipajji. Tamenaṃ bhariyā upasaṅkamitvā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjitvā “kiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2155_7: te, sāmi, aphāsuka”nti pucchi. Sabbaṃ heṭṭhā kathitaniyāmeneva veditabbaṃ. “Tena
atk-s0513a1:2155_8: hi ekasseva te pahonakaṃ suraṃ karomī”ti pana vutte “gehe surāya kāriyamānāya bahū
atk-s0513a1:2155_9: paccāsīsanti, antarāpaṇato āharāpetvāpi na sakkā idha nisinnena pivitu”nti māsakamattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2155_10: datvā antarāpaṇato surāvārakaṃ āharāpetvā ceṭakena gāhāpetvā nagarā nikkhamma nadītīraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2155_11: gantvā mahāmaggasamīpe ekaṃ gumbaṃ pavisitvā surāvārakaṃ ṭhapāpetvā “gaccha tva”nti
atk-s0513a1:2155_12: ceṭakaṃ dūre nisīdāpetvā kosakaṃ pūretvā suraṃ pātuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2156_0: Pitā panassa dānādīnaṃ puññānaṃ katattā devaloke sakko hutvā nibbatti. So tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2156_1: khaṇe “pavattati nu kho me dānaggaṃ, udāhu no”ti āvajjento tassa appavattiṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0513a1:2156_2: puttassa kulavaṃsaṃ nāsetvā dānasālaṃ jhāpetvā yācake nikkaḍḍhitvā macchariyabhāve
atk-s0513a1:2156_3: patiṭṭhāya “aññesaṃ dātabbaṃ bhavissatī”ti bhayena gumbaṃ pavisitvā ekakasseva suraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2156_4: pivanabhāvañca disvā “gacchāmi, naṃ saṅkhobhetvā dametvā kammaphalasambandhaṃ jānāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2156_5: dānaṃ dāpetvā devaloke nibbattanārahaṃ karomī”ti manussapathaṃ otaritvā illisaseṭṭhinā
atk-s0513a1:2156_6: sadisaṃ khañjaṃ kuṇiṃ visamacakkhumaṇḍalaṃ attabhāvaṃ nimminitvā bārāṇasinagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2156_7: pavisitvā rañño nivesanadvāre ṭhatvā attano āgatabhāvaṃ ārocāpetvā “pavisatū”ti vutte
atk-s0513a1:2156_8: pavisitvā rājānaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Rājā “kiṃ, mahāseṭṭhi, avelāya āgatosī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2156_9: “Āma, āgatomhi, deva ghare me asītikoṭimattaṃ dhanaṃ atthi, taṃ devo āharāpetvā attano
atk-s0513a1:2156_10: bhaṇḍāgāraṃ pūrāpetū”ti. “Alaṃ mahāseṭṭhi, tava dhanato amhākaṃ gehe bahutaraṃ dhana”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2156_11: “Sace, deva, tumhākaṃ kammaṃ natthi, yathāruciyā dhanaṃ gahetvā dānaṃ dammī”ti. “Dehi,
atk-s0513a1:2156_12: mahāseṭṭhī”ti. So “sādhu, devā”ti rājānaṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā illisaseṭṭhino gehaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2156_13: agamāsi, sabbe upaṭṭhākamanussā parivāresuṃ, ekopi “nāyaṃ, illiso”ti jānituṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:2157_0: So gehaṃ pavisitvā antoummāre ṭhatvā dovārikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “yo añño mayā samānarūpo
atk-s0513a1:2157_1: āgantvā ‘mametaṃ geha’nti pavisituṃ āgacchati, taṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā nīhareyyāthā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2157_2: vatvā pāsādaṃ āruyha mahārahe āsane nisīditvā seṭṭhibhariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā sitākāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2157_3: dassetvā “bhadde, dānaṃ demā”ti āha. Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvāva seṭṭhibhariyā ca puttadhītaro
atk-s0513a1:2157_4: ca dāsakammakarā ca “ettakaṃ kālaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ cittameva natthi, ajja pana suraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2157_5: pivitvā muducitto hutvā dātukāmo jāto bhavissatī”ti vadiṃsu. Atha naṃ seṭṭhibhariyā
atk-s0513a1:2157_6: “yathāruciyā detha, sāmī”ti āha. Tena hi bherivādakaṃ pakkosāpetvā “‘suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādīhi
atk-s0513a1:2157_7: atthikā illisaseṭṭhissa gharaṃ gacchantū’nti sakalanagare bheriṃ carāpehī”ti. Sā
atk-s0513a1:2157_8: ca tathā kāresi. Mahājano pacchipasibbakādīni gahetvā gehadvāre sannipati. Sakko
atk-s0513a1:2157_9: sattaratanapūre gabbhe vivarāpetvā “tumhākaṃ dammi, yāvadicchakaṃ gahetvā gacchathā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2157_10: āha. Mahājano dhanaṃ nīharitvā mahātale rāsiṃ katvā ābhatabhājanāni pūretvā gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2158_0: Aññataro janapadamanusso illisaseṭṭhino goṇe tasseva rathe yojetvā sattahi ratanehi
atk-s0513a1:2158_1: pūretvā nagarā nikkhamma mahāmaggaṃ paṭipajjitvā tassa gumbassa avidūrena rathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2158_2: pesento “vassasataṃ jīva, sāmi, illisaseṭṭhi, taṃ nissāya idāni me yāvajīvaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2158_3: akatvā jīvitabbaṃ jātaṃ, taveva ratho, taveva goṇā, taveva gehe satta ratanāni, neva
atk-s0513a1:2158_4: mātarā dinnāni, na pitarā, taṃ nissāya laddhāni, sāmī”ti seṭṭhino guṇakathaṃ kathento
atk-s0513a1:2158_5: gacchati. So taṃ saddaṃ sutvā bhītatasito cintesi “ayaṃ mama nāmaṃ gahetvā idañcidañca
atk-s0513a1:2158_6: vadati, kacci nu kho mama dhanaṃ raññā lokassa dinna”nti gumbā nikkhamitvā goṇe ca
atk-s0513a1:2158_7: rathañca sañjānitvā “are, ceṭaka, mayhaṃ goṇā, mayhaṃ ratho”ti vatvā gantvā goṇe
atk-s0513a1:2158_8: nāsārajjuyaṃ gaṇhi, gahapatiko rathā oruyha “are, duṭṭhaceṭaka, illisamahāseṭṭhi
atk-s0513a1:2158_9: sakalanagarassa dānaṃ deti, tvaṃ kiṃ ahosī”ti pakkhanditvā asaniṃ pātento viya khandhe
atk-s0513a1:2158_10: paharitvā rathaṃ ādāya agamāsi. So puna kampamāno uṭṭhāya paṃsuṃ puñchitvā puñchitvā
atk-s0513a1:2158_11: vegena gantvā rathaṃ gaṇhi, gahapatiko rathā otaritvā kesesu gahetvā oṇāmetvā kapparapahārehi
atk-s0513a1:2158_12: koṭṭetvā gale gahetvā āgatamaggābhimukhaṃ khipitvā pakkāmi. Ettāvatāssa surāmado
atk-s0513a1:2158_13: chijji. So kampamāno vegena nivesanadvāraṃ gantvā dhanaṃ ādāya gacchante mahājane
atk-s0513a1:2158_14: disvā “ambho kiṃ nāmetaṃ, kiṃ rājā mama dhanaṃ vilumpāpetī”ti taṃ taṃ gantvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a1:2158_15: gahitagahitā paharitvā pādamūleyeva pātenti. So vedanāppatto gehaṃ pavisituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2158_16: Dvārapālā “are, duṭṭhagahapati, kahaṃ pavisasī”ti vaṃsapesikāhi pothetvā gīvāyaṃ gahetvā nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2159_0: So “ṭhapetvā idāni rājānaṃ natthi me añño koci paṭisaraṇo”ti rañño santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2159_1: “deva, mama gehaṃ tumhe vilumpāpethā”ti āha. Nāhaṃ seṭṭhi vilumpāpemi, nanu tvameva
atk-s0513a1:2159_2: āgantvā “sace tumhe na gaṇhatha, ahaṃ mama dhanaṃ dānaṃ dassāmī”ti nagare bheriṃ
atk-s0513a1:2159_3: carāpetvā dānaṃ adāsīti. Nāhaṃ, deva, tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchāmi, kiṃ tumhe mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2159_4: macchariyabhāvaṃ na jānātha, ahaṃ tiṇaggena telabindumpi na kassaci demi. Yo dānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2159_5: deti, taṃ pakkosāpetvā vīmaṃsatha, devāti. Rājā sakkaṃ pakkosāpesi, dvinnaṃ janānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2159_6: visesaṃ neva rājā jānāti, na amaccā. Macchariyaseṭṭhi “kiṃ, deva, ayaṃ seṭṭhi, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2159_7: seṭṭhī”ti āha. “Mayaṃ na sañjānāma, atthi te koci sañjānanako”ti? “Bhariyā me, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2159_8: Bhariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā “kataro te sāmiko”ti pucchiṃsu. Sā “aya”nti sakkasseva santike
atk-s0513a1:2159_9: aṭṭhāsi. Puttadhītaro dāsakammakare ca pakkosāpetvā pucchiṃsu, sabbepi sakkasseva santike tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0513a1:2160_0: Puna seṭṭhi cintesi “mayhaṃ sīse piḷakā atthi, kesehi paṭicchannā, taṃ kho pana kappako
atk-s0513a1:2160_1: eva jānāti, taṃ pakkosāpessāmī”ti. So “kappako maṃ, deva, sañjānāti, taṃ pakkosāpethā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2160_2: āha. Tasmiṃ pana kāle bodhisatto tassa kappako ahosi. Rājā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “illisaseṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2160_3: jānāsī”ti pucchi. “Sīsaṃ oloketvā jānissāmi, devā”ti. “Tena hi dvinnampi sīsaṃ olokehī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2160_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko sīse piḷakaṃ māpesi. Bodhisatto dvinnampi sīsaṃ olokento piḷakā
