atk-s0513a1:2160_5: disvā “mahārāja, dvinnampi sīse piḷakā attheva, nāhaṃ etesu ekassāpi illisabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2163: Ubhinnaṃ piḷakā jātā, nāhaṃ passāmi illisa”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2164_0: Tattha ubhoti dvepi janā. Khañjāti kuṇṭhapādā. Kuṇīti kuṇṭhahatthā. Visamacakkhukāti
atk-s0513a1:2164_1: visamakkhimaṇḍalā kekarā. Piḷakāti dvinnampi ekasmiṃyeva sīsapadese ekasaṇṭhānāva
atk-s0513a1:2164_2: piḷakā jātā. Nāhaṃ passāmīti ahaṃ “imesu ayaṃ nāma illiso”ti na passāmi, ekassāpi
atk-s0513a1:2165_0: Bodhisattassa vacanaṃ sutvā seṭṭhi kampamāno dhanasokena satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0513a1:2165_1: tattheva pati. Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko “nāhaṃ, mahārāja, illiso, sakkohamasmī”ti mahatiyā
atk-s0513a1:2165_2: sakkalīlāya ākāse aṭṭhāsi. Illisassa mukhaṃ puñchitvā udakena siñciṃsu, so uṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:2165_3: sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ sakko āha “illisa, idaṃ dhanaṃ mama
atk-s0513a1:2165_4: santakaṃ, na tava. Ahañhi te pitā, tvaṃ mama putto. Ahaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā sakkattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2165_5: patto, tvaṃ pana me vaṃsaṃ upacchinditvā adānasīlo hutvā macchariye patiṭṭhāya dānasālāyo
atk-s0513a1:2165_6: jhāpetvā yācake nikkaḍḍhitvā dhanameva saṇṭhāpesi. Taṃ neva tvaṃ paribhuñjasi, na
atk-s0513a1:2165_7: aññesaṃ desi, rakkhasapariggahitaṃ viya tiṭṭhati. Sace me dānasālā pākatikā katvā
atk-s0513a1:2165_8: dānaṃ dassasi, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce dassasi, sabbaṃ te dhanaṃ antaradhāpetvā iminā
atk-s0513a1:2165_9: indavajirena te sīsaṃ chinditvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessāmī”ti. Illisaseṭṭhi maraṇabhayena
atk-s0513a1:2165_10: santajjito “ito paṭṭhāya dānaṃ dassāmī”ti paṭiññaṃ adāsi. Sakko tassa paṭiññaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:2165_11: ākāse nisinnova dhammaṃ desetvā taṃ sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā sakaṭṭhānameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2165_12: Illisopi dānādīni puññāni katvā saggaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2166_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva moggallāno macchariyaseṭṭhiṃ dameti, pubbepesa iminā
atk-s0513a1:2166_1: damitoyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a1:2166_2: – “tadā illiso macchariyaseṭṭhi ahosi, sakko devarājā mahāmoggallāno, rājā ānando,
atk-s0513a1:2170_0: Yato viluttā ca hatā ca gāvoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ amaccaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2170_1: kathesi. Kosalarañño kira eko amacco rājānaṃ ārādhetvā paccantagāme rājabaliṃ labhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2170_2: corehi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā “ahaṃ manusse ādāya araññaṃ pavisissāmi, tumhe gāmaṃ vilumpitvā
atk-s0513a1:2170_3: upaḍḍhaṃ mayhaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti vatvā pageva manusse sannipātetvā araññaṃ gantvā coresu
atk-s0513a1:2170_4: āgantvā gāviyo ghātetvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā gāmaṃ vilumpitvā gatesu sāyanhasamaye mahājanaparivuto
atk-s0513a1:2170_5: āgacchati. Tassa na cirasseva taṃ kammaṃ pākaṭaṃ jātaṃ. Manussā rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā
atk-s0513a1:2170_6: taṃ pakkosāpetvā dosaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā aññaṃ gāmabhojakaṃ pesetvā
atk-s0513a1:2170_7: jetavanaṃ gantvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi. Bhagavā “na, mahārāja, idāneva esa
atk-s0513a1:2170_8: evaṃsīlo, pubbepi evaṃsīloyevā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2171_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente ekassa amaccassa paccantagāmaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2171_1: Sabbaṃ purimasadisameva. Tadā pana bodhisatto vaṇijjāya paccante vicaranto tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2171_2: gāmake nivāsaṃ kappesi. So tasmiṃ gāmabhojake sāyanhasamaye mahājanaparivārena bheriyā
atk-s0513a1:2171_3: vajjamānāya āgacchante “ayaṃ duṭṭhagāmabhojako corehi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā gāmaṃ vilumpāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2171_4: coresu palāyitvā aṭaviṃ paviṭṭhesu idāni upasantūpasanto viya bheriyā vajjamānāya
atk-s0513a1:2173: “Yato viluttā ca hatā ca gāvo, daḍḍhāni gehāni jano ca nīto;
atk-s0513a1:2174: Athāgamā puttahatāya putto, kharassaraṃ ḍiṇḍimaṃ vādayanto”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2175_0: Tattha yatoti yadā. Viluttā ca hatā cāti vilumpitvā bandhitvā ca nītā, maṃsaṃ khādanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2175_1: ca hatā. Gāvoti gorūpāni. Daḍḍhānīti aggiṃ datvā jhāpitāni. Jano ca nītoti karamaraggāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2175_2: gahetvā nīto. Puttahatāya puttoti hataputtāya putto, nillajjoti attho. Chinnahirottappassa
atk-s0513a1:2175_3: hi mātā nāma natthi, iti so tassā jīvantopi hataputtaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti hataputtāya
atk-s0513a1:2175_4: putto nāma hoti. Kharassaranti thaddhasaddaṃ. Ḍiṇḍimanti paṭahabheriṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2176: Evaṃ bodhisatto imāya gāthāya taṃ paribhāsi. Na cireneva ca tassa taṃ kammaṃ pākaṭaṃ jātaṃ, athassa rājā dosānurūpaṃ niggahaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2177_0: Satthā “na, mahārāja, idānevesa evaṃsīlo, pubbepi evaṃsīloyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2177_1: āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā amacco idāni amaccoyeva,
atk-s0513a1:2181_0: Yaṃ te pavikatthitaṃ pureti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ vikatthitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2181_1: bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. Eko kira bhikkhu “āvuso, amhākaṃ jātisamā jāti, gottasamaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2181_2: gottaṃ nāma natthi, mayaṃ evarūpe nāma mahākhattiyakule jātā, gottena vā dhanena
atk-s0513a1:2181_3: vā kulappadesena vā amhehi sadiso nāma natthi, amhākaṃ suvaṇṇarajatādīnaṃ anto natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2181_4: dāsakammakarāpi no sālimaṃsodanaṃ bhuñjanti, kāsikavatthaṃ nivāsenti, kāsikavilepanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2181_5: vilimpanti. Mayaṃ pabbajitabhāvena etarahi evarūpāni lūkhāni bhojanāni bhuñjāma,
atk-s0513a1:2181_6: lūkhāni cīvarāni dhāremā”ti theranavamajjhimānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antare vikatthento jātiādivasena
atk-s0513a1:2181_7: vambhento khuṃsento vicarati. Athassa eko bhikkhu kulappadesaṃ pariggaṇhitvā taṃ
atk-s0513a1:2181_8: vikatthanabhāvaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā “āvuso, asuko
atk-s0513a1:2181_9: nāma bhikkhu evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā vikatthento vambhento khuṃsento vicaratī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2181_10: etassa aguṇaṃ kathayiṃsu. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0513a1:2181_11: sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, so bhikkhu idāneva vikatthento
atk-s0513a1:2181_12: vambhento khuṃsento vicarati, pubbepi vikatthento vambhento khuṃsento vicarī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2182_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ nigamagāme udiccabrāhmaṇakule
atk-s0513a1:2182_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike tayo vede
atk-s0513a1:2182_2: aṭṭhārasa vijjaṭṭhānāni uggahetvā sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā cūḷadhanuggahapaṇḍito
atk-s0513a1:2182_3: nāma ahosi. So takkasilāto nikkhamitvā sabbasamayasippāni pariyesamāno mahiṃsakaraṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2182_4: agamāsi. Imasmiṃ pana jātake bodhisatto thokaṃ rasso oṇatākāro ahosi. So cintesi
atk-s0513a1:2182_5: “sacāhaṃ kañci rājānaṃ upasaṅkamissāmi, so ‘evaṃ rassasarīro tvaṃ kiṃ amhākaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2182_6: karissasī’ti vakkhati, yaṃnūnāhaṃ ārohapariṇāhasampannaṃ abhirūpaṃ ekaṃ purisaṃ phalakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2182_7: katvā tassa piṭṭhicchāyāya jīvikaṃ kappeyya”nti. So tathārūpaṃ purisaṃ pariyesamāno
atk-s0513a1:2182_8: bhīmasenassa nāmekassa tantavāyassa tantavītaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2182_9: katvā “samma, tvaṃ kinnāmosī”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ bhīmaseno nāmā”ti? “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2182_10: abhirūpo upadhisampanno hutvā imaṃ lāmakakammaṃ karosī”ti? “Jīvituṃ asakkonto”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2182_11: “Samma, mā etaṃ kammaṃ kari, sakalajambudīpe mayā sadiso dhanuggaho nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:2182_12: Sace panāhaṃ kañci rājānaṃ passeyyaṃ, so maṃ ‘evaṃrasso ayaṃ kiṃ amhākaṃ kammaṃ karissatī’ti
atk-s0513a1:2182_13: kopeyya, tvaṃ rājānaṃ disvā ‘ahaṃ dhanuggaho’ti vakkhasi. Rājā te paribbayaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a1:2182_14: vuttiṃ nibaddhaṃ dassati. Ahaṃ te uppannakammaṃ karonto tava piṭṭhicchāyāya jīvissāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2182_15: Evaṃ ubhopi sukhitā bhavissāma. Karohi mama vacana”nti āha. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0513a1:2183_0: Atha naṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gantvā sayaṃ cūḷūpaṭṭhāko hutvā taṃ purato katvā rājadvāre
atk-s0513a1:2183_1: ṭhatvā rañño ārocāpesi. “Āgacchantū”ti vutte ubhopi pavisitvā rājānaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2183_2: “Kiṃkāraṇā āgatatthā”ti ca vutte bhīmaseno āha – “ahaṃ dhanuggaho, mayā sadiso sakalajambudīpe
atk-s0513a1:2183_3: dhanuggaho natthī”ti. “Kiṃ pana labhanto maṃ upaṭṭhahissasī”ti? “Aḍḍhamāse sahassaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2183_4: labhanto upaṭṭhahissāmi, devā”ti. “Ayaṃ te puriso kiṃ hotī”ti? “Cūḷūpaṭṭhāko, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2183_5: “Sādhu upaṭṭhahā”ti. Tato paṭṭhāya bhīmaseno rājānaṃ upaṭṭhahati. Uppannakiccaṃ panassa
atk-s0513a1:2184_0: Tena kho pana samayena kāsiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ araññe bahūnaṃ manussānaṃ sañcaraṇamaggaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2184_1: byaggho chaḍḍāpeti, bahū manusse gahetvā gahetvā khādati. Taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2184_2: Rājā bhīmasenaṃ pakkosāpetvā “sakkhissasi, tāta, naṃ byagghaṃ gaṇhitu”nti āha. “Deva,
atk-s0513a1:2184_3: kiṃ dhanuggaho nāmāhaṃ, yadi byagghaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkomī”ti. Rājā tassa paribbayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2184_4: datvā uyyojesi. So gharaṃ gantvā bodhisattassa kathesi. Bodhisatto “sādhu, samma,
atk-s0513a1:2184_5: gacchā”ti āha. “Tvaṃ pana na gamissasī”ti? “Āma na gamissāmi, upāyaṃ pana te ācikkhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2184_6: “Ācikkha, sammā”ti. Tvaṃ byagghassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sahasā ekakova mā agamāsi, janapadamanusse
atk-s0513a1:2184_7: pana sannipātetvā ekaṃ vā dve vā dhanusahassāni gāhāpetvā tattha gantvā byagghassa
atk-s0513a1:2184_8: uṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā palāyitvā ekaṃ gumbaṃ pavisitvā urena nipajjeyyāsi, jānapadāva
atk-s0513a1:2184_9: byagghaṃ pothetvā gaṇhissanti, tehi byagghe gahite tvaṃ dantehi ekaṃ valliṃ chinditvā
atk-s0513a1:2184_10: koṭiyaṃ gahetvā matabyagghassa santikaṃ gantvā “bho, kenesa, byaggho mārito, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2184_11: imaṃ byagghaṃ goṇaṃ viya valliyā bandhitvā rañño santikaṃ nessāmī’ti valliatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2184_12: gumbaṃ paviṭṭho, mayā valliyā anābhatāya eva kenesa mārito”ti katheyyāsi. Atha te
atk-s0513a1:2184_13: jānapadā bhītatasitā “sāmi, mā rañño ācikkhī”ti bahuṃ dhanaṃ dassanti, byaggho tayā
atk-s0513a1:2184_14: gahito bhavissati, raññopi santikā bahuṃ dhanaṃ labhissasīti. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a1:2184_15: bodhisattena kathitaniyāmeneva byagghaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ khemaṃ katvā mahājanaparivuto
atk-s0513a1:2184_16: bārāṇasiṃ āgantvā rājānaṃ disvā “gahito me, deva, byaggho, araññaṃ khemaṃ kata”nti
atk-s0513a1:2184_17: āha. Rājā tuṭṭho bahuṃ dhanaṃ adāsi. Punekadivasaṃ “ekamaggaṃ mahiṃso chaḍḍāpetī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2184_18: ārocesuṃ, rājā tatheva bhīmasenaṃ pesesi. Sopi bodhisattena dinnanayena byagghaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2184_19: viya tampi gahetvā āgañchi, rājā puna bahuṃ dhanaṃ adāsi, mahantaṃ issariyaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2184_20: So issariyamadamatto bodhisattaṃ avamaññaṃ katvā tassa vacanaṃ na gaṇhāti, “nāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2184_21: taṃ nissāya jīvāmi, kiṃ tvaññeva puriso”tiādīni pharusavacanāni vadati.
atk-s0513a1:2185_0: Atha katipāhaccayena eko sāmantarājā āgantvā bārāṇasiṃ uparundhitvā “rajjaṃ vā detu,
atk-s0513a1:2185_1: yuddhaṃ vā”ti rañño sāsanaṃ pesesi. Rājā “yujjhāhī”ti bhīmasenaṃ pesesi. So sabbasannāhasannaddho
atk-s0513a1:2185_2: rājavesaṃ gahetvā susannaddhassa vāraṇassa piṭṭhe nisīdi. Bodhisattopi tassa maraṇabhayena
atk-s0513a1:2185_3: sabbasannāhasannaddho bhīmasenasseva pacchimāsane nisīdi. Vāraṇo mahājanaparivuto
atk-s0513a1:2185_4: nagaradvārena nikkhamitvā saṅgāmasīsaṃ pāpuṇi. Bhīmaseno yuddhabherisaddaṃ sutvāva
atk-s0513a1:2185_5: kampituṃ āraddho. Bodhisatto “idānesa hatthipiṭṭhito patitvā marissatī”ti hatthikkhandhato
atk-s0513a1:2185_6: apatanatthaṃ bhīmasenaṃ yottena parikkhipitvā gaṇhi, bhīmaseno sampahāraṭṭhānaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:2185_7: maraṇabhayatajjito sarīravaḷañjena hatthipiṭṭhiṃ dūsesi. Bodhisatto “na kho te bhīmasena
atk-s0513a1:2185_8: purimena pacchimaṃ sameti, tvaṃ pubbe saṅgāmayodho viya ahosi, idāni hatthipiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2187: “Yaṃ te pavikatthitaṃ pure, atha te pūtisarā sajanti pacchā;
atk-s0513a1:2188: Ubhayaṃ na sameti bhīmasena, yuddhakathā ca idañca te vihañña”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2189_0: Tattha yaṃ te pavikatthitaṃ pureti yaṃ tayā pubbe “kiṃ tvaṃyeva puriso, nāhaṃ puriso,
atk-s0513a1:2189_1: ahampi saṅgāmayodho”ti vikatthitaṃ vambhanavacanaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ tāva ekaṃ. Atha te
atk-s0513a1:2189_2: pūtisarā sajanti pacchāti atha te ime pūtibhāvena saraṇabhāvena ca “pūtisarā”ti laddhanāmā
atk-s0513a1:2189_3: sarīravaḷañjadhārā sajanti vaḷañjanti paggharanti. Pacchāti tato pure vikatthitato
atk-s0513a1:2189_4: aparabhāge, idāni imasmiṃ saṅgāmasīseti attho. Ubhayaṃ na sameti bhīmasenāti idaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2189_5: bhīmasena ubhayaṃ na sameti. Kataraṃ? Yuddhakathā ca idañca te vihaññanti, yā ca
atk-s0513a1:2189_6: pure kathitā yuddhakathā, yañca te idāni vihaññaṃ kilamatho hatthipiṭṭhidūsanākārappatto vighātoti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2190_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto taṃ garahitvā “mā bhāyi, samma, kasmā mayi ṭhite vihaññasī”ti bhīmasenaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2190_1: hatthipiṭṭhito otāretvā “nhāyitvā gehameva gacchā”ti uyyojetvā “ajja mayā pākaṭena
atk-s0513a1:2190_2: bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti saṅgāmaṃ pavisitvā unnaditvā balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sapattarājānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2190_3: jīvaggāhaṃ gāhāpetvā bārāṇasirañño santikaṃ agamāsi. Rājā tuṭṭho bodhisattassa mahantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2190_4: yasaṃ adāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya “cūḷadhanuggahapaṇḍito”ti sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2190_5: So bhīmasenassa paribbayaṃ datvā sakaṭṭhānameva pesetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2191_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idānevesa bhikkhu vikattheti, pubbepi vikatthiyevā”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a1:2191_1: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā bhīmaseno
atk-s0513a1:2191_2: vikatthitabhikkhu ahosi, cūḷadhanuggahapaṇḍito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2201_0: Apāyimha anaccimhāti idaṃ satthā kosambiṃ upanissāya ghositārāme viharanto sāgatattheraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2201_1: ārabbha kathesi. Bhagavati hi sāvatthiyaṃ vassaṃ vasitvā cārikāgamanena bhaddavatikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2201_2: nāma nigamaṃ sampatte gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvino ca satthāraṃ disvā vanditvā
atk-s0513a1:2201_3: “mā, bhante, bhagavā ambatitthaṃ agamāsi, ambatitthe jaṭilassa assame ambatitthako
atk-s0513a1:2201_4: nāma nāgo āsīviso ghoraviso, so bhagavantaṃ viheṭheyyā”ti vārayiṃsu. Bhagavāpi tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2201_5: kathaṃ asuṇanto viya tesu yāvatatiyaṃ vārayamānesupi agamāsiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:2202_0: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā bhaddavatikāya avidūre aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe viharati. Tena
atk-s0513a1:2202_1: kho pana samayena buddhūpaṭṭhāko sāgato nāma thero pothujjanikāya iddhiyā samannāgato
atk-s0513a1:2202_2: taṃ assamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa nāgarājassa vasanaṭṭhāne tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2202_3: pallaṅkena nisīdi. Nāgo makkhaṃ asahamāno dhūmāyi, theropi dhūmāyi. Nāgo pajjali,
atk-s0513a1:2202_4: theropi pajjali. Nāgassa tejo theraṃ na bādhati, therassa tejo nāgaṃ bādhati. Evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2202_5: so khaṇena taṃ nāgarājānaṃ dametvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2203_0: Satthā bhaddavatikāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā kosambiṃ agamāsi. Sāgatattherena
atk-s0513a1:2203_1: nāgassa damitabhāvo sakalajanapadaṃ patthari. Kosambinagaravāsino satthu paccuggamanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2203_2: katvā satthāraṃ vanditvā sāgatattherassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā
atk-s0513a1:2203_3: evamāhaṃsu “bhante, yaṃ tumhākaṃ dullabhaṃ, taṃ vadeyyātha, tadeva mayaṃ paṭiyādessāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2203_4: Thero tuṇhī ahosi. Chabbaggiyā panāhaṃsu “āvuso, pabbajitānaṃ nāma kāpotikā surā
atk-s0513a1:2203_5: dullabhā ceva manāpā ca. Sace tumhe therassa pasannā, kāpotikaṃ suraṃ paṭiyādethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2203_6: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā satthāraṃ svātanāya nimantetvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā attano
atk-s0513a1:2203_7: attano gehe “therassa dassāmā”ti kāpotikaṃ suraṃ pasannaṃ paṭiyādetvā theraṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0513a1:2203_8: ghare ghare pasannaṃ suraṃ adaṃsu. Thero pivitvā surāmadamatto nagarato nikkhamanto
atk-s0513a1:2204_0: Satthā katabhattakicco nagarā nikkhamanto theraṃ tenākārena nipannaṃ disvā “gaṇhatha,
atk-s0513a1:2204_1: bhikkhave, sāgata”nti gāhāpetvā ārāmaṃ agamāsi. Bhikkhū therassa sīsaṃ tathāgatassa
atk-s0513a1:2204_2: pādamūle katvā taṃ nipajjāpesuṃ, so parivattitvā pāde tathāgatābhimukhe katvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2204_3: Satthā bhikkhū paṭipucchi “kiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, yaṃ pubbe sāgatassa mayi gāravaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2204_4: taṃ idāni atthī”ti? “Natthi, bhante”ti. “Bhikkhave, ambatitthakaṃ nāgarājānaṃ ko
atk-s0513a1:2204_5: damesī”ti. “Sāgato, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ panetarahi, bhikkhave, sāgato udakadeḍḍūbhakampi
atk-s0513a1:2204_6: dametuṃ sakkuṇeyyā”ti. “No hetaṃ, bhante”. “Api nu kho, bhikkhave, evarūpaṃ pātuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2204_7: yuttaṃ, yaṃ pivitvā evaṃvisaññī hotī”ti. “Ayuttaṃ, bhante”ti. Atha kho bhagavā theraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2204_8: garahitvā bhikkhū āmantetvā “surāmerayapāne pācittiya”nti sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2205_0: Dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā bhikkhū surāpānassa avaṇṇaṃ kathayiṃsu “yāva mahādosañcetaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2205_1: āvuso, surāpānaṃ nāma, tāva paññāsampannaṃ nāma iddhimantaṃ sāgataṃ yathā satthu
atk-s0513a1:2205_2: guṇamattampi na jānāti, tathā akāsī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi
atk-s0513a1:2205_3: kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva suraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2205_4: pivitvā pabbajitā visaññino honti, pubbepi ahesuṃyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2206_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe udiccabrāhmaṇakule
atk-s0513a1:2206_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca uppādetvā
atk-s0513a1:2206_2: jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto himavantappadese vasati pañcahi antevāsikasatehi parivuto. Atha
atk-s0513a1:2206_3: naṃ vassānasamaye sampatte antevāsikā āhaṃsu “ācariya, manussapathaṃ gantvā loṇambilaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2206_4: sevitvā āgacchāmā”ti. “Āvuso, ahaṃ idheva vasissāmi, tumhe pana gantvā sarīraṃ santappetvā
atk-s0513a1:2206_5: vassaṃ vītināmetvā āgacchathā”ti. Te “sādhū”ti ācariyaṃ vanditvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2206_6: rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase bahidvāragāmeyeva bhikkhāya caritvā suhitā hutvā punadivase
atk-s0513a1:2206_7: nagaraṃ pavisiṃsu. Manussā sampiyāyamānā bhikkhaṃ adaṃsu. Katipāhaccayena ca raññopi
atk-s0513a1:2206_8: ārocesuṃ “deva, himavantato pañcasatā isayo āgantvā uyyāne vasanti ghoratapā paramadhitindriyā
atk-s0513a1:2206_9: sīlavanto”ti. Rājā tesaṃ guṇe sutvā uyyānaṃ gantvā vanditvā katapaṭisanthāro vassānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2206_10: catumāsaṃ tattheva vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gahetvā nimantesi, te tato paṭṭhāya rājageheyeva
atk-s0513a1:2207_0: Athekadivasaṃ nagare surānakkhattaṃ nāma ahosi. Rājā “pabbajitānaṃ surā dullabhā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2207_1: bahuṃ uttamasuraṃ dāpesi. Tāpasā suraṃ pivitvā uyyānaṃ gantvā surāmadamattā hutvā
atk-s0513a1:2207_2: ekacce uṭṭhāya nacciṃsu, ekacce gāyiṃsu, naccitvā gāyitvā khārikādīni avattharitvā
atk-s0513a1:2207_3: niddāyitvā surāmade chinne pabujjhitvā taṃ attano vippakāraṃ disvā “na amhehi pabbajitasāruppaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2207_4: kata”nti roditvā paridevitvā “mayaṃ ācariyena vinābhūtattā evarūpaṃ pāpakammaṃ karimhā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2207_5: taṅkhaṇaññeva uyyānaṃ pahāya himavantaṃ gantvā paṭisāmitaparikkhārā ācariyaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0513a1:2207_6: nisīditvā “kiṃ nu kho, tātā, manussapathe bhikkhāya akilamamānā sukhaṃ vasittha,
atk-s0513a1:2207_7: samaggavāsañca pana vasitthā”ti pucchitā “ācariya, sukhaṃ vasimha, apica kho pana
atk-s0513a1:2207_8: mayaṃ apātabbayuttakaṃ pivitvā visaññībhūtā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkontā naccimha
atk-s0513a1:2207_9: ceva gāyimha cā”ti etamatthaṃ ārocentā imaṃ gāthaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a1:2211_0: Tattha apāyimhāti suraṃ pivimha. Anaccimhāti taṃ pivitvā hatthapāde lāḷentā naccimha.
atk-s0513a1:2211_1: Agāyimhāti mukhaṃ vivaritvā āyatakena sarena gāyimha. Rudimha cāti puna vippaṭisārino
atk-s0513a1:2211_2: “evarūpaṃ nāma amhehi kata”nti rodimha ca. Visaññīkaraṇiṃ pitvā, diṭṭhā nāhumha vānarāti
atk-s0513a1:2211_3: evarūpaṃ saññāvināsanato visaññīkaraṇiṃ suraṃ pivitvā “etadeva sādhu, yaṃ vānarā
atk-s0513a1:2211_4: nāhumhā”ti. Evaṃ te attano aguṇaṃ kathesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2212: Bodhisatto “garusaṃvāsarahitānaṃ nāma evarūpaṃ hotiyevā”ti te tāpase garahitvā “puna evarūpaṃ mākaritthā”ti tesaṃ ovādaṃ datvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2213_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi. Ito paṭṭhāya hi “anusandhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2213_1: ghaṭetvā”ti idampi na vakkhāma. Tadā isigaṇo buddhaparisā ahosi, gaṇasatthā pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a1:2217_0: Atikkamma ramaṇakanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2217_1: kathesi. Imassa pana jātakassa kassapasammāsambuddhakālikaṃ vatthu, taṃ dasakanipāte
atk-s0513a1:2217_2: mahāmittavindakajātake āvi bhavissati. Tadā pana bodhisatto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2220: Svāsi pāsāṇamāsīno, yasmā jīvaṃ na mokkhasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2221_0: Tattha ramaṇakanti tasmiṃ kāle phalikassa nāmaṃ, phalikapāsādañca atikkantosīti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2221_1: Sadāmattañcāti rajatassa nāmaṃ, rajatapāsādañca atikkantosīti dīpeti. Dūbhakanti
atk-s0513a1:2221_2: maṇino nāmaṃ, maṇipāsādañca atikkantosīti dīpeti. Svāsīti so asi tvaṃ. Pāsāṇamāsīnoti
atk-s0513a1:2221_3: khuracakkaṃ nāma pāsāṇamayaṃ vā hoti rajatamayaṃ vā maṇimayaṃ vā, taṃ pana pāsāṇamayameva.
atk-s0513a1:2221_4: So ca tena āsīno atiniviṭṭho ajjhotthaṭo. Tasmā pāsāṇena āsīnattā “pāsāṇāsīno”ti
atk-s0513a1:2221_5: vattabbe byañjanasandhivasena makāraṃ ādāya “pāsāṇamāsīno”ti vuttaṃ. Pāsāṇaṃ vā āsīno,
atk-s0513a1:2221_6: taṃ khuracakkaṃ āsajja pāpuṇitvā ṭhitoti attho. Yasmā jīvaṃ na mokkhasīti yasmā khuracakkā
atk-s0513a1:2221_7: yāva te pāpaṃ na khīyati, tāva jīvantoyeva na muccissasi, taṃ āsīnosīti.
atk-s0513a1:2222: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā bodhisatto attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃyeva gato. Mittavindakopi khuracakkaṃ ukkhipitvā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavamāno pāpakamme parikkhīṇe yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2223: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mittavindako dubbacabhikkhu ahosi, devarājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2227_0: Mitto have sattapadena hotīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa
atk-s0513a1:2227_1: mittaṃ ārabbha kathesi. So kira anāthapiṇḍikena saddhiṃ sahapaṃsukīḷiko ekācariyasseva
atk-s0513a1:2227_2: santike uggahitasippo nāmena kāḷakaṇṇī nāma. So gacchante kāle duggato hutvā jīvituṃ
atk-s0513a1:2227_3: asakkonto seṭṭhissa santikaṃ agamāsi. So taṃ samassāsetvā paribbayaṃ datvā attano
atk-s0513a1:2227_4: kuṭumbaṃ paṭicchāpesi. So seṭṭhino upakārako hutvā sabbakiccāni karoti. Taṃ seṭṭhissa
atk-s0513a1:2227_5: santikaṃ āgatakāle “tiṭṭha, kāḷakaṇṇi, nisīda, kāḷakaṇṇi, bhuñja kāḷakaṇṇī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0513a1:2227_6: Athekadivasaṃ seṭṭhino mittāmaccā seṭṭhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāhaṃsu “mahāseṭṭhi, mā
atk-s0513a1:2227_7: etaṃ tava santike kari, ‘tiṭṭha, kāḷakaṇṇi, nisīda kāḷakaṇṇi, bhuñja kāḷakaṇṇī’ti
atk-s0513a1:2227_8: hi iminā saddena yakkhopi palāyeyya, na cesa tayā samāno, duggato durūpeto, kiṃ te
atk-s0513a1:2227_9: iminā”ti. Anāthapiṇḍiko “nāmaṃ nāma vohāramattaṃ, na taṃ paṇḍitā pamāṇaṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a1:2227_10: sutamaṅgalikena nāma bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati, na sakkā mayā nāmamattaṃ nissāya sahapaṃsukīḷikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2227_11: sahāyaṃ pariccajitu”nti tesaṃ vacanaṃ anādāya ekadivasaṃ attano bhogagāmaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0513a1:2228_0: Corā “seṭṭhi kira bhogagāmaṃ gato, gehamassa vilumpissāmā”ti nānāvudhahatthā rattibhāge
atk-s0513a1:2228_1: āgantvā gehaṃ parivāresuṃ. Itaropi corānaññeva āgamanaṃ āsaṅkamāno aniddāyantova
atk-s0513a1:2228_2: nisīdi. So corānaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā manusse pabodhetuṃ “tvaṃ saṅkhaṃ dhama, tvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2228_3: mudiṅgaṃ vādehī”ti mahāsamajjaṃ karonto viya sakalanivesanaṃ ekasaddaṃ kāresi. Corā
atk-s0513a1:2228_4: “suññaṃ gehanti dussutaṃ amhehi, attheva idha mahāseṭṭhī”ti pāsāṇamuggarādīni tattheva
atk-s0513a1:2229_0: Punadivase manussā tattha tattha chaḍḍite pāsāṇamuggarādayo disvā saṃvegappattā hutvā
atk-s0513a1:2229_1: “sace ajja evarūpo buddhisampanno gharavicārako nābhavissa, corehi yathāruciyā pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:2229_2: sabbaṃ gehaṃ viluttaṃ assa, imaṃ daḷhamittaṃ nissāya seṭṭhino vuḍḍhi jātā”ti taṃ
atk-s0513a1:2229_3: pasaṃsitvā seṭṭhissa bhogagāmato āgatakāle sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocayiṃsu. Atha ne
atk-s0513a1:2229_4: seṭṭhi avoca “tumhe evarūpaṃ mama geharakkhakaṃ mittaṃ nikkaḍḍhāpetha, sacāyaṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2229_5: vacanena mayā nikkaḍḍhito assa, ajja me kuṭumbaṃ kiñci nābhavissa, nāmaṃ nāma appamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2229_6: hitacittameva pamāṇa”nti tassa uttaritaraṃ paribbayaṃ datvā “atthi dāni me idaṃ kathāpābhata”nti
atk-s0513a1:2229_7: satthu santikaṃ gantvā ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Satthā “na kho,
atk-s0513a1:2229_8: gahapati, idāneva kāḷakaṇṇimitto attano mittassa ghare kuṭumbaṃ rakkhati, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:2229_9: rakkhiyevā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2230_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāyaso seṭṭhi ahosi. Tassa
atk-s0513a1:2230_1: kāḷakaṇṇī nāma mittoti sabbaṃ paccuppannavatthusadisameva. Bodhisatto bhogagāmato
atk-s0513a1:2230_2: āgato taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “sace mayā tumhākaṃ vacanena evarūpo mitto nikkaḍḍhito assa,
atk-s0513a1:2230_3: ajja me kuṭumbaṃ kiñci nābhavissā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2232: “Mitto have sattapadena hoti, sahāyo pana dvādasakena hoti;
atk-s0513a1:2233: Māsaḍḍhamāsena ca ñāti hoti, tatuttariṃ attasamopi hoti;
atk-s0513a1:2234: Sohaṃ kathaṃ attasukhassa hetu, cirasanthutaṃ kāḷakaṇṇiṃ jaheyya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2235_0: Tattha haveti nipātamattaṃ. Mettāyatīti mitto, mettaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpeti, sinehaṃ karotīti
atk-s0513a1:2235_1: attho. So panesa sattapadena hoti, ekato sattapadavītihāragamanamattena hotīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2235_2: Sahāyo pana dvādasakena hotīti sabbakiccāni ekato karaṇavasena sabbiriyāpathesu saha
atk-s0513a1:2235_3: gacchatīti sahāyo. So panesa dvādasakena hoti, dvādasāhaṃ ekato nivāsena hotīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2235_4: Māsaḍḍhamāsena cāti māsena vā aḍḍhamāsena vā. Ñāti hotīti ñātisamo hoti. Tatuttarinti
atk-s0513a1:2235_5: tato uttariṃ ekato vāsena attasamopi hotiyeva. Jaheyyanti “evarūpaṃ sahāyaṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2235_6: jaheyya”nti mittassa guṇaṃ kathesi. Tato paṭṭhāya puna koci tassa antare vattā nāma nāhosīti.
atk-s0513a1:2236: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kāḷakaṇṇī ānando ahosi, bārāṇasiseṭṭhi pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2240_0: Ārogyamicche paramañca lābhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ atthakusalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2240_1: kulaputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Sāvatthiyañhi ekassa mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto jātiyā
atk-s0513a1:2240_2: sattavasso paññavā atthakusalo. So ekadivasaṃ pitaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā atthassa dvārapañhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2240_3: nāma pucchi, so taṃ na jānāti. Athassa etadahosi “ayaṃ pañho atisukhumo, ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:2240_4: sabbaññubuddhaṃ añño upari bhavaggena, heṭṭhā ca avīcinā paricchinne lokasannivāse
atk-s0513a1:2240_5: etaṃ pañhaṃ kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthī”ti. So puttamādāya bahuṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2240_6: gāhāpetvā jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2240_7: etadavoca “ayaṃ, bhante, dārako paññavā atthakusalo maṃ atthassa dvārapañhaṃ nāma
atk-s0513a1:2240_8: pucchi, ahaṃ taṃ pañhaṃ ajānanto tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgato, sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā
atk-s0513a1:2240_9: taṃ pañhaṃ kathetū”ti. Satthā “pubbepāhaṃ, upāsaka, iminā kumārakenetaṃ pañhaṃ puṭṭho,
atk-s0513a1:2240_10: mayā cassa kathito, tadā naṃ esa jānāti, idāni pana bhavasaṅkhepagatattā na sallakkhetī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2241_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2241_1: Athassa putto sattavassiko jātiyā paññavā atthakusalo. So ekadivasaṃ pitaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2241_2: “tāta, atthassa dvāraṃ nāma ki”nti atthassa dvārapañhaṃ pucchi. Athassa pitā taṃ
atk-s0513a1:2244: Dhammānuvattī ca alīnatā ca, atthassa dvārā pamukhā chaḷete”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2245_0: Tattha ārogyamicche paramañca lābhanti ca-kāro nipātamattaṃ. Tāta, paṭhamameva ārogyasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2245_1: paramaṃ lābhaṃ iccheyyāti imamatthaṃ dīpento evamāha. Tattha ārogyaṃ nāma sarīrassa
atk-s0513a1:2245_2: ceva cittassa ca arogabhāvo anāturatā. Sarīre hi rogāture neva aladdhaṃ bhogalābhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2245_3: uppādetuṃ sakkoti, na laddhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ, anāture pana ubhayampetaṃ sakkoti. Citte
atk-s0513a1:2245_4: ca kilesāture neva aladdhaṃ jhānādibhedaṃ lābhaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkoti, na laddhaṃ puna
atk-s0513a1:2245_5: samāpattivasena paribhuñjituṃ. Etasmiṃ anārogye sati aladdhopi lābho na labbhati,
atk-s0513a1:2245_6: laddhopi niratthako hoti, asati panetasmiṃ aladdhopi lābho labbhati, laddhopi sātthako
atk-s0513a1:2245_7: hotīti ārogyaṃ paramo lābho nāma. Taṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ icchitabbaṃ. Idamekaṃ atthassa
atk-s0513a1:2245_8: dvāranti ayamettha attho. Sīlañcāti ācārasīlaṃ. Iminā lokacārittaṃ dasseti. Vuddhānumatanti
atk-s0513a1:2245_9: guṇavuddhānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ anumataṃ. Iminā ñāṇasampannānaṃ garūnaṃ ovādaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:2245_10: Sutañcāti kāraṇanissitaṃ sutaṃ. Iminā imasmiṃ loke atthanissitaṃ bāhusaccaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:2245_11: Dhammānuvattī cāti tividhassa sucaritadhammassa anuvattanaṃ. Iminā duccaritadhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2245_12: vajjetvā sucaritadhammassa anuvattanabhāvaṃ dasseti. Alīnatā cāti cittassa alīnatā
atk-s0513a1:2245_13: anīcatā. Iminā cittassa asaṅkocataṃ paṇītabhāvaṃ uttamabhāvaṃ dasseti. Atthassa dvārā
atk-s0513a1:2245_14: pamukhā chaḷeteti attho nāma vuḍḍhi, tassa vuḍḍhisaṅkhātassa lokiyalokuttarassa atthassa
atk-s0513a1:2245_15: ete pamukhā uttamā cha dvārā upāyā adhigamamukhānīti.
atk-s0513a1:2246: Evaṃ bodhisatto puttassa atthassa dvārapañhaṃ kathesi. So tato paṭṭhāya tesu chasu dhammesu vatti. Bodhisattopi dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2247: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā puttova paccuppannaputto, mahāseṭṭhi pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2251_0: Āyatiṃ dosaṃ nāññāyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2251_1: kathesi. Aññataro kira kulaputto buddhasāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajito ekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2251_2: piṇḍāya caranto ekaṃ alaṅkataitthiṃ disvā ukkaṇṭhi. Atha naṃ ācariyupajjhāyā satthu
atk-s0513a1:2251_3: santikaṃ ānayiṃsu. Satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti
atk-s0513a1:2251_4: vutte “pañca kāmaguṇā nāmete bhikkhu paribhogakāle ramaṇīyā. So pana tesaṃ paribhogo
atk-s0513a1:2251_6: nāma vaṇṇagandharasasampannaṃ, khāditaṃ pana antāni khaṇḍitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2251_7: Pubbe bahū bālajanā tassa dosaṃ adisvā vaṇṇagandharasesu bajjhitvā taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0513a1:2251_8: jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇiṃsū”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2252_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto satthavāho hutvā pañcahi
atk-s0513a1:2252_1: sakaṭasatehi pubbantāparantaṃ gacchanto aṭavimukhaṃ patvā manusse sannipātetvā “imissā
atk-s0513a1:2252_2: aṭaviyā visarukkhā nāma atthi, mā kho maṃ anāpucchā pubbe akhāditapubbāni phalāphalāni
atk-s0513a1:2252_3: khāditthā”ti ovadi. Manussā aṭaviṃ atikkamitvā aṭavimukhe ekaṃ kiṃpakkarukkhaṃ phalabhāraoṇamitasākhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2252_5: Tesu ekacce vaṇṇagandharasesu bajjhitvā ambaphalasaññāya phalāni khādiṃsu, ekacce
atk-s0513a1:2252_6: “satthavāhaṃ pucchitvā khādissāmā”ti gahetvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Bodhisatto taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā
atk-s0513a1:2252_7: ye gahetvā ṭhitā, te phalāni chaḍḍāpetvā, ye khādamānā aṭṭhaṃsu, te vamanaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0513a1:2252_8: tesaṃ bhesajjaṃ adāsi. Tesu ekacce arogā jātā, paṭhamameva khāditvā ṭhitā pana jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2252_9: pattā. Bodhisattopi icchitaṭṭhānaṃ sotthinā gantvā lābhaṃ labhitvā puna sakaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0513a1:2252_10: āgantvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2253: Satthā taṃ vatthuṃ kathetvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2257_0: Tattha āyatiṃ dosaṃ nāññāyāti anāgate dosaṃ na aññāya, ajānitvāti attho. Yo kāme
atk-s0513a1:2257_1: paṭisevatīti yo vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ca paṭisevati. Vipākante hananti nanti te
atk-s0513a1:2257_2: kāmā taṃ purisaṃ attano vipākasaṅkhāte ante nirayādīsu uppannaṃ nānappakārena dukkhena
atk-s0513a1:2257_3: saṃyojayamānā hananti. Kathaṃ? Kiṃpakkamiva bhakkhitanti, yathā paribhogakāle vaṇṇagandharasasampattiyā
atk-s0513a1:2257_4: manāpaṃ kiṃpakkaphalaṃ anāgatadosaṃ adisvā bhakkhitaṃ ante hanati, jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2257_5: pāpeti, evaṃ paribhogakāle manāpāpi kāmā vipākakāle hanantīti desanaṃ yathānusandhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2257_6: pāpetvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:2257_7: Sesaparisāyapi keci sotāpannā, keci sakadāgāmino, keci anāgāmino, keci arahanto ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2258: Satthāpi imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā parisā buddhaparisā ahosi, satthavāho pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2262_0: Sīlaṃ kireva kalyāṇanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ sīlavīmaṃsakaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2262_1: ārabbha kathesi. So kira kosalarājānaṃ nissāya jīvati tisaraṇaṃ gato akhaṇḍapañcasīlo
atk-s0513a1:2262_2: tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū. Rājā “ayaṃ sīlavā”ti tassa atirekasammānaṃ karoti. So cintesi
atk-s0513a1:2262_3: “ayaṃ rājā mayhaṃ aññehi brāhmaṇehi atirekasammānaṃ karoti, ativiya maṃ garuṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:2262_4: passati, kiṃ nu kho esa mama jātigottakulappadesasippasampattiṃ nissāya imaṃ sammānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2262_5: karoti, udāhu sīlasampattiṃ, vīmaṃsissāmi tāvā”ti. So ekadivasaṃ rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2262_6: gharaṃ āgacchanto ekassa heraññikassa phalakato anāpucchitvā ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:2262_7: agamāsi, heraññiko brāhmaṇe garubhāvena kiñci avatvā nisīdi. Punadivase dve kahāpaṇe
atk-s0513a1:2262_8: gaṇhi, heraññiko tatheva adhivāsesi. Tatiyadivase kahāpaṇamuṭṭhiṃ aggahesi, atha
atk-s0513a1:2262_9: naṃ heraññiko “ajja te tatiyo divaso rājakuṭumbaṃ vilumpantassā”ti “rājakuṭumbavilumpakacoro
atk-s0513a1:2262_10: me gahito”ti tikkhattuṃ viravi. Atha naṃ manussā ito cito ca āgantvā “ciraṃdāni tvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2262_11: sīlavā viya vicarī”ti dve tayo pahāre datvā bandhitvā rañño dassesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2263_0: Rājā vippaṭisārī hutvā “kasmā, brāhmaṇa, evarūpaṃ dussīlakammaṃ karosī”ti vatvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0513a1:2263_1: tassa rājāṇaṃ karothā”ti āha. Brāhmaṇo “nāhaṃ, mahārāja, coro”ti āha. Atha “kasmā
atk-s0513a1:2263_2: rājakuṭumbikassa phalakato kahāpaṇe gaṇhī”ti? “Etaṃ mayā tayi mama atisammānaṃ karonte
atk-s0513a1:2263_3: ‘kiṃ nu kho rājā mama jātiādīni nissāya atisammānaṃ karoti, udāhu sīlaṃ nissāyā’ti
atk-s0513a1:2263_4: vīmaṃsanatthāya kataṃ, idāni pana mayā ekaṃsena ñātaṃ. Yathā sīlameva nissāya tayā
atk-s0513a1:2263_5: mama sammāno kato, na jātiādīni. Tathā hi me idāni rājāṇaṃ kāresi, svāhaṃ iminā kāraṇena
atk-s0513a1:2263_6: ‘imasmiṃ loke sīlameva uttamaṃ sīlaṃ pamukha’nti sanniṭṭhānaṃ gato. Imassa panāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2263_7: sīlassa anucchavikaṃ karonto gehe ṭhito kilese paribhuñjanto na sakkhissāmi kātuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2263_8: ajjeva jetavanaṃ gantvā satthu santike pabbajissāmi, pabbajjaṃ me detha, devā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2264_0: Atha naṃ ñātisuhajjabandhavā sannipatitvā nivāretuṃ asakkontā nivattiṃsu. So satthu
atk-s0513a1:2264_1: santikaṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā avissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhāno
atk-s0513a1:2264_2: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “bhante, mayhaṃ pabbajjā
atk-s0513a1:2264_3: matthakaṃ pattā”ti aññaṃ byākāsi. Tassa taṃ aññabyākaraṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2264_4: jātaṃ. Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā bhikkhū “āvuso, asuko nāma rañño
atk-s0513a1:2264_5: upaṭṭhākabrāhmaṇo attano sīlaṃ vīmaṃsitvā rājānaṃ āpucchitvā pabbajitvā arahatte
atk-s0513a1:2264_6: patiṭṭhito”ti tassa guṇaṃ kathayamānā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:2264_7: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāni
atk-s0513a1:2264_8: ayameva brāhmaṇo attano sīlaṃ vīmaṃsitvā pabbajitvā attano patiṭṭhaṃ akāsi, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:2264_9: paṇḍitā attano sīlaṃ vīmaṃsitvā pabbajitvā attano patiṭṭhaṃ kariṃsū”ti vatvā tehi
atk-s0513a1:2265_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa purohito ahosi dānādhimutto
atk-s0513a1:2265_1: sīlajjhāsayo akhaṇḍapañcasīlo. Rājā sesabrāhmaṇehi atirekaṃ tassa sammānaṃ karotīti
atk-s0513a1:2265_2: sabbaṃ purimasadisameva. Bodhisatte pana bandhitvā rañño santikaṃ nīyamāne ahituṇḍikā
atk-s0513a1:2265_3: antaravīthiyaṃ sappaṃ kīḷāpentā naṅguṭṭhe gaṇhanti, gīvāya gaṇhanti, gale veṭhenti.
atk-s0513a1:2265_4: Bodhisatto te disvā “mā, tātā, evaṃ sappaṃ naṅguṭṭhe gaṇhatha, mā gīvāya gaṇhatha,
atk-s0513a1:2265_5: mā gale veṭhetha. Ayañhi vo ḍaṃsitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpeyyā”ti āha. Ahituṇḍikā “ayaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2265_6: brāhmaṇa, sappo sīlavā ācārasampanno tādiso dussīlo na hoti, tvaṃ pana attano dussīlatāya
atk-s0513a1:2266_0: So cintesi “sappāpi tāva aḍaṃsantā aviheṭhentā ‘sīlavanto’ti nāmaṃ labhanti, kimaṅgaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2266_1: pana manussabhūtā. Sīlameva imasmiṃ loke uttamaṃ, natthi tato uttaritara”nti. Atha
atk-s0513a1:2266_2: naṃ netvā rañño dassesuṃ. Rājā “kiṃ idaṃ, tātā”ti pucchi. “Rājakuṭumbavilumpako coro,
atk-s0513a1:2266_3: devā”ti. “Tena hissa rājāṇaṃ karothā”ti. Brāhmaṇo “nāhaṃ, mahārāja, coro”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2266_4: “Atha kasmā kahāpaṇe aggahesī”ti ca vutte purimanayeneva sabbaṃ ārocento “svāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2266_5: iminā kāraṇena ‘imasmiṃ loke sīlameva uttamaṃ, sīlaṃ pāmokkha’nti sanniṭṭhānaṃ gato”ti
atk-s0513a1:2266_6: vatvā “tiṭṭhatu tāva idaṃ, āsīvisopi tāva aḍaṃsanto aviheṭhento ‘sīlavā’ti vattabbataṃ
atk-s0513a1:2266_7: labhati. Imināpi kāraṇena sīlameva uttamaṃ, sīlaṃ pavara”nti sīlaṃ vaṇṇento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2269: Passa ghoraviso nāgo, sīlavāti na haññatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2270_0: Tattha sīlaṃ kirevāti kāyavācācittehi avītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ ācārasīlameva. Kirāti anussavavasena
atk-s0513a1:2270_1: vadati. Kalyāṇanti sundarataraṃ. Anuttaranti jeṭṭhakaṃ sabbaguṇadāyakaṃ. Passāti
atk-s0513a1:2270_2: attanā diṭṭhakāraṇaṃ abhimukhaṃ karonto katheti. Sīlavāti na haññatīti ghoravisopi
atk-s0513a1:2270_3: samāno aḍaṃsanaaviheṭhanamattakena sīlavāti pasaṃsaṃ labhati, na haññati na vihaññatīti.
atk-s0513a1:2271: Evaṃ bodhisatto imāya gāthāya rañño dhammaṃ desetvā kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2272: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, rājaparisā buddhaparisā, purohito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2276_0: Yassa maṅgalā samūhatāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ekaṃ sāṭakalakkhaṇabrāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2276_1: ārabbha kathesi. Rājagahavāsiko kireko brāhmaṇo kotuhalamaṅgaliko tīsu ratanesu appasanno
atk-s0513a1:2276_2: micchādiṭṭhiko aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo, tassa samugge ṭhapitaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ mūsikā
atk-s0513a1:2276_3: khādiṃsu. Athassa sīsaṃ nhāyitvā “sāṭake āharathā”ti vuttakāle mūsikāya khāditabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2276_4: ārocayiṃsu. So cintesi “sace idaṃ mūsikādaṭṭhaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ imasmiṃ gehe bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2276_5: mahāvināso bhavissati. Idañhi avamaṅgalaṃ kāḷakaṇṇisadisaṃ puttadhītādīnaṃ vā dāsakammakarādīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2276_6: vā na sakkā dātuṃ. Yo hi idaṃ gaṇhissati, sabbassa mahāvināso bhavissati, āmakasusāne
atk-s0513a1:2276_7: taṃ chaḍḍāpessāmi, na kho pana sakkā dāsakammakarādīnaṃ hatthe dātuṃ. Te hi ettha
atk-s0513a1:2276_8: lobhaṃ uppādetvā imaṃ gahetvā vināsaṃ pāpuṇeyyuṃ, puttassa taṃ hatthe dassāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2276_9: So puttaṃ pakkosāpetvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “tvampi naṃ, tāta, hatthena aphusitvā daṇḍakena
atk-s0513a1:2276_10: gahetvā āmakasusāne chaḍḍetvā sīsaṃ nhāyitvā ehī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2277_0: Satthāpi kho taṃ divasaṃ paccūsasamaye bodhaneyyabandhave olokento imesaṃ pitāputtānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2277_1: sotāpattiphalassa upanissayaṃ disvā migavīthiṃ gahetvā migaluddako viya gantvā āmakasusānadvāre
atk-s0513a1:2277_2: nisīdi chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo vissajjento. Māṇavopi pitu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ajagarasappaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2277_3: viya taṃ yugasāṭakaṃ yaṭṭhikoṭiyā gahetvā āmakasusānadvāraṃ pāpuṇi. Atha naṃ satthā
atk-s0513a1:2277_4: “kiṃ karosi māṇavā”ti āha. “Bho gotama, idaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ mūsikādaṭṭhaṃ kāḷakaṇṇisadisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2277_5: halāhalavisūpamaṃ, mama pitā ‘añño etaṃ chaḍḍento lobhaṃ uppādetvā gaṇheyyā’ti bhayena
atk-s0513a1:2277_6: maṃ pahiṇi, ahametaṃ chaḍḍetvā sīsaṃ nhāyissāmīti āgatomhi, bho gotamā”ti. “Tena
atk-s0513a1:2277_7: hi chaḍḍehī”ti. Māṇavo chaḍḍesi, satthā “amhākaṃ dāni vaṭṭatī”ti tassa sammukhāva
atk-s0513a1:2277_8: gaṇhi. “Avamaṅgalaṃ, bho gotama, etaṃ kāḷakaṇṇisadisaṃ, mā gaṇhi mā gaṇhī”ti tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2278_0: Māṇavo vegena gantvā pitu ārocesi “tāta, mayā āmakasusāne chaḍḍitaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ samaṇo
atk-s0513a1:2278_1: gotamo ‘amhākaṃ vaṭṭatī’ti mayā vāriyamānopi gahetvā veḷuvanaṃ gato”ti. Brāhmaṇo
atk-s0513a1:2278_2: cintesi “taṃ sāṭakayugaṃ avamaṅgalaṃ kāḷakaṇṇisadisaṃ, taṃ vaḷañjento samaṇopi gotamo
atk-s0513a1:2278_3: nassissati, vihāropi nassissati, tato amhākaṃ garahā bhavissati, samaṇassa gotamassa
atk-s0513a1:2278_4: aññe bahū sāṭake datvā taṃ chaḍḍāpessāmī”ti. So bahū sāṭake gāhāpetvā puttena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2278_5: veḷuvanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ disvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito evamāha “saccaṃ kira vo, bho gotama,
atk-s0513a1:2278_6: āmakasusāne sāṭakayugaṃ gahita”nti? “Saccaṃ, brāhmaṇā”ti. “Bho gotama, taṃ sāṭakayugaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2278_7: avamaṅgalaṃ, tumhe taṃ paribhuñjamānā nassissatha, sakalavihāropi nassissati. Sace
atk-s0513a1:2278_8: vo nivāsanaṃ vā pārupanaṃ vā nappahoti, ime sāṭake gahetvā taṃ chaḍḍāpethā”ti. Atha
atk-s0513a1:2278_9: naṃ satthā “mayaṃ brāhmaṇa pabbajitā nāma, amhākaṃ āmakasusāne antaravīthiyaṃ saṅkāraṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:2278_10: nhānatitthe mahāmaggeti evarūpesu ṭhānesu chaḍḍitā vā patitā vā pilotikā vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:2278_11: tvaṃ pana na idāneva evaṃladdhiko, pubbepi evaṃladdhikoyevā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2279_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahanagare dhammiko magadharājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Tadā bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:2279_1: ekasmiṃ udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā
atk-s0513a1:2279_2: ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā himavante vasamāno ekasmiṃ kāle himavantato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2279_3: rājagahanagare rājuyyānaṃ patvā tattha vasitvā dutiyadivase bhikkhācāratthāya nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2279_4: pāvisi. Rājā taṃ disvā pakkosāpetvā pāsāde nisīdāpetvā bhojetvā uyyāneyeva vasanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2279_5: paṭiññaṃ gaṇhi. Bodhisatto rañño nivesane bhuñjitvā uyyāne vasati. Tasmiṃ kāle rājagahanagare
atk-s0513a1:2279_6: dussalakkhaṇabrāhmaṇo nāma ahosi. Tassa samugge ṭhapitaṃ sāṭakayuganti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2280_0: Māṇave pana susānaṃ gacchante bodhisatto paṭhamataraṃ gantvā susānadvāre nisīditvā
atk-s0513a1:2280_1: tena chaḍḍitaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ gahetvā uyyānaṃ agamāsi. Māṇavo gantvā pitu ārocesi. Pitā
atk-s0513a1:2280_2: “rājakulūpako tāpaso nasseyyā”ti bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā “tāpasa, tayā gahitasāṭake
atk-s0513a1:2280_3: chaḍḍehi, mā nassī”ti āha. Tāpaso “amhākaṃ susāne chaḍḍitapilotikā vaṭṭati, na mayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2280_4: kotuhalamaṅgalikā, kotuhalamaṅgalaṃ nāmetaṃ na buddhapaccekabuddhabodhisattehi vaṇṇitaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2280_5: tasmā paṇḍitena nāma kotuhalamaṅgalikena na bhavitabba”nti brāhmaṇassa dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:2280_6: Brāhmaṇo dhammaṃ sutvā diṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā bodhisattaṃ saraṇaṃ gato. Bodhisattopi aparihīnajjhāno
atk-s0513a1:2281: Satthāpi imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā brāhmaṇassa dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2283: “Yassa maṅgalā samūhatā, uppātā supinā ca lakkhaṇā ca;
atk-s0513a1:2285_0: Tattha yassa maṅgalā samūhatāti yassa arahato khīṇāsavassa diṭṭhamaṅgalaṃ, sutamaṅgalaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2285_1: mutamaṅgalanti ete maṅgalā samucchinnā. Uppātā supinā ca lakkhaṇā cāti “evarūpo candaggāho
atk-s0513a1:2285_2: bhavissati, evarūpo sūriyaggāho bhavissati, evarūpo nakkhattaggāho bhavissati, evarūpo
atk-s0513a1:2285_3: ukkāpāto bhavissati, evarūpo disāḍāho bhavissatī”ti ime pañca mahāuppātā, nānappakārā
atk-s0513a1:2285_4: supinā, subhagalakkhaṇaṃ, dubbhagalakkhaṇaṃ, itthilakkhaṇaṃ, purisalakkhaṇaṃ, dāsilakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2285_5: dāsalakkhaṇaṃ, asilakkhaṇaṃ, hatthilakkhaṇaṃ, assalakkhaṇaṃ, usabhalakkhaṇaṃ, āvudhalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2285_6: vatthalakkhaṇanti evamādikāni lakkhaṇāni ime ca diṭṭhiṭṭhānā yassa samūhatā, na etehi
atk-s0513a1:2285_7: uppātādīhi attano maṅgalaṃ vā avamaṅgalaṃ vā pacceti. So maṅgaladosavītivattoti so
atk-s0513a1:2285_8: khīṇāsavo sabbamaṅgaladose vītivatto atikkanto pajahitvā ṭhito. Yugayogādhigatoti
atk-s0513a1:2285_9: “kodho ca upanāho ca, makkho ca paḷāso cā”tiādinā nayena dve dve ekato āgatakilesā
atk-s0513a1:2285_10: yugā nāma. Kāmayogo, bhavayogo, diṭṭhiyogo, avijjāyogoti ime saṃsāre yojanabhāvato
atk-s0513a1:2285_11: cattāro yogā nāma. Te yuge ca yoge cāti yugayoge adhigato abhibhavitvā gato vītivatto
atk-s0513a1:2285_12: samatikkanto khīṇāsavo bhikkhu. Na jātumetīti puna paṭisandhivasena ekaṃseneva imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2286_0: Evaṃ satthā imāya gāthāya brāhmaṇassa dhammaṃ desetvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a1:2286_1: brāhmaṇo saddhiṃ puttena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Satthā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2286_2: “tadā eteva pitāputtā idāni pitāputtā ahesuṃ, tāpaso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2290_0: Kalyāṇimeva muñceyyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto omasavādasikkhāpadaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2290_1: kathesi. Dvepi vatthūni heṭṭhā nandivisālajātake vuttasadisāneva. Imasmiṃ pana jātake
atk-s0513a1:2290_2: bodhisatto gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilāyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa sārambho nāma balibaddo
atk-s0513a1:2290_3: ahosi. Satthā idaṃ atītavatthuṃ kathetvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2293: Mokkho kalyāṇiyā sādhu, mutvā tappati pāpika”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2294_0: Tattha kalyāṇimeva muñceyyāti catudosavinimuttaṃ kalyāṇiṃ sundaraṃ anavajjaṃ vācameva
atk-s0513a1:2294_1: muñceyya vissajjeyya katheyya. Na hi muñceyya pāpikanti pāpikaṃ lāmikaṃ paresaṃ appiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2294_2: amanāpaṃ na muñceyya na katheyya. Mokkho kalyāṇiyā sādhūti kalyāṇavācāya vissajjanameva
atk-s0513a1:2294_3: imasmiṃ loke sādhu sundaraṃ bhaddakaṃ. Mutvā tappati pāpikanti pāpikaṃ pharusavācaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2294_4: muñcitvā vissajjetvā kathetvā so puggalo tappati socati kilamatīti.
atk-s0513a1:2295: Evaṃ satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā brāhmaṇo ānando ahosi, brāhmaṇī uppalavaṇṇā, sārambho pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2299: Vācāva kira te āsīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kuhakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. Kuhakavatthu uddālakajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2300_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente ekaṃ gāmakaṃ upanissāya eko kūṭajaṭilo
atk-s0513a1:2300_1: kuhakatāpaso vasati. Eko kuṭumbiko tassa araññe paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā tattha naṃ vāsento
atk-s0513a1:2300_2: attano gehe paṇītāhārena paṭijaggati. So taṃ kūṭajaṭilaṃ “sīlavā eso”ti saddahitvā
atk-s0513a1:2300_3: corabhayena suvaṇṇanikkhasataṃ tassa paṇṇasālaṃ netvā bhūmigataṃ katvā “idaṃ olokeyyāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2300_4: bhante”ti āha. Atha naṃ tāpaso “pabbajitānaṃ nāma, āvuso, evarūpaṃ kathetuṃ, na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:2300_5: amhākaṃ pana parasantake lobho nāma natthī”ti āha. So “sādhu, bhante”ti tassa vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2300_6: saddahitvā pakkāmi. Duṭṭhatāpaso “sakkā ettakena jīvitu”nti katipāhaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2300_7: taṃ suvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā antarāmagge ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā āgantvā paṇṇasālāyameva vasitvā
atk-s0513a1:2300_8: punadivase tassa gehe bhattakiccaṃ katvā evamāha “āvuso, mayaṃ tumhe nissāya ciraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2300_9: vasimha, aticiraṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ manussehi saddhiṃ saṃsaggo hoti, saṃsaggo
atk-s0513a1:2300_10: ca nāma pabbajitānaṃ malaṃ, tasmā gacchāmaha”nti vatvā tena punappunaṃ yāciyamānopi
atk-s0513a1:2300_11: nivattituṃ na icchi. Atha naṃ so “evaṃ sante gacchatha, bhante”ti yāva gāmadvāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2300_12: anugantvā nivatti. Tāpasopi thokaṃ gantvāva “imaṃ kuṭumbikaṃ mayā vañcetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2300_13: cintetvā jaṭānaṃ antare tiṇaṃ ṭhapetvā paṭinivatti. Kuṭumbiko “kiṃ, bhante, nivattitthā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2300_14: pucchi. Āvuso tumhākaṃ gehacchadanato me jaṭāsu ekatiṇaṃ laggaṃ, adinnādānañca nāma
atk-s0513a1:2300_15: pabbajitānaṃ na vaṭṭati, taṃ ādāya āgatomhīti. Kuṭumbiko “chaḍḍetvā gacchatha, bhante”ti
atk-s0513a1:2300_16: vatvā “tiṇasalākampi nāma parasantakaṃ na gaṇhāti, aho kukkuccako me ayyo”ti pasīditvā vanditvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a1:2301_0: Tadā pana bodhisattena bhaṇḍatthāya paccantaṃ gacchantena tasmiṃ nivesane nivāso
atk-s0513a1:2301_1: gahito hoti. So tāpasassa vacanaṃ sutvāva “addhā iminā duṭṭhatāpasena imassa kiñci
atk-s0513a1:2301_2: gahitaṃ bhavissatī”ti kuṭumbikaṃ pucchi “atthi pana te, samma, kiñci etassa tāpasassa
atk-s0513a1:2301_3: santike nikkhitta”nti? “Atthi, samma, suvaṇṇanikkhasata”nti. “Tena hi gaccha, taṃ
atk-s0513a1:2301_4: upadhārehī”ti. So paṇṇasālaṃ gantvā taṃ adisvā vegenāgantvā “natthi, sammā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2301_5: “Na te suvaṇṇaṃ aññena gahitaṃ, teneva kuhakatāpasena gahitaṃ, ehi, taṃ anubandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2301_6: gaṇhāmā”ti vegena gantvā kūṭatāpasaṃ gaṇhitvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca pothetvā suvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2301_7: āharāpetvā gaṇhiṃsu. Bodhisatto suvaṇṇaṃ disvā “nikkhasataṃ haramāno asajjitvā tiṇamatte
atk-s0513a1:2301_8: sattosī”ti vatvā taṃ garahanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2304: Tiṇamatte asajjittho, no ca nikkhasataṃ hara”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2305_0: Tattha vācāva kira te āsi, saṇhā sakhilabhāṇinoti “pabbajitānaṃ tiṇamattampi adinnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2305_1: ādātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti evaṃ sakhilaṃ muduvacanaṃ vadantassa vācā eva kira te saṇhā
atk-s0513a1:2305_2: āsi, vacanamattameva maṭṭhaṃ ahosīti attho. Tiṇamatte asajjitthoti kūṭajaṭila ekissā
atk-s0513a1:2305_3: tiṇasalākāya kukkuccaṃ kurumāno tvaṃ satto āsatto laggo ahosi. No ca nikkhasataṃ
atk-s0513a1:2305_4: haranti imaṃ pana nikkhasataṃ haranto asatto nillaggova jātosīti.
atk-s0513a1:2306: Evaṃ bodhisatto taṃ garahitvā “mā puna, kūṭajaṭila, evarūpamakāsī”ti ovādaṃ datvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2307_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idānevesa bhikkhu kuhako, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:2307_1: kuhakoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kūṭatāpaso kuhakabhikkhu ahosi, paṇḍitapuriso
atk-s0513a1:2311_0: Yo pubbe katakalyāṇoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2311_1: Tassa kireko paccantavāsiko seṭṭhi adiṭṭhasahāyo ahosi. So ekadā paccante uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍassa
atk-s0513a1:2311_2: pañca sakaṭasatāni pūretvā kammantikamanusse āha – “gacchatha, bho, imaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2311_3: sāvatthiṃ netvā amhākaṃ sahāyakassa anāthapiṇḍikamahāseṭṭhissa paccagghena vikkiṇitvā
atk-s0513a1:2311_4: paṭibhaṇḍaṃ āharathā”ti. Te “sādhū”ti tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sāvatthiṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2311_5: mahāseṭṭhiṃ disvā paṇṇākāraṃ datvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Mahāseṭṭhi “svāgataṃ vo”ti
atk-s0513a1:2311_6: tesaṃ āvāsañca paribbayañca dāpetvā sahāyakassa sukhaṃ pucchitvā bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā
atk-s0513a1:2311_7: paṭibhaṇḍaṃ dāpesi. Te paccantaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ attano seṭṭhissa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2312_0: Aparabhāge anāthapiṇḍikopi tatheva pañca sakaṭasatāni tattha pesesi. Manussā tattha
atk-s0513a1:2312_1: gantvā paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya paccantavāsikaseṭṭhiṃ passiṃsu. So “kuto āgacchathā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a1:2312_3: kassaci purisassa nāmaṃ bhavissatī”ti parihāsaṃ katvā paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā “gacchatha
atk-s0513a1:2312_4: tumhe”ti uyyojesi, neva nivāsaṃ, na paribbayaṃ dāpesi. Te sayameva bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā
atk-s0513a1:2312_5: paṭibhaṇḍaṃ ādāya sāvatthiṃ āgantvā seṭṭhissa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2313_0: Atha so paccantavāsī punapi ekavāraṃ tatheva pañca sakaṭasatāni sāvatthiṃ pesesi,
atk-s0513a1:2313_1: manussā paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya mahāseṭṭhiṃ passiṃsu. Te pana disvā anāthapiṇḍikassa manussā
atk-s0513a1:2313_2: “mayaṃ, sāmi, etesaṃ nivāsañca bhattañca paribbayañca jānissāmā”ti vatvā tesaṃ sakaṭāni
atk-s0513a1:2313_3: bahinagare tathārūpe ṭhāne mocāpetvā “tumhe idheva vasatha, amhākaṃ vo ghare yāgubhattañca
atk-s0513a1:2313_4: paribbayo ca bhavissatī”ti gantvā dāsakammakare sannipātetvā majjhimayāmasamanantare
atk-s0513a1:2313_5: pañca sakaṭasatāni vilumpitvā nivāsanapārupanānipi nesaṃ acchinditvā goṇe palāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2313_6: sakaṭāni vicakkāni katvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā cakkānipi gaṇhitvāva agamaṃsu. Paccantavāsino
atk-s0513a1:2313_7: nivāsanamattassapi sāmikā ahutvā bhītā vegena palāyitvā paccantameva gatā. Seṭṭhimanussāpi
atk-s0513a1:2313_8: tamatthaṃ mahāseṭṭhino ārocesuṃ. So “atthi dānidaṃ kathāpābhata”nti satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2313_9: gantvā ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Satthā “na kho, gahapati, so paccantavāsī
atk-s0513a1:2313_10: idāneva evaṃsīlo, pubbepi evaṃsīloyeva ahosī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2314_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bārāṇasiyaṃ mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi
atk-s0513a1:2314_1: ahosi. Tasseko paccantavāsiko seṭṭhi adiṭṭhasahāyo ahosi. Sabbaṃ atītavatthu paccuppannavatthusadisameva
atk-s0513a1:2314_2: bodhisatto pana attano manussehi “ajja amhehi idaṃ nāma kata”nti ārocite “paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2314_3: attano kataṃ upakāraṃ ajānantā pacchā evarūpaṃ labhantiyevā”ti vatvā sampattaparisāya
atk-s0513a1:2318_0: Tatrāyaṃ piṇḍattho – khattiyādīsu yo koci puriso pubbe paṭhamataraṃ aññena katakalyāṇo
atk-s0513a1:2318_1: katūpakāro katattho nipphāditakicco hutvā taṃ parena attani kataṃ kalyāṇañceva atthañca
atk-s0513a1:2318_2: na jānāti, so pacchā attano kicce samuppanne tassa kiccassa kattāraṃ nādhigacchati na labhatīti.
atk-s0513a1:2319: Evaṃ bodhisatto imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2320: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā paccantavāsī idānīpi paccantavāsīyeva, bārāṇasiseṭṭhi pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2330_0: Littaṃ paramena tejasāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto apaccavekkhitaparibhogaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2330_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tasmiṃ kira kāle bhikkhū cīvarādīni labhitvā yebhuyyena apaccavekkhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2330_2: paribhuñjanti. Te cattāro paccaye apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjamānā yebhuyyena nirayatiracchānayonito
atk-s0513a1:2330_3: na muccanti. Satthā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā bhikkhūnaṃ anekapariyāyena dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0513a1:2330_4: apaccavekkhitaparibhoge ādīnavaṃ dassetvā “bhikkhave, bhikkhunā nāma cattāro paccaye
atk-s0513a1:2330_5: labhitvā apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati, tasmā ito paṭṭhāya cattāro paccaye
atk-s0513a1:2330_6: paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjeyyāthā”ti paccavekkhanavidhiṃ dassento “idha pana, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:2330_7: bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevati sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā nayena tantiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2330_8: ṭhapetvā “bhikkhave, cattāro paccaye evaṃ paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, apaccavekkhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2330_9: paribhogo nāma halāhalavisaparibhogasadiso. Porāṇakā hi apaccavekkhitvā dosaṃ ajānitvā
atk-s0513a1:2330_10: visaṃ paribhuñjitvā vipākante mahādukkhaṃ anubhaviṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2331_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto aññatarasmiṃ mahābhogakule
atk-s0513a1:2331_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto akkhadhutto ahosi. Athāparo kūṭakkhadhutto bodhisattena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2331_2: kīḷanto attano jaye vattamāne keḷimaṇḍalaṃ na bhindati, parājayakāle pana akkhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2331_3: mukhe pakkhipitvā “akkho naṭṭho”ti keḷimaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā pakkamati. Bodhisatto tassa
atk-s0513a1:2331_4: taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “hotu, jānissāmettha patirūpakāraṇa”nti akkhe ādāya attano ghare
atk-s0513a1:2331_5: halāhalavisena rañjitvā punappunaṃ sukkhāpetvā te ādāya tassa santikaṃ gantvā “ehi,
atk-s0513a1:2331_6: samma, akkhehi kīḷāmā”ti āha. So “sādhu, sammā”ti keḷimaṇḍalaṃ sajjetvā tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2331_7: kīḷanto attano parājayakāle ekaṃ akkhaṃ mukhe pakkhipi. Atha naṃ bodhisatto tathā
atk-s0513a1:2331_8: karontaṃ disvā “gilāhi tāva, pacchā idaṃ nāmetanti jānissasī”ti codetuṃ imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2333: “Littaṃ paramena tejasā, gilamakkhaṃ puriso na bujjhati;
atk-s0513a1:2334: Gila re gila pāpadhuttaka, pacchā te kaṭukaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2335_0: Tattha littanti makkhitaṃ rañjitaṃ. Paramena tejasāti uttamatejasampannena halāhalavisena.
atk-s0513a1:2335_1: Gilanti gilanto. Akkhanti guḷakaṃ. Na bujjhatīti “ayaṃ me gilato idaṃ nāma karissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2335_2: na jānāti. Gila reti gilāhi are. Gilāti punapi codento vadati. Pacchā te kaṭukaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2335_3: bhavissatīti imasmiṃ te akkhe gilite pacchā etaṃ visaṃ tikhiṇaṃ bhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2336_0: So bodhisattassa kathentasseva visavegena mucchito akkhīni parivattetvā khandhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2336_1: nāmetvā pati. Bodhisatto “idānissa jīvitadānaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti osadhaparibhāvitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2336_2: vamanayogaṃ datvā vametvā sappiphāṇitamadhusakkarādayo khādāpetvā arogaṃ katvā “puna
atk-s0513a1:2336_3: evarūpaṃ mā akāsī”ti ovaditvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2337_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “bhikkhave, apaccavekkhitaparibhogo nāma apaccavekkhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2337_1: katavisaparibhogasadiso hotī”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā paṇḍitadhutto ahameva
atk-s0513a1:2337_2: ahosiṃ, kūṭadhutto panettha na kathīyati, yathā ca ettha, evaṃ sabbattha. Yo pana
atk-s0513a1:2337_3: imasmiṃ kāle na paññāyati, so na kathīyatevā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2341_0: Ukkaṭṭhe sūramicchantīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2341_1: ārabbha kathesi. Ekasmiñhi samaye kosalarañño itthiyo cintayiṃsu “buddhuppādo nāma
atk-s0513a1:2341_2: dullabho, tathā manussapaṭilābho, paripuṇṇāyatanatā ca. Mayañca imaṃ dullabhaṃ khaṇasamavāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2341_3: labhitvāpi attano ruciyā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ buddhapūjaṃ vā kātuṃ dānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2341_4: vā dātuṃ na labhāma, mañjūsāya pakkhittā viya vasāma, rañño kathetvā amhākaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2341_5: desetuṃ anucchavikaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa santike dhammaṃ sossāma, tato
atk-s0513a1:2341_6: yaṃ sakkhissāma, taṃ uggaṇhissāma, dānādīni ca puññāni karissāma. Evaṃ no ayaṃ khaṇapaṭilābho
atk-s0513a1:2341_7: saphalo bhavissatī”ti. Tā sabbāpi rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attanā cintitakāraṇaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2342_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā uyyānakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmo uyyānapālaṃ pakkosāpetvā “uyyānaṃ sodhehī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2342_1: āha. Uyyānapālo uyyānaṃ sodhento satthāraṃ aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:2342_2: rañño santikaṃ gantvā “suddhaṃ, deva, uyyānaṃ, apicettha aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle
atk-s0513a1:2342_3: bhagavā nisinno”ti āha. Rājā “sādhu, samma, satthu santike dhammampi sossāmā”ti alaṅkatarathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2342_4: abhiruhitvā uyyānaṃ gantvā satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2343_0: Tasmiñca samaye chattapāṇi nāmeko anāgāmī upāsako satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇamāno
atk-s0513a1:2343_1: nisinno hoti. Rājā taṃ disvā āsaṅkamāno muhuttaṃ ṭhatvā puna “sacāyaṃ pāpako bhaveyya,
atk-s0513a1:2343_2: na satthu santike nisīditvā dhammaṃ suṇeyya, apāpakena iminā bhavitabba”nti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:2343_3: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Upāsako buddhagāravena rañño paccuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2343_4: vā vandanaṃ vā na akāsi, tenassa rājā anattamano ahosi. Satthā tassa anattamanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2343_5: ñatvā upāsakassa guṇaṃ kathesi “ayaṃ, mahārāja, upāsako bahussuto āgatāgamo kāmesu
atk-s0513a1:2343_6: vītarāgo”ti rājā “na iminā orakena bhavitabbaṃ, yassa satthā guṇaṃ vaṇṇetī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:2343_7: “upāsaka, vadeyyāsi yena te attho”ti āha. Upāsako “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi. Rājā satthu
atk-s0513a1:2343_8: santike dhammaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2344_0: So ekadivasaṃ uparipāsāde mahāvātapānaṃ vivaritvā ṭhito taṃ upāsakaṃ bhuttapātarāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2344_1: chattamādāya jetavanaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā pakkosāpetvā evamāha “tvaṃ kira, upāsaka,
atk-s0513a1:2344_2: bahussuto, amhākañca itthiyo dhammaṃ sotukāmā ceva uggahetukāmā ca, sādhu vatassa
atk-s0513a1:2344_3: sace tāsaṃ dhammaṃ vāceyyāsī”ti. “Deva, gihīnaṃ nāma rājantepure dhammaṃ desetuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2344_4: vā vācetuṃ vā nappatirūpaṃ, ayyānaṃ eva patirūpa”nti. Rājā “saccaṃ esa vadatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2344_5: uyyojetvā itthiyo pakkosāpetvā “bhadde, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ dhammadesanatthāya ca dhammavācanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2344_6: ca satthu santikaṃ gantvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ yācāmi, asītiyā mahāsāvakesu kataraṃ yācāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2344_7: āha. Tā sabbāpi mantetvā dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ ānandattherameva ārocesuṃ. Rājā satthu
atk-s0513a1:2344_8: santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno evamāha “bhante, amhākaṃ gehe itthiyo
atk-s0513a1:2344_9: ānandattherassa santike dhammaṃ sotuñca uggaṇhituñca icchanti, sādhu vata sace thero
atk-s0513a1:2344_10: amhākaṃ gehe dhammaṃ deseyya ceva vāceyya cā”ti. Satthā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a1:2344_11: theraṃ āṇāpesi. Tato paṭṭhāya rañño itthiyo therassa santike dhammaṃ suṇanti ceva uggaṇhanti ca.
atk-s0513a1:2345_0: Athekadivasaṃ rañño cūḷāmaṇi naṭṭho. Rājā tassa naṭṭhabhāvaṃ sutvā amacce āṇāpesi
atk-s0513a1:2345_1: “sabbe antovaḷañjanake manusse gahetvā cūḷāmaṇiṃ āharāpethā”ti. Amaccā mātugāme ādiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2345_2: katvā cūḷāmaṇiṃ paripucchantā adisvā mahājanaṃ kilamenti. Taṃ divasaṃ ānandatthero
atk-s0513a1:2345_3: rājanivesanaṃ paviṭṭho. Yathā tā itthiyo pubbe theraṃ disvāva haṭṭhatuṭṭhā dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2345_4: suṇanti ceva uggaṇhanti ca, tathā akatvā sabbā domanassappattāva ahesuṃ. Tato therena
atk-s0513a1:2345_5: “kasmā tumhe ajja evarūpā jātā”ti pucchitā evamāhaṃsu “bhante, rañño cūḷāmaṇiṃ pariyesāmāti
atk-s0513a1:2345_6: amaccā mātugāme upādāya antovaḷañjanake kilamenti, na jānāma kassa ‘kiṃ bhavissatī’ti,
atk-s0513a1:2345_7: tenamha domanassappattā”ti. Thero “mā cintayitthā”ti tā samassāsetvā rañño santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2345_8: gantvā paññattāsane nisīditvā “maṇi kira te, mahārāja, naṭṭho”ti pucchi. “Āma, bhante”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2345_9: “Asakkhi pana taṃ āharāpetu”nti. “Bhante, sabbaṃ antojanaṃ gahetvā kilamentopi na
atk-s0513a1:2345_10: sakkomi āharāpetu”nti. “Mahārāja, mahājanaṃ akilametvāva āharaṇūpāyo atthī”ti. “Kataro,
atk-s0513a1:2345_12: āsaṅkā atthi, te gahetvā ekekassa ekekaṃ palālapiṇḍaṃ vā mattikāpiṇḍaṃ vā datvā ‘imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2345_13: paccūsakāle āharitvā asukaṭṭhāne nāma pātethā’ti vattabbaṃ. Yena gahito bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2345_14: so tasmiṃ pakkhipitvā āharissati. Sace paṭhamadivaseyeva pātenti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2345_15: No ce pātenti, dutiyadivasepi tatiyadivasepi tatheva kātabbaṃ. Evaṃ mahājano ca na
atk-s0513a1:2345_16: kilamissati, maṇiñca labhissasī”ti evaṃ vatvā thero agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2346_0: Rājā vuttanayeneva tayo divase dāpesi, neva maṇiṃ āhariṃsu. Thero tatiyadivase āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:2346_1: “kiṃ, mahārāja, pātito maṇī”ti pucchi. “Na pātenti, bhante”ti. “Tena hi, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2346_2: mahātalasmiṃyeva paṭicchannaṭṭhāne mahācāṭiṃ ṭhapāpetvā udakassa pūrāpetvā sāṇiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2346_3: parikkhipāpetvā ‘sabbe antovaḷañjanakamanussā ca itthiyo ca uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā ekekova
atk-s0513a1:2346_4: antosāṇiṃ pavisitvā hatthaṃ dhovitvā āgacchantū’ti vadehī”ti thero imaṃ upāyaṃ ācikkhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2346_5: pakkāmi. Rājā tathā kāresi. Maṇicoro cintesi “dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2346_6: ādāya maṇiṃ adassetvā osakkissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ, pātetuṃ dāni vaṭṭatī”ti maṇiṃ paṭicchannaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2346_7: katvā ādāya antosāṇiṃ pavisitvā cāṭiyaṃ pātetvā nikkhami. Sabbesaṃ nikkhantakāle
atk-s0513a1:2346_8: udakaṃ chaḍḍetvā maṇiṃ addasaṃsu. Rājā “theraṃ nissāya mahājanaṃ akilametvāva me
atk-s0513a1:2346_9: maṇi laddho”ti tussi, antovaḷañjanakamanussāpi “theraṃ nissāya mahādukkhato muttamhā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2346_10: tussiṃsu. “Therassānubhāvena rañño cūḷāmaṇi laddho”ti therassānubhāvo sakalanagare
atk-s0513a1:2347_0: Dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā bhikkhū therassa guṇaṃ vaṇṇayiṃsu “āvuso, ānandatthero
atk-s0513a1:2347_1: attano bahussutatāya paṇḍiccena upāyakusalatāya mahājanaṃ akilametvā upāyeneva rañño
atk-s0513a1:2347_2: maṇiṃ dassesī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2347_3: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāni ānandeneva parahatthagataṃ bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2347_4: dassitaṃ, pubbepi paṇḍitā mahājanaṃ akilametvā upāyeneva tiracchānahatthagataṃ bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2348_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patto
atk-s0513a1:2348_1: tasseva amacco ahosi. Athekadivasaṃ rājā mahantena parivārena uyyānaṃ gantvā vanantarāni
atk-s0513a1:2348_2: vicaritvā udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmo maṅgalapokkharaṇiṃ otaritvā itthāgārampi pakkosi.
atk-s0513a1:2348_3: Itthiyo attano attano sīsūpagagīvūpagādīni ābharaṇāni omuñcitvā uttarāsaṅgesu pakkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:2348_4: samuggapiṭṭhesu ṭhapetvā dāsiyo paṭicchāpetvā pokkharaṇiṃ otariṃsu. Athekā uyyānamakkaṭī
atk-s0513a1:2348_5: sākhantare nisinnā deviṃ piḷandhanāni omuñcitvā uttarāsaṅge pakkhipitvā samuggapiṭṭhe
atk-s0513a1:2348_6: ṭhapayamānaṃ disvā tassā muttāhāraṃ piḷandhitukāmā hutvā dāsiyā pamādaṃ olokayamānā
atk-s0513a1:2348_7: nisīdi, dāsīpi taṃ rakkhamānā tahaṃ tahaṃ oloketvā nisinnāyeva niddāyituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2348_8: Makkaṭī tassā pamādabhāvaṃ ñatvā vātavegena otaritvā mahāmuttāhāraṃ gīvāya paṭimuñcitvā
atk-s0513a1:2348_9: vātavegena uppatitvā sākhantare nisīditvā aññāsaṃ makkaṭīnaṃ dassanabhayena ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2348_10: rukkhasusiraṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā upasantūpasantā viya taṃ rakkhamānā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2349_0: Sāpi kho dāsī paṭibujjhitvā muttāhāraṃ apassantī kampamānā aññaṃ upāyaṃ adisvā “puriso
atk-s0513a1:2349_1: deviyā muttāhāraṃ gahetvā palāto”ti mahāviravaṃ viravi. Ārakkhamanussā tato tato
atk-s0513a1:2349_2: sannipatitvā tassā vacanaṃ sutvā rañño ārocayiṃsu. Rājā “coraṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha. Purisā
atk-s0513a1:2349_3: uyyānā nikkhamitvā “coraṃ gaṇhatha, coraṃ gaṇhathā”ti ito cito ca olokenti. Atheko
atk-s0513a1:2349_4: jānapado balikārakapuriso taṃ saddaṃ sutvā kampamāno palāyi. Taṃ disvā rājapurisā
atk-s0513a1:2349_5: “ayaṃ coro bhavissatī”ti anubandhitvā taṃ gahetvā pothetvā “are, duṭṭhacora, evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2349_6: mahāsāraṃ nāma piḷandhanaṃ avaharissasī”ti paribhāsiṃsu. So cintesi “sacāhaṃ ‘na
atk-s0513a1:2349_7: gaṇhāmī’ti vakkhāmi, ajja me jīvitaṃ natthi, pothentāyeva maṃ māressanti, sampaṭicchāmi
atk-s0513a1:2349_8: na”nti. So “āma, sāmi, gahitaṃ me”ti āha. Atha naṃ bandhitvā rañño santikaṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2349_9: Rājāpi naṃ pucchi “gahitaṃ te mahāsārapiḷandhana”nti? “Āma, devā”ti. “Idāni taṃ kaha”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2349_10: “Deva, mayā mahāsāraṃ nāma mañcapīṭhampi na diṭṭhapubbaṃ, seṭṭhi pana maṃ mahāsārapiḷandhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2349_11: gaṇhāpesi, sohaṃ taṃ gahetvāva tassa adāsiṃ, so naṃ jānātī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2350_0: Rājā seṭṭhiṃ pakkosāpetvā “gahitaṃ te imassa hatthato mahāsārapiḷandhana”nti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2350_1: “Āma, devā”ti. “Kahaṃ ta”nti. “Purohitassa me dinna”nti. Purohitampi pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2350_2: tatheva pucchi, sopi sampaṭicchitvā “gandhabbassa me dinna”nti āha. Tampi pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2350_3: “purohitassa hatthato te mahāsārapiḷandhanaṃ gahita”nti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti. “Kahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2350_4: ta”nti. “Kilesavasena me vaṇṇadāsiyā dinna”nti. Tampi pakkosāpetvā pucchi, sā “na
atk-s0513a1:2350_5: gaṇhāmī”ti āha. Te pañca jane pucchantānaññeva sūriyo atthaṃ gato. Rājā “idāni vikālo
atk-s0513a1:2350_6: jāto, sve jānissāmā”ti te pañca jane amaccānaṃ datvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2351_0: Bodhisatto cintesi – “idaṃ piḷandhanaṃ antovaḷañje naṭṭhaṃ, ayañca gahapatiko bahivaḷañjo,
atk-s0513a1:2351_1: dvārepi balavārakkho, tasmā antovaḷañjanakānampi taṃ gahetvā palāyituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0513a1:2351_2: Evaṃ neva bahivaḷañjanakānaṃ, na anto, uyyāne vaḷañjanakānaṃ gahaṇūpāyo dissati.
atk-s0513a1:2351_3: Iminā duggatamanussena ‘seṭṭhissa me dinna’nti kathentena attano mokkhatthāya kathitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2351_4: bhavissati, seṭṭhināpi ‘purohitassa me dinna’nti kathentena ‘ekato hutvā nittharissāmī’ti
atk-s0513a1:2351_5: cintetvā kathitaṃ bhavissati, purohitenāpi ‘gandhabbassa me dinna’nti kathentena
atk-s0513a1:2351_6: ‘bandhanāgāre gandhabbaṃ nissāya sukhena vasissāmā’ti cintetvā kathitaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2351_7: gandhabbenāpi ‘vaṇṇadāsiyā me dinna’nti kathentena ‘ekantena anukkaṇṭhitā bhavissāmā’ti
atk-s0513a1:2351_8: cintetvā kathitaṃ bhavissati, imehi pañcahipi corehi na bhavitabbaṃ, uyyāne makkaṭā
atk-s0513a1:2351_9: bahū, piḷandhanena ekissā makkaṭiyā hatthe āruḷhena bhavitabba”nti. So rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2351_10: “mahārāja, core amhākaṃ niyyādetha, mayaṃ taṃ kiccaṃ sodhessāmā”ti āha. Rājā “sādhu,
atk-s0513a1:2352_0: Bodhisatto attano dāsapurise pakkosāpetvā te pañca jane ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne vasāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2352_1: samantā ārakkhaṃ katvā kaṇṇaṃ datvā “yaṃ te aññamaññaṃ kathenti, taṃ mayhaṃ ārocethā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2352_2: vatvā pakkāmi. Te tathā akaṃsu. Tato manussānaṃ sannisinnavelāya seṭṭhi taṃ gahapatikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2352_3: āha – “are, duṭṭhagahapati, tayā ahaṃ, mayā vā tvaṃ kahaṃ diṭṭhapubbo, kadā te mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2352_4: piḷandhanaṃ dinna”nti āha. So “sāmi mahāseṭṭhi, ahaṃ mahāsāraṃ nāma rukkhasārapādakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2352_5: mañcapīṭhampi na jānāmi, ‘taṃ nissāya pana mokkhaṃ labhissāmī’ti evaṃ avacaṃ, mā
atk-s0513a1:2352_6: me kujjha, sāmī”ti āha. Purohitopi seṭṭhiṃ āha “mahāseṭṭhi, tvaṃ iminā attano adinnakameva
atk-s0513a1:2352_7: mayhaṃ kathaṃ adāsī”ti? “Mayampi dve issarā, amhākaṃ ekato hutvā ṭhitakāle kammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2352_8: khippaṃ nipphajjissatī”ti kathesinti. Gandhabbopi purohitaṃ āha “brāhmaṇa, kadā tayā
atk-s0513a1:2352_9: mayhaṃ piḷandhanaṃ dinna”nti? “Ahaṃ taṃ nissāya vasanaṭṭhāne sukhaṃ vasissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2352_10: kathesinti. Vaṇṇadāsīpi gandhabbaṃ āha “are duṭṭhagandhabba, ahaṃ kadā tava santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2352_11: gatapubbā, tvaṃ vā mama santikaṃ āgatapubbo, kadā te mayhaṃ piḷandhanaṃ dinna”nti?
atk-s0513a1:2352_12: Bhagini kiṃkāraṇā kujjhasi, “amhesu pañcasu ekato vasantesu gharāvāso bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2352_13: anukkaṇṭhamānā sukhaṃ vasissāmā”ti kathesinti. Bodhisatto payojitamanussānaṃ santikā
atk-s0513a1:2352_14: taṃ kathaṃ sutvā tesaṃ tathato acorabhāvaṃ ñatvā “makkaṭiyā gahitapiḷandhanaṃ upāyeneva
atk-s0513a1:2352_15: pātessāmī”ti geṇḍumayāni bahūni piḷandhanāni kāretvā uyyāne makkaṭiyo gāhāpetvā hatthapādagīvāsu
atk-s0513a1:2352_16: geṇḍupiḷandhanāni piḷandhāpetvā vissajjesi. Itarā makkaṭī piḷandhanaṃ rakkhamānā uyyāne eva nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2353_0: Bodhisatto manusse āṇāpesi “gacchatha tumhe, uyyāne sabbā makkaṭiyo upadhāretha,
atk-s0513a1:2353_1: yassā taṃ piḷandhanaṃ passatha, taṃ uttāsetvā piḷandhanaṃ gaṇhathā”ti. Tāpi kho makkaṭiyo
atk-s0513a1:2353_2: “piḷandhanaṃ no laddha”nti tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhā uyyāne vicarantiyo tassā santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2353_3: “passa amhākaṃ piḷandhana”nti āhaṃsu. Sā makkaṭī asahamānā “kiṃ iminā geṇḍupiḷandhanenā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2353_4: muttāhāraṃ piḷandhitvā nikkhami. Atha naṃ te purisā disvā piḷandhanaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2353_5: āharitvā bodhisattassa adaṃsu. So taṃ ādāya rañño dassetvā “idaṃ te deva piḷandhanaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2353_6: te pañcapi acorā, idaṃ pana uyyāne makkaṭiyā ābhata”nti āha. “Kathaṃ pana te, paṇḍita,
atk-s0513a1:2353_7: makkaṭiyā hatthaṃ āruḷhabhāvo ñāto, kathaṃ te gahita”nti? So sabbaṃ ācikkhi. Rājā
atk-s0513a1:2353_8: tuṭṭhamānaso “saṅgāmasīsādīsu nāma sūrādayo icchitabbā hontī”ti bodhisattassa thutiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2356: Piyañca annapānamhi, atthe jāte ca paṇḍita”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2357_0: Tattha ukkaṭṭheti upakaṭṭhe, ubhatobyūḷhe saṅgāme sampahāre vattamāneti attho. Sūramicchantīti
atk-s0513a1:2357_1: asaniyāpi matthake patamānāya apalāyinaṃ sūraṃ icchanti, tasmiṃ khaṇe evarūpo saṅgāmayodho
atk-s0513a1:2357_2: patthetabbo hoti. Mantīsu akutūhalanti kattabbākattabbakiccaṃ sammantanakāle uppanne
atk-s0513a1:2357_3: mantīsu yo akutūhalo avikiṇṇavāco mantaṃ na bhindati, taṃ icchanti, tādiso tesu ṭhānesu
atk-s0513a1:2357_4: patthetabbo hoti. Piyañca annapānamhīti madhure annapāne paccupaṭṭhite sahaparibhuñjanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2357_5: piyapuggalaṃ patthenti, tādiso tasmiṃ kāle patthetabbo hoti. Atthe jāte ca paṇḍitanti
atk-s0513a1:2357_6: atthagambhīre dhammagambhīre kismiñcideva kāraṇe vā pañhe vā uppanne paṇḍitaṃ vicakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2357_7: icchanti. Tathārūpo hi tasmiṃ samaye patthetabbo hotīti.
atk-s0513a1:2358_0: Evaṃ rājā bodhisattaṃ vaṇṇetvā thometvā ghanavassaṃ vassento mahāmegho viya sattāhi
atk-s0513a1:2358_1: ratanehi pūjetvā tassovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato, bodhisattopi yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2359: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā therassa guṇaṃ kathetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, paṇḍitāmacco pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2363_0: Na vissase avissattheti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vissāsabhojanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2363_1: Tasmiṃ kira samaye yebhuyyena bhikkhū “mātarā no dinnaṃ, pitarā no dinnaṃ, bhātarā,
atk-s0513a1:2363_2: bhaginiyā, cūḷamātarā, cūḷapitarā, mātulena, mātulāniyā dinnaṃ. Amhākaṃ gihikālepi
atk-s0513a1:2363_3: bhikkhukālepi ete dātuṃ yuttarūpāvā”ti ñātīhi dinne cattāro paccaye vissatthā hutvā
atk-s0513a1:2363_4: apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanti. Satthā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “bhikkhūnaṃ mayā dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2363_5: kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti bhikkhū sannipātāpetvā “bhikkhave, bhikkhunā nāma ñātīhipi aññātīhipi
atk-s0513a1:2363_6: dinnake cattāro paccaye paccavekkhitvāva paribhogo kātabbo. Apaccavekkhitvā paribhogaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2363_7: katvā hi kālaṃ kurumāno bhikkhu yakkhapetaattabhāvato na muccati, apaccavekkhitaparibhogo
atk-s0513a1:2363_8: nāmesa visaparibhogasadiso. Visañhi vissāsikena dinnakampi avissāsikena dinnakampi
atk-s0513a1:2363_9: māretiyeva. Pubbepi vissāsena dinnaṃ visaṃ paribhuñjitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2364_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2364_1: Tasseko gopālako kiṭṭhasambādhasamaye gāvo gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha gosālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2364_2: katvā rakkhanto vasati. Seṭṭhino ca kālena kālaṃ gorasaṃ āharati. Athassa gosālāya
atk-s0513a1:2364_3: avidūre sīho nivāsaṃ gaṇhi. Gāvīnaṃ sīhasantāsena milātānaṃ khīraṃ mandaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2364_4: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ sappiṃ ādāya āgataṃ seṭṭhi pucchi “kiṃ nu kho, samma gopālaka,
atk-s0513a1:2364_5: mandaṃ sappī”ti? So taṃ kāraṇaṃ ācikkhi. “Atthi pana, samma, tassa sīhassa katthaci
atk-s0513a1:2364_6: paṭibandho”ti? “Atthissa sāmi, ekāya migamātukāya saddhiṃ saṃsaggo”ti. “Sakkā pana
atk-s0513a1:2364_7: taṃ gāhāpetu”nti? “Sakkā, sāmī”ti. “Tena hi taṃ gahetvā tassā nalāṭato paṭṭhāya sarīre
atk-s0513a1:2364_8: lomāni visena punappunaṃ rajitvā sukkhāpetvā dve tayo divase atikkāmetvā taṃ migamātukaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2364_9: vissajjehi, so tassā sinehena sarīraṃ lehitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇissati. Athassa
atk-s0513a1:2364_10: cammanakhadāṭhā ceva vasañca maṃsañca gahetvā āgaccheyyāsī”ti halāhalavisaṃ datvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a1:2365_0: So gopālako jālaṃ khipitvā upāyena taṃ migamātukaṃ gaṇhitvā tathā akāsi. Sīho taṃ
atk-s0513a1:2365_1: disvāva balavasinehena tassā sarīraṃ lehitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi. Gopālakopi cammādīni
atk-s0513a1:2365_2: gahetvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Bodhisatto taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “paresu sineho
atk-s0513a1:2365_3: nāma na kātabbo, evaṃ balasampannopi sīho migarājā kilesavasena saṃsaggaṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a1:2365_4: migamātukāya sarīraṃ lehanto visaparibhogaṃ katvā jīvitakkhayaṃ patto”ti vatvā sampattaparisāya
atk-s0513a1:2369_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yo pubbe sabhayo attani avissattho ahosi, tasmiṃ avissatthe,
atk-s0513a1:2369_1: yo pubbepi nibbhayo attani vissāsikoyeva, tasmiṃ vissatthepi na vissase, neva vissāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2369_2: kareyya. Kiṃkāraṇā? Vissāsā bhayamanveti, yo hi mittepi amittepi vissāso, tato bhayameva
atk-s0513a1:2369_3: āgacchati. Kathaṃ? Sīhaṃva migamātukā, yathā mittasanthavavasena katavissāsāya migamātukāya
atk-s0513a1:2369_4: santikā sīhassa bhayaṃ anveti, upagataṃ sampattanti attho. Yathā vā vissāsavasena
atk-s0513a1:2370: Evaṃ bodhisatto sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2371: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mahāseṭṭhi ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2375_0: Sotatto sosinno cevāti idaṃ satthā vesāliṃ upanissāya pāṭikārāme viharanto sunakkhattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2375_1: ārabbha kathesi. Ekasmiñhi samaye sunakkhatto satthu upaṭṭhāko hutvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0513a1:2375_2: vicaramāno korakkhattiyassa dhammaṃ rocento dasabalassa pattacīvaraṃ niyyādetvā korakkhattiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2375_3: nissāya vasati. Tassa kālakañjikaasurayoniyaṃ nibbattakāle gihi hutvā “natthi samaṇassa
atk-s0513a1:2375_4: gotamassa uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso, takkapariyāhataṃ samaṇo
atk-s0513a1:2375_5: gotamo dhammaṃ deseti vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ. Yassa ca khvāssa atthāya
atk-s0513a1:2375_6: dhammo desito, na so niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā”ti vesāliyaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2375_7: pākārānaṃ antare vicaranto satthu avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0513a1:2376_0: Athāyasmā sāriputto piṇḍāya caranto tassevaṃ avaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa sutvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto
atk-s0513a1:2376_1: tamatthaṃ bhagavato ārocesi. Bhagavā “kodhano, sāriputta, sunakkhatto moghapuriso,
atk-s0513a1:2376_2: kodhavasenevamāha, kodhavasenāpi pana ‘na so niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā’ti
atk-s0513a1:2376_3: vadanto ajānitvāpi mayhaṃ guṇameva bhāsati. Na kho pana so moghapuriso mayhaṃ guṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2376_4: jānāti. Mayhañhi, sāriputta, cha abhiññā nāma atthi, ayampi me uttarimanussadhammova.
atk-s0513a1:2376_5: Dasabalañāṇāni atthi, catuvesārajjañāṇaṃ atthi, catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2376_6: pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṃ atthi, ayampi me uttarimanussadhammova. Evaṃ uttarimanussadhammasamannāgataṃ
atk-s0513a1:2376_7: pana maṃ yo evaṃ vadeyya ‘natthi samaṇassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammo’ti, so taṃ
atk-s0513a1:2376_8: vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā yathābhataṃ nikkhitto
atk-s0513a1:2376_9: evaṃ niraye”ti evaṃ attano vijjamānaṃ uttarimanussadhammassa guṇaṃ kathetvā “sunakkhatto
atk-s0513a1:2376_10: kira, sāriputta, korakkhattiyassa dukkarakārikāya micchātape pasanno, micchātape
atk-s0513a1:2376_11: pasīdantena pana mayi eva pasīdituṃ vaṭṭati. Ahañhi ito ekanavutikappamatthake ‘atthi
atk-s0513a1:2376_12: nu kho ettha sāro’ti bāhirakaṃ micchātapaṃ vīmaṃsanto caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmacariyavāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2376_13: vasiṃ, tapassī sudaṃ homi paramatapassī, lūkho sudaṃ homi paramalūkho, jegucchī sudaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2376_14: homi paramajegucchī, pavivitto sudaṃ homi paramapavivitto”ti vatvā therena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2377_1: pabbajitvā acelako ahosi rajojalliko, pavivitto ahosi ekavihārī. Manusse disvā migo
atk-s0513a1:2377_2: viya palāyi, mahāvikatibhojano ahosi, vacchakagomayādīni paribhuñji, appamādavihāratthāya
atk-s0513a1:2377_3: araññe ekasmiṃ bhiṃsanake vanasaṇḍe vihāsi. Tasmimpi viharanto himapātasamaye antaraṭṭhake
atk-s0513a1:2377_4: rattiṃ vanasaṇḍā nikkhamitvā abbhokāse viharitvā sūriye uggate vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0513a1:2377_5: So yathā rattiṃ abbhokāse himodakena tinto, tatheva divā vanasaṇḍato paggharantehi
atk-s0513a1:2377_6: udakabindūhi temayi. Evaṃ ahorattaṃ sītadukkhaṃ anubhoti. Gimhānaṃ pana pacchime
atk-s0513a1:2377_7: māse divā abbhokāse viharitvā rattiṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati. So yathā divā abbhokāse
atk-s0513a1:2377_8: ātapena pariḷāhappatto, tatheva rattiṃ nivāte vanasaṇḍe pariḷāhaṃ pāpuṇāti, sarīrā
atk-s0513a1:2377_9: sedadhārā muccanti. Athassa pubbe assutapubbā ayaṃ gāthā paṭibhāsi –
atk-s0513a1:2381_0: Tattha sotattoti sūriyasantāpena suṭṭhu tatto. Sosinnoti himodakena susinno suṭṭhu
atk-s0513a1:2381_1: tinto. Eko bhiṃsanake vaneti yattha paviṭṭhānaṃ yebhuyyena lomāni haṃsanti, tathārūpe
atk-s0513a1:2381_2: bhiṃsanakevanasaṇḍe eko adutiyova ahosinti dīpeti. Naggo na caggimāsīnoti naggo ca
atk-s0513a1:2381_3: na ca aggimāsīno. Tathā sītena pīḷiyamānopi neva nivāsanapārupanaṃ vā ādiyiṃ, na
atk-s0513a1:2381_4: ca aggiṃ āgamma nisīdinti dīpeti. Esanāpasutoti abrahmacariyepi tasmiṃ brahmacariyasaññī
atk-s0513a1:2381_5: hutvā “brahmacariyamevetaṃ esanā gavesanā upāyo brahmalokassā”ti evaṃ tāya brahmacariyesanāya
atk-s0513a1:2381_6: pasuto anuyutto ussukkaṃ āpanno ahosinti dasseti. Munīti “muni kho esa monatthāya
