atk-s0513a1:2381_7: paṭipanno”ti evaṃ lokena sambhāvito ahosinti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2382_0: Evaṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritvā bodhisatto maraṇakāle upaṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2382_1: nirayanimittaṃ disvā “idaṃ vatasamādānaṃ niratthaka”nti ñatvā taṅkhaṇaññeva taṃ laddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2383: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “ahaṃ tena samayena so ājīvako ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2387_0: Aniccā vata saṅkhārāti idaṃ satthā parinibbānamañce nipanno ānandattherassa “mā,
atk-s0513a1:2387_1: bhante, bhagavā imasmiṃ khuddakanagarake”tyādivacanaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Tathāgate
atk-s0513a1:2387_2: hi jetavane viharante sāriputtatthero kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ nāḷakagāmake jātovarake parinibbāyi,
atk-s0513a1:2387_3: mahāmoggallāno kattikamāsasseva kāḷapakkhaamāvasiyaṃ. Evaṃ parinibbute aggasāvakayuge
atk-s0513a1:2387_4: “ahampi kusinārāyaṃ parinibbāyissāmī”ti anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno tattha gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2387_5: yamakasālānamantare uttarasīsake mañcake anuṭṭhānaseyyāya nipajji. Atha naṃ āyasmā
atk-s0513a1:2387_6: ānandatthero “mā, bhante, bhagavā imasmiṃ khuddakanagarake visame ujjaṅgalanagarake,
atk-s0513a1:2387_7: sākhānagarake parinibbāyi, aññesaṃ campārājagahādīnaṃ mahānagarānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2387_8: bhagavā parinibbāyatū”ti yāci. Satthā “mā, ānanda, imaṃ ‘khuddakanagarakaṃ, ujjaṅgalanagarakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2387_9: sākhānagaraka’nti vadehi, ahañhi pubbe sudassanacakkavattirājakāle imasmiṃ nagare
atk-s0513a1:2387_10: vasiṃ, tadā idaṃ dvādasayojanikena ratanapākārena parikkhittaṃ mahānagaraṃ ahosī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2387_11: vatvā therena yācito atītaṃ āharanto mahāsudassanasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2388_0: Tadā pana mahāsudassanaṃ sudhammapāsādā otaritvā avidūre sattaratanamaye tālavane
atk-s0513a1:2388_1: paññattasmiṃ kappiyamañcake dakkhiṇena passena anuṭṭhānaseyyāya nipannaṃ disvā “imāni
atk-s0513a1:2388_2: te, deva, caturāsīti nagarasahassāni kusāvatirājadhānippamukhāni, ettha chandaṃ karohī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2388_3: subhaddāya deviyā vutte mahāsudassano “mā devi evaṃ avaca, atha kho ‘ettha chandaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2388_4: vinehi, mā apekkhaṃ akāsī’ti evaṃ maṃ ovadā”ti vatvā “kiṃkāraṇā, devā”ti pucchito
atk-s0513a1:2388_5: “ajjāhaṃ kālakiriyaṃ karissāmī”ti. Atha naṃ devī rodamānā akkhīni puñchitvā kicchena
atk-s0513a1:2388_6: kasirena tathā vatvā rodi paridevi. Sesāpi caturāsītisahassaitthiyo rodiṃsu parideviṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2388_7: Amaccādīsupi ekopi adhivāsetuṃ nāsakkhi, sabbepi rodiṃsu. Bodhisatto “alaṃ, bhaṇe,
atk-s0513a1:2388_8: mā saddamakatthā”ti sabbe nivāretvā deviṃ āmantetvā “mā tvaṃ devi rodi, mā paridevi.
atk-s0513a1:2388_9: Tilaphalamattopi hi saṅkhāro nicco nāma natthi, sabbepi aniccā bhedanadhammā evā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2392_0: Tattha aniccā vata saṅkhārāti bhadde subhaddādevi, yattakā kehici paccayehi samāgantvā
atk-s0513a1:2392_1: katā khandhāyatanādayo saṅkhārā, sabbe te aniccāyeva nāma. Etesu hi rūpaṃ aniccaṃ…pe…
atk-s0513a1:2392_2: viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ. Cakkhu aniccaṃ…pe… dhammā aniccā. Yaṃkiñci saviññāṇakaṃ aviññāṇakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2392_3: ratanaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ aniccameva. Iti “aniccā vata saṅkhārā”ti gaṇha. Kasmā? Uppādavayadhamminoti,
atk-s0513a1:2392_4: sabbe hete uppādadhammino ceva vayadhammino ca uppajjanabhijjanasabhāvāyeva, tasmā
atk-s0513a1:2392_5: “aniccā”ti veditabbā. Yasmā ca aniccā, tasmā uppajjitvā nirujjhanti, uppajjitvā ṭhitiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2392_6: patvāpi nirujjhantiyeva. Sabbeva hete nibbattamānā uppajjanti nāma, bhijjamānā nirujjhanti
atk-s0513a1:2392_7: nāma. Tesaṃ uppāde satiyeva ca ṭhiti nāma hoti, ṭhitiyā satiyeva bhaṅgo nāma hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2392_8: na hi anuppannassa ṭhiti nāma, nāpi ṭhitaṃ abhijjanakaṃ nāma atthi. Iti sabbepi saṅkhārā
atk-s0513a1:2392_9: tīṇi lakkhaṇāni patvā tattha tattheva nirujjhanti, tasmā sabbepime aniccā khaṇikā
atk-s0513a1:2392_10: ittarā adhuvā pabhaṅguno calitā samīritā anaddhaniyā payātā tāvakālikā nissārā, tāvakālikaṭṭhena
atk-s0513a1:2392_11: māyāmarīcipheṇasadisā. Tesu bhadde subhaddādevi, kasmā sukhasaññaṃ uppādesi, evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2392_12: pana gaṇha tesaṃ vūpasamo sukhoti, sabbavaṭṭavūpasamanato tesaṃ vūpasamo nāma nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2392_13: tadevekaṃ ekantato sukhaṃ, tato aññaṃ sukhaṃ nāma natthīti.
atk-s0513a1:2393: Evaṃ mahāsudassano amatamahānibbānena desanāya kūṭaṃ gahetvā avasesassapi mahājanassa “dānaṃ detha, sīlaṃ rakkhatha, uposathakammaṃ karothā”ti ovādaṃ datvā devalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2394_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā subhaddā devī rāhulamātā
atk-s0513a1:2394_1: ahosi, pariṇāyakaratanaṃ rāhulo, sesaparisā buddhaparisā, mahāsudassano pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2398: Samatittikaṃ anavasesakanti idaṃ satthā sumbharaṭṭhe sedakaṃ nāma nigamaṃ upanissāya aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe viharanto janapadakalyāṇisuttaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Tatra hi bhagavā –
atk-s0513a1:2399_1: sannipateyya, sā kho panassa janapadakalyāṇī paramapāsāvinī nacce, paramapāsāvinī
atk-s0513a1:2399_2: gīte. ‘Janapadakalyāṇī naccati gāyatī’ti kho, bhikkhave, bhiyyosomattāya mahājanakāyo
atk-s0513a1:2399_3: sannipateyya. Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukhakāmo dukkhapaṭikūlo.
atk-s0513a1:2399_4: Tamenaṃ evaṃ vadeyya “ayaṃ te, ambho purisa, samatittiko telapatto antarena ca mahājanakāyassa
atk-s0513a1:2399_5: antarena ca janapadakalyāṇiyā pariharitabbo, puriso ca taṃ ukkhittāsiko piṭṭhito
atk-s0513a1:2399_6: piṭṭhito anubandhissati ‘yattheva naṃ thokampi chaḍḍessasi, tattheva te sīsaṃ pātessāmī”’ti.
atk-s0513a1:2399_7: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso amuṃ telapattaṃ amanasikaritvā bahiddhā
atk-s0513a1:2399_8: pamādaṃ āhareyyā”ti? “No hetaṃ, bhante”. Upamā kho myāyaṃ, bhikkhave, katā atthassa
atk-s0513a1:2399_9: viññāpanāya. Ayamevettha attho – ‘samatittiko telapatto’ti kho, bhikkhave, kāyagatāyetaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2399_10: satiyā adhivacanaṃ. Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘kāyagatā no sati bhāvitā
atk-s0513a1:2399_11: bhavissati susamāraddhā’ti evañhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba”nti –
atk-s0513a1:2401_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – janapadakalyāṇīti janapadamhi kalyāṇī uttamā chasarīradosarahitā
atk-s0513a1:2401_1: pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā. Sā hi yasmā nātidīghā, nātirassā, nātikisā, nātithūlā, nātikāḷā,
atk-s0513a1:2401_2: nāccodātā, atikkantā mānusakavaṇṇaṃ, apattā dibbavaṇṇaṃ, tasmā chasarīradosarahitā.
atk-s0513a1:2401_3: Chavikalyāṇaṃ, maṃsakalyāṇaṃ, nhārukalyāṇaṃ, aṭṭhikalyāṇaṃ, vayokalyāṇanti imehi
atk-s0513a1:2401_4: pana pañcahi kalyāṇehi samannāgatattā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā nāma. Tassā hi āgantukobhāsakiccaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2401_5: nāma natthi, attano sarīrobhāseneva dvādasahatthe ṭhāne ālokaṃ karoti, piyaṅgusāmā
atk-s0513a1:2401_6: vā hoti suvaṇṇasāmā vā. Ayamassā chavikalyāṇatā. Cattāro panassā hatthapādā mukhapariyosānañca
atk-s0513a1:2401_7: lākhārasaparikammakataṃ viya rattapavāḷarattakambalasadisaṃ hoti. Ayamassā maṃsakalyāṇatā.
atk-s0513a1:2401_8: Vīsati nakhapattāni maṃsato amuttaṭṭhāne lākhārasapūritāni viya, muttaṭṭhāne khīradhārāsadisāni.
atk-s0513a1:2401_9: Ayamassā nhārukalyāṇatā. Dvattiṃsa dantā suphusitā sudhotavajirapanti viya khāyanti.
atk-s0513a1:2401_10: Ayamassā aṭṭhikalyāṇatā. Vīsativassasatikāpi pana samānā soḷasavassuddesikā viya
atk-s0513a1:2402_0: Paramapāsāvinīti ettha pana pasavanaṃ pasavo, pavattīti attho. Pasavo eva pāsāvo,
atk-s0513a1:2402_1: paramo pāsāvo paramapāsāvo, so assā atthīti paramapāsāvinī. Nacce ca gīte ca uttamappavatti
atk-s0513a1:2402_2: seṭṭhakiriyā. Uttamameva naccaṃ naccati, gītañca gāyatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:2403_0: Atha puriso āgaccheyyāti na attano ruciyā āgaccheyya, ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – athevaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2403_1: mahājanamajjhe janapadakalyāṇiyā naccamānāya “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāresu aṅguliphoṭanesu
atk-s0513a1:2403_2: celukkhepesu ca pavattamānesu taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā rājā bandhanāgārato ekaṃ corapurisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2403_3: pakkosāpetvā nigaḷāni chinditvā samatittikaṃ suparipuṇṇaṃ telapattaṃ tassa hatthe
atk-s0513a1:2403_4: datvā ubhohi hatthehi daḷhaṃ gāhāpetvā ekaṃ asihatthaṃ purisaṃ āṇāpesi “etaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:2403_5: janapadakalyāṇiyā samajjaṭṭhānaṃ gaccha. Yattheva cesa pamādaṃ āgamma ekampi telabinduṃ
atk-s0513a1:2403_6: chaḍḍeti, tatthevassa sīsaṃ chindā”ti. So puriso asiṃ ukkhipitvā taṃ tajjento tattha
atk-s0513a1:2403_7: nesi. So maraṇabhayatajjito jīvitukāmatāya pamādavasena taṃ amanasikaritvā sakimpi
atk-s0513a1:2403_8: akkhīni ummīletvā taṃ janapadakalyāṇiṃ na olokesi. Evaṃ bhūtapubbamevetaṃ vatthu,
atk-s0513a1:2404_0: Upamā kho myāyanti ettha pana telapattassa tāva kāyagatāsatiyā opammasaṃsandanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2404_1: katameva. Ettha pana rājā viya kammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, asi viya kilesā, ukkhittāsikapuriso
atk-s0513a1:2404_2: viya māro, telapattahattho puriso viya kāyagatāsatibhāvako vipassakayogāvacaro. Iti
atk-s0513a1:2404_3: bhagavā “kāyagatāsatiṃ bhāvetukāmena bhikkhunā telapattahatthena tena purisena viya
atk-s0513a1:2404_4: satiṃ avissajjetvā appamattena kāyagatāsati bhāvetabbā”ti imaṃ suttaṃ āharitvā dassesi.
atk-s0513a1:2405_0: Bhikkhū imaṃ suttañca atthañca sutvā evamāhaṃsu – “dukkaraṃ, bhante, tena purisena
atk-s0513a1:2405_1: kataṃ tathārūpiṃ janapadakalyāṇiṃ anoloketvā telapattaṃ ādāya gacchantenā”ti. Satthā
atk-s0513a1:2405_2: “na, bhikkhave, tena dukkaraṃ kataṃ, sukaramevetaṃ. Kasmā? Ukkhittāsikena purisena
atk-s0513a1:2405_3: santajjetvā nīyamānatāya. Yaṃ pana pubbe paṇḍitā appamādena satiṃ avissajjetvā abhisaṅkhataṃ
atk-s0513a1:2405_4: dibbarūpampi indriyāni bhinditvā anoloketvāva gantvā rajjaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, etaṃ dukkara”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2406_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa rañño puttasatassa
atk-s0513a1:2406_1: sabbakaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti, so anupubbena viññutaṃ pāpuṇi. Tadā ca rañño gehe paccekabuddhā
atk-s0513a1:2406_2: bhuñjanti, bodhisatto tesaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karoti. So ekadivasaṃ cintesi “mama bahū
atk-s0513a1:2406_3: bhātaro, lacchāmi nu kho ahaṃ imasmiṃ nagare kulasantakaṃ rajjaṃ, udāhu no”ti? Athassa
atk-s0513a1:2406_4: etadahosi “paccekabuddhe pucchitvā jānissāmī”ti. So dutiyadivase paccekabuddhesu
atk-s0513a1:2406_5: āgatesu dhamakaraṇaṃ ādāya pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2406_6: antarakhajjakaṃ khāditvā nisinnakāle vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno tamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2406_7: Atha naṃ te avocuṃ – kumāra, na tvaṃ imasmiṃ nagare rajjaṃ labhissasi, ito pana vīsayojanasatamatthake
atk-s0513a1:2406_8: gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilānagaraṃ nāma atthi, tattha gantuṃ sakkonto ito sattame divase
atk-s0513a1:2406_9: rajjaṃ lacchasi. Antarāmagge pana mahāvattaniaṭaviyaṃ paripantho atthi, taṃ aṭaviṃ
atk-s0513a1:2406_10: pariharitvā gacchantassa yojanasatiko maggo hoti, ujukaṃ gacchantassa paññāsa yojanāni
atk-s0513a1:2406_11: honti. So hi amanussakantāro nāma. Tattha yakkhiniyo antarāmagge gāme ca sālāyo ca
atk-s0513a1:2406_12: māpetvā upari suvaṇṇatārakavicittavitānaṃ mahārahaseyyaṃ paññāpetvā nānāvirāgapaṭasāṇiyo
atk-s0513a1:2406_13: parikkhipitvā dibbālaṅkārehi attabhāvaṃ maṇḍetvā sālāsu nisīditvā āgacchante purise
atk-s0513a1:2406_14: madhurāhi vācāhi saṅgaṇhitvā “kilantarūpā viya paññāyatha, idhāgantvā nisīditvā pānīyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2406_15: pivitvā gacchathā”ti pakkositvā āgatāgatānaṃ āsanāni datvā attano rūpalīlāvilāsehi
atk-s0513a1:2406_16: palobhetvā kilesavasike katvā attanā saddhiṃ ajjhācāre kate tattheva ne lohitena
atk-s0513a1:2406_17: paggharantena khāditvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpenti. Rūpagocaraṃ sattaṃ rūpeneva gaṇhanti,
atk-s0513a1:2406_18: saddagocaraṃ madhurena gītavāditasaddena, gandhagocaraṃ dibbagandhehi, rasagocaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2406_20: gaṇhanti. Sace indriyāni bhinditvā tā anoloketvā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā gamissasi,
atk-s0513a1:2407_0: Bodhisatto “hotu, bhante, tumhākaṃ ovādaṃ gahetvā kiṃ tā olokessāmī”ti paccekabuddhehi
atk-s0513a1:2407_1: parittaṃ kārāpetvā parittavālukañceva parittasuttañca ādāya paccekabuddhe ca mātāpitaro
atk-s0513a1:2407_2: ca vanditvā nivesanaṃ gantvā attano purise āha – “ahaṃ takkasilāyaṃ rajjaṃ gahetuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2407_3: gacchāmi, tumhe idheva tiṭṭhathā”ti. Atha naṃ pañca janā āhaṃsu “mayampi anugacchāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2407_4: “Na sakkā tumhehi anugantuṃ, antarāmagge kira yakkhiniyo rūpādigocare manusse evañcevañca
atk-s0513a1:2407_5: rūpādīhi palobhetvā gaṇhanti, mahā paripantho, ahaṃ pana attānaṃ takketvā gacchāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2407_6: “Kiṃ pana, deva, mayaṃ tumhehi saddhiṃ gacchantā attano piyāni rūpādīni olokessāma,
atk-s0513a1:2407_7: mayampi tatheva gamissāmā”ti. Bodhisatto “tena hi appamattā hothā”ti te pañca jane
atk-s0513a1:2408_0: Yakkhiniyo gāmādīni māpetvā nisīdiṃsu. Tesu rūpagocaro puriso tā yakkhiniyo oloketvā
atk-s0513a1:2408_1: rūpārammaṇe paṭibaddhacitto thokaṃ ohīyi. Bodhisatto “kiṃ bho, thokaṃ ohīyasī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2408_2: āha. “Deva, pādā me rujjanti, thokaṃ sālāyaṃ nisīditvā āgacchāmī”ti. “Ambho, etā
atk-s0513a1:2408_3: yakkhiniyo, mā kho patthesī”ti. “Yaṃ hoti, taṃ hotu, na sakkomi, devā”ti. “Tena hi
atk-s0513a1:2408_4: paññāyissasī”ti itare cattāro ādāya agamāsi. Sopi rūpagocarako tāsaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2408_5: Tā attanā saddhiṃ ajjhācāre kate taṃ tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā purato gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2408_6: aññaṃ sālaṃ māpetvā nānātūriyāni gahetvā gāyamānā nisīdiṃsu, tattha saddagocarako
atk-s0513a1:2408_7: ohīyi. Purimanayeneva tampi khāditvā purato gantvā nānappakāre gandhakaraṇḍake pūretvā
atk-s0513a1:2408_8: āpaṇaṃ pasāretvā nisīdiṃsu, tattha gandhagocarako ohīyi. Tampi khāditvā purato gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2408_9: nānaggarasānaṃ dibbabhojanānaṃ bhājanāni pūretvā odanikāpaṇaṃ pasāretvā nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2408_10: tattha rasagocarako ohīyi. Tampi khāditvā purato gantvā dibbasayanāni paññāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2408_11: nisīdiṃsu, tattha phoṭṭhabbagocarako ohīyi. Tampi khādiṃsu, bodhisatto ekakova ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2409_0: Athekā yakkhinī “atikharamanto vatāyaṃ, ahaṃ taṃ khāditvāva nivattissāmī”ti bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:2409_1: pacchato pacchato agamāsi. Aṭaviyā parabhāge vanakammikādayo yakkhiniṃ disvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2409_2: te purato gacchanto puriso kiṃ hotī”ti pucchiṃsu. “Komārasāmiko me, ayyā”ti. “Ambho,
atk-s0513a1:2409_3: ayaṃ evaṃ sukumālā pupphadāmasadisā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā kumārikā attano kulaṃ chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0513a1:2409_4: bhavantaṃ takketvā nikkhantā, kasmā etaṃ akilametvā ādāya na gacchasī”ti? “Nesā,
atk-s0513a1:2409_5: ayyā, mayhaṃ pajāpati, yakkhinī esā, etāya me pañca manussā khāditā”ti. “Ayyā, purisā
atk-s0513a1:2409_6: nāma kuddhakāle attano pajāpatiyo yakkhiniyopi karonti petiniyopī”ti. Sā gacchamānā
atk-s0513a1:2409_7: gabbhinivaṇṇaṃ dassetvā puna sakiṃ vijātavaṇṇaṃ katvā puttaṃ aṅkena ādāya bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2409_8: anubandhi, diṭṭhadiṭṭhā purimanayeneva pucchanti. Bodhisattopi tatheva vatvā gacchanto
atk-s0513a1:2409_9: takkasilaṃ pāpuṇi. Sā puttaṃ antaradhāpetvā ekikāva anubandhi. Bodhisatto nagaradvāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2409_10: gantvā ekissā sālāya nisīdi. Sā bodhisattassa tejena pavisituṃ asakkontī dibbarūpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2410_0: Tasmiṃ samaye takkasilarājā uyyānaṃ gacchanto taṃ disvā paṭibaddhacitto hutvā “gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:2410_1: imissā sassāmikaassāmikabhāvaṃ jānāhī”ti manussaṃ pesesi. So taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “sassāmikāsī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2410_2: pucchi. “Āma, ayya, ayaṃ me sālāya nisinno sāmiko”ti. Bodhisatto “nesā mayhaṃ pajāpati,
atk-s0513a1:2410_3: yakkhinī esā, etāya me pañca manussā khāditā”ti āha. Sāpi “purisā nāma ayyā kuddhakāle
atk-s0513a1:2410_4: yaṃ icchanti, taṃ vadantī”ti āha. So ubhinnampi vacanaṃ rañño ārocesi. Rājā “assāmikabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2410_5: nāma rājasantakaṃ hotī”ti yakkhiniṃ pakkosāpetvā ekahatthipiṭṭhe nisīdāpetvā nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2410_6: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pāsādaṃ abhiruyha taṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:2411_0: So nhātavilitto sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā sirīsayanaṃ abhiruhi. Sāpi yakkhinī attano upakappanakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2411_1: āhāraṃ āharitvā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā sirisayane raññā saddhiṃ nipajjitvā rañño rativasena
atk-s0513a1:2411_2: sukhaṃ samappitassa nipannakāle ekena passena parivattitvā parodi. Atha naṃ rājā
atk-s0513a1:2411_3: “kiṃ, bhadde, rodasī”ti pucchi. “Deva, ahaṃ tumhehi magge disvā ānītā, tumhākañca
atk-s0513a1:2411_4: gehe bahū itthiyo, ahaṃ sapattīnaṃ antare vasamānā kathāya uppannāya ‘ko tuyhaṃ mātaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2411_5: vā pitaraṃ vā gottaṃ vā jātiṃ vā jānāti, tvaṃ antarāmagge disvā ānītā nāmā’ti sīse
atk-s0513a1:2411_6: gahetvā nippīḷiyamānā viya maṅku bhavissāmi. Sace tumhe sakalarajje issariyañca āṇañca
atk-s0513a1:2411_7: mayhaṃ dadeyyātha, koci mayhaṃ cittaṃ kopetvā kathetuṃ na sakkhissatī”ti. “Bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:2411_8: mayhaṃ sakalaraṭṭhavāsino na kiñci honti, nāhaṃ etesaṃ sāmiko. Ye pana rājāṇaṃ kopetvā
atk-s0513a1:2411_9: akattabbaṃ karonti, tesaññevāhaṃ sāmiko. Iminā kāraṇena na sakkā tuyhaṃ sakalaraṭṭhe
atk-s0513a1:2411_10: vā nagare vā issariyañca āṇañca dātu”nti. “Tena hi, deva, sace raṭṭhe vā nagare vā
atk-s0513a1:2411_11: āṇaṃ dātuṃ na sakkotha, antonivesane antovaḷañjanakānaṃ upari mama vasaṃ vattanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2411_12: āṇaṃ dethā”ti. Rājā dibbaphoṭṭhabbena baddho tassā vacanaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkonto
atk-s0513a1:2411_13: “sādhu, bhadde, antovaḷañjanakesu tuyhaṃ āṇaṃ dammi, tvaṃ ete attano vase vattāpehī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2411_14: āha. Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā rañño niddaṃ okkantakāle yakkhanagaraṃ gantvā yakkhe
atk-s0513a1:2411_15: pakkositvā attanā rājānaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā aṭṭhimattaṃ sesetvā sabbaṃ nhārucammamaṃsalohitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2411_16: khādi, avasesā yakkhā mahādvārato paṭṭhāya antonivesane kukkuṭakukkure ādiṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:2412_0: Punadivase dvāraṃ yathāpihitameva disvā manussā pharasūhi kavāṭāni koṭṭetvā anto
atk-s0513a1:2412_1: pavisitvā sabbaṃ nivesanaṃ aṭṭhikaparikiṇṇaṃ disvā “saccaṃ vata so puriso āha ‘nāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2412_2: mayhaṃ pajāpati, yakkhinī esā’ti. Rājā pana kiñci ajānitvā taṃ gahetvā attano bhariyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2412_3: akāsi, sā yakkhe pakkositvā sabbaṃ janaṃ khāditvā gatā bhavissatī”ti āhaṃsu. Bodhisattopi
atk-s0513a1:2412_4: taṃ divasaṃ tassāyeva sālāyaṃ parittavālukaṃ sīse katvā parittasuttañca parikkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:2412_5: khaggaṃ gahetvā ṭhitakova aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpesi. Manussā sakalarājanivesanaṃ sodhetvā
atk-s0513a1:2412_6: haritūpalittaṃ katvā upari gandhehi vilimpitvā pupphāni vikiritvā pupphadāmāni osāretvā
atk-s0513a1:2412_7: dhūmaṃ datvā navamālā bandhitvā sammantayiṃsu “ambho, yo puriso dibbarūpaṃ māpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2412_8: pacchato āgacchantiṃ yakkhiniṃ indriyāni bhinditvā olokanamattampi na akāsi, so ativiya
atk-s0513a1:2412_9: uḷārasatto dhitimā ñāṇasampanno, tādise purise rajjaṃ anusāsante sabbaraṭṭhaṃ sukhitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2412_10: bhavissati, taṃ rājānaṃ karomā”ti. Atha sabbe amaccā ca nāgarā ca ekacchandā hutvā
atk-s0513a1:2412_11: bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva, tumhe imaṃ rajjaṃ kārethā”ti nagaraṃ pavesetvā ratanarāsimhi
atk-s0513a1:2412_12: ṭhapetvā abhisiñcitvā takkasilarājānaṃ akaṃsu. So cattāri agatigamanāni vajjetvā
atk-s0513a1:2412_13: dasa rājadhamme akopetvā dhammena rajjaṃ kārento dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2413: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2417_0: Tattha samatittikanti antomukhavaṭṭilekhaṃ pāpetvā samabharitaṃ. Anavasesakanti anavasiñcanakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2417_1: aparissāvanakaṃ katvā. Telapattanti pakkhittatilatelapattaṃ. Parihareyyāti hareyya,
atk-s0513a1:2417_2: ādāya gaccheyya. Evaṃ sacittamanurakkheti taṃ telabharitaṃ pattaṃ viya attano cittaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2417_3: kāyagatāsatiyā gocare ceva sampayuttasatiyā cāti ubhinnaṃ antare pakkhipitvā yathā
atk-s0513a1:2417_4: muhuttampi bahiddhā gocare na vikkhipati, tathā paṇḍito yogāvacaro rakkheyya gopeyya.
atk-s0513a1:2419: Cittassa damatho sādhu, cittaṃ dantaṃ sukhāvaha”nti. ;
atk-s0513a1:2422: Cittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvī, cittaṃ guttaṃ sukhāvahaṃ”. ;
atk-s0513a1:2436_0: Patthayāno disaṃ agatapubbanti imasmiṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ ārabhitvā anamatagge
atk-s0513a1:2436_1: saṃsāre agatapubbaṃ disaṃ patthento pihento vuttanayena sakaṃ cittaṃ rakkheyyāti
atk-s0513a1:2438: Puttadārā disā pacchā, mittāmaccā ca uttarā.
atk-s0513a1:2440: Etā disā namasseyya, alamatto kule gihī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:2442: “Disā catasso vidisā catasso, uddhaṃ adho dasa disā imāyo;
atk-s0513a1:2443: Katamaṃ disaṃ tiṭṭhati nāgarājā, yamaddasā supine chabbisāṇa”nti. –
atk-s0513a1:2446: Esā disā paramā setaketu, yaṃ patvā dukkhī sukhino bhavantī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:2447_0: Ettha pana nibbānaṃ “disā”ti vuttaṃ. Idhāpi tadeva adhippetaṃ. Tañhi “khayaṃ virāga”ntiādīhi
atk-s0513a1:2447_1: dissati apadissati, tasmā “disā”ti vuccati. Anamatagge pana saṃsāre kenaci bālaputhujjanena
atk-s0513a1:2447_2: supinenapi agatapubbatāya agatapubbā disā nāmāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ patthayantena kāyagatāsatiyā yogo karaṇīyoti.
atk-s0513a1:2448: Evaṃ satthā nibbānena desanāya kūṭaṃ gahetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājaparisā buddhaparisā ahosi, rajjappattakumāro pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2452_0: Jīvakañca mataṃ disvāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ nāmasiddhikaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2452_1: ārabbha kathesi. Eko kira kulaputto nāmena pāpako nāma. So sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajito
atk-s0513a1:2452_2: bhikkhūhi “ehāvuso, pāpaka, tiṭṭhāvuso, pāpakā”ti vuccamāno cintesi “loke pāpakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2452_3: nāma lāmakaṃ kāḷakaṇṇibhūtaṃ vuccati, aññaṃ maṅgalapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ nāmaṃ āharāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2452_4: So ācariyupajjhāye upasaṅkamitvā “bhante, mayhaṃ nāmaṃ avamaṅgalaṃ, aññaṃ me nāmaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2452_5: karothā”ti āha. Atha naṃ te evamāhaṃsu – “āvuso, nāmaṃ nāma paṇṇattimattaṃ, nāmena
atk-s0513a1:2452_6: kāci atthasiddhi nāma natthi, attano nāmeneva santuṭṭho hohī”ti. So punappunaṃ yāciyeva.
atk-s0513a1:2452_7: Tassāyaṃ nāmasiddhikabhāvo bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭo jāto. Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2452_8: sannisinnā bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, asuko kira bhikkhu nāmasiddhiko maṅgalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2452_9: nāmaṃ āharāpetī”ti. Atha satthā dhammasabhaṃ āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi
atk-s0513a1:2452_10: kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, so idāneva,
atk-s0513a1:2453_0: Atīte takkasilāyaṃ bodhisatto disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni mante
atk-s0513a1:2453_1: vācesi. Tasseko māṇavo pāpako nāma nāmena. So “ehi, pāpaka, yāhi, pāpakā”ti vuccamāno
atk-s0513a1:2453_2: cintesi “mayhaṃ nāmaṃ avamaṅgalaṃ, aññaṃ nāmaṃ āharāpessāmī”ti. So ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2453_3: “ācariya, mayhaṃ nāmaṃ avamaṅgalaṃ, aññaṃ me nāmaṃ karothā”ti āha. Atha naṃ ācariyo
atk-s0513a1:2453_4: avoca “gaccha, tāta, janapadacārikaṃ caritvā attano abhirucitaṃ ekaṃ maṅgalanāmaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2453_5: gahetvā ehi, āgatassa te nāmaṃ parivattetvā aññaṃ nāmaṃ karissāmī”ti. So “sādhū”ti
atk-s0513a1:2453_6: pātheyyaṃ gahetvā nikkhanto gāmena gāmaṃ caranto ekaṃ nagaraṃ pāpuṇi. Tattha ceko
atk-s0513a1:2453_7: puriso kālakato jīvako nāma nāmena. So taṃ ñātijanena āḷāhanaṃ nīyamānaṃ disvā “kiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2453_8: nāmako esa puriso”ti pucchi. “Jīvako nāmeso”ti. “Jīvakopi maratī”ti? “Jīvakopi marati,
atk-s0513a1:2453_9: ajīvakopi marati, nāmaṃ nāma paṇṇattimattaṃ, tvaṃ bālo maññe”ti. So taṃ kathaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a1:2454_0: Athekaṃ dāsiṃ bhatiṃ adadamānaṃ sāmikā dvāre nisīdāpetvā rajjuyā paharanti, tassā
atk-s0513a1:2454_1: ca “dhanapālī”ti nāmaṃ hoti. So antaravīthiyā gacchanto taṃ pothiyamānaṃ disvā “kasmā
atk-s0513a1:2454_2: imaṃ pothethā”ti pucchi. “Bhatiṃ dātuṃ na sakkotī”ti. “Kiṃ panassā nāma”nti? “Dhanapālī
atk-s0513a1:2454_3: nāmā”ti. Nāmena dhanapālī samānāpi bhatimattaṃ dātuṃ na sakkotīti dhanapāliyopi adhanapāliyopi
atk-s0513a1:2454_4: duggatā honti, nāmaṃ nāma paṇṇattimattaṃ, tvaṃ bālo maññeti. So nāme majjhattataro
atk-s0513a1:2454_5: hutvā nagarā nikkhamma maggaṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge maggamūḷhapurisaṃ disvā “ambho
atk-s0513a1:2454_6: kiṃ karonto vicarasī”ti pucchi. “Maggamūḷhomhi, sāmī”ti. “Kiṃ pana te nāma”nti? “Panthako
atk-s0513a1:2454_7: nāmā”ti. “Panthakopi maggamūḷho hotī”ti? “Panthakopi apanthakopi maggamūḷho hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2454_8: nāmaṃ nāma paṇṇattimattaṃ tvaṃ pana bālo maññeti”. So nāme atimajjhatto hutvā bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:2454_9: santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ, tāta, nāmaṃ rocetvā āgatosī”ti vutte “ācariya, jīvakāpi nāma
atk-s0513a1:2454_10: maranti ajīvakāpi, dhanapāliyopi duggatā honti adhanapāliyopi, panthakāpi maggamūḷhā
atk-s0513a1:2454_11: honti apanthakāpi, nāmaṃ nāma paṇṇattimattaṃ, nāmena siddhi natthi, kammeneva siddhi.
atk-s0513a1:2454_12: Alaṃ mayhaṃ aññena nāmena, tadeva me nāmaṃ hotū”ti āha. Bodhisatto tena diṭṭhañca
atk-s0513a1:2458: Tattha punarāgatoti imāni tīṇi kāraṇāni disvā puna āgato, ra-kāro sandhivasena vutto.
atk-s0513a1:2459_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepesa nāmasiddhikoyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2459_1: vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā nāmasiddhiko idānipi nāmasiddhikoyeva, ācariyaparisā
atk-s0513a1:2463_0: Sādhu kho paṇḍito nāmāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kūṭavāṇijaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2463_1: kathesi. Sāvatthiyañhi dve janā ekato vaṇijjaṃ karontā bhaṇḍaṃ sakaṭenādāya janapadaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2463_2: gantvā laddhalābhā paccāgamiṃsu. Tesu kūṭavāṇijo cintesi “ayaṃ bahū divase dubbhojanena
atk-s0513a1:2463_3: dukkhaseyyāya kilanto, idāni attano ghare nānaggarasehi yāvadatthaṃ subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0513a1:2463_4: ajīrakena marissati. Athāhaṃ imaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse katvā ekaṃ tassa dārakānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2463_5: dassāmi, dve koṭṭhāse attanā gahessāmī”ti. So “ajja bhājessāma, sve bhājessāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2463_6: bhaṇḍaṃ bhājetuṃ na icchi. Atha naṃ paṇḍitavāṇijo akāmakaṃ nippīḷetvā bhājāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2463_7: vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā katapaṭisanthāro “atipapañco te kato, idhāgantvāpi
atk-s0513a1:2463_8: cirena buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatosī”ti vutte taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesi. Satthā “na
atk-s0513a1:2463_9: kho so, upāsaka, idāneva kūṭavāṇijo, pubbepi kūṭavāṇijoyeva. Idāni pana taṃ vañcetukāmo
atk-s0513a1:2463_10: jāto, pubbe paṇḍitepi vañcetuṃ ussahī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2464_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bārāṇasiyaṃ vāṇijakule nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:2464_1: nāmaggahaṇadivase cassa “paṇḍito”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto aññena vāṇijena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2464_2: ekato hutvā vaṇijjaṃ karoti, tassa “atipaṇḍito”ti nāmaṃ ahosi. Te bārāṇasito pañcahi
atk-s0513a1:2464_3: sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya janapadaṃ gantvā vaṇijjaṃ katvā laddhalābhā puna bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2464_4: āgamiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ bhaṇḍabhājanakāle atipaṇḍito āha “mayā dve koṭṭhāsā laddhabbā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2464_5: “Kiṃkāraṇā”ti? “Tvaṃ paṇḍito, ahaṃ atipaṇḍito. Paṇḍito ekaṃ laddhuṃ arahati, atipaṇḍito
atk-s0513a1:2464_6: dve”ti. “Nanu amhākaṃ dvinnaṃ bhaṇḍamūlakampi goṇādayopi samasamāyeva, tvaṃ kasmā
atk-s0513a1:2464_7: dve koṭṭhāse laddhuṃ arahasī”ti. “Atipaṇḍitabhāvenā”ti. Evaṃ te kathaṃ vaḍḍhetvā kalahaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2465_0: Tato atipaṇḍito “attheko upāyo”ti cintetvā attano pitaraṃ ekasmiṃ susirarukkhe pavesetvā
atk-s0513a1:2465_1: “tvaṃ amhesu āgatesu ‘atipaṇḍito dve koṭṭhāse laddhuṃ arahatī’ti vadeyyāsī”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a1:2465_2: bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “samma, mayhaṃ dvinnaṃ koṭṭhāsānaṃ yuttabhāvaṃ vā ayuttabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2465_3: vā esā rukkhadevatā jānāti, ehi, taṃ pucchissāmā”ti taṃ tattha netvā “ayye rukkhadevate,
atk-s0513a1:2465_4: amhākaṃ aṭṭaṃ pacchindā”ti āha. Athassa pitā saraṃ parivattetvā “tena hi kathethā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2465_5: āha. “Ayye, ayaṃ paṇḍito, ahaṃ atipaṇḍito. Amhehi ekato vohāro kato, tattha kena
atk-s0513a1:2465_6: kiṃ laddhabbanti. Paṇḍitena eko koṭṭhāso, atipaṇḍitena pana dve koṭṭhāsā laddhabbā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2465_7: Bodhisatto evaṃ vinicchitaṃ aṭṭaṃ sutvā “idāni devatābhāvaṃ vā adevatābhāvaṃ vā jānissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2465_8: palālaṃ āharitvā susiraṃ pūretvā aggiṃ adāsi, atipaṇḍitassa pitā jālāya phuṭṭhakāle
atk-s0513a1:2465_9: aḍḍhajjhāmena sarīrena upari āruyha sākhaṃ gahetvā olambanto bhūmiyaṃ patitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2467: “Sādhu kho paṇḍito nāma, na tveva atipaṇḍito;
atk-s0513a1:2469_0: Tattha sādhu kho paṇḍito nāmāti imasmiṃ loke paṇḍiccena samannāgato kāraṇākāraṇaññū
atk-s0513a1:2469_1: puggalo sādhu sobhano. Atipaṇḍitoti nāmamattena atipaṇḍito kūṭapuriso na tveva varaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2469_2: Manamhi upakūḷitoti thokenamhi jhāmo, aḍḍhajjhāmakova muttoti attho. Te ubhopi majjhe
atk-s0513a1:2469_3: bhinditvā samaññeva koṭṭhāsaṃ gaṇhitvā yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:2470: Satthā “pubbepi esa kūṭavāṇijoyevā”ti imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kūṭavāṇijo paccuppannepi kūṭavāṇijoyeva, paṇḍitavāṇijo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2474_0: Parosahassampi samāgatānanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto puthujjanapucchāpañcakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2474_1: ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu sarabhajātake āvi bhavissati. Ekasmiṃ pana samaye bhikkhū
atk-s0513a1:2474_2: dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitvā “āvuso, dasabalena saṃkhittena kathitaṃ dhammasenāpati
atk-s0513a1:2474_3: sāriputto vitthārena byākāsī”ti therassa guṇaṃ kathayamānā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:2474_4: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte
atk-s0513a1:2474_5: “na, bhikkhave, sāriputto idāneva mayā saṃkhittena bhāsitaṃ vitthārena byākaroti,
atk-s0513a1:2475_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2475_1: takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañcābhiññā
atk-s0513a1:2475_2: aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā himavante vihāsi. Parivāropissa pañca tāpasasatāni
atk-s0513a1:2475_3: ahesuṃ. Athassa jeṭṭhantevāsiko vassārattasamaye upaḍḍhaṃ isigaṇaṃ ādāya loṇambilasevanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2475_4: manussapathaṃ agamāsi. Tadā bodhisattassa kālakiriyāsamayo jāto. Atha naṃ antevāsikā
atk-s0513a1:2475_5: “ācariya, kataro vo guṇo laddho”ti adhigamaṃ pucchiṃsu. So “natthi kiñcī”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a1:2475_6: ābhassarabrahmaloke nibbatti. Bodhisattā hi arūpasamāpattilābhino hutvāpi abhabbaṭṭhānattā
atk-s0513a1:2475_7: āruppe na nibbattanti. Antevāsikā “ācariyassa adhigamo natthī”ti āḷāhane sakkāraṃ na kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2476_0: Jeṭṭhantevāsiko āgantvā “kahaṃ ācariyo”ti pucchitvā “kālakato”ti sutvā “api ācariyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2476_1: adhigamaṃ pucchitthā”ti āha. “Āma, pucchimhā”ti. “Kiṃ kathesī”ti? “Natthi kiñcīti
atk-s0513a1:2476_2: tena vuttaṃ, athassa amhehi sakkāro na kato”ti āhaṃsu. Jeṭṭhantevāsiko “tumhe ācariyassa
atk-s0513a1:2476_3: vacanatthaṃ na jānātha, ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattilābhī ācariyo”ti āha. Te tasmiṃ punappunaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2476_4: kathentepi na saddahiṃsu. Bodhisatto taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “andhabālā mama jeṭṭhantevāsikassa
atk-s0513a1:2476_5: vacanaṃ na saddahanti. Imaṃ tesaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti brahmalokā āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:2476_6: assamapadamatthake mahantenānubhāvena ākāse ṭhatvā jeṭṭhantevāsikassa paññānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2479: Ekova seyyo puriso sapañño, yo bhāsitassa vijānāti attha”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2480_0: Tattha parosahassampīti atirekasahassampi. Samāgatānanti sannipatitānaṃ bhāsitassa
atk-s0513a1:2480_1: atthaṃ jānituṃ asakkontānaṃ bālānaṃ. Kandeyyuṃ te vassasataṃ apaññāti te evaṃ samāgatā
atk-s0513a1:2480_2: apaññā ime bālatāpasā viya vassasatampi vassasahassampi rodeyyuṃ parideveyyuṃ, rodamānāpi
atk-s0513a1:2480_3: pana atthaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā neva jāneyyunti dīpeti. Ekova seyyo puriso sapaññoti evarūpānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2480_4: bālānaṃ parosahassatopi eko paṇḍitapurisova seyyo varataroti attho. Kīdiso sapaññoti?
atk-s0513a1:2480_5: Yo bhāsitassa vijānāti atthaṃ ayaṃ jeṭṭhantevāsiko viyāti.
atk-s0513a1:2481: Evaṃ mahāsatto ākāse ṭhitova dhammaṃ desetvā tāpasagaṇaṃ bujjhāpetvā brahmalokameva gato. Tepi tāpasā jīvitapariyosāne brahmalokaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2482: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā jeṭṭhantevāsiko sāriputto ahosi, mahābrahmā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2486_0: Asātaṃ sātarūpenāti idaṃ satthā kuṇḍiyanagaraṃ upanissāya kuṇḍadhānavane viharanto
atk-s0513a1:2486_1: koliyarājadhītaraṃ suppavāsaṃ upāsikaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Sā hi tasmiṃ samaye satta
atk-s0513a1:2486_2: vassāni kucchinā gabbhaṃ pariharitvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā ahosi, adhimattā vedanā
atk-s0513a1:2486_3: pavattiṃsu. Sā evaṃ adhimattavedanābhibhūtāpi “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā, yo
atk-s0513a1:2486_4: evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya dhammaṃ deseti. Suppaṭipanno vata tassa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho,
atk-s0513a1:2486_5: yo evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya paṭipanno. Susukhaṃ vata nibbānaṃ, yattheva rūpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2486_6: dukkhaṃ natthī”ti imehi tīhi vitakkehi adhivāsesi. Sā sāmikaṃ pakkosetvā tañca attano
atk-s0513a1:2486_7: pavattiṃ vandanasāsanañca ārocetuṃ satthu santikaṃ pesesi. Satthā vandanasāsanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2486_8: sutvāva “sukhinī hotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā, sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyatū”ti
atk-s0513a1:2486_9: āha. Saha vacaneneva pana bhagavato suppavāsā koliyadhītā sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2486_10: vijāyi. Athassā sāmiko gehaṃ gantvā taṃ vijātaṃ disvā “acchariyaṃ vata, bho”ti ativiya
atk-s0513a1:2487_0: Suppavāsāpi puttaṃ vijāyitvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dānaṃ dātukāmā
atk-s0513a1:2487_1: puna nimantanatthāya taṃ pesesi. Tena kho pana samayena mahāmoggallānassa upaṭṭhākena
atk-s0513a1:2487_2: buddhappamukho saṅgho nimantito hoti. Satthā suppavāsāya dānassa okāsadānatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2487_3: theraṃ tassa santikaṃ pesetvā taṃ saññāpetvā sattāhaṃ tassā dānaṃ paṭiggahesi saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2487_4: bhikkhusaṅghena. Sattame pana divase suppavāsā puttaṃ sīvalikumāraṃ maṇḍetvā satthārañceva
atk-s0513a1:2487_5: bhikkhusaṅghañca vandāpesi. Tasmiṃ paṭipāṭiyā sāriputtattherassa santikaṃ nīte thero
atk-s0513a1:2487_6: tena saddhiṃ “kacci te, sīvali, khamanīya”nti paṭisanthāramakāsi. So “kuto me, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2487_7: sukhaṃ, svāhaṃ satta vassāni lohitakumbhiyaṃ vasi”nti therena saddhiṃ evarūpaṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2487_8: kathesi. Suppāvāsā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “sattāhajāto me putto anubuddhena dhammasenāpatinā
atk-s0513a1:2487_9: saddhiṃ mantetī”ti somanassappattā ahosi. Satthā “api nu suppavāse aññepi evarūpe
atk-s0513a1:2487_10: putte icchasī”ti āha. “Sace, bhante, evarūpe aññe satta putte labheyyaṃ, iccheyyamevāha”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2487_11: Satthā udānaṃ udānetvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Sīvalikumāropi kho sattavassikakāleyeva
atk-s0513a1:2487_12: sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajitvā paripuṇṇavasso upasampadaṃ labhitvā puññavā lābhaggappatto
atk-s0513a1:2487_13: hutvā pathaviṃ unnādetvā arahattaṃ patvā puññavantānaṃ antare etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:2488_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitvā “āvuso, sīvalitthero nāma evarūpo
atk-s0513a1:2488_1: mahāpuñño patthitapatthano pacchimabhavikasatto satta vassāni lohitakumbhiyaṃ vasitvā
atk-s0513a1:2488_2: sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhabhāvaṃ āpajji, aho mātāputtā mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhaviṃsu, kiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2488_3: nu kho kammaṃ akaṃsū”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Satthā tatthāgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:2488_4: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “bhikkhave, sīvalino
atk-s0513a1:2488_5: mahāpuññatova satta vassāni lohitakumbhiyaṃ nivāso ca sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhabhāvappatti
atk-s0513a1:2488_6: ca attanā katakammamūlakāva, suppavāsāyapi satta vassāni kucchinā gabbhapariharaṇadukkhañca
atk-s0513a1:2488_7: sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhadukkhañca attanā katakammamūlakamevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2489_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2489_1: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā pitu accayena
atk-s0513a1:2489_2: rajjaṃ patvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi. Tasmiṃ samaye kosalamahārājā mahantena balenāgantvā
atk-s0513a1:2489_3: bārāṇasiṃ gahetvā rājānaṃ māretvā tasseva aggamahesiṃ attano aggamahesiṃ akāsi. Bārāṇasirañño
atk-s0513a1:2489_4: pana putto pitu maraṇakāle niddhamanadvārena palāyitvā balaṃ saṃharitvā bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2489_5: āgantvā avidūre nisīditvā tassa rañño paṇṇaṃ pesesi “rajjaṃ vā detu yuddhaṃ vā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2489_6: So “yuddhaṃ demī”ti paṭipaṇṇaṃ pesesi. Rājakumārassa pana mātā taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a1:2489_7: “yuddhena kammaṃ natthi, sabbadisāsu sañcāraṃ pacchinditvā bārāṇasinagaraṃ parivāretu,
atk-s0513a1:2489_8: tato dārūdakabhattaparikkhayena kilantamanussaṃ nagaraṃ vināva yuddhena gaṇhissasī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2489_9: paṇṇaṃ pesesi. So mātu sāsanaṃ sutvā satta divasāni sañcāraṃ pacchinditvā nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2489_10: rundhi, nāgarā sañcāraṃ alabhamānā sattame divase tassa rañño sīsaṃ gahetvā kumārassa
atk-s0513a1:2489_11: adaṃsu. Kumāro pana nagaraṃ pavisitvā rajjaṃ gahetvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2490_0: So etarahi satta divasāni sañcāraṃ pacchinditvā nagaraṃ rundhitvā gahitakammanissandena
atk-s0513a1:2490_1: satta vassāni lohitakumbhiyaṃ vasitvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhabhāvaṃ āpajji. Yaṃ pana
atk-s0513a1:2490_2: so padumuttarassa bhagavato pādamūle “lābhīnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a1:2490_3: patthanaṃ akāsi, yañca vipassibuddhakāle nāgarehi saddhiṃ sahassagghanakaṃ guḷadadhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2490_4: datvā patthanamakāsi, tassānubhāvena lābhīnaṃ aggo jāto. Suppavāsāpi “nagaraṃ rundhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2490_5: gaṇha, tātā”ti pesitabhāvena satta vassāni kucchinā gabbhaṃ pariharitvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā jātā.
atk-s0513a1:2491: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2495_0: Tattha asātaṃ sātarūpenāti amadhurameva madhurapatirūpakena. Pamattamativattatīti
atk-s0513a1:2495_1: asātaṃ appiyaṃ dukkhanti etaṃ tividhampi etena sātarūpādinā ākārena sativippavāsavasena
atk-s0513a1:2495_2: pamattaṃ puggalaṃ ativattati abhibhavati ajjhottharatīti attho. Idaṃ bhagavatā yañca
atk-s0513a1:2495_3: te mātāputtā iminā gabbhapariharaṇagabbhavāsasaṅkhātena asātādinā pubbe nagararundhanasātādipatirūpakena
atk-s0513a1:2495_4: ajjhotthaṭā, yañca idāni sā upāsikā punapi sattakkhattuṃ evarūpaṃ asātaṃ appiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2495_5: dukkhaṃ pemavatthubhūtena puttasaṅkhātena sātādipatirūpakena ajjhotthaṭā hutvā tathā
atk-s0513a1:2495_6: avaca, taṃ sabbampi sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2496: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā nagaraṃ rundhitvā rajjappattakumāro sīvali ahosi, mātā suppavāsā, pitā pana bārāṇasirājā ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2509: Ekova seyyo puriso sapañño, yo bhāsitassa vijānāti attha”nti. –
atk-s0513a1:2510_0: Idaṃ jātakaṃ vatthuto ca veyyākaraṇato ca samodhānato ca parosahassajātakasadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2510_1: Kevalañhettha “jhāyeyyu”nti padamattameva viseso. Tassattho – vassasatampi apaññā
atk-s0513a1:2510_2: jhāyeyyuṃ olokeyyuṃ upadhāreyyuṃ, evaṃ olokentāpi pana atthaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā na passanti,
atk-s0513a1:2510_3: tasmā yo bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānāti, so ekova sapañño seyyoti.
atk-s0513a1:2514_0: Yo dukkhaphuṭṭhāya bhaveyya tāṇanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ paṇṇikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2514_1: upāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi. So kira sāvatthivāsī upāsako nānappakārāni mūlapaṇṇādīni
atk-s0513a1:2514_2: ceva lābukumbhaṇḍādīni ca vikkiṇitvā jīvikaṃ kappeti. Tassekā dhītā abhirūpā pāsādikā
atk-s0513a1:2514_3: ācārasīlasampannā hirottappasamannāgatā kevalaṃ niccappahasitamukhā. Tassā samānakulesu
atk-s0513a1:2514_4: vāreyyatthāya āgatesu so cintesi “imissā vāreyyaṃ vattati, ayañca niccappahasitamukhā.
atk-s0513a1:2514_5: Kumārikādhamme pana asati kumārikāya parakulaṃ gatāya mātāpitūnaṃ garahā hoti, ‘atthi
atk-s0513a1:2514_6: nu kho imissā kumārikādhammo, natthī’ti vīmaṃsissāmi na”nti. So ekadivasaṃ dhītaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2514_7: pacchiṃ gāhāpetvā paṇṇatthāya araññaṃ gantvā vīmaṃsanavasena kilesasannissito viya
atk-s0513a1:2514_8: hutvā rahassakathaṃ kathetvā taṃ hatthe gaṇhi. Sā gahitamattāva rodantī kandantī
atk-s0513a1:2514_9: “ayuttametaṃ, tāta, udakato aggipātubhāvasadisaṃ, mā evarūpaṃ karothā”ti āha. “Amma,
atk-s0513a1:2514_10: mayā vīmaṃsanatthāya tvaṃ hatthe gahitā, na ca kilesavasena. Vadehi, atthi dāni te
atk-s0513a1:2514_11: kumārikādhammo”ti. “Āma, tāta, atthi. Mayā hi lobhavasena na koci puriso olokitapubbo”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2514_12: So dhītaraṃ assāsetvā gharaṃ netvā maṅgalaṃ katvā parakulaṃ pesetvā “satthāraṃ vandissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2514_13: gandhamālādihattho jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pūjetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi,
atk-s0513a1:2514_14: “cirassamāgatosī”ti ca vutte tamatthaṃ bhagavato ārocesi. Satthā “upāsaka, kumārikā
atk-s0513a1:2514_15: ciraṃ paṭṭhāya ācārasīlasampannāva, tvaṃ pana na idāneva evaṃ vīmaṃsasi, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:2514_16: vīmaṃsiyevā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2515_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto araññe rukkhadevatā hutvā
atk-s0513a1:2515_1: nibbatti. Atheko bārāṇasiyaṃ paṇṇikaupāsakoti atītavatthu paccuppannasadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2515_2: Tena pana sā vīmaṃsanatthāya hatthe gahitamattā paridevamānā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2517: “Yo dukkhaphuṭṭhāya bhaveyya tāṇaṃ, so me pitā dubbhi vane karoti;
atk-s0513a1:2518: Sā kassa kandāmi vanassa majjhe, yo tāyitā so sahasaṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2519_0: Tattha yo dukkhaphuṭṭhāya bhaveyya tāṇanti kāyikacetasikehi dukkhehi phuṭṭhāya tāyitā
atk-s0513a1:2519_1: paritāyitā patiṭṭhā bhaveyya. So me pitā dubbhi vane karotīti so mayhaṃ dukkhaparitāyako
atk-s0513a1:2519_2: pitāva imasmiṃ vane evarūpaṃ mittadubbhi kammaṃ karoti, attano jātāya dhītari vītikkamaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2519_3: kātuṃ maññatīti attho. Sā kassa kandāmīti kassa rodāmi, ko me patiṭṭhā bhavissatīti
atk-s0513a1:2519_4: dīpeti. Yo tāyitā so sahasaṃ karotīti yo mayhaṃ tāyitā rakkhitā avassayo bhavituṃ
atk-s0513a1:2519_5: arahati, so pitāyeva sāhasikakammaṃ karotīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2520: Atha naṃ pitā assāsetvā “amma, rakkhitattāsī”ti pucchi. “Āma, tāta rakkhito me attā”ti. So taṃ gharaṃ netvā maṇḍetvā maṅgalaṃ katvā parakulaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2521: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne upāsako sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a1:2522: Tadā pitā etarahi pitāva, dhītā ca etarahi dhītāva, taṃ kāraṇaṃ paccakkhato diṭṭharukkhadevatā pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a1:2526_0: Yattha verī nivisatīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2526_1: Anāthapiṇḍiko kira bhogagāmaṃ gantvā āgacchanto antarāmagge core disvā “antarāmagge
atk-s0513a1:2526_2: vasituṃ na yuttaṃ, sāvatthimeva gamissāmī”ti vegena goṇe pājetvā sāvatthimeva āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:2526_3: punadivase vihāraṃ gato satthu etamatthaṃ ārocesi. Satthā “pubbepi gahapati paṇḍitā
atk-s0513a1:2526_4: antarāmagge core disvā antarā avilambamānā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gamiṃsū”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a1:2527_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā
atk-s0513a1:2527_1: ekaṃ gāmakaṃ nimantanaṃ bhuñjanatthāya gantvā paccāgacchanto antarāmagge core disvā
atk-s0513a1:2527_2: antarāmagge avasitvāva vegena goṇe pājento attano gehameva āgantvā nānaggarasehi
atk-s0513a1:2527_3: bhuñjitvā mahāsayane nisinno “corānaṃ hatthato muccitvā nibbhayaṭṭhānaṃ attano gehaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2529: “Yattha verī nivisati, na vase tattha paṇḍito;
atk-s0513a1:2530: Ekarattaṃ dirattaṃ vā, dukkhaṃ vasati verisū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2531_0: Tattha verīti veracetanāsamaṅgipuggalo. Nivisatīti patiṭṭhāti. Na vase tattha paṇḍitoti
atk-s0513a1:2531_1: so verīpuggalo yasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhito hutvā vasati, tattha paṇḍito paṇḍiccena samannāgato
atk-s0513a1:2531_2: na vaseyya. Kiṃkāraṇā? Ekarattaṃ dirattaṃ vā, dukkhaṃ vasati verisūti, verīnañhi
atk-s0513a1:2531_3: antare vasanto ekāhampi dvīhampi dukkhameva vasatīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2532: Evaṃ mahāsatto udānaṃ udānetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2533: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā ahameva bārāṇasiseṭṭhi ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2537_0: Catubbhi aṭṭhajjhagamāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2537_1: kathesi. Vatthu heṭṭhā mittavindakajātake vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ. Idaṃ pana jātakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2537_2: kassapabuddhakālikaṃ. Tasmiñhi kāle uracakkaṃ ukkhipitvā niraye paccamāno eko nerayikasatto
atk-s0513a1:2537_3: “bhante, kiṃ nu kho pāpakammaṃ akāsi”nti bodhisattaṃ pucchi. Bodhisatto “tayā idañcidañca
atk-s0513a1:2542_0: Tattha catubbhi aṭṭhajjhagamāti samuddantare catasso vimānapetiyo labhitvā tāhi asantuṭṭho
atk-s0513a1:2542_1: atricchatāya parato gantvā aparā aṭṭha adhigatosīti attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva
atk-s0513a1:2542_2: nayo. Atricchaṃ cakkamāsadoti evaṃ sakalābhena asantuṭṭho atra atra icchanto parato
atk-s0513a1:2542_3: parato lābhaṃ patthento idāni cakkamāsado idaṃ uracakkaṃ pattosi. Tassa te evaṃ icchāhatassa
atk-s0513a1:2542_4: posassa taṇhāya hatassa upahatassa tava cakkaṃ bhamati matthake. Pāsāṇacakkaṃ, ayacakkanti
atk-s0513a1:2542_5: imesu dvīsu khuradhāraṃ ayacakkaṃ tassa matthake punappunaṃ patanavasena bhamantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2542_6: disvā evamāha. Vatvā ca pana attano devalokameva gato. Sopi nerayikasatto attano
atk-s0513a1:2543: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mittavindako dubbacabhikkhu ahosi, devaputto pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2547_0: Bahumpetaṃ vane kaṭṭhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ uttasitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2547_1: kathesi. So kira sāvatthivāsī eko kulaputto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a1:2547_2: maraṇabhīruko ahosi, rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu vātassa vā vījantassa sukkhadaṇḍakassa
atk-s0513a1:2547_3: vā patantassa pakkhicatuppadānaṃ vā saddaṃ sutvā maraṇabhayatajjito mahāravaṃ ravanto
atk-s0513a1:2547_4: palāyati. Tassa hi “maritabbaṃ mayā”ti satimattampi natthi. Sace hi so “ahaṃ marissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2547_5: jāneyya, na maraṇaṃ bhāyeyya. Maraṇassatikammaṭṭhānassa pana tassa abhāvitattāva
atk-s0513a1:2547_6: bhāyati. Tassa so maraṇabhīrukabhāvo bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2548_0: Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, asuko nāma bhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:2548_1: maraṇabhīruko maraṇaṃ bhāyati, bhikkhunā nāma ‘avassaṃ mayā maritabba’nti maraṇassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2548_2: bhāvetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2548_3: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte taṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ maraṇabhīruko”ti
atk-s0513a1:2548_4: pucchitvā “saccaṃ, bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhave, mā etassa bhikkhuno anattamanā hotha,
atk-s0513a1:2548_5: nāyaṃ idāneva maraṇabhīruko, pubbepi maraṇabhīrukoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2549_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto himavante rukkhadevatā hutvā
atk-s0513a1:2549_1: nibbatti. Tasmiṃ kāle bārāṇasirājā attano maṅgalahatthiṃ āneñjakāraṇaṃ sikkhāpetuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2549_2: hatthācariyānaṃ adāsi. Taṃ āḷāne niccalaṃ bandhitvā tomarahatthā manussā parivāretvā
atk-s0513a1:2549_3: āneñjakāraṇaṃ kārenti. So taṃ kāraṇaṃ kāriyamāno vedanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto āḷānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2549_4: bhinditvā manusse palāpetvā himavantaṃ pāvisi. Manussā taṃ gahetuṃ asakkontā nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2549_5: So tattha maraṇabhīruko ahosi, vātasaddāni sutvā kampamāno maraṇabhayatajjito soṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2549_6: vidhunitvā vegena palāyati, āḷāne bandhitvā āneñjakāraṇaṃ karaṇakālo viyassa hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2549_7: kāyassādaṃ vā cittassādaṃ vā alabhanto kampamāno vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:2550: Rukkhadevatā taṃ disvā khandhaviṭape ṭhatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2553: Tassa ce bhāyasi nāga, kiso nūna bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2554_0: Tatthāyaṃ piṇḍattho – yaṃ etaṃ dubbalaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ puratthimādibhedo vāto bhañjati,
atk-s0513a1:2554_1: taṃ imasmiṃ vane bahuṃ sulabhaṃ, tattha tattha saṃvijjati. Sace tvaṃ tassa bhāyasi,
atk-s0513a1:2554_2: evaṃ sante niccaṃ bhīto maṃsalohitakkhayaṃ patvā kiso nūna bhavissasi, imasmiṃ pana
atk-s0513a1:2554_3: vane tava bhayaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā ito paṭṭhāya mā bhāyīti.
atk-s0513a1:2555: Evaṃ devatā tassa ovādaṃ adāsi, sopi tato paṭṭhāya nibbhayo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2556_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a1:2556_1: so bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. “Tadā nāgo ayaṃ bhikkhu ahosi, rukkhadevatā
atk-s0513a1:2560_0: Sukhaṃ vata maṃ jīvantanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto thullakumārikāpalobhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2560_1: ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu terasakanipāte cūḷanāradakassapajātake āvi bhavissati. Taṃ
atk-s0513a1:2560_2: pana bhikkhuṃ satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2560_3: bhagavā”ti vutte “kattha te cittaṃ paṭibaddha”nti pucchi. So “ekissā thullakumārikāyā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2560_4: āha. Atha naṃ satthā “ayaṃ te bhikkhu anatthakārikā, pubbepi tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya sīlabyasanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2560_5: patvā kampanto vicaramāno paṇḍite nissāya sukhaṃ labhī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2561_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārenteti atītavatthupi cūḷanāradakassapajātakeyeva
atk-s0513a1:2561_1: āvi bhavissati. Tadā pana bodhisatto sāyaṃ phalāphale ādāya āgantvā paṇṇasālādvāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2561_2: vivaritvā pavisitvā puttaṃ cūḷatāpasaṃ etadavoca “tāta, tvaṃ aññesu divasesu dārūni
atk-s0513a1:2561_3: āharasi, pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ āharasi, aggiṃ karosi, ajja pana ekampi akatvā kasmā
atk-s0513a1:2561_4: dummukho pajjhāyanto nipannosī”ti? “Tāta, tumhesu phalāphalatthāya gatesu ekā itthī
atk-s0513a1:2561_5: āgantvā maṃ palobhetvā ādāya gantuṃ ārabhi, ahaṃ pana ‘tumhehi vissajjito gamissāmī’ti
atk-s0513a1:2561_6: na gacchiṃ, asukaṭṭhāne pana naṃ nisīdāpetvā āgatomhi, idāni gacchāmahaṃ tātā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2561_7: Bodhisatto “na sakkā etaṃ nivattetu”nti ñatvā “tena hi, tāta, gaccha, esā pana taṃ
atk-s0513a1:2561_8: netvā yadā macchamaṃsādīni vā khāditukāmā bhavissati, sappiloṇataṇḍulādīhi vā panassā
atk-s0513a1:2561_9: attho bhavissati, tadā ‘idañcidañcāharā’ti taṃ kilamessati. Tadā mayhaṃ guṇaṃ saritvā
atk-s0513a1:2561_10: palāyitvā idheva āgaccheyyāsī”ti vissajjesi. So tāya saddhiṃ manussapathaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2561_11: Atha naṃ sā attano vasaṃ gametvā “maṃsaṃ āhara, macchaṃ āharā”ti yena yena atthikā
atk-s0513a1:2561_12: hoti, taṃ taṃ āharāpeti. Tadā so “ayaṃ maṃ attano dāsaṃ viya kammakāraṃ viya ca katvā
atk-s0513a1:2561_13: pīḷetī”ti palāyitvā pitu santikaṃ āgantvā pitaraṃ vanditvā ṭhitakova imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2565_0: Tattha sukhaṃ vata maṃ jīvantanti tāta, tumhākaṃ santike maṃ sukhaṃ jīvantaṃ. Pacamānāti
atk-s0513a1:2565_1: tāpayamānā pīḷayamānā, yaṃ yaṃ vā khāditukāmā hoti, taṃ taṃ pacamānā. Udakaṃ añcanti
atk-s0513a1:2565_2: etāyāti udañcanī, cāṭito vā kūpato vā udakaussiñcanaghaṭikāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Sā pana udañcanī
atk-s0513a1:2565_3: viya, udakaṃ viya ghaṭikā, yena yenatthikā hoti, taṃ taṃ ākaḍḍhatiyevāti attho. Corī
atk-s0513a1:2565_4: jāyappavādenāti “bhariyā”ti nāmena ekā corī maṃ madhuravacanena upalāpetvā tattha
atk-s0513a1:2565_5: netvā telaṃ loṇañca yañca aññaṃ icchati, taṃ sabbaṃ yācati, dāsaṃ viya kammakāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2565_6: viya ca katvā āharāpetīti tassā aguṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2566_0: Atha naṃ bodhisatto assāsetvā “hotu, tāta, ehi tvaṃ mettaṃ bhāvehi, karuṇaṃ bhāvehī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2566_1: cattāro brahmavihāre ācikkhi, ācikkhitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi. So na cirasseva
atk-s0513a1:2566_2: abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca uppādetvā brahmavihāre bhāvetvā saddhiṃ pitarā brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2567: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne so bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a1:2568: “Tadā thullakumārikāva etarahi thullakumārikā. Cūḷatāpaso ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu ahosi, pitā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2572_0: Sādhū kho sippakaṃ nāmāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ haṃsapaharanakaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2572_1: ārabbha kathesi. So kireko sāvatthivāsī kulaputto sālittakasippe nipphattiṃ patto.
atk-s0513a1:2572_2: “Sālittakasippa”nti sakkharākhipanasippaṃ vuccati. So ekadivasaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane
atk-s0513a1:2572_3: uraṃ datvā pabbajitvā upasampadaṃ labhi, na pana sikkhākāmo, na paṭipattisādhako
atk-s0513a1:2572_4: ahosi. So ekadivasaṃ ekaṃ daharabhikkhuṃ ādāya aciravatiṃ gantvā nhāyitvā nadītīre
atk-s0513a1:2572_5: aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ samaye dve setahaṃsā ākāsena gacchanti. So taṃ daharaṃ āha “imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2572_6: pacchimahaṃsaṃ sakkharāya akkhimhi paharitvā pādamūle pātemī”ti. Itaro “kathaṃ pātessasi,
atk-s0513a1:2572_7: na sakkhissasi paharitu”nti āha. Itaro “tiṭṭhatu tāvassa orato akkhi, parato akkhimhi
atk-s0513a1:2572_8: taṃ paharāmī”ti. Idāni pana tvaṃ asantaṃ kathesīti. “Tena hi upadhārehī”ti ekaṃ tikhiṇasakkharaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2572_9: gahetvā aṅguliyā pariyante katvā tassa haṃsassa pacchato khipi. Sā “ru”nti saddaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2572_10: akāsi, haṃso “parissayena bhavitabba”nti nivattitvā saddaṃ sotuṃ ārabhi. Itaro tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2572_11: khaṇe ekaṃ vaṭṭasakkharaṃ gahetvā tassa nivattitvā olokentassa parabhāge akkhiṃ pahari.
atk-s0513a1:2572_12: Sakkharā itarampi akkhiṃ vinivijjhitvā gatā. Haṃso mahāravaṃ ravanto pādamūleyeva
atk-s0513a1:2572_13: pati. Tato tato bhikkhū āgantvā garahitvā “ananucchavikaṃ te kata”nti satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2572_14: netvā “bhante, iminā idaṃ nāma kata”nti tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ garahitvā
atk-s0513a1:2572_15: “na, bhikkhave, idānevesa etasmiṃ sippe kusalo, pubbepi kusaloyeva ahosī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2573_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa amacco ahosi. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2573_1: kāle rañño purohito atimukharo hoti bahubhāṇī, tasmiṃ kathetuṃ āraddhe aññe okāsameva
atk-s0513a1:2573_2: na labhanti. Rājā cintesi “kadā nu kho etassa vacanupacchedakaṃ kañci labhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2573_3: So tato paṭṭhāya tathārūpaṃ ekaṃ upadhārento vicarati. Tasmiṃ kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ eko
atk-s0513a1:2573_4: pīṭhasappī sakkharākhipanasippe nipphattiṃ patto hoti. Gāmadārakā taṃ rathakaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0513a1:2573_5: ākaḍḍhamānā bārāṇasinagaradvāramūle eko viṭapasampanno mahānigrodho atthi, tattha
atk-s0513a1:2573_6: ānetvā samparivāretvā kākaṇikādīni datvā “hatthirūpakaṃ kara, assarūpakaṃ karā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2573_7: vadanti. So sakkharā khipitvā khipitvā nigrodhapaṇṇesu nānārūpāni dasseti, sabbāni
atk-s0513a1:2574_0: Atha bārāṇasirājā uyyānaṃ gacchanto taṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi. Ussāraṇābhayena sabbe dārakā
atk-s0513a1:2574_1: palāyiṃsu, pīṭhasappī tattheva nipajji. Rājā nigrodhamūlaṃ patvā rathe nisinno pattānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2574_2: chiddatāya chāyaṃ kabarakabaraṃ disvā olokento sabbesaṃ pattānaṃ chiddabhāvaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:2574_3: “kenetāni evaṃ katānī”ti pucchi. “Pīṭhasappinā, devā”ti. Rājā “imaṃ nissāya brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0513a1:2574_4: vacanupacchedaṃ kātuṃ sakkā bhavissatī”ti cintetvā “kahaṃ, bhaṇe, pīṭhasappī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2574_5: Vicinantā mūlantare nipannaṃ disvā “ayaṃ, devā”ti āhaṃsu. Rājā naṃ pakkosāpetvā parisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2574_6: ussāretvā pucchi “amhākaṃ santike eko mukharabrāhmaṇo atthi, sakkhissasi taṃ nissaddaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2574_7: kātu”nti. Nāḷimattā ajalaṇḍikā labhanto sakkhissāmi, devāti. Rājā pīṭhasappiṃ gharaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2574_8: netvā antosāṇiyaṃ nisīdāpetvā sāṇiyaṃ chiddaṃ kāretvā brāhmaṇassa chiddābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2574_9: āsanaṃ paññapetvā nāḷimattā sukkhā ajalaṇḍikā pīṭhasappissa santike ṭhapāpetvā brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2574_10: upaṭṭhānakāle āgataṃ tasmiṃ āsane nisīdāpetvā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Brāhmaṇo aññesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2574_11: okāsaṃ adatvā raññā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ ārabhi. Athassa so pīṭhasappī sāṇicchiddena
atk-s0513a1:2574_12: ekekaṃ ajalaṇḍikaṃ pacchiyaṃ pavesento viya tālutalamhiyeva pāteti, brāhmaṇo āgatāgataṃ
atk-s0513a1:2574_13: nāḷiyaṃ telaṃ pavesento viya gilati, sabbā parikkhayaṃ gamiṃsu. Tassetā nāḷimattā
atk-s0513a1:2575_0: Rājā tāsaṃ parikkhīṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā āha – “ācariya, tumhe atimukharatāya nāḷimattā
atk-s0513a1:2575_1: ajalaṇḍikā gilantā kiñci na jānittha, ito dāni uttari jīrāpetuṃ na sakkhissatha.
atk-s0513a1:2575_2: Gacchatha, piyaṅgudakaṃ pivitvā chaḍḍetvā attānaṃ arogaṃ karothā”ti brāhmaṇo tato
atk-s0513a1:2575_3: paṭṭhāya pihitamukho viya hutvā kathentenāpi saddhiṃ akathanasīlo ahosi. Rājā “iminā
atk-s0513a1:2575_4: me kaṇṇasukhaṃ kata”nti pīṭhasappissa satasahassuṭṭhānake catūsu disāsu cattāro gāme
atk-s0513a1:2575_5: adāsi. Bodhisatto rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva, sippaṃ nāma loke paṇḍitehi uggahitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2575_6: pīṭhasappinā sālittakamattenāpi ayaṃ sampatti laddhā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2577: “Sādhuṃ kho sippakaṃ nāma, api yādisa kīdisaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:2579_0: Tattha passa khañjappahārenāti passa, mahārāja, iminā khañjapīṭhasappinā ajalaṇḍikāpahārena
atk-s0513a1:2579_1: catuddisā cattāro gāmā laddhā, aññesaṃ sippānaṃ ko ānisaṃsaparicchedoti sippaguṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2580: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā pīṭhasappī ayaṃ bhikkhu ahosi, rājā ānando, paṇḍitāmacco pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2584_0: Sikkheyya sikkhitabbānīti idaṃ satthā vesāliṃ upanissāya mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2584_1: viharanto ekaṃ licchaviṃ ārabbha kathesi. So kira licchavirājā saddho pasanno buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2584_2: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā attano nivesane mahādānaṃ pavattesi. Bhariyā panassa thūlaṅgapaccaṅgā
atk-s0513a1:2584_3: uddhumātakanimittasadisā anākappasampannā ahosi. Satthā bhattakiccāvasāne anumodanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2584_4: katvā vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ datvā gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2584_5: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, tassa nāma licchavirañño tāva abhirūpassa tādisā bhariyā
atk-s0513a1:2584_6: thūlaṅgapaccaṅgā anākappasampannā, kathaṃ so tāya saddhiṃ abhiramatī”ti. Satthā āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:2584_7: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte
atk-s0513a1:2584_8: “na, bhikkhave, esa idāneva, pubbepi thūlasarīrāya eva itthiyā saddhiṃ abhiramī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2585_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa amacco ahosi. Athekā
atk-s0513a1:2585_1: janapaditthī thūlasarīrā anākappasampannā bhatiṃ kurumānā rājaṅgaṇassa avidūrena
atk-s0513a1:2585_2: gacchamānā sarīravaḷañjapīḷitā hutvā nivatthasāṭakena sarīraṃ paṭicchādetvā nisīditvā
atk-s0513a1:2585_3: sarīravaḷañjaṃ muñcitvā khippameva uṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe bārāṇasirājā vātapānena
atk-s0513a1:2585_4: rājaṅgaṇaṃ olokento taṃ disvā cintesi “ayaṃ evarūpe aṅgaṇaṭṭhāne sarīravaḷañjaṃ muñcamānā
atk-s0513a1:2585_5: hirottappaṃ appahāya nivāsaneneva paṭicchannā hutvā sarīravaḷañjaṃ mocetvā khippaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2585_6: uṭṭhitā, imāya nirogāya bhavitabbaṃ, etissā vatthu visadaṃ bhavissati, visade pana
atk-s0513a1:2585_7: vatthusmiṃ eko putto labbhamāno visado puññavā bhavissati, imaṃ mayā aggamahesiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2585_8: kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So tassā apariggahitabhāvaṃ ñatvā āharāpetvā aggamahesiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2585_9: adāsi. Sā tassa piyā ahosi manāpā, na cirasseva ekaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi. So panassā putto
atk-s0513a1:2586_0: Bodhisatto tassā sampattiṃ disvā tathārūpaṃ vacanokāsaṃ labhitvā “deva, sikkhitabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2586_1: nāma sippaṃ kasmā na sikkhitabbaṃ, yatra hi nāmāyaṃ mahāpuññā hirottappaṃ appahāya
atk-s0513a1:2586_2: paṭicchannākārena sarīravaḷañjaṃ kurumānā tumhe ārādhetvā evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ pattā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2586_3: vatvā sikkhitabbayuttakānaṃ sippānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2590_0: Tattha santi sacchandino janāti tesu tesu sippesu sacchandā janā atthiyeva. Bāhiyāti
atk-s0513a1:2590_1: bahijanapade jātā saṃvaḍḍhā itthī. Suhannenāti hirottappaṃ appahāya paṭicchannenākārena
atk-s0513a1:2590_2: hannaṃ suhannaṃ nāma, tena suhannena. Rājānamabhirādhayīti devaṃ abhirādhayitvā imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2590_3: sampattiṃ pattāti. Evaṃ mahāsatto sikkhitabbayuttakānaṃ sippānaṃ guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2591: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā jayampatikā etarahipi jayampatikāva, paṇḍitāmacco pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2595_0: Yathanno puriso hotīti idaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto mahāduggataṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2595_1: Sāvatthiyañhi kadāci ekameva kulaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0513a1:2595_2: kadāci tīṇi cattāri ekato hutvā, kadāci gaṇabandhanena, kadāci vīthisabhāgena, kadāci
atk-s0513a1:2595_3: sakalanagaraṃ chandakaṃ saṃharitvā. Tadā pana vīthibhattaṃ nāma ahosi. Atha manussā
atk-s0513a1:2595_4: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa yāguṃ datvā “khajjakaṃ āharathā”ti āhaṃsu. Tadā
atk-s0513a1:2595_5: paneko paresaṃ bhatikārako duggatamanusso tassaṃ vīthiyaṃ vasamāno cintesi “ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2595_6: yāguṃ dātuṃ na sakkhissāmi, khajjakaṃ pana dassāmī”ti saṇhasaṇhaṃ kuṇḍakaṃ vaḍḍhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2595_7: udakena temetvā akkapaṇṇena veṭhetvā kukkuḷe pacitvā “idaṃ buddhassa dassāmī”ti taṃ
atk-s0513a1:2595_8: ādāya gantvā satthu santike ṭhito “khajjakaṃ āharathā”ti ekasmiṃ vacane vuttamatte
atk-s0513a1:2595_9: sabbapaṭhamaṃ gantvā taṃ pūvaṃ satthu patte patiṭṭhāpesi, satthā aññehi dīyamānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2596_0: Tasmiṃyeva pana khaṇe “sammāsambuddhena kira mahāduggatassa kuṇḍakakhajjakaṃ ajigucchitvā
atk-s0513a1:2596_1: amataṃ viya paribhutta”nti sakalanagaraṃ ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi. Rājarājamahāmattādayo
atk-s0513a1:2596_2: antamaso dovārike upādāya sabbeva sannipatitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā mahāduggataṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2596_3: “handa bho, sataṃ gahetvā, dve satāni gahetvā, pañca satāni gahetvā amhākaṃ pattiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2596_4: dehī”ti vadiṃsu. So “satthāraṃ paṭipucchitvā jānissāmī”ti satthu santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2596_5: tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Satthā “dhanaṃ gahetvā vā aggahetvā vā sabbasattānaṃ pattiṃ dehī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2596_6: āha. So dhanaṃ gahetuṃ ārabhi. Manussā diguṇacatugguṇaaṭṭhaguṇādivasena dadantā nava
atk-s0513a1:2596_7: hiraññakoṭiyo adaṃsu. Satthā anumodanaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhūhi vatte dassite
atk-s0513a1:2596_8: sugatovādaṃ datvā gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi. Rājā sāyanhasamaye mahāduggataṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2597_0: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, satthā mahāduggatena dinnaṃ kuṇḍakapūvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2597_1: ajigucchanto amataṃ viya paribhuñji, mahāduggatopi bahudhanañca seṭṭhiṭṭhānañca labhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2597_2: mahāsampattiṃ patto”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2597_3: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva mayā ajigucchantena tassa
atk-s0513a1:2597_4: kuṇḍakapūvo paribhutto, pubbepi rukkhadevatāya hutvā paribhuttoyeva, tadāpi cesa
atk-s0513a1:2597_5: maṃ nissāya seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ alatthevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2598_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ ṭhāne eraṇḍarukkhe
atk-s0513a1:2598_1: rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti. Tadā tasmiṃ gāmake manussā devatāmaṅgalikā honti. Athekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2598_2: chaṇe sampatte manussā attano attano rukkhadevatānaṃ balikammaṃ akaṃsu. Atheko duggatamanusso
atk-s0513a1:2598_3: te manusse rukkhadevatā paṭijaggante disvā ekaṃ eraṇḍarukkhaṃ paṭijaggi. Te manussā
atk-s0513a1:2598_4: attano attano devatānaṃ nānappakārāni mālāgandhavilepanādīni ceva khajjabhojjāni
atk-s0513a1:2598_5: ca ādāya gacchiṃsu. So pana kuṇḍakapūvañceva uḷuṅkena ca udakaṃ ādāya gantvā eraṇḍarukkhassa
atk-s0513a1:2598_6: avidūre ṭhatvā cintesi “devatā nāma dibbakhajjakāni khādanti, mayhaṃ devatā imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2598_7: kuṇḍakapūvaṃ na khādissati, kiṃ imaṃ akāraṇena nāsemi, ahameva naṃ khādissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2598_8: tatova nivatti. Bodhisatto khandhaviṭape ṭhatvā “bho purisa, sace tvaṃ issaro bhaveyyāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2598_9: mayhaṃ madhurakhajjakaṃ dadeyyāsi. Tvaṃ pana duggato, ahaṃ tava pūvaṃ na khāditvā
atk-s0513a1:2598_10: aññaṃ kiṃ khādissāmi, mā me koṭṭhāsaṃ nāsehī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2601: Āharetaṃ kuṇḍapūvaṃ, mā me bhāgaṃ vināsayā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2602_0: Tattha yathannoti yathārūpabhojano hoti. Tathannāti tassa purisassa devatāpi tathārūpabhojanāva
atk-s0513a1:2602_1: hoti. Āharetaṃ kuṇḍapūvanti etaṃ kuṇḍakena pakkapūvaṃ ānehi, mayhaṃ bhāgaṃ mā vināsehīti.
atk-s0513a1:2603_0: So nivattitvā bodhisattaṃ oloketvā balikammamakāsi. Bodhisatto tato ojaṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0513a1:2603_1: “purisa, tvaṃ kimatthaṃ maṃ paṭijaggasī”ti āha. “Duggatomhi, sāmi, taṃ nissāya duggatabhāvato
atk-s0513a1:2603_2: muccitukāmatāya paṭijaggāmī”ti. “Bho purisa, mā cintayi, tayā kataññussa katavedino
atk-s0513a1:2603_3: pūjā katā, imaṃ eraṇḍaṃ parikkhipitvā nidhikumbhiyo gīvāya gīvaṃ āhaccaṭhitā. Tvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2603_4: rañño ācikkhitvā sakaṭehi dhanaṃ āharāpetvā rājaṅgaṇe rāsiṃ kārehi, rājā te tussitvā
atk-s0513a1:2603_5: seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ dassatī”ti vatvā bodhisatto antaradhāyi. So tathā akāsi. Rājāpi tassa
atk-s0513a1:2603_6: seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ adāsi. Iti so bodhisattaṃ nissāya mahāsampattiṃ patvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2604: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā duggato etarahi duggatova, eraṇḍarukkhadevatā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2608: Sabbasaṃhārako natthīti ayaṃ sabbasaṃhārakapañho sabbākārena umaṅgajātake āvi bhavissatīti.
atk-s0513a1:2617: Haṃci tuvaṃ evamaññasīti ayampi gadrabhapañho mahāumaṅgajātakeyeva āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2620: Yena sattubilaṅgā cāti ayampi amarādevipañho nāma tattheva āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2623_0: Saddahāsi siṅgālassāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2623_1: Tasmiñhi samaye bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitvā “āvuso, devadattena pañca bhikkhusatāni
atk-s0513a1:2623_2: ādāya gayāsīsaṃ gantvā ‘yaṃ samaṇo gotamo karoti, na so dhammo. Yamahaṃ karomi, ayameva
atk-s0513a1:2623_3: dhammo’ti te bhikkhū attano laddhiṃ gāhāpetvā ṭhānappattaṃ musāvādaṃ katvā saṅghaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2623_4: bhinditvā ekasīmāya dve uposathā katā”ti devadattassa aguṇakathaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2623_5: Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya
atk-s0513a1:2623_6: nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, devadatto idāneva musāvādī, pubbepi musāvādīyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2624_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto susānavane rukkhadevatā hutvā
atk-s0513a1:2624_1: nibbatti. Tadā bārāṇasiyaṃ nakkhattaṃ ghuṭṭhaṃ ahosi. Manussā “yakkhabalikammaṃ karomā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2624_2: tesu tesu caccararacchādiṭṭhānesu macchamaṃsādīni vippakiritvā kapālakesu bahuṃ suraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2624_3: ṭhapayiṃsu. Atheko siṅgālo aḍḍharattasamaye niddhamanena nagaraṃ pavisitvā macchamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2624_4: khāditvā suraṃ pivitvā punnāgagacchantaraṃ pavisitvā yāva aruṇuggamanā niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0513a1:2624_5: So pabujjhitvā ālokaṃ disvā “idāni nikkhamituṃ na sakkā”ti maggasamīpaṃ gantvā adissamāno
atk-s0513a1:2624_6: nipajjitvā aññe manusse disvāpi kiñci avatvā ekaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ mukhadhovanatthāya gacchantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2624_7: disvā cintesi “brāhmaṇā nāma dhanalolā honti, imaṃ dhanena palobhetvā yathā maṃ upakacchakantare
atk-s0513a1:2624_8: katvā uttarāsaṅgena paṭicchādetvā nagarā nīharati, tathā karissāmī”ti. So manussabhāsāya
atk-s0513a1:2624_9: “brāhmaṇā”ti āha. So nivattitvā “ko maṃ pakkosatī”ti āha. “Ahaṃ, brāhmaṇā”ti. “Kiṃkāraṇā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2624_10: “Brāhmaṇa, mayhaṃ dve kahāpaṇasatāni atthi. Sace maṃ upakacchakantare katvā uttarāsaṅgena
atk-s0513a1:2624_11: paṭicchādetvā yathā na koci passati, tathā nagarā nikkhāmetuṃ sakkosi, tuyhaṃ te
atk-s0513a1:2624_12: kahāpaṇe dassāmī”ti. Brāhmaṇo dhanalobhena “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā taṃ tathā katvā
atk-s0513a1:2624_13: ādāya nagarā nikkhamitvā thokaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ siṅgālo pucchi “kataraṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2624_14: brāhmaṇā”ti? “Asukaṃ nāmā”ti. “Aññaṃ thokaṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchā”ti. Evaṃ punappunaṃ vadanto
atk-s0513a1:2624_15: mahāsusānaṃ patvā “idha maṃ otārehī”ti āha. Tattha naṃ otāresi. Atha siṅgālo “tena
atk-s0513a1:2624_16: hi, brāhmaṇa, uttarisāṭakaṃ pattharā”ti āha. So dhanalobhena “sādhū”ti patthari.
atk-s0513a1:2624_17: Atha naṃ “imaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ khaṇāhī”ti pathavikhaṇane yojetvā brāhmaṇassa uttarisāṭakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2624_18: abhiruyha catūsu kaṇṇesu ca majjhe cāti pañcasu ṭhānesu sarīranissandaṃ pātetvā makkhetvā
atk-s0513a1:2624_19: ceva temetvā ca susānavanaṃ pāvisi. Bodhisatto rukkhaviṭape ṭhatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2627: Sippikānaṃ sataṃ natthi, kuto kaṃsasatā duve”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2628_0: Tattha saddahāsīti saddahasi, ayameva vā pāṭho, pattiyāyasīti attho. Sippikānaṃ sataṃ
atk-s0513a1:2628_1: natthīti etassa hi sippikāsatampi natthi. Kuto kaṃsasatā duveti dve kahāpaṇasatāni panassa kuto evāti.
atk-s0513a1:2629_0: Bodhisatto imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā “gaccha, brāhmaṇa, tava sāṭakaṃ dhovitvā nhāyitvā attano
atk-s0513a1:2629_1: kammaṃ karohī”ti vatvā antaradhāyi. Brāhmaṇo tathā katvā “vañcito vatamhī”ti domanassappatto pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2630: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā siṅgālo devadatto ahosi, rukkhadevatā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2634_0: Bahucintī appacintīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dve mahallakatthere ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2634_1: kathesi. Te kira janapade ekasmiṃ araññāvāse vassaṃ vasitvā “satthu dassanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2634_2: gacchissāmā”ti pātheyyaṃ sajjetvā “ajja gacchāma, sve gacchāmā”ti māsaṃ atikkāmetvā
atk-s0513a1:2634_3: puna pātheyyaṃ sajjetvā tatheva māsaṃ, puna māsanti evaṃ attano kusītabhāvena ceva
atk-s0513a1:2634_4: nivāsaṭṭhāne ca apekkhāya tayo māse atikkāmetvā tato nikkhamma jetavanaṃ gantvā sabhāgaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:2634_5: pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā satthāraṃ passiṃsu. Atha ne bhikkhū pucchiṃsu “ciraṃ vo,
atk-s0513a1:2634_6: āvuso, buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ akarontānaṃ, kasmā evaṃ cirāyitthā”ti? Te tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2634_7: Atha nesaṃ so ālasiyakusītabhāvo bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭo jāto. Dhammasabhāyampi tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2634_8: bhikkhūnameva ālasiyabhāvaṃ nissāya kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0513a1:2634_9: bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte te pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2634_10: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, alasā kusītā”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ, bhante”ti vutte
atk-s0513a1:2634_11: “na, bhikkhave, idānevete alasā, pubbepi alasā ceva nivāsaṭṭhāne ca sālayā sāpekkhā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2635_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bārāṇasinadiyaṃ tayo macchā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2635_1: bahucintī, appacintī, mitacintīti tesaṃ nāmāni. Te araññato manussapathaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2635_2: Tattha mitacintī itare dve evamāha “ayaṃ manussapatho nāma sāsaṅko sappaṭibhayo,
atk-s0513a1:2635_3: kevaṭṭā nānappakārāni jālakuminādīni khipitvā macche gaṇhanti, mayaṃ araññameva gacchāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2635_4: Itare dve janā alasatāya ceva āmisagiddhatāya ca “ajja gacchāma, sve gacchāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2635_5: tayo māse atikkāmesuṃ. Atha kevaṭṭā nadiyaṃ jālaṃ khipiṃsu. Bahucintī ca appacintī
atk-s0513a1:2635_6: ca gocaraṃ gaṇhantā purato gacchanti. Te attano andhabālatāya jālagandhaṃ asallakkhetvā
atk-s0513a1:2635_7: jālakucchimeva pavisiṃsu. Mitacintī pacchato āgacchanto jālagandhaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0513a1:2635_8: tesañca jālakucchiṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā “imesaṃ kusītānaṃ andhabālānaṃ jīvitadānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2635_9: dassāmī”ti cintetvā bahipassena jālakucchiṭṭhānaṃ gantvā jālakucchiṃ phāletvā nikkhantasadiso
atk-s0513a1:2635_10: hutvā udakaṃ āluḷento jālassa purato patitvā puna jālakucchiṃ pavisitvā pacchimabhāgena
atk-s0513a1:2635_11: phāletvā nikkhantasadiso udakaṃ āluḷento pacchimabhāge pati. Kevaṭṭā “macchā jālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2635_12: phāletvā gatā”ti maññamānā jālakoṭiyaṃ gahetvā ukkhipiṃsu. Te dvepi macchā jālato
atk-s0513a1:2635_13: muccitvā udake patiṃsu. Iti tehi mitacintiṃ nissāya jīvitaṃ laddhaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2636: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2640_0: Tattha bahucintīti bahucintanatāya vitakkabahulatāya evaṃladdhanāmo. Itaresupi dvīsu
atk-s0513a1:2640_1: ayameva nayo. Ubho tattha samāgatāti mitacintiṃ nissāya laddhajīvitā tattha udake
atk-s0513a1:2640_2: puna ubhopi janā mitacintinā saddhiṃ samāgatāti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2641_0: Evaṃ satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a1:2641_1: mahallakā bhikkhū sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Tadā bahucintī ca appacintī ca ime
atk-s0513a1:2641_2: dve ahesuṃ, mitacintī pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a1:2645_0: Yāyaññe manusāsatīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ anusāsikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2645_1: kathesi. Sā kira sāvatthivāsinī ekā kuladhītā pabbajitvā upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:2645_2: samaṇadhamme ananuyuttā āmisagiddhā hutvā yattha aññā bhikkhuniyo na gacchanti, tādise
atk-s0513a1:2645_3: nagarassa ekadese piṇḍāya carati. Athassā manussā paṇītapiṇḍapātaṃ denti. Sā rasataṇhāya
atk-s0513a1:2645_4: bajjhitvā “sace imasmiṃ padese aññāpi bhikkhuniyo piṇḍāya carissanti, mayhaṃ lābho
atk-s0513a1:2645_5: parihāyissati. Yathā etaṃ padesaṃ aññā nāgacchanti, evaṃ mayā kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:2645_6: bhikkhunūpassayaṃ gantvā “ayye, asukaṭṭhāne caṇḍo hatthī, caṇḍo asso, caṇḍo meṇḍo,
atk-s0513a1:2645_7: caṇḍo kukkuro carati, saparissayaṭṭhānaṃ, mā tattha piṇḍāya caritthā”ti bhikkhuniyo
atk-s0513a1:2645_8: anusāsati. Tassā vacanaṃ sutvā ekā bhikkhunīpi taṃ padesaṃ gīvaṃ parivattetvā na
atk-s0513a1:2645_9: olokesi. Tassā ekasmiṃ divase tasmiṃ padese piṇḍāya carantiyā vegenekaṃ gehaṃ pavisantiyā
atk-s0513a1:2645_10: caṇḍo meṇḍako paharitvā ūruṭṭhikaṃ bhindi. Manussā vegena upadhāvitvā dvidhā bhinnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2645_11: ūruṭṭhikaṃ ekato bandhitvā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ mañcenādāya bhikkhunūpassayaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2645_12: Bhikkhuniyo “ayaṃ aññā bhikkhuniyo anusāsitvā sayaṃ tasmiṃ padese carantī ūruṭṭhikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2645_13: bhindāpetvā āgatā”ti parihāsaṃ akaṃsu. Tampi tāya katakāraṇaṃ na cirasseva bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2646_0: Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū “āvuso, asukā anusāsikā bhikkhunī aññaṃ anusāsitvā
atk-s0513a1:2646_1: sayaṃ tasmiṃ padese caramānā caṇḍena meṇḍakena ūruṃ bhindāpesī”ti tassā aguṇakathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2646_2: kathesuṃ. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a1:2646_3: “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepesā aññe anusāsatiyeva, sayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2646_4: pana na vattati, niccakālaṃ dukkhameva anubhotī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2647_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto araññe sakuṇayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2647_1: vayappatto sakuṇajeṭṭhako hutvā anekasakuṇasahassaparivāro himavantaṃ pāvisi. Tassa
atk-s0513a1:2647_2: tattha vasanakāle ekā caṇḍasakuṇikā mahāvattanimaggaṃ gantvā gocaraṃ gaṇhāti. Sā
atk-s0513a1:2647_3: tattha sakaṭehi patitāni vīhimuggabījādīni labhitvā “yathā idāni imaṃ padesaṃ aññe
atk-s0513a1:2647_4: sakuṇā nāgacchanti, tathā karissāmī”ti cintetvā sakuṇasaṅghassa ovādaṃ deti “vattanimahāmaggo
atk-s0513a1:2647_5: nāma sappaṭibhayo, hatthiassādayo ceva caṇḍagoṇayuttayānādīni ca sañcaranti, sahasā
atk-s0513a1:2647_6: uppatitumpi na sakkā hoti, na tattha gantabba”nti. Sakuṇasaṅgho tassā “anusāsikā”teva nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2648_0: Sā ekadivasaṃ vattanimahāmagge carantī atimahāvegena āgacchantassa yānassa saddaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2648_1: sutvā nivattitvā oloketvā “dūre tāvā”ti caratiyeva. Atha naṃ yānaṃ vātavegena sīghameva
atk-s0513a1:2648_2: sampāpuṇi, sā uṭṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi, cakkena dvidhā chinditvā gatā. Sakuṇajeṭṭhako sakuṇe
atk-s0513a1:2648_3: samānento taṃ adisvā “anusāsikā na dissati, upadhāretha na”nti āha. Sakuṇā upadhārentā
atk-s0513a1:2648_4: taṃ mahāmagge dvidhā chinnaṃ disvā sakuṇajeṭṭhakassa ārocesuṃ. Sakuṇajeṭṭhako “sā
atk-s0513a1:2648_5: aññā sakuṇikā vāretvā sayaṃ tattha caramānā dvidhā chinnā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2651: Sāyaṃ vipakkhikā seti, hatā cakkena sāsikā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2652_0: Tattha yāyaññe manusāsatīti yakāro padasandhikaro, yā aññe anusāsatīti attho. Sayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2652_1: loluppacārinīti attanā loluppacārinī samānā. Sāyaṃ vipakkhikā setīti sā esā vihatapakkhā
atk-s0513a1:2652_2: hutvā mahāmagge sayati. Hatā cakkena sāsikāti yānacakkena hatā sāsikā sakuṇikāti.
atk-s0513a1:2653: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā anusāsikā sakuṇikā ayaṃ anusāsikā bhikkhunī ahosi, sakuṇajeṭṭhako pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2657_0: Atikaramakarācariyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2657_1: kathesi. Tassa vatthu navakanipāte gijjhajātake āvi bhavissati. Satthā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2657_2: āmantetvā “bhikkhu na tvaṃ idāneva dubbaco, pubbepi dubbacoyeva. Dubbacabhāveneva
atk-s0513a1:2657_3: paṇḍitānaṃ ovādaṃ akaronto sattippahārena jīvitakkhayaṃ pattosī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2658_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto laṅghanaṭakayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2658_1: gahetvā vayappatto paññavā upāyakusalo ahosi. So ekassa laṅghanakassa santike sattilaṅghanasippaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2658_2: sikkhitvā ācariyena saddhiṃ sippaṃ dassento vicarati. Ācariyo panassa catunnaṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:2658_3: sattīnaṃ laṅghanasippaṃ jānāti, na pañcannaṃ. So ekadivasaṃ ekasmiṃ gāmake sippaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2658_4: dassento surāmadamatto “pañca sattiyo laṅghissāmī”ti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapesi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0513a1:2658_5: bodhisatto āha “ācariya, tvaṃ pañcasattilaṅghanasippaṃ na jānāsi, ekaṃ sattiṃ hara.
atk-s0513a1:2658_6: Sace laṅghissasi, pañcamāya sattiyā viddho marissasī”ti. So suṭṭhu mattatāya “tvañhi
atk-s0513a1:2658_7: mayhaṃ pamāṇaṃ na jānāsī”ti tassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvā catasso laṅghitvā pañcamāya
atk-s0513a1:2658_8: sattiyā daṇḍake madhukapupphaṃ viya āvuto paridevamāno nipajji. Atha naṃ bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:2658_9: “paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ akatvā imaṃ byasanaṃ pattosī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2662_0: Tattha atikaramakarācariyāti ācariya ajja tvaṃ atikaraṃ akari, attano karaṇato atirekaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2662_1: karaṇaṃ akarīti attho. Mayhampetaṃ na ruccatīti mayhaṃ antevāsikassapi samānassa
atk-s0513a1:2662_2: etaṃ tava karaṇaṃ na ruccati, tena te ahaṃ paṭhamameva kathesinti dīpeti. Catutthe
atk-s0513a1:2662_3: laṅghayitvānāti catutthe sattithale apatitvā attānaṃ laṅghayitvā. Pañcamāyasi āvutoti
atk-s0513a1:2662_4: paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ aggaṇhanto idāni pañcamāya sattiyā āvutosīti. Idaṃ vatvā ācariyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2663: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā ācariyo ayaṃ dubbaco ahosi, antevāsiko pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2667_0: Accuggatātibalatāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kokālikaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Tassa
atk-s0513a1:2667_1: vatthu terasakanipāte takkāriyajātake āvi bhavissati. Satthā pana “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:2667_2: kokāliko idāneva attano vācaṃ nissāya naṭṭho, pubbepi naṭṭhoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2668_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2668_1: vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a1:2668_2: pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesi. Himavantappadese sabbo isigaṇo sannipatitvā
atk-s0513a1:2668_3: taṃ ovādācariyaṃ katvā parivāresi. So pañcannaṃ isisatānaṃ ovādācariyo hutvā jhānakīḷaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2668_4: kīḷanto himavante vasati. Tadā eko cettha paṇḍurogī tāpaso kuṭhāriṃ gahetvā kaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2668_5: phāleti. Atheko mukharatāpaso tassa santike nisīditvā “idha pahāraṃ dehi, idha pahāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2668_6: dehī”ti taṃ tāpasaṃ rosesi. So kujjhitvā “na dāni me tvaṃ dāruphālanasippaṃ sikkhāpanakācariyo”ti
atk-s0513a1:2668_7: tiṇhaṃ kuṭhāriṃ ukkhipitvā naṃ ekappahāreneva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi. Bodhisatto tassa
atk-s0513a1:2668_8: sarīrakiccaṃ kāresi. Tadā assamato avidūre ekasmiṃ vammikapāde eko tittiro vasati.
atk-s0513a1:2668_9: So sāyaṃ pātaṃ tasmiṃ vammikamatthake ṭhatvā mahāvassitaṃ vassati. Taṃ sutvā eko
atk-s0513a1:2668_10: luddako “tittirena bhavitabba”nti cintetvā saddasaññāya tattha gantvā taṃ vadhitvā ādāya gato.
atk-s0513a1:2669_0: Bodhisatto tassa saddaṃ asuṇanto “asukaṭṭhāne tittiro vasati, kiṃ nu kho tassa saddo
atk-s0513a1:2669_1: na sūyatī”ti tāpase pucchi. Te tassa tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. So ubhopi tāni kāraṇāni
atk-s0513a1:2673_0: Tattha accuggatāti atiuggatā. Atibalatāti punappunaṃ bhāsanena atibalasabhāvā. Ativelaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2673_1: pabhāsitāti atikkantavelā pamāṇātikkamena bhāsitā. Tittiraṃ vātivassitanti yathā
atk-s0513a1:2673_2: tittiraṃ ativassitaṃ hanati, tathā evarūpā vācā dummedhaṃ bālapuggalaṃ hanatīti.
atk-s0513a1:2674: Evaṃ bodhisatto isigaṇassa ovādaṃ datvā cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2675_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, kokāliko idāneva attano vacanaṃ nissāya naṭṭho, pubbepi naṭṭhoyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2675_1: vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mukharatāpaso kokāliko
