atk-s0513a1:2675_2: ahosi, isigaṇo buddhaparisā, gaṇasatthā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2679_0: Nācintayanto purisoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uttaraseṭṭhiputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2679_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira uttaraseṭṭhi nāma ahosi mahāvibhavo. Tassa bhariyāya kucchiyaṃ eko
atk-s0513a1:2679_2: puññavā satto brahmalokā cavitvā paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā vayappatto abhirūpo pāsādiko
atk-s0513a1:2679_3: ahosi brahmavaṇṇī. Atha ekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ kattikachaṇe nakkhatte ghuṭṭhe sabbo
atk-s0513a1:2679_4: loko nakkhattanissito ahosi. Tassa sahāyakā aññe seṭṭhiputtā sapajāpatikā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2679_5: Uttaraseṭṭhiputtassa pana dīgharattaṃ brahmaloke vasitattā kilesesu cittaṃ na allīyati.
atk-s0513a1:2679_6: Athassa sahāyakā “uttaraseṭṭhiputtassapi ekaṃ itthiṃ ānetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2679_7: sammantayitvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “samma, imasmiṃ nagare kattikachaṇo ghuṭṭho, tuyhampi
atk-s0513a1:2679_8: ekaṃ itthiṃ ānetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti āhaṃsu. “Na me attho itthiyā”ti ca vuttepi
atk-s0513a1:2679_9: punappunaṃ nibandhitvā sampaṭicchāpetvā ekaṃ vaṇṇadāsiṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2679_10: katvā tassa gharaṃ netvā “tvaṃ seṭṭhiputtassa santikaṃ gacchā”ti sayanigharaṃ pesetvā
atk-s0513a1:2679_11: nikkhamiṃsu. Taṃ sayanigharaṃ paviṭṭhampi seṭṭhiputto neva oloketi, nālapati. Sā
atk-s0513a1:2679_12: cintesi “ayaṃ evaṃ rūpasobhaggappattaṃ uttamavilāsasampannaṃ maṃ neva oloketi, nālapati,
atk-s0513a1:2679_13: idāni naṃ attano itthikuttalīlāya olokāpessāmī”ti itthilīlaṃ dassentī pahaṭṭhākārena
atk-s0513a1:2679_14: aggadante vivaritvā hasitaṃ akāsi. Seṭṭhiputto oloketvā dantaṭṭhike nimittaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:2679_15: Athassa aṭṭhikasaññā uppajji, sakalampi taṃ sarīraṃ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikā viya paññāyi.
atk-s0513a1:2680_0: Taṃ tassa gharā otiṇṇaṃ eko issaro antaravīthiyaṃ disvā paribbayaṃ datvā attano gharaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2680_1: nesi, sattāhe vītivatte nakkhattaṃ ositaṃ. Vaṇṇadāsiyā mātā dhītu āgamanaṃ adisvā
atk-s0513a1:2680_2: seṭṭhiputtānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ sā”ti pucchi. Te uttaraseṭṭhiputtassa gharaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2680_3: gantvā “kahaṃ sā”ti pucchiṃsu. “Taṅkhaṇaññeva tassā paribbayaṃ datvā uyyojesi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2680_4: Athassā mātā rodantī “dhītaraṃ me na passāmi, dhītaraṃ me samānethā”ti uttaraseṭṭhiputtaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2680_5: ādāya rañño santikaṃ agamāsi. Rājā aṭṭaṃ vinicchinanto “ime te seṭṭhiputtā vaṇṇadāsiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2680_6: ānetvā tuyhaṃ adaṃsū”ti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti. “Idāni sā kaha”nti? “Na jānāmi, taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0513a1:2680_7: naṃ uyyojesi”nti. “Idāni taṃ samānetuṃ sakkosī”ti? “Na sakkomi, devā”ti. Rājā “sace
atk-s0513a1:2680_8: samānetuṃ na sakkoti, rājāṇamassa karothā”ti āha. Atha naṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2680_9: “rājāṇaṃ karissāmā”ti gahetvā pakkamiṃsu. “Seṭṭhiputtaṃ kira vaṇṇadāsiṃ samānetuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2680_10: asakkontaṃ rājā rājāṇaṃ kāretī”ti sakalanagaraṃ ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi. Mahājano ure
atk-s0513a1:2680_11: hatthe ṭhapetvā “kiṃ nāmetaṃ, sāmi, attano te ananucchavikaṃ laddha”nti paridevati.
atk-s0513a1:2680_12: Seṭṭhipi puttassa pacchato pacchato paridevanto gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2681_0: Seṭṭhiputto cintesi “idaṃ mayhaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ agāre vasanabhāvena uppannaṃ. Sace
atk-s0513a1:2681_1: ito muccissāmi, mahāgotamasammāsambuddhassa santike pabbajissāmī”ti. Sāpi kho vaṇṇadāsī
atk-s0513a1:2681_2: taṃ kolāhalasaddaṃ sutvā “kiṃsaddo nāmeso”ti pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā vegena
atk-s0513a1:2681_3: otaritvā “ussaratha, ussaratha, sāmī, maṃ rājapurisānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ dethā”ti attānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2681_4: dassesi. Rājapurisā taṃ disvā mātaraṃ paṭicchāpetvā seṭṭhiputtaṃ muñcitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2681_5: So sahāyakaparivutova nadiṃ gantvā sasīsaṃ nhāyitvā gehaṃ gantvā bhuttapātarāso mātāpitaro
atk-s0513a1:2681_6: vanditvā pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā cīvarasāṭake ādāya mahantena parivārena satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2681_7: gantvā vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā avissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhāno
atk-s0513a1:2681_8: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā na cirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2682_0: Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā bhikkhū “āvuso, uttaraseṭṭhiputto attano
atk-s0513a1:2682_1: bhaye uppanne sāsanassa guṇaṃ jānitvā ‘imamhā dukkhā muccamāno pabbajissāmī’ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:2682_2: tena sucintitena maraṇamutto ceva, pabbajito ca aggaphale patiṭṭhito”ti tassa guṇakathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2682_3: kathesuṃ. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a1:2682_4: “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, uttaraseṭṭhiputtova attano bhaye uppanne ‘iminā
atk-s0513a1:2682_5: upāyena imamhā dukkhā muccissāmī’ti cintetvā maraṇabhayā mutto, atīte paṇḍitāpi attano
atk-s0513a1:2682_6: bhaye uppanne ‘iminā upāyena imamhā dukkhā muccissāmā’ti cintetvā maraṇabhayato mucciṃsuyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2683_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto cutipaṭisandhivasena parivattanto
atk-s0513a1:2683_1: vaṭṭakayoniyaṃ nibbatti. Tadā eko vaṭṭakaluddako araññā bahū vaṭṭake āharitvā gehe
atk-s0513a1:2683_2: ṭhapetvā gocaraṃ datvā mūlaṃ gahetvā āgatāgatānaṃ hatthe vaṭṭake vikkiṇanto jīvikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2683_3: kappeti. So ekadivasaṃ bahūhi vaṭṭakehi saddhiṃ bodhisattampi gahetvā ānesi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:2683_4: cintesi “sacāhaṃ iminā dinnaṃ gocarañca pānīyañca paribhuñjissāmi, ayaṃ maṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:2683_5: āgatānaṃ manussānaṃ dassati. Sace pana na paribhuñjissāmi, ahaṃ milāyissāmi, atha
atk-s0513a1:2683_6: maṃ milāyantaṃ disvā manussā na gaṇhissanti. Evaṃ me sotthi bhavissati, imaṃ upāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2683_7: karissāmī”ti. So tathā karonto milāyitvā aṭṭhicammamatto ahosi. Manussā taṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:2683_8: na gaṇhiṃsu. Luddako bodhisattaṃ ṭhapetvā sesesu vaṭṭakesu parikkhīṇesu pacchiṃ nīharitvā
atk-s0513a1:2683_9: dvāre ṭhapetvā bodhisattaṃ hatthatale katvā “kiṃ nu kho ayaṃ vaṭṭako”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:2683_10: oloketuṃ āraddho. Athassa pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā bodhisatto pakkhe pasāretvā uppatitvā
atk-s0513a1:2683_11: araññameva gato. Aññe vaṭṭakā taṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho na paññāyasi, kahaṃ gatosī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2683_12: pucchitvā “luddakena gahitomhī”ti vutte “kinti katvā muttosī”ti pucchiṃsu. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:2683_13: “ahaṃ tena dinnaṃ gocaraṃ aggahetvā pānīyaṃ apivitvā upāyacintāya mutto”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2687_0: Tatthāyaṃ piṇḍattho – puriso dukkhaṃ patvā “iminā nāma upāyena imamhā dukkhā muccissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2687_1: acintayanto attano dukkhā mokkhasaṅkhātaṃ visesaṃ nādhigacchati. Idāni pana mayā
atk-s0513a1:2687_2: cintitakammassa phalaṃ passa. Teneva upāyena muttosmi vadhabandhanā, maraṇato ca
atk-s0513a1:2687_3: bandhanato ca muttosmi ahanti. Evaṃ bodhisatto attanā katakāraṇaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a1:2688: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā maraṇamutto vaṭṭako ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2692_0: Amātāpitarasaṃvaddhoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ akālarāviṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2692_1: kathesi. So kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto sāsane pabbajitvā vattaṃ vā sikkhaṃ vā na
atk-s0513a1:2692_2: uggaṇhi. So “imasmiṃ kāle mayā vattaṃ kātabbaṃ, imasmiṃ kāle upaṭṭhātabbaṃ, imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2692_3: kāle uggahetabbaṃ, imasmiṃ kāle sajjhāyitabba”nti na jānāti, paṭhamayāmepi majjhimayāmepi
atk-s0513a1:2692_4: pacchimayāmepi pabuddhapabuddhakkhaṇeyeva mahāsaddaṃ karoti, bhikkhū niddaṃ na labhanti.
atk-s0513a1:2692_5: Dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū “āvuso, asuko nāma bhikkhu evarūpe ratanasāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a1:2692_6: vattaṃ vā sikkhaṃ vā kālaṃ vā akālaṃ vā na jānātī”ti tassa aguṇakathaṃ kathesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2692_7: Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya
atk-s0513a1:2692_8: nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idānevesa akālarāvī, pubbepi akālarāvīyeva, kālākālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2692_9: ajānanabhāvena ca gīvāya vaṭṭitāya jīvitakkhayaṃ patto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2693_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2693_1: vayappatto sabbasippesu pāraṃ gantvā bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañcasate
atk-s0513a1:2693_2: māṇave sippaṃ vāceti. Tesaṃ māṇavānaṃ eko kālarāvī kukkuṭo atthi, te tassa vassitasaddena
atk-s0513a1:2693_3: uṭṭhāya sippaṃ sikkhanti. So kālamakāsi. Te aññaṃ kukkuṭaṃ pariyesantā caranti. Atheko
atk-s0513a1:2693_4: māṇavako susānavane dārūni uddharanto ekaṃ kukkuṭaṃ disvā ānetvā pañjare ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:2693_5: paṭijaggati. So susāne vaḍḍhitattā “asukavelāya nāma vassitabba”nti ajānanto kadāci
atk-s0513a1:2693_6: atirattiṃ vassati, kadāci aruṇuggamane. Māṇavā tassa atirattiṃ vassitakāle sippaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2693_7: sikkhantā yāva aruṇuggamanā sikkhituṃ na sakkonti, niddāyamānā gahitaṭṭhānampi na
atk-s0513a1:2693_8: passanti. Atipabhāte vassitakāle sajjhāyassa okāsameva na labhanti. Māṇavā “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2693_9: atirattiṃ vā vassati atipabhāte vā, imaṃ nissāya amhākaṃ sippaṃ na niṭṭhāyissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2693_10: taṃ gahetvā gīvaṃ vaṭṭetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā “akālarāvī kukkuṭo amhehi ghātito”ti
atk-s0513a1:2693_11: ācariyassa kathesuṃ. Ācariyo “ovādaṃ aggahetvā saṃvaḍḍhitabhāvena maraṇaṃ patto”ti
atk-s0513a1:2696: Nāyaṃ kālaṃ akālaṃ vā, abhijānāti kukkuṭo”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2697_0: Tattha amātāpitarasaṃvaddhoti mātāpitaro nissāya tesaṃ ovādaṃ aggahetvā saṃvaḍḍho.
atk-s0513a1:2697_1: Anācerakule vasanti ācariyakulepi avasamāno, ācārasikkhāpakaṃ kañci nissāya avasitattāti
atk-s0513a1:2697_2: attho. Nāyaṃ kālaṃ akālaṃ vāti “imasmiṃ kāle vassitabbaṃ, imasmiṃ na vassitabba”nti
atk-s0513a1:2697_3: evaṃ vassitabbayuttakaṃ kālaṃ vā akālaṃ vā esa kukkuṭo na jānāti, ajānanabhāveneva
atk-s0513a1:2697_4: jīvitakkhayaṃ pattoti. Idaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetvā bodhisatto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2698: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā akālarāvī kukkuṭo ayaṃ bhikkhu ahosi, antevāsikā buddhaparisā, ācariyo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2702_0: Abaddhā tattha bajjhantīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ciñcamāṇavikaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2702_1: kathesi. Tassā vatthu dvādasakanipāte mahāpadumajātake āvi bhavissati. Tadā pana
atk-s0513a1:2702_2: satthā “na, bhikkhave, ciñcamāṇavikā idāneva maṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhati, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:2703_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto purohitassa gehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2703_1: vayappatto pitu accayena tasseva purohito ahosi. Tena aggamahesiyā varo dinno hoti
atk-s0513a1:2703_2: “bhadde, yaṃ icchasi, taṃ vadeyyāsī”ti. Sā evamāha “na mayhaṃ añño varo nāma dullabho,
atk-s0513a1:2703_3: ito pana te paṭṭhāya aññā itthī kilesavasena na oloketabbā”ti. So paṭikkhipitvā punappunaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2703_4: nippīḷiyamāno tassā vacanaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkonto sampaṭicchitvā tato paṭṭhāya soḷasasu
atk-s0513a1:2704_0: Athassa paccanto kuppi, paccante ṭhitā yodhā corehi saddhiṃ dve tayo saṅgāme katvā
atk-s0513a1:2704_1: “ito uttari mayaṃ na sakkomā”ti rañño paṇṇaṃ pesesuṃ. Rājā tattha gantukāmo balakāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2704_2: saṃharitvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “bhadde, ahaṃ paccantaṃ gacchāmi, tattha nānappakārāni
atk-s0513a1:2704_3: yuddhāni honti, jayaparājayopi anibaddho, tādisesu ṭhānesu mātugāmo dupparihāro,
atk-s0513a1:2704_4: tvaṃ idheva nivattāhī”ti āha. Sā “na sakkā, deva, mayā nivattitu”nti punappunaṃ raññā
atk-s0513a1:2704_5: paṭikkhittā āha “tena hi ekekaṃ yojanaṃ gantvā mayhaṃ sukhadukkhajānanatthaṃ ekekaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2704_6: manussaṃ peseyyāthā”ti. Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā bodhisattaṃ nagare ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:2704_7: mahantena balakāyena nikkhamitvā gacchanto yojane yojane ekekaṃ purisaṃ “amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2704_8: ārogyaṃ ārocetvā deviyā sukhadukkhaṃ jānitvā āgacchā”ti pesesi. Sā āgatāgataṃ purisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2704_9: “rājā kimatthaṃ taṃ pesetī”ti pucchitvā “tumhākaṃ sukhadukkhajānanatthāyā”ti vutte
atk-s0513a1:2704_10: “tena hi ehī”ti tena saddhiṃ asaddhammaṃ paṭisevati. Rājā dvattiṃsayojanamaggaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0513a1:2704_11: dvattiṃsa jane pesesi, sā sabbehipi tehi saddhiṃ tatheva akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2705_0: Rājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā janapadaṃ samassāsetvā puna āgacchantopi tatheva dvattiṃsa
atk-s0513a1:2705_1: jane pesesi, sā tehipi saddhiṃ tatheva vippaṭipajjiyeva. Rājā āgantvā jayakkhandhāvāraṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:2705_2: ṭhatvā “nagaraṃ paṭijaggāpetū”ti bodhisattassa paṇṇaṃ pesesi. Bodhisatto sakalanagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2705_3: paṭijaggāpetvā rājanivesanaṃ paṭijaggāpento deviyā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Sā bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a1:2705_4: rūpasobhaggappattaṃ kāyaṃ disvā saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontī “ehi, brāhmaṇa, sayanaṃ abhiruhā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2705_5: āha. Bodhisatto “mā evaṃ avaca, rājāpi garu, akusalampi bhāyāmi, na sakkā mayā evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2705_6: kātu”nti āha. “Catusaṭṭhiyā pādamūlikānaṃ neva rājā garu, na akusalaṃ bhāyanti. Taveva
atk-s0513a1:2705_7: rājā garu, tvaṃyeva ca akusalaṃ bhāyasī”ti. “Āma, devi, sace tesampi evaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0513a1:2705_8: na evarūpaṃ kareyyuṃ”. “Ahaṃ pana jānamāno evarūpaṃ sāhasiyakammaṃ na karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2705_9: “Kiṃ bahuṃ vippalapasi, sace me vacanaṃ na karosi, sīsaṃ te chindāpessāmī”ti. “Tiṭṭhatu
atk-s0513a1:2705_10: tāva ekasmiṃ attabhāve sīsaṃ, attabhāvasahassepi sīse chijjante na sakkā mayā evarūpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2705_11: kātu”nti. Sā “hotu, jānissāmī”ti bodhisattaṃ tajjetvā attano gabbhaṃ pavisitvā sarīre
atk-s0513a1:2705_12: nakhavaḷañjaṃ dassetvā telena gattāni abbhañjitvā kiliṭṭhavatthaṃ nivāsetvā gilānālayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2705_13: katvā dāsiyo āṇāpesi ‘raññā kahaṃ devī’ti vutte ‘gilānā’ti katheyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2706_0: Bodhisattopi rañño paṭipathaṃ agamāsi. Rājā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pāsādaṃ āruyha
atk-s0513a1:2706_1: deviṃ apassanto “kahaṃ, devī”ti pucchi. “Gilānā, devā”ti. Sopi sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:2706_2: tassā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjanto “kiṃ te, bhadde, aphāsuka”nti pucchi. Sā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2706_3: Tatiyavāre rājānaṃ oloketvā “tvampi, mahārāja, jīvasi nāma, mādisāpi itthiyo sassāmikāyeva
atk-s0513a1:2706_4: nāmā”ti āha. “Kiṃ etaṃ, bhadde”ti? Tumhehi nagaraṃ rakkhanatthāya ṭhapito purohito
atk-s0513a1:2706_5: “tumhākaṃ nivesanaṃ paṭijaggāmī”ti idhāgantvā attano vacanaṃ akarontiṃ maṃ paharitvā
atk-s0513a1:2706_6: attano manaṃ pūretvā gatoti. Rājā aggimhi pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya kodhena taṭataṭāyanto
atk-s0513a1:2706_7: sirigabbhā nikkhamitvā dovārikapādamūlikādayo pakkosāpetvā “gacchatha, bhaṇe, purohitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2706_8: pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā vajjhabhāvappattaṃ katvā nagarā nīharitvā āghātanaṃ netvā sīsamassa
atk-s0513a1:2706_9: chindathā”ti āha. Te vegena gantvā taṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā vajjhabheriṃ carāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2707_0: Bodhisatto cintesi – “addhā tāya duṭṭhadeviyā rājā puretarameva paribhinno, ajja
atk-s0513a1:2707_1: dānāhaṃ attano baleneva attānaṃ mocessāmī”ti. So te purise āha “bho, tumhe maṃ mārentā
atk-s0513a1:2707_2: rañño dassetvāva mārethā”ti. “Kiṃkāraṇā”ti? “Ahaṃ rājakammiko, bahu me kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2707_3: bahūni mahānidhiṭṭhānāni jānāmi, rājakuṭumbaṃ mayā vicāritaṃ. Sace maṃ rañño na dassessatha,
atk-s0513a1:2707_4: bahudhanaṃ nassissati, mayā rañño sāpateyye ācikkhite pacchā kātabbaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2707_5: Te taṃ rañño dassayiṃsu. Rājā taṃ disvāva “kasmā bho, brāhmaṇa, mayi lajjaṃ na akāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2707_6: kasmā te evarūpaṃ pāpakammaṃ kata”nti āha. “Mahārāja, ahaṃ sotthiyakule jāto, mayā
atk-s0513a1:2707_7: kunthakipillikamattopi pāṇātipāto na katapubbo, tiṇasalākamattampi adinnaṃ nādinnapubbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2707_8: lobhavasena paresaṃ itthī akkhīni ummīletvāpi na olokitapubbā, hassavasenāpi musā
atk-s0513a1:2707_9: na bhāsitapubbā, kusaggenāpi majjaṃ na pītapubbaṃ, ahaṃ tumhesu niraparādho. Sā pana
atk-s0513a1:2707_10: bālā lobhavasena maṃ hatthe gahetvā mayā paṭikkhittā maṃ tajjetvā attanā kataṃ pāpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2707_11: uttānaṃ katvā mama ācikkhitvā antogabbhaṃ paviṭṭhā. Ahaṃ niraparādho, paṇṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:2707_12: pana āgatā catusaṭṭhi janā sāparādhā, te pakkosāpetvā “tāya vo vacanaṃ kataṃ, na
atk-s0513a1:2707_13: kata”nti puccha, devāti. Rājā te catusaṭṭhi jane bandhāpetvā deviṃ pakkosāpetvā “tayā
atk-s0513a1:2707_14: etehi saddhiṃ pāpaṃ kataṃ, na kata”nti pucchi. “Kataṃ, devā”ti vutte te pacchābāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2708_0: Atha naṃ bodhisatto āha – “natthi, mahārāja, etesaṃ doso, devī attano ruciṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2708_1: Niraparādhā ete, tasmā nesaṃ khamatha. Tassāpi doso natthi, itthiyo nāma methunadhammena
atk-s0513a1:2708_2: atittā. Jātisabhāvo hi esa. Etāsaṃ khamitabbayuttameva hoti. Tasmā etissāpi khamathā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2708_3: nānappakārena rājānaṃ saññāpetvā te catusaṭṭhipi jane tañca bālaṃ mocāpetvā sabbesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2708_4: yathāsakāni ṭhānāni dāpesi. Evaṃ te sabbe mocetvā sakaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhāpetvā bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:2708_5: rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “mahārāja, andhabālānaṃ nāma avatthukena vacanena abandhitabbayuttakāpi
atk-s0513a1:2708_6: paṇḍitā pacchābāhaṃ baddhā, paṇḍitānaṃ kāraṇayuttena vacanena pacchābāhaṃ baddhāpi
atk-s0513a1:2708_7: muttā. Evaṃ bālā nāma abandhitabbayuttakepi bandhāpenti, paṇḍitā baddhepi mocentī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2711: Baddhāpi tattha muccanti, yattha dhīrā pabhāsare”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2712: Tattha abaddhāti abandhitabbayuttā. Pabhāsareti pabhāsanti vadanti kathenti.
atk-s0513a1:2713_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto imāya gāthāya rañño dhammaṃ desetvā “mayā imaṃ dukkhaṃ agāre vasanabhāvena
atk-s0513a1:2713_1: laddhaṃ, idāni me agārena kiccaṃ natthi, pabbajjaṃ me anujāna, devā”ti pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2713_2: anujānāpetvā assumukhaṃ ñātijanaṃ mahantañca vibhavaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a1:2713_3: himavante vasanto abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2714: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā duṭṭhadevī ciñcamāṇavikā ahosi, rājā ānando, purohito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2724_0: Kare sarikkhoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikassa mittaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2724_1: Anāthapiṇḍikassa hi mittasuhajjañātibandhavā ekato hutvā “mahāseṭṭhi ayaṃ tayā jātigottadhanadhaññādīhi
atk-s0513a1:2724_2: neva sadiso, na uttaritaro, kasmā etena saddhiṃ santhavaṃ karosi, mā karohī”ti punappunaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2724_3: nivāresuṃ. Anāthapiṇḍiko pana “mittasanthavo nāma hīnehipi samehipi atirekehipi kattabboyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2724_4: tesaṃ vacanaṃ aggahetvā bhogagāmaṃ gacchanto taṃ kuṭumbarakkhakaṃ katvā agamāsīti
atk-s0513a1:2724_5: sabbaṃ kāḷakaṇṇivatthusmiṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idha pana anāthapiṇḍikena attano
atk-s0513a1:2724_6: ghare pavattiyā ārocitāya satthā “gahapati, mitto nāma khuddako natthi, mittadhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2724_7: rakkhituṃ samatthabhāvovettha pamāṇaṃ, mitto nāma attanā samopi hīnopi seṭṭhopi gahetabbo.
atk-s0513a1:2724_8: Sabbepi hete attano pattabhāraṃ nittharantiyeva, idāni tāva tvaṃ attano nīcamittaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2724_9: nissāya kuṭumbassa sāmiko jāto, porāṇā pana nīcamittaṃ nissāya vimānasāmikā jātā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2725_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto rañño uyyāne kusanāḷigacche
atk-s0513a1:2725_1: devatā hutvā nibbatti. Tasmiṃyeva ca uyyāne maṅgalasilaṃ nissāya ujugatakkhandho
atk-s0513a1:2725_2: parimaṇḍalasākhāviṭapasampanno rañño santikā laddhasammāno rucamaṅgalarukkho atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2725_3: “mukhako”tipi vuccati. Tasmiṃ eko mahesakkho devarājā nibbatti. Bodhisattassa tena
atk-s0513a1:2725_4: saddhiṃ mittasanthavo ahosi. Tadā rājā ekasmiṃ ekatthambhake pāsāde vasati, tassa
atk-s0513a1:2725_5: so thambho cali. Athassa calitabhāvaṃ rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā vaḍḍhakī pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2725_6: “tātā, mama ekatthambhakassa maṅgalapāsādassa thambho calito, ekaṃ sāratthambhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2725_7: āharitvā taṃ niccalaṃ karothā”ti āha. Te “sādhu, devā”ti rañño vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a1:2725_8: tadanucchavikaṃ rukkhaṃ pariyesamānā aññattha adisvā uyyānaṃ pavisitvā taṃ mukhakarukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2725_9: disvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ, tātā, diṭṭho vo tadanucchaviko rukkho”ti vutte
atk-s0513a1:2725_10: “diṭṭho, deva, apica taṃ chindituṃ na visahāmā”ti āhaṃsu. “Kiṃkāraṇā”ti? Mayañhi
atk-s0513a1:2725_11: aññattha rukkhaṃ apassantā uyyānaṃ pavisimha, tatrapi ṭhapetvā maṅgalarukkhaṃ aññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2725_12: na passāma. Iti naṃ maṅgalarukkhatāya chindituṃ na visahāmāti. Gacchatha, taṃ chinditvā
atk-s0513a1:2725_13: pāsādaṃ thiraṃ karotha, mayaṃ aññaṃ maṅgalarukkhaṃ karissāmāti. Te “sādhū”ti balikammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2725_14: gahetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā “sve chindissāmā”ti rukkhassa balikammaṃ katvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2726_0: Rukkhadevatā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “sve mayhaṃ vimānaṃ nāsessanti, dārake gahetvā kuhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2726_1: gamissāmī”ti gantabbaṭṭhānaṃ apassantī puttake gīvāya gahetvā parodi. Tassā sandiṭṭhasambhattā
atk-s0513a1:2726_2: rukkhadevatā āgantvā “kiṃ eta”nti pucchitvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā sayampi vaḍḍhakīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2726_3: paṭikkamanūpāyaṃ apassantiyo taṃ parissajitvā rodituṃ ārabhiṃsu. Tasmiṃ samaye bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:2726_4: “rukkhadevataṃ passissāmī”ti tattha gantvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā “hotu, mā cintayittha,
atk-s0513a1:2726_5: ahaṃ rukkhaṃ chindituṃ na dassāmi, sve vaḍḍhakīnaṃ āgatakāle mama kāraṇaṃ passathā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2726_6: tā devatā samassāsetvā punadivase vaḍḍhakīnaṃ āgatavelāya kakaṇṭakavesaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:2726_7: vaḍḍhakīnaṃ purato gantvā maṅgalarukkhassa mūlantaraṃ pavisitvā taṃ rukkhaṃ susiraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2726_8: viya katvā rukkhamajjhena abhiruhitvā khandhamatthakena nikkhamitvā sīsaṃ kampayamāno
atk-s0513a1:2726_9: nipajji. Mahāvaḍḍhakī taṃ kakaṇṭakaṃ disvā rukkhaṃ hatthena paharitvā “susirarukkho
atk-s0513a1:2726_10: eso nissāro, hiyyo anupadhāretvāva balikammaṃ karimhā”ti ekaghanaṃ mahārukkhaṃ garahitvā
atk-s0513a1:2726_11: pakkāmi. Rukkhadevatā bodhisattaṃ nissāya vimānassa sāminī jātā.
atk-s0513a1:2727_0: Tassā paṭisanthāratthāya sandiṭṭhasambhattā bahū devatā sannipatiṃsu. Rukkhadevatā
atk-s0513a1:2727_1: “vimānaṃ me laddha”nti tuṭṭhacittā tāsaṃ devatānaṃ majjhe bodhisattassa guṇaṃ kathayamānā
atk-s0513a1:2727_2: “bho, devatā, mayaṃ mahesakkhā hutvāpi dandhapaññatāya imaṃ upāyaṃ na jānimha, kusanāḷidevatā
atk-s0513a1:2727_3: pana attano ñāṇasampattiyā amhe vimānasāmike akāsi, mitto nāma sadisopi adhikopi
atk-s0513a1:2727_4: hīnopi kattabbova. Sabbepi hi attano thāmena sahāyakānaṃ uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ nittharitvā
atk-s0513a1:2727_5: sukhe patiṭṭhāpentiyevā”ti mittadhammaṃ vaṇṇetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2729: “Kare sarikkho atha vāpi seṭṭho, nihīnako vāpi kareyya eko;
atk-s0513a1:2730: Kareyyumete byasane uttamatthaṃ, yathā ahaṃ kusanāḷi rucāya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2731_0: Tattha kare sarikkhoti jātiādīhi sadisopi mittadhammaṃ kareyya. Atha vāpi seṭṭhoti
atk-s0513a1:2731_1: jātiādīhi adhikopi kareyya. Nihīnako vāpi kareyya ekoti eko jātiādīhi hīnopi mittadhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2731_2: kareyya. Tasmā sabbepi ete mittā kātabbāyevāti dīpeti. Kiṃkāraṇā? Kareyyumete byasane
atk-s0513a1:2731_3: uttamatthanti sabbepete sahāyassa byasane uppanne attano attano pattabhāraṃ vahamānā
atk-s0513a1:2731_4: uttamatthaṃ kareyyuṃ, kāyikacetasikadukkhato taṃ sahāyakaṃ moceyyumevāti attho. Tasmā
atk-s0513a1:2731_5: hīnopi mitto kātabboyeva, pageva itare. Tatridaṃ opammaṃ – yathā ahaṃ kusanāḷi rucāyanti,
atk-s0513a1:2731_6: yathā ahaṃ rucāyaṃ nibbattadevatā ayañca kusanāḷidevatā, appesakkhāpi mittasanthavaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2731_7: karimha, tatrapāhaṃ mahesakkhāpi samānā attano uppannadukkhaṃ bālatāya anupāyakusalatāya
atk-s0513a1:2731_8: harituṃ nāsakkhiṃ, imaṃ pana appesakkhampi samānaṃ paṇḍitadevataṃ nissāya dukkhato
atk-s0513a1:2731_9: muttomhi. Tasmā aññehipi dukkhā muccitukāmehi samavisiṭṭhabhāvaṃ anoloketvā hīnopi
atk-s0513a1:2732: Rucādevatā imāya gāthāya devasaṅghassa dhammaṃ desetvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā saddhiṃ kusanāḷidevatāya yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:2733: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rucādevatā ānando ahosi, kusanāḷidevatā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2737_0: Yasaṃ laddhāna dummedhoti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2737_4: oloketvā cittaṃ pasādetuṃ na sakkoti, usūyameva karoti. ‘Buddhā nāma evarūpena sīlena
atk-s0513a1:2737_5: samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena samannāgatā’ti vuccamāne vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2737_6: sahituṃ na sakkoti, usūyameva karotī”ti devadattassa aguṇakathaṃ kathayiṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0513a1:2737_7: āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2737_8: vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva devadatto mama vaṇṇe bhaññamāne usūyaṃ karoti, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:2738_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahanagare ekasmiṃ magadharāje rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:2738_1: hatthiyoniyaṃ nibbattitvā sabbaseto ahosi heṭṭhā vaṇṇitasadisāya rūpasampattiyā samannāgato.
atk-s0513a1:2738_2: Atha naṃ “lakkhaṇasampanno aya”nti so rājā maṅgalahatthiṃ akāsi. Athekasmiṃ chaṇadivase
atk-s0513a1:2738_3: sakalanagaraṃ devanagaraṃ viya alaṅkārāpetvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ maṅgalahatthiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2738_4: abhiruhitvā mahantena rājānubhāvena nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi. Mahājano tattha tattha
atk-s0513a1:2738_5: ṭhatvā maṅgalahatthino rūpasobhaggappattaṃ sarīraṃ disvā “aho rūpaṃ, aho gati, aho
atk-s0513a1:2738_6: līḷā, aho lakkhaṇasampatti, evarūpo nāma sabbasetavaravāraṇo cakkavattirañño anucchaviko”ti
atk-s0513a1:2739_0: Rājā maṅgalahatthissa vaṇṇaṃ sutvā sahituṃ asakkonto usūyaṃ uppādetvā “ajjeva taṃ
atk-s0513a1:2739_1: pabbatapāde pātetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessāmī”ti hatthācariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā “kinti
atk-s0513a1:2739_2: katvā tayā ayaṃ nāgo sikkhāpito”ti āha. “Susikkhāpito, devā”ti. “Na susikkhito, dusikkhito”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2739_3: “Susikkhito, devā”ti. “Yadi susikkhito, sakkhissasi naṃ vepullapabbatamatthakaṃ āropetu”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2739_4: “Āma, devā”ti. “Tena hi ehī”ti sayaṃ otaritvā hatthācariyaṃ āropetvā pabbatapādaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2739_5: gantvā hatthācariyena hatthipiṭṭhiyaṃ nisīditvāva hatthimhi vepullapabbatamatthakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2739_6: āropite sayampi amaccagaṇaparivuto pabbatamatthakaṃ abhiruhitvā hatthiṃ papātābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2739_7: kāretvā “tvaṃ ‘mayā esa susikkhāpito’ti vadesi, tīhiyeva tāva naṃ pādehi ṭhapehī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2739_8: āha. Hatthācariyo piṭṭhiyaṃ nisīditvāva “bho tīhi pādehi tiṭṭhā”ti hatthissa paṇhikāya
atk-s0513a1:2739_9: saññaṃ adāsi, mahāsatto tathā akāsi. Puna rājā “dvīhi purimapādehiyeva ṭhapehī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2739_10: āha, mahāsatto dve pacchimapāde ukkhipitvā purimapādehi aṭṭhāsi. “Pacchimapādehiyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2739_11: vuttepi dve purimapāde ukkhipitvā pacchimapādehi aṭṭhāsi, “ekenā”ti vuttepi tayo
atk-s0513a1:2739_12: pāde ukkhipitvā ekeneva aṭṭhāsi. Athassa apatanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sace pahosi, ākāse naṃ ṭhapehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2740_0: Ācariyo cintesi – “sakalajambudīpe iminā sadiso susikkhito hatthī nāma natthi, nissaṃsayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2740_1: panetaṃ esa papāte pātetvā māretukāmo bhavissatī”ti. So tassa kaṇṇamūle mantesi “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2740_2: ayaṃ rājā taṃ papāte pātetvā māretukāmo, na tvaṃ etassa anucchaviko. Sace te ākāsena
atk-s0513a1:2740_3: gantuṃ balaṃ atthi, maṃ yathānisinnaṃyeva ādāya vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā bārāṇasiṃ gacchā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2740_4: Puññiddhiyā samannāgato mahāsatto taṅkhaṇaññeva ākāse aṭṭhāsi. Hatthācariyo “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2740_5: ayaṃ hatthī puññiddhiyā samannāgato, na tādisassa mandapuññassa dubbuddhino anucchaviko,
atk-s0513a1:2740_6: paṇḍitassa puññasampannassa rañño anucchaviko, tādisā nāma mandapuññā evarūpaṃ vāhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2740_7: labhitvā tassa guṇaṃ ajānantā tañceva vāhanaṃ avasesañca yasasampattiṃ nāsentiyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2744_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – mahārāja, tādiso dummedho nippañño puggalo parivārasampattiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2744_1: labhitvā attano anatthaṃ carati. Kiṃkāraṇā? So hi yasamadamatto kattabbākattabbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2744_2: ajānanto attano ca paresañca hiṃsāya paṭipajjati. Hiṃsā vuccati kilamanaṃ dukkhuppādanaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2745_0: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya rañño dhammaṃ desetvā “tiṭṭha dāni tva”nti vatvā ākāse uppatitvā
atk-s0513a1:2745_1: bārāṇasinagaraṃ gantvā rājaṅgaṇe ākāse aṭṭhāsi. Sakalanagaraṃ saṅkhubhitvā “amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2745_2: rañño ākāsena setavaravāraṇo āgantvā rājaṅgaṇe ṭhito”ti ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi. Vegena
atk-s0513a1:2745_3: raññopi ārocesuṃ. Rājā nikkhamitvā “sace mayhaṃ upabhogatthāya āgatosi, bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2745_4: patiṭṭhāhī”ti āha. Bodhisatto bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi, ācariyo otaritvā rājānaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0513a1:2745_5: “kuto āgatosi, tātā”ti vutte “rājagahato”ti vatvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Rājā “manāpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2745_6: te, tāta, kataṃ idhāgacchantenā”ti tuṭṭhahaṭṭho nagaraṃ sajjāpetvā vāraṇaṃ maṅgalahatthiṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:2745_7: ṭhapetvā sakalarajjaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse katvā ekaṃ bodhisattassa adāsi, ekaṃ ācariyassa,
atk-s0513a1:2745_8: ekaṃ attanā aggahesi. Bodhisattassa āgatakālato paṭṭhāyeva pana rañño sakalajambudīpe
atk-s0513a1:2745_9: rajjaṃ hatthagatameva jātaṃ. So jambudīpe aggarājā hutvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2746: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā magadharājā devadatto ahosi, bārāṇasirājā sāriputto, hatthācariyo ānando, hatthī pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2750_0: Asabbatthagāmiṃ vācanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lāḷudāyittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2750_1: So kira dhammaṃ kathento “imasmiṃ ṭhāne idaṃ kathetabbaṃ, imasmiṃ ṭhāne idaṃ na kathetabba”nti
atk-s0513a1:2750_2: yuttāyuttaṃ na jānāti, maṅgale avamaṅgalaṃ vadanto “tirokuṭṭesu tiṭṭhanti, sandhisiṅghāṭakesu
atk-s0513a1:2750_3: cā”ti idaṃ avamaṅgalaṃ maṅgalaṃ katvā anumodanaṃ katheti. Avamaṅgalesu anumodanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2750_4: karonto “bahū devā manussā ca, maṅgalāni acintayu”nti vatvā “evarūpānaṃ maṅgalānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2750_5: satampi sahassampi kātuṃ samatthā hothā”ti vadati. Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū
atk-s0513a1:2750_6: “āvuso, lāḷudāyī yuttāyuttaṃ na jānāti, sabbattha abhāsitabbavācaṃ bhāsatī”ti kathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2750_7: samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2750_8: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, lāḷudāyī idāneva dandhaparisakkano
atk-s0513a1:2750_9: yuttāyuttaṃ na jānāti, pubbepi evarūpo ahosi, niccaṃ lāḷakoyeva eso”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2751_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2751_1: vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho ācariyo
atk-s0513a1:2751_2: hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni sippaṃ vācesi. Tadā tesu māṇavesu eko dandhaparisakkano
atk-s0513a1:2751_3: lāḷako māṇavo dhammantevāsiko hutvā sippaṃ uggaṇhāti, dandhabhāvena pana uggaṇhituṃ
atk-s0513a1:2751_4: na sakkoti. Bodhisattassa pana upakāro hoti, dāso viya sabbakiccāni karoti. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2751_5: bodhisatto sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā sayane nipanno taṃ māṇavaṃ hatthapādapiṭṭhiparikammāni
atk-s0513a1:2751_6: katvā gacchantaṃ āha “tāta, mañcapāde upatthambhetvā yāhī”ti. Māṇavo ekaṃ pādaṃ upatthambhetvā
atk-s0513a1:2751_7: ekassa upatthambhakaṃ alabhanto attano ūrumhi ṭhapetvā rattiṃ khepesi.
atk-s0513a1:2752_0: Bodhisatto paccūsasamaye uṭṭhāya taṃ disvā “kiṃ, tāta, nisinnosī”ti pucchi. “Ācariya,
atk-s0513a1:2752_1: ekassa mañcapādassa upatthambhakaṃ alabhanto ūrumhi ṭhapetvā nisinnomhī”ti. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:2752_2: saṃviggamānaso hutvā “ayaṃ ati viya mayhaṃ upakāro, ettakānaṃ pana māṇavakānaṃ antare
atk-s0513a1:2752_3: ayameva dandho sippaṃ sikkhituṃ na sakkoti, kathaṃ nu kho ahaṃ imaṃ paṇḍitaṃ kareyya”nti
atk-s0513a1:2752_4: cintesi. Athassa etadahosi “attheko upāyo, ahaṃ imaṃ māṇavaṃ dāruatthāya paṇṇatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2752_5: ca vanaṃ gantvā āgataṃ ‘ajja te kiṃ diṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ kata’nti pucchissāmi. Atha me ‘idaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2752_6: nāma ajja mayā diṭṭhaṃ, idaṃ kata’nti ācikkhissati. Atha naṃ ‘tayā diṭṭhañca katañca
atk-s0513a1:2752_7: kīdisa’nti pucchissāmi, so ‘evarūpaṃ nāmā’ti upamāya ca kāraṇena ca kathessati. Iti
atk-s0513a1:2752_8: naṃ navaṃ navaṃ upamañca kāraṇañca kathāpetvā iminā upāyena paṇḍitaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2752_9: So taṃ pakkosāpetvā “tāta māṇava, ito paṭṭhāya dāruatthāya vā paṇṇatthāya vā gataṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a1:2752_10: yaṃ te tattha diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā bhuttaṃ vā pītaṃ vā khāditaṃ vā hoti, taṃ āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:2753_0: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā ekadivasaṃ māṇavehi saddhiṃ dāruatthāya araññaṃ gato tattha
atk-s0513a1:2753_1: sappaṃ disvā āgantvā “ācariya, sappo me diṭṭho”ti ārocesi. “Sappo nāma, tāta, kīdiso
atk-s0513a1:2753_2: hotī”ti? “Seyyathāpi naṅgalīsā”ti. “Sādhu, tāta, manāpā te upamā āhaṭā, sappā nāma
atk-s0513a1:2753_3: naṅgalīsasadisāva hontī”ti. Atha bodhisatto “māṇavakena manāpā upamā āhaṭā, sakkhissāmi
atk-s0513a1:2753_4: naṃ paṇḍitaṃ kātu”nti cintesi. Māṇavo puna ekadivasaṃ araññe hatthiṃ disvā “hatthī
atk-s0513a1:2753_5: me ācariya diṭṭho”ti āha. “Hatthī nāma, tāta, kīdiso”ti? “Seyyathāpi, naṅgalīsā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2753_6: Bodhisatto “hatthissa soṇḍā naṅgalīsasadisā honti, dantādayo evarūpā ca evarūpā ca.
atk-s0513a1:2753_7: Ayaṃ pana bālatāya vibhajitvā kathetuṃ asakkonto soṇḍaṃ sandhāya kathesi maññe”ti
atk-s0513a1:2753_8: tuṇhī ahosi. Athekadivasaṃ nimantane ucchuṃ labhitvā “ācariya, ajja mayaṃ ucchu khādimhā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2753_9: āha. “Ucchu nāma kīdiso”ti vutte “seyyathāpi naṅgalīsā”ti āha. Ācariyo “thokaṃ patirūpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2754_0: Punekadivasaṃ nimantane ekacce māṇavā guḷaṃ dadhinā bhuñjiṃsu, ekacce khīrena. So
atk-s0513a1:2754_1: āgantvā “ācariya, ajja mayaṃ dadhinā khīrena ca bhuñjimhā”ti vatvā “dadhikhīraṃ nāma
atk-s0513a1:2754_2: kīdisaṃ hotī”ti vutte “seyyathāpi naṅgalīsā”ti āha. Ācariyo “ayaṃ māṇavo ‘sappo naṅgalīsasadiso’ti
atk-s0513a1:2754_3: kathento tāva sukathitaṃ kathesi, ‘hatthī naṅgalīsasadiso’ti kathentenāpi soṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2754_4: sandhāya lesena kathitaṃ. ‘Ucchu naṅgalīsasadisa’nti kathanepi leso atthi, ‘dadhikhīrāni
atk-s0513a1:2754_5: pana niccaṃ paṇḍarāni pakkhittabhājanasaṇṭhānānī’ti idha sabbena sabbaṃ upamaṃ na
atk-s0513a1:2754_6: kathesi, na sakkā imaṃ lāḷakaṃ sikkhāpetu”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2757: Nāyaṃ dadhiṃ vedi na naṅgalīsaṃ, dadhippayaṃ maññati naṅgalīsa”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2758_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yā vācā opammavasena sabbattha na gacchati, taṃ asabbatthagāmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2758_1: vācaṃ bālo dandhapuggalo sabbattha bhāsati, “dadhi nāma kīdisa”nti puṭṭhopi “seyyathāpi,
atk-s0513a1:2758_2: naṅgalīsā”ti vadateva. Evaṃ vadanto nāyaṃ dadhiṃ vedi na naṅgalīsaṃ. Kiṃkāraṇā? Dadhippayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2758_3: maññati naṅgalīsaṃ, yasmā ayaṃ dadhimpi naṅgalīsameva maññati. Atha vā dadhīti dadhimeva,
atk-s0513a1:2758_4: payanti khīraṃ, dadhi ca payañca dadhippayaṃ. Yasmā dadhikhīrānipi ayaṃ naṅgalīsameva
atk-s0513a1:2758_5: maññati, ediso cāyaṃ bālo, kiṃ imināti antevāsikānaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetvā paribbayaṃ datvā taṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a1:2759: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā lāḷakamāṇavo lāḷudāyī ahosi, disāpāmokkho ācariyo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2763_0: Vāyametheva purisoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ vattasampannaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2763_1: ārabbha kathesi. So kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajito vattasampanno
atk-s0513a1:2763_3: ca sādhukaṃ karoti, cuddasasu mahāvattesu asītikhandhakavattesu ca paripūrakārīyeva
atk-s0513a1:2763_4: hoti, vihāraṃ sammajjati, pariveṇaṃ vitakkamāḷakaṃ vihāramaggaṃ sammajjati, manussānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2763_5: pānīyaṃ deti. Manussā tassa vattasampattiyaṃ pasīditvā pañcasatamattāni dhuvabhattāni
atk-s0513a1:2763_6: adaṃsu, mahālābhasakkāro uppajji. Taṃ nissāya bahūnaṃ phāsuvihāro jāto. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2763_7: dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, asuko nāma bhikkhu attano vattasampattiyā
atk-s0513a1:2763_8: mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ nibbattesi, etaṃ ekaṃ nissāya bahūnaṃ phāsuvihāro jāto”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2763_9: Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya
atk-s0513a1:2763_10: nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepāyaṃ bhikkhu vattasampanno, pubbepetaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2763_11: ekaṃ nissāya pañca isisatāni phalāphalatthāya araññaṃ agantvā eteneva ānītaphalāphalehi
atk-s0513a1:2764_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2764_1: vayappatto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañcasataisiparivāro pabbatapāde vihāsi. Tadā
atk-s0513a1:2764_2: himavante caṇḍo nidāgho ahosi, tattha tattha pānīyāni chijjiṃsu, tiracchānā pānīyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2764_3: alabhamānā kilamanti. Atha tesu tāpasesu eko tāpaso tesaṃ pipāsadukkhaṃ disvā ekaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2764_4: rukkhaṃ chinditvā doṇiṃ katvā pānīyaṃ ussiñcitvā doṇiṃ pūretvā tesaṃ pānīyaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2764_5: Bahūsu sannipatitvā pānīyaṃ pivantesu tāpasassa phalāphalatthāya gamanokāso nāhosi.
atk-s0513a1:2764_6: So nirāhāropi pānīyaṃ detiyeva. Migagaṇā cintesuṃ “ayaṃ amhākaṃ pānīyaṃ dento phalāphalatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2764_7: gantuṃ okāsaṃ na labhati, nirāhāratāya ativiya kilamati, handamayaṃ katikaṃ karomā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2764_8: Te katikaṃ akaṃsu “ito paṭṭhāya pānīyaṃ pivanatthāya āgacchantena attano balānurūpena
atk-s0513a1:2764_9: phalāphalaṃ gahetvāva āgantabba”nti. Te tato paṭṭhāya ekeko tiracchāno attano attano
atk-s0513a1:2764_10: balānurūpena madhuramadhurāni ambajambupanasādīnigahetvāva āgacchati. Ekassa atthāya
atk-s0513a1:2764_11: ābhataṃ phalāphalaṃ aḍḍhateyyasakaṭabhārappamāṇaṃ ahosi. Pañcasatatāpasā tadeva paribhuñjanti.
atk-s0513a1:2765: Bodhisatto taṃ disvā “ekaṃ nāma vattasampannaṃ nissāya ettakānaṃ tāpasānaṃ phalāphalatthāya agantvā yāpanaṃ uppannaṃ, vīriyaṃ nāma kātabbamevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2768: Vāyāmassa phalaṃ passa, bhuttā ambā anītiha”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2769_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – paṇḍito attano vattapūraṇādike kammasmiṃ vāyametheva, na
atk-s0513a1:2769_1: ukkaṇṭheyya. Kiṃkāraṇā? Vāyāmassa nipphalatāya abhāvato. Iti mahāsatto “vāyāmo nāmesa
atk-s0513a1:2769_2: saphalova hotī”ti isigaṇaṃ ālapanto “vāyāmassa phalaṃ passā”ti āha. Kīdisaṃ? Bhuttā
atk-s0513a1:2769_3: ambā anītihaṃ. Tattha ambāti desanāmattaṃ, tehi pana nānappakārāni phalāphalāni ābhatāni.
atk-s0513a1:2769_4: Tesu sampannatarānaṃ ussannatarānaṃ vā vasena “ambā”ti vuttaṃ. Ye imehi pañcahi isisatehi
atk-s0513a1:2769_5: sayaṃ araññaṃ agantvā ekassa atthāya ānītā ambā bhuttā, idaṃ vāyāmassa phalaṃ. Tañca
atk-s0513a1:2769_6: kho pana anītihaṃ, “iti āha iti āhā”ti evaṃ itihītihena gahetabbaṃ na hoti, paccakkhameva
atk-s0513a1:2769_7: taṃ phalaṃ passāti. Evaṃ mahāsatto isigaṇassa ovādaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2770: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā vattasampanno tāpaso ayaṃ bhikkhu ahosi, gaṇasatthā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2774: Bahumpi so vikattheyyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ vikatthakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. Tassa vatthu heṭṭhā kathitasadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2775_0: Atīte pana bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2775_1: Tassa bhariyā puttaṃ vijāyi, dāsīpissa taṃ divasaññeva puttaṃ vijāyi. Te ekatova
atk-s0513a1:2775_2: vaḍḍhiṃsu. Seṭṭhiputte lekhaṃ sikkhante dāsopissa phalakaṃ vahamāno gantvā teneva
atk-s0513a1:2775_3: saddhiṃ lekhaṃ sikkhi, gaṇanaṃ sikkhi, dve tayo vohāre akāsi. So anukkamena vacanakusalo
atk-s0513a1:2775_4: vohārakusalo yuvā abhirūpo ahosi, nāmena kaṭāheko nāma. So seṭṭhighare bhaṇḍāgārikakammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2775_5: karonto cintesi “na maṃ ime sabbakālaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikakammaṃ kāressanti, kiñcideva dosaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2775_6: disvā tāḷetvā bandhitvā lakkhaṇena aṅketvā dāsaparibhogenapi paribhuñjissanti. Paccante
atk-s0513a1:2775_7: kho pana seṭṭhissa sahāyako seṭṭhi atthi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ seṭṭhissa vacanena lekhaṃ ādāya
atk-s0513a1:2775_8: tattha gantvā ‘ahaṃ seṭṭhiputto’ti vatvā taṃ seṭṭhiṃ vañcetvā tassa dhītaraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:2775_9: sukhaṃ vaseyya”nti. So sayameva paṇṇaṃ gahetvā “ahaṃ asukaṃ nāma mama puttaṃ tava
atk-s0513a1:2775_10: santikaṃ pahiṇiṃ, āvāhavivāhasambandho nāma mayhañca tayā, tuyhañca mayā saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2775_11: patirūpo, tasmā tvaṃ imassa dārakassa attano dhītaraṃ datvā etaṃ tattheva vasāpehi,
atk-s0513a1:2775_12: ahampi okāsaṃ labhitvā āgamissāmī”ti likhitvā seṭṭhisseva muddikāya lañjetvā yathārucitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2775_13: paribbayañceva gandhavatthādīni ca gahetvā paccantaṃ gantvā seṭṭhiṃ disvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2776_0: Atha naṃ seṭṭhi “kuto āgatosi, tātā”ti pucchi. “Bārāṇasito”ti. “Kassa puttosī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2776_2: paṇṇaṃ adāsi. Seṭṭhi paṇṇaṃ vācetvā “idānāhaṃ jīvāmi nāmā”ti tuṭṭhacitto dhītaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2776_3: datvā patiṭṭhāpesi. Tassa parivāro mahanto ahosi. So yāgukhajjakādīsu vā vatthagandhādīsu
atk-s0513a1:2776_4: vā upanītesu “evampi nāma yāguṃ pacanti, evaṃ khajjakaṃ, evaṃ bhattaṃ, aho paccantavāsikā
atk-s0513a1:2776_5: nāmā”ti yāguādīni garahati. “Ime paccantavāsibhāveneva ahatasāṭake vaḷañjituṃ na
atk-s0513a1:2776_6: jānanti, gandhe pisituṃ, pupphāni ganthituṃ na jānantī”ti vatthakammantikādayo garahati.
atk-s0513a1:2777_0: Bodhisattopi dāsaṃ apassanto “kaṭāhako na dissati, kahaṃ gato, pariyesatha na”nti
atk-s0513a1:2777_1: samantā manusse payojesi. Tesu eko tattha gantvā taṃ disvā sañjānitvā attānaṃ ajānāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2777_2: āgantvā bodhisattassa ārocesi. Bodhisatto taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “ayuttaṃ tena kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2777_3: gantvā naṃ gahetvā āgacchissāmī”ti rājānaṃ āpucchitvā mahantena parivārena nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:2777_4: “Seṭṭhi kira paccantaṃ gacchatī”ti sabbattha pākaṭo jāto. Kaṭāhako “seṭṭhi kira āgacchatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2777_5: sutvā cintesi “na so aññena kāraṇena āgacchissati, maṃ nissāyevassa āgamanena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2777_6: Sace panāhaṃ palāyissāmi, puna āgantuṃ na sakkā bhavissati. Atthi panesa upāyo. Mama
atk-s0513a1:2777_7: sāmikassa paṭipathaṃ gantvā dāsakammaṃ katvā tameva ārādhessāmī”ti. So tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:2777_8: parisamajjhe evaṃ bhāsati “aññe bālamanussā attano bālabhāvena mātāpitūnaṃ guṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2777_9: ajānantā tesaṃ bhojanavelāya apacitikammaṃ akatvā tehi saddhiṃyeva bhuñjanti, mayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2777_10: pana mātāpitūnaṃ bhojanakāle paṭiggahaṃ upanema, kheḷamallakaṃ upanema, bhājanāni
atk-s0513a1:2777_11: upanema, pānīyampi bījanimpi gahetvā upatiṭṭhāmā”ti yāva sarīravaḷañjanakāle udakakalasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2777_12: ādāya paṭicchannaṭṭhānagamanā sabbaṃ dāsehi sāmikānaṃ kattabbakiccaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:2778_0: So evaṃ parisaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā bodhisattassa paccantasamīpaṃ āgatakāle sasuraṃ avoca
atk-s0513a1:2778_1: “tāta, mama kira pitā tumhākaṃ dassanatthāya āgacchati, tumhe khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2778_2: paṭiyādāpetha, ahaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā paṭipathaṃ gamissāmī”ti. So “sādhu, tātā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2778_3: sampaṭicchi. Kaṭāhako bahuṃ paṇṇākāramādāya mahantena parivārena gantvā bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2778_4: vanditvā paṇṇākāraṃ adāsi. Bodhisattopi paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2778_5: katvā pātarāsakāle khandhāvāraṃ nivāsetvā sarīravaḷañjanatthāya paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2778_6: pāvisi. Kaṭāhako attano parivāraṃ nivattetvā kalasaṃ ādāya bodhisattassa santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2778_7: gantvā udakakiccapariyosāne pādesu patitvā “sāmi, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ yattakaṃ icchatha,
atk-s0513a1:2778_8: tattakaṃ dhanaṃ dassāmi, mā me yasaṃ antaradhāpayitthā”ti āha. Bodhisatto tassa vattasampadāya
atk-s0513a1:2778_9: pasīditvā “mā bhāyi, natthi te mama santikā antarāyo”ti samassāsetvā paccantanagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2778_10: pāvisi. Mahanto sakkāro ahosi, kaṭāhakopissa nirantaraṃ dāsena kattabbakiccaṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a1:2778_11: Atha naṃ ekāya velāya sukhanisinnaṃ paccantaseṭṭhi āha “mahāseṭṭhi, mayā tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2778_12: paṇṇaṃ disvāva tumhākaṃ puttassa dārikā dinnā”ti bodhisatto kaṭāhakaṃ puttameva katvā
atk-s0513a1:2778_13: tadanucchavikaṃ piyavacanaṃ vatvā seṭṭhiṃ tosesi. Tato paṭṭhāya kaṭāhakassa mukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2779_0: Athekadivasaṃ mahāsatto seṭṭhidhītaraṃ pakkositvā “ehi, amma, sīse me ūkā vicināhī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2779_1: vatvā taṃ āgantvā ūkā gahetvā ṭhitaṃ piyavacanaṃ vatvā “kathehi, amma, kacci te mama
atk-s0513a1:2779_2: putto sukhadukkhesu appamatto, ubho janā sammodamānā samaggavāsaṃ vasathā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2779_3: “Tāta, mahāseṭṭhi tumhākaṃ puttassa añño doso natthi, kevalaṃ āhāraṃ garahatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2779_4: “Amma, niccakālamesa dukkhasīlova, apica te ahaṃ tassa mukhabandhanamantaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2779_5: taṃ tvaṃ sādhukaṃ uggaṇhitvā mama puttassa bhojanakāle garahantassa uggahitaniyāmeneva
atk-s0513a1:2779_6: purato ṭhatvā vadeyyāsī”ti gāthaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā katipāhaṃ vasitvā bārāṇasimeva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2779_7: Kaṭāhakopi bahuṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ ādāya anumaggaṃ gantvā bahudhanaṃ datvā vanditvā
atk-s0513a1:2779_8: nivatti. So bodhisattassa gatakālato paṭṭhāya atirekamānī ahosi. So ekadivasaṃ seṭṭhidhītāya
atk-s0513a1:2779_9: nānaggarasabhojanaṃ upanetvā kaṭacchuṃ ādāya parivisantiyā bhattaṃ garahituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2779_10: Seṭṭhidhītā bodhisattassa santike uggahitaniyāmeneva imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2783_0: Tattha bahumpi so vikattheyya, aññaṃ janapadaṃ gatoti yo attano jātibhūmito aññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2783_1: janapadaṃ gato hoti, yatthassa jātiṃ na jānanti, so bahumpi vikattheyya, vambhanavacanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2783_2: vañcanavacanaṃ vadeyya. Anvāgantvāna dūseyyāti imaṃ tāva vāraṃ sāmikassa paṭipathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2783_3: gantvā dāsakiccassa katattā kasāhi paharitvā piṭṭhicammuppāṭanato ca lakkhaṇāhananato
atk-s0513a1:2783_4: ca muttosi. Sace anācāraṃ karosi, puna aññasmiṃ āgamanavāre tava sāmiko anvāgantvāna
atk-s0513a1:2783_5: dūseyya, imaṃ gehaṃ anuāgantvā kasābhighātehi ceva lakkhaṇāhananena ca jātippakāsanena
atk-s0513a1:2783_6: ca taṃ dūseyya upahaneyya. Tasmā imaṃ anācāraṃ pahāya bhuñja bhoge kaṭāhaka, mā pacchā
atk-s0513a1:2783_7: attano dāsabhāvaṃ pākaṭaṃ kāretvā vippaṭisārī ahosīti ayamettha seṭṭhino adhippāyo.
atk-s0513a1:2784_0: Seṭṭhidhītā pana etamatthaṃ ajānantī uggahitaniyāmena byañjanameva payirudāhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2784_1: Kaṭāhako “addhā seṭṭhinā mama kulaṃ ācikkhitvā etissā sabbaṃ kathitaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2784_2: tato paṭṭhāya puna bhattaṃ garahituṃ na visahi, nihatamāno yathāladdhaṃ bhuñjitvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2785: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā kaṭāhako vikatthakabhikkhu ahosi, bārāṇasiseṭṭhi pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2789_0: Tathevekassa kalyāṇanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kosalarañño asilakkhaṇapāṭhakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2789_1: brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi. So kira kammārehi rañño asīnaṃ āhaṭakāle asiṃ upasiṅghitvā
atk-s0513a1:2789_2: asilakkhaṇaṃ udāharati. So yesaṃ hatthato lābhaṃ labhati, tesaṃ asiṃ “lakkhaṇasampanno
atk-s0513a1:2789_3: maṅgalasaṃyutto”ti vadati. Yesaṃ hatthato lābhaṃ na labhati, tesaṃ asiṃ “avalakkhaṇo”ti
atk-s0513a1:2789_4: garahati. Atheko kammāro asiṃ katvā kosiyaṃ sukhumaṃ maricacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā rañño
atk-s0513a1:2789_5: asiṃ āhari. Rājā brāhmaṇaṃ pakkosāpetvā “asiṃ vīmaṃsā”ti āha. Brāhmaṇassa asiṃ ākaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2789_6: upasiṅghantassa maricacuṇṇāni nāsaṃ pavisitvā khipitukāmataṃ uppādesuṃ. Tassa khipantassa
atk-s0513a1:2789_7: nāsikā asidhārāya paṭihatā dvidhā chijji. Tassevaṃ nāsikāya chinnabhāvo bhikkhusaṅghe
atk-s0513a1:2789_8: pākaṭo jāto. Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, rañño
atk-s0513a1:2789_9: kira asilakkhaṇapāṭhako asiṃ upasiṅghanto nāsikaṃ chindāpesī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya
atk-s0513a1:2789_10: nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2789_11: bhikkhave, idāneva so brāhmaṇo asiṃ upasiṅghanto nāsikāchedaṃ patto, pubbepi pattoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2790_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente tassa asilakkhaṇapāṭhako brāhmaṇo ahosīti
atk-s0513a1:2790_1: sabbaṃ paccuppannavatthusadisameva. Rājā pana tassa vejje datvā nāsikākoṭiṃ phāsukaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2790_2: kārāpetvā lākhāya paṭināsikaṃ kāretvā puna taṃ upaṭṭhākameva akāsi. Bārāṇasirañño
atk-s0513a1:2790_3: pana putto natthi, ekā dhītā ceva bhāgineyyo ca ahesuṃ. So ubhopi te attano santikeyeva
atk-s0513a1:2790_4: vaḍḍhāpesi. Te ekato vaḍḍhantā aññamaññaṃ paṭibaddhacittā ahesuṃ. Rājāpi amacce pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2790_5: “mayhaṃ bhāgineyyopi imassa rajjassa sāmikova, dhītaraṃ etasseva datvā abhisekamassa
atk-s0513a1:2790_6: karomī”ti vatvā puna cintesi “mayhaṃ bhāgineyyo sabbathāpi ñātakoyeva, etassa aññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2790_7: rājadhītaraṃ ānetvā abhisekaṃ katvā dhītaraṃ aññassa rañño dassāmi, evaṃ no ñātakā
atk-s0513a1:2790_8: bahū bhavissanti, dvinnampi rajjānaṃ mayameva sāmikā bhavissāmā”ti. So amaccehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2790_9: sammantetvā “ubhopete visuṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti bhāgineyyaṃ aññasmiṃ nivesane, dhītaraṃ aññasmiṃ vāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:2791_0: Te soḷasavassuddesikabhāvaṃ pattā ativiya paṭibaddhacittā ahesuṃ. Rājakumāro “kena
atk-s0513a1:2791_1: nu kho upāyena mātuladhītaraṃ rājagehā nīharāpetuṃ sakkā bhaveyyā”ti cintento “attheko
atk-s0513a1:2791_2: upāyo”ti mahāikkhaṇikaṃ pakkosāpetvā tassā sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ datvā “kiṃ mayā kattabba”nti
atk-s0513a1:2791_3: vutte “amma, tayi karontiyā anipphatti nāma natthi, kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ vatvā yathā
atk-s0513a1:2791_4: mama mātulo rājā dhītaraṃ antogehā nīharāpeti, tathā karohī”ti āha. Sādhu, sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2791_5: ahaṃ rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vakkhāmi “deva, rājadhītāya upari kāḷakaṇṇī atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2791_6: ettakaṃ kālaṃ nivattitvā olokentopi natthi, ahaṃ rājadhītaraṃ asukadivase nāma rathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2791_7: āropetvā bahuāvudhahatthe purise ādāya mahantena parivārena susānaṃ gantvā maṇḍalapīṭhikāya
atk-s0513a1:2791_8: heṭṭhāmañce matamanussaṃ nipajjāpetvā uparimañce rājadhītaraṃ ṭhapetvā gandhodakaghaṭānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2791_9: aṭṭhuttarasatena nhāpetvā kāḷakaṇṇiṃ pavāhessāmī”ti evaṃ vatvā rājadhītaraṃ susānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2791_10: nessāmi, tvaṃ amhākaṃ tattha gamanadivase amhehi puretarameva thokaṃ maricacuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2791_11: ādāya āvudhahatthehi attano manussehi parivuto rathaṃ abhiruyha susānaṃ gantvā rathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2791_12: susānadvāre ekapadese ṭhapetvā āvudhahatthe manusse susānavanaṃ pesetvā sayaṃ susāne
atk-s0513a1:2791_13: maṇḍalapīṭhikaṃ pasāretvā matako viya paṭikujjo hutvā nipajja. Ahaṃ tattha āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:2791_14: tava upari mañcakaṃ attharitvā rājadhītaraṃ ukkhipitvā mañce sayāpessāmi, tvaṃ tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2791_15: khaṇe maricacuṇṇaṃ nāsikāya pakkhipitvā dve tayo vāre khipeyyāsi. Tayā khipitakāle
atk-s0513a1:2791_16: mayaṃ rājadhītaraṃ pahāya palāyissāma. Atha tvaṃ rājadhītaraṃ sīsaṃ nhāpetvā sayampi
atk-s0513a1:2791_17: sīsaṃ nhāyitvā taṃ ādāya attano nivesanaṃ gaccheyyāsīti. So “sādhu sundaro upāyo”ti sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0513a1:2792_0: Sāpi gantvā rañño tamatthaṃ ārocesi, rājāpi sampaṭicchi. Rājadhītāyapi taṃ antaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2792_1: ācikkhi, sāpi sampaṭicchi. Sā nikkhamanadivase kumārassa saññaṃ datvā mahantena parivārena
atk-s0513a1:2792_2: susānaṃ gacchantī ārakkhamanussānaṃ bhayajananatthaṃ āha – “mayā rājadhītāya mañce
atk-s0513a1:2792_3: ṭhapitakāle heṭṭhāmañce matapuriso khipissati, khipitvā ca heṭṭhāmañcā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2792_4: yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passissati, tameva gahessati, appamattā bhaveyyāthā”ti. Rājakumāro puretaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2792_5: gantvā vuttanayeneva tattha nipajji. Mahāikkhaṇikā rājadhītaraṃ ukkhipitvā maṇḍalapīṭhikāṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2792_6: gacchantī “mā bhāyī”ti saññāpetvā mañce ṭhapesi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe kumāro maricacuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2792_7: nāsāya pakkhipitvā khipi. Tena khipitamatteyeva mahāikkhaṇikā rājadhītaraṃ pahāya
atk-s0513a1:2792_8: mahāravaṃ ravamānā sabbapaṭhamaṃ palāyi, tassā palātakālato paṭṭhāya ekopi ṭhātuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2792_9: samattho nāma nāhosi, gahitagahitāni āvudhāni chaḍḍetvā sabbe palāyiṃsu. Kumāro yathāsammantitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2792_10: sabbaṃ katvā rājadhītaraṃ ādāya attano nivesanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2793_0: Ikkhaṇikā gantvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ rañño ārocesi. Rājā “pakatiyāpi sā mayā tassevatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2793_1: puṭṭhā, pāyāse chaḍḍitasappi viya jāta”nti sampaṭicchitvā aparabhāge bhāgineyyassa
atk-s0513a1:2793_2: rajjaṃ datvā dhītaraṃ mahādeviṃ kāresi. So tāya saddhiṃ samaggavāsaṃ vasamāno dhammena
atk-s0513a1:2793_3: rajjaṃ kāresi. Sopi asilakkhaṇapāṭhako tasseva upaṭṭhāko ahosi. Tassekadivasaṃ rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2793_4: āgantvā paṭisūriyaṃ ṭhatvā upaṭṭhahantassa lākhā vilīyi, paṭināsikā bhūmiyaṃ pati.
atk-s0513a1:2793_5: So lajjāya adhomukho aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ rājā parihasanto “ācariya, mā cintayittha,
atk-s0513a1:2793_6: khipitaṃ nāma ekassa kalyāṇaṃ hoti, ekassa pāpakaṃ. Tumhehi khipitena nāsikā chijjīyittha,
atk-s0513a1:2793_7: mayaṃ pana khipantā mātuladhītaraṃ labhitvā rajjaṃ pāpuṇimhā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2796: Tasmā sabbaṃ na kalyāṇaṃ, sabbaṃ vāpi na pāpaka”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2797: Tattha tathevekassāti tadevekassa. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0513a1:2798: Iti so imāya gāthāya taṃ kāraṇaṃ āharitvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2799_0: Satthā imāya desanāya lokasammatānaṃ kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ anekaṃsikabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā
atk-s0513a1:2799_1: jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā asilakkhaṇapāṭhakova etarahi asilakkhaṇapāṭhako, bhāgineyyarājā
atk-s0513a1:2803: Te desā tāni vatthūnīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ vikatthakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. Tattha dvepi vatthūni kaṭāhakajātakasadisāneva.
atk-s0513a1:2804_0: Idha panesa bārāṇasiseṭṭhino dāso kalaṇḍuko nāma ahosi. Tassa palāyitvā paccantavāsiseṭṭhino
atk-s0513a1:2804_1: dhītaraṃ gahetvā mahantena parivārena vasanakāle bārāṇasiseṭṭhi pariyesāpetvāpi tassa
atk-s0513a1:2804_2: gataṭṭhānaṃ ajānanto “gaccha, kalaṇḍukaṃ pariyesā”ti attanā puṭṭhaṃ sukapotakaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2804_3: Sukapotako ito cito ca vicaranto taṃ nagaraṃ pāpuṇi. Tasmiñca kāle kalaṇḍuko nadīkīḷaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2804_4: kīḷitukāmo bahuṃ mālāgandhavilepanañceva khādanīyabhojanīyāni ca gāhāpetvā nadiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2804_5: gantvā seṭṭhidhītāya saddhiṃ nāvaṃ āruyha udake kīḷati. Tasmiñca padese nadīkīḷaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2804_6: kīḷantā issarajātikā tikhiṇabhesajjaparibhāvitaṃ khīraṃ pivanti, tena tesaṃ divasabhāgampi
atk-s0513a1:2804_7: udake kīḷantānaṃ sītaṃ na bādhati. Ayaṃ pana kalaṇḍuko khīragaṇḍūsaṃ gahetvā mukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2804_8: vikkhāletvā taṃ khīraṃ nuṭṭhubhati. Nuṭṭhubhantopi udake anuṭṭhubhitvā seṭṭhidhītāya
atk-s0513a1:2804_9: sīse nuṭṭhubhati. Sukapotakopi nadītīraṃ gantvā ekissā udumbarasākhāya nisīditvā
atk-s0513a1:2804_10: oloketvā kalaṇḍukaṃ sañjānitvā seṭṭhidhītāya sīse nuṭṭhubhantaṃ disvā “are, kalaṇḍuka
atk-s0513a1:2804_11: dāsa, attano jātiñca vasanaṭṭhānañca anussara, khīragaṇḍūsaṃ gahetvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā
atk-s0513a1:2804_12: jātisampannāya sukhasaṃvaḍḍhāya seṭṭhidhītāya sīse mā nuṭṭhubhi, attano pamāṇaṃ na
atk-s0513a1:2807: Anuvicca kho taṃ gaṇheyyuṃ, piva khīraṃ kalaṇḍukā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2808_0: Tattha te desā tāni vatthūnīti mātukucchiṃ sandhāya vadati. Ayametthādhippāyo – yattha
atk-s0513a1:2808_1: te vasitaṃ, na te khattiyadhītādīnaṃ kucchidesā. Yattha vāsi patiṭṭhito, na tāni
atk-s0513a1:2808_2: khattiyadhītādīnaṃ kucchivatthūni. Atha kho dāsikucchiyaṃ tvaṃ vasi ceva patiṭṭhito
atk-s0513a1:2808_3: cāti. Ahañca vanagocaroti tiracchānabhūtopi etamatthaṃ jānāmīti dīpeti. Anuvicca
atk-s0513a1:2808_4: kho taṃ gaṇheyyunti evaṃ anācāraṃ caramānaṃ mayā gantvā ārocite anuvicca jānitvā
atk-s0513a1:2808_5: tava sāmikā tāḷetvā ceva lakkhaṇāhatañca katvā taṃ gaṇheyyuṃ, gahetvā gamissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2808_6: tasmā attano pamāṇaṃ ñatvā seṭṭhidhītāya sīse anuṭṭhubhitvā piva khīraṃ. Kalaṇḍukāti taṃ nāmenālapati.
atk-s0513a1:2809_0: Kalaṇḍukopi suvapotakaṃ sañjānitvā “maṃ pākaṭaṃ kareyyā”ti bhayena “ehi, sāmi, kadā
atk-s0513a1:2809_1: āgatosī”ti āha. Suko “na esa maṃ hitakāmatāya pakkosati, gīvaṃ pana me vaṭṭetvā māretukāmo”ti
atk-s0513a1:2809_2: ñatvāva “na me tayā attho”ti tato uppatitvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā yathādiṭṭhaṃ seṭṭhino
atk-s0513a1:2809_3: vitthārena kathesi. Seṭṭhi “ayuttaṃ tena kata”nti vatvā gantvā tassa āṇaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0513a1:2810: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kalaṇḍuko ayaṃ bhikkhu ahosi, bārāṇasiseṭṭhi pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2814_0: Yo ve dhammaṃ dhajaṃ katvāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kuhakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2814_1: kathesi. Tadā hi satthā tassa kuhakabhāve ārocite “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepesa
atk-s0513a1:2815_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mūsikayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2815_1: gahetvā vuḍḍhimanvāya mahāsarīro sūkaracchāpakasadiso hutvā anekasatamūsikāhi parivuto
atk-s0513a1:2815_2: araññe viharati. Atheko siṅgālo ito cito ca vicaranto taṃ mūsikayūthaṃ disvā “imā
atk-s0513a1:2815_3: mūsikā vañcetvā khādissāmī”ti cintetvā mūsikānaṃ āsayassa avidūre sūriyābhimukho
atk-s0513a1:2815_4: vātaṃ pivanto ekena pādena aṭṭhāsi. Bodhisatto gocarāya caramāno taṃ disvā “sīlavā
atk-s0513a1:2815_5: eso bhavissatī”ti tassa santikaṃ gantvā “bhante, tvaṃ ko nāmo”ti pucchi. “Dhammiko
atk-s0513a1:2815_6: nāmā”ti. “Cattāro pāde bhūmiyaṃ aṭhapetvā kasmā ekeneva ṭhitosī”ti. “Mayi cattāro
atk-s0513a1:2815_7: pāde pathaviyaṃ ṭhapente pathavī vahituṃ na sakkoti, tasmā ekeneva tiṭṭhāmī”ti. “Mukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2815_8: vivaritvā kasmā ṭhitosī”ti? “Mayaṃ aññaṃ na bhakkhayāma, vātameva bhakkhayāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2815_9: “Atha kasmā sūriyābhimukho tiṭṭhasī”ti? “Sūriyaṃ namassāmī”ti. Bodhisatto tassa vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2815_10: sutvā “sīlavā eso bhavissatī”ti tato paṭṭhāya mūsikagaṇena saddhiṃ sāyaṃ pātaṃ tassa
atk-s0513a1:2816_0: Athassa upaṭṭhānaṃ katvā gamanakāle siṅgālo sabbapacchimaṃ mūsikaṃ gahetvā maṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2816_1: khāditvā ajjhoharitvā mukhaṃ puñchitvā tiṭṭhati. Anupubbena mūsikagaṇo tanuko jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2816_2: Mūsikā “pubbe amhākaṃ ayaṃ āsayo nappahoti, nirantarā tiṭṭhāma. Idāni sithilā, evampi
atk-s0513a1:2816_3: āsayo na pūrateva, kiṃ nu kho eta”nti bodhisattassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:2816_4: “kena nu kho kāraṇena musikā tanuttaṃ gatā”ti cintento siṅgāle āsaṅkaṃ ṭhapetvā “vīmaṃsissāmi
atk-s0513a1:2816_5: na”nti upaṭṭhānakāle sesamūsikā purato katvā sayaṃ pacchato ahosi. Siṅgālo tassa
atk-s0513a1:2816_6: upari pakkhandi, bodhisatto attano gahaṇatthāya taṃ pakkhandantaṃ disvā nivattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2816_7: “bho siṅgāla, idaṃ te vatasamādānaṃ na dhammasudhammatāya, paresaṃ pana vihiṃsanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:2816_8: dhammaṃ dhajaṃ katvā carasī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2818: “Yo ve dhammaṃ dhajaṃ katvā, nigūḷho pāpamācare;
atk-s0513a1:2819: Vissāsayitvā bhūtāni, biḷāraṃ nāma taṃ vata”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2820_0: Tattha yo veti khattiyādīsu yo kocideva. Dhammaṃ dhajaṃ katvāti dasakusalakammapathadhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2820_1: dhajaṃ karitvā, kūṭaṃ karonto viya ussāpetvā dassentoti attho. Vissāsayitvāti “sīlavā
atk-s0513a1:2820_2: aya”nti saññāya sañjātavissāsāni katvā. Biḷāraṃ nāma taṃ vatanti taṃ evaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2820_3: dhajaṃ katvā raho pāpāni karontassa vataṃ kerāṭikavataṃ nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2821_0: Mūsikarājā kathentova uppatitvā tassa gīvāyaṃ patitvā hanukassa heṭṭhā antogalanāḷiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2821_1: ḍaṃsitvā galanāḷiṃ phāletvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi. Mūsikagaṇo nivattitvā siṅgālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2821_2: “muru murū”ti khāditvā agamāsi. Paṭhamāgatāva kirassa maṃsaṃ labhiṃsu, pacchā āgatā
atk-s0513a1:2821_3: na labhiṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya mūsikagaṇo nibbhayo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2822: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā siṅgālo kuhakabhikkhu ahosi, mūsikarājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2826: Nāyaṃ sikhā puññahetūti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kuhakaññeva bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2827_0: Atītasmiñhi bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mūsikarājā hutvā araññe
atk-s0513a1:2827_1: vasati. Atheko siṅgālo davaḍāhe uṭṭhite palāyituṃ asakkonto ekasmiṃ rukkhe sīsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2827_2: āhacca aṭṭhāsi. Tassa sakalasarīre lomāni jhāyiṃsu, rukkhaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṭṭhāne pana
atk-s0513a1:2827_3: matthake cūḷā viya thokāni lomāni aṭṭhaṃsu. So ekadivasaṃ soṇḍiyaṃ pānīyaṃ pivanto
atk-s0513a1:2827_4: chāyaṃ olokento cūḷaṃ disvā “uppannaṃ dāni me bhaṇḍamūla”nti araññe vicaranto taṃ
atk-s0513a1:2827_5: mūsikādariṃ disvā “imā mūsikā vañcetvā khādissāmī”ti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva avidūre
atk-s0513a1:2827_6: aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ bodhisatto gocarāya caranto disvā “sīlavā aya”nti saññāya upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2827_7: “tvaṃ kinnāmosī”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ aggikabhāradvājo nāmā”ti. “Atha kasmā āgatosī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2827_9: nāma jānāmi, tumhākaṃ pātova nikkhamitvā gocarāya gamanakāle ‘ettakā’ti gaṇetvā paccāgamanakālepi
atk-s0513a1:2827_10: gaṇessāmi, evaṃ sāyaṃ pātaṃ gaṇento rakkhissāmī”ti. “Tena hi rakkha mātulā”ti. So
atk-s0513a1:2827_11: “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā nikkhamanakāle “eko dve tayo”ti gaṇetvā paccāgamanakālepi
atk-s0513a1:2827_12: tatheva gaṇetvā sabbapacchimaṃ gahetvā khādati. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2828: Idha pana mūsikarājā nivattitvā ṭhito “bho aggikabhāradvāja, nāyaṃ tava dhammasudhammatāya matthake cūḷā ṭhapitā, kucchikāraṇā pana ṭhapitā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2831: Nāguṭṭhigaṇanaṃ yāti, alaṃ te hotu aggikā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2832_0: Tattha nāguṭṭhigaṇanaṃ yātīti “aṅguṭṭhigaṇanā”ti aṅguṭṭhagaṇanā vuccati, ayaṃ mūsikagaṇo
atk-s0513a1:2832_1: aṅguṭṭhagaṇanaṃ na gacchati na upeti na pūreti, parikkhayaṃ gacchatīti attho. Alaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2832_2: te hotu aggikāti siṅgālaṃ nāmena ālapanto āha. Ettāvatā te alaṃ hotu, na ito paraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2832_3: mūsike khādissasi. Amhehi vā tayā saddhiṃ saṃvāso alaṃ hotu, na mayaṃ idāni tayā
atk-s0513a1:2833: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā siṅgālo ayaṃ bhikkhu ahosi, mūsikarājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2837_0: Yathā vācā ca bhuñjassūti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ mātugāmaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2837_1: ārabbha kathesi. Sā kirekassa saddhāsampannassa upāsakabrāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇī dussīlā
atk-s0513a1:2837_2: pāpadhammā rattiṃ aticaritvā divā kiñci kammaṃ akatvā gilānālayaṃ dassetvā nitthunamānā
atk-s0513a1:2837_3: nipajjati. Atha naṃ brāhmaṇo “kiṃ te bhadde aphāsuka”nti pucchi. “Vātā me vijjhantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2837_5: Brāhmaṇo yaṃ yaṃ sā icchati, taṃ taṃ āharitvā deti, dāso viya sabbakiccāni karoti.
atk-s0513a1:2837_6: Sā pana brāhmaṇassa gehaṃ paviṭṭhakāle nipajjati, bahi nikkhantakāle jārehi saddhiṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0513a1:2838_0: Atha brāhmaṇo “imissā sarīre vijjhanavātānaṃ pariyanto na paññāyatī”ti ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2838_1: gandhamālādīni ādāya jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā
atk-s0513a1:2838_2: “kiṃ, brāhmaṇa, na paññāyasī”ti vutte “bhante, brāhmaṇiyā kira me sarīre vātā vijjhanti,
atk-s0513a1:2838_3: svāhaṃ tassā sappitelādīni ceva paṇītapaṇītabhojanāni ca pariyesāmi, sarīramassā
atk-s0513a1:2838_4: ghanaṃ vippasannacchavivaṇṇaṃ jātaṃ, vātarogassa pana pariyanto na paññāyati. Ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2838_5: taṃ paṭijaggantova idhāgamanassa okāsaṃ na labhāmī”ti āha. Satthā brāhmaṇiyā pāpabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2838_6: ñatvā “brāhmaṇa, ‘evaṃ nipannassa mātugāmassa roge avūpasamante idañcidañca bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2838_7: kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti pubbepi te paṇḍitehi kathitaṃ, bhavasaṅkhepagatattā pana na sallakkhesī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2839_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2839_1: vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho ācariyo
atk-s0513a1:2839_2: ahosi. Ekasatarājadhānīsu khattiyakumārā ca brāhmaṇakumārā ca yebhuyyena tasseva
atk-s0513a1:2839_3: santike sippaṃ uggaṇhanti. Atheko janapadavāsī brāhmaṇamāṇavo bodhisattassa santike
atk-s0513a1:2839_4: tayo vede aṭṭhārasa ca vijjāṭṭhānāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasiyaṃyeva kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:2839_5: divase divase dvattikkhattuṃ bodhisattassa santikaṃ āgacchati. Tassa brāhmaṇī dussīlā
atk-s0513a1:2840_0: Bodhisatto pana “iminā kāraṇena ovādagahaṇāya okāsaṃ na labhāmī”ti vutte “sā māṇavikā
atk-s0513a1:2840_1: imaṃ vañcetvā nipajjatī”ti ñatvā “tassā rogānucchavikaṃ bhesajjaṃ ācikkhissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2840_2: cintetvā āha “tāta, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya tassā sappikhīrarasādīni mā adāsi, gomutte
atk-s0513a1:2840_3: pana pañcapaṇṇāni phalādīni ca pakkhipitvā koṭṭetvā navatambalohabhājane pakkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:2840_4: lohagandhaṃ gāhāpetvā rajjuṃ vā yottaṃ vā rukkhaṃ vā lataṃ vā gahetvā ‘idaṃ te rogassa
atk-s0513a1:2840_5: anucchavikabhesajjaṃ, idaṃ vā piva, uṭṭhāya vā tayā bhuttabhattassa anucchavikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2840_6: kammaṃ karohī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthaṃ vadeyyāsi. “Sace bhesajjaṃ na pivati, atha naṃ
atk-s0513a1:2840_7: rajjuyā vā yottena vā rukkhena vā latāya vā katici pahāre paharitvā kesesu gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:2840_8: ākaḍḍhitvā kapparena potheyyāsi, sā taṅkhaṇaññeva uṭṭhāya kammaṃ karissatī”ti. So
atk-s0513a1:2840_9: “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā vuttaniyāmeneva bhesajjaṃ katvā “bhadde, imaṃ bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2840_10: pivā”ti āha. “Kena te idaṃ ācikkhita”nti? “Ācariyena, bhadde”ti. “Apanehi taṃ, na
atk-s0513a1:2840_11: pivissāmī”ti. Māṇavo “na tvaṃ attano ruciyā pivissasī”ti rajjuṃ gahetvā “attano rogassa
atk-s0513a1:2840_12: anucchavikaṃ bhesajjaṃ vā piva, yāgubhattānucchavikaṃ kammaṃ vā karohī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2843: Ubhayaṃ te na sameti, vācā bhuttañca kosiye”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2844_0: Tattha yathāvācā ca bhuñjassūti yathā te vācā, tathā bhuñjassu, “vātā me vijjhantī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2844_1: vācāya anucchavikameva katvā bhuñjassūti attho. “Yathāvācaṃ vā”tipi pāṭho yujjati,
atk-s0513a1:2844_2: “yathāvācāyā”tipi paṭhanti, sabbattha ayameva attho. Yathābhuttañca byāharāti yaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2844_3: yathā te bhuttaṃ, tassa anucchavikameva byāhara, “arogamhī”ti vatvā gehe kattabbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2844_4: karosīti attho. “Yathābhūtañcā”tipi pāṭho, atha vā arogamhīti yathābhūtameva vatvā
atk-s0513a1:2844_5: kammaṃ karohīti attho. Ubhayaṃ te na sameti, vācābhuttañca kosiyeti yā ca te ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2844_6: vācā “vātā maṃ vijjhantī”ti yañca te idaṃ paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuttaṃ, idaṃ ubhayampi
atk-s0513a1:2844_7: tuyhaṃ na sameti, tasmā uṭṭhāya kammaṃ karohi. “Kosiye”ti taṃ gottenālapati.
atk-s0513a1:2845_0: Evaṃ vutte kosiyabrāhmaṇadhītā “ācariyena ussukkaṃ āpannakālato paṭṭhāya na sakkā
atk-s0513a1:2845_1: mayā esa vañcetuṃ, uṭṭhāya kammaṃ karissāmī”ti uṭṭhāya kammaṃ akāsi. “Ācariyena me
atk-s0513a1:2845_2: dussīlabhāvo ñāto, idāni na sakkā ito paṭṭhāya puna evarūpaṃ kātu”nti ācariye gāravena
atk-s0513a1:2845_3: pāpakammatopi viramitvā sīlavatī ahosi. Sāpi brāhmaṇī “sammāsambuddhena kiramhi ñātā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2845_4: sattharipi gāravena na puna anācāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2846: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā jayampatikā idāni jayampatikāva, ācariyo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2855_0: Asampadānenitarītarassāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2855_1: Tasmiñhi kāle bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso devadatto, akataññū
atk-s0513a1:2855_2: tathāgatassa guṇaṃ na jānātī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi
atk-s0513a1:2855_3: kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva devadatto
atk-s0513a1:2855_4: akataññū, pubbepi akataññūyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2856_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahe ekasmiṃ magadharaññe rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tasseva
atk-s0513a1:2856_1: seṭṭhi ahosi asītikoṭivibhavo saṅkhaseṭṭhīti nāmena. Bārāṇasiyaṃ pīḷiyaseṭṭhi nāma
atk-s0513a1:2856_2: asītikoṭivibhavova ahosi. Te aññamaññaṃ sahāyakā ahesuṃ. Tesu bārāṇasiyaṃ pīḷiyaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0513a1:2856_3: kenacideva kāraṇena mahantaṃ bhayaṃ uppajji, sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ parihāyi. So daliddo
atk-s0513a1:2856_4: appaṭisaraṇo hutvā bhariyaṃ ādāya saṅkhaseṭṭhiṃ paccayaṃ katvā bārāṇasito nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2856_5: padasāva rājagahaṃ patvā saṅkhaseṭṭhissa nivesanaṃ agamāsi. So taṃ disvāva “sahāyo
atk-s0513a1:2856_6: me āgato”ti parissajitvā sakkārasammānaṃ katvā katipāhaṃ vītināmetvā ekadivasaṃ “samma,
atk-s0513a1:2856_7: kenaṭṭhena āgatosī”ti pucchi. “Bhayaṃ me, samma, uppannaṃ, sabbaṃ dhanaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2856_8: upatthambho me hohī”ti. “Sādhu samma, mā bhāyī”ti bhaṇḍāgāraṃ vivarāpetvā cattālīsa
atk-s0513a1:2856_9: hiraññakoṭiyo dāpetvā sesampi paricchadaparivāraṃ sabbaṃ attano santakaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2856_10: aviññāṇakaṃ majjhe bhinditvā upaḍḍhameva adāsi. So taṃ vibhavaṃ ādāya puna bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2857_0: Aparabhāge saṅkhaseṭṭhissapi tādisameva bhayaṃ uppajji. So attano paṭisaraṇaṃ upadhārento
atk-s0513a1:2857_1: “sahāyassa me mahāupakāro kato, upaḍḍhavibhavo dinno. Na so maṃ disvā pariccajissati,
atk-s0513a1:2857_2: tassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti cintetvā bhariyaṃ ādāya padasāva bārāṇasiṃ gantvā bhariyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2857_3: āha “bhadde, tava mayā saddhiṃ antaravīthiyā gamanaṃ nāma na yuttaṃ, mayā pesitayānamāruyha
atk-s0513a1:2857_4: mahantena parivārena pacchā āgamissasi. Yāva yānaṃ pesemi, tāva idheva hohī”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a1:2857_5: taṃ sālāya ṭhapetvā sayaṃ nagaraṃ pavisitvā seṭṭhissa gharaṃ gantvā “rājagahanagarato
atk-s0513a1:2857_6: tumhākaṃ sahāyo saṅkhaseṭṭhi nāma āgato”ti ārocāpesi. So “āgacchatū”ti pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2857_7: taṃ disvā neva āsanā vuṭṭhāsi, na paṭisanthāraṃ akāsi, kevalaṃ “kimatthaṃ āgatosī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2857_8: pucchi. “Tumhākaṃ dassanatthaṃ āgatomhī”ti. “Nivāso te kahaṃ gahito”ti? “Na tāva
atk-s0513a1:2857_9: nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ atthi, seṭṭhigharaṇimpi sālāya ṭhapetvāva āgatomhī”ti. “Tumhākaṃ idha
atk-s0513a1:2857_10: nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ natthi, nivāpaṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne pacāpetvā bhuñjitvā gacchatha,
atk-s0513a1:2857_11: puna amhākaṃ gharaṃ mā pavisathā”ti vatvā “mayhaṃ sahāyassa dussante bandhitvā ekaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2857_12: bahalapalāpatumbaṃ dehī”ti dāsaṃ āṇāpesi. Taṃ divasaṃ kira so rattasālīnaṃ sakaṭasahassamattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2857_13: ophunāpetvā koṭṭhāgāraṃ pūrāpesi, cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ gahetvā āgato akataññū mahācoro
atk-s0513a1:2857_14: sahāyakassa tumbamatte palāpe dāpesi. Dāso pacchiyaṃ ekaṃ palāpatumbaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:2858_0: Bodhisatto cintesi – “ayaṃ asappuriso mama santikā cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ labhitvā idāni
atk-s0513a1:2858_1: palāpatumbaṃ dāpesi, gaṇhāmi nu kho, na gaṇhāmī”ti? Athassa etadahosi “ayaṃ tāva
atk-s0513a1:2858_2: akataññū mittadubbhī katavināsakabhāvena mayā saddhiṃ mittabhāvaṃ bhindi. Sacāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2858_3: etena dinnaṃ palāpatumbaṃ lāmakattā na gaṇhissāmi, ahampi mittabhāvaṃ bhindissāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2858_4: Andhabālā parittakaṃ laddhaṃ aggaṇhantā mittabhāvaṃ vināsenti, ahaṃ pana etena dinnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2858_5: palāpatumbaṃ gahetvā mama vasena mittabhāvaṃ patiṭṭhāpessāmī”ti. So palāpatumbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2858_6: dussante bandhitvā pāsādā oruyha sālaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ bhariyā “kiṃ te, ayya, laddha”nti
atk-s0513a1:2858_7: pucchi. “Bhadde amhākaṃ sahāyo pīḷiyaseṭṭhi palāpatumbaṃ datvā amhe ajjeva vissajjesī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2858_8: Sā “ayya, kimatthaṃ aggahesi, kiṃ etaṃ cattālīsakoṭidhanassa anucchavika”nti rodituṃ
atk-s0513a1:2858_9: ārabhi. Bodhisattopi “bhadde, mā rodi, ahaṃ tena saddhiṃ mittabhāvabhedanabhayena
atk-s0513a1:2858_10: mama vasena mittabhāvaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ gaṇhiṃ, tvaṃ kiṃkāraṇā rodasī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2861: Tasmā harāmi bhusaṃ aḍḍhamānaṃ, mā me mitti jīyittha sassatāya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2862_0: Tattha asampadānenāti asampādānena. Akāralope sandhi, aggahaṇenāti attho. Itarītarassāti
atk-s0513a1:2862_1: yassa kassaci lāmakālāmakassa. Bālassa mittāni kalībhavantīti dandhassa apaññassa
atk-s0513a1:2862_2: mittāni kalīni kāḷakaṇṇisadisāni honti, bhijjantīti attho. Tasmā harāmi bhusaṃ aḍḍhamānanti
atk-s0513a1:2862_3: tena kāraṇena ahaṃ sahāyena dinnaṃ ekapalāpatumbaṃ harāmi gaṇhāmīti dasseti. “Māna”nti
atk-s0513a1:2862_4: hi aṭṭhannaṃ nāḷīnaṃ nāmaṃ, catunnaṃ aḍḍhamānaṃ, catasso ca nāḷiyo tumbo nāma. Tena
atk-s0513a1:2862_5: vuttaṃ “palāpatumba”nti. Mā me mitti jīyittha sassatāyanti mama sahāyena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2862_6: mitti mā bhijjittha, sassatāva ayaṃ hotūti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2863_0: Evaṃ vuttepi seṭṭhibhariyā rodateva. Tasmiṃ khaṇe saṅkhaseṭṭhinā pīḷiyaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0513a1:2863_1: dinno kammantadāso sālādvārena āgacchanto seṭṭhibhariyāya rodanasaddaṃ sutvā sālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2863_2: pavisitvā attano sāmike disvā pādesu nipatitvā roditvā kanditvā “kimatthaṃ idhāgatattha,
atk-s0513a1:2863_3: sāmī”ti pucchi. Seṭṭhi sabbaṃ ārocesi. Kammantadāso “hotu, sāmi, mā cintayitthā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2863_4: ubhopi assāsetvā attano gehaṃ netvā gandhodakena nhāpetvā bhojetvā “sāmikā, vo āgatā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2863_5: sesadāse sannipātetvā dassetvā katipāhaṃ vītināmetvā sabbe dāse gahetvā rājaṅgaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2863_6: gantvā uparavaṃ akāsi. Rājā pakkosāpetvā “kiṃ eta”nti pucchi, te sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2864_0: Rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā ubhopi seṭṭhī pakkosāpetvā saṅkhaseṭṭhiṃ pucchi “saccaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2864_1: kira tayā mahāseṭṭhi pīḷiyaseṭṭhissa cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ dinna”nti? “Āma, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2864_2: mama sahāyassa maṃ takketvā rājagahaṃ āgatassa na kevalaṃ dhanaṃ, sabbaṃ vibhavajātaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2864_3: saviññāṇakaṃ aviññāṇakaṃ dve koṭṭhāse katvā samabhāge adāsinti. Rājā “saccameta”nti
atk-s0513a1:2864_4: pīḷiyaseṭṭhiṃ pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti. “Tayā panassa taññeva takketvā āgatassa atthi
atk-s0513a1:2864_5: koci sakkāro vā sammāno vā kato”ti. So tuṇhī ahosi. Api pana te etassa palāpatumbamattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2864_6: dussante pakkhipāpetvā dāpitaṃ atthīti. Tampi sutvā tuṇhīyeva ahosi. Rājā “kiṃ kātabba”nti
atk-s0513a1:2864_7: amaccehi saddhiṃ mantetvā taṃ paribhāsitvā “gacchatha, pīḷiyaseṭṭhissa ghare sabbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2864_8: vibhavaṃ saṅkhaseṭṭhissa dethā”ti āha. Bodhisatto “mahārāja, mayhaṃ parasantakena
atk-s0513a1:2864_9: attho natthi, mayā dinnamattameva pana dāpethā”ti āha. Rājā bodhisattassa santakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2864_10: dāpesi. Bodhisatto sabbaṃ attano dinnavibhavaṃ paṭilabhitvā dāsaparivuto rājagahameva
atk-s0513a1:2864_11: gantvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2865: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā pīḷiyaseṭṭhi devadatto ahosi, saṅkhaseṭṭhi pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2869: Kusalūpadese dhitiyā daḷhāya cāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ajapālanigrodhe māradhītānaṃ palobhanasuttantaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Bhagavatā hi ādito paṭṭhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:2871: Tā tattha panudī satthā, tūlaṃ bhaṭṭhaṃva māluto”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:2872_0: Evaṃ yāva pariyosānā tassa suttantassa kathitakāle dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā bhikkhū
atk-s0513a1:2872_1: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, sammāsambuddho māradhītaro anekasatānipi dibbarūpāni
atk-s0513a1:2872_2: māpetvā palobhanatthāya upasaṅkamantiyo akkhīnipi ummīletvā na olokesi, aho buddhabalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2872_3: nāma acchariya”nti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2872_4: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva mayhaṃ sabbāsave khepetvā
atk-s0513a1:2872_5: sabbaññutaṃ sampattassa māradhītānaṃ anolokanaṃ nāma acchariyaṃ, ahañhi pubbe bodhiñāṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2872_6: pariyesamāno sakilesakālepi abhisaṅkhataṃ dibbarūpaṃ indriyāni bhinditvā kilesavasena
atk-s0513a1:2872_7: anoloketvāva gantvā mahārajjaṃ pāpuṇi”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2873_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bhātikasatassa kaniṭṭho ahosīti
atk-s0513a1:2873_1: sabbaṃ heṭṭhā takkasilājātake vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ. Tadā pana takkasilānagaravāsīhi
atk-s0513a1:2873_2: bahinagare sālāyaṃ bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yācitvā rajjaṃ paṭicchāpetvā abhiseke
atk-s0513a1:2873_3: kate takkasilānagaravāsino nagaraṃ devanagaraṃ viya, rājabhavanañca indabhavanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2873_4: viya alaṅkariṃsu. Tadā bodhisatto nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājabhavane pāsāde mahātale samussitasetacchattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2873_5: ratanavarapallaṅkaṃ abhiruyha devarājalīlāya nisīdi, amaccā ca brāhmaṇagahapatikādayo
atk-s0513a1:2873_6: ca khattiyakumārā ca sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu, devaccharāpaṭibhāgā
atk-s0513a1:2873_8: payojesuṃ. Gītavāditasaddena rājabhavanaṃ meghatthanitapūritā mahāsamuddakucchi viya
atk-s0513a1:2873_9: ekaninnādaṃ ahosi. Bodhisatto taṃ attano sirisobhaggaṃ olokayamānova cintesi “sacāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2873_10: tāsaṃ yakkhinīnaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ dibbarūpaṃ olokessaṃ, jīvitakkhayaṃ patto abhavissaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2873_11: imaṃ sirisobhaggaṃ na olokessaṃ. Paccekabuddhānaṃ pana ovāde ṭhitabhāvena idaṃ mayā
atk-s0513a1:2873_12: sampatta”nti. Evañca pana cintetvā udānaṃ udānento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2875: “Kusalūpadese dhitiyā daḷhāya ca, anivattitattā bhayabhīrutāya ca;
atk-s0513a1:2876: Na rakkhasīnaṃ vasamāgamimhase, sa sotthibhāvo mahatā bhayena me”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2877_0: Tattha kusalūpadeseti kusalānaṃ upadese, paccekabuddhānaṃ ovādeti attho. Dhitiyā
atk-s0513a1:2877_1: daḷhāya cāti daḷhāya dhitiyā ca, thirena abbocchinnanirantaravīriyena cāti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2877_2: Anivattitattā bhayabhīrutāya cāti bhayabhīrutāya anivattitatāya ca. Tattha bhayanti
atk-s0513a1:2877_3: cittutrāsamattaṃ parittabhayaṃ. Bhīrutāti sarīrakampanappattaṃ mahābhayaṃ. Idaṃ ubhayampi
atk-s0513a1:2877_4: mahāsattassa “yakkhiniyo nāmetā manussakhādikā”ti bheravārammaṇaṃ disvāpi nāhosi.
atk-s0513a1:2877_5: Tenāha “anivattitattā bhayabhīrutāya cā”ti. Bhayabhīrutāya abhāveneva bheravārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2877_6: disvāpi anivattanabhāvenāti attho. Na rakkhasīnaṃ vasamāgamimhaseti yakkhakantāre
atk-s0513a1:2877_7: tāsaṃ rakkhasīnaṃ vasaṃ na agamimha. Yasmā amhākaṃ kusalūpadese dhiti ca daḷhā ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2877_8: bhayabhīrutābhāvena ca anivattanasabhāvā ahumhā, tasmā rakkhasīnaṃ vasaṃ na agamimhāti
atk-s0513a1:2877_9: vuttaṃ hoti. Sa sotthibhāvo mahatā bhayena meti so mayhaṃ ayaṃ ajja mahatā bhayena
atk-s0513a1:2877_10: rakkhasīnaṃ santikā pattabbena dukkhadomanassena sotthibhāvo khemabhāvo pītisomanassabhāvoyeva jātoti.
atk-s0513a1:2878: Evaṃ mahāsatto imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desetvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2879: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “ahaṃ tena samayena takkasilaṃ gantvā rajjappattakumāro ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2883_0: Khemaṃ yahinti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2883_1: So hi bhikkhu satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā paccantaṃ gantvā ekaṃ gāmakaṃ upanissāya
atk-s0513a1:2883_2: araññasenāsane vassaṃ upagañchi. Tassa paṭhamamāseyeva piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa paṇṇasālā
atk-s0513a1:2883_3: jhāyittha. So vasanaṭṭhānābhāvena kilamanto upaṭṭhākānaṃ ācikkhi. Te “hotu, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2883_4: paṇṇasālaṃ karissāma, kasāma tāva, vapāma tāvā”tiādīni vadantā temāsaṃ vītināmesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2883_5: So senāsanasappāyābhāvena kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ nāsakkhi. So nimittamattampi
atk-s0513a1:2883_6: anuppādetvā vutthavasso jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthā
atk-s0513a1:2883_7: tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kiṃ nu kho te, bhikkhu, kammaṭṭhānaṃ sappāyaṃ jāta”nti
atk-s0513a1:2883_8: pucchi. So ādito paṭṭhāya asappāyabhāvaṃ kathesi. Satthā “pubbe kho, bhikkhu, tiracchānāpi
atk-s0513a1:2883_9: attano sappāyāsappāyaṃ ñatvā sappāyakāle vasitvā asappāyakāle vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya
atk-s0513a1:2883_10: aññattha agamaṃsu, tvaṃ kasmā attano sappāyāsappāyaṃ na aññāsī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2884_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sakuṇayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2884_1: viññutaṃ patvā sobhaggappatto sakuṇarājā hutvā ekasmiṃ araññāyatane jātassaratīre
atk-s0513a1:2884_2: sākhāviṭapasampannaṃ bahalapattapalāsaṃ mahārukkhaṃ upanissāya saparivāro vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:2884_3: Bahū sakuṇā tassa rukkhassa udakamatthake patthaṭasākhāsu vasantā sarīravaḷañjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2884_4: udake pātenti. Tasmiñca jātassare caṇḍo nāgarājā vasati. Tassa etadahosi “ime sakuṇā
atk-s0513a1:2884_5: mayhaṃ nivāse jātassare sarīravaḷañjaṃ pātenti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ udakato aggiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2884_6: rukkhaṃ jhāpetvā ete palāpeyya”nti. So kuddhamānaso rattibhāge sabbesaṃ sakuṇānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2884_7: sannipatitvā rukkhasākhāsu nipannakāle paṭhamaṃ tāva uddhanāropitaṃ viya udakaṃ pakkudhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2884_8: dutiyavāre dhūmaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā tatiyavāre tālakkhandhappamāṇaṃ jālaṃ uṭṭhāpesi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a1:2884_9: udakato jālaṃ uṭṭhahamānaṃ disvā “bho, sakuṇā, agginā ādittaṃ nāma udakena nibbāpenti,
atk-s0513a1:2884_10: idāni pana udakameva ādittaṃ. Na sakkā amhehi idha vasituṃ, aññattha gamissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2886: “Khemaṃ yahiṃ tattha arī udīrito, dakassa majjhe jalate ghatāsano;
atk-s0513a1:2887: Na ajja vāso mahiyā mahīruhe, disā bhajavho saraṇājja nobhaya”nti.
