atk-s0513a1:2888_0: Tattha khemaṃ yahiṃ tattha arī udīritoti yasmiṃ udakapiṭṭhe khemabhāvo nibbhayabhāvo,
atk-s0513a1:2888_1: tasmiṃ attapaccatthiko sapatto uṭṭhito. Dakassāti udakassa. Ghatāsanoti aggi. So
atk-s0513a1:2888_2: hi ghataṃ asnāti, tasmā “ghatāsano”ti vuccati. Na ajja vāsoti ajja no vāso natthi.
atk-s0513a1:2888_3: Mahiyā mahīruheti mahiruho vuccati rukkho, tasmiṃ imissā mahiyā jāte rukkheti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2888_4: Disā bhajavhoti disā bhajatha gacchatha. Saraṇājja no bhayanti ajja amhākaṃ saraṇato
atk-s0513a1:2888_5: bhayaṃ jātaṃ, paṭisaraṇaṭṭhānato bhayaṃ uppannanti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2889: Evaṃ vatvā bodhisatto attano vacanakare sakuṇe ādāya uppatitvā aññattha gato. Bodhisattassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā ṭhitasakuṇā jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā.
atk-s0513a1:2890: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne so bhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2891: Tadā bodhisattassa vacanakarā sakuṇā buddhaparisā ahesuṃ, sakuṇarājā pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a1:2895_0: Ye saññinoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto saṅkassanagaradvāre attanā saṃkhittena
atk-s0513a1:2895_1: pucchitapañhassa dhammasenāpatino vitthārabyākaraṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Tatridaṃ atītavatthu
atk-s0513a1:2895_2: – atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto araññāyatane kālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2895_3: karonto antevāsikehi pucchito “nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti āha…pe… tāpasā jeṭṭhantevāsikassa
atk-s0513a1:2895_4: kathaṃ na gaṇhiṃsu. Bodhisatto ābhassarato āgantvā ākāse ṭhatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2897: “Ye saññino tepi duggatā, yepi asaññino tepi duggatā;
atk-s0513a1:2898: Etaṃ ubhayaṃ vivajjaya, taṃ samāpattisukhaṃ anaṅgaṇa”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2899_0: Tattha ye saññinoti ṭhapetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanalābhino avasese sacittakasatte
atk-s0513a1:2899_1: dasseti. Tepi duggatāti tassā samāpattiyā alābhato tepi duggatā nāma. Yepi asaññinoti
atk-s0513a1:2899_2: asaññabhave nibbatte acittakasatte dasseti. Tepi duggatāti tepi imissāyeva samāpattiyā
atk-s0513a1:2899_3: alābhato duggatāyeva nāma. Etaṃ ubhayaṃ vivajjayāti etaṃ ubhayampi saññibhavañca
atk-s0513a1:2899_4: asaññibhavañca vivajjaya pajahāti antevāsikaṃ ovadati. Taṃ samāpattisukhaṃ anaṅgaṇanti
atk-s0513a1:2899_5: taṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattilābhino santaṭṭhena “sukha”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ jhānasukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2899_6: anaṅgaṇaṃ niddosaṃ balavacittekaggatāsabhāvenapi taṃ anaṅgaṇaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2900: Evaṃ bodhisatto dhammaṃ desetvā antevāsikassa guṇaṃ kathetvā brahmalokameva agamāsi. Tadā sesatāpasā jeṭṭhantevāsikassa saddahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2901: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā jeṭṭhantevāsiko sāriputto, mahābrahmā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2905_0: Candābhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto saṅkassanagaradvāre therasseva pañhabyākaraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2905_1: ārabbha kathesi. Atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto araññāyatane
atk-s0513a1:2905_2: kālaṃ karonto antevāsikehi pucchito “candābhaṃ sūriyābha”nti vatvā ābhassare nibbatto.
atk-s0513a1:2905_3: Tāpasā jeṭṭhantevāsikassa na saddahiṃsu. Bodhisatto ābhassarato āgantvā ākāse ṭhito imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2909_0: Tattha candābhanti odātakasiṇaṃ dasseti. Sūriyābhanti pītakasiṇaṃ. Yodha paññāya
atk-s0513a1:2909_1: gādhatīti yo puggalo idha sattaloke idaṃ kasiṇadvayaṃ paññāya gādhati, ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2909_2: katvā anupavisati, tattheva patiṭṭhahati. Atha vā candābhaṃ sūriyābhañca, yodha paññāya
atk-s0513a1:2909_3: gādhatīti yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ candābhā ca sūriyābhā ca patthaṭā, tatthake ṭhāne paṭibhāgakasiṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2909_4: vaḍḍhetvā taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā jhānaṃ nibbattento ubhayampetaṃ ābhaṃ paññāya gādhati
atk-s0513a1:2909_5: nāma. Tasmā ayampettha atthoyeva. Avitakkena jhānena, hoti ābhassarūpagoti so puggalo
atk-s0513a1:2909_6: tathā katvā paṭiladdhena dutiyena jhānena ābhassarabrahmalokūpago hotīti.
atk-s0513a1:2910: Evaṃ bodhisatto tāpase bodhetvā jeṭṭhantevāsikassa guṇaṃ kathetvā brahmalokameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:2911: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā jeṭṭhantevāsiko sāriputto, mahābrahmā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2915_0: Yaṃ laddhaṃ tena tuṭṭhabbanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ
atk-s0513a1:2915_1: ārabbha kathesi. Sāvatthiyañhi aññataro upāsako bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ lasuṇena pavāretvā
atk-s0513a1:2915_2: khettapālaṃ āṇāpesi “sace bhikkhuniyo āgacchanti, ekekāya bhikkhuniyā dve tayo bhaṇḍike
atk-s0513a1:2915_3: dehī”ti. Tato paṭṭhāya bhikkhuniyo tassa gehampi khettampi lasuṇatthāya gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:2915_4: Athekasmiṃ ussavadivase tassa gehe lasuṇaṃ parikkhayaṃ agamāsi. Thullanandā bhikkhunī
atk-s0513a1:2915_5: saparivārā gehaṃ gantvā “lasuṇenāvuso attho”ti vatvā “natthayye, yathābhataṃ lasuṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2915_6: parikkhīṇaṃ, khettaṃ gacchathā”ti vuttā khettaṃ gantvā na mattaṃ jānitvā lasuṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2915_7: āharāpesi. Khettapālo ujjhāyi “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo na mattaṃ jānitvā lasuṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2915_8: harāpessantī”ti? Tassa kathaṃ sutvā yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā, tāpi, tāsaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a1:2915_9: bhikkhūpi, ujjhāyiṃsu. Ujjhāyitvā ca pana bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā
atk-s0513a1:2915_10: thullanandaṃ bhikkhaniṃ garahitvā “bhikkhave, mahiccho puggalo nāma vijātamātuyāpi
atk-s0513a1:2915_11: appiyo hoti amanāpo, appasanne pasādetuṃ, pasannānaṃ vā bhiyyosomattāya pasādaṃ janetuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2915_12: anuppannaṃ vā lābhaṃ uppādetuṃ, uppannaṃ vā pana lābhaṃ thiraṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a1:2915_13: Appiccho pana puggalo appasanne pasādetuṃ, pasannānaṃ vā bhiyyosomattāya pasādaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2915_14: janetuṃ, anuppannaṃ vā lābhaṃ uppādetuṃ, uppannaṃ vā pana lābhaṃ thiraṃ kātuṃ sakkotī”tiādinā
atk-s0513a1:2915_15: nayena bhikkhūnaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ dhammaṃ kathetvā “na, bhikkhave, thullanandā idāneva
atk-s0513a1:2915_16: mahicchā, pubbepi mahicchāyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2916_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto aññatarasmiṃ brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0513a1:2916_1: nibbatti. Tassa vayappattassa samānajātikā kulā pajāpatiṃ āhariṃsu. Tassā nandā nandāvatī
atk-s0513a1:2916_2: sundarīnandāti tisso dhītaro ahesuṃ. Tāsu patikulaṃ agatāsuyeva bodhisatto kālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2916_3: katvā suvaṇṇahaṃsayoniyaṃ nibbatti, jātissarañāṇañcassa uppajji. So vayappatto suvaṇṇasañchannaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2916_4: sobhaggappattaṃ mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ disvā “kuto nu kho cavitvā ahaṃ idhūpapanno”ti
atk-s0513a1:2916_5: āvajjento “manussalokato”ti ñatvā puna “kathaṃ nu kho me brāhmaṇī ca dhītaro ca jīvantī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2916_6: upadhārento “paresaṃ bhatiṃ katvā kicchena jīvantī”ti ñatvā cintesi “mayhaṃ sarīre
atk-s0513a1:2916_7: sovaṇṇamayāni pattāni koṭṭanaghaṭṭanakhamāni, ito tāsaṃ ekekaṃ pattaṃ dassāmi, tena
atk-s0513a1:2916_8: me pajāpati ca dhītaro ca sukhaṃ jīvissantī”ti. So tattha gantvā piṭṭhivaṃsakoṭiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2916_9: nilīyi, brāhmaṇī ca dhītaro ca bodhisattaṃ disvā “kuto āgatosi, sāmī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2916_10: “Ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pitā kālaṃ katvā suvaṇṇahaṃsayoniyaṃ nibbatto tumhe daṭṭhuṃ āgato.
atk-s0513a1:2916_11: Ito paṭṭhāya tumhākaṃ paresaṃ bhatiṃ katvā dukkhajīvikāya jīvanakiccaṃ natthi, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2916_12: vo ekekaṃ pattaṃ dassāmi, taṃ vikkiṇitvā sukhena jīvathā”ti ekaṃ pattaṃ datvā agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2916_13: So eteneva niyāmena antarantarā āgantvā ekekaṃ pattaṃ deti, brāhmaṇī ca dhītaro ca
atk-s0513a1:2917_0: Athekadivasaṃ sā brāhmaṇī dhītaro āmantesi “ammā, tiracchānānaṃ nāma cittaṃ dujjānaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2917_1: Kadāci vo pitā idha nāgaccheyya, idānissa āgatakāle sabbāni pattānipi luñcitvā gaṇhāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2917_2: Tā “evaṃ no pitā kilamissatī”ti na sampaṭicchiṃsu. Brāhmaṇī pana mahicchatāya puna
atk-s0513a1:2917_3: ekadivasaṃ suvaṇṇahaṃsarājassa āgatakāle “ehi tāva, sāmī”ti vatvā taṃ attano santikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2917_4: upagataṃ ubhohi hatthehi gahetvā sabbapattāni luñci. Tāni pana bodhisattassa ruciṃ
atk-s0513a1:2917_5: vinā balakkārena gahitattā sabbāni bakapattasadisāni ahesuṃ. Bodhisatto pakkhe pasāretvā
atk-s0513a1:2917_6: gantuṃ nāsakkhi. Atha naṃ sā mahācāṭiyaṃ pakkhipitvā posesi. Tassa puna uṭṭhahantāni
atk-s0513a1:2917_7: pattāni setāni sampajjiṃsu. So sañjātapatto uppatitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gantvā na puna āgamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2918_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, thullanandā idāneva mahicchā, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:2918_1: mahicchāyeva, mahicchatāya ca pana suvaṇṇamhā parihīnā. Idāni pana attano mahicchatāya
atk-s0513a1:2918_2: eva lasuṇamhāpi parihāyissati, tasmā ito paṭṭhāya lasuṇaṃ khādituṃ na labhissati.
atk-s0513a1:2918_3: Yathā ca thullanandā, evaṃ taṃ nissāya sesabhikkhuniyopi. Tasmā bahuṃ labhitvāpi
atk-s0513a1:2918_4: pamāṇameva jānitabbaṃ, appaṃ labhitvā pana yathāladdheneva santoso kātabbo, uttari
atk-s0513a1:2920: “Yaṃ laddhaṃ tena tuṭṭhabbaṃ, atilobho hi pāpako;
atk-s0513a1:2923_0: Idaṃ pana vatvā satthā anekapariyāyena garahitvā “yā pana bhikkhunī lasuṇaṃ khādeyya,
atk-s0513a1:2923_1: pācittiya”nti sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā brāhmaṇī ayaṃ thullanandā
atk-s0513a1:2923_2: ahosi, tisso dhītaro idāni tissoyeva bhaginiyo, suvaṇṇahaṃsarājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2927_0: Yattheko labhate babbūti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kāṇamātusikkhāpadaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a1:2927_1: kathesi. Sāvatthiyañhi kāṇamātā nāma dhītuvasena pākaṭanāmā upāsikā ahosi sotāpannā
atk-s0513a1:2927_2: ariyasāvikā. Sā dhītaraṃ kāṇaṃ aññatarasmiṃ gāmake samānajātikassa purisassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2927_3: Kāṇā kenacideva karaṇīyena mātu gharaṃ agamāsi. Athassā sāmiko katipāhaccayena dūtaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2927_4: pāhesi “āgacchatu kāṇā, icchāmi kāṇāya āgamana”nti. Kāṇā dūtassa vacanaṃ sutvā “amma,
atk-s0513a1:2927_5: gamissāmī”ti mātaraṃ āpucchi. Kāṇamātā “ettakaṃ kālaṃ vasitvā kathaṃ tucchahatthāva
atk-s0513a1:2927_6: gamissasī”ti pūvaṃ paci. Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe eko piṇḍacāriko bhikkhu tassā nivesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2927_7: agamāsi, upāsikā taṃ nisīdāpetvā pattapūraṃ pūvaṃ dāpesi. So bhikkhu nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2927_8: aññassa ācikkhi, tassapi tatheva dāpesi. Sopi nikkhamitvā aññassa ācikkhi, tassapi
atk-s0513a1:2927_9: tathevāti evaṃ catunnaṃ janānaṃ dāpesi. Yathāpaṭiyattaṃ pūvaṃ parikkhayaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2927_10: kāṇāya gamanaṃ na sampajji. Athassā sāmiko dutiyampi, tatiyampi dūtaṃ pāhesi. Tatiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2927_11: pāhento ca “sace kāṇā nāgacchissati, ahaṃ aññaṃ pajāpatiṃ ānessāmī”ti pāhesi. Tayopi
atk-s0513a1:2927_12: vāre teneva upāyena gamanaṃ na sampajji, kāṇāya sāmiko aññaṃ pajāpatiṃ ānesi. Kāṇā
atk-s0513a1:2928_0: Satthā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kāṇamātāya nivesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2928_1: gantvā paññattāsane nisīditvā kāṇamātaraṃ pucchi “kissāyaṃ kāṇā rodatī”ti? “Iminā
atk-s0513a1:2928_2: nāma kāraṇenā”ti ca sutvā kāṇamātaraṃ samassāsetvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0513a1:2928_3: vihāraṃ agamāsi. Atha tesaṃ catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tayo vāre yathāpaṭiyattapūvaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:2928_4: kāṇāya gamanassa upacchinnabhāvo bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭo jāto. Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū
atk-s0513a1:2928_5: dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, catūhi nāma bhikkhūhi tayo vāre kāṇamātāya
atk-s0513a1:2928_6: pakkapūvaṃ khāditvā kāṇāya gamanantarāyaṃ katvā sāmikena pariccattaṃ dhītaraṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a1:2928_7: mahāupāsikāya domanassaṃ uppādita”nti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi
atk-s0513a1:2928_8: kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva te cattāro
atk-s0513a1:2928_9: bhikkhū kāṇamātāya santakaṃ khāditvā tassā domanassaṃ uppādesuṃ, pubbepi uppādesuṃyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2929_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto pāsāṇakoṭṭakakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2929_1: vayappatto pariyodātasippo ahosi. Kāsiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ nigame eko mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi
atk-s0513a1:2929_2: ahosi, tassa nidhānagatāyeva cattālīsa hiraññakoṭiyo ahesuṃ. Athassa bhariyā kālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2929_3: katvā dhanasinehena gantvā dhanapiṭṭhiyaṃ mūsikā hutvā nibbatti. Evaṃ anukkamena
atk-s0513a1:2929_4: sabbampi taṃ kulaṃ abbhatthaṃ agamāsi, vaṃso upacchijji. So gāmopi chaḍḍito apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2929_5: agamāsi. Tadā bodhisatto tasmiṃ purāṇagāmaṭṭhāne pāsāṇe uppāṭetvā koṭṭeti. Atha sā
atk-s0513a1:2929_6: mūsikā gocarāya caramānā bodhisattaṃ punappunaṃ passantī uppannasinehā hutvā cintesi
atk-s0513a1:2929_7: “mayhaṃ dhanaṃ bahu nikkāraṇena nassissati, iminā saddhiṃ ekato hutvā idaṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2929_8: datvā maṃsaṃ vikkiṇāpetvā khādissāmī”ti. Sā ekadivasaṃ ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ mukhena ḍaṃsitvā
atk-s0513a1:2929_9: bodhisattassa santikaṃ agamāsi. So taṃ disvā piyavācāya samālapanto “kiṃ nu kho,
atk-s0513a1:2929_10: amma, kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā āgatāsī”ti āha. Tāta, imaṃ gahetvā attanāpi paribhuñja, mayhampi
atk-s0513a1:2929_11: maṃsaṃ āharāti. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā kahāpaṇaṃ ādāya gharaṃ gantvā ekena māsakena
atk-s0513a1:2929_12: maṃsaṃ kiṇitvā āharitvā tassā adāsi. Sā taṃ gahetvā attano nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā yathāruciyā
atk-s0513a1:2929_13: khādi. Tato paṭṭhāya imināva niyāmena divase divase bodhisattassa kahāpaṇaṃ deti,
atk-s0513a1:2930_0: Athekadivasaṃ taṃ mūsikaṃ biḷāro aggahesi. Atha naṃ sā evamāha “mā, samma, maṃ māresī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2930_1: Kiṃkāraṇā na māressāmi? Ahañhi chāto maṃsaṃ khāditukāmo, na sakkā mayā na māretunti.
atk-s0513a1:2930_2: Kiṃ pana ekadivasameva maṃsaṃ khāditukāmosi, udāhu niccakālanti? “Labhamāno niccakālampi
atk-s0513a1:2930_3: khāditukāmomhī”ti. “Yadi evaṃ ahaṃ te niccakālaṃ maṃsaṃ dassāmi, vissajjehi ma”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2930_4: Atha naṃ biḷāro “tena hi appamattā hohī”ti vissajjesi. Tato paṭṭhāya sā attano ābhataṃ
atk-s0513a1:2930_5: maṃsaṃ dve koṭṭhāse katvā ekaṃ biḷārassa deti, ekaṃ sayaṃ khādati. Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2930_6: aññopi biḷāro aggahesi, tampi tatheva saññāpetvā attānaṃ vissajjāpesi. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:2930_7: tayo koṭṭhāse katvā khādanti. Puna añño aggahesi, tampi tatheva saññāpetvā attānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2930_8: mocāpesi. Tato paṭṭhāya cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā khādanti. Puna añño aggahesi, tampi
atk-s0513a1:2930_9: tatheva saññāpetvā attānaṃ mocāpesi. Tato paṭṭhāya pañca koṭṭhāse katvā khādanti.
atk-s0513a1:2930_10: Sā pañcamaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ khādamānā appāhāratāya kilantā kisā ahosi appamaṃsalohitā
atk-s0513a1:2931_0: Bodhisatto taṃ disvā “amma, kasmā milātāsī”ti vatvā “iminā nāma kāraṇenā”ti vutte
atk-s0513a1:2931_1: “tvaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ kasmā mayhaṃ nācikkhi, ahamettha kātabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti taṃ samassāsetvā
atk-s0513a1:2931_2: suddhaphalikapāsāṇena guhaṃ katvā āharitvā “amma, tvaṃ imaṃ guhaṃ pavisitvā nipajjitvā
atk-s0513a1:2931_3: āgatāgatānaṃ pharusāhi vācāhi santajjeyyāsī”ti āha. Sā guhaṃ pavisitvā nipajji. Atheko
atk-s0513a1:2931_4: biḷāro āgantvā “dehi, ajja me maṃsa”nti āha. Atha naṃ mūsikā “are, duṭṭhabiḷāra,
atk-s0513a1:2931_5: kiṃ te ahaṃ maṃsahārikā, attano puttānaṃ maṃsaṃ khādā”ti tajjesi. Biḷāro phalikaguhāya
atk-s0513a1:2931_6: nipannabhāvaṃ ajānanto kodhavasena mūsikaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti sahasāva pakkhanditvā hadayena
atk-s0513a1:2931_7: phalikaguhāyaṃ pahari. Tāvadevassa hadayaṃ bhijji, akkhīni nikkhamanākārappattāni
atk-s0513a1:2931_8: jātāni. So tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ patvā ekamantaṃ paṭicchannaṭṭhāne pati. Etenūpāyena
atk-s0513a1:2931_9: aparopi aparopīti cattāropi janā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya mūsikā nibbhayā
atk-s0513a1:2931_10: hutvā bodhisattassa devasikaṃ dve tayo kahāpaṇe deti. Evaṃ anukkamena sabbampi dhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2931_11: bodhisattasseva adāsi. Te ubhopi yāvajīvaṃ mettiṃ abhinditvā yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:2932: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2935: Tatiyo ca catuttho ca, idaṃ te babbukā bila”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2936_0: Tattha yatthāti yasmiṃ ṭhāne. Babbūti biḷāro. Dutiyo tattha jāyatīti yattha eko mūsikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2936_1: vā maṃsaṃ vā labhati, dutiyopi tattha biḷāro jāyati uppajjati, tathā tatiyo ca catuttho
atk-s0513a1:2936_2: ca. Evaṃ te tadā cattāro biḷārā ahesuṃ. Hutvā ca pana divase divase maṃsaṃ khādantā
atk-s0513a1:2936_3: te babbukā idaṃ phalikamayaṃ bilaṃ urena paharitvā sabbepi jīvitakkhayaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0513a1:2937: Evaṃ satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā cattāro biḷārā cattāro bhikkhū ahesuṃ, mūsikā kāṇamātā, pāsāṇakoṭṭakamaṇikāro pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2941: Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedhāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kuhakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. Paccuppannavatthu heṭṭhā kathitasadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2942_0: Atīte pana bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto godhāyoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2942_1: gaṇhi. Tadā eko pañcābhiñño uggatapo tāpaso ekaṃ paccantagāmaṃ nissāya araññāyatane
atk-s0513a1:2942_2: paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasati, gāmavāsino tāpasaṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahanti. Bodhisatto tassa
atk-s0513a1:2942_3: caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ekasmiṃ vammike vasati, vasanto ca pana divase divase dve tayo vāre
atk-s0513a1:2942_4: tāpasaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ atthūpasaṃhitañca vacanaṃ sutvā tāpasaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0513a1:2942_5: vasanaṭṭhānameva gacchati. Aparabhāge tāpaso gāmavāsino āpucchitvā pakkāmi. Pakkamante
atk-s0513a1:2942_6: ca pana tasmiṃ sīlavatasampanne tāpase añño kūṭatāpaso āgantvā tasmiṃ assamapade
atk-s0513a1:2942_7: vāsaṃ kappesi. Bodhisatto “ayampi sīlavā”ti sallakkhetvā purimanayeneva tassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2943_0: Athekadivasaṃ nidāghasamaye akālameghe vuṭṭhe vammikehi makkhikā nikkhamiṃsu, tāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2943_1: khādanatthaṃ godhā āhiṇḍiṃsu. Gāmavāsino nikkhamitvā makkhikākhādakā godhā gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:2943_2: siniddhasambhārasaṃyuttaṃ ambilānambilaṃ godhāmaṃsaṃ sampādetvā tāpasassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2943_3: Tāpaso godhāmaṃsaṃ khāditvā rasataṇhāya baddho “idaṃ maṃsaṃ atimadhuraṃ, kissa maṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2943_4: nāmeta”nti pucchitvā “godhāmaṃsa”nti sutvā “mama santikaṃ mahāgodhā āgacchati, taṃ
atk-s0513a1:2943_5: māretvā maṃsaṃ khādissāmī”ti cintesi. Cintetvā ca pana bhājanañca sappiloṇādīni ca
atk-s0513a1:2943_6: āharāpetvā ekamante ṭhapetvā muggaramādāya kāsāvena paṭicchādetvā paṇṇasālādvāre
atk-s0513a1:2943_7: bodhisattassa āgamanaṃ olokayamāno upasantūpasanto viya hutvā nisīdi bodhisatto sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0513a1:2943_8: “tāpasassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā upasaṅkamantova tassa indriyavippakāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2943_9: disvā cintesi “nāyaṃ tāpaso aññesu divasesu nisīdanākārena nisinno, ajjesa maṃ olokentopi
atk-s0513a1:2943_10: duṭṭhindriyo hutvā oloketi, pariggaṇhissāmi na”nti. So tāpasassa heṭṭhāvāte ṭhatvā
atk-s0513a1:2943_11: godhāmaṃsagandhaṃ ghāyitvā “iminā kūṭatāpasena ajja godhāmaṃsaṃ khāditaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2943_12: tenesa rasataṇhāya baddho ajja maṃ attano santikaṃ upasaṅkamantaṃ muggarena paharitvā
atk-s0513a1:2943_13: maṃsaṃ pacitvā khāditukāmo bhavissatī”ti tassa santikaṃ anupagantvāva paṭikkamitvā vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:2944_0: Tāpaso bodhisattassa anāgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “iminā ‘ayaṃ maṃ paharitukāmo’ti ñātaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2944_1: bhavissati, tena kāraṇena nāgacchati, anāgacchantassāpissa kuto muttī”ti muggaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2944_2: nīharitvā khipi. So tassa agganaṅguṭṭhameva āsādesi. Bodhisatto vegena vammikaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:2944_3: aññena chiddena sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā “ambho kūṭajaṭila, ahaṃ tava santikaṃ upasaṅkamanto
atk-s0513a1:2944_4: ‘sīlavā’ti saññāya upasaṅkamiṃ, idāni pana te mayā kūṭabhāvo ñāto, tādisassa mahācorassa
atk-s0513a1:2944_5: kiṃ iminā pabbajjāliṅgenā”ti vatvā taṃ garahanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2946: “Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;
atk-s0513a1:2948_0: Tattha kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedhāti ambho dummedha, nippañña etā pabbajitena dhāretabbā
atk-s0513a1:2948_1: jaṭā, pabbajjāguṇarahitassa kiṃ te tāhi jaṭāhīti attho. Kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyāti ajinasāṭiyā
atk-s0513a1:2948_2: anucchavikassa saṃvarassa abhāvakālato paṭṭhāya kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā. Abbhantaraṃ te
atk-s0513a1:2948_3: gahananti tava abbhantaraṃ hadayaṃ rāgadosamohagahanena gahanaṃ paṭicchannaṃ. Bāhiraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2948_4: parimajjasīti so tvaṃ abbhantare gahane nhānādīhi ceva liṅgagahanena ca bāhiraṃ parimajjasi,
atk-s0513a1:2948_5: taṃ parimajjanto kañjikapūritalābu viya visapūritacāṭi viya āsīvisapūritavammiko
atk-s0513a1:2948_6: viya gūthapūritacittaghaṭo viya ca bahimaṭṭhova hosi, kiṃ tayā corena idha vasantena,
atk-s0513a1:2948_7: sīghaṃ ito palāyāhi, no ce palāyasi, gāmavāsīnaṃ te ācikkhitvā niggahaṃ kārāpessāmīti.
atk-s0513a1:2949: Evaṃ bodhisatto kūṭatāpasaṃ tajjetvā vammikameva pāvisi, kūṭatāpasopi tato pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2950: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kūṭatāpaso ayaṃ kuhako ahosi, purimo sīlavantatāpaso sāriputto, godhāpaṇḍito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2954_0: Akkhī bhinnā paṭo naṭṭhoti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2954_1: Tadā kira dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, seyyathāpi nāma chavālātaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2954_2: ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagataṃ nevāraññe kaṭṭhatthaṃ pharati, na gāme kaṭṭhatthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2954_3: pharati, evameva devadatto evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā ubhato bhaṭṭho ubhato
atk-s0513a1:2954_4: paribāhiro jāto, gihiparibhogā ca parihīno, sāmaññatthañca na paripūretī”ti. Satthā
atk-s0513a1:2954_5: āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2954_6: vutte “na, bhikkhave, devadatto idāneva ubhato bhaṭṭho hoti, atītepi ubhato bhaṭṭho
atk-s0513a1:2955_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2955_1: Tadā ekasmiṃ gāmake bāḷisikā vasanti. Atheko bāḷisiko baḷisaṃ ādāya daharena puttena
atk-s0513a1:2955_2: saddhiṃ yasmiṃ sobbhe pakatiyāpi bāḷisikā macche gaṇhanti, tattha gantvā baḷisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2955_3: khipi. Baḷiso udakapaṭicchanne ekasmiṃ khāṇuke laggi. Bāḷisiko taṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ asakkonto
atk-s0513a1:2955_4: cintesi “ayaṃ baḷiso mahāmacche laggo bhavissati, puttakaṃ mātu santikaṃ pesetvā
atk-s0513a1:2955_5: paṭivissakehi saddhiṃ kalahaṃ kārāpemi, evaṃ ito na koci koṭṭhāsaṃ paccāsīsissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2955_6: So puttaṃ āha “gaccha, tāta, amhehi mahāmacchassa laddhabhāvaṃ mātu ācikkhāhi, ‘paṭivissakehi
atk-s0513a1:2955_7: kira saddhiṃ kalahaṃ karohī’ti vadehī”ti. So puttaṃ pesetvā baḷisaṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ asakkonto
atk-s0513a1:2955_8: rajjucchedanabhayena uttarisāṭakaṃ thale ṭhapetvā udakaṃ otaritvā macchalobhena macchaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2955_9: upadhārento khāṇukehi paharitvā dvepi akkhīni bhindi. Thale ṭhapitasāṭakaṃpissa coro
atk-s0513a1:2955_10: hari. So vedanāppatto hutvā hatthena akkhīni uppīḷayamāno gahetvā udakā uttaritvā
atk-s0513a1:2956_0: Sāpissa bhariyā “kalahaṃ katvā kassaci apaccāsīsanabhāvaṃ karissāmī”ti ekasmiṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:2956_1: kaṇṇe tālapaṇṇaṃ piḷandhitvā ekaṃ akkhiṃ ukkhalimasiyā añjetvā kukkuraṃ aṅkenādāya
atk-s0513a1:2956_2: paṭivissakagharaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ ekā sahāyikā evamāha “ekasmiṃyeva te kaṇṇe tālapaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2956_3: piḷandhitaṃ, ekaṃ akkhi añjitaṃ, piyaputtaṃ viya kukkuraṃ aṅkenādāya gharato gharaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2956_4: gacchasi, kiṃ ummattikāsi jātā”ti. “Nāhaṃ ummattikā, tvaṃ pana maṃ akāraṇena akkosasi
atk-s0513a1:2956_5: paribhāsasi, idāni taṃ gāmabhojakassa santikaṃ gantvā aṭṭha kahāpaṇe daṇḍāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2956_6: evaṃ kalahaṃ katvā ubhopi gāmabhojakassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu. Kalahe visodhiyamāne
atk-s0513a1:2956_7: tassāyeva matthake daṇḍo pati. Atha naṃ bandhitvā “daṇḍaṃ dehī”ti pothetuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2957_0: Rukkhadevatā gāme tassā imaṃ pavattiṃ, araññe cassā patino taṃ byasanaṃ disvā khandhantare
atk-s0513a1:2957_1: ṭhitā “bho purisa, tuyhaṃ udakepi kammanto paduṭṭho thalepi, ubhatobhaṭṭho jāto”ti
atk-s0513a1:2959: “Akkhī bhinnā paṭo naṭṭho, sakhigehe ca bhaṇḍanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:2960: Ubhato paduṭṭhā kammantā, udakamhi thalamhi cā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2961_0: Tattha sakhigehe ca bhaṇḍananti sakhī nāma sahāyikā, tassā ca gehe tava bhariyāya
atk-s0513a1:2961_1: bhaṇḍanaṃ kataṃ, bhaṇḍanaṃ katvā bandhitvā pothetvā daṇḍaṃ dāpiyati. Ubhato paduṭṭhā
atk-s0513a1:2961_2: kammantāti evaṃ tava dvīsupi ṭhānesu kammantā paduṭṭhāyeva bhinnāyeva. Kataresu dvīsu?
atk-s0513a1:2961_3: Udakamhi thalamhi cāti, akkhibhedena paṭanāsena ca udake kammantā paduṭṭhā, sakhigehe
atk-s0513a1:2962: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā bāḷisiko devadatto ahosi, rukkhadevatā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2966: Niccaṃ ubbiggahadayāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ñātatthacariyaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Paccuppannavatthu dvādasakanipāte bhaddasālajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2967_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kākayoniyaṃ nibbatti. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2967_1: rañño purohito bahinagare nadiyaṃ nhāyitvā gandhe vilimpitvā mālaṃ piḷandhitvā varavatthanivattho
atk-s0513a1:2967_2: nagaraṃ pāvisi. Nagaradvāratoraṇe dve kākā nisinnā honti. Tesu eko ekaṃ āha – “samma,
atk-s0513a1:2967_3: ahaṃ imassa brāhmaṇassa matthake sarīravaḷañjaṃ pātessāmī”ti. Itaro “mā te etaṃ rucci,
atk-s0513a1:2967_4: ayaṃ brāhmaṇo issaro, issarajanena ca saddhiṃ veraṃ nāma pāpakaṃ. Ayañhi kuddho sabbepi
atk-s0513a1:2967_5: kāke vināseyyā”ti. “Na sakkā mayā na kātu”nti. “Tena hi paññāyissasī”ti vatvā itaro
atk-s0513a1:2967_6: kāko palāyi. So toraṇassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ sampatte brāhmaṇe olambakaṃ cālento viya tassa
atk-s0513a1:2967_7: matthake vaccaṃ pātesi. Brāhmaṇo kujjhitvā kākesu veraṃ bandhi.
atk-s0513a1:2968_0: Tasmiṃ kāle ekā bhatiyā vīhikoṭṭikadāsī vīhiṃ gehadvāre ātape pattharitvā rakkhantī
atk-s0513a1:2968_1: nisinnāva niddaṃ okkami. Tassā pamādaṃ ñatvā eko dīghalomako eḷako āgantvā vīhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2968_2: khādi, sā pabujjhitvā taṃ disvā palāpesi. Eḷako dutiyampi, tatiyampi tassā tatheva
atk-s0513a1:2968_3: niddāyanakāle āgantvā vīhiṃ khādi. Sāpi taṃ tikkhattuṃ palāpetvā cintesi “ayaṃ punappunaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2968_4: khādanto upaḍḍhavīhiṃ khādissati, bahu me chedo bhavissati, idānissa puna anāgamanakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2968_5: karissāmī”ti. Sā alātaṃ gahetvā niddāyamānā viya nisīditvā vīhikhādanatthāya eḷake
atk-s0513a1:2968_6: sampatte uṭṭhāya alātena eḷakaṃ pahari, lomāni aggiṃ gaṇhiṃsu. So sarīre jhāyante
atk-s0513a1:2968_7: “aggiṃ nibbāpessāmī”ti vegena gantvā hatthisālāya samīpe ekissā tiṇakuṭiyā sarīraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2968_8: ghaṃsi, sā pajjali. Tato uṭṭhitā jālā hatthisālaṃ gaṇhi. Hatthisālāsu jhāyantīsu
atk-s0513a1:2968_9: hatthipiṭṭhāni jhāyiṃsu, bahū hatthī vaṇitasarīrā ahesuṃ. Vejjā hatthī aroge kātuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2968_10: asakkontā rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā purohitaṃ āha “ācariya, hatthivejjā hatthī tikicchituṃ
atk-s0513a1:2968_11: na sakkonti, api kiñci bhesajjaṃ jānāsī”ti. “Jānāmi, mahārājā”ti. “Kiṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2968_12: “Kākavasā, mahārājā”ti. Rājā “tena hi kāke māretvā vasaṃ āharathā”ti āha. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:2968_13: kāke māretvā vasaṃ alabhitvā tattha tattheva rāsiṃ karonti, kākānaṃ mahābhayaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0513a1:2969_0: Tadā bodhisatto asītikākasahassaparivāro mahāsusāne vasati. Atheko kāko gantvā kākānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2969_1: uppannabhayaṃ bodhisattassa ārocesi. So cintesi “ṭhapetvā maṃ añño mayhaṃ ñātakānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2969_2: uppannabhayaṃ harituṃ samattho nāma natthi, harissāmi na”nti dasa pāramiyo āvajjetvā
atk-s0513a1:2969_3: mettāpāramiṃ purecārikaṃ katvā ekavegena pakkhanditvā vivaṭamahāvātapānena pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:2969_4: rañño āsanassa heṭṭhā pāvisi. Atha naṃ eko manusso gahitukāmo ahosi. Rājā “saraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2969_5: paviṭṭho, mā gaṇhī”ti vāresi. Mahāsatto thokaṃ vissamitvā mettāpāramiṃ āvajjetvā
atk-s0513a1:2969_6: heṭṭhāsanā nikkhamitvā rājānaṃ āha – “mahārāja, raññā nāma chandādivasena agantvā
atk-s0513a1:2969_7: rajjaṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭati. Yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ kattabbaṃ hoti, sabbaṃ nisamma upadhāretvā
atk-s0513a1:2969_8: kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Yañca kayiramānaṃ nipphajjati, tadeva kātuṃ vaṭṭati, na itaraṃ. Sace
atk-s0513a1:2969_9: hi rājāno yaṃ kayiramānaṃ na nipphajjati, taṃ karonti, mahājanassa maraṇabhayapariyosānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2969_10: mahābhayaṃ uppajjati. Purohito veravasiko hutvā musāvādaṃ abhāsi, kākānaṃ vasā nāma
atk-s0513a1:2969_11: natthī”ti. Taṃ sutvā rājā pasannacitto bodhisattassa kañcanabhaddapīṭhaṃ dāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2969_12: tattha nisinnassa pakkhantarāni satapākasahassapākatelehi makkhāpetvā kañcanataṭṭake
atk-s0513a1:2969_13: rājārahaṃ subhojanaṃ bhojāpetvā pānīyaṃ pāyetvā suhitaṃ vigatadarathaṃ mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2969_14: etadavoca “paṇḍita, tvaṃ ‘kākānaṃ vasā nāma natthī’ti vadesi, kena kāraṇena nesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2969_15: vasā na hotī”ti bodhisatto “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenā”ti sakalanivesanaṃ ekaravaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2972: Tasmā nesaṃ vasā natthi, kākānamhāka ñātina”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2973_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – mahārāja, kākā nāma niccaṃ ubbiggamānasā bhayappattāva viharanti,
atk-s0513a1:2973_1: sabbalokassa ca vihesakā, khattiyādayo manussepi itthipurisepi kumārakumārikādayopi
atk-s0513a1:2973_2: viheṭhentā kilamentāva vicaranti, tasmā imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi nesaṃ amhākaṃ ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2973_3: kākānaṃ vasā nāma natthi. Atītepi na bhūtapubbā, anāgatepi na bhavissatīti.
atk-s0513a1:2974_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto imaṃ kāraṇaṃ uttānaṃ katvā “mahārāja, raññā nāma anisamma anupadhāretvā
atk-s0513a1:2974_1: kammaṃ na kattabba”nti rājānaṃ bodhesi. Rājā tussitvā bodhisattaṃ rajjena pūjesi.
atk-s0513a1:2974_2: Bodhisatto rajjaṃ raññoyeva paṭidatvā rājānaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā sabbasattānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2974_3: abhayaṃ yāci. Rājā tassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sabbasattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā kākānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2974_4: nibaddhadānaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Divase divase taṇḍulambaṇassa bhattaṃ pacitvā nānaggarasehi
atk-s0513a1:2974_5: omadditvā kākānaṃ dīyati, mahāsattassa pana rājabhojanameva dīyittha.
atk-s0513a1:2975: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā bārāṇasirājā ānando ahosi, kākarājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2985: Na pāpajanasaṃsevīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ekaṃ vipakkhaseviṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. Paccuppannavatthu mahiḷāmukhajātake kathitasadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2986_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto godhāyoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2986_1: gaṇhi. So vayappatto nadītīre mahābile anekagodhāsataparivāro vāsaṃ kappesi. Tassa
atk-s0513a1:2986_2: putto godhāpillako ekena kakaṇṭakena saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā tena saddhiṃ sammodamāno
atk-s0513a1:2986_3: viharanto “kakaṇṭakaṃ parissajissāmī”ti avattharati. Tassa tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2986_4: godhārājassa ārocesuṃ. Godhārājā puttaṃ pakkosāpetvā “tāta, tvaṃ aṭṭhāne vissāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2986_5: karosi, kakaṇṭakā nāma nīcajātikā, tehi saddhiṃ vissāso na kattabbo. Sace tvaṃ tena
atk-s0513a1:2986_6: saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ karissasi, taṃ kakaṇṭakaṃ nissāya sabbampetaṃ godhākulaṃ vināsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2986_7: pāpuṇissati, ito paṭṭhāya etena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ mā akāsī”ti āha. So karotiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:2986_8: Bodhisatto punappunaṃ kathentopi tassa tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ vāretuṃ asakkonto “avassaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2986_9: amhākaṃ etaṃ kakaṇṭakaṃ nissāya bhayaṃ uppajjissati, tasmiṃ uppanne palāyanamaggaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2986_10: sampādetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ekena passena vātabilaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2987_0: Puttopissa anukkamena mahāsarīro ahosi, kakaṇṭako pana purimappamāṇoyeva. Itaro “kakaṇṭakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2987_1: parissajissāmī”ti antarantarā avattharatiyeva, kakaṇṭakassa pabbatakūṭena avattharaṇakālo
atk-s0513a1:2987_2: viya hoti. So kilamanto cintesi “sace ayaṃ aññāni katipayāni divasāni maṃ evaṃ parissajissati,
atk-s0513a1:2987_3: jīvitaṃ me natthi, ekena luddakena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā imaṃ godhākulaṃ vināsessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2987_4: Athekadivasaṃ nidāghasamaye meghe vuṭṭhe vammikamakkhikā uṭṭhahiṃsu, tato tato godhā
atk-s0513a1:2987_5: nikkhamitvā makkhikāyo khādanti. Eko godhāluddako godhābilaṃ bhindanatthāya kuddālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2987_6: gahetvā sunakhehi saddhiṃ araññaṃ pāvisi. Kakaṇṭako taṃ disvā “ajja attano manorathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2987_7: pūressāmī”ti taṃ upasaṅkamitvā avidūre nipajjitvā “bho purisa, kasmā araññe vicarasī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2987_8: pucchi. So “godhānaṃ atthāyā”ti āha. “Ahaṃ anekasatānaṃ godhānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāmi, aggiñca
atk-s0513a1:2987_9: palālañca ādāya ehī”ti taṃ tattha netvā “imasmiṃ ṭhāne palālaṃ pakkhipitvā aggiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2987_10: datvā dhūmaṃ katvā samantā sunakhe ṭhapetvā sayaṃ mahāmuggaraṃ gahetvā nikkhantā
atk-s0513a1:2987_11: nikkhantā godhā paharitvā māretvā rāsiṃ katvā yāhī”ti evañca pana vatvā “ajja paccāmittassa
atk-s0513a1:2987_12: piṭṭhiṃ passissāmī”ti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā nipajji. Luddakopi palāladhūmaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2987_13: akāsi, dhūmo bilaṃ pāvisi, godhā dhūmandhā maraṇabhayatajjitā nikkhamitvā palāyituṃ
atk-s0513a1:2987_14: āraddhā. Luddako nikkhantaṃ nikkhantaṃ paharitvā māresi, tassa hatthato muttā sunakhā
atk-s0513a1:2988_0: Bodhisatto “kakaṇṭakaṃ nissāya bhayaṃ uppanna”nti ñatvā “pāpapurisasaṃsaggo nāma
atk-s0513a1:2988_1: na kattabbo, pāpe nissāya hitasukhaṃ nāma natthi, ekassa pāpakakaṇṭakassa vasena
atk-s0513a1:2988_2: ettakānaṃ godhānaṃ vināso jāto”ti vātabilena palāyanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2992_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – pāpajanasaṃsevī puggalo accantasukhaṃ ekantasukhaṃ nirantarasukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2992_1: nāma na edhati na vindati na paṭilabhati. Yathā kiṃ? Godhākulaṃ kakaṇṭāva. Yathā
atk-s0513a1:2992_2: kakaṇṭakato godhākulaṃ sukhaṃ na labhati, evaṃ pāpajanasaṃsevī puggalo sukhaṃ na
atk-s0513a1:2992_3: labhati. Pāpajanaṃ pana sevanto ekanteneva kaliṃ pāpeti attānaṃ, kali vuccati vināso,
atk-s0513a1:2992_4: ekanteneva pāpasevī attānañca aññe ca attanā saddhiṃ vasante vināsaṃ pāpeti. Pāḷiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2992_5: pana “phalaṃ pāpeyyā”ti likhanti. Taṃ byañjanaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ natthi, atthopissa
atk-s0513a1:2993_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kakaṇṭako devadatto
atk-s0513a1:2993_1: ahosi, bodhisattassa putto anovādako godhāpillako vipakkhasevī bhikkhu, godhārājā
atk-s0513a1:2997_0: Etañhi te durājānanti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattassa vadhāya parisakkanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2997_1: ārabbha kathesi. Dhammasabhāyañhi bhikkhūnaṃ kathaṃ sutvā satthā “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:2997_2: devadatto idāneva mayhaṃ vadhāya parisakkati, pubbepi parisakkiyeva, na ca maṃ māretuṃ
atk-s0513a1:2997_3: asakkhi, sayameva pana kilanto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2998_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto siṅgālayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2998_1: siṅgālarājā hutvā siṅgālagaṇaparivuto susānavane vihāsi. Tena samayena rājagahe ussavo
atk-s0513a1:2998_2: ahosi, yebhuyyena manussā suraṃ pivanti, surāchaṇoyeva kireso. Athettha sambahulā
atk-s0513a1:2998_3: dhuttā bahuṃ surañca maṃsañca āharāpetvā maṇḍitapasādhitā gāyitvā gāyitvā surañca
atk-s0513a1:2998_4: pivanti, maṃsañca khādanti. Tesaṃ paṭhamayāmāvasāne maṃsaṃ khīyi, surā pana bahukāva.
atk-s0513a1:2998_5: Atheko dhutto “maṃsakhaṇḍaṃ dehī”ti āha. “Maṃsaṃ khīṇa”nti ca vutte “mayi ṭhite maṃsakkhayo
atk-s0513a1:2998_6: nāma natthī”ti vatvā “āmakasusāne matamanussamaṃsaṃ khādanatthāya āgate siṅgāle māretvā
atk-s0513a1:2998_7: maṃsaṃ āharissāmī”ti muggaraṃ gahetvā niddhamanamaggena nagarā nikkhamitvā susānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2998_8: gantvā muggaraṃ gahetvā matako viya uttāno nipajji. Tasmiṃ khaṇe bodhisatto siṅgālagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0513a1:2998_9: tattha gato taṃ disvā “nāyaṃ matako”ti ñatvāpi “suṭṭhutaraṃ upaparikkhissāmī”ti tassa
atk-s0513a1:2998_10: adhovātena gantvā sarīragandhaṃ ghāyitvā tathatovassa amatakabhāvaṃ ñatvā “lajjāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2998_11: naṃ uyyojessāmī”ti gantvā muggarakoṭiyaṃ ḍaṃsitvā ākaḍḍhi, dhutto muggaraṃ na vissaji,
atk-s0513a1:2998_12: upasaṅkamantampi na olokento naṃ gāḷhataraṃ aggahesi. Bodhisatto paṭikkamitvā “bho
atk-s0513a1:2998_13: purisa, sace tvaṃ matako bhaveyyāsi, na mayi muggaraṃ ākaḍḍhante gāḷhataraṃ gaṇheyyāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2998_14: iminā kāraṇena tava matakabhāvo vā amatakabhāvo vā dujjāno”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3001: Yassa te kaḍḍhamānassa, hatthā daṇḍo na muccatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3002_0: Tattha etañhi te durājānanti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ tava duviññeyyaṃ. Yaṃ sesi matasāyikanti
atk-s0513a1:3002_1: yena kāraṇena tvaṃ matasāyikaṃ sesi, matako viya hutvā sayasi. Yassa te kaḍḍhamānassāti
atk-s0513a1:3002_2: yassa tava daṇḍakoṭiyaṃ gahetvā kaḍḍhiyamānassa hatthato daṇḍo na muccati, so tvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3003_0: Evaṃ vutte so dhutto “ayaṃ mama amatakabhāvaṃ jānātī”ti uṭṭhāya daṇḍaṃ khipi, daṇḍo
atk-s0513a1:3003_1: virajjhi. Dhutto “gaccha, viraddho dānisi mayā”ti āha. Bodhisatto nivattitvā “bho
atk-s0513a1:3003_2: purisa, maṃ virajjhantopi tvaṃ aṭṭha mahāniraye soḷasa ca ussadaniraye aviraddhoyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:3003_3: vatvā pakkāmi. Dhutto kiñci alabhitvā susānā nikkhamitvā parikhāyaṃ nhāyitvā āgatamaggeneva nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:3004: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā dhutto devadatto ahosi, siṅgālarājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:3008_0: Lasī ca te nipphalitāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattassa gayāsīse sugatālayassa
atk-s0513a1:3008_1: dassitabhāvaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Devadatto hi parihīnajjhāno lābhasakkāraparihīno “attheko
atk-s0513a1:3008_2: upāyo”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ pañca vatthūni yācitvā alabhamāno dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3008_3: saddhivihārike adhunā pabbajite dhammavinayamhi akovide pañcasate bhikkhū gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:3008_4: gayāsīsaṃ gantvā saṅghaṃ bhinditvā ekasīmāyaṃ āveṇikaṃ saṅghakammaṃ akāsi. Satthā
atk-s0513a1:3008_5: tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ñāṇaparipākakālaṃ ñatvā dve aggasāvake pesesi. Te disvā devadatto
atk-s0513a1:3008_6: tuṭṭhamānaso rattiṃ dhammaṃ desayamāno “buddhalīlaṃ karissāmī”ti sugatālayaṃ dassento
atk-s0513a1:3008_7: “vigatathinamiddho kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhusaṅgho, paṭibhātu taṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3008_8: dhammīkathā, piṭṭhi me āgilāyati, tamahaṃ āyamissāmī”ti vatvā niddaṃ upagato. Dve
atk-s0513a1:3008_9: aggasāvakā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā maggaphalehi pabodhetvā sabbe ādāya veḷuvanameva paccāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3009_0: Kokāliko vihāraṃ tucchaṃ disvā devadattassa santikaṃ gantvā “āvuso devadatta, parisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3009_1: te bhinditvā dve aggasāvakā vihāraṃ tucchaṃ katvā gatā, tvaṃ pana niddāyasiyevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:3009_2: vatvā uttarāsaṅgamassa apanetvā bhittiyaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ phusanto viya paṇhiyā naṃ
atk-s0513a1:3009_3: hadaye pahari. Tāvadevassa mukhato lohitaṃ uggañchi. So tato paṭṭhāya gilāno ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3009_4: Satthā theraṃ pucchi “sāriputta, tumhākaṃ gatakāle devadatto kiṃ akāsī”ti? Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:3009_5: devadatto amhe disvā “buddhalīlaṃ karissāmī”ti sugatālayaṃ dassetvā mahāvināsaṃ pattoti.
atk-s0513a1:3009_6: Satthā “na kho sāriputta, devadatto idāneva mama anukaronto vināsaṃ patto, pubbepi
atk-s0513a1:3009_7: pattoyevā”ti vatvā therena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3010_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kesarasīho hutvā himavantappadese
atk-s0513a1:3010_1: kañcanaguhāyaṃ vāsaṃ kappesi. So ekadivasaṃ kañcanaguhāya nikkhamitvā vijambhitvā
atk-s0513a1:3010_2: catuddisaṃ oloketvā sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkanto mahāmahiṃsaṃ vadhitvā varamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3010_3: khāditvā ekaṃ saraṃ otaritvā maṇivaṇṇassa udakassa kucchiṃ pūretvā guhaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0513a1:3010_4: pāyāsi. Atheko siṅgālo gocarappasuto sahasāva sīhaṃ disvā palāyituṃ asakkonto sīhassa
atk-s0513a1:3010_5: purato pādesu patitvā nipajji. “Kiṃ, jambukā”ti ca vutte “ahaṃ te, sāmi, pāde upaṭṭhātukāmo”ti
atk-s0513a1:3010_6: āha. Sīho “sādhu ehi, maṃ upaṭṭhaha, varamaṃsāni taṃ khādāpessāmī”ti vatvā siṅgālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3010_7: ādāya kañcanaguhaṃ agamāsi. Siṅgālo tato paṭṭhāya sīhavighāsaṃ khādati. So katipāhaccayeneva thūlasarīro ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3011_0: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ guhāya nipannakova sīho āha “gaccha jambuka, pabbatasikhare ṭhatvā
atk-s0513a1:3011_1: pabbatapāde sañcarantesu hatthiassamahiṃsādīsu yassa maṃsaṃ khāditukāmosi, taṃ oloketvā
atk-s0513a1:3011_2: āgantvā ‘asukamaṃsaṃ khāditukāmomhī’ti vatvā maṃ vanditvā ‘viroca, sāmī’ti vadāhi,
atk-s0513a1:3011_3: ahaṃ taṃ vadhitvā madhuramaṃsaṃ khāditvā tuyhampi dassāmī”ti. Siṅgālo pabbatasikharaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3011_4: abhiruhitvā nānappakāre mige oloketvā yasseva maṃsaṃ khāditukāmo hoti, kañcanaguhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3011_5: pavisitvā tameva sīhassa ārocetvā pādesu patitvā “viroca, sāmī”ti vadati. Sīho vegena
atk-s0513a1:3011_6: pakkhanditvā sacepi mattavaravāraṇo hoti, tattheva naṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā sayampi
atk-s0513a1:3011_7: varamaṃsaṃ khādati, siṅgālassapi deti. Siṅgālo kucchipūraṃ maṃsaṃ khāditvā guhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3011_8: pavisitvā niddāyati. So gacchante gacchante kāle mānaṃ vaḍḍhesi “ahampi catuppadova,
atk-s0513a1:3011_9: kiṃkāraṇā divase divase parehi posiyamāno viharāmi, ito paṭṭhāya ahampi hatthiādayo
atk-s0513a1:3011_10: hanitvā maṃsaṃ khādissāmi, sīhopi migarājā ‘viroca, sāmī’ti vuttameva padaṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a1:3011_11: varavāraṇe vadheti, ahampi sīhena ‘viroca, jambukā’ti maṃ vadāpetvā ekaṃ varavāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3012_0: So sīhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sāmi, mayā dīgharattaṃ tumhehi vadhitavaravāraṇānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3012_1: maṃsaṃ khāditaṃ, ahampi ekaṃ varavāraṇaṃ māretvā maṃsaṃ khāditukāmo, tasmā tumhehi
atk-s0513a1:3012_2: nipannaṭṭhāne kañcanaguhāyaṃ nipajjissāmi, tumhe pabbatapāde vicarantaṃ varavāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3012_3: oloketvā mama santikaṃ āgantvā ‘viroca, jambukā’ti vadetha, ettakamattasmiṃ maccheraṃ
atk-s0513a1:3012_4: mā karitthā”ti. Atha naṃ sīho āha “na, tvaṃ jambuka, vāraṇe vadhituṃ samatthe sīhakule
atk-s0513a1:3012_5: uppanno, vāraṇaṃ vadhitvā maṃsaṃ khādanasamattho siṅgālo nāma loke natthi, mā te
atk-s0513a1:3012_6: etaṃ rucci, mayā vadhitavaravāraṇānaññeva maṃsaṃ khāditvā vasā”ti. So evaṃ vuttepi
atk-s0513a1:3012_7: viramituṃ na icchi, punappunaṃ yāciyeva. Sīho taṃ vāretuṃ asakkonto sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a1:3012_8: “tena hi mama vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nipajjā”ti jambukaṃ kañcanaguhāyaṃ nipajjāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:3012_9: sayaṃ pabbatapāde mattavaravāraṇaṃ oloketvā guhādvāraṃ gantvā “viroca, jambukā”ti
atk-s0513a1:3012_10: āha. Siṅgālo kañcanaguhāya nikkhamitvā vijambhitvā catuddisaṃ oloketvā tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0513a1:3012_11: vassitvā “mattavaravāraṇassa kumbhe patissāmī”ti pakkhanditvā virajjhitvā pādamūle
atk-s0513a1:3012_12: pati. Vāraṇo dakkhiṇapādaṃ ukkhipitvā tassa sīsaṃ akkami, sīsaṭṭhīni cuṇṇavicuṇṇāni
atk-s0513a1:3012_13: ahesuṃ. Athassa sarīraṃ vāraṇo pādena saṅgharitvā rāsiṃ katvā upari laṇḍaṃ pātetvā
atk-s0513a1:3013: Bodhisatto imaṃ pavattiṃ disvā “idāni viroca, jambukā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3015: “Lasī ca te nipphalitā, matthako ca padālito;
atk-s0513a1:3016: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, ajja kho tvaṃ virocasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3017: Tattha lasīti matthaluṅgaṃ. Nipphalitāti nikkhantā. Evaṃ bodhisatto imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:3018: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā siṅgālo devadatto ahosi, sīho pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:3022_0: Bahumpetaṃ asabbhi jātavedāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ājīvakānaṃ micchātapaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3022_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tadā kira ājīvakā jetavanapiṭṭhiyaṃ nānappakāraṃ micchātapaṃ caranti.
atk-s0513a1:3022_3: micchātapaṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ pucchiṃsu “atthi nu kho, bhante, imaṃ micchātapaṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a1:3022_4: kusalaṃ vā vuḍḍhi vā”ti. Satthā “na, bhikkhave, evarūpaṃ micchātapaṃ nissāya kusalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3022_5: vā vuḍḍhi vā atthi, pubbe paṇḍitā ‘evarūpaṃ tapaṃ nissāya kusalaṃ vā vuḍḍhi vā bhavissatī’ti
atk-s0513a1:3022_6: saññāya jātaggiṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā aggijuhanādivasena kiñci vuḍḍhiṃ apassantā
atk-s0513a1:3022_7: aggiṃ udakena nibbāpetvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā
atk-s0513a1:3023_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:3023_1: Tassa jātadivase mātāpitaro jātaggiṃ gahetvā ṭhapesuṃ. Atha naṃ soḷasavassakāle etadavocuṃ
atk-s0513a1:3023_2: “mayaṃ te, putta, jātadivase aggiṃ gaṇhimha. Sacesi agāraṃ ajjhāvasitukāmo, tayo
atk-s0513a1:3023_3: vede uggaṇha. Atha brahmalokaṃ gantukāmo, aggiṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā aggiṃ paricaranto
atk-s0513a1:3023_4: mahābrahmānaṃ ārādhetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo hohī”ti. So “na mayhaṃ agārena attho”ti
atk-s0513a1:3023_5: aggiṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā assamapadaṃ māpetvā aggiṃ paricaranto araññe vihāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3023_6: So ekadivasaṃ paccantagāmake godakkhiṇaṃ labhitvā taṃ goṇaṃ assamapadaṃ netvā cintesi
atk-s0513a1:3023_7: “aggibhagavantaṃ gomaṃsaṃ khādāpessāmī”ti. Athassa etadahosi “idha loṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:3023_8: aggibhagavā aloṇaṃ khādituṃ na sakkhissati, gāmato loṇaṃ āharitvā aggibhagavantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3023_9: saloṇakaṃ khādāpessāmī”ti. So taṃ tattheva bandhitvā loṇatthāya gāmakaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3023_10: Tasmiṃ gate sambahulā luddakā taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgatā. Goṇaṃ disvā vadhitvā maṃsaṃ pacitvā
atk-s0513a1:3023_11: khāditvā naṅguṭṭhañca jaṅghañca cammañca tattheva chaḍḍetvā avasesamaṃsaṃ ādāya agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3024_0: Brāhmaṇo āgantvā naṅguṭṭhādimattameva disvā cintesi “ayaṃ aggibhagavā attano santakampi
atk-s0513a1:3024_1: rakkhituṃ na sakkoti, maṃ pana kadā rakkhissati. Iminā aggiparicaraṇena niratthakena
atk-s0513a1:3024_2: bhavitabbaṃ, natthi itonidānaṃ kusalaṃ vā vuḍḍhi vā”ti. So aggiparicariyāya vigatacchando
atk-s0513a1:3024_3: “hambho aggibhagavā, tvaṃ attanopi santakaṃ rakkhituṃ asakkonto maṃ kadā rakkhissasi,
atk-s0513a1:3024_4: maṃsaṃ natthi, ettakenapi tussāhī”ti naṅguṭṭhādīni aggimhi pakkhipanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3027: Maṃsārahassa natthajja maṃsaṃ, naṅguṭṭhampi bhavaṃ paṭiggahātū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3028_0: Tattha bahumpetanti ettakampi bahuṃ. Asabbhīti asappurisa asādhujātika. Jātavedāti
atk-s0513a1:3028_1: aggiṃ ālapati. Aggi hi jātamattova vediyati paññāyati pākaṭo hoti, tasmā “jātavedo”ti
atk-s0513a1:3028_2: vuccati. Yaṃ taṃ vāladhinābhipūjayāmāti yaṃ ajja mayaṃ attanopi santakaṃ rakkhituṃ
atk-s0513a1:3028_3: asamatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ vāladhinā abhipūjayāma, etampi tava bahumevāti dasseti. Maṃsārahassāti
atk-s0513a1:3028_4: maṃsaṃ arahassa tuyhaṃ natthi ajja maṃsaṃ. Naṅguṭṭhampi bhavaṃ paṭiggahātūti attano
atk-s0513a1:3028_5: santakaṃ rakkhituṃ asakkonto bhavaṃ imaṃ sajaṅghacammaṃ naṅguṭṭhampi paṭiggaṇhātūti.
atk-s0513a1:3029: Evaṃ vatvā mahāsatto aggiṃ udakena nibbāpetvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3030: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “nibbutaggitāpaso ahameva tena samayenā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3034_0: Na tvaṃ rādha vijānāsīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3034_1: ārabbha kathesi. Paccuppannavatthu indriyajātake āvi bhavissati. Satthā pana taṃ
atk-s0513a1:3034_2: bhikkhuṃ āmantetvā “bhikkhu mātugāmo nāma arakkhiyo, ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rakkhantāpi
atk-s0513a1:3034_3: rakkhituṃ na sakkonti. Tvampi pubbe etaṃ ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rakkhantopi rakkhituṃ
atk-s0513a1:3034_4: nāsakkhi, idāni kathaṃ rakkhissasī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3035_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sukayoniyaṃ nibbatti. Kāsiraṭṭhe
atk-s0513a1:3035_1: eko brāhmaṇo bodhisattañca kaniṭṭhabhātarañcassa puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā posesi. Tesu
atk-s0513a1:3035_2: bodhisattassa “poṭṭhapādo”ti nāmaṃ ahosi, itarassa “rādho”ti. Tassa pana brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0513a1:3035_3: bhariyā anācārā hoti dussīlā. So vohāratthāya gacchanto ubhopi bhātaro āha – “tātā,
atk-s0513a1:3035_4: sace vo mātā brāhmaṇī anācāraṃ ācarati, vāreyyātha na”nti. Bodhisatto āha “sādhu,
atk-s0513a1:3035_5: tāta, vāretuṃ sakkontā vāreyyāma, asakkontā tuṇhī bhavissāmā”ti. Evaṃ brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ
atk-s0513a1:3036_0: Tassa pana gatadivasato paṭṭhāya brāhmaṇī aticarituṃ āraddhā, pavisantānañca nikkhamantānañca
atk-s0513a1:3036_1: anto natthi, tassā kiriyaṃ disvā rādho bodhisattaṃ āha – “bhātika, amhākaṃ pitā ‘sace
atk-s0513a1:3036_2: vo mātā anācāraṃ ācarati, vāreyyāthā’ti vatvā gato, idāni cesā anācāraṃ ācarati,
atk-s0513a1:3036_3: vārema na”nti. Bodhisatto “tāta, tvaṃ attano abyattatāya bālabhāvena evaṃ vadesi,
atk-s0513a1:3036_4: mātugāmaṃ nāma ukkhipitvā carantāpi rakkhituṃ na sakkonti. Yaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0513a1:3036_5: na taṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3040_0: Tattha na tvaṃ rādha vijānāsi, aḍḍharatte anāgateti tāta rādha, tvaṃ na jānāsi, aḍḍharatte
atk-s0513a1:3040_1: anāgate paṭhamayāmeyeva ettakā janā āgatā, idāni ko jānāti, kittakāpi āgamissanti.
atk-s0513a1:3040_2: Abyayataṃ vilapasīti tvaṃ abyattavilāpaṃ vilapasi. Virattā kosiyāyaneti mātā no kosiyāyanī
atk-s0513a1:3040_3: brāhmaṇī virattā amhākaṃ pitari nippemā jātā. Sacassā tasmiṃ sineho vā pemaṃ vā bhaveyya,
atk-s0513a1:3040_4: na evarūpaṃ anācāraṃ kareyyāti imamatthaṃ etehi byañjanehi pakāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:3041_0: Evaṃ pakāsetvā ca pana brāhmaṇiyā saddhiṃ rādhassa vattuṃ na adāsi. Sāpi yāva brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0513a1:3041_1: anāgamanā yathāruciyā vicari. Brāhmaṇo āgantvā poṭṭhapādaṃ pucchi – “tāta, kīdisī
atk-s0513a1:3041_2: vo mātā”ti. Bodhisatto brāhmaṇassa sabbaṃ yathābhūtaṃ kathetvā “kiṃ te, tāta, evarūpāya
atk-s0513a1:3041_3: dussīlāyā”ti vatvā “tāta, amhehi mātuyā dosassa kathitakālato paṭṭhāya na sakkā idha
atk-s0513a1:3041_4: vasitu”nti brāhmaṇassa pāde vanditvā saddhiṃ rādhena uppatitvā araññaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3042_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:3042_1: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. “Tadā brāhmaṇo ca brāhmaṇī ca eteyeva dve janā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3042_2: rādho ānando, poṭṭhapādo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:3046_0: Api nu hanukā santāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule mahallake bhikkhū
atk-s0513a1:3046_1: ārabbha kathesi. Te kira gihikāle sāvatthiyaṃ kuṭumbikā aḍḍhā mahaddhanā aññamaññasahāyakā
atk-s0513a1:3046_2: ekato hutvā puññāni karontā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā “mayaṃ mahallakā, kiṃ no gharāvāsena,
atk-s0513a1:3046_3: satthu santike ramaṇīye buddhasāsane pabbajitvā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmā”ti sabbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3046_4: sāpateyyaṃ puttadhītādīnaṃ datvā assumukhaṃ ñātisaṅghaṃ pahāya satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3046_5: yācitvā pabbajiṃsu. Pabbajitvā pana pabbajjānurūpaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ na kariṃsu, mahallakabhāvena
atk-s0513a1:3046_6: dhammampi na pariyāpuṇiṃsu, gihikāle viya pabbajitakālepi vihārapariyante paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3046_7: kāretvā ekatova vasiṃsu. Piṇḍāya carantāpi aññattha agantvā yebhuyyena attano puttadārasseva
atk-s0513a1:3046_8: gehaṃ gantvā bhuñjiṃsu. Tesu ekassa purāṇadutiyikā sabbesampi mahallakattherānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3046_9: upakārā ahosi, tasmā sesāpi attanā laddhaṃ āhāraṃ gahetvā tassāyeva gehe nisīditvā
atk-s0513a1:3046_10: bhuñjanti. Sāpi tesaṃ yathāsannihitaṃ sūpabyañjanaṃ deti. Sā aññatarena rogena phuṭṭhā
atk-s0513a1:3046_11: kālamakāsi. Atha te mahallakattherā vihāraṃ gantvā aññamaññaṃ gīvāsu gahetvā “madhurahattharasā
atk-s0513a1:3046_12: upāsikā kālakatā”ti vihārapaccante rodantā vicariṃsu. Tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā ito cito
atk-s0513a1:3046_13: ca bhikkhū sannipatitvā “āvuso, kasmā rodathā”ti pucchiṃsu. Te “amhākaṃ sahāyassa
atk-s0513a1:3046_14: purāṇadutiyikā madhurahattharasā kālakatā amhākaṃ ativiya upakārā, ‘idāni kuto tathārūpiṃ
atk-s0513a1:3047_0: Tesaṃ taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, iminā
atk-s0513a1:3047_1: nāma kāraṇena mahallakattherā aññamaññaṃ gīvāsu gahetvā vihārapaccante rodantā vicarantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3047_2: Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya
atk-s0513a1:3047_3: nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idānevete tassā kālakiriyāya rodantā vicaranti, pubbepete
atk-s0513a1:3047_4: imaṃ kākayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā samudde mataṃ nissāya ‘samuddaudakaṃ ussiñcitvā etaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3047_5: nīharissāmā’ti vāyamantā paṇḍite nissāya jīvitaṃ labhiṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3048_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto samuddadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:3048_1: Atheko kāko attano bhariyaṃ kākiṃ ādāya gocaraṃ pariyesamāno samuddatīraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3048_2: Tasmiṃ kāle manussā samuddatīre khīrapāyāsamacchamaṃsasurādīhi nāgabalikammaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:3048_3: pakkamiṃsu. Atha so kāko balikammaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā khīrādīni disvā saddhiṃ kākiyā khīrapāyāsamacchamaṃsādīni
atk-s0513a1:3048_4: bhuñjitvā bahuṃ suraṃ pivi. Te ubhopi surāmadamattā “samuddakīḷaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti velante
atk-s0513a1:3048_5: nisīditvā nhāyituṃ ārabhiṃsu athekā ūmi āgantvā kākiṃ gahetvā samuddaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0513a1:3048_6: Tameko maccho maṃsaṃ khāditvā ajjhohari. Kāko “bhariyā me matā”ti rodi paridevi.
atk-s0513a1:3048_7: Athassa paridevanasaddaṃ sutvā bahū kākā sannipatitvā “kiṃkāraṇā rodasī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3048_8: “Sahāyikā vo velante nhāyamānā ūmiyā haṭā”ti. Te sabbepi ekaravaṃ ravantā rodiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3048_9: Atha nesaṃ etadahosi “idaṃ samuddaudakaṃ nāma amhākaṃ kiṃ pahosi, udakaṃ ussiñcitvā
atk-s0513a1:3048_10: samuddaṃ tucchaṃ katvā sahāyikaṃ nīharissāmā”ti. Te mukhaṃ pūretvā pūretvā udakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3048_11: bahi chaḍḍenti, loṇūdakena ca gale sussamāne uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya thalaṃ gantvā vissamanti.
atk-s0513a1:3049_0: Te hanūsu kilantesu mukhesu sukkhantesu akkhīsu rattesu dīnā kilantā hutvā aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3049_1: āmantetvā “ambho, mayaṃ samuddaudakaṃ gahetvā bahi pātema, gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ puna
atk-s0513a1:3049_2: udakena pūrati, samuddaṃ tucchaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissāmā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a1:3053_0: Tattha api nu hanukā santāti api no hanukā santā, api amhākaṃ hanukā kilantā. Oramāma
atk-s0513a1:3053_1: na pāremāti mayaṃ attano balena mahāsamuddaudakaṃ ākaḍḍhāma osārema, tucchaṃ pana
atk-s0513a1:3053_2: naṃ kātuṃ na sakkoma. Ayañhi pūrateva mahodadhīti.
atk-s0513a1:3054_0: Evañca pana vatvā sabbepi te kākā “tassā kākiyā evarūpaṃ nāma tuṇḍaṃ ahosi, evarūpāni
atk-s0513a1:3054_1: vaṭṭakkhīni, evarūpaṃ chavisaṇṭhānaṃ, evarūpo madhurasaddo. Sā no imaṃ corasamuddaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3054_2: nissāya naṭṭhā”ti bahuṃ vippalapiṃsu. Te evaṃ vippalapamāne samuddadevatā bheravarūpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3054_3: dassetvā palāpesi, evaṃ tesaṃ sotthi ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3055_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kākī ayaṃ purāṇadutiyikā
atk-s0513a1:3055_1: ahosi, kāko mahallakatthero, sesakākā sesamahallakattherā, samuddadevatā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:3059_0: Nayidaṃ dukkhaṃ aduṃ dukkhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:3059_1: ārabbha kathesi. So hi bhagavatā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhito”ti vutte “sacca”nti
atk-s0513a1:3059_3: bhante, sā itthī, na sakkomi taṃ vinā vasitu”nti āha. Atha naṃ satthā “esā te bhikkhu
atk-s0513a1:3059_4: anatthakārikā, pubbepi tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya sūle uttāsito etaññeva patthayamāno kālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3059_5: katvā niraye nibbatto, idāni naṃ kasmā puna patthesī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3060_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ākāsaṭṭhadevatā ahosi. Atha
atk-s0513a1:3060_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ kattikarattivārachaṇo sampatto hoti, nagaraṃ devanagaraṃ viya alaṅkariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3060_2: Sabbo jano khaṇakīḷānissito ahosi. Ekassa pana duggatamanussassa ekameva ghanasāṭakayugaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3060_3: ahosi. So taṃ sudhotaṃ dhovāpetvā obhañjāpetvā satavalikaṃ sahassavalikaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0513a1:3060_4: ṭhapesi. Atha naṃ bhariyā evamāha “icchāmahaṃ, sāmi, ekaṃ kusumbharattaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0513a1:3060_5: ekaṃ pārupitvā tava kaṇṭhe laggā kattikarattivāraṃ caritu”nti. “Bhadde, kuto amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3060_6: daliddānaṃ kusumbhaṃ, suddhavatthaṃ nivāsetvā kīḷāhī”ti? “Kusumbharattaṃ alabhamānā
atk-s0513a1:3060_7: chaṇakīḷaṃ na kīḷissāmi, tvaṃ aññaṃ itthiṃ gahetvā kīḷassū”ti. “Bhadde, kiṃ maṃ pīḷesi,
atk-s0513a1:3060_8: kuto amhākaṃ kusumbha”nti? “Sāmi, purisassa icchāya sati kiṃ nāma natthi, nanu rañño
atk-s0513a1:3060_9: kusumbhavatthusmiṃ bahu kusumbha”nti. “Bhadde, taṃ ṭhānaṃ rakkhasapariggahitapokkharaṇisadisaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3060_10: balavārakkhā, na sakkā upasaṅkamituṃ, mā te etaṃ rucci, yathāladdheneva tussassū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3060_11: “Sāmi, rattibhāge andhakāre sati purisassa agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī”ti. Iti so
atk-s0513a1:3060_12: tāya punappunaṃ kathentiyā kilesavasena tassā vacanaṃ gahetvā “hotu bhadde, mā cintayitthā”ti
atk-s0513a1:3060_13: taṃ samassāsetvā rattibhāge jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā nagarā nikkhamitvā rañño kusumbhavatthuṃ
atk-s0513a1:3060_14: gantvā vatiṃ madditvā antovatthuṃ pāvisi. Ārakkhamanussā vatisaddaṃ sutvā “coro coro”ti
atk-s0513a1:3060_15: parivāretvā gahetvā paribhāsitvā koṭṭetvā bandhitvā pabhātāya rattiyā rañño dassesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3060_16: Rājā “gacchatha, naṃ sūle uttāsethā”ti āha. Atha naṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā vajjhabheriyā
atk-s0513a1:3060_17: vajjamānāya nagarā nikkhamāpetvā sūle uttāsesuṃ. Balavavedanā pavattanti, kākā sīse
atk-s0513a1:3061_0: So tathārūpampi dukkhaṃ amanasikaritvā tameva itthiṃ anussaritvā “tāya nāmamhi ghanapuppharattavatthanivatthāya
atk-s0513a1:3061_1: kaṇṭhe āsattabāhuyugaḷāya saddhiṃ kattikarattivārato parihīno”ti cintetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3063: “Nayidaṃ dukkhaṃ aduṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ maṃ tudati vāyaso;
atk-s0513a1:3065_0: Tattha nayidaṃ dukkhaṃ aduṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ maṃ tudati vāyasoti yañca idaṃ sūle lagganapaccayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3065_1: kāyikacetasikadukkhaṃ, yañca lohamayehi viya tuṇḍehi vāyaso tudati, idaṃ sabbampi
atk-s0513a1:3065_2: mayhaṃ na dukkhaṃ, aduṃ dukkhaṃ etaṃyeva pana me dukkhanti attho. Kataraṃ? Yaṃ sāmā
atk-s0513a1:3065_3: puppharattena, kattikaṃ nānubhossatīti, yaṃ sā piyaṅgusāmā mama bhariyā ekaṃ kusumbharattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3065_4: nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā evaṃ ghanapuppharattena vatthayugena acchannā mama kaṇṭhe
atk-s0513a1:3065_5: gahetvā kattikarattivāraṃ nānubhavissati, idaṃ mayhaṃ dukkhaṃ, etadeva hi maṃ bādhatīti?
atk-s0513a1:3065_6: So evaṃ mātugāmaṃ ārabbha vippalapantoyeva kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:3066: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā jayampatikāva idāni jayampatikā, taṃ kāraṇaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā ṭhitā ākāsaṭṭhadevatā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:3070_0: Nāhaṃ punaṃ na ca punanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kilesaniggahaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3070_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira pañcasatamattā sahāyakā mahāvibhavā seṭṭhiputtā satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3070_2: sutvā sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajitvā jetavane antokoṭisanthāre vihariṃsu. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3070_3: tesaṃ aḍḍharattasamaye kilesanissito saṅkappo uppajji. Te ukkaṇṭhitvā attanā jahitakilese
atk-s0513a1:3070_4: puna gaṇhituṃ cittaṃ uppādayiṃsu. Atha satthā aḍḍharattasamanantare sabbaññutaññāṇadaṇḍadīpakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3070_5: ukkhipitvā “katarāya nu kho ratiyā jetavane bhikkhū viharantī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3070_6: olokento tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abbhantare kāmarāgasaṅkappassa uppannabhāvaṃ aññāsi. Satthā
atk-s0513a1:3070_7: ca nāma ekaputtikā itthī attano puttaṃ viya, ekacakkhuko puriso cakkhuṃ viya attano
atk-s0513a1:3070_8: sāvake rakkhati. Pubbaṇhādīsu yasmiṃ yasmiṃ samaye tesaṃ kilesā uppajjanti, te tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3070_9: kilese tato paraṃ vaḍḍhituṃ adatvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃyeva samaye niggaṇhāti. Tenassa etadahosi
atk-s0513a1:3070_10: “ayaṃ cakkavattirañño antonagareyeva corānaṃ uppannakālo viya vattati, idāneva tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3070_11: dhammadesanaṃ katvā te kilese niggaṇhitvā arahattaṃ dassāmī”ti. So surabhigandhakuṭito
atk-s0513a1:3070_13: āmantesi. Thero “kiṃ, bhante”ti āgantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. “Ānanda, yattakā bhikkhū
atk-s0513a1:3070_14: antokoṭisanthāre viharanti, sabbeva gandhakuṭipariveṇe sannipātehī”ti. Evaṃ kirassa
atk-s0513a1:3070_15: ahosi “sacāhaṃ teyeva pañcasate bhikkhū pakkosāpessāmi. ‘Satthārā no abbhantare kilesānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3070_16: uppannabhāvo ñāto’ti saṃviggamānasā dhammadesanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ na sakkhissantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3070_17: Tasmā “sabbe sannipātehī”ti āha. Thero “sādhu, bhante”ti avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya pariveṇena
atk-s0513a1:3070_18: pariveṇaṃ āhiṇḍitvā sabbe bhikkhū gandhakuṭipariveṇe sannipātetvā buddhāsanaṃ paññapesi.
atk-s0513a1:3071_0: Satthā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya silāpathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahamāno sineru
atk-s0513a1:3071_1: viya paññatte buddhāsane nisīdi āveḷāveḷā yamakayamakā chabbaṇṇaghanabuddharasmiyo
atk-s0513a1:3071_2: vissajjento. Tāpi rasmiyo pātimattā chattamattā kūṭāgārakucchimattā chijjitvā chijjitvā
atk-s0513a1:3071_3: gaganatale vijjulatā viya sañcariṃsu, aṇṇavakucchiṃ khobhetvā bālasūriyuggamanakālo
atk-s0513a1:3071_4: viya ahosi. Bhikkhusaṅghopi satthāraṃ vanditvā garucittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā rattakambalasāṇiyā
atk-s0513a1:3071_5: parikkhipanto viya parivāretvā nisīdi. Satthā brahmassaraṃ nicchārento bhikkhū āmantetvā
atk-s0513a1:3071_6: “na, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā nāma kāmavitakkaṃ byāpādavitakkaṃ vihiṃsāvitakkanti ime
atk-s0513a1:3071_7: tayo akusalavitakke vitakketuṃ vaṭṭati. Anto uppannakileso hi ‘parittako’ti avamaññituṃ
atk-s0513a1:3071_8: na vaṭṭati, kileso nāma paccāmittasadiso. Paccāmitto ca khuddako nāma natthi, okāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3071_9: labhitvā vināsameva pāpeti, evameva appamattakopi kileso uppajjitvā vaḍḍhituṃ labhanto
atk-s0513a1:3071_10: mahāvināsaṃ pāpeti. Kileso nāmesa halāhalavisūpamo uppāṭitacchavigaṇḍasadiso āsīvisapaṭibhāgo
atk-s0513a1:3071_11: asaniaggisadiso allīyituṃ na yutto āsaṅkitabbo. Uppannuppannakkhaṇeyeva paṭisaṅkhānabalena
atk-s0513a1:3071_12: bhāvanābalena yathā muhuttampi hadaye aṭṭhatvā paduminipattā udakabindu viya vivaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:3071_13: evaṃ pajahitabbo. Porāṇakapaṇḍi tāpi appamattakampi kilesaṃ garahitvā yathā puna
atk-s0513a1:3071_14: abbhantare nuppajjati, evaṃ niggaṇhiṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3072_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto siṅgālayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:3072_1: gahetvā araññe nadītīre nivāsaṃ kappesi. Atheko jarahatthī gaṅgātīre kālamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3072_2: Siṅgālo gocarappasuto taṃ matahatthisarīraṃ disvā “mahā me gocaro uppanno”ti gantvā
atk-s0513a1:3072_3: taṃ soṇḍe ḍaṃsi, naṅgalīsāya daṭṭhakālo viya ahosi. So “natthettha khāditabbayuttaka”nti
atk-s0513a1:3072_4: dantesu ḍaṃsi, thambhe daṭṭhakālo viya ahosi. Kaṇṇe ḍaṃsi, suppakoṭiyaṃ daṭṭhakālo
atk-s0513a1:3072_5: viya ahosi. Udare ḍaṃsi, kusūle daṭṭhakālo viya ahosi. Pāde ḍaṃsi, udukkhale daṭṭhakālo
atk-s0513a1:3072_6: viya ahosi. Naṅguṭṭhe ḍaṃsi, musale daṭṭhakālo viya ahosi. So “etthāpi natthi khāditabbayuttaka”nti
atk-s0513a1:3072_7: sabbattha assādaṃ alabhanto vaccamagge ḍaṃsi, mudupūve daṭṭhakālo viya ahosi. So
atk-s0513a1:3072_8: “laddhaṃ dāni me imasmiṃ sarīre mudu khāditabbayuttakaṭṭhāna”nti tato paṭṭhāya khādanto
atk-s0513a1:3072_9: antokucchiṃ pavisitvā vakkahadayādīni khāditvā pipāsitakāle lohitaṃ pivitvā nipajjitukāmakāle
atk-s0513a1:3073_0: Athassa etadahosi – “idaṃ hatthisarīraṃ mayhaṃ nivāsasukhatāya gehasadisaṃ, khāditukāmatāya
atk-s0513a1:3073_1: sati pahūtamaṃsaṃ, kiṃ dāni me aññattha kamma”nti so aññattha agantvā hatthikucchiyaṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:3073_2: maṃsaṃ khāditvā vasati. Gacchante gacchante kāle nidāghe vātasamphassena ceva sūriyarasmisantāpena
atk-s0513a1:3073_3: ca taṃ kuṇapaṃ sussitvā valiyo gaṇhi, siṅgālassa paviṭṭhadvāraṃ pihitaṃ, antokucchiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3073_4: andhakāro ahosi. Siṅgālassa lokantarikanivāso viya jāto. Kuṇape sussante maṃsampi
atk-s0513a1:3073_5: sussi, lohitampi pacchijji. So nikkhamanadvāraṃ alabhanto bhayappatto hutvā sandhāvanto
atk-s0513a1:3073_6: ito cito ca paharitvā nikkhamanadvāraṃ pariyesamāno vicarati. Evaṃ tasmiṃ ukkhaliyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3073_7: piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya antokucchiyaṃ paccamāne katipāhaccayena mahāmegho pāvassi. Atha
atk-s0513a1:3073_8: naṃ kuṇapaṃ temetvā uṭṭhāya pakatisaṇṭhānena aṭṭhāsi. Vaccamaggo vivaṭo hutvā tārakā
atk-s0513a1:3073_9: viya paññāyi. Siṅgālo taṃ chiddaṃ disvā “idāni me jīvitaṃ laddha”nti yāva hatthisīsā
atk-s0513a1:3073_10: paṭikkamitvā vegena pakkhanditvā vaccamaggaṃ sīsena paharitvā nikkhami. Tassa sañchannasarīrattā
atk-s0513a1:3073_11: sabbalomāni vaccamagge allīyiṃsu. So tālakkhandhasadisena nillomena sarīrena ubbiggacitto
atk-s0513a1:3073_12: muhuttaṃ dhāvitvā nivattitvā nisinno sarīraṃ oloketvā “idaṃ dukkhaṃ mayhaṃ na aññena
atk-s0513a1:3073_13: kataṃ, lobhahetu pana lobhakāraṇā lobhaṃ nissāya mayā etaṃ kataṃ, ito dāni paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:3073_14: na lobhavasiko bhavissāmi, puna hatthisarīraṃ nāma na pavisissāmī”ti saṃviggahadayo
atk-s0513a1:3075: “Nāhaṃ punaṃ na ca punaṃ, na cāpi apunappunaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:3077_0: Tattha na cāpi apunappunanti a-kāro nipātamatto. Ayaṃ panetissā sakalāyapi gāthāya
atk-s0513a1:3077_1: attho – ahañhi ito puna, tato ca punāti vuttavārato puna tatopi ca punappunaṃ vāraṇasarīrasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3077_2: hatthibondiṃ na pavekkhāmi. Kiṃkāraṇā? Tathā hi bhayatajjito, tathā hi ahaṃ imasmiññeva
atk-s0513a1:3077_3: pavesane bhayatajjito maraṇabhayena santāsaṃ saṃvegaṃ āpāditoti.
atk-s0513a1:3078: Evañca pana vatvā tatova palāyitvā puna taṃ vā aññaṃ vā hatthisarīraṃ nivattitvāpi na olokesi. Tato paṭṭhāya na lobhavasiko ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3079_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “bhikkhave, anto uppannakilesassa nāma vaḍḍhituṃ
atk-s0513a1:3079_1: adatvā tattha tattheva naṃ niggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3079_2: samodhānesi. Saccapariyosāne pañcasatāpi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, avasesesu
atk-s0513a1:3079_3: keci sotāpannā, keci sakadāgāmino, keci anāgāmino ahesuṃ. Tadā siṅgālo ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a1:3083_0: Ekapaṇṇo ayaṃ rukkhoti idaṃ satthā vesāliṃ upanissāya mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ viharanto
atk-s0513a1:3083_1: vesālikaṃ duṭṭhalicchavikumāraṃ ārabbha kathesi. Tasmiñhi kāle vesālinagaraṃ gāvutagāvutantare
atk-s0513a1:3083_2: tīhi pākārehi parikkhittaṃ tīsu ṭhānesu gopuraṭṭālakayuttaṃ paramasobhaggappattaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3083_3: Tattha niccakālaṃ rajjaṃ kāretvā vasantānaññeva rājūnaṃ satta sahassāni satta satāni
atk-s0513a1:3083_4: satta ca rājāno honti, tattakāyeva uparājāno, tattakā senāpatino, tattakā bhaṇḍāgārikā.
atk-s0513a1:3083_5: Tesaṃ rājakumārānaṃ antare eko duṭṭhalicchavikumāro nāma ahosi kodhano caṇḍo pharuso
atk-s0513a1:3083_6: sāhasiko, daṇḍena ghaṭṭitaāsīviso viya niccaṃ pajjalito kodhena. Tassa purato dve
atk-s0513a1:3083_7: tīṇi vacanāni kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Taṃ neva mātāpitaro, na ñātayo, na mittasuhajjā
atk-s0513a1:3083_8: sikkhāpetuṃ sakkhiṃsu. Athassa mātāpitūnaṃ etadahosi “ayaṃ kumāro atipharuso sāhasiko,
atk-s0513a1:3083_9: ṭhapetvā sammāsambuddhaṃ añño imaṃ vinetuṃ samattho nāma natthi, buddhaveneyyena
atk-s0513a1:3083_10: bhavitabba”nti. Te taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā āhaṃsu “bhante, ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3083_11: kumāro caṇḍo pharuso kodhena pajjalati, imassa ovādaṃ dethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3084_0: Satthā taṃ kumāraṃ ovadi – “kumāra, imesu nāma sattesu caṇḍena pharusena sāhasikena
atk-s0513a1:3084_1: viheṭhakajātikena na bhavitabbaṃ, pharusavāco ca nāma vijātamātuyāpi pitunopi puttadārassapi
atk-s0513a1:3084_2: bhātibhaginīnampi pajāpatiyāpi mittabandhavānampi appiyo hoti amanāpo, ḍaṃsituṃ āgacchanto
atk-s0513a1:3084_3: sappo viya, aṭaviyaṃ uṭṭhitacoro viya, khādituṃ āgacchanto yakkho viya ca ubbejanīyo
atk-s0513a1:3084_4: hutvā dutiyacittavāre nirayādīsu nibbattati. Diṭṭheyeva ca dhamme kodhano puggalo
atk-s0513a1:3084_5: maṇḍitapasādhitopi dubbaṇṇova hoti, puṇṇacandasassirikampissa mukhaṃ jālābhihatapadumaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3084_6: viya malaggahitakañcanādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya ca virūpaṃ hoti duddasikaṃ. Kodhaṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a1:3084_7: hi sattā satthaṃ ādāya attanāva attānaṃ paharanti, visaṃ khādanti, rajjuyā ubbandhanti,
atk-s0513a1:3084_8: papātā papatanti. Evaṃ kodhavasena kālaṃ katvā nirayādīsu uppajjanti, viheṭhakajātikāpi
atk-s0513a1:3084_9: diṭṭheva dhamme garahaṃ patvā kāyassa bhedā nirayādīsu uppajjanti, puna manussattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3084_10: labhitvā vijātakālato paṭṭhāya rogabahulāva honti. Cakkhurogo sotarogotiādīsu ca
atk-s0513a1:3084_11: rogesu ekato uṭṭhāya ekasmiṃ patanti, rogena aparimuttāva hutvā niccaṃ dukkhitāva
atk-s0513a1:3084_12: honti, tasmā sabbesu sattesu mettacittena hitacittena muducittena bhavitabbaṃ. Evarūpo
atk-s0513a1:3084_13: hi puggalo nirayādibhayehi na parimuccatī”ti. So kumāro satthu ovādaṃ sutvā ekovādeneva
atk-s0513a1:3084_14: nihatamāno danto nibbisevano mettacitto muducitto ahosi. Aññaṃ akkosantampi paharantampi
atk-s0513a1:3084_15: nivattitvā na olokesi, uddhaṭadāṭho viya sappo, aḷacchinno viya kakkaṭako, chinnavisāṇo
atk-s0513a1:3085_0: Tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, duṭṭhalicchavikumāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:3085_1: sucirampi ovaditvā neva mātāpitaro, na ñātimittādayo dametuṃ sakkhiṃsu, sammāsambuddho
atk-s0513a1:3085_2: pana taṃ ekovādeneva dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā mattavaravāraṇaṃ viya samuggahitāneñjakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3085_3: akāsi. Yāva subhāsitaṃ cidaṃ – ‘hatthidamakena, bhikkhave, hatthidammo sārito ekaṃyeva
atk-s0513a1:3085_4: disaṃ dhāvati puratthimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā dakkhiṇaṃ vā. Assadamakena…pe…
atk-s0513a1:3085_5: godamakena…pe… dakkhiṇaṃ vā. Tathāgatena hi, bhikkhave, arahatā sammāsambuddhena
atk-s0513a1:3085_6: purisadammo sārito aṭṭha disā vidhāvati, rūpī rūpāni passati. Ayamekā disā…pe… so
atk-s0513a1:3085_7: vuccati ‘yoggācariyānaṃ anuttaro purisadammasārathī’ti. Na hi, āvuso, sammāsambuddhena
atk-s0513a1:3085_8: sadiso purisadammasārathī nāma atthī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:3085_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idānevesa
atk-s0513a1:3085_10: mayā ekovādeneva damito, pubbepāhaṃ imaṃ ekovādeneva damesi”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3086_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:3086_1: vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ tayo vede sabbasippāni ca uggahetvā kiñci kālaṃ gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3086_2: vasitvā mātāpitūnaṃ accayena isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā
atk-s0513a1:3086_3: himavante vāsaṃ kappesi. Tattha ciraṃ vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya janapadaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:3086_4: bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase sunivattho supāruto tāpasākappasampanno
atk-s0513a1:3086_5: bhikkhāya nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājaṅgaṇaṃ pāpuṇi. Rājā sīhapañjarena olokento taṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:3086_6: iriyāpathe pasīditvā “ayaṃ tāpaso santindriyo santamānaso yugamattadaso, padavāre
atk-s0513a1:3086_7: padavāre sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapento viya sīhavijambhitena āgacchati. Sace santadhammo
atk-s0513a1:3086_8: nāmeko atthi, imassa tenabbhantare bhavitabba”nti cintetvā ekaṃ amaccaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:3086_9: So “kiṃ karomi, devā”ti āha. Etaṃ “tāpasaṃ ānehī”ti. So “sādhu, devā”ti bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3086_10: upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā hatthato bhikkhābhājanaṃ gahetvā “kiṃ, mahāpuññā”ti vutte
atk-s0513a1:3086_11: “bhante, rājā taṃ pakkosatī”ti āha. Bodhisatto “na mayaṃ rājakulūpakā, hemavantikā
atk-s0513a1:3086_12: nāmamhā”ti āha. Amacco gantvā tamatthaṃ rañño ārocesi. Rājā “añño amhākaṃ kulūpako
atk-s0513a1:3086_13: natthi, ānehi na”nti āha. Amacco gantvā bodhisattaṃ vanditvā yācitvā rājanivesanaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0513a1:3087_0: Rājā bodhisattaṃ vanditvā samussitasetacchatte kañcanapallaṅke nisīdāpetvā attano
atk-s0513a1:3087_1: paṭiyattaṃ nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhojetvā “kahaṃ, bhante, vasathā”ti pucchi. “Hemavantikā
atk-s0513a1:3087_2: mayaṃ, mahārājā”ti. “Idāni kahaṃ gacchathā”ti? “Vassārattānurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ upadhārema,
atk-s0513a1:3087_3: mahārājā”ti. “Tena hi, bhante, amhākaññeva uyyāne vasathā”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā sayampi
atk-s0513a1:3087_4: bhuñjitvā bodhisattaṃ ādāya uyyānaṃ gantvā paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāpi
atk-s0513a1:3087_5: kāretvā pabbajitaparikkhāre datvā uyyānapālaṃ paṭicchāpetvā nagaraṃ pāvisi. Tato
atk-s0513a1:3087_6: paṭṭhāya bodhisatto uyyāne vasati. Rājāpissa divase divase dvattikkhattuṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:3088_0: Tassa pana rañño duṭṭhakumāro nāma putto ahosi caṇḍo pharuso, neva naṃ rājā dametuṃ
atk-s0513a1:3088_1: asakkhi, na sesañātakā. Amaccāpi brāhmaṇagahapatikāpi ekato hutvā “sāmi, mā evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3088_2: kari, evaṃ kātuṃ na labbhā”ti kujjhitvā kathentāpi kathaṃ gāhāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3088_3: Rājā cintesi “ṭhapetvā mama ayyaṃ himavantatāpasaṃ añño imaṃ kumāraṃ dametuṃ samattho
atk-s0513a1:3088_4: nāma natthi, soyeva naṃ damessatī”ti. So kumāraṃ ādāya bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:3088_5: “bhante, ayaṃ kumāro caṇḍo pharuso, mayaṃ imaṃ dametuṃ na sakkoma, tumhe naṃ ekena
atk-s0513a1:3088_6: upāyena sikkhāpethā”ti kumāraṃ bodhisattassa niyyādetvā pakkāmi. Bodhisatto kumāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:3088_7: gahetvā uyyāne vicaranto ekato ekena, ekato ekenāti dvīhiyeva pattehi ekaṃ nimbapotakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3088_8: disvā kumāraṃ āha – “kumāra, etassa tāva rukkhapotakassa paṇṇaṃ khāditvā rasaṃ jānāhī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:3088_9: So tassa ekaṃ pattaṃ khāditvā rasaṃ ñatvā “dhī”ti saha kheḷena bhūmiyaṃ nuṭṭhābhi.
atk-s0513a1:3088_10: “Kiṃ etaṃ, kumārā”ti vutte “bhante, idānevesa rukkho halāhalavisūpamo, vaḍḍhanto
atk-s0513a1:3088_11: pana bahū manusse māressatī”ti taṃ nimbapotakaṃ uppāṭetvā hatthehi parimadditvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3092_0: Tattha ekapaṇṇoti ubhosu passesu ekekapaṇṇo. Na bhūmyā caturaṅguloti bhūmito caturaṅgulamattampi
atk-s0513a1:3092_1: na vaḍḍhito. Phalenāti phalarasena. Visakappenāti halāhalavisasadisena. Evaṃ khuddakopi
atk-s0513a1:3092_2: samāno evarūpena tittakena paṇṇena samannāgatoti attho. Mahāyaṃ kiṃ bhavissatīti
atk-s0513a1:3092_3: yadā panāyaṃ vuddhippatto mahā bhavissati, tadā kiṃ nāma bhavissati, addhā manussamārako
atk-s0513a1:3092_4: bhavissatīti etaṃ uppāṭetvā madditvā chaḍḍesinti āha.
atk-s0513a1:3093_0: Atha naṃ bodhisatto etadavoca “kumāra, tvaṃ imaṃ nimbapotakaṃ ‘idāneva evaṃtittako,
atk-s0513a1:3093_1: mahallakakāle kiṃ bhavissati, kuto imaṃ nissāya vuḍḍhī’ti uppāṭetvā madditvā chaḍḍesi?
atk-s0513a1:3093_2: Yathā tvaṃ etasmiṃ paṭipajji, evameva tava raṭṭhavāsinopi ‘ayaṃ kumāro daharakāleyeva
atk-s0513a1:3093_3: evaṃ caṇḍo pharuso, mahallakakāle rajjaṃ patvā kiṃ nāma karissati, kuto amhākaṃ etaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3093_4: nissāya vuḍḍhī’ti tava kulasantakaṃ rajjaṃ adatvā nimbapotakaṃ viya taṃ uppāṭetvā
atk-s0513a1:3093_5: raṭṭhā pabbājanīyakammaṃ karissanti, tasmā nimbarukkhapaṭibhāgataṃ hitvā ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:3093_6: khantimettānuddayasampanno hohī”ti. So tato paṭṭhāya nihatamāno nibbisevano khantimettānuddayasampanno
atk-s0513a1:3093_7: hutvā bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā pitu accayena rajjaṃ patvā dānādīni puññāni katvā
atk-s0513a1:3094_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idānevesa duṭṭhalicchavikumāro
atk-s0513a1:3094_1: mayā damito, pubbepāhaṃ etaṃ damesiṃyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā duṭṭhakumāro
atk-s0513a1:3094_2: ayaṃ licchavikumāro ahosi, rājā ānando, ovādadāyakatāpaso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:3098_0: Asantaṃ yo paggaṇhātīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ajātasattussa rañño asantapaggahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3098_1: ārabbha kathesi. So hi buddhānaṃ paṭikaṇṭakabhūte dussīle pāpadhamme devadatte pasīditvā
atk-s0513a1:3098_2: taṃ asantaṃ asappurisaṃ paggayha “tassa sakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti bahuṃ dhanaṃ pariccajitvā
atk-s0513a1:3098_3: gayāsīse vihāraṃ kāretvā tasseva vacanaṃ gahetvā pitaraṃ dhammarājānaṃ sotāpannaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3098_4: ariyasāvakaṃ ghātetvā attano sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṃ bhinditvā mahāvināsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3098_5: patto. So hi “devadatto pathaviyaṃ paviṭṭho”ti sutvā “kacci nu kho mampi pathavī
atk-s0513a1:3098_6: gileyyā”ti bhītatasito rajjasukhaṃ na labhati, sayane assādasukhaṃ na vindati, tibbakāraṇābhitunno
atk-s0513a1:3098_7: hatthipoto viya kampamāno vicarati. So pathaviṃ phalamānaṃ viya, avīcijālaṃ nikkhamantiṃ
atk-s0513a1:3098_8: viya, pathaviyā attānaṃ giliyamānaṃ viya, ādittāya lohapathaviyā uttānakaṃ nipajjāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:3098_9: ayasūlehi koṭiyamānaṃ viya ca samanupassi. Tenassa pahaṭakukkuṭasseva muhuttampi
atk-s0513a1:3098_10: kampamānassa avatthānaṃ nāma nāhosi. So sammāsambuddhaṃ passitukāmo khamāpetukāmo
atk-s0513a1:3098_11: pañhaṃ pucchitukāmo ahosi, attano pana aparādhamahantatāya upasaṅkamituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a1:3099_0: Athassa rājagahanagare kattikarattivāre sampatte devanagaraṃ viya nagare alaṅkate
atk-s0513a1:3099_1: mahātale amaccagaṇaparivutassa kañcanāsane nisinnassa jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ avidūre
atk-s0513a1:3099_2: nisinnaṃ disvā etadahosi “jīvakaṃ gahetvā sammāsambuddhassa santikaṃ gamissāmi, na
atk-s0513a1:3099_3: kho pana sakkā mayā ujukameva vattuṃ ‘ahaṃ, samma jīvaka, sayaṃ gantuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0513a1:3099_4: ehi maṃ satthu santikaṃ nehī’ti, pariyāyena pana rattisampadaṃ vaṇṇetvā ‘kaṃ nu khvajja
atk-s0513a1:3099_5: mayaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā payirupāseyyāma, yaṃ no payirupāsataṃ cittaṃ pasīdeyyā’ti
atk-s0513a1:3099_6: vakkhāmi, taṃ sutvā amaccā attano attano satthārānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathessanti, jīvakopi
atk-s0513a1:3099_7: sammāsambuddhassa vaṇṇaṃ kathessati. Atha naṃ gahetvā satthu santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3099_8: So pañcahi padehi rattiṃ vaṇṇesi “lakkhaññā vata bho dosinā ratti, abhirūpā vata
atk-s0513a1:3099_9: bho dosinā ratti, dassanīyā vata bho dosinā ratti, pāsādikā vata bho dosinā ratti,
atk-s0513a1:3099_10: ramaṇīyā vata bho dosinā ratti, kaṃ nu khvajja mayaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā payirupāseyyāma,
atk-s0513a1:3100_0: Atheko amacco pūraṇakassapassa vaṇṇaṃ kathesi, eko makkhaligosālassa, eko ajitakesakambalassa,
atk-s0513a1:3100_1: eko pakudhakaccāyanassa, eko sañcayassa belaṭṭhaputtassa, eko nāṭaputtanigaṇṭhassāti.
atk-s0513a1:3100_2: Rājā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tuṇhī ahosi. So hi jīvakasseva mahāamaccassa kathaṃ paccāsīsati.
atk-s0513a1:3100_3: Jīvakopi “raññā maṃ ārabbha kathiteyeva jānissāmī”ti avidūre tuṇhī nisīdi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0513a1:3100_4: rājā āha “tvaṃ pana, samma jīvaka, kiṃ tuṇhī”ti? Tasmiṃ khaṇe jīvako uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0513a1:3100_5: yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā “eso, deva, bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3100_6: ambavane viharati saddhiṃ aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi. Taṃ kho pana bhagavantaṃ evaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3100_7: kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato”ti nava arahādiguṇe vatvā jātito paṭṭhāya pubbanimittādibhedaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3100_8: bhagavato ānubhāvaṃ pakāsetvā “taṃ bhagavantaṃ devo payirupāsatu, dhammaṃ suṇātu,
atk-s0513a1:3101_0: Rājā sampuṇṇamanoratho hutvā “tena hi, samma jīvaka, hatthiyānāni kappāpehī”ti yānāni
atk-s0513a1:3101_1: kappāpetvā mahantena rājānubhāvena jīvakambavanaṃ gantvā tattha maṇḍalamāḷe bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3101_2: tathāgataṃ disvā santavīcimajjhe mahānāvaṃ viya niccalaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ito cito
atk-s0513a1:3101_3: ca anuviloketvā “evarūpā nāma me parisā na diṭṭhapubbā”ti iriyāpatheyeva pasīditvā
atk-s0513a1:3101_4: saṅghassa añjaliṃ paggaṇhitvā thutiṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno
atk-s0513a1:3101_5: sāmaññaphalapañhaṃ pucchi. Athassa bhagavā dvīhi bhāṇavārehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ sāmaññaphalasuttaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3101_6: kathesi. So suttapariyosāne attamano bhagavantaṃ khamāpetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3101_7: katvā pakkāmi. Satthā acirapakkantassa rañño bhikkhū āmantetvā “khatāyaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:3101_8: rājā, upahatāyaṃ, bhikkhave, rājā. Sacāyaṃ, bhikkhave, rājā issariyassa kāraṇā pitaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:3101_9: dhammikaṃ dhammarājānaṃ jīvitā na voropessatha, imasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3101_10: dhammacakkhuṃ uppajjissatha. Devadattaṃ nissāya asantapaggahaṃ katvā sotāpattiphalā parihīno”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:3102_0: Punadivase bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, ajātasattu kira asantapaggahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3102_1: katvā dussīlaṃ pāpadhammaṃ devadattaṃ nissāya pitughātakakammassa katattā sotāpattiphalā
atk-s0513a1:3102_2: parihīno, devadattena nāsito rājā”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi
atk-s0513a1:3102_3: kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, ajātasattu idāneva
atk-s0513a1:3102_4: asantapaggahaṃ katvā mahāvināsaṃ patto, pubbepesa asantapaggaheneva attānaṃ nāsesī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3103_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāvibhave brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0513a1:3103_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilaṃ gantvā sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho
atk-s0513a1:3103_2: ācariyo hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni sippaṃ vācesi. Tesu māṇavesu eko sañjīvo nāma
atk-s0513a1:3103_3: māṇavo atthi, bodhisatto tassa matakuṭṭhāpanakamantaṃ adāsi. So uṭṭhāpanakamantameva
atk-s0513a1:3103_4: gahetvā paṭibāhanamantaṃ pana aggahetvāva ekadivasaṃ māṇavehi saddhiṃ dāruatthāya
atk-s0513a1:3103_5: araññaṃ gantvā ekaṃ matabyagghaṃ disvā māṇave āha “bho, imaṃ matabyagghaṃ uṭṭhāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3103_6: Māṇavā “na sakkhissasī”ti āhaṃsu. “Passantānaññeva vo taṃ uṭṭhāpessāmī”ti. “Sace,
atk-s0513a1:3103_7: māṇava, sakkosi, uṭṭhāpehī”ti. Evañca pana vatvā te māṇavā rukkhaṃ abhiruhiṃsu. Sañjīvo
atk-s0513a1:3103_8: mantaṃ parivattetvā matabyagghaṃ sakkharāhi pahari, byaggho uṭṭhāya vegenāgantvā
atk-s0513a1:3103_9: sañjīvaṃ galanāḷiyaṃ ḍaṃsitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā tattheva pati, sañjīvopi tattheva
atk-s0513a1:3104_0: Māṇavā dārūni ādāya āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācariyassa ārocesuṃ. Ācariyo māṇave āmantetvā
atk-s0513a1:3104_1: “tātā, asantapaggahakārā nāma ayuttaṭṭhāne sakkārasammānaṃ karontā evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3107: Tameva ghāsaṃ kurute, byaggho sañjīviko yathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3108_0: Tattha asantanti tīhi duccaritehi samannāgataṃ dussīlaṃ pāpadhammaṃ. Yo paggaṇhātīti
atk-s0513a1:3108_1: khattiyādīsu yo koci evarūpaṃ dussīlaṃ pabbajitaṃ vā cīvarādisampadānena, gahaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3108_2: vā uparajjasenāpatiṭṭhānādisampadānena paggaṇhāti, sakkārasammānaṃ karotīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:3108_3: Asantaṃ cūpasevatīti yo ca evarūpaṃ asantaṃ dussīlaṃ upasevati bhajati payirupāsati.
atk-s0513a1:3108_4: Tameva ghāsaṃ kuruteti tameva asantapaggaṇhakaṃ so dussīlo pāpapuggalo ghasati saṃkhādati
atk-s0513a1:3108_5: vināsaṃ pāpeti. Kathaṃ? Byaggho sañjīviko yathāti, yathā sañjīvena māṇavena mantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3108_6: parivattetvā matabyaggho sañjīviko jīvitasampadānena sampaggahito attano jīvitadāyakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3108_7: sañjīvameva jīvitā voropetvā tattheva pātesi, evaṃ aññopi yo asantapaggahaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:3108_8: so dussīlo taṃ attano sampaggāhakameva vināseti. Evaṃ asantasampaggāhakā vināsaṃ pāpuṇantīti.
atk-s0513a1:3109: Bodhisatto imāya gāthāya māṇavānaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:3110: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā matabyagghuṭṭhāpanako māṇavo ajātasattu ahosi, disāpāmokkho ācariyo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
